deficiency_finding: In the last three months, the life boat was not maneuvered.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure and instructions is the immediate cause of substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: There was no record of maneuvering the life boat in the past few months because of bad weather or not obtaining a permit.
corrective_action: The life boat will be lowered into the sea by the ship master before he leaves.
preventive_action: The crew should note the reasons on the log book and look for another chance to lower the life boat.

deficiency_finding: The Seafarer employment agreement was not signed by the company.
description_overview: The Medical Certificate does not have C/E's signature on it.
immediate_causes: Instructions were given for the post to be on the bridge.
root_cause_analysis: Their contract document was not confirmed by officers.
corrective_action: The un-signed seafarer agreement was checked by the ship's officer and signed by the master.
preventive_action: The master checked the other seafarers' contract agreement.

deficiency_finding: Engine room officers do not have enough knowledge of the English language.
description_overview: The Deck Log Book was printed in English for Bridge-to-Bridge / Bridge-to-Shore communications, but the PSCO wanted it to be handwritten.
immediate_causes: A safety meeting was held.
root_cause_analysis: Crew's mother language is not English and she doesn't speak it very well.
corrective_action: Daily English listening and speaking practice.
preventive_action: There is daily English listening and speaking training.

deficiency_finding: There was no SDS in the paint store at the time of inspection.
description_overview: There was no SDS in the paint store at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: The ship crew doesn't have a concept of garbage management.
root_cause_analysis: The Material Safety Data Sheet was not located in the paint store and could not be presented to the PSCO.
corrective_action: It is visible to all personnel entering the paint store when it is kept at it's designated place.
preventive_action: The staff at the ship's stores were told to make a bright box to keep the sds for paints and chemicals.

deficiency_finding: There are no entries in the records for the main engine and auxiliary engines since the year 2021.
description_overview: The PSC deficiency was caused by the PSC Inspector keeping the records in hard copy.
immediate_causes: ISM Code regulation 11 'Documentation' is misinterpreted.
root_cause_analysis: The Master began keeping the documentation in hard copy in order to satisfy the PSC Inspector.
corrective_action: The Classification Society was invited to conduct an Occasional Survey.
preventive_action: There will be an Internal Audit within 3 months and an External Audit within the next H&S meeting.

deficiency_finding: The Gaga card was thrown on theOOP deck.
description_overview: The exposed area caused the garbage placards to fade.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The placards were degraded as a result of the decks being exposed and the external accommodation being washed at regular intervals.
corrective_action: New placards were posted on the faded ones.
preventive_action: The vessel was told to carry out the PSC checks diligently.

deficiency_finding: As per the PSC report requirement, the forward liferaft operating instruction was not complied with.
description_overview: As per the PSC report, the forward liferaft operating instruction was not complied with.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: The review instruction was not adequate.
corrective_action: All codes were upgraded to '10- rectified' after a follow-up inspection in Townsville, Australia.
preventive_action: The Quarterly Safety Bulletin raises awareness among the crew.

deficiency_finding: The control engine room has Propulsion and auxiliary machinery.
description_overview: The bell and strobe call alarms for the telephone by the M/E local control stand were not working.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Poor insulation from the stern navigation light and the old electric line caused the low insulation on the main switch board.
corrective_action: Keep insulation in the main switch board when replacing a new electric line and carry out a waterproof measure.
preventive_action: The master and C/E inspect the auxiliary and the responsible person should report any deficiencies to the master and chief engineer.

deficiency_finding: Not according to regulation.
description_overview: It is not clean.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel's hull was not clean due to the long stay in the previous port of call.
corrective_action: Due to vessel's short stay, the hull cleaning was postponed for the next Fujairah call on April 30th, 2024.
preventive_action: In due time deficiency will be shared with all managed vessels.

deficiency_finding: The hatch of E/R Sky lacks nuts.
description_overview: The Hatch of E/R Sky lack of two nuts, the Access cover of S/G RM lack of three nuts, and the Access cover of Rope store lack of two nuts.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The crews did not pay attention to the lack of nuts.
corrective_action: The crews put back butterfly nuts in the presence of PSC officers.
preventive_action: The nuts should be put back after opening the covers.

deficiency_finding: There is a Ladder without Wood Chock on the Port Side.
description_overview: Some medicines and equipment expired and were kept in a medical store.
immediate_causes: The old chock was not replaced in time.
root_cause_analysis: The old chock was not replaced in time.
corrective_action: The new chock was installed during the inspection.
preventive_action: All Gangways, including the midship pilot gangway, should be inspected periodically for the condition of the chocks and other fittings.

deficiency_finding: Exhaust manifolds have insufficient heat insulation.
description_overview: Fire-fighting equipment.
immediate_causes: Lack of awareness of the importance of securing spare parts.
root_cause_analysis: The company was overlooked because of the lack of fire fighting inspection regs.
corrective_action: Exhaust manifolds covered by insulation material.
preventive_action: The lesson learnt was sent to the fleet to verify the condition of the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The oil record book part I shall be completed on each occasion, on a tank-to-tank basis if appropriate.
description_overview: According to the log review, the oily water separator entered manual operation on the 17th of March.
immediate_causes: Load Line requirements are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: Commplacency and underestimation of the criticality of the task is one of the root causes of non conformity.
corrective_action: After the vessel's departure, C/E will be temporarily replaced, with pay, and immediately assigned to formal training for the proper and consistent maintenance of the Oil Record Book, before returning to active duty.
preventive_action: Information about the case, several Technical letters and Bulletins for review and discussion, in regards to proper operation of OWS and entries on Oil Record Book are included.

deficiency_finding: The spreader on the pilot ladders was found to have increased clearance.
description_overview: The clearance on the main deck is excessive.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The pilot ladders received onboard on 16-Nov-2022 and with apparent normal condition, but the PSC inspector insist that some clearance to be adjusted as per the requirement of the pilot.
corrective_action: The Deficiency closed after the ship' crew conducted adjustment according to the inspector's recommendation.
preventive_action: The deck appliance/fitting should be inspected and maintained as per the instructions in the maker's instruction manual.

deficiency_finding: Manning specified by the minimum safe manning doc, but the presence of a certified cook on board is not a requirement for MSMD.
description_overview: The cook on board is not provided by MSMD.
immediate_causes: The office was told.
root_cause_analysis: A re-issuance of the MSMC was shown despite the fact that the minimum number of persons required in the capacity of a Cook was shown in the flag administration marine notice.
corrective_action: Immediately contacted the Flag Administration for a re- issuance of MSMC.
preventive_action: MSMC was re-issued.

deficiency_finding: There was insufficient rest for the Chief Officer during cargo operations in February and January and for the Chief Engineer and 4th engineer during Bunkering.
description_overview: All of the vessels managed by the company are equipped with a dedicated software that is used to electronically maintain the hours of work and rest records by the onboard crew.
immediate_causes: The vessel was unable to apply the stencil in time due to the sudden berthing schedule.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of planning for rest hours for crew members.
corrective_action: After the inspection, a training session was held where the company's work-rest hour policy was discussed.
preventive_action: All vessels are reminded to use the pre planning module in the ISF watchkeeper to identify potential violations to have the mitigation measures placed in advance.

deficiency_finding: Emergency systems, lighting, batteries, and switches are on the main deck.
description_overview: All cargo has hatch cover.
immediate_causes: Minor leaks came up due to exposure.
root_cause_analysis: Emergency stop boxes were not checked.
corrective_action: Emergency boxes were freed during the PSC inspection.
preventive_action: To make sure emergency stop boxes and emergency switches are not missed in the future, a routine has been introduced.

deficiency_finding: The Lifebuoy is damaged.
description_overview: There was a weak fire alarm in the engine room.
immediate_causes: The crew on duty did not follow the rules.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision on board and neglect to comply with the company's Precautionary Inspection, maintenance Period and Distribution.
corrective_action: The life buoy on board was checked and found to be in good condition.
preventive_action: The supervision of the inspection of life-saving and fire-fighting equipment on board should be strengthened.

deficiency_finding: The sea water outlet pipe has a big margin of error.
description_overview: The deficiency identified by the PSCO was dealt with by the CCS on board the vessel at the port of Zhoushan.
immediate_causes: None was identified.
root_cause_analysis: No lack of standards, no lack of compliance, and no lack of planning were identified by the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: The next Safety Committee Meeting will discuss deficiency at the end of March.

deficiency_finding: The condition of the ship and its equipment will be maintained to conform with the provisions of the present regulations to ensure that the ship in all respects will remain fit to proceed to sea without danger to the ship or persons on board.
description_overview: Non-Conformity was rectified on April 20.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: The Master and Chief Engineer failed to follow up the requests for spare parts that were made to the Management Office.
corrective_action: The F.O. and L.O. purifiers were found in good running condition during the dry docking.
preventive_action: If spare parts are needed, the Management Office should be contacted immediately and the machineries and equipment should be in good working order.

deficiency_finding: The headline is not connected to the rescue boat.
description_overview: Rescue boat davit slewing is slow.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: The line was kept aside in the boat because of the lack of familiarity with the requirements.
corrective_action: The officer was told to connect the headline back to the rescue boat.
preventive_action: Make sure the headline is connected to the rescue boat.

deficiency_finding: The safety pin of CO2 cylinders needs to be removed.
description_overview: Bulk carriers add safety measures.
immediate_causes: Poor certificate management by Master resulted in EIAPP certificate not being returned to certificate file folder.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient knowledge by attending the RINA Surveyor to issue the proper EIAPP Certificates.
corrective_action: The maker of the CO2 system confirmed that the safety pin should not be removed from the safety position.
preventive_action: There is no need for preventive measures.

deficiency_finding: There are plans for survival craft.
description_overview: During the abandon ship drill, the crew couldn't demonstrate the launching of the lifeboat.
immediate_causes: The records and photographic evidence of the last drill were verified by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Aging and inadequate maintenance are to blame for material failure.
corrective_action: The first time the lifeboat was launched, it was not timely and an additional internal audit was carried out.
preventive_action: The deficiency along with corrective and preventive actions will be discussed during the next Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is a need to perform manual cleaning of the backflush motor filter.
description_overview: The discharge of water in a port is not required.
immediate_causes: The sewage treatment plant was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of Maintenance as per maker's procedures.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Outside light is partly dirty.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Didn't report the broken equipment to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The Company has established procedures to ensure that vessels are maintained in accordance with the provisions of the PMS.
corrective_action: The crew cleaned the globe after the PSC Officer pointed out the deficiency.
preventive_action: The necessary corrective and preventive action plan has been issued by the company.

deficiency_finding: The International Code of SignAL-SOLAS was missing.
description_overview: survival craft
immediate_causes: The crew could not show that the International Code of Signals was updated with the latest amendment.
root_cause_analysis: The crew thought that maintaining a soft copy would comply with the requirements.
corrective_action: The corrective action was demonstrated to the satisfaction of the attending PSCO, who closed the deficiency with code International Code of Signals 10.
preventive_action: The Master has been instructed to cross-check the updates carried out by the responsible officer on a random basis.

deficiency_finding: Winches and capstans.
description_overview: Brake lining is worn out and in poor conditions.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The brake lining condition had been observed and parts were ordered and delivered.
corrective_action: New brake liners were installed.
preventive_action: The thickness of the brake lining will be included in the form.

deficiency_finding: The latest wage scale as agreed in the Collective Bargaining Agreement is not applied in the seafarer employment agreements.
description_overview: The payroll and wage adjustment payment for the month of January will be included in February payroll when the Hong Kong CBA wage scale is implemented.
immediate_causes: Engine Cadet has exceeded 44 hours of work with a total of 118.6 hours excess OT since he joined the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: System factors are non conformance to Legislative rules or regulations, Seaway Restrictions, Inadequate SHE Control, Wear and Tear, and not related to Lack of Maintenance.
corrective_action: The Seafarer is expected to work in excess of normal working hours as required for the safe and efficient operation of the business.
preventive_action: Monitoring/planning onboard cadets training, work hours and keep relevant documentation readily available during a PSC inspection in order to avoid any remarks or non-conformities noted on the report.

deficiency_finding: The light is partly elec. wire loose.
description_overview: The light electrical cables weren't fastened properly during the inspection.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The cable supporting elements have been worn due to stress.
corrective_action: To the satisfaction of attending PSC inspectors, I secured sagging wires using cable bands.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer conducted a training session for all Engine Officers and Electricians on 24 April 2023.

deficiency_finding: When cargo operations were already well underway, the unloading plan was not the representative of the stevedore.
description_overview: When the gasket of the steam line gave way, PSCO did the E/R inspection at the same time.
immediate_causes: The terminal representative couldn't understand English and refused to sign the unloading plan.
root_cause_analysis: There was no foreman who came on-board to sign the unloading plan.
corrective_action: After foreman signed the unloading plan, it was shown to PSC.
preventive_action: To avoid any problems from the authorities, it is necessary for the Foreman to sign the Discharging plan prior to Cargo operation.

deficiency_finding: A/B, C/Ck, Messman, and many other Phillipino seafarers have valid medical fitness certificates that are in excess of 2 years.
description_overview: Incorrect wages were not in line with minimum wages as indicated in the CBA wage scale.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The date shown on the "fit to work" section should be the same as the date shown on the medical certificates.
corrective_action: The managers ordered the clinic to re-issue all medical certificates after two years after the "fit to work" date.
preventive_action: The managed fleet was told to check all medical certificates on board and to confirm compliance.

deficiency_finding: There is a light for embarkation of a rescue boat.
description_overview: The standard compass error was not determined by a watch.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear.
corrective_action: The light was repaired after the PSC inspection.
preventive_action: The Master was told to include theciency in the agenda of the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The company is unable to ensure the crew are well trained and organized.
description_overview: The crew can't demonstrate the alarm's function because they don't know the system.
immediate_causes: There is no compliance with procedures, permits, or safe working practices.
root_cause_analysis: The deficiencies that were pointed out were not taken into account.
corrective_action: Ensure the proper familiarization and training of the master, officers and crew are carried out regularly.
preventive_action: To inform all managed vessels about the deficiency to avoid a similar point out item during a PSC inspection.

deficiency_finding: There is oil leaking from the doors of the building.
description_overview: A/E were running on load for cargo operation.
immediate_causes: It is closed and not filled.
root_cause_analysis: Poor seal between the gasket and the engine frame caused the oil leak from the crankcase doors.
corrective_action: After the gasket replacement, the auxiliary engines were tested under load and found to be operating normally.
preventive_action: The crew was briefed about the importance of replacing the gasket after the Crankcase inspection.

deficiency_finding: The ECR air conditioning cooling unit does not work in cooling mode.
description_overview: The boat cooling water port was blocked by a fire.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: There is a root cause of the deficiency.
corrective_action: The crew of the engine's crew had to fix the leaking engine's crew air condition.
preventive_action: All officers and crew will be involved in the monthly safety committee meeting to discuss all the deficiencies.

deficiency_finding: The Master is instructed to notify class and arrange for their recording or agreement to repair for the damage not later than January 9, 2023.
description_overview: The QHSE team will be notified if the risk rating is high.
immediate_causes: The electrician was asked to fix the lights.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of this incident is the crew's inability to follow Company's procedures, proper reporting, coordination of task on hand and lack of proper inspection.
corrective_action: In the meantime, the condition will be monitored and will be in close contact with classification society.
preventive_action: Since it is a case that should have been communicated to the company, it was communicated to the crew.

deficiency_finding: Sickbay is not required to use a store room.
description_overview: Steering gear room has an oil store.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The mattress is stowed in the sick bay temporarily as the place the mattress is used by the stevedores at the port.
corrective_action: The sick bay was kept free from any other stores except hospital equipment and medicine, and good hygiene was maintained because the mattress was stowed before.
preventive_action: There is a requirement for all crew/officer awareness and compliance.

deficiency_finding: The application for endorsement by the flag state is not available.
description_overview: The lifeboat engine did not start.
immediate_causes: The established procedure was not followed.
root_cause_analysis: The 2nd mate lost the applications before the port arrival.
corrective_action: The Crew department sent the 2nd Engineer's application again.
preventive_action: The Master gave the documents to the 2nd and 3rd officer.

deficiency_finding: On June 1, 2023, the vessel received a new fireman outfit and a new fire man outfit.
description_overview: A fireman was not wearing the correct fireman's outfit as the crew was unable to perform a satisfactory fire drill.
immediate_causes: The correct donning procedure was explained to the crew members after they were briefed on the inspector's concern.
root_cause_analysis: The orientation on the fire drill was inadequate.
corrective_action: On June 1, 2023, the vessel received a new fireman outfit and a new fire man outfit.
preventive_action: To avoid further argument with EU PSCO, the company fleet's fireman outfit will be replaced with a new standard.

deficiency_finding: The number of the two-way vhf radiotelephone apparatus is not indicated in the location.
description_overview: There is a training booklet in the mess rooms.
immediate_causes: The requirement of posting the number of sets next to the symbol wasn't realized by the responsible officer.
root_cause_analysis: The number of the two-way vhf radiotelephone apparatus was not marked on the cabinet of portable radio.
corrective_action: The number of the two-way vhf radiotelephone apparatus was posted immediately by the deck crew.
preventive_action: The details of this deficiency will be shared with the fleet management for the attention of Masters and involved crew members.

deficiency_finding: There was a short rubber packet on the skylight cover.
description_overview: The auxiliary engine number 1 fuel oil leak alarm system was bypassed.
immediate_causes: The original rubber packets for the skylight cover of E/R have been removed for coaming maintenance purpose.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient work, production standards, and inadequate risk identification are some of the root cause-job factors.
corrective_action: Upon completion of the maintenance work, the new rubber packet was restored back.
preventive_action: To ensure that the warning signs are posted in the vicinity of the work areas onboard, the training is to be carried out.

deficiency_finding: Not available during inspection for chemicals stored in forecastle.
description_overview: The forecastle was often covered with sea splash due to the bad weather and low freeboard.
immediate_causes: The crew was told to separate the chemicals in the locker.
root_cause_analysis: The deck crew did not know how to use the chemical management procedure.
corrective_action: Put the MSDS next to the chemicals in the forecastle store.
preventive_action: Put the MSDS next to the chemicals in the forecastle store.

deficiency_finding: There are tight conditions.
description_overview: The starboard side freeboard marks, forward and middle draft marks, and Plimsoll mark are not fully painted.
immediate_causes: The vessel has been at the last port of Iquique, Chile for more than a month and failed to clean the hull due to restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of supervision and compliance with the maintenance plan.
corrective_action: The port authority gave permission for the marks to be painted.
preventive_action: Inspection hull condition should be carried out regularly during stay in ports.

deficiency_finding: A copy of the report was posted on the ship's notice board.
description_overview: The certificate on board was not valid.
immediate_causes: Delays of maintenance were caused by previous port restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: The present system of Class Audit was not understood by the company.
corrective_action: The company gives the audit record to the vessel.
preventive_action: The audit record was not issued by the class auditor due to the shift to electric data base.

deficiency_finding: The navigation bridge has a table of life-saving signals missing.
description_overview: There are life-saving signals missing on the navigation bridge.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient safety checks by the Master and Safety Officer during their safety rounds.
corrective_action: The Table of Life saving signals on the Bridge were immediately posted.
preventive_action: To maintain oversight and ensure that all required posters are posted on the navigation bridge and other areas on the vessel, the master must be a safety officer.

deficiency_finding: The galley and provision room are not sanitary.
description_overview: The inspector pointed out that the second officer didn't set up the station code.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: The galley and provision store must be kept in a sanitary condition as per the requirements of the Maritime Labor Convention 2006 Management Manual.
corrective_action: The crew cleaned the galley and provision store.
preventive_action: Master should improve the inspection of the galley and provision store.

deficiency_finding: The Master cannot verify the information contained in the electronic certificate, including confirmation of periodic endorsements, when necessary because the vessel is carrying digitally issued certificates by Flag Administration and R.O.
description_overview: The service confirmation for the Voyage data recorder expired.
immediate_causes: The missing authorisation letter was immediately sent to the vessel by the office.
root_cause_analysis: There is no internet access on the vessel.
corrective_action: An electronic certificates file procedure was received.
preventive_action: Since all documentation is handled by the office, it is not necessary to fit Alrayan with internet.

deficiency_finding: The Gaga card was thrown on theOOP deck.
description_overview: The exposed area caused the garbage placards to fade.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The placards were degraded as a result of the decks being exposed and the external accommodation being washed at regular intervals.
corrective_action: New placards were posted on the faded ones.
preventive_action: The vessel was told to carry out the PSC checks diligently.

deficiency_finding: The drill report was not real.
description_overview: The crew did not know how to wear a fireman's outfit.
immediate_causes: The space drill report was immediately corrected.
root_cause_analysis: The enclosed space entry and rescue drill reports were unrealistic according to PSCO.
corrective_action: The crew will repeat the drill in front of the PSC.
preventive_action: The master needs to teach the crew with abandon ship drill procedures.

deficiency_finding: Mooring line one no. at stern and two nos. at forward slack.
description_overview: Mooring line one no. at stern and two nos. at forward slack.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Not proper monitoring and not properly defined procedures.
corrective_action: Instructions for proper monitoring of mooring lines tension and balancing adjustment were immediately given to all crew members.
preventive_action: The newly developed mooring management plan was shared with the crew.

deficiency_finding: After treatment, sewage water is collected through the pipe to the peak tank which is not marked on the cert.
description_overview: After treatment, sewage water is collected through the pipe to the peak tank which is not marked on the cert.
immediate_causes: The valve that goes to the sewage treatment unit is not rotating.
root_cause_analysis: There are issues with the sewage holding tank in the sewage treatment system.
corrective_action: In response to the identified non-compliance issue, the master suspended the collection of sewage for about 12 hours until sailing, effectively managing 15 metric tons of water.
preventive_action: In order to prevent the recurrence of the same in the future and to improve the safety standard, all deficiencies will be shared with the whole fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The communication method was not completed before the ship arrived at the port.
description_overview: After mooring operations by the Aft mooring team, the Winch clutch lever was not put in place.
immediate_causes: The information on the Communication method was missing in the ship/shore checklist.
root_cause_analysis: There are personal facts about inadequate practice and inadequate coaching.
corrective_action: The training is done by the master to duty officer.
preventive_action: Sharing of deficiency is a way to prevent re-occurrence.

deficiency_finding: The valid collective bargaining agreement is not available on board.
description_overview: The Collective Bargaining Agreement has been forwarded to all managed vessels by the Crew department.
immediate_causes: Same was not immediately presented to the PSC Inspector, which resulted in the PSC deficiency.
root_cause_analysis: The PSC Inspector received the CBA after a few minutes.
corrective_action: The Classification Society was invited to conduct an Occasional Survey.
preventive_action: There are existing operating procedures for vessels.

deficiency_finding: There are no chlorine tablets in the sewage treatment plant.
description_overview: The watchkeepers missed a chance to check the contents of the compartment for chlorine tablets.
immediate_causes: The valve that goes to the sewage treatment unit is not rotating.
root_cause_analysis: The checks to make sure the quantity of chlorine tablets was enough were not effective.
corrective_action: There was a note posted near the chlorinator to check for chlorine tablets.
preventive_action: Training is carried out for all crew members to confirm compliance with the work order.

deficiency_finding: Engine room, fire alarm panel, steering gear, and one yellow and green rotation lamp are not working.
description_overview: The rudder angle indicator was not showing the same angle as the bridge repeater.
immediate_causes: During control testing, the navigation lights were found to be in good order.
root_cause_analysis: The Engine Room alarm indicators were found to be malfunctioning during the Engine Room inspection.
corrective_action: The sound alarm was restored after the electric wire was re- connected.
preventive_action: In order to avoid the re-occurrence of the problem, the Electrician has been recommended to check all connections for proper tightening during the periodic PMS check and all lamps to be checked as required by the work orders.

deficiency_finding: There are recreational facilities and a mess room.
description_overview: There was no fitness equipment in the gym.
immediate_causes: The crew kept excessive mineral drinking water in his cabin.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge neglected the requirements of the company.
corrective_action: It was reported to the company, discussed the deficiency and analyzed the cause.
preventive_action: Master should strengthen supervision and inspection on board in order to avoid similar defects.

deficiency_finding: There are three hatch covers cylinders that are leaking on the main deck.
description_overview: Bulk carriers add safety measures.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment includes jack plugs.
root_cause_analysis: The cylinder oil seal is senescent.
corrective_action: The spare parts can be renewed by the assembly cylinder.
preventive_action: Walk around inspection is one way to improve the standard and responsibility of management in shipboard maintenance.

deficiency_finding: The fire doors can't be closed tightly.
description_overview: The vessel's overall appearance was found to be satisfactory.
immediate_causes: The fire door doesn't have an adjustment to lock.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance and inspection.
corrective_action: The door leading to the bridge was adjusted.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was briefed by the Master to include this item in the weekly routine inspections.

deficiency_finding: The mooring rope at the poop deck is in bad shape.
description_overview: The cargo holds line 3 has a smoke sampling fire detection system.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The ship staff failed to inspect the ship.
corrective_action: The mooring ropes on the poop deck have been renewed by the ship's staff.
preventive_action: The mooring ropes must be inspected every now and then as well as before and after use.

deficiency_finding: Sewage holding tank is leaking.
description_overview: Sewage holding tank is leaking.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector found a leak at the sewage holding tank.
corrective_action: The bolts were tightened and the leak was fixed to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The daily Engine UMS checklist was further enhanced to request sewage check for leak on daily basis and non-conformity was issued as per Company's procedures for all PSC findings.

deficiency_finding: There is a lack of maintenance on the ventilation system on board.
description_overview: The INMARSAT-C date role has been replaced due to old software.
immediate_causes: Direct is Tear and Wear.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient leadership or supervision.
corrective_action: The Steering Gear Room Stbd Side had ER Vent Ducting repaired with galva tin sheeting.
preventive_action: Managers are to be kept fully aware of any defects that can't be fixed.

deficiency_finding: There is a cargo ship safety radio.
description_overview: The boat and socks are missing.
immediate_causes: Failure to check tools prior to use of equipment is a human factor.
root_cause_analysis: The concerned officer was unaware of the requirement to have drain socks fitted to the rescue boat drain.
corrective_action: Rescue boat drain socks were put in place by the AMSA inspector.
preventive_action: The Life Saving appliance Maintenance Plan has instructions on the monthly check of rescue boat drain socks.

deficiency_finding: There is welding equipment that is not properly sealed at penetration.
description_overview: One deficiency was identified during the PSC in Shibushi, Japan.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Although vessel is a new building and constructed as per latest applicable regulations and standards, during inspection PSC Officer shook the cable from welding equipment resulting to partial dislocation of putty at penetration.
corrective_action: Penetration was upgraded in order to satisfy the PSC request and prevent future comments.
preventive_action: The safety committee will discuss the matter at the next meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is a steering gear compartment.
description_overview: The steering gear compartment has electric cables near the securing tray.
immediate_causes: The vessel did not have to have certs onboard.
root_cause_analysis: Good maintenance is not kept onboard.
corrective_action: All wasted cable ties have been replaced with new ones.
preventive_action: Senior officer keep an eye on crew maintenance work, ensure all work is done correctly, and check crew work during a ship visit.

deficiency_finding: The path of the M5-2 was worn out and parts were missing.
description_overview: Brake lining is worn out and in poor conditions.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of inspection is a basic underlying cause.
corrective_action: Due to the use of tensioned mooring ropes and the worn out break path, the roller will be changed in due time.
preventive_action: Instructions and training should be done by the crew.

deficiency_finding: The last master review record was found on the board, but there were no records of the annual master review.
description_overview: The previous Master uploaded the document into the system prior to the due date.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient management of change.
corrective_action: The Annual Master's review of the year 2022, was printed out and filed.
preventive_action: A work order has been created to alert the vessel when the Annual Master's SMS review is due, and the requirement to attach.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence of flag notification of defect or flag agreed equivalance on board.
description_overview: The observations were made due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with flag rules.
root_cause_analysis: The office did not report the inoperative speedlog.
corrective_action: The flag should be given to the office.
preventive_action: When equipment becomes inoperative, Flag should be informed.

deficiency_finding: The free fall boat has not been in the water since May 10, 2022.
description_overview: There was a fire drill for the galley.
immediate_causes: The crew did not know about the 2 valves pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: There is no specific regulation on this matter, but a typical simulating launching sequence is carried out during the management change.
corrective_action: The boat was in the water at Eemshaven.
preventive_action: The crew was informed that when the ship hand over rescue boats/lifeboats /free-fall lifeboats, they would be lowered and maneuvered in the water.

deficiency_finding: There is a record book of engine parameters.
description_overview: No NOx verification is done for ME and A/E replacements.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to update the record book of engine parameters.
corrective_action: The record book of engine parameters should have been updated immediately.
preventive_action: The chief engineer must educate the engine crew about environmental pollution prevention and the record book of engine parameters.

deficiency_finding: The temperature in the room was too hot to work on board.
description_overview: The discharge of water in a port is not required.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: For the reason of long service hour and steam passing both inlet and outlet that contributes the tubings to degrade.
corrective_action: The company arranged for a shore technician to fix the air cond. unit after the port state inspector recommended it.
preventive_action: Supply necessary spare parts on board in time for air condition repairs.

deficiency_finding: The alarm panel in the water ingress detector is faulty.
description_overview: The Chief Officer conducted both tests without any defects and on a monthly basis.
immediate_causes: Defective tools, equipment, materials, and preventive cleaning are some of the things that can be found.
root_cause_analysis: Defective tools, equipment, materials, and preventive cleaning are some of the things that can be found.
corrective_action: The new sensor was successfully fitted during the vessel's dry-docking / special surveys to the satisfaction of the attending Class surveyor.
preventive_action: Master will discuss the deficiency during the next monthly safety meeting in order to discuss the inspection's overall process; the recorded deficiency's contributed factors among to all crew members in order to ensure that sufficient shipboard inspections shall be conducted at all times.

deficiency_finding: The exhaust fan in the laundry room is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The last maintenance was done on April 2nd, 2024 and the starter panel, noise controls, and vibration level were all found to be in good condition.
immediate_causes: Lack of awareness of the importance of securing spare parts.
root_cause_analysis: Poor work standards.
corrective_action: The fan has been replaced.

deficiency_finding: The crew couldn't demonstrate high pressure leak test, low pressure alarm test and mask seal test.
description_overview: Poor crew performance during fire drill is related to poor maintenance and lack of central centre of command.
immediate_causes: The unit was inspected and repaired.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient training.
corrective_action: The importance of proper usage of vessel's FFE/LSA equipment was discussed and analyzed.
preventive_action: The PSC Inspection report and lessons learned have been included in the agenda of the monthly scheduled Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is a copy of a certificate of financial security on the board.
description_overview: In the crew mess room, it was observed that the certificates were not pasted.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was a human error when the copy was posted in the crew mess room.
preventive_action: Learning will be sent to all vessels in the form of Safety Bulletin-Monthly findings list.

deficiency_finding: The audible alarm did not work during the test of the water system in the store.
description_overview: There was no evidence that ACM had been removed from the vessel.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given and the deficiency was fixed on-site during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The audible alarm failed to operate during the test, but the visual alarm gave a proper signal.
corrective_action: The inspector cleared the deficiency after the audio signal was re-instated and evidence provided.
preventive_action: Instructions for the verification of the wiring arrangement of the alarm panel, as well as the operability of both visual/audio alarm, will be included in a safety directive.

deficiency_finding: There is no documentation that shows how long the rest days are.
description_overview: On the voyage from Krishnapatnam to San Lorenzo, the ship staff was involved in hold cleaning.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer and the Deck Officers are responsible for making sure the deck scuppers are plugged and secured.
root_cause_analysis: The staff of the ship missed out on the number of days the crew member was rested after the accident.
corrective_action: After seeing the PSCO observation, the number of days the AB was off-duty was entered in the accident report.
preventive_action: The human elements were briefed to include all details in the accident and incident forms, review and confirm that all details are captured prior to closing the report.

deficiency_finding: There was no hand washing arrangement in the galley.
description_overview: The depth of the echo sounder is fed into the ECDIS for continuous recording.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The guideline states that towels, soap and toilet paper should be provided by the ship's owner, but not the paper towel.
corrective_action: Place a paper towel in front of you to wash your hands.
preventive_action: The company sent the required paperwork to confirm the paper towel in the galley.

deficiency_finding: There are warning notices.
description_overview: Some frame markings from F70 to F80 are not in the same color.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The frame numbers 70, 75 and 80 are painted on the port side main deck.
preventive_action: The vessel manager briefed the entire ship staff to make sure that the markings on the vessel are refreshed and painted in contrasting colors after carrying out maintenance work.

deficiency_finding: The IBWM-certificate states that the water management methods used on the vessel are in line with the regulations.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: There was no flow of sludge observed due to malfunctioning of solenoid valve which allows air for sludge to return in both "auto" and "manual" mode Immediate Cause - Substandard Conditions
root_cause_analysis: The certificate was issued at Istanbul/Turkey on the 1 April 2020 and Annually surveyed and signed by Imed Houas.
corrective_action: A new IBWM-Certificate reflecting only regulation D-2 was sent on board.
preventive_action: Special reference was made to the importance of proper handling and examination of ship's certification in the training session carried out by Master and Chief Engineer.

deficiency_finding: There was no information on the engine logbook.
description_overview: Lifejackets as part of the vessel's LSA / safety equipment are being checked and maintained on a monthly basis following the company's SMS/PMS interval requirements and in accordance with SOLAS, LSA Code, makers and Flag Administration's requirements.
immediate_causes: There was no immediate corrective action requested or taken.
root_cause_analysis: He proceeds for another task after the maintenance instead of making all necessary records.
corrective_action: The records in the Engine logbook were immediately updated by the officer-in-charge.
preventive_action: The importance of record keeping and prioritization of completing the task before taking to another task shall be observed diligently.

deficiency_finding: The onboard complain procedure states that a placard should be posted in the officers and crew messroom with contact information of the competent authority of the seafarer's country.
description_overview: The onboard complaint procedures don't specify contact information for the competent authority in the seafarers country of residence, and the name of a person or persons onboard the ship who can, on a confidential basis, provide seafarers with impartial advise on their complaint and otherwise assist them in following the compliant procedures available
immediate_causes: Training/familiarization records were not presented during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The complaint procedure was not read and understood by the officer.
corrective_action: The contact details of the designated crew member were posted immediately in Appendix 1 of the manual.
preventive_action: All crew members were trained on the complaint procedure.

deficiency_finding: The actual voyage time was not matched by the voyage plan.
description_overview: There is a smoke detection system for cargo holds.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient monitoring.
corrective_action: The correct route chart was used to revise the voyage plan.
preventive_action: The Marine manager will check out the deficiency on a sampling basis.

deficiency_finding: The crane hook safety latch is malfunctioning.
description_overview: There is no power in the bottle that is used to operate the rescue boat crane.
immediate_causes: Human physical constraints are caused by error.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency is servicing.
corrective_action: The crane hook safety latch was immediately rectified to the satisfaction of the PSC inspectors.
preventive_action: The monthly safety committee meeting will include the participation of all officers and crew to discuss the deficiencies.

deficiency_finding: Diesel engine air pollution control is out of order.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: The equipment defect caused the SCR to be out of order.
root_cause_analysis: Factory defect or faulty equipment.
corrective_action: The CA was imposed on the vessel after the class was informed.
preventive_action: The manufacturer's instructions will be followed.

deficiency_finding: Personal protection.
description_overview: The emergency showers were not ready to use because the water was drained.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human performance difficulties are not followed.
corrective_action: Prior to calling the port, the vessel had prepared for the cold weather by checking the emergency eyewash and showers.
preventive_action: The crew members were briefed on cold weather preparations and procedures and the Chief Engineer explained the functioning of the equipment.

deficiency_finding: The S.E.A isn't original and isn't signed by the person who authorized it.
description_overview: The number of people which the ship is certified to carry is not indicated in the International Sewage Pollution Prevention Cert.
immediate_causes: The PSCO did not agree with the fact that the last attending class surveyor failed to stamp on the safety radio certificate.
root_cause_analysis: Poor knowledge, lack of supervision.
corrective_action: Re-sign all S.E.A authorization.
preventive_action: Strengthen supervision.

deficiency_finding: EEBD for training is not marked.
description_overview: The pressure on the bridge was less than recommended.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The third officer doesn't talk about the training purpose.
corrective_action: The training purpose was marked by the third officer.
preventive_action: The LSA/FFA must be inspected and maintained by the third officer.

deficiency_finding: The second officer and third engineer signed on board but did not hold valid COC or CRA.
description_overview: There are no records in the approved training record book.
immediate_causes: When heaving up the port side anchor, the windlass mooring winch gear sheared due to heavy weather.
root_cause_analysis: At the time of embarkation of crew, Master checks for the crew Certificates and documents; and highlights any discrepancy with the Office.
corrective_action: All crew had a valid flag license at the time of inspection.
preventive_action: The monthly finding list will be shared with the Fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The GMS gas analyzer malfunctioned on low input value.
description_overview: According to the flag state approved action plan, to be repaired.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the schedule.
root_cause_analysis: There is no spare on the board.
corrective_action: The company arranged for the repair of the GMS analyzer in this port and the same was done in the present port.
preventive_action: Training for the crew will be given and additional maintenance routine will be kept.

deficiency_finding: Training for new crew.
description_overview: There are ventilators in the store.
immediate_causes: There is an immediate cause of substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The direct cause is to discard related records.
corrective_action: On September 30, 2022, all crewmembers, including 2/E and BOSUN, were trained toFamiliarize with shipboard essential instructions, fire-fighting / abandon ship drill, and changes in the ship management system.
preventive_action: It will be discussed with the existing ship manager so that the records of shipboard activities will be kept for at least one year when the next ship management takes over.

deficiency_finding: The main unit of the public address is out of order.
description_overview: Since the system was on all the time and the main panel is located in the equipment room which is not monitored, the staff missed the power indication light failure on the main panel.
immediate_causes: The power indicator lamp failure was not noticed.
root_cause_analysis: The PA System main console is located in the electrical equipment room.
corrective_action: The power inlet light has been replaced.
preventive_action: It will be included in the PA System weekly/monthly checks as well as the main panel in the electrical equipment room.

deficiency_finding: There is a free fall life boat.
description_overview: There is no safe way to get to the free fall emergency light.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: The safety officer didn't follow company guidelines.
corrective_action: Cleaned free fall wind chime.
preventive_action: The safety officer was told to keep the free fall window clean.

deficiency_finding: The galley and handling rooms are dirty.
description_overview: In order to allow the shore loader to access the hatches, the crew had to take breaks to maintain the air draft.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: The company procedures specify that the accommodation area should be inspected on a weekly basis, but the responsible officer failed to identify and address issues such as the uncleaned corners at the bottom of galley cabinets, the lack of regular cleaning and organizing inside the galley refrigerator, and the failure.
corrective_action: The galley was immediately cleaned after the inspection and the wooden boards were removed.
preventive_action: The importance of hygiene for crew health was emphasized by the master.

deficiency_finding: There are three certificates for Master that have expired.
description_overview: There is no copy of the certificate of safety training in the documents.
immediate_causes: Delays of maintenance were caused by previous port restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: The crewing company did not submit the renewal application on time.
corrective_action: The certificates should be renewed under the regulations.
preventive_action: All certificates should be maintained and followed up after application.

deficiency_finding: A seafarer with medical fitness is valid for more than 2 years.
description_overview: A seafarer for a medical checkup.
immediate_causes: Even if validation of certificate was met according to company requirement, some crew's medical certificate was not meet U.K rule.
root_cause_analysis: The crew's medical certificate was met because all the validation was done in 2 years.
corrective_action: Discuss medical certificate of philippine crew with company.
preventive_action: The attached agreement will be used for the prevention of the same point out from the external parties.

deficiency_finding: Diesel Generators exhaust gas pipes are not completely protected.
description_overview: The inspector's comment is acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: After arriving at Piraeus anchorage, the vessel stayed there for a few days for routine maintenance on several equipment before heading towards Tersan shipyard to begin her planned dry dock repairs.
corrective_action: The missing insulation covers were put back as required.
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: The ISM system needs to be corrected within 3 months.
description_overview: The ISM system needs to be corrected within 3 months.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow rules and regulations is a substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of safety awareness on the part of the crew.
corrective_action: Office staffs followed up to provide assistance to master without delay.
preventive_action: The ship department heads are required to report to the master's office if they have any problems with shipboard maintenance.

deficiency_finding: The spring is broken and the safety hook is not self back returned.
description_overview: There is safety management.
immediate_causes: Human physical constraints are caused by error.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of inspection of hooks in the maker's maintenance manual.
corrective_action: A new spring has been installed.
preventive_action: Random check by company's Supremo during internal audits.

deficiency_finding: There is a Hi-Hi alarm.
description_overview: There is a Hi-Hi alarm for No. 3 CH.
immediate_causes: The alarm was caused by sensor failure but not able to access it immediately.
root_cause_analysis: Cargo loads affect sensor and malfunction.
corrective_action: A simulation test was carried out to confirm that the system was functioning normally.
preventive_action: If there is a sensor failure, keep the spare sensor on board and conduct a routine fuction test.

deficiency_finding: The port side navigation wing's RPM indicator is not adjusted properly.
description_overview: When the engine was stopped, the Rpm indicator was stuck on 35rpm and did not come back to zero.
immediate_causes: The gangway net was damaged when the crew tried to shift the gangway to allow the crane's movement and adjust the height of the gangway for the tidal change during the port stay.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance was not done.
corrective_action: The electrical officer was asked to check the port side indicator.
preventive_action: The master will explain the proper checks of bridge equipment to the bridge team.

deficiency_finding: From the steering control position on the bridge, the magnetic compass can't be seen clearly.
description_overview: There is an emergency light for the Magnetic compass.
immediate_causes: The officer forgot to put the blocker back in ECDIS as he was rushing to finish the plan.
root_cause_analysis: The officer did not report the condition of the magnetic compass.
corrective_action: The officer and electrician were told to clean the mirror of the magnetic compass.
preventive_action: The magnetic compass mirror must be cleaned by deck officers.

deficiency_finding: The Collective Bargaining Agreement expired at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The interim certificate expired on January 14, 2023.
immediate_causes: Lack of distribution of standard.
root_cause_analysis: The previous Master didn't check the relevant certificate prior to arrival and didn't find the CBA on board.
corrective_action: Master showed the expired ones to the PSCO and put the valid one into the file.
preventive_action: Enhance the training of SMI-S-J16 (The Stipulations on External Inspection), SMI-S-L02 (The Stipulations for Management of Ship Files), and the Maritime Labor Management Handbook.

deficiency_finding: There is a fuel change-over procedure.
description_overview: FO change over procedure will include preparation to cross ECA line and later on stop/start scrubber operation.
immediate_causes: The PSC Inspector raised a deficiency when they found that the FO change over procedure did not contain the necessary steps for preparation prior to entering the ECA line and start/stop scrubber operation.
root_cause_analysis: Chief Engineer did not keep relevant records and presented only low sulphur log book entries related to FO change over prior crossing ECA line.
corrective_action: Company's Circular No. 25 was revised to include step by step instructions on the preparation of the vessels prior to entering the ECA line.
preventive_action: Company's Circular No. 30 "Bunkers Remaining On Board On Arrival"

deficiency_finding: Two rollers in the forecastle were blocked at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: The forecastle was often covered with sea splash due to bad weather and low freeboard.
immediate_causes: Poor supervision and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Poor supervision and maintenance.
corrective_action: Rollers were repaired.
preventive_action: This finding together with control, root cause and corrective actions applied will be brought to crew attention during regular safety meeting on board with goal to prevent similar occurrences.

deficiency_finding: The spring is broken and the safety hook is not self back returned.
description_overview: There is safety management.
immediate_causes: Human physical constraints are caused by error.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of inspection of hooks in the maker's maintenance manual.
corrective_action: A new spring has been installed.
preventive_action: Random check by company's Supremo during internal audits.

deficiency_finding: The navigation bridge has a table of life-saving signals missing.
description_overview: There are life-saving signals missing on the navigation bridge.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient safety checks by the Master and Safety Officer during their safety rounds.
corrective_action: The Table of Life saving signals on the Bridge were immediately posted.
preventive_action: To maintain oversight and ensure that all required posters are posted on the navigation bridge and other areas on the vessel, the master must be a safety officer.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence of 3rd Engineers.
description_overview: According to the relevant Class/IACS rules and regulations, as in built condition.
immediate_causes: The issue was fixed in the presence of the PSC Officer and endorsed before leaving the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: The flag endorsement of the Third Engineer had not been sent on time.
corrective_action: PCSO closed the deficiency after Master issued a statement that the third engineer was not engaged in high voltage equipment duties.
preventive_action: Crew Managers were briefed on the dispatch of original documents.

deficiency_finding: The completion date of the survey on which the certificate is based is not stated in the form used for it.
description_overview: Cert for International Air Pollution Prevention.
immediate_causes: The missing Washers were immediately stored at the international shore connection storage position.
root_cause_analysis: The completion date of the survey on which the certificate is based was not stated on the certificate.
corrective_action: A new 'FULL TERM' certificate stating the completion date of the survey on which this certificate is based has been issued and sent on board during the inspection.
preventive_action: The report will be shared with other ships in the fleet in order to check if additional acceptance by flag administration is required.

deficiency_finding: Some oil leaking from the diesel generators.
description_overview: The PSC deficiency was caused by the PSC Inspector keeping the records in hard copy.
immediate_causes: Maintenance and routine inspection instructions were not followed.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of situational awareness: Complacency and lack of due diligence.
corrective_action: The main engine fuel injector was replaced.
preventive_action: Prior to joining, officers will receive e-PMS training.

deficiency_finding: The wire that parted resulted in Deficiency No. 1 has not been properly maintained.
description_overview: The pilot ladder was parted and the ship side railing was damaged.
immediate_causes: There is no compliance with procedures, permits, or safe working practices.
root_cause_analysis: Hardware is bad condition.
corrective_action: Load test have been carried out with good result.
preventive_action: The ISM Audit will be done at Disport Immingham.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence of the position being monitored on arrival Ashdod.
description_overview: There was no fitness equipment in the gym.
immediate_causes: Wrong entry during rest hours.
root_cause_analysis: The system design and the enforcement of work standards are inadequate.
corrective_action: After 15 minutes of displaying, the LOP is automatically removed by the vessel.
preventive_action: The case was distributed to the fleet.

deficiency_finding: There is a discrepancy between equipment recorded in the certificate and the layout of the deck.
description_overview: The D-2 standard is mandatory for the ship.
immediate_causes: The crewmember failed to comply with procedures.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not properly explain that the equipment recorded in the Intl Sewage was different from what was recorded in the certificate.
corrective_action: The Technical department immediately sought the advice of the Classification Society and the manufacturer of the system in order to obtain a written confirmation for record purposes and avoid future misinterpretation of the details recorded in the ISPPC.
preventive_action: This deficiency will be communicated to senior officers during the briefings process.

deficiency_finding: Seafarers employment agreement is not required.
description_overview: Seafarers employment agreement is not required.
immediate_causes: The agent didn't report to the PSC office because he didn't receive the letter from the flag.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer and Chief Engineer are not familiar with the Company Procedure (SBM Part 1 Section 7.10) and their lack of awareness of Regulation 2.1 MLC of 2006 in relation to the Cadet's SEA.
corrective_action: The hourly rate was calculated as: $430 / 160 hours, and the overtime was calculated as: 2.69 x OT x 1.25.
preventive_action: The Master, Chief Engineer, and the Chief Officer must be reminded of the procedures regarding the life onboard/ cadet training.

deficiency_finding: ACCUMULATION OF WATER IS NOT WATERTIGHT.
description_overview: PSC deficiencies may be caused by simple busted lights.
immediate_causes: Crew members don't know what an emergency is when they are in the engine room.
root_cause_analysis: There is damage to the signal light cover.
corrective_action: The churchyard cover has been renovated and tested for signs.
preventive_action: It's a good idea for the electrician to check all the lights on a weekly basis.

deficiency_finding: There were lashing devices found on the deck.
description_overview: The starboard ship side plimsoll line was found to be rusty.
immediate_causes: The door from the engine room to the deck is not closing correctly.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of regular maintenance on the deck.
corrective_action: To ensure the safety of cargo securing operations, lashing devices have been removed.
preventive_action: In case of assistance needed, they should inform the company and place an order for new lashing devices.

deficiency_finding: The fence guard is not around the rotating part.
description_overview: The fence guard is not around the rotating part.
immediate_causes: The original cargo cleaning pump was not fully guard by the safety net.
root_cause_analysis: The manufacturer did not have this design.
corrective_action: An iron cover was used to reach the criterion.
preventive_action: Pass to other vessels to learn and study and keep the cover fixed with nuts.

deficiency_finding: The battery room can't be closed from outside.
description_overview: loosened bolts for hinges caused the fire protection door to not be fully closed.
immediate_causes: There was no handler on the ventilation.
root_cause_analysis: The original type and design was delivered.
corrective_action: The ventilating can be opened and closed from inside and outside.
preventive_action: As a lesson learned, self-check and conduct the retrofit work on fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The valve remote control system is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The cargo is listed in the shipper's declaration as a group B cargo, but there is no information on the chemical hazard of the cargo.
immediate_causes: Didn't report the broken equipment to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The forward valve of Forepeak was not functional due to wear and tear and was reported to the flag administration on the same day.
corrective_action: The forepeak store valve and valve remote control system was replaced by a vessel.
preventive_action: In order to confirm compliance, the Master shared his experience across the fleet.

deficiency_finding: A set of reset buttons is located in the radio instrument room.
description_overview: There is a reset button in the chart room.
immediate_causes: The chart desk has a non-watch keeping position and one of the reset buttons is located in it.
root_cause_analysis: The PSC suggested not to use the reset button in the radio room and use the one on the bridge.
corrective_action: The crew covered the button with a plastic cover to prevent it from being used.
preventive_action: This finding will be sent to all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is a sludge pump in the Engine Room that has oil water rest.
description_overview: Aft peak tank sounding and piping arrangement will be reviewed and approved by class for storing treated sewage.
immediate_causes: Minor leaks came up due to exposure.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance and inspection base on MARPOL Annex I.
corrective_action: A new pipe is going to be replaced.
preventive_action: periodical inspection will be carried out by C/E, 2/E&3/E.

deficiency_finding: One of the portable gas detectors isn't working.
description_overview: A portable gas detector.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The equipment was in good working order and had been used daily to determine gas content in cargo holds filled with coal.
corrective_action: Two of the portable gas detectors are usable and back up for the faulty one.
preventive_action: The master is supposed to make sure that the maintenance routines provided by Martin Brussgaard for the Gas detectors are followed, kept fully charged and the self test is carried out before use.

deficiency_finding: The UN Code was not followed and respected in the certificate issued by the flag state.
description_overview: The ISSC was issued by the flag after a successful completion of inspection, however the company identification number was incorrect when the certificate was issued and same was missed to be checked by the master.
immediate_causes: There is a human error.
root_cause_analysis: Improper Description in procedure, instruction, and plan.
corrective_action: Re-issuance of certificate was requested immediately.
preventive_action: All statutory certificates were checked for the same error.

deficiency_finding: The engine room sea chest valve is not in a contrasting colour.
description_overview: The lower platform of Gangway was marked with the maximum load and maximum angle of Inclination.
immediate_causes: The crew members were aware that the sea chest valves were not marked with a contrasting color during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect marking.
corrective_action: The valves with open/closing markings are inspected and marked with contrasting colors for easy identification.
preventive_action: The observation has been included into company database from where repeat and significant observations are selected for inclusion in periodic circulation of repeat observation.

deficiency_finding: The water ingress panel of no.1 cargo hold has an alarm.
description_overview: Provision and disposition are included in lifebuoys.
immediate_causes: Poor understanding of STCW and lack of familiarization.
root_cause_analysis: The Master confirmed that the alarm had sounded earlier and that it was pending to be fixed by the Engineer.
corrective_action: The alarm was no longer active after the sensor was cleaned.
preventive_action: When an alarm is activated, it must be properly investigated so that prompt action can be taken to address the alarm condition and eliminate it.

deficiency_finding: The deck rest hour log shows Master & Chief Officer duty and rest hours from February 1 to today.
description_overview: There are lights at the emergency station panel for the A/C room to not work.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow procedure due to oversight.
corrective_action: Work/rest hours records have been updated.
preventive_action: Every day the rest hours records will be updated.

deficiency_finding: The fan switch panel is covered.
description_overview: Master instructed to follow up the convention regulation after the operation in port Gdynia without BWMS.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of perception.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of foresight in evaluating an emergency situation.
corrective_action: There is material removed from the galley fan switch panel.
preventive_action: A list of the deficiencies has been sent to the entire fleet.

deficiency_finding: The phone test failed.
description_overview: There was a bridge wing microphone at the monitor.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were offered.
root_cause_analysis: VDR was operating normally prior to arrival.
corrective_action: The company arranged for the maker's representative to attend the vessel in order to fix the issue.
preventive_action: During the upcoming Safety Committee meeting, the deficiency will be further discussed and analyzed.

deficiency_finding: The national flag is in poor condition.
description_overview: The merchant flag was dirty during the inspection.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: The officer maintenance program wasn't carried out properly.
corrective_action: The flag was renewed on the spot.
preventive_action: Subject deficiency will be communicated to the fleet vessels via the Company's Monthly Alert Bulletin after a training Session was carried out by the Master for the awareness of responsible deck personnel.

deficiency_finding: SOLAS Ch. II-2 / Reg.15.2
description_overview: The fire hose was not connected to the nozzle at the test.
immediate_causes: The date in the test report was wrong.
root_cause_analysis: The environment is harsh and the system is in place.
corrective_action: Inventory was updated and the wrong nozzle was changed.
preventive_action: All connections for proper use are checked during safety inspection and only one system to be used on board.

deficiency_finding: The fire door of the bridge can't be closed tightly.
description_overview: The port side wharf is between No. 4 and 5 Cargo Harbor.
immediate_causes: The fire door doesn't have an adjustment to lock.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance or repair procedures are inadequate.
corrective_action: Immediately adjusted self-locking mechanism after PSC pointed out a defect.
preventive_action: Follow up with manufacturer's maintenance instructions and regular inspection of equipment.

deficiency_finding: The inventory for fire detonation system is not correct.
description_overview: There is a lack of familiarity with the system.
immediate_causes: There were different locations for fire nozzles.
root_cause_analysis: The locations of the fire detectors are not verified against the fire alarm panel during a routine test.
corrective_action: The master is responsible for all the sensors that have been checked and verified with actual numbers as per the alarm panel screen.
preventive_action: All ships in the fleet have been told to check the zone number of the fire sensor to make sure it matches the zone number on the fire detection panel.

deficiency_finding: Manning was specified by the minimum safe manning doc.
description_overview: According to MSMD minimum 13 crew members, the presence of a certified cook on board is not provided.
immediate_causes: Lack of knowledge is one of the reasons for inadequate training and leadership.
root_cause_analysis: The Minimum Safe Manning document is related to the regulation SOLAS V 14.2 and the resolution A.1047(27).
corrective_action: On the 2nd of December, flag state administration issued a flag state advisory.
preventive_action: The provision for a ship's cook will be included in the new MSMC for ships with at least 10 crew.

deficiency_finding: The fire control plan at the starboard side gangway is damaged.
description_overview: There is an excessive amount of garbage between cargo holds.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: A small part of the fire plan was damaged when the PSCO opened the packaging.
preventive_action: The training of officers has been carried out by the master.

deficiency_finding: There were two Fire Extinguishers that were not inspected.
description_overview: The oil record book sludge operation entries were incorrect during the PSC inspection.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection tags of the fire extinguishers were not updated because the assistant safety officer was not paying attention.
corrective_action: The two fire extinguishers had their inspection tags updated according to the recent LSA/FFE inspection recorded in the company's e-PMS.
preventive_action: The safety officer and his assistant should make sure that the tags of the equipment are amended according to the company's maintenance plan.

deficiency_finding: There is a leaking pipe on the starboard side of the engine room.
description_overview: A fire drill found substandard, scenario fire in laundry: - fire flap of laundry kept open, one SCBA Set not ready to use, wasted time bringing a spare set, unconscious person in laundry not rescued at first chance.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure and instructions to fix the leaking pipe is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of competence is one of the personal factors.
corrective_action: The leaking pipe needs to be fixed by the chief engineer.
preventive_action: The leaking pipe needs to be fixed asap.

deficiency_finding: At the time of the inspection fresh vegetables were not found on the ship.
description_overview: The code is old edition.
immediate_causes: Fresh vegetables are consumed during the long sea passage.
root_cause_analysis: The long voyage to the port can take more than 20 days.
corrective_action: Enough fresh fruit and vegetables were supplied by the local chandler.
preventive_action: The Master, Senior officer, and engineers should make sure the vessel has enough fresh fruit and vegetables for the voyage.

deficiency_finding: There was a leak from the emergency fire pump.
description_overview: High water pressure can be caused by POLYURETHAN HOSE FROM PUMP TO GAUGE.
