immediate_causes: There are bulbs on the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of control.
corrective_action: All of the pantyhose on the emergency fire pump should be replaced.
preventive_action: Responsible officers and engineers have been warned about the import of PMS.

deficiency_finding: The strands of the radio antenna wire are broken.
description_overview: The port side wharf is between No. 4 and 5 Cargo Harbor.
immediate_causes: Cleaned before leaving.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of effective checks during the schedule.
corrective_action: The radio antenna wire has been renewed.
preventive_action: The finding will be discussed during the joining briefing of senior sea staff in the office.

deficiency_finding: There are steel bars and plates in the steering gear room.
description_overview: Steering gear room has an oil store.
immediate_causes: There were many ER floor on lower platform screws that were lost.
root_cause_analysis: Steel bars and plates were not secured on the steering gear room rack.
corrective_action: All steel bars and plates on Steering gear were rearranged and secured.
preventive_action: Master/CE will conduct more practical shipboard inspection for actual condition verification.

deficiency_finding: Notices for noise protection are not posted at the entrance of the S/G room.
description_overview: The refrigerators that were put in place didn't have thermometers installed.
immediate_causes: No defect was identified.
root_cause_analysis: As per procedure, failure to post necessary standard requirement.
corrective_action: There is noise protection at the entrance of the Steering gear room.
preventive_action: The master and safety officer held a meeting to discuss the importance and function of the deficiencies.

deficiency_finding: There are multiple minor oil leaks.
description_overview: There are multiple minor oil leaks.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment includes jack plugs.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance of jack plugs.
corrective_action: Training of concerned team members by Master on proper monitoring and required inspection of Hydraulic hatch cover oil leaks is required.
preventive_action: Fleetwide sharing of findings and lessons learned.

deficiency_finding: There are compulsory entries for weekly inspection.
description_overview: During the inspection at the Port of Novorossiysk, the PSC officer noted a box not being checked in the question of 'at-sea maintenance capability' as per the requirements.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge forgot to record the LSA inspection entry in the deck log book.
root_cause_analysis: The officer didn't know about the SOLAS items.
corrective_action: As per the requirements, the log-book has been updated.
preventive_action: The officer was told to check all the items related to the convention.

deficiency_finding: The sewage inlet valve is difficult to operate.
description_overview: After treatment, sewage water is collected through the pipe to the peak tank which is not marked on the cert.
immediate_causes: The valve that goes to the sewage treatment unit is not rotating.
root_cause_analysis: There are issues with the sewage holding tank in the sewage treatment system.
corrective_action: It's a good idea to inspect and move the valves which are not used often.
preventive_action: The valve will be closed when it is operational on the spot.

deficiency_finding: There is no record on board to show that annual servicing is carried out by the service engineer.
description_overview: There is a navigation.
immediate_causes: After a change of management failure to check the tanks in the certificate section 3.1 is what happened.
root_cause_analysis: The master didn't find the flag approval letter and the service engineer's training certificate in the master's file.
corrective_action: After inspecting the file on the bridge, Master found the flag approval letter and engineer's training certificate and sent them to the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The inspector qualification certificate should be attached to the inspection report so that it can be easily checked.

deficiency_finding: Limit the swing of the rescue boat during inspection.
immediate_causes: Limit switch in stock due to cold weather.
root_cause_analysis: During inSPECTION, UP LIMIT SWITCH got stung.
corrective_action: It was replaced with a spare on the spot.
preventive_action: It's important to keep an eye on the training work and the rest of the work.

deficiency_finding: The record book of engine parameters, which include components and settings, which may influence NOx emission of the engine, was not properly maintained.
description_overview: There is a sewage treatment plant.
immediate_causes: The sewage treatment plant was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: There is a direct cause of non-compliance with customers and stakeholders.
corrective_action: The vessel resumed to record all parts changes.
preventive_action: The guidance for NOx technical file record keeping has been followed by fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The last passage plan was not changed with Constanta.
description_overview: Master didn't get the accurate berth number information from the agent.
immediate_causes: When the Constanta berth is fixed, not amending anchorage to berth, ignore ISM/ SOLAS Ch. V, STCW and procedure.
root_cause_analysis: When the Constanta berth is fixed, not amending anchorage to berth, ignore ISM/ SOLAS Ch. V, STCW and procedure.
corrective_action: The required information is included in the amended last passage plan.
preventive_action: During the additional internal audit, ISM PIC will review the passage plan and the required information.

deficiency_finding: Messroom and recreational facilities are not required.
description_overview: The officers recreation room had a TV, CD/DVD player, audio system, guitar, table games, and few books.
immediate_causes: The inspection was inadequate.
root_cause_analysis: Caused by slack to inspection by the duty officer.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The boat's cooling water line was blocked.
description_overview: Scupper from deck going off into the water.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: Senior officer neglected to conduct a post-operational test to verify the absence of any obstructions in the cooling water inlet mesh/ports after the last trial/testing on January 21st, 2024.
corrective_action: The rescue boat engines were tried out by the AMSA inspector after the rescue boat engine cooling water line was cleared.
preventive_action: The LSA Maintenance plan chapter 5.6 for weekly inspections and maintenance of rescue boat engines should be followed by the ship staff.

deficiency_finding: The main fire line was found with a temporary repair.
description_overview: The main sea water pump discharge pipe is leaking.
immediate_causes: The deck line mark on the hull was not marked correctly.
root_cause_analysis: The Technical department was informed immediately by email and phone.
corrective_action: The fire line was fixed after the proper extension joint was supplied.
preventive_action: The spare extension joint should be kept on board for proper repairs.

deficiency_finding: The muster list does not specify which officers are assigned to ensure that life-saving and fire appliances are maintained in good condition and are ready for immediate use or replacements for key persons who may become disabled, taking into account that different emergencies may call for different actions.
description_overview: The muster list was not specified which officers are assigned to ensure that life-saving and fire appliances are maintained in good condition and are ready for immediate use or replacements for key persons who may become disabled, taking into account that different emergencies may call for different actions.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The muster list did not specify which officers are assigned to ensure that life-saving and fire appliances are maintained in good condition and are ready for immediate use or replacements for key persons who may become disabled.
corrective_action: The crew's responsibilities were educated after the muster list was revised to specify which officers are assigned to ensure that LSA/FFA are maintained in good condition.
preventive_action: Through the fleetwide warning notice for immediate action and company official circular, this information was addressed to the fleet vessels to train the crew members onboard.

deficiency_finding: The Starboard lifeboat propeller shaft is grinding at moderate revolutions when in either gear.
description_overview: The ship's electrician adjusted the indicator to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
immediate_causes: At times, the indicator was showing up to 10 points more than the actual, but when the PCS officers came on, it was back to normal.
root_cause_analysis: The publication of standard was inadequate.
corrective_action: Four pieces of Gland were replaced at the propeller shaft.
preventive_action: The makers manual will be added to the vessel's PMS.

deficiency_finding: The garbage record book part II did not record the disposal of cargo hold wash water from the last 3 loaded bulk cargos.
description_overview: Section 3 includes cargo handling procedures and documents.
immediate_causes: There is an eye wash station in the steering room next to the engine workshop.
root_cause_analysis: The volume of wash water containing cargo residues was not recorded by C/O.
corrective_action: After the discharge of currently loaded bulk cargo, C/O will record the disposal of cargo residues in cargo hold wash water in garbage record book part II.
preventive_action: C/O keeps a note of "Do not forget to record cargo residues contained in cargo hold wash water in garbage record book part II"

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence of air quality in the sets.
description_overview: The air conditioning is malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: Not applicable.
root_cause_analysis: The air quality test on the air compressor was neglected.
corrective_action: The air quality test was arranged by the company technical department.
preventive_action: The company's technical department was warned by the CTO for missing out on the annual air quality test of the air compressor.

deficiency_finding: 5 nos. twist lock ISO sockets on hatch cover bay 13 forward and 3 nos. twist lock ISO sockets on deck bay 39 forward.
description_overview: There were no safety covers on Port and Starboard Lifeboat's cable outlet sockets.
immediate_causes: There were different locations for fire nozzles.
root_cause_analysis: There are basic and root cause job factors.
corrective_action: The ISO sockets will be welded by a Class approved welder.
preventive_action: All ISO sockets will be inspected on a monthly basis by C/O and observations will be recorded in CVM 012.

deficiency_finding: The lights are used without protection.
description_overview: The lights are used without protection.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Some Cargo Lights have protection covers that aren't properly maintained.
corrective_action: The crew repaired cargo lights.
preventive_action: The case information of PSC deficiencies for all company ships is rounded.

deficiency_finding: There are sanitary facilities.
description_overview: The hot/cold domestic water supplies and toilets' sanitary water supply were unreliable.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: The self-inspection before arrival was not carried out conscientiously.
corrective_action: All hot/cold domestic water supplies were changed and repaired by 4/E.
preventive_action: Improve on-board training and supervision, as well as sanitary equipment maintenance work.Familiarize the 2006 Tittle, The Regulations and the Code regulation 3.1, and Circulate to the fleet and require all ship Master checking and take action in order to avoid the similar defect recurrence.

deficiency_finding: Able-bodied seamen take fire rounds during the day but not at night.
description_overview: There are two showers and an eyewash on the vessel.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: The review of work rest hours is not done effectively.
corrective_action: Time taken for fire rounds after their regular watchkeeping hours has been added to the table of shipboard working arrangement.
preventive_action: Senior management was briefed on how to plan for compliance with work and rest hours.

deficiency_finding: All vls valves are to be tested and fully operational prior to loading.
description_overview: The SCBA sets are placed in the location as per the approved fire plan for the vessel.
immediate_causes: There was a small leak from the isolation valve during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The Teflon seat ring on the port side isolation valve was damaged when it was removed for inspection.
corrective_action: The valves will be pressure tested to the satisfaction of the vessel class society and the USCG.
preventive_action: The company's planned maintenance system will be reviewed to make sure that maintenance requirements for the VCS system and VCS system valves are complete.

deficiency_finding: Structural condition/ openings to the cargo area, doors, and scuttles.
description_overview: The rope was soaked in paint and found on the starboard side.
immediate_causes: The crew didn't put the caps on the hydrants.
root_cause_analysis: No alert was triggered to office because the job was closed in the vessel's PMS.
corrective_action: The locking mechanism was dismantled, components were overhauled, and boxed back in place.
preventive_action: If there is a defect, the fleet alert will be sent to the vessels and they will not be allowed to close the jobs.

deficiency_finding: There was a report dated 25 March 2020 about the presence of Asbestos Containing Materials.
description_overview: The material must be rectified before departure.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were provided.
root_cause_analysis: The latest inventory of hazardous material part-I, which was not available on board, was not due to the failure to follow procedure.
corrective_action: The master received the latest report which states that there is no requirement to maintain a flag or a management plan.
preventive_action: The company has a contractor who is responsible for maintenance and issue IHM reports, same time access to web platform with all certificates and report has been provided to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence that the Crew Basic training certificates issued to Indian crew members are acceptable to the flag state.
description_overview: There is no evidence that the Crew Basic training certificate issued to an Indian crew member is acceptable to the flag state.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with Customer / Stakeholder requirements Unclear Instructions is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: There are personal factors such as lack of competence, Misunderstood instructions, and inadequate supervision.
corrective_action: To consult the flag state and get clarification.
preventive_action: Before joining the vessel, the office should assess the current certification requirement.

deficiency_finding: The Collective Bargaining Agreement for Phillipino crew members is not available.
description_overview: The wage tables were not included in the CBA that was presented to the inspector.
immediate_causes: Not identified.
root_cause_analysis: There is missing documentation.
corrective_action: The wage scale has been uploaded in the documentation system.
preventive_action: The missing pages of the annex were identified due to a transferring error.

deficiency_finding: The alarm speaker base plate-holder is almost dismantled and needs maintenance.
description_overview: The cargo ship safety equipment certificate stated that the navigation equipment was in good working condition, as it was seen by the inspector.
immediate_causes: The PSCO received clarifications regarding the maintenance plan.
root_cause_analysis: The general alarm siren speaker base plate-holder at the C deck was found to be in poor condition during the PSC inspection.
corrective_action: All the deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency in order to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: There is no ship information on the identification card of inflatable life-rafts.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts are not in place on the two manifolds found on the Bunker stations.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge doesn't know how to inspect and maintain emergency equipment.
corrective_action: The identification card of inflatable life-rafts had ship's information on it.
preventive_action: The officer in charge was trained to inspect and maintain emergency equipment.

deficiency_finding: There is a mid deck platform in the bay.
description_overview: Master confirms that life-saving equipment is maintained in line with the Class approved maintenance system.
immediate_causes: The previous voyage was laden and the cargo holds couldn't be accessed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The PSCO officer is referring to the subject as a result of our vessel's collision with M/V Planet Skipper in October of 2023.
corrective_action: The area was checked and found to be in order.
preventive_action: Stevedore damage reports to be made and the damage to be notified to all concerned personnel for proper follow up. Stevedore damage reports to be made and the damage to be notified to all concerned personnel for proper follow up.

deficiency_finding: The apron in the paint locker is missing.
description_overview: The eye wash kit was not returned after the paint room was cleaned last week.
immediate_causes: The apron and PPE were not located in the paint locker.
root_cause_analysis: Logistical problems.
corrective_action: The apron was put in the paint locker and the PPE verification was done in the chemical locker.
preventive_action: The master briefed the safety officer that during his rounds he should check the PPE in the paint locker and chemical storage area.

deficiency_finding: The exhaust hood of the galley is oily.
description_overview: All critical equipment must be tested on a weekly basis, the same was executed by the crew without any defect.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: The exhaust hood was cleaned immediately to the satisfaction of the PSC officers.
corrective_action: The galley exhaust hood needs to be cleaned.
preventive_action: The galley crew was told that the exhaust hood should be clean and free of oil.

deficiency_finding: The steering gear room S1 and S3 were deconditioned.
description_overview: The second means of access to the emergency fire pump is secured on the inside.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer's failure to ensure that the relevant gaskets of natural exhaust ventilators are in sound condition and properly placed is the root cause.
corrective_action: The crew prior to the vessel's departure rectified the identified deficiency.
preventive_action: Instructions were given to the vessel to discuss the imposed deficiency in the next safety meeting and highlight the proper procedures.

deficiency_finding: Both sides of the maindeck are rusted.
description_overview: Code 16.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance is ongoing.
corrective_action: Adequate material has been provided to the vessel for the derusting/painting of the collapsible stanchions.
preventive_action: Further verification will be carried out during upcoming vessel inspection and ship's maintenance upgradation plan will be monitored from our office.

deficiency_finding: Several gratings on the deck were not tightened.
description_overview: One of the lights in the cable duct space was unlit, but the light was immediately renewed and shown to PSCO.
immediate_causes: The engine crew did not spot the oil leaks.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: The deck is inspected at an interval of 3 months.
preventive_action: We shared this information with other vessels in the fleet and verified compliance after Master and Chief engineer briefed all crew about the correct procedure for effective inspection and maintenance on deck and securing of the fittings after completion of the job.

deficiency_finding: My head is leaking.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: There is an oil mark on the cylinder liner.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of paying attention to detail.
corrective_action: Keep the work area clean after work by inspecting additional leaks in the main engine.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The lights of the NUC.
description_overview: Arcs of visibility are not for NUC lights.
immediate_causes: The bottle brush used for testing the alarm signal of the OWS 15PPM monitor is missing.
root_cause_analysis: The 2nd officer was responsible for checking the navigation equipment and did not detect the inadequate light.
corrective_action: Ensure that the blinding sector of the affected light is corrected.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness in the entire fleet, the deficiency will be shared within the Bi-Weekly Compliance Check.

deficiency_finding: Crew members addressed the issue of the minor F.O. leak.
description_overview: The crew cabins are outworn.
immediate_causes: The company was notified.
root_cause_analysis: As per the plan, as per technical procedures
corrective_action: The Master held another Safety Meeting in order to review the deficiency.
preventive_action: The Master held another Safety Meeting in order to review the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: There is a crack on the Port side L/B.
description_overview: Master confirms that life-saving equipment is maintained in line with the Class approved maintenance system.
immediate_causes: The lamp cap is loose.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection was inadequate.
corrective_action: Once pointed out by the inspector, the Flag state, Class and Lifeboat Makers approved servicing company were immediately contacted and an approved shore technician attendance was arranged at the port of inspection with required spare parts to carry out the repairs as per class approved repair procedures.
preventive_action: After the conclusion of the inspection, senior management officers were briefed by the QHSE officer and the responsible officer was reprimanded for his oversight.

deficiency_finding: The Chief Officer did not sign the Ship Shore Safety Checklist at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: The transfer of cargo is done by tanker.
immediate_causes: The certificates considered of Bunker CLC not available onboard were construed as non-fulfilment of specified requirement.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge had to stop the process as he was called for sampling and calculation.
corrective_action: The check list was signed by the C/O and verified by the PSC officer.
preventive_action: As part of the company's system improvement program, this observation was shared through the entire fleet.

deficiency_finding: When the rudder was on PS, the remote operation of both steering gear pump was not disabled.
description_overview: The muster list was not specified which officers are assigned to ensure that life-saving and fire appliances are maintained in good condition and are ready for immediate use or replacements for key persons who may become disabled, taking into account that different emergencies may call for different actions.
immediate_causes: Lack of training.
root_cause_analysis: There are 11 Lack of Personal Capability, 13 Physical/mental stress, 14 Lack of knowledge, 15 Improper motivation, and 25 Normal wear and tear.
corrective_action: A Steering drill performed with all crew participation and demonstrated steering change over procedures with both pumps from remote control to local.
preventive_action: Posters are posted in the steering gear room.

deficiency_finding: The meat leak detection system has an alarm.
description_overview: High water pressure can be caused by POLYURETHAN HOSE FROM PUMP TO GAUGE.
immediate_causes: Every time the cold room is opened for a long period, the power failure will cause a false alarm because the sensitivity of the sensor is dependent on the power supply.
root_cause_analysis: The freon detection system shows a meat room leak alarm.
corrective_action: After checking and cleaning the sensitivity sensor, leaking test of the unit, and adjusted sensitivity settings, the deficiency was corrected and closed by the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: The Master and the Chief Engineer were made aware of the deficiency by the Technical Supremo.

deficiency_finding: The fire extinguisher is out of date.
description_overview: Incinerator is out of order.
immediate_causes: A malfunction in the antenna unit caused the system to stop working.
root_cause_analysis: Had to overlook to inspect servicing records.
corrective_action: There is a request for the office to provide a fire extinguisher.
preventive_action: Every week there will be a periodic check to make sure nothing is missed for inspection.

deficiency_finding: It was verified that the EIAPP Certificates were not the originals.
description_overview: An Occasional Survey was carried out at the request of the owner after deficiencies were pointed out by the USCG Mobile.
immediate_causes: The audio-visual equipment in the TV room was out of order because of wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: The e-certificate of IAPP was not original and the original should be kept on board, according to the PSC inspector.
corrective_action: We can't comprehend why a deficiency was raised, as the certificates as well as the filing on board are in line with the requirements.
preventive_action: There will beciency in the rest of the fleet.

deficiency_finding: The gyro compass light was not on.
description_overview: There is a dedicated battery that is not sealed and marked for emergency use.
immediate_causes: There is insufficient planning of the maint.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of attention.
corrective_action: The subject bulb has been changed.
preventive_action: The company requires the bulbs to be checked once a week.

deficiency_finding: The crew couldn't demonstrate the emergency operation of the peak tank valve.
description_overview: The AMSA inspector pointed out that the ship staff failed to identify the hole in the fore peak tank vent hole, however the rest of the vent heads were found to be in order.
immediate_causes: The store at fore peak has some lamps that burn-out.
root_cause_analysis: There is no enough pressure in the manual pump.
corrective_action: The manual pump was checked and repaired by the Chief Engineer.
preventive_action: To ensure that the system is working properly, the Master instructed the Chief Officer to check and inspect the emergency operation of FPT valve at regular intervals.

deficiency_finding: The crew member didn't know about theFoul weather recovery operation for rescue boat.
description_overview: The standard compass error was not determined by a watch.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of training and knowledge.
corrective_action: The crew members were briefed about the recovery of the rescue boat.
preventive_action: Training should be done on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: Nox Parameters records of M.E and No1 D/E were not recorded.
description_overview: The correct nozzle ID was marked on the record.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The Technical file was not updated due to busy schedule.
corrective_action: The Technical File was updated immediately.
preventive_action: The Technical File to be updated immediately after any spare replacement to keep a record.

deficiency_finding: During the PSC inspection, the rescue boat engine failed to start.
description_overview: There is planned maintenance on the diesel generator.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: The ship's engineer couldn't find the engine's spark plug since the engine started without a problem on last inspection.
corrective_action: The engine's starting is in good order after the ship's crew dismantled the igniters and cleaned them.
preventive_action: Every week, this item will be checked under the company system, under the IT platform, under the ship's LSA checklist, and under the rescue boat engine test.

deficiency_finding: Vapour return valve does not work.
description_overview: There was excessive Hull Growth on the stern and port side of the vessels.
immediate_causes: The issue with the shipyard was explained by the master.
root_cause_analysis: The vapour return valve was overlooked by the crew after it was damaged by shipyard staff.
corrective_action: A spare valve has been used to replace the damaged one.
preventive_action: The shipyard staff are working on the ship.

deficiency_finding: The officer in charge of water ballast water management onboard was not familiar with the BWMP.
description_overview: There is a certificate for the management of water.
immediate_causes: The treatment system wasn't working.
root_cause_analysis: After returning from vacation, the individual in charge of the BWMS aboard the company vessel had not completed the verification of all details regarding the BWMS.
corrective_action: The Master explained the differences of D1 and D2 to the Inspector.
preventive_action: This includes external training when necessary to fulfill specific duties and comply with SOLAS regulations.

deficiency_finding: The onboard complaint procedures don't specify contact information for the competent authority in the seafarers country of residence, and the name of a person or persons onboard the ship who can, on a confidential basis, provide seafarers with impartial advise on their complaint and otherwise assist them in following the compliant procedures available
description_overview: The onboard complaint procedures don't specify contact information for the competent authority in the seafarers country of residence, and the name of a person or persons onboard the ship who can, on a confidential basis, provide seafarers with impartial advise on their complaint and otherwise assist them in following the compliant procedures available
immediate_causes: Maintenance routines were not carried out.
root_cause_analysis: The contact details of the competent authority in the seafarer country of residence were not displayed along with the procedure.
corrective_action: The contact details of the competent authority in seafarers country of residence were posted at common spaces.
preventive_action: The contact details for the competent person are updated during every crew change.

deficiency_finding: The engine crew did not know about the alarm testing.
description_overview: The E/G had a fuel leak alarm.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The engine crew was not familiar with the testing of the oil mist detector's alarm.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer showed the engine officers how to test the OMD alarm.
preventive_action: An extra safety meeting was held with all crew to discuss deficiency.

deficiency_finding: The anchor chain bitter end is missing from the store.
description_overview: The action code is 17/10/2018.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: It was found that deck personnel used the hammer earlier in the day, and that the officer failed to point out the importance of keeping the hammer.
corrective_action: The hammer was put in position to PSCOs satisfaction prior to the PSC inspection.
preventive_action: Instructions will be included to proceed with extraordinary inspection in order to confirm that the tool is stowed correctly.

deficiency_finding: The fire detection system was found not connected.
description_overview: There is an oil leak from a cylinder in a cargo hold.
immediate_causes: The seafarer was supposed to identify that hose was not connected.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of awareness of the importance to conduct the checks relating to the fire-fighting equipment.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer had a discussion with the engine personnel to make them aware of the importance of performing the check on the equipment.
preventive_action: Fire-fighting on April 5th.

deficiency_finding: Watertight doors and closing devices.
description_overview: The door can't be closed due to the fact that it's out of hinge/angle.
immediate_causes: The maintenance of the water/weather tight doors was not carried out according to company's guidance.
root_cause_analysis: The importance of water/weather tight doors was overlooked.
corrective_action: The hinges were renewed.
preventive_action: Water tight door inspection is included in the monthly routine so that deteriorated doors can be renewed in dry docking.

deficiency_finding: The Load Line mark is not painted clearly.
description_overview: It is a fact that cannot be avoided over time, thus the need to refresh/paint as necessary and while in operation, as well as the fact that ports should not have restrictions or regulations preventing/prohibiting the vessel to comply with regulations that are adopted worldwide as is the case.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Before the next operation/port of call, draft marks will be refreshed/painted the soonest.
preventive_action: There are draft marks for maintenance and inspections.

deficiency_finding: The Grain Final Loan Manual was not approved by the flag state.
description_overview: There is missing evidence that is approved for the Administration Booklet.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The master on board presented a lack of proper supervision and assessment of the need to comply with vessels' loading grain manual with safety load line convention and general cargo treatment verification requirements.
corrective_action: The loading grain manual was endorsed by the class surveyor who was on board, for the satisfaction of the PSC officials.
preventive_action: There is an additional reminder to pay attention from his side and to ensure that all the manuals are endorsed by the RO.

deficiency_finding: Evaluation of crew performance.
description_overview: A fire drill found substandard, scenario fire in laundry: - fire flap of laundry kept open, one SCBA Set not ready to use, wasted time bringing a spare set, unconscious person in laundry not rescued at first chance.
immediate_causes: The crew got anxious as the drill was observed by three PSC officers, Class Surveyor's, Internal Auditor and Vessel Manager.
root_cause_analysis: The crew were not familiar with the 2nd make of the SCBA because the vessel had 2 different makes.
corrective_action: The entire crew was trained on the importance of inspections, early detection, and regular maintenance with reference to company Training Material 120.
preventive_action: The ship staff was advised to carry out trainings and drills as per the vessel specific drill planners.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire drill and emergency preparation.
description_overview: An additional fire drill was conducted onboard on 9th Oct, 2022, as follow-up actions, the checking and preparation of subsequent abandon ship were made accordingly.
immediate_causes: The CSR-1 wasn't handled properly during the last CSR amendment.
root_cause_analysis: Code 10 was given to the deficiency by PSCO after the corrective actions were re-inspected and verified.
corrective_action: The rules of emergency drills and trainings for ship and shore were held by the shipmaster for chief officer and 3rd officer on October 9, 2022, to improve the knowledge.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Light for liferaft unlit.
description_overview: There is a hand crank for the lifeboat.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect tools, equipment, materials, and inadequate inspection are some of the things that can go wrong.
corrective_action: The sudden malfunction of the launching light for liferaft was fixed from the vessel's stock prior to the completion of the inspection.
preventive_action: The ship's engineers and safety officer were reminded of the importance of the proper shipboard inspections on the critical equipment in order to make sure it is ready for use at all times.

deficiency_finding: There are damaged electrical connections on the main deck.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: The covers of the receptacle were damaged when the cargo light was taken off.
corrective_action: There is a damaged cover on the main deck.
preventive_action: C/E conducted education to all engineer about check risk of elctrical receptacle and terminal and maintain method of electrical connection as per the SMP- 30.

deficiency_finding: Collective bargaining agreement.
description_overview: According to the Seafarer Employment Agreement there is a Collective Bargaining Agreement in force.
immediate_causes: Lack of distribution of standard.
root_cause_analysis: The file was corrupted and could not be presented to PSCO during inspection.
corrective_action: The crewing department printed the valid CBA for the ship's files.
preventive_action: The crewing department verified with crewing agencies that all managed vessels have the actual employment agreements on board.

deficiency_finding: The low insulation alarm is indicated by the ESB-110 V.
description_overview: The inspection and maintenance of the emergency fire pump are carried out as per the guidelines.
immediate_causes: PSC pointed out that the heating system wasn't working because of the small amount of frozen ice on the top of the water drain pan.
root_cause_analysis: Defective equipment is one of the things.
corrective_action: The insulation alarm was cleared after it was found that the alarm was due to a defect in the equipment.
preventive_action: The master and chief engineer will inspect and maintain equipment as per Maker's guidelines.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence of receipt of maritime safety information.
description_overview: In the crew mess room, it was observed that the certificates were not pasted.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The officer changed the area E, F & G of NAVAREA X in Australia to receive maritime safety information, thus the vessel failed to receive the maritime safety information.
corrective_action: The master got maritime safety information from the website of Australia Maritime Safety Authority.
preventive_action: The master conducted education to all of the officers about the passage plan.

deficiency_finding: There is a program for the prevention of occupational injuries.
description_overview: There is a risk of falling to the lower deck if the chain is missing.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: After the manning of the rescue boat for the drill, the crew overlooked to place the securing chain in position again.
corrective_action: The chain was put in position by drill participants.
preventive_action: The crew was reminded to stay calm and to complete the task safely.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence for training about recovery people from water.
description_overview: At the time of Inspection there was a no maintenance record for the EPIRB.
immediate_causes: Liaise with the company to get the fire-maintenance program for the fire doors.
root_cause_analysis: There was an oversight by the chief officer.
corrective_action: Existing drilling records will be changed.
preventive_action: The officer has been told to monitor the plans.

deficiency_finding: The date on the test certificate was wrong.
description_overview: A voyage or passage plan.
immediate_causes: The date in the test report was wrong.
root_cause_analysis: A mistake was typed from a service station.
corrective_action: The test certificate was revised from the service station.
preventive_action: The test certificate was revised from the service station.

deficiency_finding: The boiler flushed water drain pipe is above the generator.
description_overview: Scupper from deck going off into the water.
immediate_causes: C/E immediately went to Isolate to fix or replace the damaged pipe.
root_cause_analysis: During the E/R round with PSCO he noted that the flushing water drain pipe had sights of rust.
corrective_action: The structural condition of all similar piping should be verified.
preventive_action: The structural condition of all similar piping should be verified.

deficiency_finding: The training manual is not specific to a ship.
description_overview: The SOLAS and Fire training manuals are not specific.
immediate_causes: The SOLAS and Fire training manuals were not ship specific.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge of checking and updating the manual missed adding the manual of freefall.
corrective_action: Before departure, Master asked the officer in charge to add missing manual freefall lifeboat.
preventive_action: The Company will inform Manning Agency about this deficiency and instruct them to discuss this topic during the pre after it held an additional meeting and training with all crew.

deficiency_finding: All paint types are not covered in the sds at the paint store.
description_overview: The paint store did not cover all paint types.
immediate_causes: The ship crew doesn't have a concept of garbage management.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector noticed that some paint types were missing during the inspection.
corrective_action: The deficiency was solved before the port inspector left the vessel.
preventive_action: One more time, the engine and deck crew was told to be on the lookout for MSDS in specific stores for paint and chemicals.

deficiency_finding: There are co2 pipes on the main deck.
description_overview: There is lack of maintenance on the co2 pipes on the main deck.
immediate_causes: The previous voyage was laden and the cargo holds couldn't be accessed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of proper maintenance for the main deck.
corrective_action: Deficiency was solved in anchorage.
preventive_action: When it is necessary to avoid Non- Conformity for our vessel, the deck and engine crew was instructed to check, observe and to do specific maintenance more often.

deficiency_finding: Lifejackets and immersion suits are stored in the engine control room.
description_overview: The crew forgot to put the IMO sticker symbols in the current position when the immersion suits were relocated from previous location.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of awareness was neglected by the PIC.
corrective_action: The storage locations for lifejackets and immersion suits can be found in the engine control room.
preventive_action: The Company will send e-Circular to all fleet with recommendations how to prevent

deficiency_finding: Liferaft port and starboard side HRU are not provided with a weak link.
description_overview: The life RAFT PAINTER SYSTEM IS NOT DRAGGED BY THE SINKING SHIP.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge failed to inspect the exhaust gas pipe.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of inspection before the port.
corrective_action: The master and PSCO were satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: It is the duty of the master to keep the equipment in good order.

deficiency_finding: The engine room is not ready for use.
description_overview: It is not ready for use.
immediate_causes: The port side of the engine room ventilation fan had low insulation and was kept isolated.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient procedure.
corrective_action: Water leaking through the deteriorated packing of the junction box was the reason for low insulation.
preventive_action: During routine maintenance and to replace packings of junction boxes which are in deteriorated, a brief of engineers was carried out by the chief engineer.

deficiency_finding: Supplementary anchor restrain wire on Starboard windlass is not required.
description_overview: The deck crew put it back with the general tools because they didn't know it was a hammer for bitter ends.
immediate_causes: The anchor lashing was made by the ship's crew and the AMSA PSC Officer did not accept that the crew cut the wire.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not know that lashing wire strops were required.
corrective_action: After confirmation from the office, the Master immediately requested for direct purchasing with supplementary anchor lashing wires from the local supplier.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer will conduct regular inspections to make sure that spare anchor lashing wires are available for replacement.

deficiency_finding: Fresh provisions were insufficient for the intended voyage.
description_overview: The inspector's comment was acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew went to the local supermarket on the same date of the PSC inspection, however, they did not return to the vessel until after the inspection.
corrective_action: Provide before departure and arrange provisions list to meet it.
preventive_action: The stock provision should be arranged before the ship's schedule is suddenly changed.

deficiency_finding: The cargo information in the declaration is incorrect.
description_overview: There is a cargo declaration for one shipper that is less than 25%.
immediate_causes: The PSC inspector tried to explain that this could be a mistake since the other two declarations did not indicate TML.
root_cause_analysis: The contents of the Cargo Declaration should be double checked by the Chief Officer and Master.
corrective_action: The contents of the Cargo Declaration should be double checked by the Chief Officer and Master.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer must receive a copy of the Cargo Declaration and the Analysis Report from the Shipper.

deficiency_finding: Several cables passing decks without cable penetration arrangements were not properly filled.
description_overview: There is an electric cable that connects the Minoans to the MGPS that was damaged.
immediate_causes: Compliance with performance standard was inadequate.
root_cause_analysis: The cable trunk deck and the navigational deck have inadequate work standards.
corrective_action: The deck MASTER B,C and navigation deck had their cable penetrations fixed and sealed with a special fire retardant compound.
preventive_action: The fleet was notified of the deficiency and was asked to check the cables trunk located in the accommodation decks to make sure they are protected from fire.

deficiency_finding: The crew doesn't know how to operate a life raft float free.
description_overview: Managers noted deficiency.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient implementation of safety instructions, incorrect use of safety equipment, inadequate seamanship practice, routine/ slackness, inadequate skills/ knowledge, Lack of Compliance were all identified in the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: The Non Conformity PSC2 304 was raised by the Safety Department.
preventive_action: The training on proper fitting and installation of HRU was carried out on August 26, 2023.

deficiency_finding: The passage plan does not consider the abort line before entering the harbor.
description_overview: The safety depth was updated immediately after the abort line was marked.
immediate_causes: Insufficient review instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The responsible personnel have not implemented "Access control to the ship" strictly as per SSP to check PSCO ID and register them, although duty crew found PSCO, notified captain immediately and PSCOs were identified/accompanied by captain before entering ship.
corrective_action: The safety depth was updated immediately after the abort line was marked.
preventive_action: The training of crew ECDIS safety settings has been enhanced.

deficiency_finding: The rescue boat embarkation and launching arrangements should allow the rescue boat to be boarded and launched in the shortest time possible.
description_overview: Rescue boat davit slewing is slow.
immediate_causes: There was a malfunction with the sample pump.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance.
corrective_action: The new davit is ready and will be sent by sea freight after 2 to 3 months.
preventive_action: The davit will be sent to Houston by sea freight on June 24.

deficiency_finding: The meat has been put back in the freezer.
description_overview: Charterers arranged to supply LSFO 120 MT in PM on the same day that Ocean Venus accepted the renewal audit.
immediate_causes: Instructions to the vessel were given to the company.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision by superiors resulted in the lack of awareness of CCK.
corrective_action: To not be frozen again once unfrozen, CCK was instructed.
preventive_action: The procedures from the safety manual were advised by CCK.

deficiency_finding: The fan in the engine room can't be closed effectively.
description_overview: Fire damper for engine room ventilation fan no.2 was conducted additional test as well as PMS, but ship's crew had conducted cursory inspection without details, as he hadn't known the damper closed completely or not.
immediate_causes: The PSCO suspected that the safety valve was stuck after the Third Engineer had difficulty pulling it.
root_cause_analysis: Poor supervision and maintenance.
corrective_action: The No.2 Damper wasn't fully closing because it was stuck.
preventive_action: The company distributed and shared the deficiency to all the fleets to prevent similar case.

deficiency_finding: Steering gear room intermediate inlet ducting was found to be corroded and wasted.
description_overview: There are numerous pipe support on the main deck that are cracked and Wasted.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Steering gear dust was repaired.
preventive_action: The Deck, Engine Room, and Steering gear room have been added to the safety officer's inspection list.

deficiency_finding: The limit switch on the rescue boat malfunctioned.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: The limit switch was stuck by frozen grease when the Rescue Boat was tested in the monthly drill.
root_cause_analysis: Acts that are unsafe.
corrective_action: The master confirmed that the limit switch was free and grease free.
preventive_action: The officer in charge of LSA should conduct weekly testing to make sure the vessel is in working condition.

deficiency_finding: The work hours of the C/E and Bunker operators are different.
description_overview: The number of endorsements does not match the original Philippine CoC.
immediate_causes: The crew on duty did not follow the rules.
root_cause_analysis: There are three things that need to be done to comply with MLC.
corrective_action: The master was satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: The master will make sure the rest hours of the crew are kept up.

deficiency_finding: CSR number is not original.
description_overview: The workday is not updated and the rest time is not 24 hours.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: Remark: During handover between Masters, correct check of signature of CSRs.
corrective_action: CSR document No.7 was received with a code for verification.
preventive_action: CSR's can't be verified online, flag explanation was passed to all fleet vessels and flag email to be kept in.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence of cross-checking the vessel's position on ECDIS during the last voyage.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: During outbound transit, after departure in Melbourne monitor and checked for constant cross checking by LOP were taken, as well as passing to nearest landmarks as per passage plan for position fixing interval and other available means.
preventive_action: A bridge team meeting and training for all deck officers to take other means for cross checking of vessel position and constant taking as per position fixing interval during passage when passing nearest landmarks and during transit for pilotage was conducted.

deficiency_finding: Load line marking is rusted.
description_overview: Title 3 is The Regulations and the Code.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the frequent Panama Canal transits, the coating on the draft marks had worn off.
corrective_action: We want to make it clear that the draft and load line marks are raised, welded numbers and lines on the hull are raised and that they are perfectly clear whether they are painted or not.
preventive_action: The master has been requested to maintain the draft marks in a satisfactory condition.

deficiency_finding: Wages are not adequate.
description_overview: He is being paid as a deck cadet even though he is an OS on the bridge.
immediate_causes: The crewing officer was unable to arrange crew relief in a timely manner for the master and chief engineer.
root_cause_analysis: The crew in question is on his first contract with the company and his first time on a tanker vessel.
corrective_action: The actions were taken.
preventive_action: The actions were taken.

deficiency_finding: Some bolts and nuts are not in place on the two manifolds found on the Bunker stations.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts are not in place on the two manifolds found on the Bunker stations.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The senior officer failed to identify the defect and the nut bolts were missing.
corrective_action: Training is carried out for crew to maintain their equipment.
preventive_action: The crew must be trained to carry out inspection and work.

deficiency_finding: The ship name port was faded.
description_overview: The ship name port of registry was found faded due to long period on the sea without specific maintenance.
immediate_causes: The incorrect symbol was used on one side.
root_cause_analysis: Some letters have been stained.
corrective_action: Deficiency was solved in anchorage.
preventive_action: When it is necessary to avoid Non- Conformity for our vessel, the crew was instructed to check, observe and to do specific maintenance more often.

deficiency_finding: The GMDSS office is not related to the operation of the SSB.
description_overview: This is not considered to be a legitimate deficiency according to a further review.
immediate_causes: The established procedure was not followed.
root_cause_analysis: The question was not answered correctly by the chief officer.
corrective_action: The training was done according to the manual.
preventive_action: Control of knowledge of GMDSS equipment of junior officers is carried out by senior officers.

deficiency_finding: The sea water system has a pipe.
description_overview: The main sea water pump discharge pipe is leaking.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: The crew carried out temporary repairs after the vessel encountered bad weather and a leak.
corrective_action: Repairs are permanent.
preventive_action: The next Safety meeting will remind all crew that permanent repairs must be carried out as soon as possible and that patches are only a temporary solution.

deficiency_finding: The auxiliary engine number two was leaking oil.
description_overview: The auxiliary engine number two was leaking oil.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The crew left some stains on the machine after not cleaning the lube oil properly.
corrective_action: The crew cleans the lube oil stains.
preventive_action: The C/E and 1/E will make sure the engine room is clean.

deficiency_finding: One part of the railings on the port and stbd side is broken.
description_overview: Charterers arranged to supply LSFO 120 MT in PM on the same day that Ocean Venus accepted the renewal audit.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The railings were failing and one part was broken.
corrective_action: The broken railing on port side along hatch no.4 was repaired.
preventive_action: All crew members were advised to report any defects to the senior management after the Safety Management Meeting onboard.

deficiency_finding: There is a DEFICIENCY NO.1 about MARPOL AnNEX IV.
description_overview: The Fire main isolating valve was hard to operate and operated using a special tool.
immediate_causes: The modification to the shipboard piping drawing was already class approved prior installation.
root_cause_analysis: The gate valve was stuck because of excessive pressure applied.
corrective_action: The damaged wheel was removed and replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: How to fix a stuck gate valve.

deficiency_finding: There was no safety sign or barrier on the deck.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human Cause - failure to comply with stakeholder requirements.
corrective_action: The safety sign was installed on the open manhole.
preventive_action: Risk control, quality control of safety checklist and procedural process.

deficiency_finding: In the month of May, actual hours of rest are not reflected in the recorded rest hours of deck personnel.
description_overview: The rope was soaked in paint and found on the starboard side.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: There was a conflict between rest hours and drills.
corrective_action: The necessity to be properly and accurately recorded was the topic of the safety committee meeting.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company has taken the following measures: - A Safety Bulletin has been forwarded to the Company's managed vessels with the outcome of PSC Inspection which is to be discussed during the next Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: There are no EEBD's in the accommodations.
description_overview: The ship structure access manual is missing.
immediate_causes: Human error.
root_cause_analysis: EEBDs should be located in the accommodations.
corrective_action: As per class approved safety plan, there are three EEBDs located at the upper deck of the vessel.
preventive_action: Master briefed officers about proper job planning and emergency readiness of safety equipment after maintenance, test or drills and their understanding was confirmed.

deficiency_finding: The portable VHF batteries are not required.
description_overview: One two-way vhf radiotelphone apparatus is missing.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: At the time of the PSC inspection, it was noticed that two out of three GMDSS portable VHF units were showing charging fault indication when docked.
corrective_action: The new batteries were delivered in Rio Grande, Brazil.
preventive_action: The matter was discussed in a meeting of the safety committee.

deficiency_finding: The fire detection system was found not connected.
description_overview: There is an oil leak from a cylinder in a cargo hold.
immediate_causes: The seafarer was supposed to identify that hose was not connected.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of awareness of the importance to conduct the checks relating to the fire-fighting equipment.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer had a discussion with the engine personnel to make them aware of the importance of performing the check on the equipment.
preventive_action: Fire-fighting on April 5th.

deficiency_finding: Not required - hold the vent.
description_overview: The vent of the cargo hold was found to be severely corroded.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: Failure to fulfill maintenance requirements: Defective parts/components not replaced/repaired in due time proper maintenance to remove/clean/minimize rust on vent gratings could and should be done by crew on board.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of motivation, poor risk awareness, and perception of risk are some of the human factors.
corrective_action: Proper repair/replacement of grids will be done during the upcoming dry-dock.
preventive_action: Master will ensure compliance with Company's instructions and regulatory requirements for the inspection and maintenance of bulk carrier hatch covers / coamings and openings, in addition to the repairs to be carried out at this time.

deficiency_finding: There is a light protection cover in the engine room.
description_overview: There is a quick-closing valve for the generator oil inlet.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: Crew not effective carry out maintenance work according to safety management system procedure.
corrective_action: Fix a new spare part immediately.
preventive_action: Carry out training to all crew about the safety management system procedure and carefully carry out all maintenance of the ship and equipment.

deficiency_finding: Evaluation of crew performance in fire drills.
description_overview: The initial fire drill did not demonstrate adequate familiarity.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Crew did not follow company procedures.
corrective_action: At the 2nd attempt in front of PSC inspectors, all crew briefed the same time and carried out the fire drill.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be shared with all fleet vessels to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: The clearance on the main deck is excessive.
description_overview: The clearance on the main deck is excessive.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: Improper checks are done on the safety line.
corrective_action: The AMSA inspector was upgraded to code 15 for the next port of call.
preventive_action: This deficiency will be shared with all Fleet vessels in order to raise awareness and avoid re-occurrence.

deficiency_finding: Section 2 Maintenance Procedures and Section 9 Inspection / Maintenance of Tanks and other show that the procedures implemented onboard do not ensure that the ship is maintained in accordance with the provisions of the relevant rules and regulations.
description_overview: There is a damaged wall in the galley.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of test matrix.
root_cause_analysis: The cabin windows are weathertight but the condition of rubber gasket is worn out.
corrective_action: Measures were put in place to prevent recurrence after an in-depth investigation was conducted to identify the cause of each deficiency.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The latest version of the manual is not available.
description_overview: The code is old edition.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear are consequences of material fatigue.
root_cause_analysis: The defect was issued in Japan on 6/15 and has not been closed in the computer system.
corrective_action: The Iamsar MANUAL VOL III is available on board and can be changed to code 10.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Not required - hold the vent.
description_overview: The vent of the cargo hold was found to be severely corroded.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: Failure to fulfill maintenance requirements: Defective parts/components not replaced/repaired in due time proper maintenance to remove/clean/minimize rust on vent gratings could and should be done by crew on board.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of motivation, poor risk awareness, and perception of risk are some of the human factors.
corrective_action: Proper repair/replacement of grids will be done during the upcoming dry-dock.
preventive_action: Master will ensure compliance with Company's instructions and regulatory requirements for the inspection and maintenance of bulk carrier hatch covers / coamings and openings, in addition to the repairs to be carried out at this time.

deficiency_finding: Several connections boxes and junction boxes on deck in poor conditions are not required.
description_overview: PSCO observed 5 overhead lights with wiring terminated outside or a junction box located in the vicinity.
immediate_causes: Equipment failure, malfunctioning, and lack of verification.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: New boxes were ordered and will be delivered at the next port of call, Turkey.
preventive_action: At the next Safety Meeting, deficiencies will be discussed.

deficiency_finding: The gangway motor is missing.
description_overview: The Gangway electric motor burned out before it was supposed to be supplied upon arrival.
immediate_causes: Human factors are non compliance with procedures, permits, or safe working practices.
root_cause_analysis: Human Factors: insufficient resources
corrective_action: The Gangway electric motor will be fitted.
preventive_action: Proper insulations will be carried out on all the electromotors.

deficiency_finding: The certificate was not found on the board.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of attention and control.
corrective_action: The revised certificate was requested to the authorities.
preventive_action: The certificates are verified by the office and vessel.

deficiency_finding: The passage plan was not prepared.
description_overview: The passage plan was not prepared.
immediate_causes: The company misunderstanding situation with ECDIS on-line course to pass was discovered by the PSC.
root_cause_analysis: In order to pass the anchored vessels and clear the fishing boats in the area, the vessel altered course against the passage plan.
corrective_action: The current passage plan was amended based on actual passage.
preventive_action: To be amended as soon as possible, the passage plan must be verified by the master.

deficiency_finding: UMS-Ship code 17.
description_overview: The anti-heeling system is not good.
immediate_causes: Chemicals are kept in an undesignated area.
root_cause_analysis: When the power supply from No.3 was stopped, No.1 was not able to connect automatically to the main switchboard.
corrective_action: The Stand By diesel Generator can be started and come on load after the Alarm Monitor system has been fixed.
preventive_action: The maintenance plan was discussed in the meeting.

deficiency_finding: The certificate of insurance for liability for removal of wreck expired on February 20.
description_overview: The counter in the bridge had a deviation of more than 10rpm.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The valid certificate has been sent to the vessel on time, but the Master failed to update the relevant folder with the valid ship certificates.
corrective_action: The mentioned certificate was put to the relevant folder and verified by the class.
preventive_action: The master was told to ensure proper monitoring of the ship's certificates during the monthly safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: There are fire doors and openings in fire.
description_overview: The self-closing door at the poop deck is malfunctioning over time.
immediate_causes: Insufficient crew awareness on fire prevention.
root_cause_analysis: The proper closing of the fire doors is checked monthly by the crew, as required by the company.
corrective_action: The door closing mechanism is adjusted.
preventive_action: The doors on the board were inspected and found to be in good working order.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has missing means of escae markings.
description_overview: A portable gas detector.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There wasn't enough marking in the engine room.
corrective_action: The escape route was painted but not enough.
preventive_action: Company staff will check when they visit a vessel.

deficiency_finding: Engine crew unfamiliar with oil mist alarm testing.
description_overview: The E/G had a fuel leak alarm.
immediate_causes: The smoke detector couldn't be tested in the presence of the PSCO.
root_cause_analysis: Follow up with ship's equipment is improper.
corrective_action: The simulation test of the oil mist detector system from the remote control unit was carried out to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The training of crew on Oil Mist Detector system's testing functions has been done on board.

deficiency_finding: There is a self-closing valve between the oil level glass gauge and the M/E L.O.S.T.
description_overview: The deficiency was closed by the PSC Inspector.
immediate_causes: The crewmember failed to comply with procedures.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of situational awareness.
corrective_action: The crew will be reminded that the self-closing valve should not be kept open with the use of clamping devices.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The Damage Control Booklet was not approved by the class.
description_overview: The deficiency was recorded and closed at FORM B.
immediate_causes: The incorrect symbol was used on one side.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of control over documents.
corrective_action: Class Surveyor attendance can be arranged at the next port of call.
preventive_action: To inform office if similar observation was found, the master must inspect all vessel's manual and documents.

deficiency_finding: There is a steam pipe leaking.
description_overview: There is a steam pipe leaking.
immediate_causes: Damage, temperture change and vibration are the main reasons for steam leaking from the No.1 A/E Fuel oil line.
root_cause_analysis: Ignore the low temperture affect to the steam pipe line.
corrective_action: The steam tracing line was renewed immediately.
preventive_action: To make sure no equipment is missing check, conduct engine room equipment inspection.

deficiency_finding: The air horn on the floor malfunctioned.
description_overview: In line with the Company's Safety Management System and as a part of pre-arrival checks, the Inert Gas System was tried out and found that the deck high pressure alarm was not reset.
immediate_causes: The lack of marking on the relay caused the alarm.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of inspection and maintenance.
corrective_action: The relay board power supply terminal connection was fixed.
preventive_action: Provide training to personnel involved in maintenance and operation, emphasizing the importance of adhering to approved operational systems and the potential risks associated with unauthorized modifications.

deficiency_finding: The Rain plug of the L/B (P) was broken during the PSC inspection at ZHUHAI, China.
description_overview: The company's established procedures and practices clearly state that all scuppers must be plugged at all times when in port.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer and the Deck Officers are responsible for making sure the deck scuppers are plugged and secured.
root_cause_analysis: During inspection it was asked PSCO to open the rain plug of life boat, same was opened up, but the rain plug fell out of the housing hole on the life boat body.
corrective_action: The rain plug was replaced with a new one immediately after the inspection.
preventive_action: "Rapid Fleet Safety Alert" was issued for our fleet on 21st Nov to call attention to this issue.

deficiency_finding: There is a leaking pipe on the starboard side of the engine room.
description_overview: A fire drill found substandard, scenario fire in laundry: - fire flap of laundry kept open, one SCBA Set not ready to use, wasted time bringing a spare set, unconscious person in laundry not rescued at first chance.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure and instructions to fix the leaking pipe is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of competence is one of the personal factors.
corrective_action: The leaking pipe needs to be fixed by the chief engineer.
preventive_action: The leaking pipe needs to be fixed asap.

deficiency_finding: Negligence, lack of possibility for proper, complex maintenance of ship's decks carried by ship's crew.
description_overview: Due to the limited capabilities of the crew and weather conditions during voyages, certain areas are poorly maintained.
immediate_causes: Lack of immigration is a problem.
root_cause_analysis: Negligence, lack of possibility for proper, complex maintenance of ship's decks carried by ship's crew.
corrective_action: The deck at Pomerania Shipyard Szczecin has been repaired.
preventive_action: ISM Company has planned repairs for other vessels.

deficiency_finding: It's not in a working language.
description_overview: The master was told to provide communication in working language all the time.
immediate_causes: The other external party is not under the control of the company.
root_cause_analysis: Other.
corrective_action: The working language onboard is Turkish and English and the crew has good knowledge of English.
preventive_action: The non-conformity will be shared with fleet vessels and discussed during company seminars, in-house pre-joining meetings and in-house trainings.

deficiency_finding: Due to high tide and same level of the accommodation ladder with quay side gangway watch took initiative and temporary picked up accommodation ladder without installation of portable gangway.
description_overview: The access and structural features of the ship.
immediate_causes: The problem with the air conditioning system was caused by the failure of the compressor on the night before the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There was a failure of equipment.
corrective_action: The deck crew was instructed and a safety meeting was held.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Not required - hold the vent.
description_overview: The vent of the cargo hold was found to be severely corroded.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: Failure to fulfill maintenance requirements: Defective parts/components not replaced/repaired in due time proper maintenance to remove/clean/minimize rust on vent gratings could and should be done by crew on board.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of motivation, poor risk awareness, and perception of risk are some of the human factors.
corrective_action: Proper repair/replacement of grids will be done during the upcoming dry-dock.
preventive_action: Master will ensure compliance with Company's instructions and regulatory requirements for the inspection and maintenance of bulk carrier hatch covers / coamings and openings, in addition to the repairs to be carried out at this time.

deficiency_finding: Employed for magnetron of X-band radar.
description_overview: During every navigation watch, the X-band and S-band radar performance monitor is checked and found to be in order.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: Training was given to the person in charge.
preventive_action: The equipment on the ship must be inspected and maintained as per the instructions in the maker's manual.

deficiency_finding: Tools and equipment are not available for immediate use.
description_overview: Not seen because these tools can't be stored in one place and they were kept on different places and designated places.
immediate_causes: The PSC officer can't locate the tools because they are located and kept on different places.
root_cause_analysis: Tools were stored in different places.
corrective_action: Master / Chief Officer conducted training about the locations, uses and importance in familiarizing the locations of these tools and can be easily located and ready for immediate use in case of emergency.
preventive_action: To be posted on the store with the locations as reference and easier to locate.

deficiency_finding: The rescue boat has a towing line.
description_overview: The emergency towing manual is missing from the forecastle.
immediate_causes: I found a new edition of Marpol Consolidated in Witherby Connect.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge of the LSA was unaware of the towing requirement.
corrective_action: The PSCO acknowledged that the officer in charge of the LSA placed one towing line with more than 50 meters in a rescue boat immediately.
preventive_action: The crew studied the Rescue boat towing arrangement and noted one line not less than 50 meters in length of sufficient strength to tow a life raft.

deficiency_finding: Emergency system, means of communication between safety centre and other control stations.
description_overview: The in charge officer did not set to low power mode during the cargo operation.
immediate_causes: At the time of inspection, the safety officer set the VHF to low power mode (1W) and checked the setting of others on board to make sure they are set to low power transmittion mode.
root_cause_analysis: A safety circular will be issued to the fleet for lessons learned.
corrective_action: At the time of inspection, the safety officer set the VHF to low power mode (1W) and checked the setting of others on board to make sure they are set to low power transmittion mode.
preventive_action: A safety circular will be issued to the fleet for lessons learned.

deficiency_finding: The meat and fish room floors were iced over.
description_overview: The fire screen for the valve is broken.
immediate_causes: Clean meat and fish room, wash and dry, then remove the iced area to avoid the same issue.
root_cause_analysis: The fresh water was not drained when the chamber area was cleaned.
corrective_action: The meat and fish room was cleaned and dry.
preventive_action: The risk of similar deficiencies recurring was mitigated by the summary of findings/deficiencies in the form of PSC experience feedback to all managed vessels.

deficiency_finding: There was no pressure on the Accumulator of rescue boat.
