description_overview: The crew was asked to demonstrate the launching with the accumulator.
immediate_causes: The davit's function was lost due to the screw holding the control handle being loose, which caused the control handle to come off its original position.
root_cause_analysis: After completing the Rescue boat annual survey in port, the service engineer forgot to refill the accumulator of rescue boat davit, and there was no supervision to check the condition of the accumulator pressure.
corrective_action: The PSC officer is going to inspect the accumulator.
preventive_action: Master discussed this observation with all ship staffs to emphasize the importance of cross check after task completed, Enhance supervision, do more training to improve safety awareness.

deficiency_finding: The water ingress panel of no.1 cargo hold has an alarm.
description_overview: Provision and disposition are included in lifebuoys.
immediate_causes: Poor understanding of STCW and lack of familiarization.
root_cause_analysis: The Master confirmed that the alarm had sounded earlier and that it was pending to be fixed by the Engineer.
corrective_action: The alarm was no longer active after the sensor was cleaned.
preventive_action: When an alarm is activated, it must be properly investigated so that prompt action can be taken to address the alarm condition and eliminate it.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence that the ship safety commission implemented their guidelines for cargo operations in the port.
description_overview: Low.
immediate_causes: Poor safety awareness and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: The safety alert for cargo operation is recorded in the monthly safety committee meeting record, but there is no description of each member's duty.
corrective_action: All relevant crews have a safety meeting on the day, learn about the main point of safety committee meeting, master stressed that everyone should be familiar with their duties, especially the duty of safety during cargo discharging in port.
preventive_action: Every ship in the fleet is reminded to pay close attention to relevant deficiency and keep in mind the important of safety in all aspects.

deficiency_finding: The air damper to E/R is faulty.
description_overview: The engine room vent flap wheel is small and not strong enough to open the big vent.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The smooth operation of the ventilator flap was verified by the greased starboard side engine room ventilator spindle.
preventive_action: The importance of regular testing and maintenance of all fire and safety equipment was briefed by the ship staff.

deficiency_finding: The mess Room did not update the CBA.
description_overview: Before departure, to correct the problem.
immediate_causes: A malfunction in the antenna unit caused the system to stop working.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel missed out on a newCBA because it was updated on arrival.
corrective_action: The PSC officer on board at Mariveles immediately corrected the deficiency by checking and preparing two hard copies and posting them in the messrooms.
preventive_action: During the monthly safety meeting, the issue was brought to the attention of all officers and ratings.

deficiency_finding: There are parts of the draft mark that are not clear.
description_overview: Not required.
immediate_causes: Lack of knowledge is one of the reasons for inadequate training and leadership.
root_cause_analysis: The crew doesn't pay attention to the maintenance of the ship's draft mark.
corrective_action: The draft mark is painted on the stbd side.
preventive_action: The C/O is responsible for the maintenance inspection at the interval regulation.

deficiency_finding: The compass error was not recorded on the 3rd of September.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: OOW were not familiar with the text messaging service.
corrective_action: Enhancement of the PIC responsibility is one way to strengthen the study.
preventive_action: Enhancement of the PIC responsibility is one way to strengthen the study.

deficiency_finding: The engine room can't explain why the agent neutralizing tank is in alarm when the system is switched on.
description_overview: The engine room can't explain why the agent neutralizing tank is in alarm when the system is switched on.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The log on the E/R was not recorded by the crew.
corrective_action: The crew took the chemical into the AUN and reduced the water content.
preventive_action: The crew made a card with the ratio of chemical to water and posted it near the alarm panel.

deficiency_finding: The O-rings of the machine are damaged.
description_overview: No one.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: It was very cold and the O-rings were frozen.
corrective_action: You should replace the driving gear with a spare one.
preventive_action: The inspection was done as required by the SMS.

deficiency_finding: Several air vents for cofferdams and ballast tanks were found to be in poor condition at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: Poor maintenance and supervision.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance and supervision.
corrective_action: The air vents were renewed.
preventive_action: This finding together with control, root cause and corrective actions applied will be brought to the crew's attention during a regular safety meeting on board with the goal to prevent similar occurrences.

deficiency_finding: The main deck muster station is not clear.
description_overview: The main deck muster station is not clear.
immediate_causes: The Master didn't understand the document request.
root_cause_analysis: The gangway was temporarily left close to the Muster station in order to be stored later in the day.
corrective_action: The parts were immediately removed and stored as appropriate.
preventive_action: There are daily safety rounds by OOW.

deficiency_finding: There are rubber mats for insulation in the air conditioner room.
description_overview: There are no rubber mats in the engine room.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow procedure/instruction is a human cause.
corrective_action: The crew put rubber mats for insulation.
preventive_action: rubber mats for insulation and situational awareness were sent to all managed vessels by the company.

deficiency_finding: The muster stations are missing from the ships stairs and corridors.
description_overview: The arrow symbols were placed far away from each other.
immediate_causes: The symbols 'arrow' to muster stations were missing.
root_cause_analysis: The arrow symbols were placed far away from each other.
corrective_action: There are two 'arrow' symbols already in place, but ships staff put additional 'arrow' symbols on the stairs and corridors.
preventive_action: There must be symbols not far away from each other.

deficiency_finding: Not in compliance with the requirements of the STCW.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: The inadequate record is due to the failure to follow SMS.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance was indicated by the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: The deck officers were told to strictly follow the instructions of the Master Standing Orders.
preventive_action: The master was instructed to discuss finding and corrective action during the scheduled safety in order to prevent recurrence.

deficiency_finding: There is a memory disk for a station.
description_overview: Some frame markings from F70 to F80 are not in the same color.
immediate_causes: There are immediate causes of substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The EGC information can't be printed in time because of the printer's jam, and system alarms show the wrong storage warning.
corrective_action: Trained of relevant personnel on the contents of SMI-S-D01.
preventive_action: The 2nd offcier will strengthen timely inspection.

deficiency_finding: There is segregation of dangerous goods.
description_overview: There is a chemical and oil store.
immediate_causes: The person failed to comply with the requirements.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector refers to several chemical pails which were recently received with latest stores' delivery during the recent transit of Istanbul straits and due to the limited space in the locker, they were yet not properly stowed and separated.
corrective_action: Instructions for storage and segregation of chemicals were posted on the site in accordance with the company's instructions.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was told by the Master that all chemicals should be stored in a safe and secure place and that the manufacturer's datasheets should be available to personnel handling and using the substances.

deficiency_finding: The fixed gas detection cabinet needs to be repaired prior to the cargo discharge operation.
description_overview: The fire screen for the valve is broken.
immediate_causes: There was a malfunction with the sample pump.
root_cause_analysis: The human factor is inadequate inspection and follow up.
corrective_action: Each person carried a personal gas detector along with an EEBD while entering the pump room.
preventive_action: An unsafe condition was raised in the safety management system.

deficiency_finding: The Master and Chief Engineer were unable to provide evidence of using the UMS system in the Engine Room.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: The hours were restored July and August.
root_cause_analysis: The records did not show that UMS had been implemented.
corrective_action: The bridge duty officer was informed of the start of the UMS Period.
preventive_action: To show the in charge personnel from the beginning of the period to the end.

deficiency_finding: The smell and decomposing of garbage can be seen.
description_overview: Garbage storage on board is excessive and the same is pending.
immediate_causes: Poor planning of garbage disposal resulted in below-standard order.
root_cause_analysis: Garbage was accumulated despite the vessel following good waste management procedures.
corrective_action: The balance of garbage was discharged after the inspection.
preventive_action: In order for arrangements to be made at a suitable port, garbage disposal needs to be coordinated with the Company Operations Department in advance of long voyages.

deficiency_finding: galley equipment is not operational after the emergency stop.
description_overview: galley equipment is not operational after the emergency stop.
immediate_causes: The setting position wasn't adjusted properly and the limit switches weren't touching the plate.
root_cause_analysis: Emergency stops were not inspected and tested.
corrective_action: To replace the circuit breaker as soon as the spare part arrives.
preventive_action: The safety officer will check the galley.

deficiency_finding: There is only one lifebuoy at the entrance of the gangway.
description_overview: Life buoy with self-igniting light and lifeline was supposed to post near the shore gangway in order to use in an emergency, however, it did not post on scene.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: Misunderstood regulation is caused by lack of knowledge.
corrective_action: There is an additional life buoy near the gangway.
preventive_action: A lifebuoy with a heaving line should be available on-board the ship near the gangway or accommodation ladder, however, it was not posted near the junction point between shore and ship.

deficiency_finding: Emergency lighting is not maintained.
description_overview: The corridors and ECR had dull lighting.
immediate_causes: WEAR and TEAR.
root_cause_analysis: During the inspection, the lighting was found to be inoperative due to wear and tear.
corrective_action: Additional spare lamps will be onboard and additional checks will be conducted prior to arrival port to prevent similar occurrences in the future.
preventive_action: Additional spare lamps will be onboard and additional checks will be conducted prior to arrival port to prevent similar occurrences in the future.

deficiency_finding: VDR annual performance test certificate is missing.
description_overview: The AC malfunction could not have been fixed by the crew and it was reported to the Company.
immediate_causes: The fire detection system was not taught.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause was that the master couldn't keep in files the VDR annual performance test certificate.
corrective_action: The PSCO accepted the deficiency corrective after it was obtained and shown the VDR annual performance test certificate.
preventive_action: We checked the company's report forms and found no item for VDR annual performance test certificate.

deficiency_finding: The limit switch on the rescue boat malfunctioned.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: The limit switch was stuck by frozen grease when the Rescue Boat was tested in the monthly drill.
root_cause_analysis: Acts that are unsafe.
corrective_action: The master confirmed that the limit switch was free and grease free.
preventive_action: The officer in charge of LSA should conduct weekly testing to make sure the vessel is in working condition.

deficiency_finding: The company identification number is notCOINCIDED.
description_overview: The ISSC was issued by the flag after a successful completion of inspection, however the company identification number was incorrect when the certificate was issued and same was missed to be checked by the master.
immediate_causes: The act is not under the control of the local authorities.
root_cause_analysis: Poor inspection of ship certificates after issuance.
corrective_action: Attached is a copy of the ISSC certificate that was sent to the vessel.
preventive_action: The master was told to check the trading certificates and documents issued to the vessel to make sure they are accurate.

deficiency_finding: The public address system is malfunctioning.
description_overview: There is a ship blockade broken.
immediate_causes: The speakers in the Rescue Boat Deck were cracked.
root_cause_analysis: The Public Address System maintenance requirements of weekly verification for proper functioning are documented in the Work Instructions Manual Section I Chapter 8.2.18, however, it was not included in the paper-based PMS forms to remind vessel's crew in-charge of inspections and maintenance.
corrective_action: The entire PA system was tested and found to be working.
preventive_action: The form will be sent to all fleet vessels by the end of July.

deficiency_finding: There is a steam pipe on the deck.
description_overview: Water seepage from one of the steam line flange was observed by the PSCO.
immediate_causes: There is a routine inspection and maintenance of the LTA.
root_cause_analysis: There is a routine inspection and maintenance of the LTA.
corrective_action: The steam line gasket was replaced and there was no water seepage.
preventive_action: The responsible officer was briefed by the master for the dangers of similar defects.

deficiency_finding: Not as required is the sanitary room.
description_overview: Plumbing leaks, broken sinks, and missing toilet seats were found in sanitary rooms.
immediate_causes: The sanitary facilities were thoroughly cleaned by the crew.
root_cause_analysis: The Master or an officer appointed by him is responsible for carrying out inspection of the crew accommodation, public spaces, sanitary facilities, provision locker, laundry rooms.
corrective_action: The leaking drain pipe was fixed by the ship's staff.
preventive_action: Regular inspection of crew accommodation is required to comply with the requirement.

deficiency_finding: The antenna warning poster is missing.
description_overview: Due to the accumulated ice above food, the cold room/ meet room did not thaw out.
immediate_causes: There is oversight.
root_cause_analysis: Unfortunately, one of the signs that had been removed for renewal was the high voltage warning sign.
corrective_action: In response to the incident, the vessel's Master held a meeting with all officers to emphasize the importance of proper job planning.
preventive_action: It will be a point of discussion during company-run seminars and in-house pre-joining meetings to reinforce the importance of proper task completion and verification.

deficiency_finding: NP 14 requires for intended voyage not available on board.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector was observe and made deficiency, that required NP 14 missed on board.
corrective_action: The deficiency was corrected before departure.
preventive_action: The Fleet Monthly Reminder clearly shows company requirements related to nautical charts and publications.

deficiency_finding: The speed and distance indicator is not working.
description_overview: The speed and distance indicator was inoperative due to the vessel at the berths.
immediate_causes: The duty officer couldn't demonstrate properly to the PSC inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of familiarity with equipment.
corrective_action: The speed indicator should be set to zero in order to indicate zero speed.
preventive_action: The company shared the PSC report with the Fleet vessel to make sure there was no repeat on board.

deficiency_finding: The crew is not familiar with the device.
description_overview: Obstacles were found outside the No. 1 emergency on the main deck.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given and the deficiency was fixed on-site during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The Engine Crew was asked to review the OWS History log by the PSCO.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer with some delay showed the PSCO the OWS history Log for his satisfaction and same was recorded with action taken code 10 into the PSC Report.
preventive_action: In order to include the OWS history log familiarization during the take over of a new Chief Engineer as well as the 3 months inspection to safety items, the Company revised some ISM forms.

deficiency_finding: The rate of discharge of sewage from the holding tank approved by the Administration is not available.
description_overview: The rate of discharge from the holding tank approved by the Administration is not available.
immediate_causes: The water came from the emergency because the discharge valve on the common delivery line was stuck in the open position.
root_cause_analysis: The table 'The rate of discharge of sewage from holding tank' is not approved by the Administration.
corrective_action: A corrected certificate was issued by the Class Society.
preventive_action: Masters on board and Company's Technical Department will provide proper verification and controlling of certificates or documents and inform immediately issuing Authority in case of any discrepancies.

deficiency_finding: Emergency system/location of emergency installation.
description_overview: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient maintenance and supervision by the ship crew.
corrective_action: The hinges at all boxes have been repaired.
preventive_action: Maintenance schedules should be followed according to the company.

deficiency_finding: Air pipes and cable pipes are in bad shape.
description_overview: There is an electric cable that connects the Minoans to the MGPS that was damaged.
immediate_causes: The warning system is not adequate.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: The pipes, cable boxes, and paint were immediately cleaned by the ship staff for safe loading during the port stay.
preventive_action: To identify high-focus areas, you need a vessel.

deficiency_finding: Sickbay is not required to use a store room.
description_overview: Steering gear room has an oil store.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The mattress is stowed in the sick bay temporarily as the place the mattress is used by the stevedores at the port.
corrective_action: The sick bay was kept free from any other stores except hospital equipment and medicine, and good hygiene was maintained because the mattress was stowed before.
preventive_action: There is a requirement for all crew/officer awareness and compliance.

deficiency_finding: The table of shipboard working arrangement poster does not reflect the actual work and rest schedule.
description_overview: The table of shipboard working arrangement poster does not reflect the actual work and rest schedule of engine room personnel.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The table of shipboard working arrangement poster does not reflect the actual work and rest schedule of engine room personnel.
corrective_action: Provide objective documentary evidence (training attendance records, post rectification photos, service reports, etc.) and file with the respective observations.
preventive_action: It is advisable to give enough time to monitor and verify the effectiveness of corrective and preventive actions.

deficiency_finding: The main deck has excessivecorrosion.
description_overview: Plastic or metal wires are used to hold the safety valve on the fuel oil level gauge.
immediate_causes: The previous voyage was laden and the cargo holds couldn't be accessed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of proper maintenance for the main deck.
corrective_action: The residual cargo should be removed and cleaned as soon as possible.
preventive_action: There is a special corrosive main deck with residual cargo.

deficiency_finding: The garbage category in the record book is incorrect.
description_overview: The inspector's comment is acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The garbage record book was not properly recorded after the garbage was incinerated.
corrective_action: The master reviewed and amended the garbage record book.
preventive_action: He emphasized that the category and quantity of garbage incinerated, must be recorded accurately in the Garbage record book, prior being off landed for proper disposal.

deficiency_finding: The GMS gas analyzer malfunctioned on low input value.
description_overview: According to the flag state approved action plan, to be repaired.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the schedule.
root_cause_analysis: There is no spare on the board.
corrective_action: The company arranged for the repair of the GMS analyzer in this port and the same was done in the present port.
preventive_action: Training for the crew will be given and additional maintenance routine will be kept.

deficiency_finding: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: Conducted training on last minute changes to passage plan.
root_cause_analysis: The paper printout of the plan was not done because of the lack of knowledge.
corrective_action: Changes to the passage plan must be discussed with the bridge team prior to their arrival.
preventive_action: The education master checks for compliance.

deficiency_finding: The vending machine of the room was missing.
description_overview: The steering gear room broke and the gasket was needed to fix it.
immediate_causes: Material fatigue caused this gasket to break.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: The complete plan maintenance system job scheduling is based on the recommendation of the maker.
preventive_action: The other ventilators were checked for free operation.

deficiency_finding: Lifebuoy with line is not ready for immediate use.
description_overview: The line should be untied immediately.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The long voyage and stay at the anchorage lead to more garbage being produced.
corrective_action: The line should be untied immediately.
preventive_action: Life-saving equipment inspection items should be implemented.

deficiency_finding: The drill record is incorrect.
description_overview: A drill has been conducted in order to complete the mission.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply.
root_cause_analysis: After the 2nd engineer boarded the vessel, a black and white copy of the medical certificate was provided.
corrective_action: The resting hours form has been changed.
preventive_action: The crew must check their records to avoid any wrong entries.

deficiency_finding: Load Line and Safety Equipment certificates are incomplete.
description_overview: During the PSC Inspection at Yokkaichi PSC Officer Maeda Takuma imposed a deficiency.
immediate_causes: The vessel was unable to apply the stencil in time due to the sudden berthing schedule.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: Only the E certificates were kept in the file after the endorsed certificates were removed.
preventive_action: The company's procedures for managing electronic certificates have been reviewed by the Master as a preventive measure.

deficiency_finding: The BWT system on the vessel is based on UV light and filtrati, which is required by the manufacturers.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure and instructions is the immediate cause of substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Theability to comprehend is a basic/roots cause.
corrective_action: Correct entries were made in the BWRB after de-ballasting was completed.
preventive_action: Be attentive while filling out WBRB.

deficiency_finding: There is a free fall life boat.
description_overview: There is no safe way to get to the free fall emergency light.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: The safety officer didn't follow company guidelines.
corrective_action: Cleaned free fall wind chime.
preventive_action: The safety officer was told to keep the free fall window clean.

deficiency_finding: The safety pin of release for the life rafts is stuck.
description_overview: The forward forecastle doors are weathertight.
immediate_causes: The chief officer took the waste paint off the safety pins.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of compliance.
corrective_action: The officer in charge was told to follow the procedures for checking and maintenance equipment.
preventive_action: Marine Supt, Techinical Supt should make sure safety equipment is ready for use at all times when boarding the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The duty engineer was not familiar with the critical operation of valves and pipes system in the stage of fuel oil change over and was unable to maneuver freely at the high density and narrow water area.
description_overview: The company name on the DOC is not the same as on the CSR.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: Senior office gave the order to duty oiler, but oiler misinterpreted and operated the wrong valves.
corrective_action: After being verified by the duty oiler, the valves were fixed by the senior office.
preventive_action: All instructions from the senior office to the crew must be double confirmed.

deficiency_finding: The handlingroom is damaged.
description_overview: Several tiles were broken or loose.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: There are 12 crew members with the SEA who have exceeded their contract time.
description_overview: Certifying and documentation is part of the Seafarers' employment agreement.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Manning agency prioritized responding to various restrictions on crew change procedures due to the effects of the Pandemic and overlooked simple Crew Contract duration and extension procedures which required POEA.
corrective_action: The POEA contract for 12 crew was extended by 2 months.
preventive_action: Since the declaration of the end of the Pandemic, restrictions have been relaxed in each country, so it is now possible to respond to normal operations.

deficiency_finding: Documentation for the enhanced survey programme is missing.
description_overview: The vessel is not provided with the necessary information.
immediate_causes: Bulk carrier was stated in the ship's classification certificate, along with other cargo ships.
root_cause_analysis: The certificates were issued for a different type of ship.
corrective_action: When the ship type is "other cargo", Class re-confirmed that ESP documentation is not required.
preventive_action: The Company reviewed this finding with the Master to make sure that any gaps in knowledge are corrected and that the Master is aware of what is required to be checked.

deficiency_finding: Engineers are not recording their working time.
description_overview: Engineers are not recording their working time.
immediate_causes: There was a small leak from the isolation valve during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The operator's rest time engine room engineer was different because he only operated the cargo of cement.
corrective_action: You can check the Bunker time on rest time and real time.
preventive_action: We need to pay attention to the rest time and check it every time.

deficiency_finding: The emergency generator room has low insulation.
description_overview: The insulation on the panel is not good.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer and the Deck Officers are responsible for making sure the deck scuppers are plugged and secured.
root_cause_analysis: There was some water in the Emergency Generator room when the vessel was at Anchorage due to the heavy rain.
corrective_action: The Lifeboat light on the upper deck was opened and cleaned.
preventive_action: If any low insulation is found, it is to be sorted out on the priority list.

deficiency_finding: Two rollers in the forecastle were blocked at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: The forecastle was often covered with sea splash due to bad weather and low freeboard.
immediate_causes: Poor supervision and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Poor supervision and maintenance.
corrective_action: Rollers were repaired.
preventive_action: This finding together with control, root cause and corrective actions applied will be brought to crew attention during regular safety meeting on board with goal to prevent similar occurrences.

deficiency_finding: Garbage is not categorized correctly.
description_overview: The PSC reported that the paint was stored on the mooring deck in an inadequately secured condition during the previous passage and not in the paint locker.
immediate_causes: During the self-inspection on the ship, the deficiency was not found in advance.
root_cause_analysis: Bins were not stenciled as per the category mentioned.
corrective_action: Training was given to all crew on how to dispose of garbage.
preventive_action: Proper supervision and guidance by senior in charge.

deficiency_finding: An auxiliary engine.
description_overview: There were multiple critical alarms activated for the three auxiliary engines.
immediate_causes: Due to short passage and lack of awareness of situational importance of hygiene, the washrooms on the ship were not immediately cleaned and maintained.
root_cause_analysis: The detector was damaged, and the wire connecting was wrong, as a result of the engineer in charge lack of inspection and maintenance.
corrective_action: After looking at the detector, it was found that it was damaged.
preventive_action: Maintenance and inspection should be done at regular intervals as per maintenance plan.

deficiency_finding: SOLAS Ch. II-1 Parts C,D,E,F - SOLAS 09 Amend.
description_overview: The same devices observed for 3 MSW cooling pumps and function is not confirmed.
immediate_causes: The contents of the SOLAS Training Manual were not checked by the officer in charge.
root_cause_analysis: Outfitting, Maintenance Program Implementation, Scope Issue, Companies Standards, Policies, or Administrative Controls issue are not addressed.
corrective_action: The main bilge, fire and G:S: pump No.1 has been re-adjusted.
preventive_action: The companies planned maintenance system has been updated and new jobs are included.

deficiency_finding: The screen on the VHF is not clear.
description_overview: There is a cover letter for the Tonnage Certificate, but it is not available on board.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: During the voyage, the screen on the VHF was burning up.
corrective_action: The radio technician replaced the screen after the master reported the malfunction.
preventive_action: The radio technician replaced the screen after the master reported the malfunction.

deficiency_finding: There are two signal lights on the mast.
description_overview: After gangway was rigged, the vessel was boarded by PSC, but the lights on the main mast were not on.
immediate_causes: Crew members don't know what an emergency is when they are in the engine room.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance.
corrective_action: The light bulb was changed with an onboard spare and the same was shown to the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: During the subsequent vessel port call, the effectiveness of corrective action will be verified.

deficiency_finding: Cement boxes are fitted to the main engine.
description_overview: BWMS found two alarms still active despite being alarmed.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedures.
root_cause_analysis: Poor assessment of preventive maintenance needs.
corrective_action: The vessel sailed from Australia to her destination.
preventive_action: The Class instructed the crew to use cement boxes or doubler plates to fix the issue.

deficiency_finding: The EEBD is not used for marking.
description_overview: The action code is 17/10/2018.
immediate_causes: The number of compass observations was insufficient.
root_cause_analysis: It became apparent that the EEBD for training purposes was not marked according to directives, instructions and practices.
corrective_action: After the completion of the PSC inspection, the Safety Officer was told to immediately mark the EEBD 'For training only'.
preventive_action: Instructions will be included to proceed with extraordinary inspection of training material and devices to ensure compliance. Instructions will be included to proceed with extraordinary inspection of training material and devices to ensure compliance.

deficiency_finding: There is a life buoy at the rescue boat deck.
description_overview: There is a safety guard on the pump.
immediate_causes: The original cargo cleaning pump was not fully guard by the safety net.
root_cause_analysis: There was inadequate supervision after the job was done.
corrective_action: The Imo symbol for lifebuoy was immediately posted.
preventive_action: The master briefed the concerned ship staff and safety officer to carry out frequent rounds around the vessel and ensure all required Imo symbols are posted at the designed areas to avoid future reoccurrences of such observations.

deficiency_finding: The vessel did not have a transfer procedure.
description_overview: An Occasional Survey was carried out at the request of the owner after deficiencies were pointed out by the USCG Mobile.
immediate_causes: Poor supervision and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The floor at the bottom of the engine room was not tightened with screws in time because the person did not check carefully enough.
corrective_action: The transfer procedures were found to be in order.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is ready availability of fire fighting equipment.
description_overview: There is a fire extinguisher that is missing.
immediate_causes: The acts are substandard.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient leadership.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The lock on the rescue boat is a manual one.
description_overview: In the crew mess room, it was observed that the certificates were not pasted.
immediate_causes: The crew didn't input drill time into the record.
root_cause_analysis: There is a harsh maritime environment, inadequate maintenance schedule, and oversight.
corrective_action: The seized interlock mechanism needs immediate repair or replacement.
preventive_action: To share lessons learnt with office staff as well as the fleet to review/discuss and correct where required to avoid similar finding.

deficiency_finding: Mooring rollers between Hatch no.1 and 2 are not rotating.
description_overview: The mooring roller between Hatch no.1 and 2 on the port side was frozen and not rotating during the PSC inspection.
immediate_causes: The vessel did not keep a hard copy of rest hours as a backup in case of a software issue.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer overlooked the less frequently used and less visible equipment, which led to the deficiency in Mooring Roller Maintenance.
corrective_action: The mooring roller between Hatch no.1 and 2 on the port side was freed up and repaired immediately.
preventive_action: The Master will supervise periodic checks on all deck maintenance status, ensuring thorough inspections of all equipment, including less frequently used and less visible mooring rollers near hatch covers.

deficiency_finding: There is a missing manhole.
description_overview: One two-way vhf radiotelphone apparatus is missing.
immediate_causes: The emergency generator was isolated and the supply to the emergency switchboard was cut off.
root_cause_analysis: As per SOLAS Regulation XI-1/7, the vessel is equipped with additional gas meter in excess of the requirement.
corrective_action: Requisition No.1181097 prepared and submitted to the Office for the provision of a spare gas meter to the satisfaction of attending PSC Officer, which will be delivered in the next convenient Port.
preventive_action: The Monthly Alert Bulletin will be sent to all the Dry Fleet.

deficiency_finding: The exhaust of the galley is not clean.
description_overview: The galley sink was taken out to clear the drainpipe.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The galley crew neglected to clean the galley during the last week, which caused the deficiency to be raised.
corrective_action: The relevant evidence was provided to the PSC officer.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels were told to carry out a thorough inspection at the galley.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, the self-closing arrangement on Fire Doors was missing.
description_overview: There is a lack of familiarity with SSP Confidentiality on who is not authorized to look into the manual.
immediate_causes: Individual and group violations by lack of supervision.
root_cause_analysis: Individual and group violations by lack of supervision.
corrective_action: There are Sel-Closing devices in the CO2 room.
preventive_action: It has been verified that the fire door arrangements are in line with the fire safety plan.

deficiency_finding: The scrubber alarm system is not connected to the engine room alarm system, when creating an alarm on the scrubber, no visible or audible alarm was observed in ER and in/on ER alarm system.
description_overview: Crew member that perform the test didn't know that it takes 10 to 15 minutes to set the alarm, the alarm was in good technical condition.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were offered.
root_cause_analysis: There is no audio-visual alarm in the Engine room due to faulty relays.
corrective_action: After testing, the faulty relays were found to be in working order.
preventive_action: There was an extraordinary safety meeting where the details of the finding and its planned/proposed corrective action were discussed.

deficiency_finding: The safety of navigation and bridge visibility were found at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The port and starboard views were not visible at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Testing was carried out after the repair and it was found to be in good working order.
root_cause_analysis: The port and starboard screens were not clear.
corrective_action: The clear view screens were dismantled and cleaned.
preventive_action: The bridge team was briefed by the master on the importance of maintaining clear and clear view glass.

deficiency_finding: There is no Em'cy lighting at the NO.2 INMARSAT-C station.
description_overview: There is ready availability of fire-fighting equipment.
immediate_causes: During the last rescue boat drill on 19th May 2023, the wire rope for the pin of the rescue boat hook got detached from the hook while trying out.
root_cause_analysis: The instructions of operation of the navigation equipment on the bridge were not fully understood by the personnel in charge.
corrective_action: The instructions of operation of the navigation equipment on the bridge were given to the personnel in charge.
preventive_action: Instructions of operation of the navigation equipment on the bridge.

deficiency_finding: Provision of liferafts.
description_overview: Lashed down.
immediate_causes: The problem with the air conditioning system was caused by the failure of the compressor on the night before the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There was a machine failure.
corrective_action: Life rafts were renewed at Tuzla Shipyard.
preventive_action: All vessel's equipment must be checked to make sure it's working well before embarking on any passage.

deficiency_finding: The expired publication was found during the inspection.
description_overview: There was an oil stain under the drain valve of the oil tank for the Hatch Cover system.
immediate_causes: The contents of the SOLAS Training Manual were not checked by the officer in charge.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the epidemic, the application was unable to supply ships.
corrective_action: The master and PSCO were satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: 2nd Officer will make sure the publications are updated at all times.

deficiency_finding: The engine's alabaster andTRIP are not working.
description_overview: A potential slip trip and fall can be caused by rubber insulation mats in front of electrical panels that are not secured properly.
immediate_causes: The pressure switch became non-operational after the valve block where the sensor is being attached was found to be leaking and the isolation valve was open.
root_cause_analysis: The onboard staffs didn't realize that the battery left inside the electric room was a trip hazard.
corrective_action: Cut off the lube oil pressure that is supplied to the low pressure shut down sensor by installing a ball valve.
preventive_action: The test should have been carried out within the given time frame.

deficiency_finding: Master was told to comply from the current date onward after only 3 compass observations in the last 5 weeks.
description_overview: If not possible to take observation due to overcast skies, poor visibility or due to heavy traffic, an entry is to be made to justify not being able to take gyro error observation.
immediate_causes: The number of compass observations was insufficient.
root_cause_analysis: The deck log book shows overcast skies and poor visibility, but no entry was made on the azimuth log to justify not having a compass error observation.
corrective_action: When the condition does not allow to take compass error observation, duty officers did not make remarks on the compass observation log.
preventive_action: The duty officers didn't have log entry on the azimuth log.

deficiency_finding: The Bunker Station has a heavy rusty smell.
description_overview: The maintenance of certain sections was not completed due to the short voyages.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of risk awareness.
corrective_action: The master will carry out safety rounds on a monthly basis and report the issues to the office.
preventive_action: The deficiency status was closed on the 18th of February.

deficiency_finding: The FFB davit, chain blocks in ER, provision/bunker crane, and several hooks of hoisting equipment are all missing.
description_overview: There is safety management.
immediate_causes: Prior to the arrival of the vessel at this port, the latches of the hooks were improved, but the paint on them was blocking the moving mechanism.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not carry out proper maintenance on mooring equipment.
corrective_action: The supply of the grating plates was delivered on the following date and the renewal work will resume depending on the weather.
preventive_action: The supply of new grating plates was arranged prior to the vessel's arrival, as the vessel did a 6 week voyage and it was expected a lot of spare material would be used for various maintenance work.

deficiency_finding: Hull is cracking.
description_overview: The master was told to have the Main deck repaired during the upcoming dry dock.
immediate_causes: The cracks have been detected and reported to Class, which issued a Condition of Class.
root_cause_analysis: The condition of class is to be defintly repaired.
corrective_action: The class satisfaction has been repaired.
preventive_action: Scheduled for Dry dock repairs.

deficiency_finding: The application letter was not available.
description_overview: The risk rating is low.
immediate_causes: Not identified.
root_cause_analysis: Not identified.
corrective_action: The flag administration was contacted to clarify the situation.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The structural fire protection of the bulkhead is compromised by the bridge air conditioning unit penetrating through it.
description_overview: The inspector believes that the marking does not comply with the requirements of SOLAS XI-1/3.
immediate_causes: The bridge communication unit was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: Procedure was not followed.
corrective_action: There is an issue of NCR O-20240416/002.
preventive_action: Deficiency was sent via e-mail to all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The limit SWITCH is not in good condition.
immediate_causes: The actual status of the tapes is good but they are not in good shape.
root_cause_analysis: When the vessel arrived to Quebec city port, the PSC officer from Transport Canada noticed the side load line was submerged.
corrective_action: The limit switch needs to be replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Before fumigating a previous voyage, no evidence of the ship safety committee should be carried out.
description_overview: Before fumigating a previous voyage, no evidence of the ship safety committee should be carried out.
immediate_causes: The rest hours were not filled by the crew.
root_cause_analysis: Apparently master disseminated the information to department heads instead of conducting fumigation safety meeting to all crew prior starts.
corrective_action: The master immediately held a safety meeting for all crew except those on duty watch.
preventive_action: Master will never fail to conduct a safety meeting before starting any  fumigation in the cargo holds from here onward even with limited time.

deficiency_finding: The doors are not maintained.
description_overview: The powerpack room had a weathertight door that was kept open by a plastic strap.
immediate_causes: The hinges were not aligned correctly, causing a gap when closing the frequently used door at sea.
root_cause_analysis: Management Factors: Lack of proper supervision / leadership Lack of supervision in inspecting the weather-tight door on the upper deck.
corrective_action: The powerpack room plastic strap was removed and the weathertight door was checked.
preventive_action: Photographs to be sent to the office in both positions as part of the weekly work done report. Photographs to be sent to the office in both positions as part of the weekly work done report.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, it was found out that the HRU for the EPIRB and VDR is expired.
description_overview: The life RAFT PAINTER SYSTEM IS NOT DRAGGED BY THE SINKING SHIP.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The HRUs were delivered after the Radio Technician disembarked since he will be back onboard next port.
corrective_action: The 2nd/ officer was instructed by the PSC inspector to install the HRUs.
preventive_action: The Annual Safety Radio survey will be arranged prior to the due date.

deficiency_finding: The alarm panel is inaudible.
description_overview: The E/G had a fuel leak alarm.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The general and fire alarm was tested weekly by the engineer and found normal, however due to wear and tear the cable was not found loose in connection, no audio was found when tested by PSCO.
corrective_action: The Elec engineer checked the cable and found it was loose, connected again and tested the alarm, audio and visual alarm comes.
preventive_action: Elec engineer should ensure the alarm panel is in good condition and senior management should check the compliance in the monthly inspection.

deficiency_finding: Six bolts and nuts were found to be seriously corroded.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts of the bilge standard discharge connection were found to be heavily corroded.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are deficiencies in the inspection method and work standards.
corrective_action: The deficiency was fixed on the spot by the PSC officers, who closed it.
preventive_action: A safety meeting on the same day emphasized the importance of careful inspections onboard and proper assessment of the needs for preventive maintenance.

deficiency_finding: Mooring line one no. at stern and two nos. at forward slack.
description_overview: Mooring line one no. at stern and two nos. at forward slack.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Not proper monitoring and not properly defined procedures.
corrective_action: Instructions for proper monitoring of mooring lines tension and balancing adjustment were immediately given to all crew members.
preventive_action: The newly developed mooring management plan was shared with the crew.

deficiency_finding: Two valid Load Line Certificates are in the file of the ship.
description_overview: The Master accidentally kept both certificates in the same file.
immediate_causes: The owners asked for help.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of documentation.
corrective_action: A lock and key has been placed on the certificate.
preventive_action: A common message will be sent to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: The LO Sludge Tank's oil record book entries were incorrect from January 30th to April 24th.
description_overview: At the stage of inspection, there isn't any further action on root cause analysis.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The standard act.
corrective_action: The LO Sludge Tank's capacity in the oil record book was checked and corrected.
preventive_action: An authorized person will check entries in the oil record book on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: There is an inventory of rescue boats.
description_overview: Rescue boat recovery equipment is missing.
immediate_causes: He can't answer the question because he doesn't have BWMP knowledge.
root_cause_analysis: The No.2 rescue boat inventory was shown to PSCO.
corrective_action: The No.2 rescue boat inventory was shown to PSCO.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Toilets on the upper deck are broken off.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: Instructions were given to mark the seat positions inside the life boats.
root_cause_analysis: Master's weekly inspection checks are ineffective.
corrective_action: The seats were replaced with new ones after the purchase order was raised.
preventive_action: The safety officer was told to bring to the attention of the crew similar defects so that they can be fixed in time.

deficiency_finding: Multiple Alarms on the Main Operational Panel.
description_overview: The crew of the ship could not give a satisfactory explanation as to why the emergency power source was insufficient.
immediate_causes: Cleaned before leaving.
root_cause_analysis: The subjects of the M/E multiple alarms were found to have previously been set in "inhibit" mode.
corrective_action: As per standard procedure, a non-conformity was issued.
preventive_action: The relevant NC will be discussed on the next Safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: Radio batteries are examined daily.
description_overview: Not recorded in the radio logbook.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The bridge team and electrical officer were briefed on proper upkeep of the GMDSS log books.
preventive_action: There is a poster on the bridge with a list of documents to be updated prior to arrival.

deficiency_finding: Minimum Safe Manning is not properly filled.
description_overview: The Minimum safe manning certificate states that the ship occasionally have unattended machinery space, but according to class certificate it is not unattended.
immediate_causes: Lack of awareness of the importance of securing spare parts.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of awareness.
corrective_action: The updated Safety Manning was received on October 27th.
preventive_action: All certificates must be updated on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: Emergency preparation.
description_overview: The fire drill showed lack of communication, control and appropriate response.
immediate_causes: Human Factors are not applicable.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient training is one of the human factors.
corrective_action: The entire ship staff was briefed by the vessel manager.
preventive_action: Upon the vessel's arrival at the discharge port in China, an auditor will be assigned to carry out Internal Audit of the vessel and training of entire ship staff.

deficiency_finding: The SO2/CO2 ratio is incorrect due to missing calibration gas.
description_overview: According to the flag state approved action plan, to be repaired.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: Calibration gas is difficult to dispatch by parcel because it is dangerous.
corrective_action: In order to secure integrity condition of EGCS, Ship's hand carried out of following process ; i) Gas sampling probe filter on funnel side has duly applied maintenance as replaced filter and cleaning/penetrating of pipe line
preventive_action: The C/E educated officer is in charge of the shipboard maintenance procedure.

deficiency_finding: The application receipt of the flag endorsement of 3rd mate expired on April 10th.
description_overview: The engineer didn't know about the test of M/E L.O stand-by pump change-over in case of low pressure.
immediate_causes: Incorrect equipment handling and operating.
root_cause_analysis: The flag endorsement has been issued and forwarded, but no further corrective action has been done.
corrective_action: As the full crew certification was onboard, the deficiency was initially not understood.
preventive_action: The availability and validity of the new joiners certificates are checked by the Master through S-29 report which is submitted to office.

deficiency_finding: The rudder angle indicators are not being used for the steering gear tests.
description_overview: The master instructed the crew to get more training on how to operate the CO2 system in an emergency.
immediate_causes: The Starboard Side Bridge Wing Rudder angle Indicator had a few degrees of error and the spare part was already on order.
root_cause_analysis: Steering gear rudder angle indicator error and drills for emergency steering gears were carried out frequently to confirm and assess the situation, to verify the difference of true rudder angle at steering gear room and rudder angle repeaters.
corrective_action: The crew was told how to perform such entries by the master.
preventive_action: In order to be alert about the matter, the case was sent to the fleet.

deficiency_finding: The Alarm system of OWS was found to be inoperative.
description_overview: There were problems with the rescue boat engine cooling water pump.
immediate_causes: The bottle brush used for testing the alarm signal of the OWS 15PPM monitor is missing.
root_cause_analysis: There are missing tools.
corrective_action: The bottle brush placed near the OWS 15PPM monitor alarm indicates the alarm Scatter signal is too low.
preventive_action: Long term action.

deficiency_finding: The actual conditions on board are not reflected in the records.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The records on the day of the inspection were the last two weeks outdated and the provision ROB records were last calculated at the end of the month.
corrective_action: Training has been done on weekly inspection of food.
preventive_action: Finding will be communicated to all vessels, under the management in the form of Fleet Notice aiming to emphasize the finding requesting from the vessels, the ROB for the provisions to be always updated when the vessel is alongside.

deficiency_finding: The standard compass deviation is excessive.
description_overview: The vessel was found to have a deficiency for the Standard compass high deviation.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Magnetic compass isn't adjusted correctly.
corrective_action: The compass was adjusted by swinging the vessel in the open seas.
preventive_action: The Gyro and Magnetic compass error can be observed with correct deviation and log.

deficiency_finding: HULL CRACKING IS A CONSEQUENCE OF COLLISION WITH A BARGE DURING BUNKER OPERATION.
description_overview: There are numerous pipe support on the main deck that are cracked and Wasted.
immediate_causes: There were 6 pieces of pipe support that were corrosive and 3 that werecracked due to insufficient maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Green Pearl was damaged due to the inability of the Bunker barge to maneuver.
corrective_action: The ship's damages were repaired at the shipyard.
preventive_action: After repairs were done at Las Palmas Shipyard, deficiency was issued by the PSC officer.

deficiency_finding: The antenna is not provided with a handrail.
description_overview: According to the relevant Class/IACS rules and regulations, as in built condition.
immediate_causes: The issue was fixed in the presence of the PSC Officer and endorsed before leaving the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: The antenna is not provided with a handrail.
corrective_action: Same has been fixed.
preventive_action: Deficiency will be shared with all vessels.

deficiency_finding: The air pressure gauge of G/E No2 needs to be boosted.
description_overview: The battery charging panel board is low insulation.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient auditing, inspection, and monitoring.
corrective_action: Change from spare part.
preventive_action: The officer is responsible for following P.M.S.

deficiency_finding: The alarm for the sewage holding tank failed.
description_overview: There was oil leaking from hatch cover No.1 forward lift-up jack flexible hose end connection during the inspection.
immediate_causes: Repairs were made by shipboard staff before departure.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance and supervision.
corrective_action: The high level alarm is tested on a weekly basis.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer was briefed by the engine room staff.

deficiency_finding: The ship's freefall lifeboat has not been launched and maneuvered in the water by its assigned operating crew for more than four months.
description_overview: Rescue boat davit slewing is slow.
immediate_causes: The company stated in the CSR doc that it was not the same as the DOC.
root_cause_analysis: The administrator has been informed and a letter has already been issued.
corrective_action: The master was told to arrange the launching and lowering of the boat at the first chance.
preventive_action: The next in-house training session for Deck and Engine Officers will include the topic officiencies.

deficiency_finding: The instructions in the ballast water record book were not followed by some entries.
description_overview: The instructions in the ballast water record book were not followed by some entries.
immediate_causes: Incorrect interpretation of entries will be made in BWRB.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient review of BWRB entries.
corrective_action: The guidance for recording entries in the Ballast water record book has been corrected.
preventive_action: feedback is shared with all fleet vessels

deficiency_finding: There are many places where there are no necessary supplies.
description_overview: The pilot ladder was parted and the ship side railing was damaged.
immediate_causes: Poor housekeeping.
root_cause_analysis: As per the cleaning schedule, the ship's crew didn't make round check regularly.
corrective_action: Inspector rectified the items placed at the common washrooms.
preventive_action: Supplies are in the common washrooms if you hold shipboard education to review the safety and hygiene check list.

deficiency_finding: The boiler suits were wet on the alleyway.
description_overview: The boiler suits were wet on the alleyway.
immediate_causes: The crew of the ship hung the wet boiler suits on the handrails of the main deck alleyway due to their lack of fire safety and situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of training and compliance on fire safety due to: 1 Lack of training and familiarization on fire safety requirement 2 Lack of skill and motivation on fire hazard 3 Substandard instruction and procedure to observe company fire safety procedure and industrial fire prevention practices
corrective_action: All crew members were trained on fire safety and the wet boiler suits were immediately removed.
preventive_action: 2 Master is to carry out refresher training on board during monthly safety meeting and enhance fire safety requirement, to establish safety culture on board

deficiency_finding: The fire plan will be updated.
description_overview: The stability booklet states that shearing forces that do not comply with condition are found in the last loading computer test.
immediate_causes: After a change of management failure to check the tanks in the certificate section 3.1 is what happened.
root_cause_analysis: The master did not compare the fire plan with the safety equipment certificate.
corrective_action: The data was rectified as per the ship's certificate.
preventive_action: While renewing a ship's certificate, the staff and master should check and confirm all the information.

deficiency_finding: The cover letter for thennage certificate is different from the certificate.
description_overview: There is a cover letter for the Tonnage Certificate, but it is not available on board.
immediate_causes: The endorsed certificate wasn't printed on the plane.
root_cause_analysis: There was an inadequate issue of the Tonnage certificate.
corrective_action: The cover page was removed from the Tonnage certificate.
preventive_action: The certificates issued by the class will be checked to make sure they are in line with SOLAS regulations.

deficiency_finding: There were two Fire Extinguishers that were not inspected.
description_overview: The oil record book sludge operation entries were incorrect during the PSC inspection.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection tags of the fire extinguishers were not updated because the assistant safety officer was not paying attention.
corrective_action: The two fire extinguishers had their inspection tags updated according to the recent LSA/FFE inspection recorded in the company's e-PMS.
preventive_action: The safety officer and his assistant should make sure that the tags of the equipment are amended according to the company's maintenance plan.

deficiency_finding: The sewage treatment plant is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The sewage treatment system had an inoperative pump and a low drum level.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Improper awareness by the MARPOL crew.
corrective_action: Dosing pump connection hose was replaced and chemicals were ordered to ensure adequate operation in the future.
preventive_action: To re-iterate that the vessel should only request PSC inspections when they have completed their drydocking and carried out pre sailing checks.

deficiency_finding: The Ballast Water code is other.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: Oversight.
root_cause_analysis: The water filter is out of order.
corrective_action: The system was tested and worked correctly.
preventive_action: The company already requested new filters from the maker.

deficiency_finding: The accommodation air condition was found to be insufficient.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The crew of the ship knew that the No.1 AC compressor didn't have enough gas.
corrective_action: The compressor system was filled with gas.
preventive_action: The crew is watching the leak of freon gas in the compressor system.

deficiency_finding: BWMS barrels with hazardous substances on the funnel deck are not properly stored and lashed.
description_overview: Oil pollution discharge reported by the vessel and there are apparent oil substance remaining onboard and the hull of the vessel are suspected of being a discharge violation.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Master and his crew lack of safety awareness on handling hazardous substances that can cause pollution when not properly secured and stored.
corrective_action: Transfer the drums to a store that has proper storage and lashed them.
preventive_action: Carry out education on all crew to make sure the drums with hazardous substance are locked up.

deficiency_finding: ER floor plates are loose.
description_overview: Few floor plates were not secured with screws in the engine room.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: The PSC requirements have been done.
corrective_action: The steering gear compartment is not an emergency exit according to the safety plan.
preventive_action: Engineers were told to secure floorplates even during break.

deficiency_finding: About 60 percent of the supports are in poor, corroded or damaged condition.
description_overview: About 60 percent of the supports are in poor, corroded or damaged condition.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The senior officer missed to notice that the officer did not prepare a proper maintenance plan for the supports.
corrective_action: The broken supports for 'electrical, hydraulic and/ or pneumatic' cables need to be renewed.
preventive_action: This deficiency is to be shared across all fleet vessels to make sure proper maintenance plan is prepared for electrical, pneumatic, and mechanical cable supports.

deficiency_finding: The brake lining on the anchor windlass is worn out.
description_overview: Brake lining is worn out and in poor conditions.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The brake lining was not stated to be in bad condition despite being reported to be in need of maintenance.
corrective_action: New brake linings were requested and expected to be delivered on board by 15 August in order to replace the remaining mooring winch and windlass.
preventive_action: The company's procedures for reporting of defect and non conformities were requested by the responsible officer.

deficiency_finding: There was no security drill after 7 crew members were changed.
description_overview: The drill was for Steering gear failure.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: The record-keeping of security drill compliance was negligent.
corrective_action: The actual documentation that shows the completion of the security drill was used to correct the deficiency.
preventive_action: All deficiencies will be shared with the entire fleet of vessels to prevent the occurrence of similar issues.

deficiency_finding: The starboard wilden pump isolation is broken.
description_overview: The main engine fuel oil leakage alarm was bypassed.
immediate_causes: Installation problems and vessel's inherent vibration are to blame for the hairline crack.
root_cause_analysis: The bonding wire is loose and not assembled on the starboard Wilden pump body.
corrective_action: The bonding cable connection of the Wilden pump was overlooked during the pre-arrival checks.
preventive_action: The issue will be included in the vetting memo.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency phone in the gear room.
description_overview: During the Emergency steering gear drill, the steering gear emergency phone and headphones were tested and found to be working well.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear.
corrective_action: The new headphones were tested and found to be satisfactory and the deficiency was closed.
preventive_action: The master was briefed on the importance of a thorough inspection of Emergency steering gear and all related equipment.

deficiency_finding: There are bubbles in the magnetic compass.
description_overview: There is an emergency light for the Magnetic compass.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The navigation officer failed to detect the Magnetic compass during his bridge watch.
corrective_action: The inspector verified that the deficiency was closed before disembarking from the ship.
preventive_action: All navigation equipment should be checked on arrival as per the company's prearrival check list.

deficiency_finding: There are cable pipes from the main deck that are corroded in several places.
description_overview: The Bulk Cargo Shipping Name is not specified in one of the five cargo declarations.
immediate_causes: Prior to the arrival of the vessel at this port, the latches of the hooks were improved, but the paint on them was blocking the moving mechanism.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of safety awareness among the crew.
corrective_action: The pipes should be maintained immediately.
preventive_action: The officer needs to be trained on the maintenance requirements of SOLAS.

deficiency_finding: The short term ballast water management certificate should be amended to show that D1 is the primary means of ballast water management.
description_overview: The primary means of ballast water management will be amended to the short term certificate.
immediate_causes: The primary muster station was established at the Stbd upper deck area in close proximity of the Fire control station and line with the SOLAS requirements as the muster station marked on the plans was at the Life Boat.
root_cause_analysis: Dispensation term certificate was not checked when it was issued.
corrective_action: The report was sent to flag to close the short term certificate.
preventive_action: BWTS will be functional all the time.

deficiency_finding: There are remote means of control for machinery spaces.
description_overview: Only one of two valves was closing for the individual stop of FO to ME.
immediate_causes: Equipment failure, malfunctioning, and lack of verification.
root_cause_analysis: Equipment failure, malfunctioning, and lack of verification.
corrective_action: The noticed valve has been dismantled and damaged.
preventive_action: In order to avoid reoccurrence, the present observation has been included into next end of month's alert message 'Fleet Vessels month inspections outcome & Learn from reflecting on experience' to share with Fleet Vessels and Shore Office personnel.

deficiency_finding: Several hatch entrance covers have defects.
description_overview: Life buoy with self-igniting light and lifeline was supposed to post near the shore gangway in order to use in an emergency, however, it did not post on scene.
immediate_causes: The fuel injection pump drain was found in place at the time of the last inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance and supervision are improper.
corrective_action: The deficiency was fixed prior to departure by the C/O and deck personnel.
preventive_action: The discussion of present deficiency was done during the extra safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The Weather fax antenna Earth cable was torn and damaged.
description_overview: The 220V system has an earth fault.
immediate_causes: There are bad tools/ equipment.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge was not able to check the system because of the bad weather.
corrective_action: The damage ground wire was fixed by the ship's electrician.
preventive_action: The bridge deck has an antenna that needs to be checked before it arrives at the port.

deficiency_finding: Emergency generator couldn't take power.
description_overview: Emergency generator couldn't take power.
immediate_causes: The ESB AC115V feeder low insulation alarm was activated by the defective lamp sockets.
root_cause_analysis: Emergency d/g failed to take emergency power at automatic operation mode during the test.
corrective_action: The company was informed about the fault with the defect report.
preventive_action: The Master and Chief Engineer briefed all officers on routine control and checks of critical equipment.

deficiency_finding: There is a boiler alarm.
description_overview: The Boiler Low level alarm was malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The Boiler alarm float unit was renewed.
preventive_action: The importance of compliance with watchkeeping routines was emphasized in the report.

deficiency_finding: There are bubbles in the magnetic compass.
description_overview: There is an emergency light for the Magnetic compass.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The navigation officer failed to detect the Magnetic compass during his bridge watch.
corrective_action: The inspector verified that the deficiency was closed before disembarking from the ship.
preventive_action: All navigation equipment should be checked on arrival as per the company's prearrival check list.

deficiency_finding: The last change over procedure did not record the volume of low sulphur fuel oils.
description_overview: The company's Safety Management System provides detailed guidelines on the fuel change over procedures and appropriate entry is made in the company logbook TEC 31 - Fuel Oil & Ozone Depleting Substances Record Book, prior entry to ECA, CARB or EU Area.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with industry rules.
root_cause_analysis: The ROB of low sulphur fuel oil was recorded in the TEC 31, but the record was not shown to the PSCO.
corrective_action: At the time of inspection, the PSCO verified the entries made in the engine logbook and commented that low sulphur fuel oil quantity was not recorded.
preventive_action: The human elements were briefed on the importance of having a clear and concise communication with any 3rd party to avoid such lapse in near future.

deficiency_finding: There are chemicals that are not available on board.
description_overview: There was a shortage of PSC PPE in the S/G room.
immediate_causes: The store at fore peak has some lamps that burn-out.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector did not receive the MSDS immediately.
corrective_action: The master improves the file organization.
preventive_action: At their regular ship visits, management make sure that documents are filed according to category and date.

deficiency_finding: Three portable two-way VHF radiotelephones were not provided with wrist or next strap.
description_overview: There are straps not arranged on the liferaft port side.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: After the inspection, it was found that the straps had been removed in order to be cleaned but had been lost.
corrective_action: The Master immediately ordered three (3) new neck spare straps with a suitable weak link in compliance with the requirements set in the resolution and the photos of the missing straps were forwarded to the PSCO who verified that the deficiency had been corrected.
preventive_action: The Company will consider revising the relevant form to include clear instructions on the inspection of the wrist of neck strap during the next revision of the Safety Operation Manual.

deficiency_finding: The Collective Bargaining Agreement expired at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The interim certificate expired on January 14, 2023.
immediate_causes: Lack of distribution of standard.
root_cause_analysis: The previous Master didn't check the relevant certificate prior to arrival and didn't find the CBA on board.
corrective_action: Master showed the expired ones to the PSCO and put the valid one into the file.
preventive_action: Enhance the training of SMI-S-J16 (The Stipulations on External Inspection), SMI-S-L02 (The Stipulations for Management of Ship Files), and the Maritime Labor Management Handbook.

deficiency_finding: There are teflon plugs on the deck of the ballast tanks.
description_overview: Section 3 includes cargo handling procedures and documents.
immediate_causes: There was a small leak from the port side forward manifolds during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: For the sake of preservation from being stolen, ship staff deliberately applied the teflon plugs instead of copper plugs without having due regard to the risk of damaged teflon plugs which may compromise the watertight integrity of the ship in adverse weather.
corrective_action: The original copper plugs were put in the deck locker after the inspection.
preventive_action: The sounding pipes and tank covers need to be kept in good working order for compliance with the regulations.

deficiency_finding: Cargo hold No.2 and No.4 are not able to close weathertight.
description_overview: Cargo hold No.2 and No.4 are not able to close weathertight.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
