root_cause_analysis: There are Incorrect/insufficient tools, equipment or materials.
corrective_action: Prior to the ship's departure from the port, rectification action was provided to PSCO and deficiency was closed.
preventive_action: In order to ensure that effective shipboard inspections shall be conducted at all times, Master conducted an additional safety meeting and discussed the deficiency's nature with all officers and crew members.

deficiency_finding: Placards.
description_overview: Some placards on waste boxes are missing.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Lack of assessment of needs and risks.
corrective_action: The particular subject is rectified.
preventive_action: Discussed in the meeting with the crew how to prevent the systematic recurrence.

deficiency_finding: The entrance hatch of cargo hold 4 is not closing.
description_overview: The chief engineer and 3rd engineer joined VESSEL at the same time, but they didn't get their email addresses in time.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of two man verification check.
root_cause_analysis: insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: It is now properly closing.
preventive_action: To follow company maintenance plan procedures.

deficiency_finding: Load Master wasn't an annual test conducted by the Class.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: The Master and C/O didn't know how to enter the Garbage Log.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector did not see the annual test result.
corrective_action: To find the test result retained on board, the company immediately asked the Class for the annual test result.
preventive_action: There was a missing test result and a show to the inspector.

deficiency_finding: There is a water tight door at the side entrance.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: Clarifications and instructions were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The alarm panel was checked and the obstruction was removed because it was an improper attempt to save time.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness and prevent recurrence, the deficiency will be distributed to the entire fleet.

deficiency_finding: Access the Booby hatch on the deck.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: The closing device was seized because it was rusty and couldn't close the Boody hatch covers.
corrective_action: The booby hatch covers were closed after the Deck Crew dismantled the closing device.
preventive_action: The Technical Supremo instructed the crew to carry out good maintenance and make sure the booby hatch covers are closed properly.

deficiency_finding: The national flag is no longer flying.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: The limit switch was stuck by frozen grease when the Rescue Boat was tested in the monthly drill.
root_cause_analysis: Unsafe acts include inattention, lack of familiarity, and awareness.
corrective_action: The national flag will be changed.
preventive_action: The nation flag has been changed.

deficiency_finding: There are no safety covers on the Port and Starboard Lifeboat's cable outlet sockets.
description_overview: There were no safety covers on Port and Starboard Lifeboat's cable outlet sockets.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The vessel fabricated a cover for the male end.
preventive_action: The male end of the charging cable will be fitted with additional covers.

deficiency_finding: There is a malfunctioning public ADDRESS system.
description_overview: To be fixed before departure.
immediate_causes: The vessel produced a valid letter during PSC and reports before the inspection from the shore service firm indicating that spare parts are not available yet from the maker.

preventive_action: The same were supplied at the next port of call, but they weren't available at that time.

deficiency_finding: The engine control room has a steering gear alarm Panel.

preventive_action: The Lamp/BZ test button on the associated machinery is in good working order and will be attached as evidence.

deficiency_finding: The current convention requires that the condition of the ship and its equipment be maintained.

deficiency_finding: The new name of the ship does not mean that the exemption certificate has an expired date.
description_overview: The ship name port of registry was found faded due to long period on the sea without specific maintenance.
immediate_causes: The chart desk has a non-watch keeping position and one of the reset buttons is located in it.
root_cause_analysis: During the change of the ship's name and management, the flag exemption certificate was not amended with the new ship's name and official numbers were the same.
corrective_action: The new exemption certificate was issued by Flag on July 31, 2023 with the new ship's name.
preventive_action: Before taking the vessel into the management more information about the ship's certificates should be requested from the vessel's manager.

deficiency_finding: There are steel pipes in the Engine room 2nd deck.
description_overview: A voyage or passage plan.
immediate_causes: After a change of management failure to check the tanks in the certificate section 3.1 is what happened.
root_cause_analysis: Steel pipes are secured to avoid shifting during rolling, but this time they were not secured back by rope after pulling out some materials.
corrective_action: The pieps were secured by rope and confirmed by PSC officers before they disembarked.
preventive_action: The securing condition of objects is included in the Internal Audit Cehcklist.

deficiency_finding: The General Service pumps 1 and 2 are missing.
description_overview: The last routine test of the fire and general service pump was done at the St. Eustatius anchorage.
immediate_causes: Clarifying to the inspector was offered.
root_cause_analysis: At the time of the inspection, the General Service pumps 1 & 2 were not in position.
corrective_action: The new units were quickly installed and tested after the Port State Control Inspection.
preventive_action: The meeting was organised after the inspection to discuss maintenance needs for the safety system.

deficiency_finding: The crew couldn't demonstrate high pressure leak test, low pressure alarm test and mask seal test.
description_overview: Poor crew performance during fire drill is related to poor maintenance and lack of central centre of command.
immediate_causes: The unit was inspected and repaired.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient training.
corrective_action: The importance of proper usage of vessel's FFE/LSA equipment was discussed and analyzed.
preventive_action: The PSC Inspection report and lessons learned have been included in the agenda of the monthly scheduled Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: The cargo hold on S/S is missing.
description_overview: The deficiency was closed by the PSC Inspector.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: During discharging operation crew found the opportunity to perform a maintenance job on the hatch covers cleats.
corrective_action: The cleat was put back in position.
preventive_action: Information sharing and awareness was part of the deficiency that was communicated to the fleet.

deficiency_finding: The inventory for fire detonation system is not correct.
description_overview: There is a lack of familiarity with the system.
immediate_causes: There were different locations for fire nozzles.
root_cause_analysis: The locations of the fire detectors are not verified against the fire alarm panel during a routine test.
corrective_action: The master is responsible for all the sensors that have been checked and verified with actual numbers as per the alarm panel screen.
preventive_action: All ships in the fleet have been told to check the zone number of the fire sensor to make sure it matches the zone number on the fire detection panel.

deficiency_finding: The sewage treatment plant has no sludge return.
description_overview: The MSDS for Monoethylene glycol was not available when PSCO inspected it.
immediate_causes: There was no flow of sludge observed due to malfunctioning of solenoid valve which allows air for sludge to return in both "auto" and "manual" mode Immediate Cause - Substandard Conditions
root_cause_analysis: Lack of situational awareness / risk perception / risk awareness system had been tested during Pre AMSA Inspection in presence of AMSPEC Surveyor and system found in good working order.
corrective_action: In both "AUTO" and "manual" mode, thefective solenoid valve was replaced with a spare one.
preventive_action: Duty engineer to check the function of the valve on a daily basis.

deficiency_finding: There is a public toilet that is not operational.
description_overview: There are sanitary facilities.
immediate_causes: The public toilet on A Deck was not tested and was not found to have a defect by the weekly inspection by TOP 4.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance with strict weekly inspection due to:
corrective_action: The public toilet on A Deck was immediately repaired and tested in good working order.
preventive_action: Crew members are to be trained and motivated on basic MLC requirements.

deficiency_finding: Fire safety/ventilation appliance on B deck is unable to close during test.

immediate_causes: Direct is Tear and Wear.
root_cause_analysis: The closing appliance is unable to close due to lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: The closing appliance is checked and maintained.
preventive_action: Maintenance and Frequency check must be done correctly.

deficiency_finding: The window glass on the bridge is cracked.
description_overview: From the main steering position, the horizontal field of vision will extend from right to left on each side of the ship.
immediate_causes: There were 6 pieces of pipe support that were corrosive and 3 that werecracked due to insufficient maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The material failed.
corrective_action: A new window was ordered from China and installed in the next port.
preventive_action: There is no preventive action since the window cracked.

deficiency_finding: An emergency escape was found without the required rope and harness in the engine room.
description_overview: The oil record book sludge operation entries were incorrect during the PSC inspection.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was a human mistake that led to the temporary removal of the rope and harness.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed when the rope and harness were put back.
preventive_action: Due to the dangerous environment in engine room, it is extremely important to keep the equipment in good order.

deficiency_finding: The record must be filled with item 1.2 "not fit" and item 1.3 "fitted".

immediate_causes: There are rules and regulations.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence that the flag state was informed or that an exemption letter was seen.

deficiency_finding: Master instructed to follow up the convention regulation after the operation in port Gdynia without BWMS.

deficiency_finding: There is a small oil leak from M.E.

corrective_action: The pipe was replaced on the spot.
preventive_action: Thorough inspections will be carried out by engine officers and crew in order to avoid similar leaks.

deficiency_finding: OS V.A.T is in charge of launching PS liferaft but doesn't have a certificate of competence on survival craft and rescue boat.

preventive_action: All the deficiencies imposed during external/ internal inspections root cause analysis and corrective actions taken are Circulated fleet-wise, in order to be discussed during the next monthly Safety Committee Meeting for better knowledge and in order to prevent recurrence.

deficiency_finding: It was found that the PA system wasn't working properly.

immediate_causes: The speaker got damaged because of rain water and the cable connection didn't work properly.
root_cause_analysis: Monthly/weekly checks are not done because of lack of supervision.
corrective_action: The damaged speaker was replaced and the cable connection was checked.
preventive_action: The crew has been trained to check the PA system at regular intervals.

deficiency_finding: The oil record book part I shall be completed on each occasion, on a tank-to-tank basis if appropriate.

corrective_action: After the vessel's departure, C/E will be temporarily replaced, with pay, and immediately assigned to formal training for the proper and consistent maintenance of the Oil Record Book, before returning to active duty.
preventive_action: Information about the case, several Technical letters and Bulletins for review and discussion, in regards to proper operation of OWS and entries on Oil Record Book are included.

deficiency_finding: The Port bridge wing revolution counter shows ahead movement.

corrective_action: It is not possible to calibrate the port wing revolution counter until the difference between main engine and wing revolution counter is zero.
preventive_action: The officers have been warned to be more careful.

deficiency_finding: The clearance on the main deck is excessive.

preventive_action: A training session was conducted by the Master to Deck Officers and Electrician to discuss company's compliance with monitoring and maintenance of navigation equipment.

deficiency_finding: The fixed gas detection cabinet needs to be repaired prior to the cargo discharge operation.

preventive_action: An unsafe condition was raised in the safety management system.

deficiency_finding: The safety management system should include procedures to ensure that accidents and hazardous situations are reported to the company investigated and analysed to improve safety and pollution prevention.
description_overview: The Emergency efficiency certificate was issued to the vessel at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: There was a small leak in the fresh water pipe line, and the engine department used a soft patch to block it.
corrective_action: An additional training was given to C/E.
preventive_action: C/E was given a training on how to report the temporary repair issue.

deficiency_finding: There is an inventory of rescue boats.
description_overview: At the point of inspection, the search light in the rescue boat was not working.
immediate_causes: Insufficient servicing of equipment in operation is a standard act.
root_cause_analysis: There are job factors, system factors, and inadequate assessment of preventive maintenance needs.
corrective_action: An additional set of batteries was included in the rescue boat inventory.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be included in the compliance check list.

deficiency_finding: The HAMMER FOR PORT ANCHOR CHAITTER END is not available in the store.
description_overview: The deck crew put it back with the general tools because they didn't know it was a hammer for bitter ends.
immediate_causes: The deck crew didn't know that it was a hammer for bitter ends and that emergency tools should not be used for general work.
root_cause_analysis: The deck crew didn't know that it was a hammer for bitter ends and that emergency tools should not be used for general work.
corrective_action: The hammer was moved back to its original position.
preventive_action: To apply for the provision of tools to the company if similar tools are needed for normal work, and to educate the crew not to use emergency tools for normal work.

deficiency_finding: The engine room is being used in machinery mode.
description_overview: After the maintenance is completed, the system is restored to its original state by the ship staff.
immediate_causes: The problem with the air conditioning system was caused by the failure of the compressor on the night before the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: The alarm system was set to normal operation in the presence of the PSCO after the ship staff removed the alarm offset.
preventive_action: The concerned head of the department was instructed by the Supremo to ensure that the alarm systems are set to normal after any maintenance work is done.

deficiency_finding: The minimum safe manning doc specified Manning, but the MSMD does not include the required cook.

immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel fail to check which result in this deficiency was caused by the pre-arrival PSC preparation email.
corrective_action: After completing the application form, the vessel must send the new certificate to MI.
preventive_action: To make sure the date and content are correct, the vessel must check all the certificates to make sure.

deficiency_finding: The WBTS panel has a Degas Space Level Low Alarm on it.

immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: Dispensation letter from Flag State is to be provided before departure.

root_cause_analysis: As the vessel arrived with a deffective EUT unit on the Ballast Water management System, the PSC Inspector showed the short term BWM Certificate issued by Class.
corrective_action: The Master reached out to the Technical Manager and the Department at the office.
preventive_action: The Master must be able to communicate the information to any PSC Inspector who does not know the Norwegian flag exemption.

deficiency_finding: The emergency switchboard bus tie circuit breaker is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The close button push handle broke during the inspection.
immediate_causes: The handle lever of the fish room has been tested.
root_cause_analysis: The damaged push handle was replaced with a spare ACB.
corrective_action: It will be discussed during the next safety meeting.
preventive_action: It will be discussed during the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The Cargo Hold No 4 hatch coaming plate stiffener is cracked.
description_overview: There are four small hatch covers on the main deck.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The hatch cover no4 port side had a crack on the hatch coaming stiffener.
corrective_action: The damage did not affect the structural integrity and watertightness of the vessel, since the crack is limited to the support stiffener on the railway, and therefore accepted by the managers.
preventive_action: The Master is instructed to ensure that a thorough examination is carried out when the vessel faces severe weather conditions.

deficiency_finding: There is a copy of the certificate not posted.
description_overview: It was MLC 2006
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew failed to post the MLC certificate.
corrective_action: The copy was posted on the spot.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels are given the deficiency along with our comments.

deficiency_finding: Escape Breathing Devices are used during the fire drills.
description_overview: The reference was made toWARD the SCBA in use during the drill.
immediate_causes: During control testing, the navigation lights were found to be in good order.
root_cause_analysis: After the drill, the SCBA kit was taken by the crew member and the time of handling was not complete.
corrective_action: The scalpel was held without scalpels and was TIGHTENED by hand.
preventive_action: A safety meeting was held with all the firefighters.

deficiency_finding: The SOLAS training manual is not ship specific.
description_overview: The angle indicator on the bridge is partially unreadable.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The SOLAS training manual has been updated by crossing out equipment and operating instructions that do not apply to this vessel.
corrective_action: The SOLAS training manual can't be removed due to double-sided printing, however, it has been covered with blank paper and labeled with the word "deleted" as per the inspector's request.
preventive_action: The master told the officers and crew members that the SOLAS training manual should be easy to read and consistent with the vessel.

deficiency_finding: There is a cargo operation.

immediate_causes: Several manholes were not secured.
root_cause_analysis: Due to security mode/restrictions failure to follow proper procedures, the ship/Shore safety check list was not implemented from the vessel side.
corrective_action: The agent was told to call the terminal representative to sign the VO-01 "Ship/Shore Safety Checklist" and the terminal form.
preventive_action: The importance of an effective opening key meeting will be highlighted, along with the vigilance needed during loading and operation.

deficiency_finding: There is a battery warning lamp found with low amber.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: The battery was replaced during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: When inspected, the battery signaling lamp did not operate due to discharge from the battery.
corrective_action: During the PSC inspection, the battery was replaced with spare.
preventive_action: Before and after use, make sure the battery is fully charged.

deficiency_finding: There was only one gas detector.
description_overview: The SOLAS Ch XI-1, Rg 7 Atmosphere testing instrument for enclosed spaces does not have a gas detector onboard.
immediate_causes: This port or next port will be supplied with a portable gas meter with built in pump.
root_cause_analysis: There is one more gas detector applied and supplied to meet the regulation.
corrective_action: A portable atmosphere testing instrument or instruments should be carried on the ship.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Some deck patching isn't maintenance free.
description_overview: There is sight glass provided to observe the opening and closing of the automatic.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: One of the nozzles in the room failed to spray water.

immediate_causes: The smoke detector couldn't be tested in the presence of the PSCO.
root_cause_analysis: There is a small hole in the nozzle stock.
corrective_action: The nozzles were cleaned and tested by the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: The system should be cleaned after each test.

deficiency_finding: There was no eye wash in the locker.
description_overview: The eye wash kit was not returned after the paint room was cleaned last week.
immediate_causes: The lack of supervision by officers is one of the reasons for the inadequate awareness of crew.
root_cause_analysis: There was no eye wash in the locker.
corrective_action: There is a new eye wash bottle in the battery locker.
preventive_action: Every battery room inspection should include eye wash and chemical gloves.

deficiency_finding: Bitts wrongly used as guide-roller are dangerous mooring arrangemnet.
description_overview: Mooring-ropes are not used for bollards.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: According to the company's procedures, the mooring line should not be wrapped around the drum, and the P.I.Cs were not familiar with how to use the f'cle and poop winches to ensure crew safety and prevent equipment accidents.
corrective_action: The mooring line on the warping drum and the mooring line on the bitts were moved immediately.
preventive_action: The mooring line is secured to the bollard.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire plans mark on the port side main deck.
description_overview: The inspector demanded to check the sample from the discharge pump after he was informed about the status of the overboard valve.
immediate_causes: The incorrect symbol was used on one side.
root_cause_analysis: The importance of the symbol was neglected by the safety officer.
corrective_action: The spare IMO symbol was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: The safety officer should inspect all IMo symbols in accordance with the standard.

deficiency_finding: There is a plastic container in the ER.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow R&R, fire hazard, and inadequate supervision were identified in the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: The metal drums were secured in the ER and were transferred from the plastic container.
preventive_action: An audiovisual training material was used to teach the engine crew about proper lubrication in their engines, as well as fire prevention in the ER.

deficiency_finding: There is no Em'cy lighting at the NO.2 INMARSAT-C station.
description_overview: There is ready availability of fire-fighting equipment.
immediate_causes: During the last rescue boat drill on 19th May 2023, the wire rope for the pin of the rescue boat hook got detached from the hook while trying out.
root_cause_analysis: The instructions of operation of the navigation equipment on the bridge were not fully understood by the personnel in charge.
corrective_action: The instructions of operation of the navigation equipment on the bridge were given to the personnel in charge.
preventive_action: Instructions of operation of the navigation equipment on the bridge.

deficiency_finding: The boiler room has a fire alarm panel.
description_overview: The engine control room has a fire detection system panel.
immediate_causes: The vessel can use the scrubber in either closed loop or open loop depending on the port requirements.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection was inadequate.
corrective_action: The engine room will be manned until the flame detector is replaced.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineers of all fleet vessels will be requested to ensure the good operation of the fire detection system and the availability of spare parts.

deficiency_finding: During the last cabin/galley inspections, several serious deficiencies were noted.
description_overview: There were no safety covers on Port and Starboard Lifeboat's cable outlet sockets.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: No reports and orders to the company were sent due to crew negligent accommodation inspection.
corrective_action: The crew worked as per the checklist to eliminate deficiencies.
preventive_action: Crew was told to pay attention to the galley and accommodations.

deficiency_finding: The strg gear room does not have a master gyro compass.
description_overview: A gyro compass.
immediate_causes: There was a two-degree difference between the main gyro and the repeater in the steering gear room.
root_cause_analysis: The crew had become too focused on the task and failed to complete it adequately.
corrective_action: The crew immediately synchronised the repeater with the master gyro. All gyro repeaters were checked against the master gyro reading, and all were in order.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer and the Master have been briefed by the Technical Supremo on the importance of performing the routines diligently.

deficiency_finding: The forepeak tank main alarm wires are disconnected because of the water ingress detection system.
description_overview: The schedule provides adequate instructions to the ships staff for detailed inspection of water ingress alarm system on board at periodic intervals.
immediate_causes: Human Factors are not applicable.
root_cause_analysis: The crew checked all wires because of the alarm from the water detection system.
corrective_action: The wires of the detection system were tightened correctly.
preventive_action: To be included in the monthly safety meetings.

deficiency_finding: Sewage leake before the valve on the portside.
description_overview: When the vent flap is not engaged in the rod, the water will cause it to detach.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow the procedures of the company.
root_cause_analysis: It is necessary to tear and wear piping.
corrective_action: Confirmation with onboard materials was sent to AMSA.
preventive_action: The condition of the piping was determined from our investigation.

deficiency_finding: The manual does not specify, a fire during loading and discharging of cargo and while underway, the use of techniques and procedures for different chemical cargo.
description_overview: The INMARSAT-C date role has been replaced due to old software.
immediate_causes: The manufacturer's operation manual did not provide ship specific alarm setting values for each sensor, but just provided generic alarm setting values without the location of each sensor.
root_cause_analysis: The Fire safety operational booklet and Fire safety manual are provided to the vessel in line with SOLAS requirements.
corrective_action: The concerned sections have been updated.
preventive_action: The observation has been discussed with all concerned in order to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: The engine room damper was seized.
description_overview: The inspector's comment was acknowledged.
immediate_causes: The quick release of forward life raft was difficult to open due to the improper installation of accompanying shackle that was used for securing in place.
root_cause_analysis: During Class annuals and prior to Port Hedland, the damper was found to be moving eccentrically at the connection between the lever and the shaft.
corrective_action: The Mushroom vent has been completely rebuilt and the shafts on both sides have been renewed.
preventive_action: A weekly routine of trying out and checks of ER blowers and flaps is included in the planned maintenance system.

deficiency_finding: The fire pipe and air pipes from E/R to the fire station are not covered by the insulation materials.
description_overview: A number of seafarers monthly overtime and payment have not been assessed by the person in charge.
immediate_causes: The third mate was not aware of the special requirements of the Nav logbook regrading drill record.
root_cause_analysis: The air pipes and water pipes from Engine Room to Fire Room were not covered with insulation material.
corrective_action: The air pipes and water pipes from Engine Room to Fire Sation were covered with insulation material to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The issue was addressed to the Classification Society for further clarification.

deficiency_finding: Installation of the radio is not required.
description_overview: Disregard deficiency before departure.
immediate_causes: The lifeboat engine was not started.
root_cause_analysis: The date of the message display error was caused by the loss of the gps signal at the port area.
corrective_action: After checking the gps signal, I manually updated the time until the gps signal came back to normal.
preventive_action: The shore-based superintendent has urged the master to strengthen the daily training of officers, followed by regular spot checks on the officer's operation of various equipment.

deficiency_finding: The rotator is damaged due to the energy top sheave.
description_overview: There is no power in the bottle that is used to operate the rescue boat crane.
immediate_causes: During cargo operation, StevedORES OPERATE THE SHIP CRANE.
root_cause_analysis: The cable winch on the upper part of the crane was damaged when it fell under the cargo window.
corrective_action: The survey was conducted at Portocel, Brazil on 2nd Oct.
preventive_action: The report was sent to the fleet vessel via e-POS.

deficiency_finding: The mooring ropes were damaged.
description_overview: The engine control room has a 220V feeder panel.
immediate_causes: English and Chinese are not accepted as working languages by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not find the damage to the ropes.
corrective_action: The management company was immediately reported to arrange mooring ropes.
preventive_action: The crew's performance and supervision onboard can be improved by enhancing training and guidance onboard.

deficiency_finding: The oil record book is not required.
description_overview: Bunker operations records did not have records on type of fuel or total quantity received.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer did not record the quantity of fuel received and the type of fuel in the Oil Record book.
corrective_action: Chief Engineer immediately recorded the type of fuel and total quantity received.
preventive_action: The new company's circular is titled "Recording of operations in the Oil Record Book Part I." The new company's circular is titled "Recording of operations in the Oil Record Book Part I." The new company's circular is titled "Recording of operations in the Oil Record Book Part

deficiency_finding: After treatment, sewage water is collected through the pipe to the peak tank which is not marked on the cert.
description_overview: After treatment, sewage water is collected through the pipe to the peak tank which is not marked on the cert.
immediate_causes: The valve that goes to the sewage treatment unit is not rotating.
root_cause_analysis: There are issues with the sewage holding tank in the sewage treatment system.
corrective_action: In response to the identified non-compliance issue, the master suspended the collection of sewage for about 12 hours until sailing, effectively managing 15 metric tons of water.
preventive_action: In order to prevent the recurrence of the same in the future and to improve the safety standard, all deficiencies will be shared with the whole fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: Loadline marks and freeboard marks.
description_overview: The draft marks are rusty.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The draft marks deteriorated during the last voyages due to the adverse weather conditions and the waves.
corrective_action: At the first convenient port, Fujairah anchorage, maintenance was carried out on Plimsol and draft marks.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be discussed during the on-board safety committee meeting with the participation of the officers and crew.

deficiency_finding: There is a plastic cap on the fire detector in the engine room.
description_overview: The fire plan is not up to date.
immediate_causes: Cyl.oil has a measuring tank level gauge.
root_cause_analysis: People are related.
corrective_action: The fire detector cap was removed during the inspection.
preventive_action: The last check done by the electrician was on October 22nd, and the last check done by the fitter was on October 27th.

deficiency_finding: Most of the cargo holds hatch covers are missing or damaged.
description_overview: There are four small hatch covers on the main deck.
immediate_causes: The repaired hatch cover packing needed to be replaced with a minimum length of packing.
root_cause_analysis: The senior officer did not verify the job done on hatch cover packing.
corrective_action: Training for proper maintenance of hatch covers and packing is required of all ship staff.
preventive_action: It will be shared with the fleet.

deficiency_finding: At the port side, the middle draft mark and the Plimsoll mark are not fully painted.
description_overview: The vessel was taken over by technical management.
immediate_causes: The agent didn't report to the PSC office because he didn't receive the letter from the flag.
root_cause_analysis: At the time of inspection, the hull coating and hull marking was new and readable.
corrective_action: If all safety requirements are met, the draft will be re-painted on the 3rd of May at Balboa anchorage.
preventive_action: The check of the load lines marks is part of the 6 monthly routine inspection of the hull.

deficiency_finding: Vegetables in the freezer room were rotten.
description_overview: Vegetables in the freezer room were rotten.
immediate_causes: There is a risk of crew health if rotten fruit is found in the vegetable room.
root_cause_analysis: The chief cook did not inspect the vegetables in the chamber.
corrective_action: The chief cook cleaned the vegetable store room.
preventive_action: Trainings were given to the crew by the master.

deficiency_finding: The application for endorsement was expired on 26.06.2022.
description_overview: The abandon ship drill and fire drill were not recorded in the log book.
immediate_causes: The eye wash and emergency shower on both sides have been tested and found satisfactory.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the vessel's trade, it was not possible to connect the original CoC prior to the expired CRA.
corrective_action: The flag state circular was accepted by PSCO and the original endorsement of the certificate has been received.
preventive_action: A review of the internal processes and procedures has shown full compliance with Flag rules and requirements and therefore there are no changes that need to be made with respect to the processes / procedures followed in this instance.

deficiency_finding: Garbage shipboard handling is not required.
description_overview: Master requested to dispose Ashore all garbage before departure if next port is not specified.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The garbage was on the beach before the vessel left Gdynia.
preventive_action: The chief officer should ensure that Garbage Management plan is followed and managers should be informed prior arrival port for garbage disposal in case of insufficient storage area.

deficiency_finding: There are tube lights in the steering gear room.
description_overview: Some tube lights in the steering gear room were found to be deficient.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The PSC Inspector deficiency was identified by the responsible officers before the inspection and replacement of tube lights in the steering gear room was scheduled, but was delayed due to other issues onboard.
corrective_action: The tube lights that were faulty were replaced with new.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company took the following measures.

deficiency_finding: BWMS barrels with hazardous substances on the funnel deck are not properly stored and lashed.
description_overview: Oil pollution discharge reported by the vessel and there are apparent oil substance remaining onboard and the hull of the vessel are suspected of being a discharge violation.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Master and his crew lack of safety awareness on handling hazardous substances that can cause pollution when not properly secured and stored.
corrective_action: Transfer the drums to a store that has proper storage and lashed them.
preventive_action: Carry out education on all crew to make sure the drums with hazardous substance are locked up.

deficiency_finding: There is a quick closing valve near the emergency diesel generator.
description_overview: There are other DEFICIENCIES.
immediate_causes: A malfunction in the antenna unit caused the system to stop working.
root_cause_analysis: There was inadequate supervision and improper inspection.
corrective_action: The quick closing near the door of the emergency diesel generator was posted by the vessel.
preventive_action: The senior management of the vessel was briefed by the office to be more cautious when inspecting their work areas.

deficiency_finding: The glass on the port bow window is broken.
description_overview: Oil gas can not be kept tight by the bridge doors.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The window on the port side of the bridge needs to be replaced.
corrective_action: A new window was delivered on the ship at the next port of call after the broken window was replaced.
preventive_action: An additional lookout was posted on the bridge when the vessel was navigating in estuary or congested waters.

deficiency_finding: The table of shipboard working arrangement is not correct.
description_overview: The table of shipboard working arrangement poster does not reflect the actual work and rest schedule of engine room personnel.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The times in the shipboard working arrangement are not in line with the actual working hours form.
corrective_action: It needs to be prepared in accordance with the hours of the company.
preventive_action: The master has been instructed to assign able seafarer watch and work schedule.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire detector alarm in the engine room.

immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There is excessive wear and tear.
corrective_action: The malfunction of the fire detector alarm was reported to the flag and class.
preventive_action: As part of knowledge sharing and continued compliance, the observation will be shared fleet wide.

deficiency_finding: The A-Class Fire Door has a hold back hook.
description_overview: The hold back hook at the stairway A-Class Fire Door was observed by the PSC officer during the inspection.
immediate_causes: Fruits and vegetables are not available on the ship.
root_cause_analysis: SOLAS regulation Chapter II - 2 Reg. 9 Sec. 2.3.4 'Protection of Stairway in Accommodation Spaces' states that shipboard non-compliance with company procedure and SOLAS regulation Chapter II - 2 Reg. 9 Sec.
corrective_action: The staff immediately removed the hold back hook from the identified stairway after the inspector pointed it out.
preventive_action: The crew was educated about the purpose of the A- Class Fire Door and the strict monitoring by the safety officer.

deficiency_finding: There is evidence that the members of the engine department don't know how to operate an oil separator.
description_overview: The engine crew was not able to demonstrate alarm quickly when using the oily water separator.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions is one of the reasons for inadequate knowledge update training.
root_cause_analysis: All crew must be familiar with ship's machinery/ equipment in order for the engine team to be known as OWS.
corrective_action: The engineer officers and crew have been told to be familiar with the procedures of the oil separator.
preventive_action: To demonstrate in rest fleet for awareness and further actions, the said remarks will be included on monthly distance checking.

deficiency_finding: The volume of low sulphur fuel oils in each tank as well as the date, time and position of the ship when the fuel oil changeover operation is completed prior to the entry into an emission control area missing was instructed to be in compliance by the master.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with industry rules.

deficiency_finding: The batteries of the waterproof torch light expired in March and April of 2020.

preventive_action: The waterproof torch light on board of m/v ENEIDA has new batteries installed.

deficiency_finding: There is no return liquid in the backflow pipe of the sewage treatment plant during the inspection.
description_overview: Failure to follow instructions.
immediate_causes: To ensure that the system is operational, a through inspection of the plant was conducted to identify the cause of the malfunction.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of awareness of the importance of regular maintenance.
corrective_action: After PSC left the vessel, the Plant System and pipes were cleaned.
preventive_action: Following the inspection of the sewage treatment plant, the vessel manager instructed the PIC to make sure that all system components are functioning well.

deficiency_finding: There were instances of violation of requirements for minimum hours of rest during the months of January and February.
description_overview: Identified and recorded broken rules were related to Master's and Chief Engineer's extra occupation during vessel's pilotage.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency was caused by a type error at the time of completion.
corrective_action: The training for the officers who are responsible for the completion of the work and rest hours was carried out by the Marine Supremo.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer and the 2nd Engineer were warned about the proper implementation of the working arrangement.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, some recipients did not mark properly.

deficiency_finding: PIPELINE is changing.
description_overview: The water leak was caused by the worn-out gasket.
immediate_causes: The inspector demanded that a special wording for 'boiler fuel changeover during sailing' be included in the procedures, despite the fact that we were having ship specific change over procedure for all fleet.
root_cause_analysis: There was a malfunction of the boiler feed and sludge pump in the engine room.
corrective_action: After the pressure gauge was replaced with new spare units, testing confirmed their satisfactory performance.
preventive_action: A Fleet Alert has been drafted and distributed to all fleet vessels, addressing the issue and directing vessels to conduct the specified checks.

deficiency_finding: The approved method of sludge disposal was not used by the vessel.
description_overview: The maximum capacity of the stuffing box drain tank was different from the IOPP certificate supplement.
immediate_causes: Lack of training.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer failed to follow the current supplement to the IOPP certificate requirements.
corrective_action: The method of sludge disposal that was not approved was stopped until the new IOPP certificate arrived.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer was talking to the Energy and Environmental Management Supremo.

deficiency_finding: The crew doesn't know how to operate the engine room CO2 release system.
description_overview: A monthly training on the CO2 release procedure into engine room operation of the equipment is also carried out along with the drills.
immediate_causes: The crew was not familiar with the operation of the fixed CO2 firefighting system.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was overwhelmed by the PSCO's presence and were unable to demonstrate their familiarity with the CO2 system's operation mechanism.
corrective_action: The crew was briefed by the C/E on how to operate CO2 fixed firefighting systems.
preventive_action: He also carried out detailed training on operating the fixed CO2 firefighting system.

deficiency_finding: The reflective tape is not required.
description_overview: The crew cabins are outworn.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: During the vessel's maintenance, some of the reflective tapes faded, but it wasn't fixed by the time of the inspection.
corrective_action: The PSC Officer mentioned that reflective tapes were replaced with new on board and that the deficiency was closed.
preventive_action: Instructions were given to all vessels to discuss the observation during the next Safety Meeting with the participation of all officers and ratings.

deficiency_finding: There is a condition evaluation report in the ESP file.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: The Master and C/O didn't know how to enter the Garbage Log.
root_cause_analysis: Master wasn't able to show a condition evaluation report on time.
corrective_action: After the completion of the PSC inspection, the condition evaluation report was shown to PSCO.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness to crew and prevent reoccurrence of the similar nature, deficiencies will be sent to all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence for training about recovery people from water.

immediate_causes: Liaise with the company to get the fire-maintenance program for the fire doors.

deficiency_finding: Crane surface oily.

corrective_action: The crane surface was thoroughly cleaned.
preventive_action: All vessels in our fleet will have this data added to their data base.

deficiency_finding: The crew was not properly instructed about their duties as the fireman's outfit was not checked and they were not properly dressed.
description_overview: The pressure sensor on the sea water line is in good working order.

corrective_action: On 25-Nov-2023, proper donning of fireman's outfit with correct procedures for fire drill were demonstrated in presence of Fleet Manager.

deficiency_finding: Food left on work tops.

corrective_action: All available equipment was used to clean the galley floor.
preventive_action: The galley must always be hospital clean.

deficiency_finding: The fuel oil leak alarm was bypassed.

immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.

corrective_action: The gasket that was installed on the sensor was not thick enough.
preventive_action: The system was found to be in good working condition after being surveyed by the class.

deficiency_finding: Several steps at the lower part of the Pilot Ladder are loosened.

immediate_causes: The Sub Panel lost communication with the Main Fire Alarm control panel.

corrective_action: The pilot ladder with loosened steps was removed from service and marked as "Do Not Use, Out of Service."
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was told that the ladder should be straightened and that each step should be inspected thoroughly.

deficiency_finding: The limit value of Regulation 14.1 of MARPOL Annex VI is not updated and the declaration is not completed by the fuel oil supplier's representative.

deficiency_finding: Fire doors in galley and on deck store are not working.

deficiency_finding: Crew members addressed the issue of the minor F.O. leak.

deficiency_finding: Garbage drums on the deck are not secured.

immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: There was a light that was replaced with a spare light.
preventive_action: The engineers were briefed about carrying out the routines diligently.

deficiency_finding: The original CSR NO: 1 is missing.
description_overview: There was no deficiency and the status was confirmed by the flag state.
immediate_causes: He refused to accept the explanations of the Master.
root_cause_analysis: The document has the signature of either Mr. William R. Gallagher or Mr. Guy E.C. Maitland as Senior Deputy Commissioner of the Republic of the Marshall Islands.
corrective_action: There was no deficiency for this topic.
preventive_action: Our comments were shared with other vessels to increase awareness.

deficiency_finding: A ladder is torn out.
description_overview: Some of the medicines inside the first aid box need to be replaced.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer overlooked the torn up part of the gangway net during the preparation of the ladder and had to replace it on time.
root_cause_analysis: Not renewed with a new spare.
corrective_action: The old net was replaced with a new spare gangway net.
preventive_action: Master to instruct officer in charge to conduct visual inspection on gangway net during port stay before and after departure in every port, the same to be included in the pre-arrival meeting to avoid the same finding.

deficiency_finding: The doors are not maintained.
description_overview: The powerpack room had a weathertight door that was kept open by a plastic strap.
immediate_causes: The hinges were not aligned correctly, causing a gap when closing the frequently used door at sea.
root_cause_analysis: Management Factors: Lack of proper supervision / leadership Lack of supervision in inspecting the weather-tight door on the upper deck.
corrective_action: The powerpack room plastic strap was removed and the weathertight door was checked.
preventive_action: Photographs to be sent to the office in both positions as part of the weekly work done report. Photographs to be sent to the office in both positions as part of the weekly work done report.

deficiency_finding: The electrical trunk is not sealed with insulation materials.
description_overview: The cable penetration seal in the electrical trunk was not included in the last installation of the internet system.
immediate_causes: The same was not enough for the PSC officer.
root_cause_analysis: The PMS for cable and pipe connections was verified and found to be adequate.
corrective_action: The cable penetration in the electrical trunk was sealed with insulation materials.
preventive_action: The monthly safety task for verification of cable and pipe connections was discussed on board by the engineers and found adequate for compliance and to prevent any reoccurrences.

deficiency_finding: Fireman outfit walkie talkie is not immediately available for the Fire team assembled in the Fire control station.
description_overview: Code 17 should be fixed before departure.
immediate_causes: The walkie talkie was ready for use on the bridge.
root_cause_analysis: Designated walkie talkies for fire fighting teams were available on the Bridge, and all crew members were aware of the location.
corrective_action: Designated walkie talkies for fire fighting teams have been relocated to the Fire station next to the Fire suits.
preventive_action: The crew members were made aware of the new location of the walkie talkies.

deficiency_finding: The safety net is torn up.
description_overview: Some of the medicines inside the first aid box need to be replaced.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer overlooked the torn up part of the gangway net during the preparation of the ladder and had to replace it on time.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: Explanation and training were given to deck officers and crew regarding the securing of the safety net as per ILO publication "Accident prevention on board ship."
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company requested that the PSC deficiencies be discussed during the next monthly safety committee meeting under master's supervision, with the participation of all shipboard personnel.

deficiency_finding: There is a copy of a certificate for financial security posted.
description_overview: Post a new certificate of insurance or other financial security after removing an outdated one.
immediate_causes: While taking over, the master didn't check the certificate at the mess rooms.
root_cause_analysis: The Master was negligent for not updating the required postings of the latest MLC certificate.
corrective_action: The QHSE department advised the Master to make sure the latest vessel certificates are up to date.
preventive_action: Code 10 was signed by the PSC.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency light near the life raft.
description_overview: One of the lights in the cable duct space was unlit, but the light was immediately renewed and shown to PSCO.
immediate_causes: The equipment no light near port side liferaft was found to be deficient.
root_cause_analysis: There was a possible failure of light due to the time of vessel docking.
corrective_action: The electrical officer replaced the light.
preventive_action: The officer on deck and electrical officer need to verify the correct functioning of lights again to avoid similar observations during the PSC inspection.

deficiency_finding: The HEIGHT OF TWO VENTILATORS OF GALLY IS 900 MM.
description_overview: The two Ventilators had to be provided with additional supports.
immediate_causes: Ventilators in position 1 or 2 to spaces below freeboard decks or decks of enclosed superstructures should have coamings of steel or other equivalent material.
root_cause_analysis: The requirement for providing additional supports for the 2 Galley Vents was not verified by Class during the ship design and building stage.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed out after PSCO verified that the ship staff had installed support for the Galley ventilators which had a coaming height over 900mm.
preventive_action: Senior officers have been briefed about Load Line Regulations, pertaining to ventilators on Deck.

deficiency_finding: Some mooring ropes have not been properly installed.
description_overview: There are some Mooring ropes that are below standard.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew missed to correct a few of them after adjusting the mooring ropes.
corrective_action: The rat guards were placed correctly after the inspector pointed them out to the satisfaction of the inspector.
preventive_action: The crew were educated on checking the proper positioning of ratguards after adjustment of each mooring rope.

deficiency_finding: The ozone deplete record book isn't presented.
description_overview: BWM appendix II does not include the records of ballast.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The missing report is recorded on the Record Book.
corrective_action: The book entry was properly recorded by the engineer officer.
preventive_action: All record book is checked by the Chief Engineer.

deficiency_finding: The name of the ship and the port need to be changed.
description_overview: The ship name port of registry was found faded due to long period on the sea without specific maintenance.
immediate_causes: The crew was in the process of changing the FW tank while the vessel was receiving fresh water.
root_cause_analysis: Some letters have been stained.
corrective_action: The ship's name has been cleaned and painted.
preventive_action: The shipboard safety and health committee meeting has been restructured in order to keep the public safe.

deficiency_finding: The engine room is out of range.
description_overview: There are excessive belts on between the motor and compressor.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Although most of the foggy pressure gauge were legible, the malfunctioning one went undetected by the Investigation responsible crew member.
corrective_action: A request was made for a replacement thermometer to be delivered at the next port of call, and the spare was delivered during the vessel's stop in Singapore.
preventive_action: The Master held a safety meeting where all deficiencies were thoroughly examined and discussed.

deficiency_finding: There is a missing safety data sheet in the steering gear room.
description_overview: There is aGHT cover on L/B Canoe.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: Nobody noticed that it was missing.
corrective_action: The missing safety data sheets were found on the products.
preventive_action: The crew was told by the master to put the safety data sheets in place.

deficiency_finding: All crew will wear PPE from today.
description_overview: There was a shortage of PSC PPE in the S/G room.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with industry rules.
root_cause_analysis: The crew's safety awareness is not good.
corrective_action: Before carrying out related work, arrange crew to wear PPE.
preventive_action: Conduct a crew safety meeting to emphasize the importance of wearing PPE and enhance safety awareness.

deficiency_finding: There is a lack of Ventilation.
description_overview: No.8 Cargo Hold fan vent was seized and corrected.
immediate_causes: The factors that affect the vessels are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The mushroom vent was dismantled and worked well.
preventive_action: Safety meetings were held to discuss the findings from the PSC inspection.

deficiency_finding: The hull Summary report and the Thickness measurement report are missing from the last survey.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: Bulk carrier was stated in the ship's classification certificate, along with other cargo ships.
root_cause_analysis: There is a different state of ship's type in class certificates and ship's drawing and manual.
corrective_action: The report and drill record were Enclosed.
preventive_action: If you want to apply to the requirements, you need to update the state of the ship's type in all class certificates and ship's drawing and manual.

deficiency_finding: The maintenance of the ship and equipment is not ensured by the implementation of SMS.
description_overview: The master failed to report the malfunction of the ship compass gyro.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: An additional audit is required due to the deficiencies in the ISM and lack of proper system implementation.
corrective_action: The internal audit is performed by the company's auditor.
preventive_action: The monthly safety committee meeting will include the participation of all officers and crew to discuss the deficiencies.

deficiency_finding: InmarSAT No.2 is out of order.
description_overview: At the navigation bridge, the Inmarsat C No 2 is not working.
immediate_causes: The ship staff missed out on connecting the painter line after they disconnected the rescue boat.
root_cause_analysis: Theceiver is not connected.
corrective_action: The new INMARSAT will be installed.
preventive_action: In order to avoid huge reparing in Egypt due to customs restriction, an internal meeting was held.

deficiency_finding: 0.05M3 RETAINED IN INCINERATOR WAST OIL ON 20.08.2022, M3: 0.05M3 RETAINED IN INCINERATOR WASTE.
description_overview: The AC malfunction could not have been fixed by the crew and it was reported to the Company.
immediate_causes: The issue with the shipyard was explained by the master.
root_cause_analysis: There was no evidence that waste oil was removed from the shipyard.
corrective_action: The issue was discussed in the office and the Tech Dept. has been instructed to monitor the activities and make sure that proper documents are available to support the removal from the ship.
preventive_action: The issue was discussed in the office and the Tech Dept. has been instructed to monitor the activities and make sure that proper documents are available to support the removal from the ship.

deficiency_finding: The wheelhouse window wipers are inoperative.
description_overview: Arcs of visibility are not for NUC lights.
immediate_causes: The officer forgot to put the blocker back in ECDIS as he was rushing to finish the plan.
root_cause_analysis: In order to find out the inoperative in time, the officer in charge had to carry out good maintenance and test wheelhouse window wipers.
corrective_action: The wheelhouse window wipers need to be repaired immediately.
preventive_action: The officer in charge should make sure the wheelhouse window wipers are in good working order.

deficiency_finding: The mess Room did not update the CBA.
description_overview: Before departure, to correct the problem.
immediate_causes: A malfunction in the antenna unit caused the system to stop working.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel missed out on a newCBA because it was updated on arrival.
corrective_action: The PSC officer on board at Mariveles immediately corrected the deficiency by checking and preparing two hard copies and posting them in the messrooms.
preventive_action: During the monthly safety meeting, the issue was brought to the attention of all officers and ratings.

deficiency_finding: The gauged records in GRB were not recorded in a respectful way.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: There are leaks in the cargo hatch covers of CH No. 5 FWD and AFT S/S.
description_overview: Bulk carriers add safety measures.
immediate_causes: The previous voyage was laden and the cargo holds couldn't be accessed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: Required repair kits and spare cylinders were ordered and will be received at the next port.
preventive_action: All findings are sent to the company's fleet to carry out safety meetings and avoid reoccurrence.

deficiency_finding: There is a dirty air duct gratings filter in the steering gear room.
description_overview: The engine room fire damper could not close because of a locking pin stuck in the fan housing.
immediate_causes: The engine room duct was not inspected and the Blind cover was not noticed by the ship staff.
root_cause_analysis: The duct gratings filter was not maintained by the Engine Crew.
corrective_action: The engine crew was given instructions by the technical manager to maintain the air duct gratings filter after the PSC inspection.

deficiency_finding: Generator 1, and 3 exhaust systems were found with exposed surfaces.
description_overview: The insulation lagging on steam/bunker pipes in the underdeck passage was damaged.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: There are exposed surfaces for the G/E exhaust system.
corrective_action: The hot surfaces should be covered with proper lagging.
preventive_action: The third engineer must check the temperature daily and pay more attention to lagging condition.

deficiency_finding: The revolution counter in Bridge is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The counter in the bridge had a deviation of more than 10rpm.
immediate_causes: The quick release of forward life raft was difficult to open due to the improper installation of accompanying shackle that was used for securing in place.
root_cause_analysis: The indicator of the port side revolution counter was stuck.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed at the time of the inspection after the indicator was overhauled by the crew.
preventive_action: The same will be discussed in the next SCM when the deficiency is brought to the attention of the managed fleet.

deficiency_finding: Not as required.
description_overview: The exhaust gas scrubber system is being used for SOx compliance.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The manufacturer was contacted for clarification and verification. EGCS records from the data logger are to be cross verified by senior management.
preventive_action: The data logger records should be checked monthly by senior management and any issues should be reported to the office.

deficiency_finding: Three embarkation ladders for liferafts were found to be used for more than 30 months without a valid strength test.
description_overview: survival craft
immediate_causes: Ladders for liferaft are due for a shore strength test.
root_cause_analysis: The crew and management don't know that it's mandatory to comply with the ISO standard along with SOLAS and other regulations.
corrective_action: If liferaft embarkation ladders are not replaced, a 30-month strength test will be required.
preventive_action: The company sent a fleet-wide circular detailing the deficiency and vessels replied with their compliance and ack for understanding.

deficiency_finding: Emergency towing equipment is not ready for use.
description_overview: The emergency towing manual is missing from the forecastle.
immediate_causes: The PSC officer can't locate the tools because they are located and kept on different places.
root_cause_analysis: The ship store did not allow emergency towing rope to be used.
corrective_action: Clean up ropes and remove ship store near towing equipment.
preventive_action: It is the responsibility of the chief officer to supervise and monitor the daily and periodically maintenance of emergency equipment.

deficiency_finding: The ship must be compliant with the requirements of SOLAS XII/4, 5, 6 and 7.
description_overview: The type of ship in the certificates is not known.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer presented the plan to the officer.
root_cause_analysis: PSCO was confused due to the dual vessel type and want to have a confirmation from flag as the stability booklet was approved by flag.
corrective_action: Immediately, the vessel flag (Barbados) was contacted to have clarification on the defect and issue a statement on the type of vessel.
preventive_action: Sharing Auditor Deficiency will be shared with auditors.

deficiency_finding: The company's address and place on the survey were incorrect.
description_overview: Only for information.
immediate_causes: On endorsement of annual verification, PSC decided not to write 'R.O.C.' as a country on the DOC company address.
root_cause_analysis: Not applicable.
corrective_action: The address and endorsement on DOC were requested by the company.
preventive_action: The company decided to change the address in order to prevent arguments of China PSC in the future.

deficiency_finding: Not according to regulation.
description_overview: It is not clean.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel's hull was not clean due to the long stay in the previous port of call.
corrective_action: Due to vessel's short stay, the hull cleaning was postponed for the next Fujairah call on April 30th, 2024.
preventive_action: In due time deficiency will be shared with all managed vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is a tank on theOOP deck that is not under control.
description_overview: There is a navigation.
immediate_causes: The C/O neglected to inspect the port of the water tank.
root_cause_analysis: The PIC did not carry out a routine inspection as per the requirements.
corrective_action: The cover should be locked with a security lock.
preventive_action: The crew responsible must carry out a routine periodically inspection.

deficiency_finding: It was found that the planned maintenance schedule was not up to date.
description_overview: Hatch cover box is not maintained.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: A spare connection was a challenge when the vessel was calling West African and South American ports.
corrective_action: The main engine will need Immobilization once it arrives at the port.
preventive_action: Fleet messages have been sent to vessels to check their running hours.

deficiency_finding: The Incinerator waste oil tank is not running.
description_overview: Poor crew performance during fire drill is related to poor maintenance and lack of central centre of command.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: The crew never reported the malfunction of the motor, the company is not aware.
corrective_action: The ship received a new motor in China and ran it through a test.
preventive_action: The company reminded the fleet during the month end, to report any malfunction of equipment to office immediately.

deficiency_finding: It's not in a working language.
description_overview: The master was told to provide communication in working language all the time.
immediate_causes: The other external party is not under the control of the company.
root_cause_analysis: Other.
corrective_action: The working language onboard is Turkish and English and the crew has good knowledge of English.
preventive_action: The non-conformity will be shared with fleet vessels and discussed during company seminars, in-house pre-joining meetings and in-house trainings.

deficiency_finding: There was medicine in the first aid box.
description_overview: Some of the medicines inside the first aid box need to be replaced.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: If any expired medicines were found in the first-aid boxes, they were replaced with new ones.
preventive_action: During the meeting for enhancing shipboard management and crew's responsibility, a relative training course was provided to all shipboard crews.

deficiency_finding: The washers for International Shore Connection were missing.
description_overview: During the PSC Inspection at Yokkaichi PSC Officer Maeda Takuma imposed a deficiency.
immediate_causes: The ship safety officer did not report the deficiency.
root_cause_analysis: The washers for International Shore Connection were missing.
corrective_action: Put the washers on the International Shore Connection.
preventive_action: The International shore Connection is inspected weekly by the third officer.

deficiency_finding: The rest shown on the safety meeting time in the remark column is not the same as the rest shown in the same line.
description_overview: Before fumigating a previous voyage, no evidence of the ship safety committee should be carried out.
immediate_causes: The rest hours were not filled by the crew.
root_cause_analysis: The rest hour records were approved without verification.
corrective_action: The officer was trained to fill the rest hour records correctly.
preventive_action: There is a proper procedure for filling up rest hours record and verification.

deficiency_finding: The gyro compass is not synchronized with the master gyro compass.
description_overview: The difference between gyro was noticed while carrying out the steering gear drill.
immediate_causes: Bridge officers and engineers were briefed on arrival checks on steering gear.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient inspection of the steering fear room.
corrective_action: The gyro's were synchronized immediately.
preventive_action: Proper checks of steering gear prior arrival/departure checks will be added to the data base.

deficiency_finding: The performance standard was not met.
description_overview: BWMS found two alarms still active despite being alarmed.
immediate_causes: There was no flow of sludge observed due to malfunctioning of solenoid valve which allows air for sludge to return in both "auto" and "manual" mode Immediate Cause - Substandard Conditions
root_cause_analysis: At the time of the PSC inspection, a Surveyor from the vessel's Class was also attending the vessel for Annual Survey, and the Ballast Water Management Treatment System was found with two active alarms.
corrective_action: The Ballast Water Management Treatment System was restored and verified on the 11th of April at the port of Piraeus-Greece.
preventive_action: The Master called for a meeting where the deficiency was discussed in detail.

deficiency_finding: The setting of the radio station was incorrect.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: The responsible officer overlooked Guangzhou station, which was set in the present voyage area.
root_cause_analysis: The responsible officer overlooked Guangzhou station, which was set in the present voyage area.
corrective_action: Adding the missing station in the Navtex made up for it.
preventive_action: The officer should review the pre-arrival checklist with regards to bridge equipment.

deficiency_finding: The company name on the DOC is not the same as on the CSR.
description_overview: The company name on the DOC is not the same as on the CSR.
immediate_causes: The CSR doc is different from the DOC.
root_cause_analysis: The company stated in the CSR doc that it wasn't the same as the DOC.
corrective_action: In case of discrepancy, the master must cross check all certificates and report the office.
preventive_action: Keeping up to date all trading certificates is carried out by the Education (Education and Training) Briefing of master.

deficiency_finding: Daylight signal lamp malfunction.
description_overview: The inspector's comment was acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Two days before the PSC inspection, the lamp was tested and found to be in good condition.
corrective_action: The daylight signal lamp was lit after the ship's stock was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: The good operational order of the signaling lamp, three spare bulbs, and the effective light emission sectors of daylight have been verified by the masters of managed vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is a torch light in a boat.
description_overview: The torch was not water proof.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The Rescue boat torch was replaced with a new spare torch.
preventive_action: The officers were told that LSA/FFA equipment should be kept onboard in a state of readiness at all times.

deficiency_finding: The microphone on the bridge wings was affected by noise signals and was found on VDR.
description_overview: The action code is 17/10/2018.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: A copy of the certificate of compliance was issued by the testing facility upon successful performance test after the VDR annual performance test was conducted by an approved testing facility.
corrective_action: The VDR error alarm code was caused by a faulty microphone, savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay
preventive_action: The Master instructed all officers to be pro-active in reporting error alarm to make sure the navigation aids are kept up to date.

deficiency_finding: The HFO Settling tank is partly broken.
description_overview: The machinery, boiler and other pressure vessel associated piping system and fitting should be of a design and construction adequate for the service for which they are intended and should be so installed and protected as to reduce to a minimum any dangers to persons onboard.
immediate_causes: HFO Settling insulation tank lagging is broken.
root_cause_analysis: Responsible person carry out repair/rectification of steam leak in Temperature controller but failed to renew the damaged insulation lagging.
corrective_action: Confirmation and verification of PSC Inspectors were required for insulation lagging to be renewed.
preventive_action: Conducted de-briefing to all engine staff and reminded them of the importance of proper maintenance of insulation laggings in exhaust pipes and pressure pipes.

deficiency_finding: The quantity of lubricant oil was not recorded in the oil record book.
description_overview: The inspector's comment is acknowledged.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer who is responsible for the correct records in ORB failed to carry out his duties properly.
