corrective_action: The Chief Engineer was given training by the Company Auditor for proper records of ORB.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer was told to keep correct records at the oil record book.

deficiency_finding: The scrubber alarm system is not connected to the engine room alarm system, when creating an alarm on the scrubber, no visible or audible alarm was observed in ER and in/on ER alarm system.
description_overview: Crew member that perform the test didn't know that it takes 10 to 15 minutes to set the alarm, the alarm was in good technical condition.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were offered.
root_cause_analysis: There is no audio-visual alarm in the Engine room due to faulty relays.
corrective_action: After testing, the faulty relays were found to be in working order.
preventive_action: There was an extraordinary safety meeting where the details of the finding and its planned/proposed corrective action were discussed.

deficiency_finding: There was no safety sign or barrier on the deck.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human Cause - failure to comply with stakeholder requirements.
corrective_action: The safety sign was installed on the open manhole.
preventive_action: Risk control, quality control of safety checklist and procedural process.

deficiency_finding: The second officer is not familiar with the code.
description_overview: The second officer is not familiar with the code.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: As part of joining familiarization, the second officer was briefed on ship specific security duties, but he was not familiar with the use of SSAS button.
corrective_action: The use of SSAS button was demonstrated to the satisfaction of the PSC Inspector by the second officer.
preventive_action: Training was carried out for all crew to be familiar with the SSAS.

deficiency_finding: Launching arrangements for rescue boats are not required.
description_overview: The remote control lever for the rescue boat is in poor condition.
immediate_causes: The rescue boat davit's remote control lever was not recovered because it was worn out.
root_cause_analysis: The remote control lever for the rescue boat is in poor condition.
corrective_action: The spring in the lever was replaced.
preventive_action: During regular inspection of launching arrangement including rescue boat and required parameters of rescue boat, master educated correct points should be checked.

deficiency_finding: Safe means of access.
description_overview: The lifebuoy is not in position in the vicinity of the gangway.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The starboard lifeboat launching area was provided with an additional lifebuoy after it was put back in place.
preventive_action: Lessons learned were shared with all Fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: There was oil on the deck.
description_overview: There was an oil stain under the drain valve of the oil tank for the Hatch Cover system.
immediate_causes: The problem with the air conditioning system was caused by the failure of the compressor on the night before the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There are machines and equipment.
corrective_action: See F-010 for corrective actions.
preventive_action: See F-010 for corrective actions.

deficiency_finding: 10CM X 20CM is the size of the broken manhole.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of inspection and maintenance of insulation materials in the engine room.
corrective_action: Before his disembarkation from the vessel, the broken insulation materials of the emergency trunk have been verified by PSCO and the code has been lowered to 10.
preventive_action: PIC should carry out regular inspection and maintenance of emergency trunk.

deficiency_finding: The supplement not provided on board is the SOLAS 2020 Edition.
description_overview: The supplement not provided on board is the SOLAS 2020 Edition.
immediate_causes: The weekly notice was overlooked by the officer in charge.
root_cause_analysis: There was no supervision from the senior office.
corrective_action: The latest SOLAS 2020 Edition supplement was provided by check and office.
preventive_action: feedback will be shared with all fleet vessels

deficiency_finding: The sewer holding tank in the engine room is not stated in the report.
description_overview: The holding tank's capacity is different with the certificate.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: In reference to the previous PSC inspection, the ISPP was amended, however a clarification as to why Holding tk is not included in the certificate is required by the PSC inspector.
corrective_action: As part of the investigation required by PSC, a class was contacted.
preventive_action: A copy of the statement issued by Class ABS is filed with the ISPP certificate.

deficiency_finding: There is a certificate of financial security in relation to the owners of ships.
description_overview: The financial security certificate for seafarer repatriation costs and liabilities was updated on February 20th, but was missed out in the mess rooms.
immediate_causes: The P&I certificate copy that was on display in the Mess room was outdated and not replaced with a new one.
root_cause_analysis: The outdated certificate was overlooked during weekly rounds and safety inspections which led to the deficiency.
corrective_action: The old certificate was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: The master's monthly verification checklist has been updated to include checking posted certificates for expired certificates.

deficiency_finding: The smoke detection system was blocked.
description_overview: All pipes are disconnected at the time of the inspection.
immediate_causes: Poor supervision and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient maintenance, test and inspection of the fire detection system in connection with the cargo spaces.
corrective_action: The sample detection system was tested without an alarm after it was blown by high pressure air.
preventive_action: In addition to routine maintenance and test requirements being defined in management PMS, the additional requests of testing and verify the functioning of fire detection system for cargo spaces have been.

deficiency_finding: The lifebuoy isn't ready to be thrown at sea because of the rusted release pin.
description_overview: The condition of MOB was checked after the observation and it was found that an additional release pin was attached to the equipment and it was rusted.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: An additional pin was attached to prevent accidental releases.
corrective_action: After the inspection, the additional release pin was removed and the vessel confirmed the readiness of MOB for emergency use.
preventive_action: The responsible officer was told to keep all emergency equipment ready to use and not to apply any additional material to any emergency system.

deficiency_finding: Financial security is not posted.
description_overview: There is a certificate or documentary evidence of financial security.
immediate_causes: While taking over, the master didn't check the certificate at the mess rooms.
root_cause_analysis: The notice board was not displayed for all shipboard personnel due to lack of awareness and knowledge.
corrective_action: The Master had the financial security information posted on the notice boards.
preventive_action: The Master is to make sure that information that is required by regulatory regulations for shipboard personnel is posted at a designated location.

deficiency_finding: The emergency generator isn't working.
description_overview: The AMSA officer went to the emergency generator room to conduct an operational test.
immediate_causes: Master is responsible for upkeep of the certificate.
root_cause_analysis: The EDG on the vessel is equipped with the following particulars.
corrective_action: A physical inspection by the classification society to test the Emergency Diesel Generator has been scheduled for the next port to address the raised condition of class.
preventive_action: After the Makers instructions, exchange the freshwater cooling with fresh anti-freeze.

deficiency_finding: Division decks are not required.
description_overview: There are chemicals found under the main staircase in the upper deck.
immediate_causes: Chemicals are kept in an undesignated area.
root_cause_analysis: When the job was not done for the day, the deck crew kept the chemicals under the stairs.
corrective_action: Chemicals used for cleaning were moved to the Chemical locker.
preventive_action: During the Safety meeting conducted by the Master, he emphasized the need for awareness regarding handling hazardous chemicals and the possibility of injury to staff when not using proper PPE for handling the chemicals.

deficiency_finding: Incinerator operations and operating manual.
description_overview: The front door of the fire chamber was found to be broken.
immediate_causes: The certificates considered of Bunker CLC not available onboard were construed as non-fulfilment of specified requirement.
root_cause_analysis: It was decided that there was no imminent safety concern because of the wear on the furnace door.
corrective_action: Our crew proceeded with the necessary repair because the required material was onboard.
preventive_action: All managed vessels were made aware of the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: The Forecastle store has a fan.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: The old gingham net was replaced with a new one.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance was identified as one of the reasons for the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: The deficiency was verified by the inspectors.
preventive_action: Managers' SMS procedures were followed whenciency was discussed during the next Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: ARPA TX time's magnetron was found late.
description_overview: The suits for duty officer in bridge are not appropriate.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The performance test was carried out by the end of every watch and both radars were in good working condition.
corrective_action: Instructions were given to the Chief Officer and the Electrician to prepare for the renewal of the magnetron.
preventive_action: A training session was conducted by the Master to Deck Officers and Electrician to discuss company's compliance with monitoring and maintenance of navigation equipment.

deficiency_finding: The Statement of Compliance Fuel Oil Consumption reporting is no longer valid.
description_overview: If there were leaks in the engine room, the adjacent spaces may become dirty.
immediate_causes: The new captain did not understand the exchange of emails and the company did not timely print out the new statement.
root_cause_analysis: All navigation lights were tested prior to Huasco's arrival and all were functional.
corrective_action: The deficiency was corrected and action taken code 15 to 10 was changed.
preventive_action: Every document sent from the company will be filed without fail and re-check to make sure it is still valid.

deficiency_finding: The discharge of 16286.4 m3 of water from the vessel to the port was not reported.
description_overview: Load lines - ICLL 2003 amend.
immediate_causes: The previous Master was told to report any deballasting in Chinese waters prior to his arrival.
root_cause_analysis: The master forgot to sign at other tasks.
corrective_action: The permission was guaranteed to the vessel by the local agent, but they failed to notify the MSA.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The air pipe head has a rubber seal.
description_overview: When the vent flap is not engaged in the rod, the water will cause it to detach.
immediate_causes: There is an oil mark on the cylinder liner.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: During their stay in China, the ship's crew carried out some repairs.
preventive_action: In order to prevent re-occurrence, master educated to all crew how to manage and maintain the air vent.

deficiency_finding: One life-jacket light on a bridge cannot be turned off.
description_overview: There is a life jacket light on the bridge.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: The test stop button was a little hard to push, but it was fixed during the inspection.
corrective_action: The staff of the ship immediately demonstrated the correct operation of the life-jacket light.
preventive_action: The Master made it clear to the officers that they must be able to demonstrate their operation to any external parties without hesitation and that they must have comprehensive knowledge of all life saving equipment.

deficiency_finding: The certificate of insurance for liability for removal of wreck expired on February 20.
description_overview: The counter in the bridge had a deviation of more than 10rpm.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The valid certificate has been sent to the vessel on time, but the Master failed to update the relevant folder with the valid ship certificates.
corrective_action: The mentioned certificate was put to the relevant folder and verified by the class.
preventive_action: The master was told to ensure proper monitoring of the ship's certificates during the monthly safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: The power went out at high density and narrow water.
description_overview: At the stage of inspection, there isn't any further action on root cause analysis.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The crews failed to drain the water from the tanks.
corrective_action: The G/E worked normally after the water was drained from the service tanks.
preventive_action: The duty engineer will check the service tanks and drain water at least daily during the E/R watch.

deficiency_finding: The cover plate was found, but no knots were provided.
description_overview: The oil mist detector test was unsatisfactory.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The officer was negligent.
corrective_action: The crew changed all the pipes to use a steel cap because of the high risk of pilferage.
preventive_action: Reminder to fleet to check and avoid similar deficiencies.

deficiency_finding: The port and starboard bridge clear view was found at the time of inspection.
description_overview: Oil gas can not be kept tight by the bridge doors.
immediate_causes: The bridge communication unit was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: The glass of C.V.S was found to be dirty.
corrective_action: The Chief officer ordered the Deck crew to clean the glass.
preventive_action: Officer in charge was advised by a master to check and clean frequently.

deficiency_finding: The name of the ship and the port need to be changed.
description_overview: The ship name port of registry was found faded due to long period on the sea without specific maintenance.
immediate_causes: The crew was in the process of changing the FW tank while the vessel was receiving fresh water.
root_cause_analysis: Some letters have been stained.
corrective_action: The ship's name has been cleaned and painted.
preventive_action: The shipboard safety and health committee meeting has been restructured in order to keep the public safe.

deficiency_finding: The bridge wing starboard side ME indicator is in poor condition.
description_overview: The bridge wings settings have incorrect Rpm and Rudder indicators.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment is being used.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance management is not adequate.
corrective_action: The faulty RPM indicator was replaced.
preventive_action: All identified defects will be included in the defect management module for adequate support from office.

deficiency_finding: The language on board is not marked on the log book.
description_overview: There was a small leak from the union during the test and it took 30 seconds for the valve to shut down.
immediate_causes: The officer forgot to fill in.
root_cause_analysis: The log book was leaked working language remark while being printed in office.
corrective_action: We put the word 'English' on the current use deck log book immediately.
preventive_action: The master gave a presentation to all deck officers to mark on the log book.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency fire pump that is not ready for use.
description_overview: The safety management system should provide for specific measures to promote the reliability of equipment.
immediate_causes: Lack of training.
root_cause_analysis: The crew inspects equipment on a weekly, monthly, and quarterly basis.
corrective_action: The proper function of the emergency fire pump was confirmed by the flag inspector.
preventive_action: To ensure our seafarers' competence, we need to re-assess our procedures and reexamine our training program.

deficiency_finding: There is time and space for closed space exploration and rescue.
description_overview: Insufficient maintenance.
immediate_causes: The space drill report was immediately corrected.
root_cause_analysis: There is inadequate monitoring of personal facts.
corrective_action: Training was given to personnel towards effective recordkeeping.
preventive_action: Sharing of deficiency is a way to prevent re-occurrence.

deficiency_finding: Division decks are not required.
description_overview: There are chemicals found under the main staircase in the upper deck.
immediate_causes: Chemicals are kept in an undesignated area.
root_cause_analysis: When the job was not done for the day, the deck crew kept the chemicals under the stairs.
corrective_action: Chemicals used for cleaning were moved to the Chemical locker.
preventive_action: During the Safety meeting conducted by the Master, he emphasized the need for awareness regarding handling hazardous chemicals and the possibility of injury to staff when not using proper PPE for handling the chemicals.

deficiency_finding: The old edition of the list of ship stations.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: Couldn't provide during the inspection.
corrective_action: Installation of list of ship station to computer dedicated for documentation.
preventive_action: To avoid recurrence, share information with the fleet to ensure the latest publication is onboard.

deficiency_finding: There is a glass panel between the bridge-wing and the bridge entrances.
description_overview: A portable gas detector.
immediate_causes: The gauge glass of the hot well was old and hard to see.
root_cause_analysis: The glass on the bridge was cracked.
corrective_action: After berths and changing with new glass, ordered glass should be supplied.
preventive_action: It is necessary to have spare in hand and to be ready at all times.

deficiency_finding: The junior deck officer had no knowledge of BWMP.
description_overview: There are inconsistencies between the descriptions of the IBWM certificate and the BWMP.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer presented the plan to the officer.
root_cause_analysis: The deck cadet and 3rd officer were interviewed by PSCO for the operation of BWTS.
corrective_action: The training was carried out by the master.
preventive_action: The deck officer and junior engineers had their training done.

deficiency_finding: All seafarers are not included in the table with the shipboard working arrangements.
description_overview: Master requested to dispose Ashore all garbage before departure if next port is not specified.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: There are 2 kinds of shipboard working arrangements.
corrective_action: Revised shipboard working arrangements were recommended by the PSC.
preventive_action: Sharing deficiency for using correct forms and posting appropriate places with the entire fleet.

deficiency_finding: The VDR is also in alarm because the X-band radar is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The observations were made due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers.
immediate_causes: The X-band radar on the vessel stopped working shortly before it arrived in Rotterdam.
root_cause_analysis: Captain not well supervise the LSA on board as per company procedure.
corrective_action: The service was arranged for the vessel's call in the Netherlands.
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: Fumigation instructions not signed by the master and C/O.
description_overview: The voyage safety plan checklist was not signed by the master and chief officer.
immediate_causes: Poor understanding of STCW and lack of familiarization.
root_cause_analysis: There is an inadequate documentary record of the verification of the safety plan.
corrective_action: The master and C/O must sign the instructions.
preventive_action: Training for Fumigation procedures, ventilating the spaces and monitoring will be carried out.

deficiency_finding: The covers for garbage bins in the galley are missing.
description_overview: Garbage bin covers are missing from the galley.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: The lack of spare bins which had been ordered by the vessel but delivered at the same day in the afternoon is the first cause.
corrective_action: The galley has a new garbage bin placed in it.
preventive_action: The galley has a new garbage bin placed in it.

deficiency_finding: The Rain plug of the L/B (P) was broken during the PSC inspection at ZHUHAI, China.
description_overview: The company's established procedures and practices clearly state that all scuppers must be plugged at all times when in port.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer and the Deck Officers are responsible for making sure the deck scuppers are plugged and secured.
root_cause_analysis: During inspection it was asked PSCO to open the rain plug of life boat, same was opened up, but the rain plug fell out of the housing hole on the life boat body.
corrective_action: The rain plug was replaced with a new one immediately after the inspection.
preventive_action: "Rapid Fleet Safety Alert" was issued for our fleet on 21st Nov to call attention to this issue.

deficiency_finding: Black smoke can be seen from the generator's exhaust pipe.
description_overview: The emergency light outside the funnel was unlit when PSCO checked the lighting system.
immediate_causes: Ceased operation of auxiliary engine #1.
root_cause_analysis: The fuel oil injection valve is faulty.
corrective_action: Assessed the condition of the fuel injection valve after it was removed.
preventive_action: The Person In Charge is responsible for maintenance to strictly follow thePMS protocols.

deficiency_finding: The Cargo Ship Safety Radio Certificate is valid until 17.01.2027.
description_overview: At the time of Inspection there was a no maintenance record for the EPIRB.
immediate_causes: The Master could not locate the ship structure access manual during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The document control is poor and the current certificate is missing.
corrective_action: The certificate was presented to the PSCO after the inspection.
preventive_action: Handling certificates, including filing, was given additional guidance by the vessel's engineer.

deficiency_finding: Poor condition filter for the head of the air vent.
description_overview: The engine room of the vessel has been meticulously maintained and is currently in good working condition.
immediate_causes: There was a missingPLUG.
root_cause_analysis: Its condition became poor due to lack of proper maintenance.
corrective_action: Cleaning, maintenance and renewal of filters by crews.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was reminded to inspect and verify the Filter for the head of the air vent.

deficiency_finding: Life RAFT P&S are not restricted on the dock.
description_overview: Life RAFT P&S are not restricted on the dock.
immediate_causes: Human physical constraints are caused by error.
root_cause_analysis: The life raft had just been returned on board by the shore service company.
corrective_action: The life rafts were thrown at the crane by the crew.
preventive_action: Equipment that is used for certain purposes should be stowed in an expedient place.

deficiency_finding: There are symbols missing from the fire detectors in the Purifier room.
description_overview: There are no CO2 gas detectors presented.
immediate_causes: The fire door insulation is poor.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of supervision.
corrective_action: Firefighting equipment is covered under the ship specific computerized plan maintenance system.
preventive_action: We shared the observation with all the vessels.

deficiency_finding: There were several outside doors that weren't closing properly.
description_overview: The forward forecastle doors are weathertight.
immediate_causes: Poor rubber packing, lack of safety culture and situational awareness of the importance to weather-tight and water integrity were some of the reasons why the forward forecastle doors were not checked carefully.
root_cause_analysis: The condition of the doors remain unidentified, unreported and eventually unrectified.
corrective_action: All doors have been opened and adjusted.
preventive_action: All exit doors have been inspected and minor adjustments made.

deficiency_finding: The air fire damper on the bridge deck is missing.
description_overview: The isolator/connection box has a radio antenna wire broken off.
immediate_causes: The crew kept excessive mineral drinking water in his cabin.
root_cause_analysis: The person doesn't mention the rules of soLAS part I, Chapter II, Regulation 9.
corrective_action: We installed the gun wire of the bridge.
preventive_action: 'SOLAS PART I, CHAPTER 2, REGULATION 9. 7' is a good place to start.

deficiency_finding: The G/E (3 PCS)-ID number of component parts was not recorded correctly.
description_overview: The drill was for Steering gear failure.
immediate_causes: The ID number's record is incomplete.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't know how to record the technical file thoroughly.
corrective_action: The record should be filled in according to the actual ID number.
preventive_action: A person in charge training, studying the record of construction, technical file and means of verification, recording the parameters in accordance with the rules and meeting with requirement.

deficiency_finding: There is evidence that the company does not have due control of the ship's certificates.
description_overview: The observations were made due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers, some certificates were not up to date.
corrective_action: After the ship informed the offices, all expired certificates were extended or renewed.
preventive_action: The ship management team should be informed in advance if the certificates are missing or expired.

deficiency_finding: There is a broken U type line on the port side main deck.
description_overview: Line-throwing appliance containers are no longer valid.
immediate_causes: The broken drain cock for the U type line on the port side main deck was not found during a routine inspection and was not maintained in good condition.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of compliance with proper inspection and maintenance of the U type line.
corrective_action: The drain cock was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: The U type line on deck needs to be inspected and maintained by the crew on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: The sea temp was not recorded in the log book.
description_overview: The forecastle cracked about 12 metres above waterline frames due to the same collision.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge forgot to record the LSA inspection entry in the deck log book.
root_cause_analysis: The Nav Log Book did not record the sea temperature.
corrective_action: OOWs were trained by the Captain how to record the sea temperature.
preventive_action: The chief officer trained relevant crewmembers.

deficiency_finding: The main fire line isolation valve was not closing at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The stanchions for securing cargo on the main deck are in bad shape.
immediate_causes: The excessive paint of the valve needs to be identified.
root_cause_analysis: The maintenance plan for the vessel is going forward with the cooperation of the crew and the Technical Department.
corrective_action: The paint was removed, the valve's cover was opened, grease was applied and the deficiency was marked on the report.
preventive_action: The shaft of the valves must remain clean and un-painted if maintenance is to be done.

deficiency_finding: The exhaust of the galley is not clean.
description_overview: The galley sink was taken out to clear the drainpipe.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The galley crew neglected to clean the galley during the last week, which caused the deficiency to be raised.
corrective_action: The relevant evidence was provided to the PSC officer.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels were told to carry out a thorough inspection at the galley.

deficiency_finding: There are two mattresses on the floor of the hospital room.
description_overview: Due to crew being occupied with port activities and duties, old mattress was not taken out of hospital in time.
immediate_causes: The elevator needed extended service because it was not operational.
root_cause_analysis: The old mattress wasn't taken out of the hospital in time.
corrective_action: The old mattress was removed.
preventive_action: This finding together with control, root cause and corrective actions applied will be sent to all fleet ships in quarterly letters.

deficiency_finding: The angle indicator on the bridge is partially unreadable.
description_overview: The angle indicator on the bridge is partially unreadable.
immediate_causes: Using faulty equipment.
root_cause_analysis: The angle indicator on the bridge was faded.
corrective_action: A new reading board will be delivered within a week.
preventive_action: Constantly, the PIC should check and maintain.

deficiency_finding: The wood damper is missing.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Didn't report the broken equipment to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The Company has established procedures to ensure that vessels are maintained in accordance with the provisions of the PMS.
corrective_action: The crew put the missing wood damper to the ladder after the PSC Officer pointed out the deficiency.
preventive_action: The necessary corrective and preventive action plan has been issued by the company.

deficiency_finding: Not all charts are up to date.
description_overview: The crew didn't know about fixed fire extinguishing systems in the galley.
immediate_causes: NAVAREA warnings weren't updated properly.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient update/refresher training is a problem.
corrective_action: The bridge team was briefed by the master about voyage charts to be corrected.
preventive_action: The next safety committee meeting will include a discussion with all crew about good voyage planning.

deficiency_finding: Not required.
description_overview: The PSC/AMSA Inspector found out that the existing and newly supplied pilot ladder was not compliant with the Australian Local Ports while she was in Australia.
immediate_causes: The wirings went over the junction box because of inadequate routine inspection that led to overtime and undetected.
root_cause_analysis: The last pilot ladder certificate was issued in April 2023 and complies with ISO 799- 1: 2019.
corrective_action: The master and deck officers need to be aware of the different local port regulations and their standards, as well as the SOLAS regulations.
preventive_action: The master and deck officers need to be aware of the different local port regulations and their standards, as well as the SOLAS regulations.

deficiency_finding: Calibration report for 15 PPM oil content meter is not available.
description_overview: The design of the equipment will be approved by the administration.
immediate_causes: The crew did not know about the 2 valves pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: There is no attention given to proper certification of pollution prevention equipment.
corrective_action: Calibration and additional seals of 15 PPM device are provided.
preventive_action: The PSC Deficiency will be discussed during the next Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is a Certificate of Documentary evidence of financial security for repatriation that is not posted.
description_overview: A valid certificate for financial security was not put in the officer and crew mess room as requested by the inspector.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of this deficiency lies in inadequate familiarization of the senior officers with DMLC Part II, which states that "the certificate shall be posted in a conspicuous place on board where it is available to all seafarers."
corrective_action: The document was posted in the ratings and officers messrooms.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company took the following measures: - The deficiency was discussed onboard with all Crew during the Safety Meeting carried out after the inspection presenting the certificate and DMLC Part II and notifying all Crew that the Certificate of Financial Security relating to shipowners was

deficiency_finding: One of the Life rafts is kept together by a single cable.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: The chief officer took the waste paint off the safety pins.
root_cause_analysis: Even though both Life rafts are lashed individually with Individual HRU's, the Top Life raft will not be released automatically.
corrective_action: The Life raft lashing wire position was changed.
preventive_action: Life rafts must be lashed individually by lashing wire.

deficiency_finding: Collective bargaining agreement.
description_overview: According to the Seafarer Employment Agreement there is a Collective Bargaining Agreement in force.
immediate_causes: Lack of distribution of standard.
root_cause_analysis: The file was corrupted and could not be presented to PSCO during inspection.
corrective_action: The crewing department printed the valid CBA for the ship's files.
preventive_action: The crewing department verified with crewing agencies that all managed vessels have the actual employment agreements on board.

deficiency_finding: There are no protective covers on the deck stores.
description_overview: Garbage bin covers are missing from the galley.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew forgot to return after use of the receptacle protective cover.
corrective_action: The protective cover of the receptacle was immediately returned by the crew.
preventive_action: The protective cover must be secured to prevent it from being lost when the receptacle is in use.

deficiency_finding: The counter in the bridge had a deviation of more than 10rpm.
description_overview: The counter in the bridge had a deviation of more than 10rpm.
immediate_causes: There was an oil spill on the deck.
root_cause_analysis: In order to ensure their functional reliability, the Company has adopted specific maintenance, inspection and testing procedures for equipment and systems onboard.
corrective_action: The revolution counter was adjusted before departure.
preventive_action: The deficiencies to be discussed during the monthly safety committee meeting under master's supervision were discussed.

deficiency_finding: The fireman's outfit on the main deck of the No1 Fire Station was not working.
description_overview: The Safety Light for fireman's outfit was found to be in good working order.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Poor task management, inadequate skills, inadequate follow up inspection, and failure to follow safety instructions were all indicated in the root case analysis.
corrective_action: The Chief Officer was asked to confirm the condition.
preventive_action: The next monthly submission of LSA/FFE PMS checklist was to be submitted by the vessel by the end of October.

deficiency_finding: Some medicines account for zero in the inventory list.
description_overview: There is a missing LSA element.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the customs regulation in the last port Argentina, some expired medicines were removed from the inventory list and new supply could not be delivered in time.
corrective_action: The medicine supply was arranged prior to the arrival of the vessel.
preventive_action: In order to prevent medicine stocks from falling below requirement, the port restrictions should be considered in advance.

deficiency_finding: There was a lack of communication between the bridge team and the Reef Pilot in the vicinity of Mecca Reef.
description_overview: There is a lack of communication.
immediate_causes: The gauge glass of the hot well was old and hard to see.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of communication and an analysis of the incident.
corrective_action: The additional training is based on the SOM Ch.2 Sect.
preventive_action: Before signing on, Specifie training on Master/Pilot relation.

deficiency_finding: The fire hose in the engine room is not more than 15m in length.
description_overview: The fire hose in the engine room is not more than 15m in length.
immediate_causes: The Plan For The Recovery of Person From The Water manual does not include specific missing characterestic and limitation of equipment intended to be used for the recovery operations.
root_cause_analysis: The officer who installed the new hose did not check the limits of the Engine Room area.
corrective_action: Correct measurement of fire hose was made, fire hose was placed in the fire box to the satisfaction of the attending PSC officer.
preventive_action: The Company's Monthly Alert Bulletin will be used to circulate the subject deficiency to the fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence to show that the enclosed space entry drill records complied with the SOLAS requirements.
description_overview: The drill was for Steering gear failure.
immediate_causes: The space drill report was immediately corrected.
root_cause_analysis: The record keeping was not adequate.
corrective_action: After the deficiency was raised, a training for the crew for the enclosed space rescue was carried out and the initial drill record was updated to reflect the actions taken.
preventive_action: The Master was instructed to discuss this matter at the next safety meeting to analyze the risks and consequences of this omission.

deficiency_finding: The certificate will be re-issued with a new format by the end of the year.
description_overview: Load lines - ICLL 2003 amend.
immediate_causes: English and Chinese are not accepted as working languages by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: A reminder in the survey report.
corrective_action: The relevant certificates should be updated in time according to the requirements of the flag state.
preventive_action: Strengthen the safety responsibility education of the crew, implement the requirements of SMS "Instruction for ship certificate management", and organize relevant personnel to learn.

deficiency_finding: D.C power was found out of work.
description_overview: Due to the joining crew, the cabin was devoid of bed sheets.
immediate_causes: The damaged wire clips were not secured.
root_cause_analysis: Standard procedures or instructions.
corrective_action: The power supply wire connection was damaged.
preventive_action: DC power is checked every week.

deficiency_finding: Some endorsement by flag state of crew member is not signed by the holder.
description_overview: The cargo ship safety equipment certificate stated that the navigation equipment was in good working condition, as it was seen by the inspector.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The crew members' signature was taken.
preventive_action: Before signing the AOA, all crew members need to have their certificates verified.

deficiency_finding: Multiple M.E. alarms are permanently off.
description_overview: During the PSCO inspection, there were multiple alarm reposes.
immediate_causes: As per the maker design, deviation of M.E. exhaust valve is necessary.
root_cause_analysis: Take the M.E. exhaust deviation to the finish with the engine position in mind.
corrective_action: The maker design was found in the manual.
preventive_action: No action is required as per the maker design.

deficiency_finding: There is a show called BWTS.
description_overview: The treatment plant has a permanent alarm.
immediate_causes: Failure to check tools prior to use or use of faulty equipment is a human factor.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of situational awareness is a human factor.
corrective_action: The item no.1 was rectified.
preventive_action: As per manufacturer instructions, C/O and ETO should monitor and check BWTS regularly.

deficiency_finding: The low voltage alarm that occurred when switch the power source from main to batteries was caused by the inadequate capacity of batteries found during inspection.
description_overview: The magnetic compass is out of order.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Equipment supervisor inspection is only a formality.
corrective_action: Ensure sufficient battery capacity by replacing all batteries immediately.
preventive_action: The person in charge of the equipment should strengthen the inspection and maintenance of the ship's safety equipment, discover and eliminate equipment faults in time, and ensure the safe and normal operation of the equipment.

deficiency_finding: There is a section pipe at the M/E H.T cooling fresh water main.
description_overview: A duplicate set of fire control plans or a booklet containing such plans will be permanently stored in a weathertight enclosure outside the deckhouse for the assistance of shore-side fire-fighting personnel.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer's failure to schedule the maintenance work was the root cause of the abnormality.
corrective_action: The pipe at the gasket was painted.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer was told to schedule maintenance work at an earlier stage.

deficiency_finding: Wetted through the oil.
description_overview: The drain cover is soaked in oil.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The oil soaked lagging of the primary drain tank cover was renewed.
preventive_action: All hot surfaces are checked foragging material.

deficiency_finding: Shore Based Maintenance Contract expired.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: Instructions were given for the post to be on the bridge.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector insisted on writing the deficiency because the document was not posted on the bridge in the GMDSS area.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: There is a broken window on deck A.
description_overview: SOLAS Chapter II-1 is referred to as Ref. SOLAS Chapter II-1
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: People are related.
corrective_action: Replacement window glass.
preventive_action: The crew was told to carefully handling the equipment and immediately report any defects.

deficiency_finding: Fresh provisions were insufficient for the intended voyage.
description_overview: The inspector's comment was acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew went to the local supermarket on the same date of the PSC inspection, however, they did not return to the vessel until after the inspection.
corrective_action: Provide before departure and arrange provisions list to meet it.
preventive_action: The stock provision should be arranged before the ship's schedule is suddenly changed.

deficiency_finding: The insulation of the 220V panel is low.
description_overview: galley equipment is not operational after the emergency stop.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: 220V and 440V insulation was tested prior to arrival in the port, but a grounding on cargo hold lighting in entrance to cargo hold no.1 was found at the time of inspection.
corrective_action: On site prior to disembarkation of PSCO.
preventive_action: In case of low insulation, the 220 V electric feeder panel should be checked regularly by the master.

deficiency_finding: Medical fitness for a second engineer who isn't on board.
description_overview: A drill has been conducted in order to complete the mission.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: After the 2nd engineer boarded the vessel, a black and white copy of the medical certificate was provided.
corrective_action: The original medical certificate was given before the departure from Port of Boryeong.
preventive_action: Section 3 Management of Crew Qualifications and Certificates and Section 4 Medical certificates should be provided to the all fleets, in the Crew Management, as requested by the revision of the phrase.

deficiency_finding: There was oil under the diesel generators and the main engine foundation area.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: The directions are not understood.
corrective_action: The subject vessel became the Technical and Safety Managers of Staff Centre Shipmanagement on August 12th, 2022.
preventive_action: The actions have been completed and considered to be effective.

deficiency_finding: There is a key person who can demonstrate the test on DC power.
description_overview: The inspector asked the 3rd officer to demonstrate the procedure for sending the test message, but he couldn't explain the procedure for changing-over from AC to DC power.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The deck officer was not familiar with the procedure for changing-over the GMDSS station from AC to DC power.
corrective_action: Master briefed the 3rd officer about the correct procedure for sending a test message.
preventive_action: The Master conducted a training session with all of the OOW's.

deficiency_finding: The contact information of the authority in the seafarer's country of residence was not available.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: Even if validation of certificate was met according to company requirement, some crew's medical certificate was not meet U.K rule.
root_cause_analysis: After joining multi-country crew members, the documents were not updated in time.
corrective_action: To update the contact information of the complaint procedure, contact the company immediately.
preventive_action: To be familiar with the requirement of the convention, training and guidance should be enhanced.

deficiency_finding: Cargo ship safety equipment form E was not properly filled.
description_overview: After receiving a new electronic certificate last month, the old certificate was not removed from the file.
immediate_causes: The human factor.
root_cause_analysis: The insufficiency of communication between different organizations is a system cause.
corrective_action: Lloyd Register confirmed that the form is issued in line with the requirements for this specific vessel and no amendments are required.
preventive_action: Observation and classification society clarification was discussed on board and in the office.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection there was no indication of Enclosed Space.
description_overview: At the time of inspection, familiarisation is not required.
immediate_causes: The gangway safety marks notice board is displayed on the upper side of the gangway but not on the lower platform.
root_cause_analysis: Enclosed space safety and marking procedures were neglected.
corrective_action: Space entrances were marked by the crew.
preventive_action: If needed, the crew should check the marks and renew in the future.

deficiency_finding: There are leaks in the cargo hatch covers of CH No. 5 FWD and AFT S/S.
description_overview: Bulk carriers add safety measures.
immediate_causes: The previous voyage was laden and the cargo holds couldn't be accessed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: Required repair kits and spare cylinders were ordered and will be received at the next port.
preventive_action: All findings are sent to the company's fleet to carry out safety meetings and avoid reoccurrence.

deficiency_finding: There is a broken window.
description_overview: From the main steering position, the horizontal field of vision will extend from right to left on each side of the ship.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The window was broken.
corrective_action: The new glass was delivered on the 21st of July.
preventive_action: This observation was shared with other vessels in the fleet to raise awareness.

deficiency_finding: The pilot ladder was parted and the ship side railing was damaged.
description_overview: The pilot ladder was parted and the ship side railing was damaged.
immediate_causes: The speaker got damaged because of rain water and the cable connection didn't work properly.
root_cause_analysis: According to the PMS, failure to perform maintenance.
corrective_action: The railing was damaged and the painting was parted.
preventive_action: It was necessary to organize relevant personnel to learn the procedure for maintenance and management of ship and equipment and the instruction for ship maintenance.

deficiency_finding: The second officer is not familiar with the code.
description_overview: The second officer is not familiar with the code.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: As part of joining familiarization, the second officer was briefed on ship specific security duties, but he was not familiar with the use of SSAS button.
corrective_action: The use of SSAS button was demonstrated to the satisfaction of the PSC Inspector by the second officer.
preventive_action: Training was carried out for all crew to be familiar with the SSAS.

deficiency_finding: The temperature in freezers and cold boxes was not updated.
description_overview: There are chemicals found under the main staircase in the upper deck.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Cook forgot to record the temperature.
corrective_action: Instructions were given to Cook to be more careful since monitoring the temperatures of the freezers is fundamental to preserve the good condition of the frozen provisions and eliminates the risks of poor material used for the preparation of healthy meals.
preventive_action: Master and C/O were told to be more careful during the galley / provision store inspections after the unfortunate incident.

deficiency_finding: Fire doors are in fire resisting divisions.
description_overview: Fire doors that are self-closing are not closing properly.
immediate_causes: Liaise with the company to get the fire-maintenance program for the fire doors.
root_cause_analysis: The fire doors that didn't close completely were neglected by the crews and kept open.
corrective_action: The obstruction was removed and the tension of the self-closing door was adjusted.
preventive_action: The importance of fire doors will be taught to all crews.

deficiency_finding: The signalling lamp battery was found discarded.
description_overview: The battery charge was off at the test.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given and the deficiency was fixed on-site during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The battery for the lamp was charged according to the schedule, but it wasn't getting power.
corrective_action: The power from the battery was restored to the outer port after the terminal was connected.
preventive_action: The Master held a Safety Meeting where all findings were discussed.

deficiency_finding: There is a broken window.
description_overview: From the main steering position, the horizontal field of vision will extend from right to left on each side of the ship.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The window was broken.
corrective_action: The new glass was delivered on the 21st of July.
preventive_action: This observation was shared with other vessels in the fleet to raise awareness.

deficiency_finding: There are damaged electrical connections on the main deck.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: The covers of the receptacle were damaged when the cargo light was taken off.
corrective_action: There is a damaged cover on the main deck.
preventive_action: C/E conducted education to all engineer about check risk of elctrical receptacle and terminal and maintain method of electrical connection as per the SMP- 30.

deficiency_finding: There is a Certificate of Documentary evidence of financial security for repatriation that is not posted.
description_overview: A valid certificate for financial security was not put in the officer and crew mess room as requested by the inspector.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of this deficiency lies in inadequate familiarization of the senior officers with DMLC Part II, which states that "the certificate shall be posted in a conspicuous place on board where it is available to all seafarers."
corrective_action: The document was posted in the ratings and officers messrooms.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company took the following measures: - The deficiency was discussed onboard with all Crew during the Safety Meeting carried out after the inspection presenting the certificate and DMLC Part II and notifying all Crew that the Certificate of Financial Security relating to shipowners was

deficiency_finding: The current area of operation is not receiving maritime safety information from Inmarsat-C.
description_overview: The current area of operation is not receiving maritime safety information from Inmarsat-C.
immediate_causes: The EGC did not have a save area for Navarea.
root_cause_analysis: The EGC did not have a save area for Navarea.
corrective_action: The area setting was changed to the East of Australia.
preventive_action: The NAVAREA setting should be changed to avoid similar issues in the future.

deficiency_finding: Load line markings on the deck are not painted in the same color.
description_overview: Load line markings on the deck are not painted in the same color.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: The inspections or routines not done so effectively were caused by the long sea passages and shorter stay at the port.
corrective_action: The deck line was painted with contrasting colors after departure from the port.
preventive_action: Job code-12283, draft and marking monthly routine exist in PMS and therefore no further preventive action is required.

deficiency_finding: The position fixing intervals are not as per the plan.
description_overview: The same devices observed for 3 MSW cooling pumps and function is not confirmed.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to record rest hours.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: The passage plan was reviewed and approved by the master.
preventive_action: This observation has been shared with other vessels.

deficiency_finding: The auxiliary engine found oil leaking from the F.O filter.
description_overview: There was no fitness equipment in the gym.
immediate_causes: A spare bottle of the SCBA was partially filled.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient time for maintenance and arrival preparation.
corrective_action: The oil stain from the F.O filter was checked by the chief engineer and immediately corrected by the PSC officer on board.
preventive_action: During the monthly safety meeting, the issue was brought to the attention of the officers and ratings.

deficiency_finding: One fire team member entered the fire scene with a closed BA bottle, belt with the axe was worn under the jacket, and they were unable to use the axe if needed.
description_overview: There is a quick-closing valve for the generator oil inlet.
immediate_causes: The fireman wasn't dressed in the right way.
root_cause_analysis: Several drills were done in the previous months, but they were not effective.
corrective_action: The drill was repeated several times prior to the vessel's departure to ensure a smooth execution.
preventive_action: The company will communicate the raised deficiency to all Fleet vessels so as the responsible for the task shipboard management personnel to become aware of what had happened, aiming to avoid re

deficiency_finding: The requiment safety certificate was issued by the ship classification society under authorization from the ship's flag of Hong Kong, which gave the deadline for repairing the equipment.
description_overview: The X Band radar was not working during the inspection and the ship classification society issued a requiment safety certificate.
immediate_causes: The manual was endorsed by the classification society and there was no instructions available to make sure it was approved by the class.
root_cause_analysis: The equipment malfunctioned due to the faulty TR control unit.
corrective_action: The X- Band Radar was found to be operating normally after the repairs were done.
preventive_action: From where repeat/ significant observations are selected for inclusion in periodic QHSE/Vetting bulletin for promulgation among all vessels across the fleet, this observation will be included in our database.

deficiency_finding: There was a self-closing device between the flat glass level gauge and the lub oil settling tank.
description_overview: There was a self-closing device between the flat glass level gauge and the lub oil settling tank.
immediate_causes: Unsafe conditions include failure to follow maintenance standards, guards inadequate, and self-closing device kept open.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of compliance with company requirements.
corrective_action: During the inspection, the self-closing device was repaired.
preventive_action: Master was instructed to thoroughly discuss the finding and corrective actions during the next schedule.

deficiency_finding: There are two part A/C units that are not equivalent to the one through which they pass and are not fitted with closing arrangements.
description_overview: The master failed to report the malfunction of the ship compass gyro.
immediate_causes: The agent didn't report to the PSC office because he didn't receive the letter from the flag.
root_cause_analysis: The company delivered three air condition units, which were fitted by the ship's crew, as an additional effort to maintain proper working / living condition within the Master's cabin / office and the wheelhouse.
corrective_action: The vessel completed the requested repairs to the satisfaction of the attending Class Surveyor at the next port of call in Singapore on 26/01/2019.
preventive_action: Master discussed the deficiency's nature and contributed factors during the next monthly safety meeting for all crewmembers awareness and attention to make sure that the installation of any external equipment or machinery does not withdraw any relevant rule or regulation.

deficiency_finding: There is a pipe between the engine room and the gear room.
description_overview: The inspector believes that the marking does not comply with the requirements of SOLAS XI-1/3.
immediate_causes: Ladders for liferaft are due for a shore strength test.
root_cause_analysis: The maintenance procedure was not followed.
corrective_action: The anti-fire material was used to block the pipe.
preventive_action: Train all crew the FJDS-SP-EL 10-04C ship's Precautionary Inspection, Maintenance Period and Distribution.

deficiency_finding: The person is a scrubber.
description_overview: There are a lot of salt and acid scale deposits on the scrubber.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
corrective_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: There is a search and signalling lamp on a side-bridge.
description_overview: Daylight signaling lamp is not in good working condition, the mirror is missing, and the handle is broken.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: When engaged on international voyages, all ships of over 150 tons gross ton will have an efficient daylight signaling lamp which is not dependent on the ship's main source.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was reminded of the importance of having a sound signalling lamp.

deficiency_finding: There was nothing visible from the Engine Room side.
description_overview: The log book is not verified by the master.
immediate_causes: The ship's hull has a'scratch' measuring approximately 3mm deep and 700mm long, which was confirmed by an inspection from inside the engine room.
root_cause_analysis: There is no sign of welding or hot work on the inside of the ship, which is why the PSC Officer referred to the visible sign of corrosion as a "burn mark".
corrective_action: The inspector was adamant that the matter be reported to Class, despite a photograph showing that there was no evidence of a previous repair or welding mark.
preventive_action: The photographs show that only a cosmetic upgrade is required, which has already been completed.

deficiency_finding: There was excessive Hull Growth on the stern and port side of the vessel.
description_overview: There was excessive Hull Growth on the stern and port side of the vessels.
immediate_causes: Due to the short port stay at Onsan, S. Korea, the UWC was canceled and Underwater Cleaning was carried out at Yeosu.
root_cause_analysis: Barnacles and other fouling organisms growth is excessive due to long stay at port and anchorage.
corrective_action: The UWC and Hull inspection was done at Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
preventive_action: In laden condition, under water cleaning must be done without fail.

deficiency_finding: The instrument is not approved by the administration.
description_overview: The loading instrument computer is used for other administrative issues and is not dedicated for stability information.
immediate_causes: The substandard condition of the deck was observed by PSCO during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: As per item 2.
corrective_action: The certificate was approved on behalf of the administration.
preventive_action: As per item 2.

deficiency_finding: Rescue Boat Painter is not connected to Rescue Boat.
description_overview: Rescue boat davit slewing is slow.
immediate_causes: The ship staff missed out on connecting the painter line after they disconnected the rescue boat.
root_cause_analysis: There is a requirement that the Painter should always be connected to the Rescue Boat.
corrective_action: The PSCO instructed Person In Charged to connect the painter to the Rescue Boat.
preventive_action: The Rescue Boat has equipment listed in the Finished Plan/Drawing.

deficiency_finding: The fish store room temperature was -12 degree centigrade.
description_overview: There is ice in the Fish room due to high temperature and humidity.
immediate_causes: Insufficient review instructions.
root_cause_analysis: When entering and exiting the fish room, the galley crew left the door open for a long time.
corrective_action: The temperature in the fish store room was lowered when the fish room door was closed.
preventive_action: The company will have a SHEQ meeting in January with the results of the inspection in February. After the meeting, those informations will be distributed to all company fleet vessel with lesson and learned.

deficiency_finding: The main fire line isolation valve was not closing at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The stanchions for securing cargo on the main deck are in bad shape.
immediate_causes: The excessive paint of the valve needs to be identified.
root_cause_analysis: The maintenance plan for the vessel is going forward with the cooperation of the crew and the Technical Department.
corrective_action: The paint was removed, the valve's cover was opened, grease was applied and the deficiency was marked on the report.
preventive_action: The shaft of the valves must remain clean and un-painted if maintenance is to be done.

deficiency_finding: There is no instruction in the use of radio life-saving equipment.
description_overview: It took the crew more than 20 minutes to lower the boat.
immediate_causes: Master was unable to give the required documents and information at the time of inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of control and awareness is the underlying cause of inadequate information in the ship's muster list.
corrective_action: The instructions on the use of Radio for Life-Saving appliances have been updated.
preventive_action: The muster list was updated with the instructions for the radio test.

deficiency_finding: HULL CRACKING IS A CONSEQUENCE OF COLLISION WITH A BARGE DURING BUNKER OPERATION.
description_overview: There are numerous pipe support on the main deck that are cracked and Wasted.
immediate_causes: There were 6 pieces of pipe support that were corrosive and 3 that werecracked due to insufficient maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Green Pearl was damaged due to the inability of the Bunker barge to maneuver.
corrective_action: The ship's damages were repaired at the shipyard.
preventive_action: After repairs were done at Las Palmas Shipyard, deficiency was issued by the PSC officer.

deficiency_finding: Not carried out as required by the ship's voyage plan is the ship's position fixing.
description_overview: Chapter 6 - navigation and bridge procedures and chapter 6e - additional navigation procedures for ships fitted with ECDIS provide guidance to the ship's staff.
immediate_causes: Crew carelessness or improper record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel's passage when approaching the berth, as highlighted in the subject deficiency, was planned for monitoring of the position via LOP's and Parallel Indexing techniques.
corrective_action: The manual fixes were shown to PSCO by 3/Off on the back-up ECDIS.
preventive_action: The company's navigation procedures were also discussed in detail, and the ship's staff confirmed their understanding.

deficiency_finding: Fire protection systems are being operated.
description_overview: The master instructed the crew to get more training on how to operate the CO2 system in an emergency.
immediate_causes: The Filipino crew members did not comply with the company's complaint procedures.
root_cause_analysis: The crew members who were questioned by the PSC officer were not assigned to FF duties.
corrective_action: After the completion of the PSC inspection, the vessel's Master and Chief Officer gathered all crew members and demonstrated the procedure of emergency operation of the CO2 system, which was requested by each crew member separately.
preventive_action: Fleet vessels' Masters were told of the finding and were requested to teach all crew members how to respond and act in an emergency, regardless of their assigned emergency duties.

deficiency_finding: The main unit of the public address is out of order.
description_overview: Since the system was on all the time and the main panel is located in the equipment room which is not monitored, the staff missed the power indication light failure on the main panel.
immediate_causes: The power indicator lamp failure was not noticed.
root_cause_analysis: The PA System main console is located in the electrical equipment room.
corrective_action: The power inlet light has been replaced.
preventive_action: It will be included in the PA System weekly/monthly checks as well as the main panel in the electrical equipment room.

deficiency_finding: Smoke sampling fire detection system for cargo holds line 3 is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The cargo holds line 3 has a smoke sampling fire detection system.
immediate_causes: The equipment is defective.
root_cause_analysis: People are related.
corrective_action: The crew successfully demonstrated the test by changing the Airflow indicator for the line 3 wire system.
preventive_action: The D-25 (Cargo Hold CO2 Inspection Report) 3-monthly report and the O-05 (Loading Operations Planning Checklist) are considered adequate if they were conducted properly.

deficiency_finding: The port and starboard bridge clear view was found at the time of inspection.
description_overview: Oil gas can not be kept tight by the bridge doors.
immediate_causes: The bridge communication unit was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: The glass of C.V.S was found to be dirty.
corrective_action: The Chief officer ordered the Deck crew to clean the glass.
preventive_action: Officer in charge was advised by a master to check and clean frequently.

deficiency_finding: There was no security drill after 7 crew members were changed.
description_overview: While scrutinizing the drill records, the PSCO noted that there was a crew change of more than 25% and the vessel had conducted an abandon ship drill and fire drill within 24 hours of the crew change.
immediate_causes: There was an isolated lapse on complying with drill requirements.
root_cause_analysis: There was an isolated lapse on complying with drill requirements.
corrective_action: After obtaining terminal permission, the vessel conducted a security drill.
preventive_action: The drills and trainings were conducted as per the company procedure after the master was debriefed.

deficiency_finding: On board training and instructions.
description_overview: The SOLAS training manual is incomplete and not vessel specific.
immediate_causes: The ship's plans for recovery of person from the water were not mentioned due to lack of review and supervision by the master and the person in charge.
root_cause_analysis: The SOLAS training manual contains the recovery of rescue boat general instruction.
corrective_action: The specific instruction was attached to the SOLAS training manual.
preventive_action: The crews should check the SOLAS training manual for the specific equipment.

deficiency_finding: There is an error of the gyro compass on the bridge.
description_overview: The compass developed an error of more than 4 degrees.
immediate_causes: The bridge daily checks were not complied with.
root_cause_analysis: The bridge gyro repeater was not included in the pre-arrival checks because of its Synchronization.
corrective_action: The equipment was checked out by the senior officers and the attending surveyor.
preventive_action: The bridge team and OOW's were reminded to carry out the required checks on bridge equipment diligently, master to verify the completion of checks prior to signing the pre-arrival checklist.

deficiency_finding: When emergency shutdowns are activated from the port and starboard manifolds, cargo pumps do not shut down.
description_overview: The importance of this matter was already recognized by the safety management system.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of test matrix.
root_cause_analysis: Failing to follow rules and regulations is an inadequate assessment of needs and risks.
corrective_action: Malfunctions on the buttons are fixed by renewing the contactor in the electrical panel to ensure the proper functioning of the emergency shutdown system.
preventive_action: Malfunctions on the buttons are fixed by renewing the contactor in the electrical panel to ensure the proper functioning of the emergency shutdown system.

deficiency_finding: The wages below the required wages are found in various Seafarer Employment Agreements.
description_overview: The Seafarer Employment Agreements (SEAs) were inspected by the PSC at Wilhelmshaven, Germany, where few discrepancies were observed.
immediate_causes: Same was not immediately presented to the PSC Inspector, which resulted in the PSC deficiency.
root_cause_analysis: The office IT team updated the wages in the system after learning about the new CBA.
corrective_action: All officers and ratings new revised agreements have been sent to the vessel, which has been signed and accepted by all seafarers.
preventive_action: New wages will be adopted as soon as possible and all ships will be informed of the same.

deficiency_finding: The main engine is the Propulsion and auxiliary machinery.
description_overview: The PSCO found that the ME fuel quick closing valve can close quickly.
immediate_causes: The NO.3 G/E quik was not active when tested.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance of the quick closing valve.
corrective_action: The PSCO confirmed that the quick close valve was in good working order after it was cleaned and oiled.
preventive_action: Chief Engineer will keep a close watch to make sure that the maintenance schedule is followed strictly.

deficiency_finding: Third mate forgot to record fire and abandon drill.
description_overview: The abandon ship drill and fire drill were not recorded in the log book.
immediate_causes: The third mate was not aware of the special requirements of the Nav logbook regrading drill record.
root_cause_analysis: The third mate was not familiar with the requirements of the drill record.
corrective_action: At the major event column, add abandon and fire drill.
preventive_action: After the drill is complete, the drill record should be recorded in the logbook.

deficiency_finding: The Gas Detectors malfunctioned.
description_overview: The Master has acknowledged that the plastic drainpipe for the no. 2 steering gear had aged.
immediate_causes: Lack of immigration is a problem.
root_cause_analysis: They were damaged due to the wrong operation.
corrective_action: Two sets of new Gas Detectors with Calibration Certificates were purchased.
preventive_action: The crew on maintenance of the gas detector has been trained.

deficiency_finding: The latest wage scale as agreed in the Collective Bargaining Agreement is not applied in the seafarer employment agreements.
description_overview: The payroll and wage adjustment payment for the month of January will be included in February payroll when the Hong Kong CBA wage scale is implemented.
immediate_causes: Engine Cadet has exceeded 44 hours of work with a total of 118.6 hours excess OT since he joined the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: System factors are non conformance to Legislative rules or regulations, Seaway Restrictions, Inadequate SHE Control, Wear and Tear, and not related to Lack of Maintenance.
corrective_action: The Seafarer is expected to work in excess of normal working hours as required for the safe and efficient operation of the business.
preventive_action: Monitoring/planning onboard cadets training, work hours and keep relevant documentation readily available during a PSC inspection in order to avoid any remarks or non-conformities noted on the report.

deficiency_finding: Affected internals include side longitudinals, web frames and associated brackets in the way of the tank.
description_overview: As per the investigation report.
immediate_causes: The lever in the meat room was damaged when one of my crew accidentally hit it.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel's collision with M/V Planet Skipper occurred in the Aegean Sea and caused the shell plates to be damaged.
corrective_action: A Condition of Class was imposed in the Class Survey Status Report as a result of the occasional survey performed at the port of Mykonos.
preventive_action: Refer to the incident investigation report.

deficiency_finding: There are many places where there are no necessary supplies.
description_overview: The pilot ladder was parted and the ship side railing was damaged.
immediate_causes: Poor housekeeping.
root_cause_analysis: As per the cleaning schedule, the ship's crew didn't make round check regularly.
corrective_action: Inspector rectified the items placed at the common washrooms.
preventive_action: Supplies are in the common washrooms if you hold shipboard education to review the safety and hygiene check list.

deficiency_finding: The signaling lamp doesn't work with the emergency battery.
description_overview: The lamp doesn't work with the emergency battery.
immediate_causes: The battery was replaced during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There is inadequate maintenance and preventive assessment of needs.
corrective_action: Requisition was raised and the vessel was supplied with a new battery.
preventive_action: A circular case is distributed to all fleet.

deficiency_finding: Engine room auxiliary generator No.2, No.3 bed plate and No.3 Purifier lubricating oil pump have oil in them.
description_overview: Due to crew being occupied with port activities and duties, old mattress was not taken out of hospital in time.
immediate_causes: The fire door insulation is poor.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not clean up the scene carefully.
corrective_action: The leaking gasket on the No.3 oil pump has been replaced with onboard spare parts.
preventive_action: Master/CE will conduct more practical shipboard inspection for actual condition verification after all engine crew have been educated for practical shipboard maintenance procedure.
