deficiency_finding: There is one light on the open deck.
description_overview: There is a navigation.
immediate_causes: An internal audit is planned for the earliest port.
root_cause_analysis: The person in charge didn't check the working condition of the light on the deck.
corrective_action: Check the lamp's working condition by changing it.
preventive_action: If there is an abnormal working condition, try to find the reason and change the bulb or repair it in time.

deficiency_finding: The bridge team couldn't locate the emergency light for the GMDSS station.
description_overview: On 7th of August there will be a test without records.
immediate_causes: Light was not working.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient checks.
corrective_action: The light was repaired after the power cable was cut.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels will get feedback.

deficiency_finding: Emergency preparation.
description_overview: The fire drill showed lack of communication, control and appropriate response.
immediate_causes: Human Factors are not applicable.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient training is one of the human factors.
corrective_action: The entire ship staff was briefed by the vessel manager.
preventive_action: Upon the vessel's arrival at the discharge port in China, an auditor will be assigned to carry out Internal Audit of the vessel and training of entire ship staff.

deficiency_finding: Outside light is partly dirty.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Didn't report the broken equipment to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The Company has established procedures to ensure that vessels are maintained in accordance with the provisions of the PMS.
corrective_action: The crew cleaned the globe after the PSC Officer pointed out the deficiency.
preventive_action: The necessary corrective and preventive action plan has been issued by the company.

deficiency_finding: The entries of the engine log book did not comply with the requirements.
description_overview: The entries of the engine log book are not in line with the requirements.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The 2nd engineer didn't make entry into the engine log book for ME because of berthing maneuvering soon after he overhauled the main engine at anchorage.
corrective_action: Chief engineer reviewed the engine log book and verified it was satisfactory before signing.
preventive_action: The training was carried out by the chief engineer.

deficiency_finding: The onboard complain procedure states that a placard should be posted in the officers and crew messroom with contact information of the competent authority of the seafarer's country.
description_overview: The onboard complaint procedures don't specify contact information for the competent authority in the seafarers country of residence, and the name of a person or persons onboard the ship who can, on a confidential basis, provide seafarers with impartial advise on their complaint and otherwise assist them in following the compliant procedures available
immediate_causes: Training/familiarization records were not presented during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The complaint procedure was not read and understood by the officer.
corrective_action: The contact details of the designated crew member were posted immediately in Appendix 1 of the manual.
preventive_action: All crew members were trained on the complaint procedure.

deficiency_finding: The external access door to the Accommodation B deck entrance was detached at the time of inspection.
description_overview: It is not ready for use.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: As a result of remote investigation, it was found that maintenance was in progress and that the crew failed to report it to the inspector.
corrective_action: After inspection, the deficiency was fixed by fitting new bolts.
preventive_action: The fleet will get a new circular about proper maintenance.

deficiency_finding: There is no protection cover for the emergency light in the generator room.
description_overview: There is a safety guard on the pump.
immediate_causes: The original cargo cleaning pump was not fully guard by the safety net.
root_cause_analysis: During regular inspections, I had to identify the missing protection cover for the Emergency Light.
corrective_action: EO was replaced with a complete light assembly.
preventive_action: A training session was held for all ship staff on the importance of thorough inspections and reporting of any defects to safety officer.

deficiency_finding: Hatch cover operation has a leak.
description_overview: There was an oil stain under the drain valve of the oil tank for the Hatch Cover system.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not pick up the case of improper inspection prior to the day of PSC inspection.
corrective_action: There were no leaks after the cleaning of the oil resisdues.
preventive_action: Crew were told to keep a close eye on the station condition in line with the instructions from e-PMS.

deficiency_finding: The SOLAS requirements for maximum walking distance from any point to the nearest portable fire extinguishers are not complied with by the fire extinguisher arrangement for engine room.
description_overview: One two-way vhf radiotelphone apparatus is missing.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: As per SOLAS requirements, additional fire extinguishers must be placed in the ER.
preventive_action: The Crew was told to check the location of LSA/FFA items in ER in order to fulfill regulatory requirements.

deficiency_finding: The hours of work and rest records for engineering personnel are not always accurate.
immediate_causes: The crew takes input the work and rest hour.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of awareness of the work and rest hours.
corrective_action: All crew members were trained to record work and rest correctly.
preventive_action: All engine crew work and rest hours should be reviewed every month.

deficiency_finding: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
description_overview: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge failed to inspect the exhaust gas pipe.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't check the engine exhaust gas pipe in the lifeboat because of Marker's manual.
corrective_action: After repairing exhaust gas pipe, engines in lifeboat are tested and no leaks are found.
preventive_action: All equipment should be inspected by an experienced engineer.

deficiency_finding: A cold room with rotten fruit.
description_overview: A vegetable cold room with rotten fruit was found.
immediate_causes: There is a risk of crew health if rotten fruit is found in the vegetable room.
root_cause_analysis: The person in charge failed to properly inspect the stock of food inside the vegetable rooms and overlooked the presence of rotten fruit.
corrective_action: To ensure health crew protection, a safety meeting was held to educate all crew members to prioritize the thorough inspection of all stock items and maintain high standards of hygiene and food safety.
preventive_action: The company encourages a culture of accountability and responsibility for maintaining orderliness throughout the vessel.

deficiency_finding: Multiple closing caps on sounding pipes, temperature monitoring pipes and bilge monitoring pipes were found in the course of PSC Inspection and not able to be secured in position.
description_overview: According to the PSC report, there were many violations of the minimum rest hours in the month of January and February.
immediate_causes: Load Line requirements are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: There is a shortage of stores.
corrective_action: The crew replaced the sounding pipes caps with plastic ones after they were stolen.
preventive_action: The updated guidance for crew was provided by the Company as part of preventive actions.

deficiency_finding: The crew modified the receipt of garbage disposal.
description_overview: The crew modified the receipt of garbage disposal.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The data on the garbage quantity on the receipt was not clear and the figure was rewritten by the related crew without signature and instruction.
corrective_action: There is an amendment to the seal for confirmation.
preventive_action: To prevent the phenomenon of modification again, the documents should be confirmed face to face in the future.

deficiency_finding: The emergency fire pump has a priming unit that isn't functioning.
description_overview: There are excessive belts on between the motor and compressor.
immediate_causes: The Emergency Fire Pump was not running when the PSCO went to inspect it.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: The engineers found that the fire line was already pressurized so they disengaged the priming unit.
preventive_action: The company superintendent who boarded the vessel in this port counselled and briefed the senior officers to politely explain to the PSCO the manufacturer's manual and recommendation about the Emergency Fire Pump belt, which should be in slack position when the priming unit is not engaged.

deficiency_finding: Oil and broken.
description_overview: The convention is called BWM Convention B.
immediate_causes: The inspector observed that a firefighter's neck was exposed during a mock drill.
root_cause_analysis: Due to lack of time, a task was unable to perform.
corrective_action: The first place insulation material was rectified.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels haveficiencies.

deficiency_finding: The oil trays will be marked in Mtrs.
description_overview: The capacity bead was welded on the trays.
immediate_causes: The manual was endorsed by the classification society and there was no instructions available to make sure it was approved by the class.
root_cause_analysis: The save-alls were marked and approved by the classification society with the capacities, while the inspector requested it to be marked in metric system.
corrective_action: The save-alls were stenciled in the metric system.
preventive_action: If they get faded or painted over, the vessel's stencil capacities are added to it's list.

deficiency_finding: The telephone alarm bell light was not working at the main engine room maneuver station.
description_overview: The medical fitness certificate for the Chief Cook was issued for a different reason.
immediate_causes: The alarm is weak.
root_cause_analysis: The telephone alarm bell light was not working because of the detached terminals of indicator light from the PCB.
corrective_action: The telephone alarm bell and light assembly have been replaced with a stand by spare by the ship's electrician.
preventive_action: Proper routine control and checks have been advised by the master and communication equipment will be tested regularly.

deficiency_finding: The harness doesn't fit in the escape trunk of the engine room.
description_overview: A safety harness was installed in the escape trunk.
immediate_causes: The crew placed a harness on request.
root_cause_analysis: The crew put a harness on the inspector's request.
corrective_action: The escape trunk area was brought in with a safety harness.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels have a deficiency record.

deficiency_finding: The publication is out of date.
description_overview: At the time of inspecting the publications, the manual was out of date.
immediate_causes: Ropes conditions weren't good enough.
root_cause_analysis: Do not receive it in time.
corrective_action: You can request for the next port agent or ship chandler.
preventive_action: Review and Confirmation request items that aren't supplied in time.

deficiency_finding: There is an Invalid SMCC Certificate on the ship.
description_overview: The inflatable boat is mentioned in the access manual as a means to inspect the higher parts of the Fore Peak Tank.
immediate_causes: A thorough clean-up of the provision store was conducted to organize and rearrange the food items in a neat and orderly manner.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient communication.
corrective_action: A new certificate was received during the PSC Inspection.
preventive_action: Email should be sent to the company after receiving certificates on board.

deficiency_finding: The main air horn isn't working.
description_overview: The main air horn isn't working.
immediate_causes: The Bridge A/C unit was switched off when the galley fire alarm was being tested.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge inspects and tests the broken mast air horn wire.
corrective_action: The wire rope and sheave have been tested and are in good condition.
preventive_action: The officer was briefed about the lapse.

deficiency_finding: There are two reset buttons in the chart room and radio room.
description_overview: There is a chemical and oil store.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow up rule/regulation.
corrective_action: There are two buttons in the chart and radio room that need to be removed.
preventive_action: To improve crew's safety awareness as well as continuous onboard training by office staff.

deficiency_finding: Emergency system/location of emergency installation.
description_overview: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient maintenance and supervision by the ship crew.
corrective_action: The hinges at all boxes have been repaired.
preventive_action: Maintenance schedules should be followed according to the company.

deficiency_finding: Daylight is passing through the emergency escape door.
description_overview: The fresh stock of provisions was supplied to the vessel on 18th April at San Francisco.
immediate_causes: The door wasn't closing due to Deformation.
root_cause_analysis: There is a gap in the inner seal area.
corrective_action: Escape door was adjusted and accepted by Transport Canada.
preventive_action: As part of sharing information and lessons learnt and to increase awareness, encourage crew members to be always alert and to proceed with respective inspection to ensure that in such cases are always in compliance with the practices and requirements of any load line item.

deficiency_finding: The emergency switch board has a low impedance.
description_overview: The AMSA inspector pointed out that the ship staff failed to identify the hole in the fore peak tank vent hole, however the rest of the vent heads were found to be in order.
immediate_causes: Lack of immigration is a problem.
root_cause_analysis: DEFECTIVE WATERTIGHT RECEPTACLES AT FORE PART DECK LEAD TO WATER INGRESS.
corrective_action: There are new effluents with a new spade.
preventive_action: Check the electrical parts in the deck for signs of corroding and water intrusion, which can lead to low INSULATION.

deficiency_finding: The convention requires that the principal ballast water management method used on the ship be used.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The certificate was replaced in the folder with the correct one.
preventive_action: As soon as a certificate is received, the file will be updated.

deficiency_finding: Not available in the paint locker is the sds for paint held on board.
description_overview: There was a shortage of PSC PPE in the S/G room.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were provided.
root_cause_analysis: The Material Safety Data Sheet was not prepared in the paint locker.
corrective_action: Please refer to the attached photos as evidence if you want to put the MSDS in the paint locker.
preventive_action: There will be a dedicated folder with a containing list and updated on receiving new material on board.

deficiency_finding: Safety in general.
description_overview: A potential slip trip and fall can be caused by rubber insulation mats in front of electrical panels that are not secured properly.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The rubber insulation mats in front of the electric panels were not secured.
corrective_action: tiger tape is used to secure insulation mats in front of electrical panels.
preventive_action: The Company procedure has been revised to include guidance on securing the insulation mat.

deficiency_finding: There is an unsafe opening on the surface of the platform.
description_overview: As per vessel design this platform has minimal opening near the cradle pin access area however AMSA inspector had recommended to make arrangements to protect crew from falling.
immediate_causes: There is a small opening on the side of the platform.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient design.
corrective_action: In discussion with the company, ship staff provided an extension checkered plate to the original drop-down platform to cover the opening near the boarding platform.
preventive_action: Learning from events.

deficiency_finding: There are communication equipment boxes on the island.
description_overview: PSCO observed 5 overhead lights with wiring terminated outside or a junction box located in the vicinity.
immediate_causes: Minor leaks came up due to exposure.
root_cause_analysis: The junction boxes were not maintained properly by the deck crew.
corrective_action: The junction boxes were secured with a copper sheet, screw and nuts.
preventive_action: ISM PIC will check the junction boxes on a monthly basis.

deficiency_finding: Emergency steering position communications.
description_overview: There is a 5 degree difference between the bridge compass and steering gear compass located inside the steering gear room.
immediate_causes: The crewmember failed to comply with procedures.
root_cause_analysis: There was an equipment failure between periods of inspection.
corrective_action: Technical assistance was given to resolve the issue prior to departure.
preventive_action: Crew will continue to follow company procedures and take necessary actions in case of an equipment breakdown due to wear and age.

deficiency_finding: Fireman not familiar with fireman's outfit and not carrying two-way radio.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: The unit was inspected and repaired.
root_cause_analysis: Crew complacency is due to insufficient familiarisation and training.
corrective_action: After a satisfactory result was achieved, a detailed report was submitted.
preventive_action: An issue was communicated to all vessels and additional training was provided to the crew.

deficiency_finding: The weight of the Port side is less than 4Kg.
description_overview: The QHSE team will be notified if the risk rating is high.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: During the PSC inspection, the buoy was not put back in place after being taken out for maintenance.
corrective_action: PSCO closed the deficiency after the original buoy was put back in-front of inspectors.
preventive_action: The importance of adequate inspection of all safety equipment, LSA/FFA was briefed to all crew members.

deficiency_finding: Some parts of the line were damaged.
description_overview: The crew noticed minor rust on the lines, but it did not affect the integrity of the line.
immediate_causes: Minor damages to Tank Dome seals were noted during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The crew noticed minor rust on the lines, but it did not affect the integrity of the line.
corrective_action: The maintenance of the line is expected to be completed by the end of April.
preventive_action: Existing procedures and periodic inspection ensure that defects are promptly identified and appropriate action is taken.

deficiency_finding: There is evidence that the ship board gas detector is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The boiler abnormal alarm is permanently off.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of training.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of training.
corrective_action: The manual was obtained from the manufacturer.
preventive_action: Calibration must be carried out with photographic evidences as per the manual.

deficiency_finding: Civil Liability for Bunker Oil Pollution Damage Cert is missing.
description_overview: The Bunker Oil Pollution Damage Certificate was found on board.
immediate_causes: The certificates considered of Bunker CLC not available onboard were construed as non-fulfilment of specified requirement.
root_cause_analysis: Master was not aware that the certificate was not an e- certificate and was only a colour scanned copy.
corrective_action: The Management office sent the original hard copies to the vessel.
preventive_action: If any of the original certificates is missing, the master should immediately report it to the office.

deficiency_finding: Survey out of window.
description_overview: Survey out of window.
immediate_causes: Ladders for liferaft are due for a shore strength test.
root_cause_analysis: There is a short term Cargo Ship Safety Construction Certificate that has been issued.
corrective_action: This is Force Majeure extension and survey reports will provide for vessel!
preventive_action: Keeping with the survey reports, inspection windows will be monitored with more care.

deficiency_finding: The embarkation ladder shacks don't connect with the pad eye.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: During the sea passage, the embarkation ladder shackles were disconnected to protect the rope end from exposure to the sea, but they were not reconnected after passing through an area of heavy weather.
root_cause_analysis: Life-saving appliances and firefighting equipment were not adequately controlled.
corrective_action: The Port State Control Officer accepted the corrective action report before departure.
preventive_action: Notices will be posted in the bridge if FFE and LSA are temporarily secured.

deficiency_finding: The function of safety systems.
description_overview: Emergency dewatering valve control panel on navigation bridge shows both close and open indicators at the same time.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: Evidence shows that the safety management system is not effective in ensuring compliance.
description_overview: PSCO V.V. Rusanov imposed a new deficiency during the Novorossiysk PSC inspection.
immediate_causes: Due to short passage and lack of awareness of situational importance of hygiene, the washrooms on the ship were not immediately cleaned and maintained.
root_cause_analysis: The captain of the C/O did not report the temporary repair to crack in the trunkway to the company and class in a timely manner.
corrective_action: The captain and chief officer should strengthen the route training and supervision of maintenance crews, and should require relevant crews of the ship to promptly report any damage or defects to key equipment and structures, which should be reported by the captain to the company and classification society.
preventive_action: The master and c/o asked the relative crews to regularly inspect the ship's key equipment and structures.

deficiency_finding: The Save all for the sludge and fuel oil overflow tanks air vents were damaged at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: The self-closing valves for the ME space, HFO overflow tank and cofferdam tanks were checked recently and it was suspected that they weren't closing on time.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedures.
root_cause_analysis: All air vent and coaming were checked by the PSCO.
corrective_action: The chief engineer checked for damage to the relevant area after removing the cement from the air vent.
preventive_action: The master taught the crew how to check and maintain the air vent and the overflow tanks.

deficiency_finding: The echo sounder has a shallow depth alert.
description_overview: One pressure gauge in the engine room was out of range due to inadequate maintenance.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: After testing the UKC alert value with various range, it was forgotten to return to original parameters.
corrective_action: The UKC alert value was set by the crew.
preventive_action: The consequences of not properly setting the UKC alert value are emphasized in master facilitation education training.

deficiency_finding: There are various items in the store.
description_overview: There are ventilators in the store.
immediate_causes: The ship crew doesn't have a concept of garbage management.
root_cause_analysis: Heavy loading caused the crew to move out the secured drums and lashing gears ladder and not secure them back immediately.
corrective_action: All items must be secured in the store.
preventive_action: After tasks are completed, the crew in charge has been reminded to secure items.

deficiency_finding: In the preceding months, the company has identified and taken appropriate action for rest hour violations.
description_overview: In the preceding months, the company has identified and taken appropriate action for rest hour violations.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The first engineer is not familiar with ISM.
corrective_action: Reducing the number of duty hours is one way to learn and study the rules about this field.
preventive_action: Training crew to know the rules of rest time.

deficiency_finding: The rocket parachute flare in the bridge is missing a water-resistant case.
description_overview: The distress flares were not stored in a portable container at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: In charge officer didn't secure the parachute flares back to water-resistance after inspection, just stowed in a carton box.
corrective_action: The officer in charge sealed the opening with the parachute flares.
preventive_action: Master and C/O guided duty crew in bridge to report to master when open the casing for double check.

deficiency_finding: The communication method was not completed before unloading.
description_overview: The paint room light was found unlit.
immediate_causes: The field for the phone number was blank.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient communication, improper communication method, and technique used.
corrective_action: The phone number was put in.
preventive_action: The Fleet will be reminded to insert 'N/A' instead of a blank field.

deficiency_finding: There were CO2 pipes on the deck.
description_overview: After checking on the condition of the CO2 pipes on the deck, it was confirmed that there was no leaking or broken pipes, and then the jobs of de-rusting/painting maintenance were arranged for the pipes with serious rust condition.
immediate_causes: The ship crew doesn't have a concept of garbage management.
root_cause_analysis: Improper extension of service life Windlass P/S gypsies are in poor condition and need to be renewed.
corrective_action: After checking on the condition of the CO2 pipes on the deck, it was confirmed that there was no leaking or broken pipes, and then the jobs of de-rusting/painting maintenance were arranged for the pipes with serious rust condition.
preventive_action: The instructions for inspecting of ship and its equipment were held by the shipmaster.

deficiency_finding: Garbage should be given to shore facilities.
description_overview: The Oil Record book states that the spill from the #2 HSFO (S) tank was verified by the CCS.
immediate_causes: Chemicals used to clean the toilet bowl may affect the performance of the sewage treatment plant.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not timely land on the garbage.
corrective_action: All plastic bottles were thrown into the water.
preventive_action: The Responsible Officer was reprimanded for not properly discharging his duties.

deficiency_finding: The crew doesn't know how to check and wear the breathing apparatus.
description_overview: The SCBA sets are placed in the location as per the approved fire plan for the vessel.
immediate_causes: The correct donning procedure was explained to the crew members after they were briefed on the inspector's concern.
root_cause_analysis: During the course of the inspection, PSCO was requested by the crew to conduct a fire drill in order to assess their readiness, as well as to verify that relevant equipment is in proper condition.
corrective_action: To the satisfaction of the PSCO, an additional fire drill was conducted and proper wearing and donning of the fireman outfit was verified.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the following measures have been adopted.

deficiency_finding: Fruits and vegetables are missing completely on board.
description_overview: Title3 / Regulation A 3.2.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Physical causes are listed.
corrective_action: On 14th July, the vessel received a provision.
preventive_action: Physical.

deficiency_finding: The last master review record was found on the board, but there were no records of the annual master review.
description_overview: The previous Master uploaded the document into the system prior to the due date.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient management of change.
corrective_action: The Annual Master's review of the year 2022, was printed out and filed.
preventive_action: A work order has been created to alert the vessel when the Annual Master's SMS review is due, and the requirement to attach.

deficiency_finding: At the port side, the middle draft mark and the Plimsoll mark are not fully painted.
description_overview: The vessel was taken over by technical management.
immediate_causes: The agent didn't report to the PSC office because he didn't receive the letter from the flag.
root_cause_analysis: At the time of inspection, the hull coating and hull marking was new and readable.
corrective_action: If all safety requirements are met, the draft will be re-painted on the 3rd of May at Balboa anchorage.
preventive_action: The check of the load lines marks is part of the 6 monthly routine inspection of the hull.

deficiency_finding: There was no Damage Control Plan on the bridge.
description_overview: The pilot ladder did not have a certificate on board.
immediate_causes: The Master could not locate the ship structure access manual during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The Damage Control Plan was not cited on time.
corrective_action: The Damage Control Plan was located and shown to the PSCO.
preventive_action: To increase crew awareness, additional guidance will be provided.

deficiency_finding: There is an engine international Air pollution prevention certificate.
description_overview: There is a statement of compliance for the engine international air pollution prevention certificate, but not for the EIAPP certificate.
immediate_causes: Master is responsible for the upkeep of the certificate.
root_cause_analysis: Wrong data was entered during the issuance of the certificate.
corrective_action: The EIAPP certificate was renewed with correct data.
preventive_action: The data in the EIAPP certificate is correct, according to a fleet circular sent to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: No.3 and no.4 cylinder fuel injection valve of the main engine was not recorded in the record book.
description_overview: There was no damage to the lines or the sensor.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of initial training.
root_cause_analysis: The document recording requirement was trained to the C/E.
corrective_action: The records were checked and completed by PIC and Master reported to PSCO.
preventive_action: Maintenance records should be kept and checked by leadership at intervals for compliance.

deficiency_finding: Emergency steering position communications.
description_overview: There is a 5 degree difference between the bridge compass and steering gear compass located inside the steering gear room.
immediate_causes: The crewmember failed to comply with procedures.
root_cause_analysis: There was an equipment failure between periods of inspection.
corrective_action: Technical assistance was given to resolve the issue prior to departure.
preventive_action: Crew will continue to follow company procedures and take necessary actions in case of an equipment breakdown due to wear and age.

deficiency_finding: There was no mechanical protection over the poles of the emergency batteries at the time of inspection.
description_overview: During the cable break test, the fire detection system didn't show an alarm.
immediate_causes: There was a small leak from the isolation valve during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: It was not possible for the PIC to install on the Bridge Emergency Batteries with proper protection cover.
corrective_action: The Master instructed the PIC to make a plywood cover and put it in the emergency batteries.
preventive_action: The importance of mechanical protection cover for Bridge emergency batteries was discussed in a safety meeting by the Master.

deficiency_finding: The actual voyage time was not matched by the voyage plan.
description_overview: There is a smoke detection system for cargo holds.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient monitoring.
corrective_action: The correct route chart was used to revise the voyage plan.
preventive_action: The Marine manager will check out the deficiency on a sampling basis.

deficiency_finding: There were several doors that weren't properly closing.
description_overview: The starboard side freeboard marks, forward and middle draft marks, and Plimsoll mark are not fully painted.
immediate_causes: The equipment is defective.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: The dogs were adjusted and lubricated.
preventive_action: The crew was briefed on all the deficiencies with the help of the Fleet Supremo and Internal Auditor.

deficiency_finding: There is no valid statement of compliance fuel oil consumption reporting onboard.
description_overview: The Statement of Compliance for Fuel Oil Consumption Reporting expired on May 21st, 2022.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure and update ship's certificate file timely is a standard act.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient monitoring of standard Compliance: Change of Management took place a few months ago.
corrective_action: The previous management was contacted by the ship managers and the deficiency was fixed before departure.
preventive_action: The certificate module has been updated with the fuel consumption report.

deficiency_finding: Generator engines number 1, 2, and 3 are missing.
description_overview: Fire-fighting equipment.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: There are basic and underlying causes of material failure.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed before he disembarked.
preventive_action: The instructions on the proper installation of heat insulation have been changed.

deficiency_finding: The limit switch on the rescue boat malfunctioned.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: The limit switch was stuck by frozen grease when the Rescue Boat was tested in the monthly drill.
root_cause_analysis: Acts that are unsafe.
corrective_action: The master confirmed that the limit switch was free and grease free.
preventive_action: The officer in charge of LSA should conduct weekly testing to make sure the vessel is in working condition.

deficiency_finding: There was a leak from the emergency fire pump.
description_overview: High water pressure can be caused by POLYURETHAN HOSE FROM PUMP TO GAUGE.
immediate_causes: There are bulbs on the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of control.
corrective_action: All of the pantyhose on the emergency fire pump should be replaced.
preventive_action: Responsible officers and engineers have been warned about the import of PMS.

deficiency_finding: The main generator in E/R shut down due to 2/E incorrect operation.
description_overview: The operation was not tested correctly by the PIC 2/E.
immediate_causes: After the maneuvering drill of the life boat on 26th Oct., the No.1 battery was not adequately charged, which led to critical equipment failure.
root_cause_analysis: The Emergency generator automatic start simulation test was not familiar to the PIC 2/E.
corrective_action: Engineers were educated on how to test the emergency generator's automatic start simulation.
preventive_action: C/E will teach engineers how to test the emergency generator's automatic start simulation.

deficiency_finding: There are two working lights on the main switchboard.
description_overview: The insulation for the E/R switchboard is low.
immediate_causes: The tube light for illuminating the main switch board wasn't working.
root_cause_analysis: The light was not identified and fixed in a timely manner.
corrective_action: The defect was fixed immediately after the lights were checked.
preventive_action: The lights on the main switchboard panel will be checked daily by the Chief Engineer.

deficiency_finding: Large amount of plastic garbage was found in drums and the store at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: Vegetables in the freezer room were rotten.
immediate_causes: Garbage management plan and mandatory regulations were not complied with by the crew.
root_cause_analysis: Garbage from received stores and provisions was mishandled.
corrective_action: The garbage was taken to the shore facility.
preventive_action: Garbage Management Plan for properly disposal of garbage was delivered to crew.

deficiency_finding: The symbol Mark for E/G is missing.
description_overview: All the vessels need to have a certain number of mandatory, hazard, safety, fire, direction and prohibitory signs.
immediate_causes: Lack of knowledge is one of the reasons for inadequate training and leadership.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge is one of the reasons for inadequate training and leadership.
corrective_action: The symbols should be posted immediately by the safety officer.
preventive_action: The crew was given training about the importance of the safety signs.

deficiency_finding: The NOx influencing parts for the engines are not available onboard.
description_overview: The correct nozzle ID was marked on the record.
immediate_causes: The inadequate record is due to the failure to follow SMS.
root_cause_analysis: All changes affecting the designated engine parameters, including adjustments, parts replacements and modifications to engine parts, shall be recorded chronologically in an engine's record book of engine parameters.
corrective_action: The relevant service reports are available and documentation has been amended accordingly.
preventive_action: Sharing Lessons Learned We have shared the deficiency with the fleet to ensure that the NOx record book is kept up to date, independent of the executing party of the maintenance.

deficiency_finding: The insulations on the pipes were missing and soaked.
description_overview: The lagging got dirty during the maintenance and the staff missed out on replacing it.
immediate_causes: There is insufficient planning of the maint.
root_cause_analysis: There was no supervision by the C/E and 2/E.
corrective_action: Replacing and installing missing insulation.
preventive_action: Engine Team will be instructed to report any anomalies.

deficiency_finding: There is a rusty deck.
description_overview: Cross decks were found to be rusty during the inspection.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human Factors: Lack of planning, lack of motivation, inadequate inspection and Maintenance.
corrective_action: Cross decks are hydro blasted and painted.
preventive_action: Periodical checks for the vessel's condition will be carried out by the vessel manager.

deficiency_finding: There are two cleats on one securing spot in the No. 2 cargo hold hatch cover.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: The old chock was not replaced in time.
root_cause_analysis: The removal of the old cleat was forgotten because the responsible person mounted a new cleat.
corrective_action: The Chief Officer ordered the removal of the old cleat and made sure there was only one cleat on one securing spot.
preventive_action: If the old cleat had been removed at the time of the installation, the PSC deficiency would have been avoided.

deficiency_finding: The steering gear has a rubber retaining channel.
description_overview: The deficiency was closed by the PSC Inspector.
immediate_causes: Lack of planning.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of situational awareness.
corrective_action: The Steering gear hatch needs to be maintained.
preventive_action: The officer was told to prioritize the jobs for the defects.

deficiency_finding: Abandon ship drills.
description_overview: It took the crew more than 20 minutes to lower the boat.
immediate_causes: The crew are not aware of the requirement of setting for ECDIS, the operation and maintenance manual is not fully implemented on board.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not have enough training for the lowering operation.
corrective_action: The boat was lowered into the water within 10 minutes after a new drill was conducted.
preventive_action: Abandon ship drill should be conducted until the satisfaction of the class surveyor and flag state officers, as well as the relevant training to be effectively carried out as a ship's plan based on SOLAS Chapter III/Reg.19 as well as quality documents on board a ship.

deficiency_finding: Several beams on deck are in poor condition.
description_overview: Not required.
immediate_causes: Human factors include lack of preventive maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The deck frames and support were missed out during the maintenance regime.
corrective_action: Maintenance has been carried out on all the identified.
preventive_action: The full length of the transvers beam has been thoroughly checked to make sure there are no areas with waste.

deficiency_finding: Cross track distance for last voyage not set at an appropriate distance or in accordance with procedures for establishing a safe voyage
description_overview: The speed and distance indicator was inoperative due to the vessel at the berths.
immediate_causes: The crew are not aware of the requirement of setting for ECDIS, the operation and maintenance manual is not fully implemented on board.
root_cause_analysis: Master and officers did not confirm the passage plan carefully.
corrective_action: The XTD 2.0Nm has been revised.
preventive_action: The review of shore-based safety health environment quality meeting will be noticed by all fleets.

deficiency_finding: Captain's medical certificate expired at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The Captain's medical certificate expired at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient monitoring.
corrective_action: Master was relieved in the next port.
preventive_action: There is a isolated case and a human element.

deficiency_finding: Current loaded cargo is not included in the manual.
description_overview: After inspecting the vessel's certificates, the inspector requested the logbooks and other documents, including the cargo securing manual.
immediate_causes: There are insufficient documentation and inadequate record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The contents of the Cargo Securing Manual should be reviewed before loading cargo.
corrective_action: The New Amendment Cargo Securing Manual included palleted steel coil lashing.
preventive_action: Since the ship is registered as a bulk carrier, all possible break-bulk cargo should be included in the cargo securing manual, and it should be ensured that the related cargo is adequately covered in the Cargo Securing Manual before loading.

deficiency_finding: The short term ballast water management certificate should be amended to show that D1 is the primary means of ballast water management.
description_overview: The primary means of ballast water management will be amended to the short term certificate.
immediate_causes: The primary muster station was established at the Stbd upper deck area in close proximity of the Fire control station and line with the SOLAS requirements as the muster station marked on the plans was at the Life Boat.
root_cause_analysis: Dispensation term certificate was not checked when it was issued.
corrective_action: The report was sent to flag to close the short term certificate.
preventive_action: BWTS will be functional all the time.

deficiency_finding: The Sensor of T/C Exh. failed.
description_overview: A/E # 3 Digital Thermometer was found to be faulty during the inspection.
immediate_causes: There was insufficient supervision by the officer in charge.
root_cause_analysis: Human Factors are selected by the DOL.
corrective_action: A faulty sensor with a new spare was found to be working well.
preventive_action: Chief Engineer carried out training of concerned staff with regard to importance of always checking and monitoring all running machineries sensors at all times and reporting immediately to duty engineer if any abnormality is noted.

deficiency_finding: Grease and chemical products were missing from the fwd store at the time of inspection.
description_overview: Fire doors that are self-closing are not closing properly.
immediate_causes: Poor housekeeping.
root_cause_analysis: There was an inadequate safety inspection.
corrective_action: It was printed and kept nearby.
preventive_action: The report was done for the implementation of chemical handling safety.

deficiency_finding: The frame of the fire door between the E/R and steering room is not insulated.
description_overview: The electronic water level sensor is not insulated.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The insulation of the emergency escape trunk was incomplete and the frame of the fire door was not insulated during the inspection.
corrective_action: The crew was told by the captain to complete the work as soon as possible.
preventive_action: In order to ensure that fire insulation in E/R is kept in good conditions, Master held an additional Safety meeting and additional training with all crew during which they were told to accurately plan maintenance task in a suitable way and to always ensure that fire insulation in E/R is kept in good

deficiency_finding: The bridge doors are not waterproof.
description_overview: One of the self closing devices for engine room sounding pipes on the lower floor is missing a closing function.
immediate_causes: There is no regular inspection of the door.
root_cause_analysis: There is no regular inspection of the door.
corrective_action: The door is leaking.
preventive_action: All doors must be inspected regularly.

deficiency_finding: The gas analyzer in EGCS is malfunctioning.
description_overview: Pilot ladders and hoist pilot transfer arrangements.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human Cause - overlook by ship's crew.
corrective_action: The new gas analyzer cooler and temperature transmitter were replaced.
preventive_action: Risk control, quality control of safety checklist and procedural process are included in the general conditions inspection.

deficiency_finding: When requested, the documents referred to could not be shown.
description_overview: In order to comply with the elements of the Maritime Labour Convention 2006 that are listed in this specific Document, the Company's systems and arrangements on board are structured.
immediate_causes: When the Master presented the three hard copies of the SMS manual and the references therein, he requested to see the forms that are being completed in hard copy as well.
root_cause_analysis: ISM Code regulation 11 'Documentation' is misinterpreted.
corrective_action: The Master posted theAccommodation Inspection Report in both Mess Rooms in order to satisfy the PSC Inspector.
preventive_action: There will be an Internal Audit within 3 months and an External Audit within the next H&S meeting.

deficiency_finding: A large amount of oil was leaking from the quick closing valve of ME.
description_overview: The starboard windlass motor was leaking oil.
immediate_causes: There is an oil mark on the cylinder liner.
root_cause_analysis: The ME FO inlet quick closing valve is malfunctioning.
corrective_action: The valve was dismantled and replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: To make sure the valves don't have any leaks, the crew will do an inspection on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: There are no emergency exit signs in the engine room.
description_overview: There is a lack of safety awareness.
immediate_causes: There are immediate cause-substandard conditions.
root_cause_analysis: The safety and fire control plan states that in inadequate maintenance and inspection signs are not posted.
corrective_action: The signs were posted before the departure.
preventive_action: The Chief officer is responsible for the inspection of the signs.

deficiency_finding: There is an oil leak on the lower platform and the floor needs to be cleaned.
description_overview: Many ER floor plates are not secured by screws.
immediate_causes: There was a lack of inspection in the lower platform and a failure to identify the hazard in the turning wheel.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient design.
corrective_action: Fresh water mixed with soap powder was used to clean the flooring.
preventive_action: There will be a weekly inspection to be made.

deficiency_finding: The LSA training manual has many deleted and unbound pages.
description_overview: The LSA training manual was thoroughly inspected by ship staff and class surveyor during the last annual survey on 20th December 2022, and the manual was in good condition.
immediate_causes: The valve that goes to the sewage treatment unit is not rotating.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection was inadequate.
corrective_action: The LSA training manual on the bridge and officers mess room was bound in good condition.
preventive_action: The responsible officer has been briefed by the master and safety officer to keep the LSA training manual in good condition.

deficiency_finding: There are a lot of parts of outside husk that are 888-282-0476 888-282-0476.
description_overview: There is a light on the boat deck.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: The season has an effect on it.
corrective_action: The areas that are rotten and corroding will be painted.
preventive_action: Painting and oil application on the deck.

deficiency_finding: In the emergency escape route, the emergency light is not marked.
description_overview: The Emcy light is hanging loose in the cables without mounting.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was no sign to inspect the emergency light in the emergency escape route.
corrective_action: The lamps of the emergency lights were signed and this deficiency was immediately corrected by PSCO.
preventive_action: Make sure that all the emergency lights are marked and check the emergency light at the emergency escape route.

deficiency_finding: There was no cover on the garbage bin.
description_overview: There is a dirty ventillation grill.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of good practice was the reason for the not effective implementation ofGMP.
corrective_action: The food waste bin was covered with a lid.
preventive_action: Good practice to follow and regular checks to be carried out by the officer.

deficiency_finding: The international shore connection is not ready to use.
description_overview: One International Shore Connection is kept in a box at the gangway when in port, as per the Fire and Safety Plan.
immediate_causes: The ship safety officer did not report the deficiency.
root_cause_analysis: The international shore connection was used for regular maintenance.
corrective_action: The attending ship's staff immediately recognized the error after the inspector pointed it out.
preventive_action: The training of entire ship staff on the requirements of arrival port procedures and checks was carried out by Master.

deficiency_finding: There are valve indicators that are damaged.
description_overview: There is a cover letter for the Tonnage Certificate, but it is not available on board.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The valve indicators were in position but in the last operation when the valves were closed the indicators were damaged and that resulted in a deficiency to be raised.
corrective_action: The valve position indicators were renewed.
preventive_action: Fleet Notice will be sent to all vessels under the management to emphasize the finding.

deficiency_finding: Loadline marks and freeboard marks.
description_overview: The draft marks are rusty.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The draft marks deteriorated during the last voyages due to the adverse weather conditions and the waves.
corrective_action: At the first convenient port, Fujairah anchorage, maintenance was carried out on Plimsol and draft marks.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be discussed during the on-board safety committee meeting with the participation of the officers and crew.

deficiency_finding: The battery charger malfunction is called the GMDSS.
description_overview: The PSC action code is 17
immediate_causes: The gangway net was damaged when the crew tried to shift the gangway to allow the crane's movement and adjust the height of the gangway for the tidal change during the port stay.
root_cause_analysis: The battery charger was damaged when sailing to China.
corrective_action: Crew request repair to company, Company ready to replace battery charger during safety radio inspection at China port.
preventive_action: The work standards have been added to prevent a repeat.

deficiency_finding: Engine Cadet has a Seafarer Employment Agreement (SEA) with no provision for overtime, but he is working more than 44 hours per week.
description_overview: Engine Cadet has a Seafarer Employment Agreement (SEA) with no provision for overtime, but he is working more than 44 hours per week.
immediate_causes: Engine Cadet has exceeded 44 hours of work with a total of 118.6 hours excess OT since he joined the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: Senior engineers didn't compensate for overtime work and didn't arrange rest for the cadet because he was working over 44 hours a week.
corrective_action: The overtime of Engine Cadet was paid in cash by the Master.
preventive_action: To be given rest day after machinery repair to compensate for the extra hours worked.

deficiency_finding: The rusty wheel was found near the churchyard line.
description_overview: There is a fire hydrant on the port side main deck.
immediate_causes: The broken drain cock for the U type line on the port side main deck was not found during a routine inspection and was not maintained in good condition.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance on the CoW line hydrant valves.
corrective_action: The hydrant was replaced by a new one.
preventive_action: There is a requirement for senior officers to check the cargo on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: Not in good shape.
description_overview: There is a standard reference with photographs to identify the condition of mooring ropes and how to discard them.
immediate_causes: The mooring rope is used with the guide rollers.
root_cause_analysis: The mooring rope in the poop deck was not adequately tagged or marked to indicate that the rope is not to be used.
corrective_action: Master has been advised to discuss with a local agent about off-landing the condemned rope at a suitable port.
preventive_action: The importance of carrying out routine inspection prior each use and detailed inspection on quarterly basis is important.

deficiency_finding: The radio Log Book does not include a summary of communications relating to Distress, urgent and safety traffic.
description_overview: There were not ship specific and missing information in the fire safety operational booklet.
immediate_causes: A malfunction in the antenna unit caused the system to stop working.
root_cause_analysis: Crew neglected to insert the relevant entries into the log, although specific instructions were provided.
corrective_action: The attending superintendent instructed the master to use the correct GMDSS log.
preventive_action: In order to include additional check points for the GMDSS proper recording, the VO 70 PSC Pre inspection check list was amended.

deficiency_finding: Both sets are required for dangerous goods that are not ready to use.
description_overview: The SCBA sets are placed in the location as per the approved fire plan for the vessel.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision by the master.
corrective_action: The master and PSCO were satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: The master will make sure the BA sets are working normally.

deficiency_finding: Steering gear room floor is oily.
description_overview: The main engine fuel oil leakage alarm was bypassed.
immediate_causes: The crew did not have a tight well connection.
root_cause_analysis: There was a trace of oil.
corrective_action: The immediately on-site was closed by the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: The crew members took care of the oil trace.

deficiency_finding: There are unsafe working conditions in the vessel such as leaking fuel oil lines from service tanks, mooring arrangements and temporary repairs to the sea water lines.
description_overview: The INMARSAT-C date role has been replaced due to old software.
immediate_causes: The limit switch was stuck by frozen grease when the Rescue Boat was tested in the monthly drill.
root_cause_analysis: The dangerous devices were overlooked by the PIC.
corrective_action: The sea water line was repaired by welding.
preventive_action: Any imperfections should be corrected in time for the routine inspection.

deficiency_finding: Not required.
description_overview: There was no evidence of LOP fixing during the inbound pilotage passage.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with procedures can include non-compliance and disregard of LOP's not plotted as per the Voyage Plan requirement.
root_cause_analysis: LOP's plotting fast techniques require adequate training for all deck officers.
corrective_action: Plotting of LOP's as per the plan was accepted by the PSCO and closed on the report.
preventive_action: The passage plan should include details of position fixing systems and should be increased at Master's discretion.

deficiency_finding: The EGCS space is not able to close the fire damper.
description_overview: The cargo holds line 3 has a smoke sampling fire detection system.
immediate_causes: Not complying with load line regulation.
root_cause_analysis: A hand wheel and steel wire connection were used to operate the fire damper.
corrective_action: Grease the damper gear and make sure it's free of stuck parts.
preventive_action: The correct checking procedure was included in his standing order to ask all engineers and ratings to do the proper testing.

deficiency_finding: The crane is out of commission.
description_overview: The crane is out of commission.
immediate_causes: During cargo operation, StevedORES OPERATE THE SHIP CRANE.
root_cause_analysis: The crane was out of service due to a parted wire.
corrective_action: The ship's crew replaced the hoisting wire on the Cargo Deck Crane.
preventive_action: In case of rough usage/mishandling of crane and associated equipment, the crew must suspend operations and the entire running length of the crane wire must be checked.

deficiency_finding: There is an audible alarm for two way communication between the steering gear room and the navigation bridge.
description_overview: There is a dedicated battery that is not sealed and marked for emergency use.
immediate_causes: The alarm is weak.
root_cause_analysis: Testing and maintenance are not done well.
corrective_action: After cleaning the speakers, they were found to be in normal working condition.
preventive_action: Crew was briefed and trained on determination of integrity of performance of equipment during every test and indicate on remarks in the report to provide better guidance on considering replacement due to deteriorated equipment.

deficiency_finding: The form 2 and 3 of the CSR document are missing.
description_overview: The valid Cargo Ship Safety Construction Certificate issued to the vessel is valid beyond the validity of the DoC.
immediate_causes: When heaving up the port side anchor, the windlass mooring winch gear sheared due to heavy weather.
root_cause_analysis: The company's certificate was not properly managed by the master.
corrective_action: Send Form 2 and Form 3 to the ship manager.
preventive_action: Training was carried out.

deficiency_finding: The lifebuoy on the port side is stuck by rust.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow the procedure, Fleet ops, technical procedures, machinery general, 4.4.1 steering gear, and makers instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The pin was stuck and rusty.
corrective_action: Outworn lifebuoys were replaced with new lifebuoys.
preventive_action: To be tested for proper function after installation, any safety & emergency equipment to be ready for immediate use.

deficiency_finding: The galley fire door is not closing correctly.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: The door mechanism needed to be adjusted.
corrective_action: The door mechanism was adjusted by the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: There is an additional check point for the verification of the self-closing fire doors in the galley compartment.

deficiency_finding: The EGCS space is not able to close the fire damper.
description_overview: The cargo holds line 3 has a smoke sampling fire detection system.
immediate_causes: Not complying with load line regulation.
root_cause_analysis: A hand wheel and steel wire connection were used to operate the fire damper.
corrective_action: Grease the damper gear and make sure it's free of stuck parts.
preventive_action: The correct checking procedure was included in his standing order to ask all engineers and ratings to do the proper testing.

deficiency_finding: There are boxes of bottled water in the Mess boy's Cabin.
description_overview: There are boxes of bottled water in the Mess boy's Cabin.
immediate_causes: The crew kept excessive mineral drinking water in his cabin.
root_cause_analysis: Section 3.1 and 3.2 are not fully understood.
corrective_action: The crew moved the mineral water packages to the storeroom.
preventive_action: Ensuring clean and tidy condition of crew accommodation and provision storeroom is a priority for shipboard senior management.

deficiency_finding: The hours of rest for C/O and 2/0 did not comply with the drill record.
description_overview: The tank cleaning operations room sample point failed while testing the fixed gas detection system.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The records of the Chief Officer and Second Officer were recorded as rest instead of work, as a result of inadequate supervision Investigation carried out with the assistance of the Master.
corrective_action: The work and rest hours records that were found with errors were corrected to show the actual working status of the Chief Officer and Second Officer.
preventive_action: As a preventive measure, a training session was carried out on the same day (14th) by the Master to all officers and crew, in the course of which, he stressed the importance to meticulously record the hours of work in strict compliance with the actual routines and onboard activities/ drills etc.

deficiency_finding: It is not possible for crew members to take paid annual leave within a year if they are on board for more than 11 months.
description_overview: The rope was soaked in paint and found on the starboard side.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: As per the PSC officer report, repatriation had been arranged for all of them.
corrective_action: The crew members that had SEA for a year were already returned to their home countries.
preventive_action: The company's Management Review will discuss this deficiency.

deficiency_finding: The audible fire alarm can't be sounded in the service space within 2 minutes when the fire detection sensor is not acknowledged.
description_overview: The D-2 standard is mandatory for the ship.
immediate_causes: The Pre-Alarm for No.4 Cargo hold was activated due to malfunction of the sensor.
root_cause_analysis: The ship's crew did not know how to use the fire alarm system.
corrective_action: In order to better understand the crew, additional training was carried out by the master and the Supremo.
preventive_action: Instructions have been posted on the fire alarm panel and will be discussed in the upcoming safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: Rescue boat was not launched and maneuvered.
description_overview: The design of the equipment will be approved by the administration.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: Master didn't seek proper opportunity to launch and maneuver the rescue boat.
corrective_action: Master will seek a proper opportunity to conduct the drill to correct the deficiency on her next port in Australia.
preventive_action: Regulations and provisions will be implemented and complied with.

deficiency_finding: The limit switch on the rescue boat malfunctioned.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: The limit switch was stuck by frozen grease when the Rescue Boat was tested in the monthly drill.
root_cause_analysis: Acts that are unsafe.
corrective_action: The master confirmed that the limit switch was free and grease free.
preventive_action: The officer in charge of LSA should conduct weekly testing to make sure the vessel is in working condition.

deficiency_finding: The safety net of the gangway wasn't assembled correctly.
description_overview: The main engine fuel oil leakage alarm was bypassed.
immediate_causes: Errors were allowed to go undetected because of inadequate Monitoring and supervision during the assembly and rigging process.
root_cause_analysis: Errors were allowed to go undetected because of inadequate Monitoring and supervision during the assembly and rigging process.
corrective_action: The Gangway safety net was rigged correctly.
preventive_action: The crew was briefed on proper monitoring and care to be taken while rigging the safety net.

deficiency_finding: Engineer can't confirm the reason for the fresh sprayed F.O stains on the M/E No.12 cyl F.O pump body.
description_overview: During rounds, failed to observe and identify the leaks.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: When noticed, the fuel spray could have been identified and cleaned.
corrective_action: The fuel pump body was cleaned.
preventive_action: The inspection and maintenance regime should be strictly followed.

deficiency_finding: Garbage on board.
description_overview: Load line markings on the deck are not painted in the same color.
immediate_causes: Marine Growth on Ships Hull was observed.
root_cause_analysis: The long voyage and stay at the anchorage lead to more garbage being produced.
corrective_action: Contact the agent to apply for garbage collection.
preventive_action: If there is more garbage on the ship, the master will apply to deliver it to the shore.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire alarm in the Engine Room.
description_overview: The visitor's log book is not required to be recorded.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The power supply unit of the Engine room alarm column was found to be faulty after an investigation by an office representative.
corrective_action: The alarm column was restored and tested many times for proper operation after a new power supply unit was installed.
preventive_action: Training was done to all officers and crew on the procedures for defect reporting.

deficiency_finding: Stbd side lifeboat embarkation deck floor is cracked and the navigation bridge wing is also cracked.
description_overview: Master confirms that life-saving equipment is maintained in line with the Class approved maintenance system.
immediate_causes: This port or next port will be supplied with a portable gas meter with built in pump.
root_cause_analysis: The PSCO officer is referring to the subject as a result of our vessel's collision with M/V Planet Skipper in October of 2023.
corrective_action: The short-term Cargo Ship Safety Construction Certificate was issued after the occasional survey was performed at the port of Mykonos.
preventive_action: Refer to the report.

deficiency_finding: The ship name port was faded.
description_overview: The ship name port of registry was found faded due to long period on the sea without specific maintenance.
immediate_causes: The incorrect symbol was used on one side.
root_cause_analysis: Some letters have been stained.
corrective_action: Deficiency was solved in anchorage.
preventive_action: When it is necessary to avoid Non- Conformity for our vessel, the crew was instructed to check, observe and to do specific maintenance more often.

deficiency_finding: The lack of a central centre of command and poor crew performance were related to the missing head count.
description_overview: Poor crew performance during fire drill is related to poor maintenance and lack of central centre of command.
immediate_causes: The correct donning procedure was explained to the crew members after they were briefed on the inspector's concern.
root_cause_analysis: The orientation on the fire drill was inadequate.
corrective_action: Crew members were educated on the procedures for fighting fires, including the use of fireman outfits, fireman's radio, and equipment.
preventive_action: The master and head of departments will closely watch the drills.

deficiency_finding: The external access door to the Accommodation B deck entrance was detached at the time of inspection.
description_overview: It is not ready for use.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: As a result of remote investigation, it was found that maintenance was in progress and that the crew failed to report it to the inspector.
corrective_action: After inspection, the deficiency was fixed by fitting new bolts.
preventive_action: The fleet will get a new circular about proper maintenance.

deficiency_finding: Hatch cover operation has a leak.
description_overview: There was an oil stain under the drain valve of the oil tank for the Hatch Cover system.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not pick up the case of improper inspection prior to the day of PSC inspection.
corrective_action: There were no leaks after the cleaning of the oil resisdues.
preventive_action: Crew were told to keep a close eye on the station condition in line with the instructions from e-PMS.

deficiency_finding: The place for storage of CHEMICALS is not near the EXPANSION TANK.
description_overview: There are 6 bolts and nuts in the sewage discharge connection.
immediate_causes: On endorsement of annual verification, PSC decided not to write 'R.O.C.' as a country on the DOC company address.
root_cause_analysis: The chemical cleaner was not put back on it's place by the Engine staff.
corrective_action: Remark will be discussed in the next safety meeting.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is no communication bridge or steering gear room.
description_overview: Installation for communication between bridge and steering gear didn't work out.
immediate_causes: The bridge communication unit was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: The bridge communication unit was out of order.
corrective_action: The crew under the assistance of the Shore Electrician was able to repair the communication.
preventive_action: The bridge communication unit was repaired after the crew found the fault.

deficiency_finding: The antenna on the side monkey island was temporary and not permanently secured.
description_overview: The doors of the battery room, deck escape trunk, emergency steering gear room, and deck crane no. 4 are all corroded.
immediate_causes: The crew failed to notice the lack of marking after last painting maintenance despite the fact that this item was included in our PMS on an annual basis.
root_cause_analysis: The maintenance of the GMDSS equipment is not done accurately.
corrective_action: The antennae were tested and found to be in good condition.
preventive_action: The master and safety officer have instructed the 2/O to inspect and maintain the ship.

deficiency_finding: NP 14 requires for intended voyage not available on board.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector was observe and made deficiency, that required NP 14 missed on board.
corrective_action: The deficiency was corrected before departure.
preventive_action: The Fleet Monthly Reminder clearly shows company requirements related to nautical charts and publications.

deficiency_finding: The emergency diesel generator fuel tank is not marked.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: When logging out, INM-C was not closely monitored and checked by the duty deck officer due to lack of safety and situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: Although the Emergency Diesel Generator has marks with tank full capacity, the PSC officer required to indicate marks also the 18.0 hrs working hours of the Emergency Diesel Generator as well.
corrective_action: The post marked for 18.0 hours of work at maximum capacity.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer spoke to the crew about the importance of marking the Emergency Diesel Generator tank for easy identification.

deficiency_finding: There are entries missing on the IOPP certificate.
description_overview: The box drain tank is connected to the MARPOL I shore connection.
immediate_causes: After a change of management failure to check the tanks in the certificate section 3.1 is what happened.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of proper supervision and leadership after the change in management.
corrective_action: Training was carried out by the entire crew, with reference to the company Training Material 120 (PSC Detainable Deficiencies) guiding them of the importance of inspections, early detection, and regular maintenance.
preventive_action: The staff was told to fortify their inspection regime and carry out the Inspection as per the Company form Tec-44 - Environmental Protection Questionnaire, required by the Environment Management Manual.

deficiency_finding: The approved ship security plan did not apply to the Oxygen / Acetylene locker.
description_overview: The company follow the International Ship and Port Facility Security Code.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of security awareness, inadequate leadership, and lack of knowledge are some of the reasons why FFRRP is Failure to Follow Rules Regulation and Procedures.
corrective_action: After being pointed out, the Master instructed the crew to secure the Oxygen / Acetylene locker and carry out a Safety Meeting with regards to proper equipment securing, emphasizing in the Restricted Areas on board and how we secure that areas.
preventive_action: The proper securing of equipment in restricted areas has to be closely monitored by the head of department and the Deck crew.

deficiency_finding: Work and rest hours are not recorded.
description_overview: Advancing and retarding of clocks were not recorded in the rest hours module.
immediate_causes: Carelessness is recorded in the Work and Rest hours module.
root_cause_analysis: The onboard management did not adequately enforce the printed and rest hours of the compass module.
corrective_action: Checked and corrected entry in work and rest hours.
preventive_action: Training was carried out for all crew to record their work and rest hours.

deficiency_finding: The generator can't supply power to the switchboard.
description_overview: There is low insulation on the emergency generator.
immediate_causes: There has been a sudden failure of communication equipment/switch which burn on date of inspection.
root_cause_analysis: After a wi-fi signal test, the electrical engineer checks the crew cabin for wi-fi signal access.
corrective_action: The earth fault was isolated by the shore company.
preventive_action: Generator should be used frequently.

deficiency_finding: The cover for the emergency stop cargo pump is missing.
description_overview: There are other DEFICIENCIES.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There is inadequate technical design and design criteria.
corrective_action: The additional protection cover was installed in keeping with the continuous improvement policy of the company.
preventive_action: The crew members were briefed on the importance of good planning during the monthly safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: The wall/bulkhead on which the door is supported is detached from the base of the Port and Stbd side entrance doors.
description_overview: The vessel's overall appearance was found to be satisfactory.
immediate_causes: The rubber packing on the vent flap was not sealed completely.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection and testing intervals of fire protection systems, such as fire doors inspections, are included in the vessel's FFE/LSA planned maintenance system and date of carried out inspections as well as inspection results are recorded.
corrective_action: Due to delivery time ex manufacturers supply of new doors as well as repair of adjacent bulkhead will be conducted.
preventive_action: An alert message will be sent to all fleet vessels advising the Safety Officers to ensure the function of fire doors and highlight the proper condition of adjacent/support bulkheads during routine inspections.

deficiency_finding: The Chancery office did not present the decree.
description_overview: On the time of inspection, the fire main line on the starboard side was leaking.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The harbour master should not be contacted via the local agent.
