corrective_action: If you want to stop the decay of security to the local agent, ask the harbour master sign and pitchfork to send it back to the ship.
preventive_action: The VESSEL should take the initial step to send the data to the local agent, then send it back to the ship.

deficiency_finding: There is a Rubbish Bin in the mess room.
description_overview: There is a certificate or documentary evidence of financial security.
immediate_causes: The crew kept excessive mineral drinking water in his cabin.
root_cause_analysis: The Officer's mess room has a plastic rubbish bin.
corrective_action: The officer's mess room had a plastic rubbish bin that posed a risk of flammability.
preventive_action: Ensure that only non-flammable materials are purchased for use in officer mess rooms and other areas where fire risks are a concern.

deficiency_finding: Emergency systems need to be ready for use all the time.
description_overview: There is a sewage treatment plant.
immediate_causes: There is a malfunction of the control valve.
root_cause_analysis: The emergency valve not being maintained for a long time resulted in frozen parts.
corrective_action: After de-rusted and cleaned the valve stem and applied penetrating oil, the valve could be opened by hand.
preventive_action: If the system remains inactive for a long period of time, then its moving parts may.

deficiency_finding: The springs on the No.1 and No.2 cargo hold fwd are not tensioned and are wasted.
description_overview: The rope was inspected prior to the vessel's arrival and was found to be in good order during the last drill.
immediate_causes: The covers can be opened and closed.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear, lack of attention, exposure to extreme conditions are some of the things that can happen.
corrective_action: Proper operation was ensured when the springs were maintained.
preventive_action: The information was given to the whole fleet.

deficiency_finding: The water in the fresh water tank isFFICIENT for the local fire fighting system.
description_overview: The water in the freshwater tank is insufficient.
immediate_causes: The long stay at port and anchorage for more than 15 days resulted in non-production of FW and no supply of FW at anchorage.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of regular inspections.
corrective_action: The water for the FW tank for the water based local firefighting system has been topped up after the agent arranged supply of fresh water.
preventive_action: Maintenance schedules should be followed according to the company.

deficiency_finding: There is an obstruction for the deck fire main line.
description_overview: Line-throwing appliance containers are no longer valid.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not clear the astern drain valve.
corrective_action: Remove the astern drain valve for the deck main line.
preventive_action: Training crew checks main line valves on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: Two red lights are not lighting up.
description_overview: Arcs of visibility are not for NUC lights.
immediate_causes: After the Bunkering operation, failed and forgot to record on time.
root_cause_analysis: While drifting off Japan coast, the crew checked the lights and they were in good working order.
corrective_action: Crew immediately replaced the busted light bulbs with new spare bulbs onboard.
preventive_action: If the lights are in good working condition, they will be checked.

deficiency_finding: There is a rescue boat.
description_overview: There are self closing devices that aren't closing properly.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: It's not possible to know why the wire to swing the boat is hung outside of the ship's hull.
corrective_action: The wire handle was back in position.
preventive_action: The crew and safety officer were reminded to pay more attention to their equipment.

deficiency_finding: A sign in the engine room is in poor condition.
description_overview: Not posted in a prominent place.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: After it was delivered by her previous owners to our management, several imo signs had been omitted to be replaced, and the vessel was for 3 months in shipyards.
corrective_action: All of the signs that were in poor condition were replaced with new ones.
preventive_action: The condition of imo signs will be monitored by 3rd engineer.

deficiency_finding: The General Service pumps 1 and 2 are missing.
description_overview: The last routine test of the fire and general service pump was done at the St. Eustatius anchorage.
immediate_causes: Clarifying to the inspector was offered.
root_cause_analysis: At the time of the inspection, the General Service pumps 1 & 2 were not in position.
corrective_action: The new units were quickly installed and tested after the Port State Control Inspection.
preventive_action: The meeting was organised after the inspection to discuss maintenance needs for the safety system.

deficiency_finding: The Muster List is incomplete, missing the following duties: closing of the watertight doors, fire doors, valves, scuppers, side scuttles, skylight, portholes and other similar opening in the ship.
description_overview: The Muster List was incomplete due to missing duties such as the closing of the watertight doors, fire doors, valves, scuppers, side scuttles, skylight, portholes and other similar opening in the ship.
immediate_causes: The duty to close fire doors, valves, scuppers, side scuttles, skylights, portholes and other similar openings in the ship is not assigned to a specific crew member but required to be performed by the support team.
root_cause_analysis: PSCO didn't see the Muster List for the particular duties of support squad.
corrective_action: The PSCO comments 'Close all watertight doors, fire doors, valves, scuppers, side scuttles, skylight and portholes' were reflected by Zenin on the duty of support squad member A/B SALIM.
preventive_action: The Monthly Alert Bulletin will be used to circulate the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: Master instructed from today to ensure the volume of low sulphur fuel oils in each tank are being recorded, when any fuel oil changeover operation is completed prior to the entry into an emission control area or commenced after exit.
description_overview: The PSC deficiency was caused by the PSC Inspector keeping the records in hard copy.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with industry rules.
root_cause_analysis: The volume for the low-sulfur fuel oil storage tank was not recorded in the changeover operation.
corrective_action: The vessels will be reminded of the importance of making proper entries in the F.O change when this deficiency is brought to the attention of the whole fleet.
preventive_action: In order to reflect all fuel tanks, the F.O. change has been updated.

deficiency_finding: The ship structure access manual is not approved by Administration or RO.
description_overview: The vessel was delivered in October of 2012 and entered into management in April of 2022.
immediate_causes: The flag of Marshall Island was missed.
root_cause_analysis: The statutory manual was not available at the time of takeover.
corrective_action: The approved ship structure access manual was approved by Class NK and was not available onboard.
preventive_action: At the time of change of management, it is important to verify the availability of the Class approved ship structure access manual.

deficiency_finding: Garbage record book has no master's signature.
description_overview: There were only self-inspection records on May 7, 2024 and a document with the inspection photos, but the self-inspection record on November 7, 2023 was missing.
immediate_causes: The master was not occupied at other tasks.
root_cause_analysis: After completing one page in the Garbage Record Book, the C/O and Master's did not sign the name.
corrective_action: Code 10 was issued after the master signed the Garbage Record Book.
preventive_action: Check the ship Garbage Record Book and other statutory Logbooks from the master.

deficiency_finding: There were instances of violation of requirements for minimum hours of rest during the months of January and February.
description_overview: Identified and recorded broken rules were related to Master's and Chief Engineer's extra occupation during vessel's pilotage.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency was caused by a type error at the time of completion.
corrective_action: The training for the officers who are responsible for the completion of the work and rest hours was carried out by the Marine Supremo.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer and the 2nd Engineer were warned about the proper implementation of the working arrangement.

deficiency_finding: ESP of Inspection was not readily available.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Thickness Measurement document file is only required when a vessel is 10 years old and not valid for a vessel like Belita.
corrective_action: The required ESP documentation was printed and filed by the Master in a designated folder.
preventive_action: The Master and the Management are to ensure that certificates and survey reports are filed according to company requirements.

deficiency_finding: The self-closing fire door at the bridge was not latched at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The self-closing fire door at the bridge was not latched at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The door closer on the fire door at the bridge entrance was not adjusted due to lack of attention.
corrective_action: The door closer two stage speed adjustment was carried out and deficiency corrected during the inspection.
preventive_action: The campaign will take a full look at the conditions of the fire doors and their closing arrangements.

deficiency_finding: There are cable pipes from the main deck that are corroded in several places.
description_overview: The Bulk Cargo Shipping Name is not specified in one of the five cargo declarations.
immediate_causes: Prior to the arrival of the vessel at this port, the latches of the hooks were improved, but the paint on them was blocking the moving mechanism.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of safety awareness among the crew.
corrective_action: The pipes should be maintained immediately.
preventive_action: The officer needs to be trained on the maintenance requirements of SOLAS.

deficiency_finding: The cook on board is not provided by MSMD.
description_overview: The cook on board is not provided by MSMD.
immediate_causes: The original documentation should be kept with the sentence of "specimen".
root_cause_analysis: The flag advised on the renewal of MSMC certificates to include Cook for the vessels with ten or more crew.
corrective_action: There is a new MSMC certificate for the subject vessel.
preventive_action: The entire fleet is getting a new MSMC certificate.

deficiency_finding: There is no enclosure for a wire roller.
description_overview: The security gratings on A deck were secured with a padlock, preventing immediate access or escape in case of emergency.
immediate_causes: Instructions to the vessel were given to the company.
root_cause_analysis: There is no requirement in safety and technical specifications for the personal opinion of PSCO.
corrective_action: The wire roller and pilot Combined ladder are protected by an enclosure.
preventive_action: The wire roller was used during the stay in this port.

deficiency_finding: The EEDI technical file is unable to be produced.
description_overview: The correct nozzle ID was marked on the record.
immediate_causes: The Master and Chief Engineer were unfamiliar with the procedure and instructions.
root_cause_analysis: There are three main causes: BASIC CAUSES - PERSONAL FACTORS.
corrective_action: The EEDI Technical file was sent to the Master.
preventive_action: The ship's certificates and statuary drawing management should be improved.

deficiency_finding: Wrong shore station setting.
description_overview: One pressure gauge in the engine room was out of range due to inadequate maintenance.
immediate_causes: Didn't follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of supervision by Master.
corrective_action: The correct shore station should be set according to the range and service area.
preventive_action: Master should check the shore station setting of Navtex after reading the SMO-DM-07 instruction on operating and managing communications and navigation equipment.

deficiency_finding: The position fixing intervals are not as per the plan.
description_overview: The same devices observed for 3 MSW cooling pumps and function is not confirmed.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to record rest hours.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: The passage plan was reviewed and approved by the master.
preventive_action: This observation has been shared with other vessels.

deficiency_finding: The COVID-19 spread protection policy is not implemented at ship's access point.
description_overview: The Malfunction/failure of BWTS 2nd unit is not reported to Canadian Authority and the IBWMC is in short term.
immediate_causes: The certificates for the diesel generators were not original.
root_cause_analysis: Gangway Duty O/S fail to follow the Company's policy to keep all visitors check their body temperature, either they will proceed to deck or inside accommodation.
corrective_action: Conducted re-training of all crew regarding the company's Infection Prevention and Control System Manual.
preventive_action: The Duty Office and the Safety Officer must remind the Gangway Watch to take the body temperature of all visitors going onboard.

deficiency_finding: Hull is cracking.
description_overview: The master was told to have the Main deck repaired during the upcoming dry dock.
immediate_causes: The cracks have been detected and reported to Class, which issued a Condition of Class.
root_cause_analysis: The condition of class is to be defintly repaired.
corrective_action: The class satisfaction has been repaired.
preventive_action: Scheduled for Dry dock repairs.

deficiency_finding: There are no records in the 'Cadet training Record book' of any familiarisation with safety trainings on board.
description_overview: There are no records in the approved training record book.
immediate_causes: Engine Cadet has exceeded 44 hours of work with a total of 118.6 hours excess OT since he joined the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: This is because the given training and familiarization are already recorded in SMS record forms and maintained by C/O and 3/O.
corrective_action: The records in the cadet training record book are related to safety training on board and the records in the cadet training record book are maintained by C/O and 3/O.
preventive_action: C/O and 3/O will supervise cadet to record the cadet training record book while C/O and 3/O is making training record after every training and familiarization is completed.

deficiency_finding: The latest version of the manual is not available.
description_overview: The code is old edition.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear are consequences of material fatigue.
root_cause_analysis: The defect was issued in Japan on 6/15 and has not been closed in the computer system.
corrective_action: The Iamsar MANUAL VOL III is available on board and can be changed to code 10.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Medical equipment is missing.
description_overview: There is a missing LSA element.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of two man verification check.
root_cause_analysis: The medical equipment and medicines were kept on the vessel.
corrective_action: In order to comply with the International Medical Guide for Ships, all required items were ordered and purchased.
preventive_action: The Master will deliver a training session to the responsible personnel.

deficiency_finding: Lifts with penetrate only a single deck will be surrounded by steel doors at both levels.
description_overview: There is a lack of familiarity with SSP Confidentiality on who is not authorized to look into the manual.
immediate_causes: Individual and group violations by lack of supervision.
root_cause_analysis: There is a small hole on the cap of the door lock, but it does not affect the function of the lock.
corrective_action: The PSCO identified screw was taken away by the crew.
preventive_action: Crew should strictly follow the procedures as stipulated in SMI-S-H27 The Stipulation for Maintenance of Emergency Equipment.

deficiency_finding: The air fire damper on the bridge deck is missing.
description_overview: The isolator/connection box has a radio antenna wire broken off.
immediate_causes: The crew kept excessive mineral drinking water in his cabin.
root_cause_analysis: The person doesn't mention the rules of soLAS part I, Chapter II, Regulation 9.
corrective_action: We installed the gun wire of the bridge.
preventive_action: 'SOLAS PART I, CHAPTER 2, REGULATION 9. 7' is a good place to start.

deficiency_finding: Two valid Load Line Certificates are in the file of the ship.
description_overview: The Master accidentally kept both certificates in the same file.
immediate_causes: The owners asked for help.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of documentation.
corrective_action: A lock and key has been placed on the certificate.
preventive_action: A common message will be sent to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: CLOSING DEVICES/WATERTIGHT DOORS ARE NOT CLOSING PROPERLY.
description_overview: The door from the engine room to the deck is not closing correctly.
immediate_causes: The door from the engine room to the deck is not closing correctly.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not follow company's procedures.
corrective_action: The watertight door was adjusted during the PSC inspection.
preventive_action: As standard practice, deficiency was discussed to all crew in order to prevent reoccurrence.

deficiency_finding: The fuel oil high pressure pump of M/E No.2 cylinder stuck while the fuel oil system changed to VLSFO caused the ship to fail to maneuver freely near the D42 buoy.
description_overview: At the stage of inspection, there isn't any further action on root cause analysis.
immediate_causes: Repairs were made by shipboard staff before departure.
root_cause_analysis: Unfamiliarity with the operation of fuel change over and improper handover during engine watches.
corrective_action: The system was put to the test and found to be in working order.
preventive_action: Frequent training sessions will be carried out by the chief engineer to avoid future occurrences of such observations.

deficiency_finding: There is a back-up arrangement for electronic nautical publications.
description_overview: There is a back-up arrangement for electronic nautical publications.
immediate_causes: Due to the short port stay at Onsan, S. Korea, the UWC was canceled and Underwater Cleaning was carried out at Yeosu.
root_cause_analysis: The PIC doesn't know the importance of backup e-publications.
corrective_action: Put the ADP into a white list of anti-viruses software.
preventive_action: The electronic nautical chart system and E-nature publications were included in the training.

deficiency_finding: Only one working novel can be found in the Beck log book.
description_overview: There was a small leak from the shower at the front of the building.
immediate_causes: The English version operation procedure was not created due to the first work with Bangladesh crew.
root_cause_analysis: The crew used two languages, Chinese and English, but the 2nd officer didn't understand the rules.
corrective_action: The Chinese language should be deleted from the front page of the logbook and all records should be in English.
preventive_action: In the event of a wrong entry being made, the captain should inspect the front page of the logbook and fill in the correct language.

deficiency_finding: Steel plates and gratings were not secured on the poop deck and forecastle store.
description_overview: The FW temperature of no.2 D/G is out of order.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient risk identification.
corrective_action: Forecastle rearranged and subject materials were secured to Master's satisfaction.

corrective_action: The new glass was delivered on the 21st of July.
preventive_action: This observation was shared with other vessels in the fleet to raise awareness.

deficiency_finding: There are buckets of paint on the main deck.
description_overview: Instructions for engaging emergency steering are not clear.
immediate_causes: The Venting line of gas sampling line was stock and can't flow gas.
root_cause_analysis: In order to follow the scheduled maintenance plan on deck as well as in the hatch discharging coamings, the vessel's managers supplied the vessel with sufficient amount of paints and other materials at the previous port of Rotterdam.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed by the PSC officer after the paint cans were removed from the deck.
preventive_action: The company's procedures for placing the paint and chemical cans under the fixed firefighting system were discussed in the safety meeting after the inspection.

deficiency_finding: The Minimum Safe Manning Document issued by the flag state is not filled.
description_overview: Guidance on carriage of cook was not included in the Minimum safe manning document available at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
corrective_action: This is checked with the vessel's flag state and advised "Minimum Safe Manning Certificate" is correctly issued and it is in force.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The response engineer wasn't familiar with the main cooling sea water standby pump change.
description_overview: The inspector looked at all the alarms of the rudder pumps.
immediate_causes: Delays of maintenance were caused by previous port restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of training and practice.
corrective_action: The sea water standby pump change was found to be in good working order after being tested again.
preventive_action: There are certain practices to be followed as per company regulations.

deficiency_finding: According to the statement of prefumigation, the living quarters, Day rooms, Engine room, and Bridge areas are not to be tested daily for hydrogen phosphide.
description_overview: The main deck muster station is not clear.
immediate_causes: The Guidance had been sent on board and not follow the company's procedures.
root_cause_analysis: Master and HD did not follow the company's instructions.
corrective_action: A safety meeting should be held for all ship's staff to explain the hazardous consequences.
preventive_action: Discuss the issue with the ship's staff and learn about the precautions that need to be taken during the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: There are oil traces around the system.
description_overview: There are pipes leaking on the deck.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The oil traces were left in the save-all tray due to the maintenance work done on the vessel's deck.
corrective_action: The traces in the save-all tray were immediately cleaned to the satisfaction of the PSC Officer and the deficiency was closed on the spot.
preventive_action: Finding will be communicated to all vessels, under the management in the form of Fleet Notice, aiming to avoid re-occurrence, pointing out that after maintenance of any equipment on board, cleaning of the surrounding area should be carried out.

deficiency_finding: The X-Band radar is not fully functional.
description_overview: Master asked for service at the first port and the flag granted it.
immediate_causes: The cam pin of the release system had an identification mark on it.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear.
corrective_action: All watch personnel were made aware of the malfunction and were told not to rely on it.
preventive_action: As soon as the degraded performance is noticed, the service must be requested immediately and the radars must be brought in full working condition.

deficiency_finding: The side cargo hold no.5 hatchcover cylinder was found with oil leaking.
description_overview: Cargo hold No. 5 is leaking most likely due to previous cargo dust which causes the damage of the cylinder gasket.
immediate_causes: The valve was old.
root_cause_analysis: Poor pier fenders caused load line marking damage.
corrective_action: The new gasket was tested with good results.
preventive_action: Deficiency discussed during monthly safety meeting in order to avoid re- occurrence.

deficiency_finding: The Life Raft Painter Line is not connected.
description_overview: The life RAFT PAINTER SYSTEM IS NOT DRAGGED BY THE SINKING SHIP.
immediate_causes: The ship staff missed out on connecting the painter line after they disconnected the rescue boat.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of proper monitoring.
corrective_action: The safety officer was instructed to verify the life raft's connection to the weak link.
preventive_action: The connection of the pretzel line to the WeAK LINK was analyzed.

deficiency_finding: The table of shipboard working arrangement doesn't assign qualified personal to engineering watches.
description_overview: The work rest hours of C/E last month could not be accessed due to a software issue.
immediate_causes: No defect was identified.
root_cause_analysis: Improper Description in procedure, instruction, and plan.
corrective_action: The Subjected Form was immediately reviewed and updated to all vessels.
preventive_action: All forms were reviewed for the same type of error.

deficiency_finding: There is a passage plan from the pilot station to the berths.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: Crew carelessness or improper record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The safety check was done and everything was in order.
corrective_action: On the spot, the navigation officer amended the passage plan's form to the satisfaction of the psc officer who rectified the deficiency.
preventive_action: Masters will be told to make sure their records are kept in the future and to alert them if there is a deficiency.

deficiency_finding: General service pumps 1 and 2 are not working.
description_overview: The last routine test of the fire and general service pump was done at the St. Eustatius anchorage.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The dirty muddy water at the anchorage was the root cause of the damage to the solenoid valve.
corrective_action: A purchase order was made to procure a spare for the damaged component.
preventive_action: As a preventive measure, the officer in charge of the routine maintenance has been instructed to check the priming unit after every usage in dirty waters to avoid re occurrence.

deficiency_finding: The main antenna has a pin disconnected.
description_overview: The crew pointed out that the connection to the ship's antenna was in need of repair and the relevant spare parts had already been ordered and delivered.
immediate_causes: The valve was old.
root_cause_analysis: It was out of position because of the missing lock wire.
corrective_action: The lock wire was renewed as shown below.
preventive_action: Deficiency handled through non-conformance path as part of qualitative part and controlled close out.

deficiency_finding: There is a cover on the power control unit.
description_overview: There is low insulation on the emergency generator.
immediate_causes: The warning system is not adequate.
root_cause_analysis: There is a cause and a cause and a cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause and cause
corrective_action: Fix the damaged door panel hinge, restore the function of the handle, and make sure the weathertightness is maintained.
preventive_action: The master organized the seafarers on board to study the company's documents.

deficiency_finding: BWTS is malfunctioning due to a malfunction of the rectifier.
description_overview: During her passage to the US Gulf on October 30th, 2022, the BWTS was not operational due to defects in the PCB.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Repairs of the BWTS system will be carried out by a service engineer.
preventive_action: During the BWTS operation, current fluctuations will be monitored diligently at the CCR panel.

deficiency_finding: The latest ship's Condition Evaluation Report is not available.
description_overview: Crew members were sent away before mustering finished and one crew member was reported missing during the drill, but nobody was actually missing.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: The last Condition Evaluation Report was lost and Master was not able to find it.
corrective_action: The Master forwarded the report to the PSC Officer.
preventive_action: The Master was discussed the captioned matter with the Technical Manager and the importance of proper filing was emphasized.

deficiency_finding: A/E no.1 and C.W. system pressure gauge are not readable.
description_overview: The needle indicator on the pressure gauge was found to be half broken, but the gauge was functioning.
immediate_causes: Though the pressure was checked weekly and before each arrival, there was a lower pressure than required at the time of the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear of the gauge causes it to not work.
corrective_action: The generator's cooling water system pressure gauge was pulled out and replaced with a spare.
preventive_action: If spare parts are required for replacement, the Chief Engineer and the PIC should contact the Management Office as early as possible.

deficiency_finding: The current convention requires that the condition of the ship and its equipment be maintained.
description_overview: There is a manual for P and A.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The P & A manual was not amended in 2021.
corrective_action: S/I sent amendments to the vessel from the P & A manual.
preventive_action: To put on the link of COF in shipnet 1.

deficiency_finding: There were 2 cargo hold vent flaps that were missing.
description_overview: Deficiency was fixed prior to departure.
immediate_causes: The engine crew did not spot the oil leaks.
root_cause_analysis: The damaged toggles were not immediately replaced.
corrective_action: New sets of toggles were installed on the cargo hold vent flaps.
preventive_action: Monthly Inspection as per Company ISM form D-I to be continuously observed.

deficiency_finding: The pilot ladder was seen with several loose chocks.
description_overview: Pilot ladders and hoist pilot transfer arrangements.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Defect Cause is worn out and Human Cause is overlook by ship's crew.
corrective_action: The pilot ladder was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: Risk control, quality control of safety checklist and procedural process are included in the general conditions inspection.

deficiency_finding: The Vessel's #1 Nitrogen Compressor High Water Level in Automatic Compressor drain is malfunctioning.
description_overview: There are excessive belts on between the motor and compressor.
immediate_causes: Defective valve of sewage system is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: The Nitrogen plant was not in use during this port stay.
corrective_action: After being pointed out by the inspector, the auto-drain system was immediately repaired by our Chief Engineer and Chief Officer.
preventive_action: The planned maintenance system MARAD required testing of the drain system at monthly intervals.

deficiency_finding: The Panama log book did not record the inspection of crew accommodation.
description_overview: More detailed inspections and drills were carried out by 2 PSC Officer onboard at Three Rivers, Quebec, Canada.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: The PSC officer has a suggestion.
corrective_action: The inspection date was changed under the recommendation of the officer.
preventive_action: The log book shows that the crew carried out the inspection on 10th and 18th of December.

deficiency_finding: The emergency light on the radio was not on.
description_overview: Solas Chapter II-I is called Reg 43.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure and instructions to fix the leaking pipe is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: The officer of GMDSS equipment did not make proper checks.
corrective_action: The light was lit after the electrical officer tightened the bulb.
preventive_action: The officer in charge of the equipment in the bridge has been warned about the importance of checks and controls.

deficiency_finding: Satellite is 406MHz/ 1.6 GHz.
description_overview: At the time of Inspection there was a no maintenance record for the EPIRB.
immediate_causes: The failure to follow procedure was identified.
root_cause_analysis: During the Inspection performance, the requested 5 Year Maintenance Report was not presented to the PSC Inspectors, as the Master did not manage to identify the requested Report in his Certificates folder.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: The next Monthly Alert Bulletin will be sent to the fleet for awareness and for avoiding repetition.

deficiency_finding: There have been no records on the condition of cooking oil for more than six months.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts of the bilge standard discharge connection were found to be heavily corroded.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient port facility for landing cooking oil.
corrective_action: On May 2nd, the PSCO was informed that the proper recordkeeping for landing cooking oil had been found.
preventive_action: The company Garbage Management Plan will be added to the database as a result of the briefings carried out by the Safety Meeting Closure Master.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence that the incident was reported to any authorities.
description_overview: There was no evidence that the incident was reported to any authorities.
immediate_causes: Chemicals are kept in an undesignated area.
root_cause_analysis: There was water coming from the mechanical seal of the No.2 MSCW pump, blanks were put in the discharge valves of the pump, and the water was contained in the Bilge Holding Tank.
corrective_action: Form 18 and 19 were used to report the incident.
preventive_action: The purpose of the training session was to emphasize the importance of recording all defects and non-compliances in the PMS.

deficiency_finding: The battery charge was off at the test.
description_overview: The battery charge was off at the test.
immediate_causes: The issue was fixed in the presence of the PSC Officer and endorsed before leaving the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: The ship crew didn't realize that the GMDSS battery couldn't drop less than 24v during the test period.
corrective_action: The TAYLOR MARINE DEEP SEA SERVICE approved by class should be arranged to board repairing.
preventive_action: Crew was trained to follow ISM SI 100101 and SPR 1002-01 strictly.

deficiency_finding: The Main Deck gas free pipe was Seized.
description_overview: The first flap valve on the line is from the dehumidifier and extends from the pump room to break the forecastle.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: There is a root cause.
corrective_action: Class report was submitted to the local PSC Office after the flap valve was freed up and the satisfactory valve operation was confirmed by Class NK Surveyor during his attendance for occasional survey.
preventive_action: The ship's staff overlooked the necessary valve maintenance because the maintenance task for the subject valve was missed.

deficiency_finding: SOx records are not properly filled.
description_overview: Master instructed to fill-in the change-over log from today onwards.
immediate_causes: The crew didn't pay much attention to filling up the records.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge of how to file evidence in a written procedure.
corrective_action: Fuel oil change over will take place as early as possible if there is a proper fill up of the ship log.
preventive_action: The relevant document and log book will be checked by the ship and company.

deficiency_finding: Documentation for the enhanced survey programme is missing.
description_overview: The vessel is not provided with the necessary information.
immediate_causes: Bulk carrier was stated in the ship's classification certificate, along with other cargo ships.
root_cause_analysis: The certificates were issued for a different type of ship.
corrective_action: When the ship type is "other cargo", Class re-confirmed that ESP documentation is not required.
preventive_action: The Company reviewed this finding with the Master to make sure that any gaps in knowledge are corrected and that the Master is aware of what is required to be checked.

deficiency_finding: Carryage of windmill blade on deck is not revised in the cargo securing manual.
description_overview: The BWMP Appendix 1 is not updated as per the log book.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow R&R, inadequate records are direct causes of unsafe acts.
root_cause_analysis: There are inadequate reference documents.
corrective_action: It was explained to PSCO with some documents provided by charterers.
preventive_action: To consult with class and flagstate if carrying similar cargo in future and documents should be available onboard.

deficiency_finding: The main gyro compass is out of sync.
description_overview: The compass developed an error of more than 4 degrees.
immediate_causes: The gyro compass repeater was malfunctioning during the storm.
root_cause_analysis: The steering gear room does not have proper inspection of the gyro repeater.
corrective_action: The main gyro compass was reasjusted to be in accordance with the gyro heading compass repeater.
preventive_action: Master told the safety officer to do a more thorough inspection of safety items in the steering gear room.

deficiency_finding: The discharge plan is not acknowledged or signed by the stevedores.
description_overview: The discharge plan is not acknowledged or signed by the stevedores.
immediate_causes: The Code of SOLAS and LSA does not meet the requirement of Convention.
root_cause_analysis: The terminal representative should have signed the Ship shore safety checklist and discharge plan.
corrective_action: The terminal representative's acknowledgment of the Ship shore safety checklist and discharge plan was immediately requested by the responsible person.
preventive_action: Before the operation begins, the pre-operation procedures thoroughly discussed and subsequently carried out, and any deficiencies discussed and additional precautions required agreed upon and completely signed by both parties.

deficiency_finding: The crew did not comply with the protection measures.
description_overview: Firefighting outfits on board are fire proximity suits type and may not provide the wearer sufficient thermal protection from radiated heat if entering an enclosed space including machinery and accommodation spaces where a fire is established.
immediate_causes: Equipment not renewed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient instruction.
corrective_action: A meeting was held to highlight the procedure for gangway watch.
preventive_action: During the next safety committee meeting, the company circular will be shared with all crew.

deficiency_finding: Two crew members working on a gangway without appropriate PPE or considering their safety, are an example of how the ships SMS has not adequately ensured safe operations during working at heights and over the side.
description_overview: Two crew members were trying to lower the ship's gangway without wearing proper safety gear.
immediate_causes: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
root_cause_analysis: Poor supervision.
corrective_action: The chief officer instructed the two crew members to wear proper PPE and resume the job after being briefed by the master.
preventive_action: The senior management of the vessel was instructed by the Supremo to ensure that the ship staff are trained and briefed regularly about the importance of wearing proper PPE and the requirements of the SMS relating to safety for different jobs.

deficiency_finding: The emergency fire pump has malfunctioning pipes.
description_overview: The emergency fire pump was found to be inoperative during testing.
immediate_causes: The broken bulbs of indicator lights on the ship's Electrician were replaced immediately by the PSCO who was present on the scene.
root_cause_analysis: The failure was caused by mechanical damage which could not be predicted.
corrective_action: The emergency fire pump and vacuum pump were taken out of their position and put into a new one.
preventive_action: Order and replace existing vacuum pump with new spare parts by the end of December 2022.

deficiency_finding: The connection of the antenna to the ship is no longer strong.
description_overview: The crew pointed out that the connection to the ship's antenna was in need of repair and the relevant spare parts had already been ordered and delivered.
immediate_causes: The mooring rope is used with the guide rollers.
root_cause_analysis: The officers failed to find a crack on the antenna.
corrective_action: The crew replaced the old pipes with new ones.
preventive_action: The issue was reported and the job was scheduled.

deficiency_finding: The lamp battery can't operate it.
description_overview: As part of the pre-arrival checks, the lamp was checked and found in order.
immediate_causes: If the detector still worked after carrying the test, the PIC told the vessel to get the new detector.
root_cause_analysis: The cable wire loosened from the plug.
corrective_action: Good working condition and repaired wire, daylight signaling lamp test.
preventive_action: This finding together with control, root cause and corrective actions applied will be brought to crew attention during regular checks to remind them that sensitive equipment must be handled with care at all times.

deficiency_finding: There were no indications or details about the compulsory two-way radio equip in the fire training manual.
description_overview: During the inspection at the Port of Novorossiysk, the PSC officer noted a box not being checked in the question of 'at-sea maintenance capability' as per the requirements.
immediate_causes: All details for the compulsory radio equipment for firemen have been changed.
root_cause_analysis: The crews are not familiar with the requirements of SOLAS Chapter II-2.
corrective_action: The captain should organize the crew to learn the requirements of SOLAS Chapter II.
preventive_action: Crew in charge will be asked to keep the Fire training Manual up to date.

deficiency_finding: The report of the deficiency will be sent to PSC The Netherlands.
description_overview: The E/G had a fuel leak alarm.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The equipment malfunctioned at the time of the inspection.
corrective_action: The system was tested after installation of new spare.
preventive_action: This deficiency will be shared with the company fleet for checking if the emergency stops are available on board.

deficiency_finding: Emergency systems, lighting, batteries, and switches are on the main deck.
description_overview: All cargo has hatch cover.
immediate_causes: Minor leaks came up due to exposure.
root_cause_analysis: Emergency stop boxes were not checked.
corrective_action: Emergency boxes were freed during the PSC inspection.
preventive_action: To make sure emergency stop boxes and emergency switches are not missed in the future, a routine has been introduced.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence that the vessel carried SOPEP training.
description_overview: A crew member wearing a fireman outfit is not familiar with the proper use of self-contained breathing apparatus.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Every time there is a new crew, the PCSO looks for the records of the individual reading confirmation.
corrective_action: The training was performed to all crew members and the acknowledgement list was updated.
preventive_action: The SOPEP acknowledgement list, which used as an additional tool to be always completely and updated, will be confirmed under the management in the form of Fleet Notice.

deficiency_finding: The shower and eyewash will be available on the deck.
description_overview: The vessel was taken over by technical management.
immediate_causes: The eye wash and emergency shower on both sides have been tested and found satisfactory.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector verified that the Emergency showers and eye wash were working and maintained well, but the stbd side eyewash's few holes of the nozzles were found blocked with debris.
corrective_action: Emergency shower and eye washing, routine maintenance, and testing are some of the things Master has told the crew.
preventive_action: The Technical Supremo verified the effectiveness of the closure during the Technical Inspection of the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The VHF is unlit.
description_overview: After gangway was rigged, the vessel was boarded by PSC, but the lights on the main mast were not on.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The light above the unit was replaced.
preventive_action: There was no ongoing Defect List for navigation equipment.

deficiency_finding: Exhaust manifolds have insufficient heat insulation.
description_overview: Fire-fighting equipment.
immediate_causes: Lack of awareness of the importance of securing spare parts.
root_cause_analysis: The company was overlooked because of the lack of fire fighting inspection regs.
corrective_action: Exhaust manifolds covered by insulation material.
preventive_action: The lesson learnt was sent to the fleet to verify the condition of the vessel.

deficiency_finding: Steering gear room floor is oily.
description_overview: The main engine fuel oil leakage alarm was bypassed.
immediate_causes: The crew did not have a tight well connection.
root_cause_analysis: There was a trace of oil.
corrective_action: The immediately on-site was closed by the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: The crew members took care of the oil trace.

deficiency_finding: The implementation of SMS was filled.
description_overview: As a result of the defeciencies, the PSC wrote on the inspection report that "SMS as implemented onboard failed to ensure the effectivene maintenance of ship and and equipment equipments and adequate emergency prepareness per evidenced by related defeciencies."
immediate_causes: Master contacted the local agent to get permission from the port authority to carry out the drill.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance for the entire ship is ongoing but we are one step behind during inspection due to the fact that equipment that is susceptible to damage is missing.
corrective_action: In order to continue the maintenance program, more crew needs to be onboard.
preventive_action: The company wants to continue uplifting the maintenance of the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The controller of the atmospheric valve is faulty.
description_overview: In line with the Company's Safety Management System and as a part of pre-arrival checks, the Inert Gas System was tried out and found that the deck high pressure alarm was not reset.
immediate_causes: HFO Settling insulation tank lagging is broken.
root_cause_analysis: Equipment malfunction.
corrective_action: Testing of IGG system is covered under the ship specific computerized planned maintenance system.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer and all Engine room staff were briefed on proper maintenance procedures.

deficiency_finding: The SART battery expired.
description_overview: The battery of the SART was showing an end of life date at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Lack of situational awareness and inadequate monitoring and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: The new SART batteries were not ordered in time.
corrective_action: After trying out the new batteries, they were installed in the Next Port of call Singapore.
preventive_action: The monthly navigation and communication equipment status report will be exchanged with the company.

deficiency_finding: The cable under the passage on deck is in poor condition.
description_overview: About 60 percent of the supports are in poor, corroded or damaged condition.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear.
corrective_action: These are known and followed conditions and could not be fixed during the winter.
preventive_action: This observation will be shared and discussed during company-run seminars and in house pre-joining meetings, as regular checks and maintenances will continue to ensure vessels condition and further actions will be taken if required.

deficiency_finding: ARPA TX time's magnetron was found late.
description_overview: The suits for duty officer in bridge are not appropriate.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The performance test was carried out by the end of every watch and both radars were in good working condition.
corrective_action: Instructions were given to the Chief Officer and the Electrician to prepare for the renewal of the magnetron.
preventive_action: A training session was conducted by the Master to Deck Officers and Electrician to discuss company's compliance with monitoring and maintenance of navigation equipment.

deficiency_finding: The ship's hull had paint taken off and rust on it.
description_overview: There was a bridge wing microphone at the monitor.
immediate_causes: The damage to the paint coating on the ship's side was caused by contact with the shore fender during the intensive operation along the Australia-China route.
root_cause_analysis: Touch-up painting was done whenever possible due to the intensive non stop trade and short anchorage time.
corrective_action: Due Date: 29th of February, Status: Completed.
preventive_action: Depending on the ship's side plating condition, consider in future to go to Drydock during Intermediate surveys for paint hull refreshment, such approach will also contribute to the fuel saving in view

deficiency_finding: Fire doors in galley and on deck store are not working.
description_overview: The galley fire door was fixed to make it easier to get to it.
immediate_causes: Insufficient crew awareness on fire prevention.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient crew awareness on fire prevention.
corrective_action: The galley fire doors were dismantled and the deck store doors were replaced.
preventive_action: The issue of fire doors not closing properly and remaining open will be discussed in the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is a lack of familiarity in the operation of GMDSS.
description_overview: Low.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Due to their bad condition, the instructions were taken down and not reposted in their previous position.
corrective_action: The officer posts the instructions from the operational manual near the equipment.
preventive_action: The Master requested that all helpful information be posted near the equipment.

deficiency_finding: There is no information in the Fire training manual about two-way radio.
description_overview: Code 17 should be fixed before departure.
immediate_causes: The walkie talkie was ready for use on the bridge.
root_cause_analysis: The Fire training manual with new requirement of Firemen walkie talkie was not updated.
corrective_action: The instructions for location and use of accessories for Firemen were prepared by the vessel.
preventive_action: Information with all vessels will be shared by the company.

deficiency_finding: The equipment has a fault.
description_overview: The condition of the ship and its equipment will be maintained to conform with the provisions of the present regulations to ensure that the ship in all respects will remain fit to proceed to sea without danger to the ship or persons aboard.
immediate_causes: The No 2 Steering Control Power Supply Unit had a component malfunction.
root_cause_analysis: The PCB component failed.
corrective_action: The service engineer for trouble shooting attended the vessel on the 4th Sept.
preventive_action: Investigate possibility of changing remaining steering control system PCBs.

deficiency_finding: The crew was not properly instructed about their duties as the fireman's outfit was not checked and they were not properly dressed.
description_overview: There was no damage to the lines or the sensor.
immediate_causes: The garbage drums were not secured by the engine staff.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to demonstrate is one of the causes of inadequate leadership.
corrective_action: On 25-Nov-2023, proper donning of fireman's outfit with correct procedures for fire drill were demonstrated in presence of Fleet Manager.
preventive_action: In order to prevent this occurrence, this observation will be shared with all the fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: Seafarers' employment agreement is expired.
description_overview: The Electrician and the 2nd Engineer were found to have expired.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Oversight by the PIC.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed during the inspection in order to extend contracts by 5 days.
preventive_action: This is an auditable observation and will be verified during future superintendent's inspections.

deficiency_finding: On the starboard side, the valve handle of the line is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The crew did not close the Fuel Oil leak box drain valves for the alarm after performing a maintenance job on No.2 and No.3 Aux Engines.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow R&R, inadequate records are direct causes of unsafe acts.
root_cause_analysis: In order to make sure that no mixing of different grades of fuel will occur when receiving FO, a blank plate has been inserted.
corrective_action: The procedure to open and close the valve by removal of the inserted blind as safety measure to avoid commingling the fuels was explained to the PSC officers.
preventive_action: To Speak up clearly to PSC officers so no doubt to be raised.

deficiency_finding: The overflow tank in E/R is not self closing.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: The self closing valves of the overflow tank were seized during testing by the PSC inspector.
corrective_action: The person in charge dismantled the self closing valve and returned it to its original position, which was accepted by the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: The person in charge with the supervision of the Chief Engineer must make sure that the valves are in good working order.

deficiency_finding: The expired date was for the HRU marking.
description_overview: The company must take corrective action on the ISM system within 3 months.
immediate_causes: Not under their control.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient practice.
corrective_action: The importance of checking the equipment's expiry date was discussed during the safety meeting.
preventive_action: The importance of checking the HRU actual expiry was discussed during the safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is drainage.
description_overview: The sink drain is at the deck level.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: The staff was not aware of the health issues that could arise due to improper drainage.
corrective_action: The new drainpipe was installed on July 1, 2023.
preventive_action: The vessel staff was briefed on:  Planning and obtaining resources for permanent repairs after temporary repairs.

deficiency_finding: There is partial heat insulation for M/E fuel drain pipe.
description_overview: There is a corridor short of a handrail at the 'A' deck of accommodation space.
immediate_causes: The office was told.
root_cause_analysis: The insulation material should have been re-installed by the Oiler after the securing pipe works.
corrective_action: The missing heat insulation from M/E fuel drain pipe and steam pipe was immediately re-installed by engine crew and verified by PSC officer.
preventive_action: This deficiency will be reported to all company's vessels in order to prevent it from occurring on any of our vessels.

deficiency_finding: While discharging operation was in progress, a 'notice of cessation of operation' was raised by the Port State Control as the shore gangway was not designed to carry out the weight.
description_overview: While discharging operation was in progress, a 'notice of cessation of operation' was raised by the Port State Control as the shore gangway was not designed to carry out the weight.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Master was reluctant to exercise his authority over the terminal since it was a common practice.
corrective_action: This topic will be recorded in our terminal database for Masters awareness for future calls in this terminal, as well as a briefing to be given by the Master to all Deck Officers and deck crew pointing out the inadequacy of the ship's rails to support the weight of the gangway.
preventive_action: The next Inhouse seminar will emphasize to Master's the importance of inspecting equipment provided by shore as well as securing means and location.

deficiency_finding: The Safety Management System has failed to ensure safe operation safety of crew and safety management.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: The door wasn't closing due to Deformation.
root_cause_analysis: Complacency on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on
corrective_action: The training and education onboard should be conducted as per the SMS Procedure.
preventive_action: Use of onboard video training as provided in the e-video training modules of KARCO to supplement the training and drills conducted onboard.

deficiency_finding: The crew did not comply with the protection measures.
description_overview: Firefighting outfits on board are fire proximity suits type and may not provide the wearer sufficient thermal protection from radiated heat if entering an enclosed space including machinery and accommodation spaces where a fire is established.
immediate_causes: Equipment not renewed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient instruction.
corrective_action: A meeting was held to highlight the procedure for gangway watch.
preventive_action: During the next safety committee meeting, the company circular will be shared with all crew.

deficiency_finding: The echo sounder printing device is malfunctioning.
description_overview: During the pre-arrival checks for Novorossiysk port, the Echo sounder printer was fully operational, but it failed to start.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Equipment that is deficient in supervision.
corrective_action: The sounder printer was checked by an electrician.
preventive_action: The 2nd officer was briefed by the master about regular checks of the bridge equipment and any issues to be reported immediately.

deficiency_finding: The NOX record should only include the ID number of the engine parts.
description_overview: In case of a low pressure, the M/E F.O. feeders and booster pumps cannot be started automatically.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of initial training.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer should have recorded the full ID - D34 DII-137TE2810 when he carried out the maintenance.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer filled the entire installed ID as per the NOx listed in front of PSCO.
preventive_action: The lesson learnt by the Chief Engineer to avoid the same mistake will be shared with all engineers.

deficiency_finding: The exhaust of the galley is not clean.
description_overview: The galley sink was taken out to clear the drainpipe.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The galley crew neglected to clean the galley during the last week, which caused the deficiency to be raised.
corrective_action: The relevant evidence was provided to the PSC officer.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels were told to carry out a thorough inspection at the galley.

deficiency_finding: L.T. cooling water pumps are missing safety guards.
description_overview: The INMARSAT-C date role has been replaced due to old software.
immediate_causes: Installation problems and vessel's inherent vibration are to blame for the hairline crack.
root_cause_analysis: It was stressed that problem detection was less than adequate.
corrective_action: There were guards on rotating parts of the pump.
preventive_action: It is for their own safety that these rules are in place.

deficiency_finding: There was a lot of ice in the freezer for meat.
description_overview: Due to the accumulated ice above food, the cold room/ meet room did not thaw out.
immediate_causes: Failure of the cook to fulfill the assigned tasks is a human factor.
root_cause_analysis: Ice accumulated over food.
corrective_action: The meat room had ice in it and it was clean.
preventive_action: Proper instructions to be posted for daily inspections of food in cold rooms.

deficiency_finding: Chains by the starboard liferaft are closed.
description_overview: The monthly liferaft inspection was not recorded correctly last month.
immediate_causes: Testing was carried out after the repair and it was found to be in good working order.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of lubrication and maintenance.
corrective_action: Hooks were de-rusted and painted.
preventive_action: Maintenance can be carried out to check the hooks for easy opening.

deficiency_finding: Sounding pipes of sludge tank, over flow tank and double bottom D.O. tank.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: The sounding pipes' condition was already identified by the Chief Engineer and he instructed the crew to fix it.
corrective_action: Prior to PSCO's disembarkation, subject issues were fixed.
preventive_action: PSC Deficiencies will be discussed during the next Safety Meeting in order to enhance Crew awareness and avoid reoccurrence of the same deficiencies to be granted to the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The fire door is open at the time of inspection.
description_overview: In multi-engine installations which are supplied from the same fuel source, means of isolating the fuel supply and spill piping to individual engines shall be provided.
immediate_causes: The garbage drums were not secured by the engine staff.
root_cause_analysis: Adjusting self-closed devices on fire doors by crew on board is not a good idea.
corrective_action: The crew on board completed adjusting of self-closed device for all fire doors in close position as per requirements.
preventive_action: The crew on board will make sure that all fire doors with self-closed device are in good condition and that they are closed in normal condition.

deficiency_finding: The flag was allowed to be flown until 15 April 2023.
description_overview: The self-closing door at the poop deck is malfunctioning over time.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The sensor is affected by marine growth.
corrective_action: Dispensation was received from flag and class.
preventive_action: There will be hull cleaning at the next drydock.

deficiency_finding: There is a self-closing valve on the E/R floor.
description_overview: The self-closing valves for the ME space, HFO overflow tank and cofferdam tanks were checked recently and it was suspected that they weren't closing on time.
immediate_causes: There was a malfunction with the sample pump.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance and supervision.
corrective_action: The self-closing valves were fitted back after being dismantled and cleaned.
preventive_action: The senior management of the vessel was told to take frequent rounds around the vessel to make sure the weaknesses are fixed immediately.

deficiency_finding: The VDR annual performance test certificate is missing.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: The L2 manifolds didn't close within 30 seconds.
root_cause_analysis: Procedures not followed.
corrective_action: The performance test certificate can be obtained from the office.
preventive_action: Master will make sure that it is kept in a certificate folder.

deficiency_finding: There was an inoperative radio installation.
description_overview: The master was told to put in place safety procedures for access to the ship from shore.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The Master told the inspector that the crew had already identified the problem with the radio and that arrangements had been made for a technician to fix it.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: The isolator/connection box has a radio antenna wire broken off.
description_overview: The isolator/connection box has a radio antenna wire broken off.
immediate_causes: Maintenance and inspection are improper.
root_cause_analysis: The 2/O did not do enough to detect that the isolator/connection box had become disconnected from the radio equipment.
corrective_action: The ship crew was arranged to connect and secure the grounded wire after the inspector pointed it out.
preventive_action: The proper functioning of the radio equipment, as well as the thorough inspection of the antennas and grounding wires, will be ensured by the responsible officer and crew.

deficiency_finding: The Lifeboat Service station has an authorization for annual (2023) and five yearly servicing not found.
description_overview: The new crew joined the vessel on April 4, 2022, after the vessel had undergone a change of management.
immediate_causes: On 18-Aug-22, Gyro No.1 became faulty and was immediately reported to the office.
root_cause_analysis: The approval letter of the service technicians who had carried out servicing and testing was not available onboard.
corrective_action: The situation was explained to Techno Fibre Middle East Marine Services and the details of the external specialist who had carried out servicing and testing of free fall lifeboats part of 5 yearly inspection were obtained.
preventive_action: The human element was discussed with the master and he was told about the requirement to file the details along with the maker approval certificate of the technicians performing annual / 5 yearly inspection and service of all LSA/FFA items along with the test certificate.

deficiency_finding: There is a cable protection plate on the Main deck.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance for damaged sections of the cable protector cover was noted during the PSC inspection.
corrective_action: The new protectors were stored on the vessel.
preventive_action: Lesson learned was sent to all vessels via company e-pos system.

deficiency_finding: One of the portable gas detectors isn't working.
description_overview: A portable gas detector.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The equipment was in good working order and had been used daily to determine gas content in cargo holds filled with coal.
corrective_action: Two of the portable gas detectors are usable and back up for the faulty one.
preventive_action: The master is supposed to make sure that the maintenance routines provided by Martin Brussgaard for the Gas detectors are followed, kept fully charged and the self test is carried out before use.

deficiency_finding: The fresh water line is corroding.
description_overview: The fresh water line was not maintained.
immediate_causes: Errors were allowed to go undetected because of inadequate Monitoring and supervision during the assembly and rigging process.
root_cause_analysis: The fresh water line was not maintained according to the procedure.
corrective_action: The fresh water line has been renewed.
preventive_action: The fresh water line was checked and the heavy corroded line was renewed.

deficiency_finding: The Captain and Chief Officer were not familiar with the procedures.
description_overview: The P&S rubber seals partially perished.
immediate_causes: Minor damages to Tank Dome seals were noted during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow procedures and lack of proper familiarization is the cause of this deficiency.
corrective_action: Every 8 hours, a thorough monitoring is required to ensure early detection of harmful leaking gas.
preventive_action: All vessels with guidelines for  fumigation will receive a fleet letter.

deficiency_finding: There are incorrect setttings on the bridge.
description_overview: The bridge wings settings have incorrect Rpm and Rudder indicators.
immediate_causes: The bridge wings settings have incorrect Rpm and Rudder indicators.
root_cause_analysis: Defective equipment.
corrective_action: The proper adjustment of Rudder angle indicators was carried out.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be communicated to the fleet for swift actions.

deficiency_finding: The C/H pipe on the deck is almost missing.
description_overview: In order to allow the shore loader to access the hatches, the crew had to take breaks to maintain the air draft.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The ratings who usually handle this were ignorant of the fact that a few of the caps were made from Teflon and not brass.
corrective_action: New brass caps were provided on board and there was enough spare to use in the future.
preventive_action: In an extra ordinary safety meeting after departure, Master told the crew that brass or steel closing devices are the only acceptable material for the load line items.

deficiency_finding: There is a cracked deck at the port side provision crane.
description_overview: Insufficient maintenance.
immediate_causes: There were 6 pieces of pipe support that were corrosive and 3 that werecracked due to insufficient maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The unfaithfulness of the rating.
corrective_action: The cracked area to be repaired by vsl under NKK and discussion with Yard Built was issued as a target date by the COC.
preventive_action: This deficiency will be included in the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The Sea Water line pipe is leaking.
description_overview: PSCO observed penetrations into several junction boxes in the engine room, including the main engine junction box #3.
immediate_causes: The excessive wear and tear is not related to routine maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Poor work planning Leak was identified after her last departure from China and maintenance was deferred to next call at disport, where vessel is expected to have a longer port stay.
corrective_action: During her port stay, the pipe line will be fabricated and replaced.
preventive_action: The training center requested to include a training course about the safety and potential risks involved due to any SW leaks.

deficiency_finding: Cleanliness is not sanitary.
description_overview: There are sanitary facilities.
immediate_causes: Due to short passage and lack of awareness of situational importance of hygiene, the washrooms on the ship were not immediately cleaned and maintained.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was reminded of their responsibilities and warned to be more careful during ship operations.
corrective_action: The planning of PSC deficiency items.
preventive_action: There will be training for PSC deficiency items.

deficiency_finding: There is a gap between floor covering and the crew messroom.
description_overview: The fresh stock of provisions was supplied to the vessel on 18th April at San Francisco.
immediate_causes: Poor workmanship on the delivery of the vessel led to the floor bulge in the crew messroom.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance and inspections.
corrective_action: The flooring materials, including cement, adhesive, and floor covering, were supplied on board, professional assistance/training was provided to crew by shore workshop who supplied repair material.
preventive_action: During a routine engagement call, the senior management onboard was briefed on the importance of effective compliance with established maintenance/ inspection routines in the planned maintenance system and the flooring condition in the accommodation areas must be maintained to a high standard.

deficiency_finding: There is a bad gasket on the entrance to the engine room.
description_overview: Engine crew replaced the ceramic glass gasket of the entrance to the engine room.
immediate_causes: The gasket of the fire door is rotten.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of compliance with company requirements.
corrective_action: Engine crew replaced the ceramic glass gasket of the entrance to the engine room.
preventive_action: During next quarterly maintenance/ inspection and submission of TEC 27 'Quarterly LSA-FFE Maintenance Checklist' and MAR02 'Deck Equipment Maintenance Booklet' end of September, the vessel was instructed to submit date imprinted photo evidence of all fire doors condition.

deficiency_finding: GAS TEMPERATURE GAUGE FOR NO1 CYLINDER OF M/E OUT.
description_overview: The Safety Light for fireman's outfit was found to be in good working order.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance management.
corrective_action: The temperature went up with a new one.
preventive_action: Returned with Spare on the plane.

deficiency_finding: There is an engine international Air pollution prevention certificate.
description_overview: There is a statement of compliance for the engine international air pollution prevention certificate, but not for the EIAPP certificate.
immediate_causes: Master is responsible for the upkeep of the certificate.
root_cause_analysis: Wrong data was entered during the issuance of the certificate.
corrective_action: The EIAPP certificate was renewed with correct data.
preventive_action: The data in the EIAPP certificate is correct, according to a fleet circular sent to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: The shipboard safety management system was not implemented as per the ISM elements 8 and 10.
description_overview: The key was not kept by the captain.
immediate_causes: The deficiencies were reported to the office and assistance was sought to correct them.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient compliance to procedures established in the company's safety management system was the last internal audit done by office.
corrective_action: The deficiencies were reported to the office and assistance was sought to correct them.
preventive_action: A Fleet Alert is to be sent to all vessels and must be discussed with all crew to avoid a repeat of the PSC observation.

deficiency_finding: There are two reset buttons in the chart room and radio room.
description_overview: There is a chemical and oil store.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow up rule/regulation.
corrective_action: There are two buttons in the chart and radio room that need to be removed.
preventive_action: To improve crew's safety awareness as well as continuous onboard training by office staff.

deficiency_finding: There is a leak of oil at the rescue boat.
description_overview: The No.3 Generator has a fuel oil pipe.
immediate_causes: Maintenance is improper.
root_cause_analysis: The oil level was close to minimum during the weekly test and the engineer had to refill the oil tank.
corrective_action: The rescue boat was tested again by emergency method and found no more leaks.
preventive_action: Staff need to check the oil level and tight the cap of the tank before testing the rescue boat davit.

deficiency_finding: The cold/refrigerator room temperature check stopped for the last three days.
description_overview: Heavy parts stored on deck are not protected from movement.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: All four cold/refrigerator rooms have temperature records that can be found on the locally maintained list.
corrective_action: All cold/refrigerator rooms' records from the ER book are immediately transferred to local lists.
preventive_action: The crew was told that the lists of temperatures should be updated daily.

deficiency_finding: Light covers in E/R have been damaged.
description_overview: Light covers in E/R have been damaged.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: The technical manager took over the vessel with no stock from the previous management.
corrective_action: Exchange light covers should be installed after delivery.
preventive_action: A certain stock should always be on board.

deficiency_finding: The BWMS must be maintained by the master, owner, operator, agent, or person in charge of the vessel.
description_overview: The BWMS must be maintained by the master, owner, operator, agent, or person in charge of the vessel.
immediate_causes: Insufficient review instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The inoperable BWTS was reported to the USCG before entering the US waters.
