corrective_action: Training was carried out by the service engineer regarding BWTS operation and its maintenance of the relevant ship staff.
preventive_action: After a crew change, the Chief Officer and Chief Engineer must ensure that relevant crew members are trained in the proper operation and maintenance of the BWTS.

deficiency_finding: There are several off scans showing in the ECR monitoring.
description_overview: There are numerous pipe support on the main deck that are cracked and Wasted.
immediate_causes: The company was notified.
root_cause_analysis: It was found that the case had been identified and reported.
corrective_action: The safety committee met to discuss the deficiency.
preventive_action: The safety committee met to discuss the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: The crew was unfamiliar with the operation of oily water separator and its oil content monitoring system.
description_overview: The crew couldn't say anything to the inspector because there weren't any valves on the diagram.
immediate_causes: The crew did not know about the 2 valves pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: nil
corrective_action: Training was done for all engine crew on the operation of oily water separator.
preventive_action: Crew to participate in weekly testing and operation of oily water separator.

deficiency_finding: The last one was in Port of New Orleans.
description_overview: The initial fire drill did not demonstrate adequate familiarity.
immediate_causes: The MARSEC level is on the upper landing platform of the gangway.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer did not have effective supervision and inspection.
corrective_action: The agent reported the non-conformity deficiency to the PSCO before sailing and got his confirmation.
preventive_action: The master will supervise and guide the work of the Chief Officer.

deficiency_finding: Both sets are required for dangerous goods that are not ready to use.
description_overview: The SCBA sets are placed in the location as per the approved fire plan for the vessel.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision by the master.
corrective_action: The master and PSCO were satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: The master will make sure the BA sets are working normally.

deficiency_finding: The books of engine parameters should be kept.
description_overview: The record books of engine parameters are not always filled in.
immediate_causes: The third mate was not aware of the special requirements of the Nav logbook regrading drill record.
root_cause_analysis: The engineer's duties can cause records not to be done consistently.
corrective_action: NOx related records were supplemented immediately.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer instructed on records related to NOx.

deficiency_finding: The fire line drain valve port side was damaged.
description_overview: The Engine room has 4 chairs that are damaged.
immediate_causes: The broken drain cock for the U type line on the port side main deck was not found during a routine inspection and was not maintained in good condition.
root_cause_analysis: The drain valve handle for the fire line port side is damaged due to rust.
corrective_action: The old and rusty fire line drain valve on the port side was removed by the Master and replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: To ensure that the fire line drain valves on deck are working properly and that no damage is done to the equipment for smooth operation, the PIC must carry out regular rounds of inspection.

deficiency_finding: Air is escaping from the top of the mask when the two crew members are wearing the BA set.
description_overview: The SCBA sets are placed in the location as per the approved fire plan for the vessel.
immediate_causes: The correct donning procedure was explained to the crew members after they were briefed on the inspector's concern.
root_cause_analysis: In the presence of PSCO, the crew was briefed on the proper donning procedures of SCBA sets.
corrective_action: The BA sets were donned by all the Fire Fighters as part of the corrective measures.
preventive_action: The next theme as part of monthly safety day training across the fleet will be focused on the correct donning procedure of Fireman's suits and SCBA sets.

deficiency_finding: The work hours of the C/E and Bunker operators are different.
description_overview: The number of endorsements does not match the original Philippine CoC.
immediate_causes: The crew on duty did not follow the rules.
root_cause_analysis: There are three things that need to be done to comply with MLC.
corrective_action: The master was satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: The master will make sure the rest hours of the crew are kept up.

deficiency_finding: The Hull was noted with some kind of problem.
description_overview: There was a long period of sailing from the previous dry dock.
immediate_causes: Delays of maintenance were caused by previous port restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: Poor supervision and maintenance.
corrective_action: Will be done in the shipyard.
preventive_action: Special attention needs to be paid to the dry dock when the hull needs to be painted and when the crew needs to protect it.

deficiency_finding: There is a safe working load that is missing in the engine room workshop.
description_overview: Low.
immediate_causes: Rules and regulations are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: The inDICATION was delayed due to maintenance work.
corrective_action: There was a new inDICATION for safe working load that was approved in both areas.
preventive_action: To avoid extinction, finding will be prioritized to all breeches.

deficiency_finding: The standard compass error is not determined at least once per watch.
description_overview: The last watch for the voyage from Dardanelles to Constanta did not include an entry for related error calculation.
immediate_causes: The handle lever of the fish room has been tested.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow procedures saves time and effort.
corrective_action: Regardless of the vessel's status, the master instructed all OOWs to record the compass correction log.
preventive_action: All fleet was made aware of the need to keep Log regardless of the vessel's status.

deficiency_finding: The vessel safety management system onboard was found not to be effective as per ISM element 7.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: The company was notified.
root_cause_analysis: The implementation of laid down company procedures towards ISM compliance was not carried out onboard.
corrective_action: stringent checks/inspections/maintenance would be required to comply with regulations and safety of personnel, vessel and environment after an extraordinary safety meeting with all staff onboard.
preventive_action: The heads of departments were instructed to carry out effective ISM compliance and to monitor the inspection regimes of the junior officers.

deficiency_finding: The buoy release pins are difficult to remove.
description_overview: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
immediate_causes: The deficiency was corrected during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The company's procedures state that the safety officer is responsible for checking the overall condition of all safety equipment.
corrective_action: The Monthly PSCI performance will be used as loss prevention for all crew awareness.
preventive_action: The Monthly PSCI performance will be used as loss prevention for all crew awareness.

deficiency_finding: The water system has a fault alarm.
description_overview: There is a cover letter for the Tonnage Certificate, but it is not available on board.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow repair/ maintenance instructions.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of supervision.
corrective_action: There was a re-tightened wire connection.
preventive_action: During the extra safety meeting, a discussion of the present deficiency was done.

deficiency_finding: The antenna was bent.
description_overview: The crew pointed out that the connection to the ship's antenna was in need of repair and the relevant spare parts had already been ordered and delivered.
immediate_causes: There was a positive test result after the last test.
root_cause_analysis: Strong winds in the past have caused the whip to bend at the fixed end.
corrective_action: Remove the Whip antenna from transponder.
preventive_action: The antenna whip was bent, but there was no immediate concern with the operation of equipment.

deficiency_finding: China's ECA was not specified in the Passage Plan Voyage 008L from Singapore to Yang Jiang.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: Conducted training on last minute changes to passage plan.
root_cause_analysis: The information is not mandatory in the passage plan.
corrective_action: The environment section of the passage plan will be briefed by the bridge team.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There are motor protective guards that are rotating.
description_overview: There are dangerous areas with several pumps without protective cover.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The pumps have a design.
corrective_action: punched metal around open rotating parts of several pumps in E/R
preventive_action: If necessary, the company will take further action.

deficiency_finding: The load line mark will consist of a ring 300mm in diameter and 25mm wide, with a horizontal ling 450mm in length and 25mm in breath, the upper edge of which will pass through the center of the ring.
description_overview: The medical fitness certificate for the Chief Cook was issued for a different reason.
immediate_causes: The crew made a mistake when painting the load line marks.
root_cause_analysis: The open/close indication was not renewed after the mistake by the Safety Officer.
corrective_action: The crew covered the lower load line mark which was not used with paint.
preventive_action: Carry out a training about ship's load lines.

deficiency_finding: A vessel can't take a compass to determine the risk of a collision.
description_overview: The officer on watch was limited to taking the compass bearing from the conning position.
immediate_causes: The actions will be implemented according to the company's requirements and ISM Code provisions.
root_cause_analysis: The officer on watch was limited to taking the compass bearing from the conning position.
corrective_action: The ability to take visual bearings from the conning position was restored.
preventive_action: With the alternatives provided to provide compass bearing ability on board and accepted by the flag, any further enhancement advise is being explored.

deficiency_finding: There is an engine international Air pollution prevention certificate.
description_overview: There is a statement of compliance for the engine international air pollution prevention certificate, but not for the EIAPP certificate.
immediate_causes: Master is responsible for upkeep of the certificate.
root_cause_analysis: Wrong data was entered during the issuance of the certificate.
corrective_action: The EIAPP certificate was renewed with correct data.
preventive_action: The data in the EIAPP certificate is correct, according to a fleet circular sent to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: The company name on the DOC is not the same as on the CSR.
description_overview: The company name on the DOC is not the same as on the CSR.
immediate_causes: The company stated in the CSR doc that it was not the same as the DOC.
root_cause_analysis: The company stated in the CSR doc that it wasn't the same as the DOC.
corrective_action: In case of discrepancy, the master must cross check all certificates and report the office.
preventive_action: Keeping up to date all trading certificates is carried out by the Education (Education and Training) Briefing of master.

deficiency_finding: The Outlet valve of the breathing apparatus air cylinder is leaking.
description_overview: The action code is 17/10/2018.
immediate_causes: Unforeseen defect.
root_cause_analysis: The breathing apparatus air cylinder was found leaking during the PSC inspection, even if the magnetic compass had been checked before the vessel arrived at the port.
corrective_action: Crew personnel fixed the malfunction on the spot and the PSC officer closed the deficiency before he disembarked.
preventive_action: The company pre-PSC preparation checklist was updated and a circular was issued to inform all company fleet vessels avoiding the same deficiencies in the future.

deficiency_finding: It was not possible for Vessel to implement cyber risk management.
description_overview: Instructions and procedures to ensure safe operation of ships should be included in every company's safety management system.
immediate_causes: The officer forgot to put the blocker back in ECDIS as he was rushing to finish the plan.
root_cause_analysis: Master and Navigating Officer didn't know that a password should be kept in computers.
corrective_action: The deleted file 'Computer Credentials' is kept in Master's custody.
preventive_action: Master's weekly verification and before arrival port that cyber security management is being maintained.

deficiency_finding: There is oil on the emergency stand.
description_overview: The ship staff post completion of a task is referred to in the observation as improper housekeeping.
immediate_causes: Failure to secure.
root_cause_analysis: Improper cleaning.
corrective_action: The crew painted the job site to make it look better after cleaning the emergency stand.
preventive_action: Management advised the Master to discuss the contents of the observation with the ship staff to highlight the importance of securing the job site after completion of the task.

deficiency_finding: The chart number C1312000, C1313000, C1315400,C1315101,C1513121 is listed in the voyage plan from Guangzhou to Shenzhen.
description_overview: Load lines - ICLL 2003 amend.
immediate_causes: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
corrective_action: 2/O uploaded the ENC permit again and showed all the updates.
preventive_action: Before the voyage begins, the master will check the effectiveness and results of the training given to 2/O.

deficiency_finding: The tapes of the rescue boat are damaged.
description_overview: The engine room of the vessel has been meticulously maintained and is currently in good working condition.
immediate_causes: The actual status of the tapes is good but they are not in good shape.
root_cause_analysis: The actual status of the tapes is good but they are not in good shape.
corrective_action: The crew immediately replaced the tapes that were pointed out by the PSC officer.
preventive_action: If degraded quality is observed, the master should inform the crew on following the inspection schedule and renewing the tapes.

deficiency_finding: The watchkeeping personnel/shipboard working arrangement did not include the addition of the 3rd officer.
description_overview: During the Emergency steering gear drill, the steering gear emergency phone and headphones were tested and found to be working well.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The deck watchkeeping schedule was immediately updated by the responsible person to include the additional 3/O as a watchkeeping officer and posted on Bridge and other designated areas.
preventive_action: This observation has been shared with all fleet vessels and Masters have been requested to send the completed checklist for the Paris and Tokyo MoU's Concentrated Inspection Campaign (CIC) on STCW to verify compliance

deficiency_finding: AnNEX I samples were found next to ANNEX II bottles outside of containment.
description_overview: The International Bulk Chemical Code requires that samples be kept away from each other.
immediate_causes: The person failed to comply with the requirements.
root_cause_analysis: It was discovered that the responsible officer was familiar with the procedures.
corrective_action: The company's procedures separated the cargo samples.
preventive_action: The matter was discussed during the Safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The sink and faucet are in poor condition.
description_overview: The sink and faucet are in poor condition.
immediate_causes: There was a missingPLUG.
root_cause_analysis: People are related.
corrective_action: The sink faucet and drain should be fixed by the end of the inspection.
preventive_action: LAUNDRY FACILITIES checks are included in the following:

deficiency_finding: There is insufficient air pressure in the fire control station.
description_overview: There was no fitness equipment in the gym.
immediate_causes: A spare bottle of the SCBA was partially filled.
root_cause_analysis: The Bulk Carrier Pre-Arrival preparation was incomplete.
corrective_action: The bottle was immediately charged to max pressure.
preventive_action: All SCBA bottles pressure were checked and refilled.

deficiency_finding: The meat temperature was 12C and the fish temperature was 13C.
description_overview: The refrigerators that were put in place didn't have thermometers installed.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: A rise in temperatures was caused by the defrosting of the meat and fish room and a thorough cleaning of the rooms.
corrective_action: The meat and fish rooms were not allowed to be entered after the cleaning of the room due to the low temperature.
preventive_action: The temperature of the meat and fish rooms must not rise above the allowable range, which was observed prior to the departure yard.

deficiency_finding: The sludge tank manhole is open in the engine room.
description_overview: The embarkation ladder for the starboard side survival craft rusted seriously.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: It wasn't implemented seriously on board.
corrective_action: The cover should be closed and the screw tightened.
preventive_action: The training crew is familiar with the requirement.

deficiency_finding: The plan was not presented by the crew, but it was approved by the person in charge of the operation.
description_overview: The Emergency efficiency certificate was issued to the vessel at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: During the last rescue boat drill on 19th May 2023, the wire rope for the pin of the rescue boat hook got detached from the hook while trying out.
root_cause_analysis: Improper attempt to save time/effort, Misunderstood instruction/information, and inadequate identification of requirement are some of the things that have been reported.
preventive_action: During the next safety committee meeting, the master will conduct a discussion with all officers to increase awareness of QHSE Section 2.7 Certificates, Surveys and Inspections to be Complied with.

deficiency_finding: The starboard side plimsoll line was not conspicuously marked.
description_overview: The starboard ship side plimsoll line was found to be rusty.
immediate_causes: Human factors are not applicable.
root_cause_analysis: Starboard ship side plimsoll line mark didn't re-painted due to vessel having no anchorage or permission granted from port authorities, also long voyage from Argentina to Singapore in adverse weather has led to formation of rust on marks.
corrective_action: To be highlighted by painting.
preventive_action: To inform the Vessel Manager in regard to issue of re-paint draft / Loadline / Plimsoll marks by Jibe with Finding and request permission at port, by port authorities or during the voyage for stop the vessel, and make re-painting.

deficiency_finding: The lifebuoy is not close to the gangway.
description_overview: Lifebuoy is not ready at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Instructions were given to the crew to place the lifebuoy.
root_cause_analysis: As per the approved vessel's LSA plan, the position of the nearest lifebuoy was found during the inspection of the deck.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency in order to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: Before fumigating a previous voyage, no evidence of the ship safety committee should be carried out.
description_overview: Before fumigating a previous voyage, no evidence of the ship safety committee should be carried out.
immediate_causes: The rest hours were not filled by the crew.
root_cause_analysis: Apparently master disseminated the information to department heads instead of conducting fumigation safety meeting to all crew prior starts.
corrective_action: The master immediately held a safety meeting for all crew except those on duty watch.
preventive_action: Master will never fail to conduct a safety meeting before starting any  fumigation in the cargo holds from here onward even with limited time.

deficiency_finding: No time records for the engineer on duty when the normal period of rest is disturbed by call - outs to work when machinery space is unattended.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: Rules, regulations or procedures are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: We have determined that the ISF work rest program is utilized on our onboard fleet to facilitate adequate rest and organize personnel working hours to mitigate fatigue risks.
corrective_action: We retrieved the draft copies and completed the entries in the ISF after we identified the missing records.
preventive_action: A comprehensive review of our record-keeping procedures has been conducted to identify any potential gaps.

deficiency_finding: The crewmembers with assigned responsibilities in terms of security are not familiar with the procedures for control access, did not check the PSCO ID and did not complete the visitor's logbook as per the ship security plan.
description_overview: The crew member posted at the gangway did not perform the required procedures to verify the visitor's identification and record their details in the gangway log book as required by the ship security plan.
immediate_causes: The control of access to ship was not the same as the drug test of the duty officer.
root_cause_analysis: The crew member received the PSC inspectors at the gangway and conducted the boarding briefing.
corrective_action: The company security officer held a meeting with the ship staff and emphasized the need to perform gangway duties in line with the ISPS ship security plan.
preventive_action: The action plan will be shared with a Fleet Security Alert.

deficiency_finding: There are no records of maintenance according to the resolution.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: The inadequate record is due to the failure to follow SMS.
root_cause_analysis: The crew is not familiar with the guidelines of the sewage treatment plant.
corrective_action: Make inspection and maintenance to the sewage treatment plant and record the action as per the manufacturer's manual.
preventive_action: Master and crew were given guidance to follow the requirement of Resolution MEPC 227 (64).

deficiency_finding: The recirculating facilities found are not required.
description_overview: The recirculating facilities were found not to be in line with section 6.11.
immediate_causes: The office was told.
root_cause_analysis: Even though the vessel is fully and properly certified for compliance with MEPC 107 (49) referring to the OWS, the inspector suggested to install a sampling line outlet on the pipe that leads to the bilge tank to verify that the effluent is changing over from the overboard discharge to the bilge tank.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: The level of the Da dedicated seawater tank is not high enough for a ship to use the BWTS.
description_overview: The level of the Da dedicated seawater tank is not high enough for a ship to use the BWTS.
immediate_causes: The treatment system wasn't working.
root_cause_analysis: The suspension of the ballast operation at Rotterdam was due to the use up of the salinity water tank.
corrective_action: A low level alarm that prevents the activation of the system does not affect the safe operation of the treatment system.
preventive_action: In the future a more robust plan will be implemented to provide for the equipment limitations, along with checks, designed to confirm correct operation and possible faults in the system.

deficiency_finding: The second efficient painter is not available in the lifeboat, the heat exchanger is partly covered by paint.
description_overview: The painter release device has been fixed.
immediate_causes: Didn't carry out inspection and grease.
root_cause_analysis: There were insufficient inspection and maintenance and insufficient monitoring and supervision.
corrective_action: Training on the inspection and maintenance requirement for all related crew is required.
preventive_action: The preventive action was discussed with the ship master and should be shared with all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: When the mic is used to make an announcement, GA does not cut-out.
description_overview: The engine room has many floor plates that are not secured with screws.
immediate_causes: An internal audit is planned for the earliest port.
root_cause_analysis: The type of equipment allows only manual handling of GA, thus need to be manually interrupted when using the PA system.
corrective_action: It needs to be dealt with during dry dock.
preventive_action: The deficiency was reported to all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The lifebuoy on the port side is stuck by rust.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow the procedure, Fleet ops, technical procedures, machinery general, 4.4.1 steering gear, and makers instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The pin was stuck and rusty.
corrective_action: Outworn lifebuoys were replaced with new lifebuoys.
preventive_action: To be tested for proper function after installation, any safety & emergency equipment to be ready for immediate use.

deficiency_finding: Some bolts and nuts are not in place on the two manifolds found on the Bunker stations.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts are not in place on the two manifolds found on the Bunker stations.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The senior officer failed to identify the defect and the nut bolts were missing.
corrective_action: Training is carried out for crew to maintain their equipment.
preventive_action: The crew must be trained to carry out inspection and work.

deficiency_finding: A monkey fist with bolts was found with a heaving line.
description_overview: A monkey fist with bolts was found with a heaving line.
immediate_causes: Lack of familiarity with company manual/plan andMOORING SYSTEM MANAGEMENT PLAN and GUIDELINE FOR MOORING ROPE.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of familiarity with company manual/plan andMOORING SYSTEM MANAGEMENT PLAN and GUIDELINE FOR MOORING ROPE.
corrective_action: The heaving lines were checked and the monkey fists were replaced with soft material.
preventive_action: The heaving lines were checked and the monkey fists were replaced with soft material.

deficiency_finding: The crew certification is done by the STCW.
description_overview: There is a lack or fault on leadership and management.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of documents control.
root_cause_analysis: TheManning Agency, Company-crewing area, and Captain are included on the docs.
corrective_action: The company and manning agency were informed immediately.
preventive_action: The current procedure is to check all crew docs before joining (manning / crewing), upon arrival vessel (Captain), at least once monthly (when Annex 09 is sent to company) and to recheck all crew docs before arrival at port.

deficiency_finding: There are incorrect setttings on the bridge.
description_overview: The bridge wings settings have incorrect Rpm and Rudder indicators.
immediate_causes: The bridge wings settings have incorrect Rpm and Rudder indicators.
root_cause_analysis: Defective equipment.
corrective_action: The proper adjustment of Rudder angle indicators was carried out.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be communicated to the fleet for swift actions.

deficiency_finding: The remote control of the mooring winch is not working.
description_overview: The fire plan is not up to date.
immediate_causes: The warning system is not adequate.
root_cause_analysis: People are related.
corrective_action: The class have attended issuing a class condition and raised a spare PartRequisition.
preventive_action: The company standard procedure for establishing contact with company technical department for reporting has been completed.

deficiency_finding: The fore pee room watt starting motor panels were secured with oil drums in unsafe conditions.
description_overview: The door can't be closed due to the fact that it's out of hinge/angle.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the fact that the drums were not placed at their location, the oil drums were temporarily placed next to the motor panel.
corrective_action: After the inspection, the oil drums were removed from the watt staring motor panels, secured to another free space, and the access to the panels was blocked.
preventive_action: After the inspection, the observatory was given instructions for avoiding future issues.

deficiency_finding: EEXI Technical file and onboard management manual can't be produced on request.
description_overview: There is a crack on the container of starboard life raft.
immediate_causes: The vessel did not have to have certs onboard.
root_cause_analysis: There were missing files on the ship.
corrective_action: After receiving the missing files, the PSC inspectors showed them to the office.
preventive_action: All ship's certificates and important documents similar to EEXI Technical file and onboard management manual for "EPL" should be readily available and valid onboard.

deficiency_finding: EEBD for training is not marked.
description_overview: The pressure on the bridge was less than recommended.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The third officer doesn't talk about the training purpose.
corrective_action: The training purpose was marked by the third officer.
preventive_action: The LSA/FFA must be inspected and maintained by the third officer.

deficiency_finding: The Sensor of T/C Exh. failed.
description_overview: A/E # 3 Digital Thermometer was found to be faulty during the inspection.
immediate_causes: There was insufficient supervision by the officer in charge.
root_cause_analysis: Human Factors are selected by the DOL.
corrective_action: A faulty sensor with a new spare was found to be working well.
preventive_action: Chief Engineer carried out training of concerned staff with regard to importance of always checking and monitoring all running machineries sensors at all times and reporting immediately to duty engineer if any abnormality is noted.

deficiency_finding: To replace the wash basin pipe for leaking water in some cabins, as well as the cover of air ventilation, where necessary.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer had identified all the items and had to be replaced.
corrective_action: The crew has been given instructions for the replacement and maintenance of the items that have been identified.
preventive_action: Crew training was provided and they were reminded to maintain their cabins.

deficiency_finding: There is evidence that the company does not have due control of the ship's certificates.
description_overview: The observations were made due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers, some certificates were not up to date.
corrective_action: After the ship informed the offices, all expired certificates were extended or renewed.
preventive_action: The ship management team should be informed in advance if the certificates are missing or expired.

deficiency_finding: There is a dose not indicated on the bridge panel.
description_overview: The bridge door was found to have a small hole.
immediate_causes: There was a small hole in the bridge door during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There is no maintenance on the sensor of the indicator.
corrective_action: The dust of the sensor was cleaned and the indicator was in good working order.
preventive_action: All sensors for W/T doors need to be regularly checked to make sure they are in good order.

deficiency_finding: Not required access control to ship.
description_overview: The lifebuoy is not in position in the vicinity of the gangway.
immediate_causes: The Master could not locate the ship structure access manual during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The C/O working office on the ship's Suez room is located at the STAB side.
corrective_action: Trained the relevant responsible personnel to be familiar with the requirement of SSP 8.3 Responsibility for Access door control, The Stipulation for controlling the access to the ship.
preventive_action: In order to avoid any misunderstanding, the master and chief officer should communicate with the inspector.

deficiency_finding: There is a local fixed application fire extinguishing system.
description_overview: The line leading to the E/R is not marked.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The PIC neglected to inspect and repair the local fixed application fire extinguishing system.
corrective_action: Repairs to the fixed application fire-extinguishing system and test of other locations found to be in working order were found to be satisfactory.
preventive_action: If equipment failure is found, repair it in time or seek shore-based support.

deficiency_finding: The record must be filled as required.
description_overview: The vegetable room door is not sealed properly.
immediate_causes: The same serial numbers were shown for the auxiliary engines.
root_cause_analysis: The master's understanding of the certificate was inadequate and the defects raised by PSC were not clarified in a timely manner.
corrective_action: The Master reported the issue to the Supremo.
preventive_action: The certificate must be consistent with ship equipment and the master should be familiar with it.

deficiency_finding: The galley exhaust grease is dirty.
description_overview: The action code 17 was supposed to be rectified before departure.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: Improper housekeeping and improper inspection are to blame.
corrective_action: The galley exhaust grease trap was removed.
preventive_action: Instructions have been given to the responsible department in order to raise attention to proper housekeeping.

deficiency_finding: Emergency towing equipment is not available for immediate use.
description_overview: The emergency towing manual is missing from the forecastle.
immediate_causes: The canvas cover of the bridge wing VDR microphone was immediately removed after being pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The last annual Emergency Towing drill was carried as the Master failed to get fully familiar with the emergency towing process on time.
corrective_action: The company's Emergency Response Planning Manual was reviewed and the missing Emergency Towing Booklet was found.
preventive_action: Masters/crews will be instructed to discuss andanalyze the deficiency in the next scheduled SCM.

deficiency_finding: The Captain and Chief Officer were not familiar with the procedures.
description_overview: The P&S rubber seals partially perished.
immediate_causes: Minor damages to Tank Dome seals were noted during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow procedures and lack of proper familiarization is the cause of this deficiency.
corrective_action: Every 8 hours, a thorough monitoring is required to ensure early detection of harmful leaking gas.
preventive_action: All vessels with guidelines for  fumigation will receive a fleet letter.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, the sanitary inspection form used onboard did not offer the possibility to monthly evaluate every aspect of the accommodation.
description_overview: The correct nozzle ID was marked on the record.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient documentation.
corrective_action: The form VCRW will be amended to allow monthly evaluation of every subject.
preventive_action: Deficiency will be sent to the fleet.

deficiency_finding: The ship structure access manual is not approved by Administration or RO.
description_overview: The vessel was delivered in October of 2012 and entered into management in April of 2022.
immediate_causes: The flag of Marshall Island was missed.
root_cause_analysis: The statutory manual was not available at the time of takeover.
corrective_action: The approved ship structure access manual was approved by Class NK and was not available onboard.
preventive_action: At the time of change of management, it is important to verify the availability of the Class approved ship structure access manual.

deficiency_finding: Master instructed to implement proper procedure to avoid similar.
description_overview: Master instructed to implement proper procedure to avoid similar.
immediate_causes: Maintenance and inspection are improper.
root_cause_analysis: The safety working procedure was not followed when the hatch cover was opened.
corrective_action: The hatch covers need to be secured.
preventive_action: The deck crew is trained about hatch cover operation.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, no ratings were identified to be part of the safety committee.
description_overview: It is the responsibility of the support team to close water-tight doors according to the muster list.
immediate_causes: Poor safety awareness and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of documentation Unclear roles.
corrective_action: Crew should vote for their representatives for the Safety Committee at the extraordinary meeting.
preventive_action: All vessels will receive the matter.

deficiency_finding: The hatch of E/R Sky lacks nuts.
description_overview: The Hatch of E/R Sky lack of two nuts, the Access cover of S/G RM lack of three nuts, and the Access cover of Rope store lack of two nuts.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The crews did not pay attention to the lack of nuts.
corrective_action: The crews put back butterfly nuts in the presence of PSC officers.
preventive_action: The nuts should be put back after opening the covers.

deficiency_finding: The coastal area setting is incorrect.
description_overview: The current area of operation is not receiving maritime safety information from Inmarsat-C.
immediate_causes: The navigation officer set only code B in the broadcast of Navarea X Australia.
root_cause_analysis: The bridge management failed to change the status of the EGC coastal area to the correct setting due to a lack of awareness.
corrective_action: The duty officer was ordered by the master to cover the correct area.
preventive_action: The Master and the navigation officer must make sure that the correct Navarea region is included in the new passage plan.

deficiency_finding: Load line markings on the deck are not painted in the same color.
description_overview: Load line markings on the deck are not painted in the same color.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: The inspections or routines not done so effectively were caused by the long sea passages and shorter stay at the port.
corrective_action: The deck line was painted with contrasting colors after departure from the port.
preventive_action: Job code-12283, draft and marking monthly routine exist in PMS and therefore no further preventive action is required.

deficiency_finding: There is a garbage bin in the galley.
description_overview: There is a dust bin in the sick bay.
immediate_causes: The human cause is Inspector's comment.
root_cause_analysis: 4 S 4 was selected.
corrective_action: Deficiency was fixed before departure.
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: The contracts of the next crew members have expired since May 14th and the SMS does not ensure effective control of their resources and personnel.
description_overview: A voyage or passage plan.
immediate_causes: The drill matrix column for launching and maneuvering of rescue boat was found by the PSC inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Communication between the Office Crewing Manager and the manning agent was poor.
corrective_action: To get the missing POEA contracts, contact the manning agent immediately.
preventive_action: Crew contracts should be monitored to ensure they are renewed on time.

deficiency_finding: The emission monitoring system malfunctioned.
description_overview: There was a small leak from the union during the test and it took 30 seconds for the valve to shut down.
immediate_causes: During control testing, the navigation lights were found to be in good order.
root_cause_analysis: Scupper VP310 for sea water outlet pipe is located in the engine room.
corrective_action: The emergency shutdown alarm disappears after the VP310 valve is opened.
preventive_action: The crews were trained to open the valve under the sea water line.

deficiency_finding: Gas concentration safety checks have not been recorded in the ship's logbook.
description_overview: Gas concentration safety checks have not been recorded in the ship's logbook.
immediate_causes: The chief officer put the log in the deck logbook.
root_cause_analysis: The gas concentration checks are recorded in the deck log book.
corrective_action: When the cargo hold is loaded with cargo, training was given to staff to always log the gas monitoring logs in the logbook.
preventive_action: Proper implementation is needed.

deficiency_finding: There is a table of shipboard working arrangements that is not in the required format.
description_overview: The gangway watchman failed to record the security tag for one of the 2 boarding custom officers.
immediate_causes: The BWMC was issued on behalf of the administration.
root_cause_analysis: A table with the shipboard working arrangements must be prepared in accordance with the standardized format.
corrective_action: No further actions were necessary from the Company's side because the correct Form Crew-06 Table of shipboard working arrangements already existed onboard.
preventive_action: Communication's basic law between two people is "Not about what A said, but what B understands".

deficiency_finding: The visual indicators are not in order.
description_overview: The visual indication was out of order because four numbers bulbs were fused.
immediate_causes: Insufficient supervision.
root_cause_analysis: The indicators/bulbs will be received at the next port of call.
corrective_action: A common message will be sent to all vessels to highlight the deficiency.
preventive_action: Due date for documentary evidence is 21st March.

deficiency_finding: The glass on the port bow window is broken.
description_overview: Oil gas can not be kept tight by the bridge doors.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The window on the port side of the bridge needs to be replaced.
corrective_action: A new window was delivered on the ship at the next port of call after the broken window was replaced.
preventive_action: An additional lookout was posted on the bridge when the vessel was navigating in estuary or congested waters.

deficiency_finding: The CO2 extinguishing installation pipes were fixed.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: The rusty on the back of the pipes was not found by the ship's PIC.
corrective_action: All CO2 pipes were checked, painted and renewed with new pipes.
preventive_action: The ship's PIC will conduct regular inspections and focus on hidden areas of pipes.

deficiency_finding: There was sludge in the ER.
description_overview: Prior to disposal at the end of the repair period, wash water was stowed in un-covered drums.
immediate_causes: The valve to the sludge tank was not being used.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel was not ready to sail when invited.
corrective_action: Carbon water was correctly recorded.
preventive_action: Share findings from previous calls to the subject port for onboard checks.

deficiency_finding: The International Anti-Fouling system certificate is missing.
description_overview: It is not clean.
immediate_causes: Due to the short port stay at Onsan, S. Korea, the UWC was canceled and Underwater Cleaning was carried out at Yeosu.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of familiarity with ship's certificates.
corrective_action: The new Original Antifouling Certificate was issued by the Contacted Class RINA.
preventive_action: The importance to have only official Class electronic e-certificates was discussed with Master and all senior officers during a Safety Meeting on the ship.

deficiency_finding: GALLEY STEOVE Vent is heavily greased.
description_overview: GALLEY STEOVE Vent is heavily greased.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect inspection as required.
corrective_action: The wire mesh was properly cleaned.
preventive_action: There is more detailed inspection on a weekly basis.

deficiency_finding: The chief officer was not familiar with his duties.
description_overview: An Occasional Survey was carried out at the request of the owner after deficiencies were pointed out by the USCG Mobile.
immediate_causes: There is an immediate cause of substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: There are basic and personal factors.
corrective_action: The office conducted remote training on the safe use of pesticides in ships.
preventive_action: To avoid re-occurrence, conduct training for the onboard crew.

deficiency_finding: The control tank ventilating system should be provided with devices to prevent flame from entering the cargo tanks.
description_overview: It is observed that the vessel intended to avoid any possible condensation on cargo tanks during the anchorage period.
immediate_causes: C/E immediately went to Isolate to fix or replace the damaged pipe.
root_cause_analysis: There was a insufficient safety round.
corrective_action: The flame screens were approved by the USCG.
preventive_action: The Master has convened relevant crew members to discuss this deficiency and strengthened inspections of key equipment to avoid similar deficiency from recurring.

deficiency_finding: The Safety Management System has failed to ensure safe operation safety of crew and safety management.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: The door wasn't closing due to Deformation.
root_cause_analysis: Complacency on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on
corrective_action: The training and education onboard should be conducted as per the SMS Procedure.
preventive_action: Use of onboard video training as provided in the e-video training modules of KARCO to supplement the training and drills conducted onboard.

deficiency_finding: There are lifejackets in the engine control room.
description_overview: There are lifejackets in the engine control room.
immediate_causes: The Code of SOLAS and LSA does not meet the requirement of Convention.
root_cause_analysis: Immediate corrective action taken by responsible personnel onboard, whistles to be selected and fitted to the two lifejackets in engine control room, firmly secured by lanyards.
corrective_action: There are at least two life jackets stored in ECR for duty engineers.
preventive_action: Immediate corrective action taken by responsible personnel onboard, whistles to be selected and fitted to the two lifejackets in engine control room, firmly secured by lanyards.

deficiency_finding: There is a cracked deck at the port side provision crane.
description_overview: Insufficient maintenance.
immediate_causes: There were 6 pieces of pipe support that were corrosive and 3 that werecracked due to insufficient maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The unfaithfulness of the rating.
corrective_action: The cracked area to be repaired by vsl under NKK and discussion with Yard Built was issued as a target date by the COC.
preventive_action: This deficiency will be included in the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The sewage treatment plant has no sludge return.
description_overview: The MSDS for Monoethylene glycol was not available when PSCO inspected it.
immediate_causes: There was no flow of sludge observed due to malfunctioning of solenoid valve which allows air for sludge to return in both "auto" and "manual" mode Immediate Cause - Substandard Conditions
root_cause_analysis: Lack of situational awareness / risk perception / risk awareness system had been tested during Pre AMSA Inspection in presence of AMSPEC Surveyor and system found in good working order.
corrective_action: In both "AUTO" and "manual" mode, thefective solenoid valve was replaced with a spare one.
preventive_action: Duty engineer to check the function of the valve on a daily basis.

deficiency_finding: Able-bodied seamen take fire rounds during the day but not at night.
description_overview: There are two showers and an eyewash on the vessel.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: The review of work rest hours is not done effectively.
corrective_action: Time taken for fire rounds after their regular watchkeeping hours has been added to the table of shipboard working arrangement.
preventive_action: Senior management was briefed on how to plan for compliance with work and rest hours.

deficiency_finding: A vessel can't take a compass to determine the risk of a collision.
description_overview: The officer on watch was limited to taking the compass bearing from the conning position.
immediate_causes: The actions will be implemented according to the company's requirements and ISM Code provisions.
root_cause_analysis: The officer on watch was limited to taking the compass bearing from the conning position.
corrective_action: The ability to take visual bearings from the conning position was restored.
preventive_action: With the alternatives provided to provide compass bearing ability on board and accepted by the flag, any further enhancement advise is being explored.

deficiency_finding: Seaworthiness is affected by hull damage.
description_overview: The next port of call for the vessel will be Montreal, Canada.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause was imposed because of the recent grounding of the vessel during her transit through the St.Lawrence river.
corrective_action: The DNV presence was present during the UWS inspection.
preventive_action: There is still an ongoing soft-mud grounding incident at the Three Rivers port.

deficiency_finding: There is evidence of basic training.
description_overview: There is no evidence that the Crew Basic training certificate issued to an Indian crew member is acceptable to the flag state.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: There is no evidence that the certificates issued to Indian crew members are acceptable to the flagstate.
preventive_action: The Crew Manager was requested to check the training facilities in use.

deficiency_finding: There is a mistake on item 3.2.3 of the IOPP Certificate Supplement.
description_overview: The gross tonnage record in the comply test report for LRIT is incorrect.
immediate_causes: On endorsement of annual verification, PSC decided not to write 'R.O.C.' as a country on the DOC company address.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient inspection of the ship certificate is incorrect on the Form A of IOPP certificate.
corrective_action: The statement on Form A of IOPP certificate was corrected by the ship class.
preventive_action: This deficiency will be shared to all fleet vessels and request the PICs to cross check and avoid similar case onboard.

deficiency_finding: It is the responsibility of the adminisration to ensure that the weathertightness can be maintained.
description_overview: The crew noticed minor rust on the lines, but it did not affect the integrity of the line.
immediate_causes: Instructions were given for the emergency light to be replaced.
root_cause_analysis: Due to rush of the shipment and bad weather during sailing period in North Pacific area, the maintenance work cannot be arranged properly.
corrective_action: The cleats with poor condition have been repaired by the crew and shore base repair team.
preventive_action: The maintenance result will be monitored by the PIC of technical and marine dept.

deficiency_finding: The mooring lines are not properly arranged.
description_overview: The training of the code for controlling access to the ship at different security levels was given to the chief officer.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't tidy the ropes after the ship docked.
corrective_action: The crew should arrange all the ropes at the area.
preventive_action: Always keep safety and property in mind when you request an officer in charge.

deficiency_finding: The freefall helsman's window was slippery during the inspection.
description_overview: When the gasket of the steam line gave way, PSCO did the E/R inspection at the same time.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: The magnetic compass was affected by the vessel's cargo and the ship's superstructure.
corrective_action: Prior to the vessel's departure from port, a new magnetic compass was installed.
preventive_action: The "Shipboard Safety Officer Inspection Check-list" was revised to include specific instructions.

deficiency_finding: There are hatch covers seized.
description_overview: There are four small hatch covers on the main deck.
immediate_causes: The coastal areas were the trading area of the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: There were insufficient maintenance and lack of awareness by the officer.
corrective_action: AMSA confirmed and closed out the deficiency after quick closing cleats Eased up, de-rusted, lubricated and greased.
preventive_action: The deck officers were briefed on proper deck inspection and hatch cover maintenance.

deficiency_finding: TheHatch cover was frozen and there were missing bolts and nuts.
description_overview: There are four small hatch covers on the main deck.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance and repair are not carried out according to the schedule of work plan.
corrective_action: Remove the frozen area with the help of bolts and nuts.
preventive_action: The case information is spread through the Shore SHEQ meeting result and company data processing system.

deficiency_finding: Crew training and familiarity with BWMP.
description_overview: The Malfunction/failure of BWTS 2nd unit is not reported to Canadian Authority and the IBWMC is in short term.
immediate_causes: See the deficiencies 1 and 4.
root_cause_analysis: Improper leadership example. In inadequate communication/implementation of policy/procedure/practice.
corrective_action: The Master sent a report by e-mail which was accepted by the PSC.
preventive_action: Section 12 BWMP states that all malfunction/failure of BWTS must be reported and recorded.

deficiency_finding: The life boat engine failed to start.
description_overview: After some time, the engine started and was tested in all modes.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the failure was lack of proper maintenance and supervision by the engine crew.
corrective_action: In the presence of PSC officer, the life boat's engine started and tested in several modes.
preventive_action: The crew should be familiar with the deck manual for proper maintenance and testing of LSA critical equipment.

deficiency_finding: A/C room fire detection is malfunctioning.
description_overview: A/C room fire detection is malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The smoke detector for the AC room was last tested in February of 2023 and found satisfactory.
corrective_action: The smoke detector sensor was renewed.
preventive_action: All fire detectors have to be tested every three months.

deficiency_finding: The sink and faucet are in poor condition.
description_overview: The sink and faucet are in poor condition.
immediate_causes: There was a missingPLUG.
root_cause_analysis: People are related.
corrective_action: The sink faucet and drain should be fixed by the end of the inspection.
preventive_action: LAUNDRY FACILITIES checks are included in the following:

deficiency_finding: The side deck line markings were marked at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The side deck line marking was marked at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Defect Cause is paint worn out. Human Cause is overlook by ship's crew.
corrective_action: Re-painted after seeing.
preventive_action: Risk control, quality control of safety checklist and procedural process are included in the general conditions inspection.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence of 3rd Engineers.
description_overview: According to the relevant Class/IACS rules and regulations, as in built condition.
immediate_causes: The issue was fixed in the presence of the PSC Officer and endorsed before leaving the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: The flag endorsement of the Third Engineer had not been sent on time.
corrective_action: PCSO closed the deficiency after Master issued a statement that the third engineer was not engaged in high voltage equipment duties.
preventive_action: Crew Managers were briefed on the dispatch of original documents.

deficiency_finding: Side scuttles and deadlights.
description_overview: As a result of the review, the quality of the window glasses is not required in accordance with the convention.
immediate_causes: There arefective tools/ equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There is a technical error.
corrective_action: As a result of the review, the quality of the window glasses is not required in accordance with the convention.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The Starboard has an error rate of 2 revolutions.
description_overview: The ship's electrician adjusted the indicator to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
immediate_causes: At times, the indicator was showing up to 10 points more than the actual, but when the PCS officers came on, it was back to normal.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance and inadequate equipment were identified in the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: As a result of the above observations, a new indicator under coding P-23-41 (SP-C4-1777) was raised via Managers web- platform AIOLOS and the same has been distributed to the Suppliers for obtaining offers.
preventive_action: The next Safety Committee Meeting will discuss deficiency and corrective actions.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has a cargo hold.
description_overview: BWMS found two alarms still active despite being alarmed.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedures.
root_cause_analysis: Poor assessment of preventive maintenance needs.
corrective_action: The vessel sailed from Australia to her destination.
preventive_action: The Class instructed the crew to use cement boxes or doubler plates to fix the issue.

deficiency_finding: Rescue Boat Painter is not connected to Rescue Boat.
description_overview: Rescue boat davit slewing is slow.
immediate_causes: The ship staff missed out on connecting the painter line after they disconnected the rescue boat.
root_cause_analysis: There is a requirement that the Painter should always be connected to the Rescue Boat.
corrective_action: The PSCO instructed Person In Charged to connect the painter to the Rescue Boat.
preventive_action: The Rescue Boat has equipment listed in the Finished Plan/Drawing.

deficiency_finding: The room is not insulated completely.
description_overview: Fire doors that are self-closing are not closing properly.
immediate_causes: The broken bulbs of indicator lights on the ship's Electrician were replaced immediately by the PSCO who was present on the scene.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of this deficiency is that safety officer and electrician failed to ensure proper implementation of fire integrity requirements of cable trunks.
corrective_action: During PSC Inspectors was on board, all cables were insulated properly.
preventive_action: The safety officer and electrician were reminded to ensure that fire integrity of the vessel was always implemented in accordance with national and international requirements.

deficiency_finding: The high pressure relief valve was gagged.
description_overview: The high pressure relief valve was gagged.
immediate_causes: The stopper bolt wasn't removed after pooping testing.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of risk perception and understanding of senior engineers.
corrective_action: The boiler high pressure relief valve has a pop-up tool in it.
preventive_action: Brief all engineers to understand the purpose of securing bolt/pop-up tool in the boiler high pressure relief valve.

deficiency_finding: The office's POOR house keepers are located inside the office.
description_overview: Garbage bins for food waste were found in the fish room.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions and procedures.
root_cause_analysis: The Engine office had some spare parts in the floor due to inadequate cleaning and inspection.
corrective_action: The crew cleaned and removed parts before they disembarked.
preventive_action: The crew was told to keep working in good order.

deficiency_finding: Satellite is 406MHz/ 1.6 GHz.
description_overview: At the time of Inspection there was a no maintenance record for the EPIRB.
immediate_causes: The failure to follow procedure was identified.
root_cause_analysis: During the Inspection performance, the requested 5 Year Maintenance Report was not presented to the PSC Inspectors, as the Master did not manage to identify the requested Report in his Certificates folder.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: The next Monthly Alert Bulletin will be sent to the fleet for awareness and for avoiding repetition.

deficiency_finding: There are incorrect entries on the Record of Equipment on paragr. 2.1 and 2.2.
description_overview: After being notified by inspector, a new certificate was sent to the vessel.
immediate_causes: Human factors are not applicable.
root_cause_analysis: Rules, Regulations and Procedures are not followed.
corrective_action: After the necessary adjustments were made, the renewed certificate was immediately dispatched to the ship.
preventive_action: All certificates were confirmed to be in compliance with international standards.

deficiency_finding: The Panama Administration did not complete the 'Exemptions' section at the time of inspection.
description_overview: More detailed inspections and drills were carried out by 2 PSC Officer onboard at Three Rivers, Quebec, Canada.
immediate_causes: There is a human error.
root_cause_analysis: According to PSCO, the exemption is an additional statutory certificate and keeps on board for the competent authority if applied.
corrective_action: The letter from Panama Flag State was sent to the PSC Quebec, Canada.
preventive_action: To keep all the necessary documents that were received from Panama Flag State.

deficiency_finding: SART/AIS-SART.
description_overview: The battery of the SART was showing an end of life date at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge is one of the causes of human error.
corrective_action: A new battery was to be delivered in the next port.
preventive_action: The crew has been told to follow the vessels and make random checks of equipment.

deficiency_finding: The person is a MLC.
description_overview: The certificates are not posted in some places.
immediate_causes: The two furniture doors in the galley were disassembled by the ship's crew and put aside due to their broken hinges and lack of food safety and situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: Not familiar with Labour Convention 2006
corrective_action: The first and second part of the MLC certs have been added.
preventive_action: The case should be shared with the fleet to remind them of the requirements.

deficiency_finding: Not moved to the side of the Life raft by the Accumulator.
description_overview: The crew was asked to demonstrate the launching with the accumulator.
immediate_causes: The davit's function was lost due to the screw holding the control handle being loose, which caused the control handle to come off its original position.
root_cause_analysis: The davit's function was lost due to the screw holding the control handle being loose, which caused the control handle to come off its original position.
corrective_action: The control handle was found in good working order after the screw was tightened and the observation was closed with code 10.
preventive_action: The observation will be promulgated across the fleet vessels to prevent repeat of similar observation.

deficiency_finding: The watchkeeping personnel/shipboard working arrangement did not include the addition of the 3rd officer.
description_overview: During the Emergency steering gear drill, the steering gear emergency phone and headphones were tested and found to be working well.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The deck watchkeeping schedule was immediately updated by the responsible person to include the additional 3/O as a watchkeeping officer and posted on Bridge and other designated areas.
preventive_action: This observation has been shared with all fleet vessels and Masters have been requested to send the completed checklist for the Paris and Tokyo MoU's Concentrated Inspection Campaign (CIC) on STCW to verify compliance

deficiency_finding: There was medicine in the first aid box.
description_overview: Some of the medicines inside the first aid box need to be replaced.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: If any expired medicines were found in the first-aid boxes, they were replaced with new ones.
preventive_action: During the meeting for enhancing shipboard management and crew's responsibility, a relative training course was provided to all shipboard crews.

deficiency_finding: After a crew change, the muster list isn't updated.
description_overview: The muster list was not updated before the inspection.
immediate_causes: Master did not push the PIC to update in time.
root_cause_analysis: Master did not push the PIC to update in time.
corrective_action: The muster list was updated soon after the deficiency was cited.
preventive_action: After each crew change, the duties for each crew will be updated.

deficiency_finding: BWMS malfunction.
description_overview: There was no evidence that ACM had been removed from the vessel.
immediate_causes: Poor housekeeping.
root_cause_analysis: BWMS became inoperable due to defects while sailing to Vostochny, Russia. Trouble shooting was conducted in cooperation with BWTS manufacturer, but failed, and it was found that engineer dispatch with spare parts for replacement were necessary.
corrective_action: The crew reported the malfunction of BWTS to the manufacturer.
preventive_action: The review of shore-based safety health environment quality meeting resulted in all fleet sharing action procedures in case of BWTS malfunction.

deficiency_finding: The gyro compass #1 malfunction is not required.
description_overview: A compass malfunction.
immediate_causes: The gyro compass repeater was malfunctioning during the storm.
root_cause_analysis: During sea passage with heading south and west, gyro compass No.1 is not stable.
corrective_action: The gyro sphere was replaced by a technician.
preventive_action: The new report will be released to the fleet as soon as possible.

deficiency_finding: The filling pipe cover is not locked.
description_overview: There were two holes that were not sealed with A-60 cement for fire prevention.
immediate_causes: Cyl.oil has a measuring tank level gauge.
root_cause_analysis: The DWT filling cover was sealed with a plastic strip, but the PSC officer wanted it sealed with a pad lock.
corrective_action: The DWT filling cover was placed to the satisfaction of the local Port State Control Authorities.
preventive_action: There was a notification sent to the fleet requesting to check the Fresh Water Tanks.

deficiency_finding: The condition of the ship and its equipment will be maintained to conform with the provisions of the present regulations to ensure that the ship in all respects will remain fit to proceed to sea without danger to the ship or persons onboard.
description_overview: The condition of the ship and its equipment should be in line with the current regulations to ensure that the ship is safe to sail.
immediate_causes: The temporary cold repair was carried out as the vessel was loaded.
root_cause_analysis: There were few sections of the line with problems at the time of inspection.
corrective_action: The lines are being renewed on the deck.
preventive_action: A Shore workshop is being arranged for the renewal of the Hyd lines on deck.

deficiency_finding: One flood light superstructure and one flood light in the forecastle are out of order.
description_overview: The battery charging panel board is low insulation.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Engineers were busy with main engine work and there was a delay in the replacement of lamps.
preventive_action: Senior staff is told to spare extra manpower whenever necessary to avoid delay in maintenance jobs.

deficiency_finding: CARGO SHIP SAFETY RADIO CERTIFICATED SEA AREAS IN WHICH THE SHIP IS CARRIED TO OPERATE WRONG, A1+A2
description_overview: For a ship without an equivalent arrangement approved in accordance with regulation 4.1 as listed in paragraph 2.6, the sulphur content of fuel oil carried for use on board the ship shall not exceed 0.50% m/m.
immediate_causes: The canvas cover of the bridge wing VDR microphone was immediately removed after being pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The cargo ship safety radio certificate issue error was discovered by the captain.
corrective_action: The new certificate check and inspect should be based on the instructions for the ship's survey.
preventive_action: The master had received training and achieved good results.

deficiency_finding: The X-Band radar is not operational.
description_overview: There is a quick-closing valve for the generator oil inlet.
immediate_causes: Lack of immigration is a problem.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was negligent in their maintenance of the radar.
corrective_action: The radar has been repaired in Singapore and all functions have been checked, all in good condition.
preventive_action: The radar inspection and maintenance training needs to be done by a technical engineer.

deficiency_finding: The door of the hospital was not closed tightly.
description_overview: The door of the hospital was not closed tightly.
immediate_causes: Poor rubber packing, lack of safety culture and situational awareness of the importance to weather-tight and water integrity were some of the reasons why the forward forecastle doors were not checked carefully.
root_cause_analysis: The rubber packing of the door deteriorated and was partly broken.
corrective_action: To keep the door weather tight, the deck crew renewed the rubber packing of the door.
preventive_action: Instructions for inspection ship and it's equipment, maintenance of the ship and equipment, and instructions for reporting were all carried out by the master.

deficiency_finding: The verification of the compass error is not as per the requirements.
description_overview: Master confirms that standard Magnetic and Gyro compasses are in good working conditions and that compass errors are obtained regularly by OOW, with records for the same maintained in the compass error book.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given and the deficiency was fixed on-site during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The compass error logbook was reviewed by the PSCO due to insufficient weather conditions.
corrective_action: Each watch is being verified based on weather conditions and the compass error log book is being kept.
preventive_action: After departure a meeting was held and the implication of the observation as received was discussed and it was decided that compass error verification must be carried out at least once per watch in line with company requirement.

deficiency_finding: The SOPEP manual, Annex II and SOPEP drill record are missing.
description_overview: The SOPEP Port contacts list is not up to date.
immediate_causes: The SOPEP List of National Contact Points was not updated in the SOPEP Manual.
root_cause_analysis: Crew Negligence of Lack of Awareness SOPEP Port contact lists were missing from the SOPEP plan folder and only available in company's software.
corrective_action: The inspector preferred to have the annexes printed out rather than uploading the focal points.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is a document of compliance dangerous goods.
description_overview: According to the flag state approved action plan, to be repaired.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the schedule.
root_cause_analysis: The certificate was amended due to improper abbreviations input.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: The contents of this PSC inspection along with the generated RCA/CAP will be included in the next safety meeting as a topic for discussion.

deficiency_finding: The chart is not updated.
description_overview: The previous Master uploaded the document into the system prior to the due date.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: There was a missing correction from year 2021.
corrective_action: The crew corrected the chart during the inspection.
preventive_action: If all charts are corrected, the crew will perform a more careful check.

deficiency_finding: The emergency light was found in operation and the cover was damaged.
description_overview: The cargo ship safety equipment certificate stated that the navigation equipment was in good working condition, as it was seen by the inspector.
immediate_causes: After the vessel reported the failure, the company did not arrange necessary repair service.
root_cause_analysis: There was a crack on the light cover and the emergency light was not lit up during the inspection.
corrective_action: The light bulb and cover should be replaced immediately.
preventive_action: All the alarms should be inspected and tested by the engineer in charge.

deficiency_finding: The original certificate is not on the plane.
description_overview: The original sheet of C.S.R no.1 is not on the board.
immediate_causes: The CSR-1 wasn't handled properly during the last CSR amendment.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of communication between the office and the CSR board.
corrective_action: The new duplicate certificate was issued by HKMD on the same day as the original.
preventive_action: The training was done during the voyage from NINGBO to RIZHAO.

deficiency_finding: There is only one version of Iamsar volume 3 available, version 2022, which is already available for some months.
description_overview: Low.
immediate_causes: Not identified.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of suitable resources.
corrective_action: All vessels in the fleet are required to have a list of publications on board.
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: The watchman left the gangway due to his escort.
description_overview: The watchman left the gangway due to his escort.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The watchman should not leave the gangway.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Fuel change isn't ship specific.
description_overview: Fuel Change over procedure not ship specific was identified during PSC Inspection at the port of Ghent, Belgium.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Fuel Change procedure which is part of the Company's System but also as a stand alone and vessel's specific FOMP was not described at the time of the inspection.
corrective_action: Having identified the omission, Vessel and company alike proceeded with the issuance of an additional document which will accompany the vessel's FOMP and will include the specific process which needs to be followed.
preventive_action: Findings will be sent to the fleet in order to raise awareness.

deficiency_finding: There are two emergency lights next to the port gangway.
description_overview: There are two emergency lights next to the port gangway.
immediate_causes: There was a malfunction with the sample pump.
root_cause_analysis: The emergency lights were found to be malfunctioning during the PSC inspection, but were found to be functional after a pre-arrival check.
corrective_action: The crew replaced the light bulbs before they left the port.
preventive_action: To ensure compliance and avoidance of repetition, deficiency will be sent to all of our vessels.

deficiency_finding: Light missing due to provision and disposition of lifejackets.
