description_overview: The lifejackets' lights expired across the vessel at the time of inspection.

deficiency_finding: The crane's protection guard is poor.
description_overview: The observations were made due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: Proper rectification was not scheduled because of the absence of the protection cover.
corrective_action: The protection guard was restored after corrective actions were initiated.
preventive_action: Protection guards are provided to all moving gears.

deficiency_finding: There are symbols missing in the Engine Room.

immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The missing label was not observed by the Safety Officer and Engineers.
corrective_action: The order was created for the missing label.
preventive_action: The crew has to be trained on how to label safety equipment as per regulations.

deficiency_finding: There is a 6X6 connection with the pipe system found corroding.

deficiency_finding: There were several outside doors that weren't closing properly.
description_overview: The forward forecastle doors are weathertight.
immediate_causes: Poor rubber packing, lack of safety culture and situational awareness of the importance to weather-tight and water integrity were some of the reasons why the forward forecastle doors were not checked carefully.
root_cause_analysis: The condition of the doors remain unidentified, unreported and eventually unrectified.
corrective_action: All doors have been opened and adjusted.
preventive_action: All exit doors have been inspected and minor adjustments made.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire door leading to the engine room.

immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The new lock set was smaller than the old one, which caused the door to remain closed.
corrective_action: It was reported to the management company that there was a need to replace the lock on the door.
preventive_action: Make sure the lock set is in good condition, open it, and maintain it.

deficiency_finding: The publications are not up to date.

immediate_causes: The crew of the ship hung the wet boiler suits on the handrails of the main deck alleyway due to their lack of fire safety and situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: The gangway at the quay is not safe due to the old railroad rails close to the edge.
corrective_action: The gangway was positioned on the spot after PSC officers observed it to their satisfaction.
preventive_action: The deficiency was discussed in detail during the training session.

deficiency_finding: There are pipes leaking on the deck.

deficiency_finding: The lighting is insufficient.

deficiency_finding: The meat leak detection system has an alarm.
description_overview: High water pressure can be caused by POLYURETHAN HOSE FROM PUMP TO GAUGE.
immediate_causes: Every time the cold room is opened for a long period, the power failure will cause a false alarm because the sensitivity of the sensor is dependent on the power supply.
root_cause_analysis: The freon detection system shows a meat room leak alarm.
corrective_action: After checking and cleaning the sensitivity sensor, leaking test of the unit, and adjusted sensitivity settings, the deficiency was corrected and closed by the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: The Master and the Chief Engineer were made aware of the deficiency by the Technical Supremo.

deficiency_finding: The lining of the Bunker Line was found frozen.
description_overview: The company's planned maintenance system has clear guidance for care and maintenance of the Bunker line and its associated valves and connections.
immediate_causes: The broken drain cock for the U type line on the port side main deck was not found during a routine inspection and was not maintained in good condition.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel Bunkering of VLSFO Bunker was carried out after the last inspection of the Bunker line and associated.
corrective_action: After being pointed out by the inspector, the vessel immediately cleared the frozen drain valve and the operation of the drain valve was verified by the PSCO.
preventive_action: The senior management was briefed on the importance of checking and maintaining the Bunker line as per the company's planned maintenance system.

deficiency_finding: There is a fixed fire extinguishing installation.
description_overview: The line leading to the E/R is not marked.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Others.
corrective_action: Marking was done on the line leading to the E/R from the Fixed Foam Extinguishing system.
preventive_action: Training was carried out for relevant staff.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire door from the stair way to the B deck.
description_overview: Fire damper for engine room ventilation fan no.2 was conducted additional test as well as PMS, but ship's crew had conducted cursory inspection without details, as he hadn't known the damper closed completely or not.
immediate_causes: It wasn't enough to close the fire door fully with the door closer.
root_cause_analysis: There are insufficient maintenance checks.
corrective_action: The function test of the fire door closing was conducted and found in good order.
preventive_action: Senior management was briefed on the importance of safety and inspection rounds.

deficiency_finding: The Mark was not painted on the Port side.
description_overview: Not required.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: COFF with deck crew painting refreshed by wire brushed, primer and finishing paint was applied and the corrective action was shown to the PSCO.
preventive_action: It's like extensive chaffing in the locks and alongside when you check the hull condition and plimsoll marks.

deficiency_finding: The record must be filled as required.
description_overview: The vegetable room door is not sealed properly.
immediate_causes: The same serial numbers were shown for the auxiliary engines.
root_cause_analysis: The master's understanding of the certificate was inadequate and the defects raised by PSC were not clarified in a timely manner.
corrective_action: The Master reported the issue to the Supremo.
preventive_action: The certificate must be consistent with ship equipment and the master should be familiar with it.

deficiency_finding: Other Alarms are malfunctioning.
description_overview: The refrigerators that were put in place didn't have thermometers installed.
immediate_causes: A statement of compliance for FO consumption reporting is yet to be issued by the flag administration.
root_cause_analysis: Due to other pressing operations in the port, spare parts on order were not yet renewed by the ship's staff.
corrective_action: There were new faulty sensors and pressure transmitters that were supplied in the port.
preventive_action: Procedures are in place to ensure staff are aware of requirements and trained.

deficiency_finding: Structural members between frame 12 and frame14 will be permanently repaired.
description_overview: Structural members between frame 12 and frame14 will be permanently repaired.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: A Condition of class (COC) was issued after temporary repairs were carried out by the shore workshop team.
corrective_action: The COC is issued by the classification society.
preventive_action: Training session for all ships staff included familiarization of open COC's.

deficiency_finding: In case of emergency, the doors are locked from inside.
description_overview: Since the delivery of the vessel, no alterations have been made.
immediate_causes: Incorrect equipment handling and operating.
root_cause_analysis: The access door is usually locked.
corrective_action: The lock on the door is always open so that both inside and outside can enter.
preventive_action: Lesson learned spread to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: The gas analyzer is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The gas analyzer is malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: It's difficult to find the right spare because of long term unavailability.
root_cause_analysis: It's difficult to find the right spare because of long term unavailability.
corrective_action: The company immediately inquires about the availability of the spare parts and will supply them on the next port.
preventive_action: The gas analyzer should be upgraded to a more durable type.

deficiency_finding: The operation of the post office was not in line with the plan.
description_overview: The last passage plan wasn't amended with anchor position and relevant berths.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The passage plan was properly prepared by the Navigating officer, but he failed to apply the intervals of position fixing to the ECDIS.
corrective_action: According to the LOP and the LOP entries, training is provided from master to all bridge officers.
preventive_action: The Master and Navigating officers were reprimanded of the importance of the proper preparation and execution of voyage plan as well as ECDIS operation and relevant requirements.

deficiency_finding: There is a large quantity of chemicals stored in steering gear in a 200 ltr drum.
description_overview: There is a large quantity of chemicals stored in steering gear in a 200 ltr drum.
immediate_causes: If the safety officer was properly doing his verification, the missing safety labels should not be cited.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of safety awareness.
corrective_action: The report was submitted to PSCO and action was taken to close the issue.
preventive_action: Good situational awareness should be a shared activity and as a team.

deficiency_finding: Several gratings in the deck catwalk were heavily corroded at the time of inspection.
description_overview: Several gratings in the deck catwalk were heavily corroded at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: The master was not occupied at other tasks.
root_cause_analysis: The last supply was done in Vietnam in September.
corrective_action: The gratings were renewed prior to departure Hamilton.
preventive_action: The deficiency noted along with corrective action and lesson learnt has been shared with all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The record book of engine parameters is not recorded properly.
description_overview: The record book of engine parameters did not record the replacement of fuel valve nozzles for G/E and M/E.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The chief engineer entered the parts numbers that were stamped on the main body of the replacement parts rather than the specific id of the parts that were included in the makers manual, according to the investigation.
corrective_action: On the same day, the entries were corrected by the chief engineer.
preventive_action: In order to prevent a similar occurrence in the future, the fleet vessels Chief Engineers were requested to check and confirm that all NOx technical file entries were properly recorded.

deficiency_finding: The sink and faucet are in poor condition.
description_overview: The sink and faucet are in poor condition.
immediate_causes: There was a missingPLUG.
root_cause_analysis: People are related.
corrective_action: The sink faucet and drain should be fixed by the end of the inspection.
preventive_action: LAUNDRY FACILITIES checks are included in the following:

deficiency_finding: The manual position fixing was not following the inbound voyage plan.
description_overview: There are methods of position fixing that are not marked in the passage plan.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance of transit areas.
root_cause_analysis: The bridge team failed to follow company procedures for LOP fix of the position during pilotage due to a lack of awareness.
corrective_action: The Master told the bridge team to plot the LOP fix position at frequent intervals on the ECDIS during coastal voyages and pilotage.
preventive_action: The Master must ensure that the company procedure in MSM Section 11.4 Passage Planning is fully implemented with additional focus on the requirements for "monitoring".

deficiency_finding: There is a restriction on the amount of water that can be used on board.
description_overview: The fresh water line was not maintained.
immediate_causes: Master contacted the local agent to get permission from the port authority to carry out the drill.
root_cause_analysis: Due to long port stays at African ports, the fresh water generation by ship own was impossible, also the fresh water supplies were not available at those port, the temporarily limiting consumption fresh water measure were adopted on board to ensure crew and ship safety.
corrective_action: The master raised the request for fresh water at the port of Gijon to the local agent.
preventive_action: Master will seek fresh water from all available resources to make sure there is enough for routine use.

deficiency_finding: Placards.
description_overview: Some placards on waste boxes are missing.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Lack of assessment of needs and risks.
corrective_action: The particular subject is rectified.
preventive_action: Discussed in the meeting with the crew how to prevent the systematic recurrence.

deficiency_finding: The main deck has excessivecorrosion.
description_overview: Plastic or metal wires are used to hold the safety valve on the fuel oil level gauge.
immediate_causes: The previous voyage was laden and the cargo holds couldn't be accessed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of proper maintenance for the main deck.
corrective_action: The residual cargo should be removed and cleaned as soon as possible.
preventive_action: There is a special corrosive main deck with residual cargo.

deficiency_finding: Light for liferaft unlit.
description_overview: There is a hand crank for the lifeboat.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect tools, equipment, materials, and inadequate inspection are some of the things that can go wrong.
corrective_action: The sudden malfunction of the launching light for liferaft was fixed from the vessel's stock prior to the completion of the inspection.
preventive_action: The ship's engineers and safety officer were reminded of the importance of the proper shipboard inspections on the critical equipment in order to make sure it is ready for use at all times.

deficiency_finding: The battery of BNWAS expired.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: The CSR doc is different from the DOC.
root_cause_analysis: The spare battery unavailability and supply issues are due to the vessel's trading area.
corrective_action: Please find the delivery note for reference if you need a spare battery replaced.
preventive_action: The vessel was told to create a requisition for 3 months in advance.

deficiency_finding: There are mats missing in front of the panels.
description_overview: A potential slip trip and fall can be caused by rubber insulation mats in front of electrical panels that are not secured properly.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to use PPE properly is caused by lack of standards.
corrective_action: There are areas where protection materials have been missing.
preventive_action: This topic will be part of the next committee meeting which will be representative of the supreme leader.

deficiency_finding: Rescue boat hoses deteriorated and were difficult to arrange.
description_overview: Inspector's opinion is that one rope should be replaced with a new one.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: Work instructions are not included in the system.
corrective_action: Engineers adjusted the bend of the hose.
preventive_action: To include work instructions in the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The alarm light in the engine room is not functioning.
description_overview: The alarm system for CO2 Fire Extinguishing system for the main engine of the air space is not fitted to the vessel.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The fire detection system and water mist alarms were checked on a weekly basis.
corrective_action: The power supply was replaced.
preventive_action: The weekly checks will be continued by the vessel.

deficiency_finding: There is no safe way to get to the free fall emergency light.
description_overview: There is no safe way to get to the free fall emergency light.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: There are Incorrect tools, equipment or materials.
corrective_action: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
preventive_action: The ship's engineers and safety officer were reminded of the importance of the detailed shipboard inspections on the onboard LSA / FFE / critical equipment in order to verify that such equipment shall be ready for use at all times.

deficiency_finding: The fuel oil leak alarm was bypassed.
description_overview: The main engine fuel oil leakage alarm was bypassed.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The gasket that was installed on the sensor was too thick and caused an alarm to appear later.
corrective_action: The gasket that was installed on the sensor was not thick enough.
preventive_action: The system was found to be in good working condition after being surveyed by the class.

deficiency_finding: The fire detection system was found not connected.
description_overview: There is an oil leak from a cylinder in a cargo hold.
immediate_causes: The seafarer was supposed to identify that hose was not connected.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of awareness of the importance to conduct the checks relating to the fire-fighting equipment.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer had a discussion with the engine personnel to make them aware of the importance of performing the check on the equipment.
preventive_action: Fire-fighting on April 5th.

deficiency_finding: The IOPP does not specify the ship type.
description_overview: There were few spaces left to be filled in the last page of the ballast operation.
immediate_causes: There was no flow of sludge observed due to malfunctioning of solenoid valve which allows air for sludge to return in both "auto" and "manual" mode Immediate Cause - Substandard Conditions
root_cause_analysis: Mistake by class: inadequate documentation.
corrective_action: The corrective action was accepted by PSCO.
preventive_action: This observation has been included in the Company database from where it was selected for inclusion into periodic QHSE/Vetting Bylletin.

deficiency_finding: Fumigation instructions not signed by the master and C/O.
description_overview: The voyage safety plan checklist was not signed by the master and chief officer.
immediate_causes: Poor understanding of STCW and lack of familiarization.
root_cause_analysis: There is an inadequate documentary record of the verification of the safety plan.
corrective_action: The master and C/O must sign the instructions.
preventive_action: Training for Fumigation procedures, ventilating the spaces and monitoring will be carried out.

deficiency_finding: The hours of rest for C/O and 2/0 did not comply with the drill record.
description_overview: The tank cleaning operations room sample point failed while testing the fixed gas detection system.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The records of the Chief Officer and Second Officer were recorded as rest instead of work, as a result of inadequate supervision Investigation carried out with the assistance of the Master.
corrective_action: The work and rest hours records that were found with errors were corrected to show the actual working status of the Chief Officer and Second Officer.
preventive_action: As a preventive measure, a training session was carried out on the same day (14th) by the Master to all officers and crew, in the course of which, he stressed the importance to meticulously record the hours of work in strict compliance with the actual routines and onboard activities/ drills etc.

deficiency_finding: The approved ship security plan did not apply to the Oxygen / Acetylene locker.
description_overview: The company follow the International Ship and Port Facility Security Code.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of security awareness, inadequate leadership, and lack of knowledge are some of the reasons why FFRRP is Failure to Follow Rules Regulation and Procedures.
corrective_action: After being pointed out, the Master instructed the crew to secure the Oxygen / Acetylene locker and carry out a Safety Meeting with regards to proper equipment securing, emphasizing in the Restricted Areas on board and how we secure that areas.
preventive_action: The proper securing of equipment in restricted areas has to be closely monitored by the head of department and the Deck crew.

deficiency_finding: When equipment for which performance standards are developed by the organization is carried on ships in addition to those items of equipment required by regulation 19 and 20, such equipment shall be subject to approval and compliance with performance standards not inferior to those adopted by the organization.
description_overview: The vessel is fitted with a Furuno VR-700 VDR unit and ancillary equipment, and the vessel's class-approved PMS is provided with weekly, monthly, and maintenance and testing work orders which are in line with makers' recommendations and instructions.
immediate_causes: After a change of management failure to check the tanks in the certificate section 3.1 is what happened.
root_cause_analysis: An approved service technician boarded the vessel and carried out a repair on the MIC.
corrective_action: The Annual Performance Test of VDR is carried out as per guidelines given in SOLAS regulation V 20 and as per Circular 1222.
preventive_action: It was emphasized that proper and regular maintenance for the bridge equipment be completed as per the schedule and in case any defect or discrepancy is noted same is to be reported and attended to immediately.

deficiency_finding: Two steam pipes are not complete.
description_overview: The new insulation was found to be insufficient after completion of routine maintenance.
immediate_causes: Lack of supervision and inadequate job planning.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector is correct that the heat insulation was missing at the time of the inspection.
corrective_action: This was fixed to the satisfaction of the PSC officers and recorded on the report.
preventive_action: He will closely supervise compliance in the future after conducting a meeting with all crew and emphasizing proper supervision to each planned tasks to ensure the work has been completed as planned and all component of the fitting / work location has been taken back its initial state properly.

deficiency_finding: If the administration is satisfied that the equipment is appropriate to the space connected, no electrical equipment will be installed in it.
description_overview: The conduit piping for the following had isolated spot holes for Temperature sensor conduct, Pressure sensor conduct, and Junction box conduct.
immediate_causes: The seafarer was supposed to identify that hose was not connected.
root_cause_analysis: The conduit pipes at all locations on the deck were verified and noted to be in good order except for the one pointed out by PSCO.
corrective_action: The temperature sensor conduit for 2 port and 6 Stbd, pressure sensor conduit for 1 Stbd, 2 port and 2 Sbd, and Junction box conduit for 5 Stbd were all carried out by the ship staff.
preventive_action: The condition of the main deck has been checked in order to review the maintenance plan.

deficiency_finding: The stability information booklet is not required.
description_overview: There was no approval from the flag.
immediate_causes: The Stability Manual was approved by the classification society.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of inspection ship certs.
corrective_action: The correct certificates were printed out and kept in file.
preventive_action: Master should be familiar with Chapter I General Provisions Part B and Certificates and the Appendix of SOLAS convention.

deficiency_finding: The company is required to take corrective actions within 3 months.
description_overview: The company is required to take corrective actions within 3 months.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow rules and regulations is a substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: The deficiency no. 15 for ISM is marked/raised by PSCO due to the fact that some of the deficiencies are a result of ISM procedure failure or lack of effectiveness.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: An onboard audit was conducted to verify the effectiveness of the system.

deficiency_finding: There is 8 inches of sea water near the Main Engine.
description_overview: There is planned maintenance on the diesel generator.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear the gasket.
corrective_action: The new gasket was raised to complete the repairs.
preventive_action: For any future failures or repairs, the spare gasket should be kept onboard.

deficiency_finding: The last condition evaluation report is not available during the inspection.
description_overview: The risk rating is low.
immediate_causes: Bulk carrier was stated in the ship's classification certificate, along with other cargo ships.
root_cause_analysis: Master couldn't find the Condition Evaluation Report/Executive Hull Summary because it wasn't kept in the ESP.
corrective_action: The Condition Evaluation Report/Executive Hull Summary was sent immediately after Master requested it.
preventive_action: In order to confirm the latest report to be recorded and file to relevant files, the master should check the reports monthly.

deficiency_finding: There is a crack on the Port side L/B.
description_overview: Master confirms that life-saving equipment is maintained in line with the Class approved maintenance system.
immediate_causes: The lamp cap is loose.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection was inadequate.
corrective_action: Once pointed out by the inspector, the Flag state, Class and Lifeboat Makers approved servicing company were immediately contacted and an approved shore technician attendance was arranged at the port of inspection with required spare parts to carry out the repairs as per class approved repair procedures.
preventive_action: After the conclusion of the inspection, senior management officers were briefed by the QHSE officer and the responsible officer was reprimanded for his oversight.

deficiency_finding: There are no EEBD's in the accommodations.
description_overview: The ship structure access manual is missing.
immediate_causes: Human error.
root_cause_analysis: EEBDs should be located in the accommodations.
corrective_action: As per class approved safety plan, there are three EEBDs located at the upper deck of the vessel.
preventive_action: Master briefed officers about proper job planning and emergency readiness of safety equipment after maintenance, test or drills and their understanding was confirmed.

deficiency_finding: There was a station roller at the mooring station.
description_overview: Including pipe and valves.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: It was easy to turn and move the frozen rollers.
preventive_action: The crew was briefed on all the deficiencies with the help of the Fleet Supremo and Internal Auditor.

deficiency_finding: Engine room, fire alarm panel, steering gear, and one yellow and green rotation lamp are not working.
description_overview: The rudder angle indicator was not showing the same angle as the bridge repeater.
immediate_causes: During control testing, the navigation lights were found to be in good order.
root_cause_analysis: The Engine Room alarm indicators were found to be malfunctioning during the Engine Room inspection.
corrective_action: The sound alarm was restored after the electric wire was re- connected.
preventive_action: In order to avoid the re-occurrence of the problem, the Electrician has been recommended to check all connections for proper tightening during the periodic PMS check and all lamps to be checked as required by the work orders.

deficiency_finding: The Weather fax antenna Earth cable was torn and damaged.
description_overview: The 220V system has an earth fault.
immediate_causes: There are bad tools/ equipment.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge was not able to check the system because of the bad weather.
corrective_action: The damage ground wire was fixed by the ship's electrician.
preventive_action: The bridge deck has an antenna that needs to be checked before it arrives at the port.

deficiency_finding: The company should establish procedures to ensure that the ship is maintained in accordance with the provisions of the relevant rules and regulations and with any additional requirements which may be established by the company.
description_overview: The second officer is not familiar with the code.
immediate_causes: Regular updates to the Solas Training Manual were not carried out by the safety officer.
root_cause_analysis: The crew is not familiar with the provisions of the ISM code.
corrective_action: The master, chief officer and chief engineer were trained about the documents below.
preventive_action: The equipment should be regularly maintained and recorded according to the ship's maintenance plan.

deficiency_finding: The record of the Last Stability Calculation was not compatible with the record of the Ballast Water Record.
description_overview: On the 16th of September, the entry drill time for Second Officer was 10:00-11:00 instead of 10:30-11:45 because of a typing error.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer's inattentiveness was the cause of the discrepancy between the entries in the Ballast Water Record Book and the stability calculation.
corrective_action: The Chief Officer was given additional training by the Master to ensure that the stability calculations are in line with the record book entries.
preventive_action: This deficiency was addressed during the daily management shore meeting under the Managing Director.

deficiency_finding: Life rafts are not secured in accordance with instructions.
description_overview: The life rafts are not secured in accordance with instructions.
immediate_causes: Master ordered the safety officer to correct the situation.
root_cause_analysis: The arrangements of the davit launched liferafts was with turnbuckle type, which was properly maintained and easy to release, but the inspector noticed that the pelican hook was instead used.
corrective_action: The L/R should be secured as per the instructions.
preventive_action: The L/R should be secured as per the instructions.

deficiency_finding: Some endorsement by flag state of crew member is not signed by the holder.
description_overview: The cargo ship safety equipment certificate stated that the navigation equipment was in good working condition, as it was seen by the inspector.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The crew members' signature was taken.
preventive_action: Before signing the AOA, all crew members need to have their certificates verified.

deficiency_finding: The rescue boat embarkation and launching arrangements should allow the rescue boat to be boarded and launched in the shortest time possible.
description_overview: Rescue boat davit slewing is slow.
immediate_causes: There was a malfunction with the sample pump.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance.
corrective_action: The new davit is ready and will be sent by sea freight after 2 to 3 months.
preventive_action: The davit will be sent to Houston by sea freight on June 24.

deficiency_finding: The L/O settling tank valve was tied up.
description_overview: There was a self-closing device between the flat glass level gauge and the lub oil settling tank.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The senior engine officers did not notice that the engine personnel had tied the L/O settling tank valve with a rope to prevent accidental operation.
corrective_action: The engine crew put a warning label over the valves after removing the rope.
preventive_action: During the safety meeting held after the inspection, the Master emphasized the importance of ensuring that all quick closing valves remain unobstructed to prevent automatic closure during emergency situations.

deficiency_finding: There is oil leaking on the inner shaft seal.
description_overview: There is oil leaking on the inner shaft seal.
immediate_causes: Testing was carried out after the repair and it was found to be in good working order.
root_cause_analysis: There is an incorrect identification of an oil leak.
corrective_action: The inspector asked for the ER bottom platforms to be taken out to inspect the bilges and bottom sections of the vessel.
preventive_action: In order to highlight the importance of proper relay of information to 3rd part auditors/inspectors about the vessel machinery and proper inspection of Engine Room bottom sections periodically for any leakage from the pipes, seals and importance of keeping, a detailed teleconference de-briefing session was conducted by the

deficiency_finding: Generator 1, and 3 exhaust systems were found with exposed surfaces.
description_overview: The insulation lagging on steam/bunker pipes in the underdeck passage was damaged.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: There are exposed surfaces for the G/E exhaust system.
corrective_action: The hot surfaces should be covered with proper lagging.
preventive_action: The third engineer must check the temperature daily and pay more attention to lagging condition.

deficiency_finding: There is a lack of familiarity with fire drill management.
description_overview: SoLAS CH. 11-2, REG 15
immediate_causes: The procedure of shipboard contingency plan was not followed.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient training and familiarization is required.
corrective_action: Carried out a fire drill as per the contingency plan.
preventive_action: There are drills and training on the shipboard contingency plan.

deficiency_finding: The closing mechanism on E/R is missing.
description_overview: The EGC coastal station setting is incorrect.
immediate_causes: Human physical constraints are caused by error.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not notice the missing spring.
corrective_action: As soon as possible, the missing spring will be installed.
preventive_action: The crew will check the spring in the future.

deficiency_finding: The BWTS is out of order and there is no valid flag state exemption letter on board.
description_overview: The flag state condition was agreed.
immediate_causes: The crew were not familiar with the stripping procedure of the tanks.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance was indicated by the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: Since the vessel is eligible for compliance with D2 regulation, the international certificate must reflect this eligibility.
preventive_action: The crew discussed deficiency and corrective actions at the end of August.

deficiency_finding: The EEDI technical file is unable to be produced.
description_overview: The correct nozzle ID was marked on the record.
immediate_causes: The Master and Chief Engineer were unfamiliar with the procedure and instructions.
root_cause_analysis: There are three main causes: BASIC CAUSES - PERSONAL FACTORS.
corrective_action: The EEDI Technical file was sent to the Master.
preventive_action: The ship's certificates and statuary drawing management should be improved.

deficiency_finding: There are incomplete details of debt not recorded in the official record book.
description_overview: The Gangway SWL and max. person capacity placard/stencil is missing because of the rush to leave the shipyard facing restrictions in China.
immediate_causes: There is no record of the ID number.
root_cause_analysis: There is a gap from log book entries to the departure.
corrective_action: Master should put this information on the departure page.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Boiler fuel pipes and water level drums are not insulated.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: The responsible crew is required to check the overall condition of the pipework during the monthly inspections of the boilers.
corrective_action: The insulation around the fuel pipes was installed by the engine crew.
preventive_action: During the next monthly safety meeting, the Master was instructed to emphasize the need of carrying out effective inspections and enhancing crew's supervision during the periodic inspections/checks as well as reporting any identified defects.

deficiency_finding: Outside light is partly dirty.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Didn't report the broken equipment to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The Company has established procedures to ensure that vessels are maintained in accordance with the provisions of the PMS.
corrective_action: The crew cleaned the globe after the PSC Officer pointed out the deficiency.
preventive_action: The necessary corrective and preventive action plan has been issued by the company.

deficiency_finding: A mooring rope needs to be changed.
description_overview: The rope was sent as an additional head line and did not meet retirement criteria.
immediate_causes: The warning system is not adequate.
root_cause_analysis: Poor inspection and/or maintenance.
corrective_action: During the course of the inspection, mooring rope was replaced with a new spare rope.
preventive_action: The retirement criteria for synthetic fibre ropes were explained.

deficiency_finding: The furniture in the crew mess room needs to be renewed.
description_overview: The Engine room has 4 chairs that are damaged.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was aware of the broken furniture, but they didn't prioritize the job in order to get it fixed on time.
corrective_action: All the furniture was repaired at the port of Narvik.
preventive_action: In case of any damage, the relevant part to be repaired or the furniture to be immediately replaced should be observed by the Chief Officer.

deficiency_finding: The BWMS must be maintained by the master, owner, operator, agent, or person in charge of the vessel.
description_overview: The BWMS must be maintained by the master, owner, operator, agent, or person in charge of the vessel.
immediate_causes: Insufficient review instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The inoperable BWTS was reported to the USCG before entering the US waters.

deficiency_finding: The galley fire door is not closing correctly.

preventive_action: There is an additional check point for the verification of the self-closing fire doors in the galley compartment.

deficiency_finding: It was not possible to demonstrate the operation of the incinerator.
description_overview: If the risk rating is high, the QHSE team will be notified.
immediate_causes: The crew are not aware of the requirement of setting for ECDIS, the operation and maintenance manual is not fully implemented on board.
root_cause_analysis: The pilot burner's DO pump did not provide enough pressure.
corrective_action: Immediately after the pilot DO pump was inspected, primed, and successfully tested, all crew members were trained on the procedures for operating the incinerator.
preventive_action: The procedure is already in place for the operation of the incinerator.

deficiency_finding: There is a sink in the crew laundry that has a missing tap.

preventive_action: During the Monthly Safety Committee Meeting, the deficiency was brought to the attention of the entire fleet.

deficiency_finding: BWNAS has been inoperative since April.

preventive_action: The matter will be discussed.

deficiency_finding: There is a Rubbish Bin in the mess room.

deficiency_finding: The person who is responsible for the maintenance of LSA equipment is not on the muster list.

root_cause_analysis: The crewing company did not submit the renewal application on time.
corrective_action: The certificates should be renewed under the regulations.
preventive_action: All certificates should be maintained and followed up after application.

deficiency_finding: Load Master wasn't an annual test conducted by the Class.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: The Master and C/O didn't know how to enter the Garbage Log.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector did not see the annual test result.
corrective_action: To find the test result retained on board, the company immediately asked the Class for the annual test result.
preventive_action: There was a missing test result and a show to the inspector.

deficiency_finding: The brake lining on the anchor windlass is worn out.
description_overview: Brake lining is worn out and in poor conditions.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The brake lining was not stated to be in bad condition despite being reported to be in need of maintenance.
corrective_action: New brake linings were requested and expected to be delivered on board by 15 August in order to replace the remaining mooring winch and windlass.
preventive_action: The company's procedures for reporting of defect and non conformities were requested by the responsible officer.

deficiency_finding: There is a copy of the certificate not posted.
description_overview: It was MLC 2006
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew failed to post the MLC certificate.
corrective_action: The copy was posted on the spot.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels are given the deficiency along with our comments.

deficiency_finding: The condition evaluation report is not available.

root_cause_analysis: After finding lack of documents, the company was not asked to give it timely.
corrective_action: Print out the Executive Hull Summary immediately and ask the company/class to give a Condition evaluation report.
preventive_action: If there is a shortage of documents, the company should give them to the master in time.

deficiency_finding: The fluorescent bulb light is unlight.
description_overview: One of the lights in the cable duct space was unlit, but the light was immediately renewed and shown to PSCO.

root_cause_analysis: Bulb failure due to noise.
corrective_action: The electrical officer was briefed by the master to check the lights outside and inside one day before the arrival port.
preventive_action: The completion date is 06.06.2.

deficiency_finding: The weight of battery for a flight sign is 7.5KG.
description_overview: The signalling lamp battery was disconnected from the power supply at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: There are rules and regulations.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient knowledge.
corrective_action: The total weight of the battery for the daylight signal lamp was lowered.
preventive_action: The weight of battery for a daylight signal lamp was explained in the training of the ship staff.

deficiency_finding: There is a damaged buoy on the port bridge wing.
description_overview: The crew noticed minor rust on the lines, but it did not affect the integrity of the line.
immediate_causes: The number of compass observations was insufficient.
root_cause_analysis: A surface scar on a life buoy was seen by the PSCO and later investigated by the ship's staff.
corrective_action: The port bridge wing life buoy was replaced immediately by the new spare life buoy.
preventive_action: Proper way of inspecting the life buoy explained.

deficiency_finding: The transfer of oily water from the bilges to the tank was not recorded on ORB.
description_overview: The Oil Record book states that the spill from the #2 HSFO (S) tank was verified by the CCS.
immediate_causes: There was a small amount of water at the entrance of the pipe duct during the PSC inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The master and C/E did not fully explain the PSCO's query about the related recording in the ORB.
corrective_action: In order to avoid the same mistakes in the future, the chief engineer should learn "Regulation 17 of Chapter 3 of MARPOL ANNEX I" immediately.
preventive_action: Carry out self- inspection of oil record book before signature and weekly to strengthen the supervision of crew.

deficiency_finding: At the time of the inspection, the cargo ship construction certificate does not match the exemption certificate issued by Liberia.
description_overview: Survey out of window.
immediate_causes: The endorsed certificate wasn't printed on the plane.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect information in the safety construction certificate was not identified.
corrective_action: An E-Safety Construction Certificate was requested to be re-issued immediately.
preventive_action: Training was done to make sure the filling systems are checked and the information is correct.

deficiency_finding: The ship discharged waste into the sea, but it was wrongly recorded as discharging into the sea.
description_overview: There will be a 611.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: N/A
root_cause_analysis: The C/O was recorded in the wrong position.
corrective_action: The discharged waste position was recorded as C/O corrected.
preventive_action: The system document management regulations need to be strictly implemented.

deficiency_finding: There is a steering flat with chemicals stored in it.
description_overview: The MSDS for Monoethylene glycol was not available when PSCO inspected it.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were provided.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient product/service design verification is a problem.
corrective_action: The report of the monoethylene glycol was sent to PSCO before departure.
preventive_action: The deficiencies will be discussed in the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: Wrong direction for release.
description_overview: The condition of MOB was checked after the observation and it was found that an additional release pin was attached to the equipment and it was rusted.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: The MOB design of the vessel was approved by Class.
corrective_action: In order for the Light release position to meet the satisfaction of the PSC Officer, the old supports of MOB have to be uninstall and re-installed.
preventive_action: Discussed with the crew in order to increase their safety awareness.

deficiency_finding: The master, owner, operator, agent, or person in charge of a vessel in the waters of the United States must remove fouling organisms from the vessels hull and dispose of any removed substances in accordance with local, state, and federal regulations.
description_overview: The master, owner, operator, agent, or person in charge of a vessel in the waters of the United States must remove fouling organisms from the vessels hull and dispose of any removed substances in accordance with local, state, and federal regulations.
immediate_causes: Delays of maintenance were caused by previous port restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: There were few marine growths in the ship's hull, but the hull cleaning operation was not allowed due to local port regulations.
corrective_action: The hull cleaning will take place in the port of RiZhao on February 24th.
preventive_action: In order to avoid a repeat of similar, the ship fleet master should learn this issue and conduct self-check on board.

deficiency_finding: There are rollers in the section that aren't rotating.

root_cause_analysis: Insufficient adjustment, maintenance, and repair.
corrective_action: The rope rollers will be carried out.
preventive_action: In case of any issue, the mooring station equipment should be reported to C/O in a timely manner.

deficiency_finding: There is a steering gear compartment.
description_overview: The gyro compass light is not working.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The emergency steering gyro compass repeater light was last checked in good order before the maneuver at Abbot Point, Australia.
corrective_action: There is a spare bulb on the spot.
preventive_action: All lights need to be checked every week and after drills.

deficiency_finding: There was no security drill after 7 crew members were changed.
description_overview: While scrutinizing the drill records, the PSCO noted that there was a crew change of more than 25% and the vessel had conducted an abandon ship drill and fire drill within 24 hours of the crew change.
immediate_causes: There was an isolated lapse on complying with drill requirements.
root_cause_analysis: There was an isolated lapse on complying with drill requirements.
corrective_action: After obtaining terminal permission, the vessel conducted a security drill.
preventive_action: The drills and trainings were conducted as per the company procedure after the master was debriefed.

deficiency_finding: There is a different type of beacon found on some navigation lights.
description_overview: The lights are used without protection.
immediate_causes: The store at fore peak has some lamps that burn-out.
root_cause_analysis: During the last safety inspection on the ship, the staff identified the lights that were due to wear and they were put on order.
corrective_action: There was a discrepancy between the light on Aft ANCHOR top and the light on the other side.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The sewage discharge valve was not locked.
description_overview: The vessel is fitted with OWS, type- 3Sep OWS-5m3/h, Oil Filtering equipment with alarm and automatic stopping device.
immediate_causes: Defective valve of sewage system is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: There are 12 factors that can cause a job to fail.
corrective_action: The discharge valve to Aft peak tank was replaced because it was stuck in shut position.
preventive_action: The topic will be discussed during monthly safety and management meetings.

deficiency_finding: There is a bad gasket on the entrance to the engine room.
description_overview: Engine crew replaced the ceramic glass gasket of the entrance to the engine room.
immediate_causes: The gasket of the fire door is rotten.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of compliance with company requirements.
corrective_action: Engine crew replaced the ceramic glass gasket of the entrance to the engine room.
preventive_action: During next quarterly maintenance/ inspection and submission of TEC 27 'Quarterly LSA-FFE Maintenance Checklist' and MAR02 'Deck Equipment Maintenance Booklet' end of September, the vessel was instructed to submit date imprinted photo evidence of all fire doors condition.

deficiency_finding: There are cracks on the steps.
description_overview: PSCO V.V. Rusanov imposed a new deficiency during the Novorossiysk PSC inspection.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: There was a strong sea and it was difficult to board the ship, so Master decided to drive the engine to make a leeward.
corrective_action: Purchase order for new pilot ladder type A with certificate will be made by master.
preventive_action: The steps should always be clean and free from oil and grease.

deficiency_finding: The automatic start for the sea water cooling pump is malfunctioning.
description_overview: INSULATION MATERIALS FOR PIPES FROM E/R TO FIRE STATION ON A-60 ARE NOT COVERD.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The PIC engineer neglects at regular inspection.
corrective_action: To control the automatic starting, use the pressure launcher.
preventive_action: We will strictly implement the manual in the future.

deficiency_finding: The alarm system malfunctioned.
description_overview: The vessel is fitted with OWS, type- 3Sep OWS-5m3/h, Oil Filtering equipment with alarm and automatic stopping device.
immediate_causes: Defective valve of sewage system is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: The maker manual has an inadequate scheduling of maintenance work.
corrective_action: The normal working of OWS was restored after the Smart Bilge measuring cell was cleaned and flushed with fresh water.
preventive_action: In consultation with the Technical Manager and Makers, the job for cleaning the cell was changed to weekly instead of monthly.

deficiency_finding: The peak area must be cleaned.
description_overview: The peak area must be cleaned.
immediate_causes: There are a lot of rubber hoses and ropes on the floor.
root_cause_analysis: The rubber hoses were not stacked correctly.
corrective_action: The rubber hoses were stacked at the storage shelf.
preventive_action: Improve all crew's safety awareness.

deficiency_finding: Several alarms were found in the alarm system.
description_overview: The root cause was related to faulty sensors for the isolated alarms.
immediate_causes: There was a violation of SOLAS 1981 Chapter II.
root_cause_analysis: There are valid generic and specific certificates for the ECDIS held by all watchkeepers.
corrective_action: Due to the location of the vessel, the replacement sensors could not be delivered.
preventive_action: The engine room will be manned until the alarms are online.

deficiency_finding: The auxiliary engine number two was leaking oil.
description_overview: The auxiliary engine number two was leaking oil.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The crew left some stains on the machine after not cleaning the lube oil properly.
corrective_action: The crew cleans the lube oil stains.
preventive_action: The C/E and 1/E will make sure the engine room is clean.

deficiency_finding: The emergency switchboard has a colour strip designation.
description_overview: There is low insulation on the emergency generator.
immediate_causes: The crew members were aware that the sea chest valves were not marked with a contrasting color during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The emergency switchboard has a colour strip on it.
corrective_action: This deficiency is appreciated by the vessel staff and managers.
preventive_action: The observation will be sent to all fleet vessels to confirm that they have the colour strip designation on the emergency switchboard.

deficiency_finding: The log book has not been verified.
description_overview: The log book has not been verified.
immediate_causes: The master was not occupied at other tasks.
root_cause_analysis: The master forgot to sign at other tasks.
corrective_action: The master signed the log.
preventive_action: Verification of documents will be carried out with master training.

deficiency_finding: The air vent on WBT 5 stbd is not tightly sealed.
description_overview: There is no effective prevention of mosquitoes in the hospital.
immediate_causes: The air vent side cover supports the air vent.
root_cause_analysis: Material degrades due to exposure.
corrective_action: Securing bolts are checked and replaced where necessary.
preventive_action: To identify where maintenance is needed, weekly inspection should be increased.

deficiency_finding: LRIT is not required.
description_overview: The LRIT conformance test report is not original.
immediate_causes: The procedure used during the exchange was explained by the captain.
root_cause_analysis: The cause for why there was only a copy of the LRIT Conformance Test on board was related to the IKM that misinterpreted the regulations and filed the original document at their facilities.
corrective_action: A copy of the original LRIT conformance test report has been accepted by the NMA.
preventive_action: To avoid similar deficiencies in the future on board any of the company's vessels where only a copy of the LRIT conformance test report is filed on board, a statement has been requested from NMA to confirm that a copy is a valid report.

deficiency_finding: There is missing evidence that is approved for the Administration Booklet.
description_overview: There is missing evidence that is approved for the Administration Booklet.
immediate_causes: Not under the Company's/ship management control.
root_cause_analysis: The final loading manual needs to be checked with Administration.
corrective_action: The declaration was attached to the report.
preventive_action: All documents should be paid more attention to.

deficiency_finding: Water, pipes, tanks and cargo hold no. six and sever rusted.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts of the bilge standard discharge connection were found to be heavily corroded.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of responsibility for deck maintenance work.
corrective_action: The maintenance work was carried out in time after departure from Constanta.
preventive_action: Once the weather permits, de-rusting maintenance work can be carried out.

deficiency_finding: There are fire doors in fire-resisting divisions.
description_overview: There are several fire doors that are not closing properly in the room.
immediate_causes: The staff missed out on the fact that three of the fire doors were not adequately closing.
root_cause_analysis: There is inadequate maintenance and hazard identification.
corrective_action: The doors for both spaces have been adjusted and are self-closing.
preventive_action: This observation will be shared with all fleet vessels to ensure that all self-closing doors are latched when in closed position.

deficiency_finding: The lack of a central centre of command and poor crew performance were related to the missing head count.
description_overview: Poor crew performance during fire drill is related to poor maintenance and lack of central centre of command.
immediate_causes: The correct donning procedure was explained to the crew members after they were briefed on the inspector's concern.
root_cause_analysis: The orientation on the fire drill was inadequate.
corrective_action: Crew members were educated on the procedures for fighting fires, including the use of fireman outfits, fireman's radio, and equipment.
preventive_action: The master and head of departments will closely watch the drills.

deficiency_finding: There is a valid SOC for fuel oil consumption reporting or for fuel oil consumption reporting and operational carbon intensity rating.
description_overview: The title was reg. 4.
immediate_causes: The crew delayed responding to the PSC officer request due to their busy schedule.
root_cause_analysis: The SEEMP folder was not found to be valid for fuel oil consumption reporting.
corrective_action: Request a new copy valid SOC for fuel consumption and update as per requirement.
preventive_action: If a document is not found, always ask for shore assistance.

deficiency_finding: The control of the water in the cargo hold is in the control of the engine.
description_overview: The control of the water in the cargo hold is in the control of the engine.
immediate_causes: China ports are not convenient for delivery of spare parts.
root_cause_analysis: The alarm panel's power supply was faulty.
corrective_action: The fault that caused the failure of the power supply was replaced.
preventive_action: The ETR will periodically check the panels of the alarm system.

deficiency_finding: The endorsement of Flag State for the 2nd ENGs Certificate of competency was found with a wrong COC Number.
description_overview: The endorsement of Flag State for the 2nd ENGs Certificate of competency was found with a wrong COC Number.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: As soon as practical after joining the vessel, all Crew Certificates must be reviewed for validity and correct entries, as well as any discrepancies brought to the attention of Office for follow-up.
corrective_action: During the course of the inspection and deficiency closed with the PSC prior disembarkation, a new CRA was issued by the flag.
preventive_action: Observation to be shared, along with the Monthly Finding List, with Fleet vessels to review crew certificates for correct entries.

deficiency_finding: There are straps not arranged on the liferaft port side.
description_overview: There are straps not arranged on the liferaft port side.
immediate_causes: The vessel not update and poster on time was due to the port facility security level.
root_cause_analysis: P.I.C didn't acknowledge well on securing strap for life raft leading to improper handling.
corrective_action: P.I.C immediately adjusted the arrangement of the Life raft lashing strap.
preventive_action: To avoid this issue from occurring again, Master conducted the education to all crews about international regulation related to SOLAS 1996.

deficiency_finding: There was an oil spill during the operation of the MARPOL AnNEX I/Pumping, piping and discharge arrangements.
description_overview: There was an oil spill from the 2P tank vent.
immediate_causes: The air supply system valve was closed.
root_cause_analysis: Refer investigation report shows that the 2P Bunker tank filling valve was leaking and lead to the overflow of the 1 Starboard VLSFO Bunker tank.
corrective_action: There was a 300 liter oil spill which was contained on the deck.
preventive_action: Training session for all ship's staff was conducted for correct procedures to be followed as per company's Fuel management plan Chapter 5 'Bunkering Procedures'.

deficiency_finding: Poor condition filter for the head of the air vent.
description_overview: The engine room of the vessel has been meticulously maintained and is currently in good working condition.
immediate_causes: There was a missingPLUG.
root_cause_analysis: Its condition became poor due to lack of proper maintenance.
corrective_action: Cleaning, maintenance and renewal of filters by crews.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was reminded to inspect and verify the Filter for the head of the air vent.

deficiency_finding: Fire protection is lacking.
description_overview: The insulation material of the FO drain tank is broken.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: There is a lack of maintenance on weathertight hatches on board.

immediate_causes: There is a lack of supervision from the onboard management.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: The crew welded and installed steel cleats and secured devices.
preventive_action: Managers are to be kept fully aware of any defects that can't be fixed.

deficiency_finding: Most cleats can't be closed, 2 are missing.

immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: After the departure of the vessel from the port, the Chief Officer and Chief Engineer had already identified the condition and maintenance work that needed to be done.
corrective_action: The 2 missing cleats were replaced with the help of the deck crew.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was strongly advised to follow all the Company's maintenance procedures onboard in order to ensure the vessel's good maintenance condition as required.

deficiency_finding: The fire symbol is missing.

preventive_action: The topic will be included in the lesson learned.

deficiency_finding: A seafarer with medical fitness is valid for more than 2 years.

immediate_causes: Even if validation of certificate was met according to company requirement, some crew's medical certificate was not meet U.K rule.
