deficiency_finding: There are a lot of loose boxes in the CO2 room.
description_overview: Non-Conformity was rectified on April 12.
immediate_causes: Due to short passage and lack of awareness of situational importance of hygiene, the washrooms on the ship were not immediately cleaned and maintained.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer's failure to maintain vessel's proper housekeeping and hygiene condition is the root cause of the deficiency.
corrective_action: The boxes had to be removed immediately.
preventive_action: The monthly safety committee meeting with the participation of all officers and crew will discuss all the deficiencies.

deficiency_finding: The water is giving a continuous alarm.
description_overview: Code 17.
immediate_causes: The Pre-Alarm for No.4 Cargo hold was activated due to malfunction of the sensor.
root_cause_analysis: There was a misunderstanding between the PSCOs and the water ingress alarm system.
corrective_action: The PSCOs were accepted before their disembarkation after the ship's staff explained the same to them.
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: There are 12 crew members with the SEA who have exceeded their contract time.
description_overview: Certifying and documentation is part of the Seafarers' employment agreement.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Manning agency prioritized responding to various restrictions on crew change procedures due to the effects of the Pandemic and overlooked simple Crew Contract duration and extension procedures which required POEA.
corrective_action: The POEA contract for 12 crew was extended by 2 months.
preventive_action: Since the declaration of the end of the Pandemic, restrictions have been relaxed in each country, so it is now possible to respond to normal operations.

deficiency_finding: There is a light for the starboard side.
description_overview: There is a navigation.
immediate_causes: Although we are thankful for drawing Master's attention to unlit navigation light, we believe that this fact couldn't be recorded as PSC deficiency.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel didn't deviate from the instructions.
corrective_action: The PSC Deficiency was upgraded to "code 10 - rectified".
preventive_action: The vessel was equipped with spare light and alarm.

deficiency_finding: In the month of May, actual hours of rest are not reflected in the recorded rest hours of deck personnel.
description_overview: The rope was soaked in paint and found on the starboard side.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: There was a conflict between rest hours and drills.
corrective_action: The necessity to be properly and accurately recorded was the topic of the safety committee meeting.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company has taken the following measures: - A Safety Bulletin has been forwarded to the Company's managed vessels with the outcome of PSC Inspection which is to be discussed during the next Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: The ship must be compliant with the requirements of SOLAS XII/4, 5, 6 and 7.
description_overview: The type of ship in the certificates is not known.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer presented the plan to the officer.
root_cause_analysis: PSCO was confused due to the dual vessel type and want to have a confirmation from flag as the stability booklet was approved by flag.
corrective_action: Immediately, the vessel flag (Barbados) was contacted to have clarification on the defect and issue a statement on the type of vessel.
preventive_action: Sharing Auditor Deficiency will be shared with auditors.

deficiency_finding: The gangway net is damaged.
description_overview: All the vessels need to have a certain number of mandatory, hazard, safety, fire, direction and prohibitory signs.
immediate_causes: The old gingham net was replaced with a new one.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of compliance, inadequate maintenance, and insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: NET REPLACED.
preventive_action: There is an issue to be included in the next committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: The fan is from E/R.
description_overview: The interim certificate expired on January 14, 2023.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The operation and general condition of the E/R fans will be verified quarterly in line with e-PMS.
corrective_action: After the vessel's departure, maintenance is expected to be completed by the end of January.
preventive_action: The Master and the deck officer discussed the importance of protecting the vessel's appearance during the remote close out meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence that the vessel is provided with an inspection boat as required by the ship's access manual at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: The inflatable boat is mentioned in the access manual as a means to inspect the higher parts of the Fore Peak Tank.
immediate_causes: Testing was carried out after the repair and it was found to be in good working order.
root_cause_analysis: There are improper arrangements.
corrective_action: As per the advice of the PSC officer, the verification that the deficiency was closed out will be done by the attending PSC officer at the next Paris MOU PSC inspection.
preventive_action: The inspection of portable access equipment as per access manual was revised in order to raise crew awareness.

deficiency_finding: The space that was used for oil production was garbage-strewn.
description_overview: The O2/Acetylene room doors had a retrofit plate welded on them.
immediate_causes: There was a small amount of water at the entrance of the pipe duct during the PSC inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency is a housekeeping issue.
corrective_action: The deficiency was fixed to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer, Engine's officers and personnel were strongly advised to ensure proper detection, elimination of any leaking and cleaning works on a daily basis and to ensure that all deficiencies are discussed at the monthly safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: Not required - hold the vent.
description_overview: The vent of the cargo hold was found to be severely corroded.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: Failure to fulfill maintenance requirements: Defective parts/components not replaced/repaired in due time proper maintenance to remove/clean/minimize rust on vent gratings could and should be done by crew on board.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of motivation, poor risk awareness, and perception of risk are some of the human factors.
corrective_action: Proper repair/replacement of grids will be done during the upcoming dry-dock.
preventive_action: Master will ensure compliance with Company's instructions and regulatory requirements for the inspection and maintenance of bulk carrier hatch covers / coamings and openings, in addition to the repairs to be carried out at this time.

deficiency_finding: The cargo operations control form was not signed by the terminal representative.
description_overview: There are no drills visible on the company form III.3.1.3 Drill & Training log.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There is a human error.
corrective_action: The discharge plan has a terminal representative signature on it.
preventive_action: The deck officers carried out a report on the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: There was some pasta with worms.
description_overview: During the last monthly inspection, all provision items were found to be in good condition.
immediate_causes: Testing was carried out after the repair and it was found to be in good working order.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection was inadequate.
corrective_action: The spoiled pasta was thrown away.
preventive_action: The Galley staff has been briefed by the master to ensure proper inspection of all provision items and any sign of spoilt items to be safely dispose of.

deficiency_finding: There were insects noted inside the light covers.
description_overview: There were insects noted inside the light covers.
immediate_causes: There were a lot of flies around the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: We didn't remove the dead flies before we arrived.
corrective_action: Light covers were removed and cleaned.
preventive_action: Light cover for any flies trap should be included in a routine inspection.

deficiency_finding: The crew was provided with an inappropriate size suit.
description_overview: Two sets of immersion suits were found missing at the time of the inspection, as per the fire control and safety plan.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was given the wrong size of suit.
corrective_action: Re-checking the height of each crew is one of the things that the company has to do.
preventive_action: To avoid the same case, check the appropriate immersion size for each crew in any changes or new crew assigned during delivery of the vessel.

deficiency_finding: It was not possible for Vessel to implement cyber risk management.
description_overview: Instructions and procedures to ensure safe operation of ships should be included in every company's safety management system.
immediate_causes: The officer forgot to put the blocker back in ECDIS as he was rushing to finish the plan.
root_cause_analysis: Master and Navigating Officer didn't know that a password should be kept in computers.
corrective_action: The deleted file 'Computer Credentials' is kept in Master's custody.
preventive_action: Master's weekly verification and before arrival port that cyber security management is being maintained.

deficiency_finding: The Security Plan was not signed by the SSO and the PFSO.
description_overview: The Security Plan was not signed by the SSO and the PFSO.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of Knowledge of Statutory Rules/ Regulations/Procedures is a problem.
corrective_action: When he came on board at 1610lt, he sent a request email to the local PFSO which was signed and stamped on the D.O.S.
preventive_action: Comply with the procedures for every port.

deficiency_finding: No.1 G/E INSTRUMENT PANEL can't be read.
description_overview: The loading instrument computer is used for other administrative issues and is not dedicated for stability information.
immediate_causes: The door wasn't closing due to Deformation.
root_cause_analysis: SMO-702-1.2 Routine Check and Test at Sea was not followed.
corrective_action: Return the damage caused by the pressUREGUAGE.
preventive_action: The electrician and engineer should check generators, motors, switchboard, gauge, sound and light signal, alarm system and other electrical equipment at least twice a day.

deficiency_finding: Exhaust lagging on generators is not a problem.
description_overview: There is a navigation.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge failed to inspect the exhaust gas pipe.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't carry out inspection according to the plan.
corrective_action: The lagging on the exhausts has been re-installed.
preventive_action: Trained the crew and make sure they are familiar with the requirements of the HMC-VMM-002 ship's Precautionary Inspection, Maintenance Period and Distribution.

deficiency_finding: The EEXI technical file was not provided by the PSC.
description_overview: All the vessels need to have a certain number of mandatory, hazard, safety, fire, direction and prohibitory signs.
immediate_causes: Poor order.
root_cause_analysis: There are insufficient information documents in supervision.
corrective_action: Master requested for a copy of EEXI Technical File to be sent by e-mail.
preventive_action: The long term measures include making a file folder onboard.

deficiency_finding: Master was told to comply from the current date onward after only 3 compass observations in the last 5 weeks.
description_overview: If not possible to take observation due to overcast skies, poor visibility or due to heavy traffic, an entry is to be made to justify not being able to take gyro error observation.
immediate_causes: The number of compass observations was insufficient.
root_cause_analysis: The deck log book shows overcast skies and poor visibility, but no entry was made on the azimuth log to justify not having a compass error observation.
corrective_action: When the condition does not allow to take compass error observation, duty officers did not make remarks on the compass observation log.
preventive_action: The duty officers didn't have log entry on the azimuth log.

deficiency_finding: The Key Officer wasn't familiar with the operation.
description_overview: Disregard deficiency before departure.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The PSC officer wrote that the Key Officer was not familiar with the operation.
corrective_action: The test was immediately carried out by the master.
preventive_action: Master instructed the PIC to carry out the test.

deficiency_finding: The completion date of the survey on which the certificate is based was before the issuance of the S.C certificate.
description_overview: The vessels get the same date to fix the boiler controllers malfunction.
immediate_causes: The same serial numbers were shown for the auxiliary engines.
root_cause_analysis: The class issued certificate was not checked for clerical errors.
corrective_action: The PSCO was satisfied with the new certificate issued by the Class.
preventive_action: All certificates received onboard should be checked for details and any Typo errors should be addressed immediately.

deficiency_finding: The room wasn't as clean as it should have been.
description_overview: In the 'before' pictures, the change over procedure was ship specific, but it was revised as requested and the deficiency was fixed before departure.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given and the deficiency was fixed on-site during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The deficiency was recorded due to the presence of oil in the boiler fuel oil feed pump in the purifier room, which was cleaned after the inspection.
corrective_action: The PSC officer verified the actions taken by the engine personnel and the deficiency was closed out during the inspection.
preventive_action: The Master and the Chief Engineer held an ad hoc meeting after the inspection to improve good housekeeping practices.

deficiency_finding: There is a leaking bandage on the heating line in front of the superstructure.
description_overview: The water leak was caused by the worn-out gasket.
immediate_causes: Maintenance is improper.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient inspection.
corrective_action: The heated cargo has now been discharged and Master confirmed that cosmetic maintenance has continue on steam line and the upgrading process is being closely monitored by technical department.
preventive_action: The general condition of steam lines on the main deck should be checked regularly by the Master and Chief Engineers to make sure that they are free of damage.

deficiency_finding: During the PSC inspection, the rescue boat engine failed to start.
description_overview: There is planned maintenance on the diesel generator.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: The ship's engineer couldn't find the engine's spark plug since the engine started without a problem on last inspection.
corrective_action: The engine's starting is in good order after the ship's crew dismantled the igniters and cleaned them.
preventive_action: Every week, this item will be checked under the company system, under the IT platform, under the ship's LSA checklist, and under the rescue boat engine test.

deficiency_finding: Program settings are loaded.
description_overview: The settings for the container in the loading program were found to be far over reasonable limits.
immediate_causes: There are factors that affect the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: The factors that affect a job are system factors, inadequate communication, and information.
corrective_action: 'Heavy over light' container settings should be changed to a limit/weight.
preventive_action: The finding will be shared with the entire fleet to make sure that the same finding won't be repeated on other vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence that the operations waste is met with the requirements of MARPOL AnNEX V.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: The Master and C/O didn't know how to enter the Garbage Log.
root_cause_analysis: The Master and C/O didn't know how to enter the Garbage Log.
corrective_action: The Garbage Management Plan was re-educated.
preventive_action: The Master and C/O were told to enter the Garbage Log.

deficiency_finding: The ISO sockets at bay 14(SA), 18(SA), 26(SF) and 38(SF) were wasted.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Not enough to meet the requirement.
corrective_action: The crew replaced the old ISO sockets with new ones.
preventive_action: To follow the requirements.

deficiency_finding: The water came from the fire pump.
description_overview: The starboard side freeboard marks, forward and middle draft marks, and Plimsoll mark are not fully painted.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient compliance with the instructions.
corrective_action: The emergency fire pump was repaired and resumed.
preventive_action: Maintenance training will be conducted on board to make sure crews fulfill their responsibilities.

deficiency_finding: Not available is the record of employment.
description_overview: Seafarers' extension contracts are not signed by the owner's managers.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with industry rules.
root_cause_analysis: Seafarers contract extensions were in place for all crew, but they couldn't be processed at POEA since the vessel's manning had been handed over to new management.
corrective_action: The contracts don't like manning the department.
preventive_action: All staff are told to carry Signed contracts at the beginning of their contracts.

deficiency_finding: Seemp part 1 wasn't on the plane.
description_overview: The Emergency efficiency certificate was issued to the vessel at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The ship staff kept the file in soft copy because they missed the instructions for printing.
corrective_action: The master was told to keep the SEEMP in the hard copy and soft copy.
preventive_action: The deficiency status was closed after the completion of the QMS Dept.

deficiency_finding: Several navigation officers were unable to demonstrate placing a position on the ECDIS.
description_overview: OOW was asked to demonstrate placing a position on the ECDIS, but was unable to do so.
immediate_causes: There was a lack of continuous learning and familiarization in order to gain confidence and more knowledge specifically to use all navigation equipment, which was expressed by OOW during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Proper training and familiarization are lacking.
corrective_action: In order to ensure comprehension and learning of the familiarization, the Deck Officers were provided with individual demonstrations of placing positions derived from bearing and distances obtained from terrestrial objects.
preventive_action: To ensure full understanding of the equipment usage, the company should conduct a comprehensive training familiarization for deck officers on the use of ECDIS.

deficiency_finding: Oil and broken.
description_overview: The convention is called BWM Convention B.
immediate_causes: The inspector observed that a firefighter's neck was exposed during a mock drill.
root_cause_analysis: Due to lack of time, a task was unable to perform.
corrective_action: The first place insulation material was rectified.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels haveficiencies.

deficiency_finding: The ship's structutal integrity may have been compromised as a result of the collision.
description_overview: The company policy is to maintain the vessel in its highest standards.
immediate_causes: The lever in the meat room was damaged when one of my crew accidentally hit it.
root_cause_analysis: There was a collision with Hong Hai 189.
corrective_action: Repairs to the satisfaction of the class have been carried out.
preventive_action: The damaged areas will be repaired within the deadline provided by the class.

deficiency_finding: When an enclosed space entry drill is carried out, it is not allowed by the crew.
description_overview: When an enclosed space entry drill is carried out, it is not allowed by the crew.
immediate_causes: PSCO recorded a deficiency because Master's information that the familiarization process of the signed on 2nd Officer was just initiated at the same day was not accepted.
root_cause_analysis: Conflicting demands, directions, and inadequate transfer of information are some of the problems.
corrective_action: To the satisfaction of the PSCO's request, an additional safety enclosed space rescue drill was conducted, while requested SMS work permit report was also completed.
preventive_action: During the Master's next monthly safety meeting for all crew members awareness / attention was given to the fact that there are deficiencies that need to be communicated to all managed vessels.

deficiency_finding: There are four mattresses in the hospital.
description_overview: Due to crew being occupied with port activities and duties, old mattress was not taken out of hospital in time.
immediate_causes: Crew members don't know what an emergency is when they are in the engine room.
root_cause_analysis: The poor weekly examination of the ship's hospital was the cause of this.
corrective_action: Mattresses are moved to the equipment store.
preventive_action: A training session was held by the master to all crew members to make them aware of the importance of keeping the hospital room tidy and equipped with only the required items.

deficiency_finding: The rescue boat crane wasn't coming back to neutral position.
description_overview: The operating handle was not free to come back in position due to rust and inadequate lubrication as the operating handle mechanism is exposed to external corrosive weather conditions.
immediate_causes: The returning spring mechanism was immediately lubricated by the ship's crew.
root_cause_analysis: The condition of the rescue boat davit and associated operating handle should be checked by the master during the rescue boat drill.
corrective_action: The officer in charge will carefully monitor the condition of the operating handle in relation to any damage, rust, or inadequate lubrication and make sure that the defect is fixed immediately.
preventive_action: During the post inspection safety meeting, master told department heads to fix any defect that was reported.

deficiency_finding: There was no lighting at the funnel trunk.
description_overview: The emergency light outside the funnel was unlit when PSCO checked the lighting system.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: During the pre-arrival tests, one bulb in the top of the funnel was found to be broken.
corrective_action: The broken bulb was replaced prior to the completion of the inspection.
preventive_action: In order to always check the vessel's lighting at all times, the master and crew were briefed.

deficiency_finding: There are missing manometers on the deck of the Bunker station.
description_overview: Including pipe and valves.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The PSC officer found that manometers were not installed.
corrective_action: There are Manometers on the station.
preventive_action: The next cumulative findings report will be a lesson learnt from this deficiency.

deficiency_finding: There is a dirty surface around the Rescue Boat.
description_overview: The Rescue Boat has a dirty surface and a lot of oil.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: There was incomplete maintenance and lack of hazardous recognition.
corrective_action: The deck was cleaned and the oil was removed.
preventive_action: During the stay in port, this attention will be included in the order book and operational meeting.

deficiency_finding: Oil pollution discharge reported by the vessel and there are apparent oil substance remaining onboard and the hull of the vessel are suspected of being a discharge violation.
description_overview: Oil pollution discharge reported by the vessel and there are apparent oil substance remaining onboard and the hull of the vessel are suspected of being a discharge violation.
immediate_causes: There was an oil spill on the deck.
root_cause_analysis: Crew failed to follow instructions from senior officers.
corrective_action: Emergency clean up operation on deck followed by reporting to office and concerned authorities.
preventive_action: It is necessary to conduct cross checks during internal oil transfer.

deficiency_finding: Communication at the drill was done in Chinese and the English language was not fully understood by all crew members.
description_overview: The Deck Log Book was printed in English for Bridge-to-Bridge / Bridge-to-Shore communications, but the PSCO wanted it to be handwritten.
immediate_causes: The crew lacked confidence because of the presence of various external parties.
root_cause_analysis: Chinese and English were used to communicate with the Philippine crew.
corrective_action: Use English only in drills.
preventive_action: English is the only language used in the drill.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency stop for the rescue boat engine.
description_overview: There is a washing machine in the A/C station.
immediate_causes: The emergency stop of rescue boat needs proper training and education.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient instructions, orientation and/or training are examples of inadequate leadership and/or supervision.
corrective_action: To make sure the crew knows how to use the emergency stop of the rescue boat.
preventive_action: Training and education will be done to make sure that the correct procedures are followed when using a life-saving appliance.

deficiency_finding: The fire plan will be updated.
description_overview: The stability booklet states that shearing forces that do not comply with condition are found in the last loading computer test.
immediate_causes: After a change of management failure to check the tanks in the certificate section 3.1 is what happened.
root_cause_analysis: The master did not compare the fire plan with the safety equipment certificate.
corrective_action: The data was rectified as per the ship's certificate.
preventive_action: While renewing a ship's certificate, the staff and master should check and confirm all the information.

deficiency_finding: The strands of the radio antenna wire are broken.
description_overview: The port side wharf is between No. 4 and 5 Cargo Harbor.
immediate_causes: Cleaned before leaving.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of effective checks during the schedule.
corrective_action: The radio antenna wire has been renewed.
preventive_action: The finding will be discussed during the joining briefing of senior sea staff in the office.

deficiency_finding: The antenna wire is broken.
description_overview: The new telephone numbering system installed 3 months ago does not correspond to the auto telephone directory at the emergency control station.
immediate_causes: The damaged wire clips were not secured.
root_cause_analysis: The crew failed to do a good inspection after they encountered adverse weather.
corrective_action: The issue had been confirmed and closed out during the same day PSC re-inspection.
preventive_action: Instructs officer to check his aerial antenna connections on a weekly basis.

deficiency_finding: The engine generator is a foundation oily.
description_overview: There are pipes leaking on the deck.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: During maintenance of the engine the cylinder head covers were removed and before the assembly, the lube oil flow was checked.
corrective_action: The cylinder head covers were re- inspected to make sure they were in good shape.
preventive_action: There are specific instructions how to close a maintenance job which are complemented by weekly Health, Occupational, Safety and Environmental Inspection which is conducted by the Senior Management onboard.

deficiency_finding: There is a certificate or documentary evidence of financial security.
description_overview: A certificate of financial security for crew repatriation and ship owners liability is posted in a mess room.
immediate_causes: While taking over, the master didn't check the certificate at the mess rooms.
root_cause_analysis: There was no certificate or documentary posted.
corrective_action: There are certificates of financial security posted on the spaces.
preventive_action: Crew trained MLC Part- II will be strengthened.

deficiency_finding: The crew handling of a fire hose was unsafe.
description_overview: Medium.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: PSC officer requested the testing of emergency fire pump and one crew member was sent on deck to place a fire hose in order to test fire pressure.
corrective_action: Every crew member was busy with other tasks as the PSC was a team of two plus two auditors and during the inspection, cargo hold inspectors were also onboard keeping many other crew.
preventive_action: Extra training was sent to the fleet in order for the crew member to hold the fire hose.

deficiency_finding: Cargo and other hatchways are damaged due to minor oil leak from hatch covers.
description_overview: The PSCO found that the ME fuel quick closing valve can close quickly.
immediate_causes: Lack of training.
root_cause_analysis: The officer didn't know about the ICLL 2003 Amend/ANNEX I/Reg.14 and didn't follow the SMI-S-H03 and SMI-S-H05.
corrective_action: Trained the crew with the ICLL 2003 Amend/ANNEX I/Reg.14, SMI-S-H03 and SMI-S-H05.
preventive_action: Training of ICLL 2003; SMI-S-H03 and SMI-S-H05 SOLAS is relevant to enhance crew safety awareness and professional level.

deficiency_finding: The sewage inlet valve is difficult to operate.
description_overview: After treatment, sewage water is collected through the pipe to the peak tank which is not marked on the cert.
immediate_causes: The valve that goes to the sewage treatment unit is not rotating.
root_cause_analysis: There are issues with the sewage holding tank in the sewage treatment system.
corrective_action: It's a good idea to inspect and move the valves which are not used often.
preventive_action: The valve will be closed when it is operational on the spot.

deficiency_finding: The crew cabin is being used as a general store.
description_overview: mooring ropes were not laid correctly after berths.
immediate_causes: The air supply system valve was closed.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of storage area in the drinking water store.
corrective_action: The store was on the plane.
preventive_action: As per the GA plan,CCOMODATION SPACE needs to be checked.

deficiency_finding: There are holes in the main deck ventilator P22 and P21 pipe conduit.
description_overview: The international shore connection is a universal hose connection that is to be provided on all ships.
immediate_causes: The broken bulbs of indicator lights on the ship's Electrician were replaced immediately by the PSCO who was present on the scene.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause is the failure of the Electrician to discharge his duties and to ensure that the pipe of the main deck's ventilators were in good working order.
corrective_action: The ship's electrician immediately repaired the holed pipe conduit of the ventilator P22 and P21 by removing the head shrinker and installing a new threaded cable.
preventive_action: In order to ensure the correct function and good condition of all electrical equipment's, the Electrician was strongly advised that frequent inspection be done.

deficiency_finding: The Chief Officer is not familiar with the ships.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer presented the plan to the officer.
root_cause_analysis: Chie officer was at the port prior to the inspection.
corrective_action: After deficiency was imposed and for the sake of good order, the Crew Department arranged a remote video conference training in the next day in order to refresh the knowledge of the officer.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness and for all vessel's compliance, deficiency will be sent to all fleet's vessels.

deficiency_finding: The forecastle deck forepeak tank sounding pipe self-closing device was found to be faulty.
description_overview: The forecastle deck forepeak tank sounding pipe self-closing device was found to be faulty.
immediate_causes: Poor housekeeping.
root_cause_analysis: There was a scheduled maintenance job that wasn't executed.
corrective_action: The Forepeak sounding pipe self-closing device is in good working order.
preventive_action: The crew is trained to look after the smallest details when carrying out routine jobs.

deficiency_finding: The fire control plans were found without an approval date and the symbols were not readable.
description_overview: A duplicate set of fire control plans or a booklet containing such plans will be permanently stored in a weathertight enclosure outside the deckhouse for the assistance of shore-side fire-fighting personnel.
immediate_causes: The ship's plans for recovery of person from the water were not mentioned due to lack of review and supervision by the master and the person in charge.
root_cause_analysis: The plans are constantly affected by the nature forces of water, salt and humidity.
corrective_action: The crew must communicate the importance of proper documentation, maintenance, and inspection of fire control plans and the correction action taken to the personnel responsible for maintaining and inspecting the plans and other relevant personnel.
preventive_action: The report was shared among the vessels after the company was informed about the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: There are no paint marks on both sides of the water.
description_overview: The draft marks are rusty.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The Loadline and draft marks were painted during fair weather conditions.
preventive_action: The company and vessels under management always strive to keep their hull and draft marks well maintained.

deficiency_finding: The launchable life-raft position is incorrect.
description_overview: Steering gear room has an oil store.
immediate_causes: The primary muster station was established at the Stbd upper deck area in close proximity of the Fire control station and line with the SOLAS requirements as the muster station marked on the plans was at the Life Boat.
root_cause_analysis: The safety officer's failure to ensure that the life-raft was stowed to the proper location is the root cause.
corrective_action: The location of the life-raft was moved as per the safety plan.
preventive_action: PSC Deficiencies will be discussed during the next Safety Meeting in order to enhance Crew awareness and avoid reoccurrence of the same deficiencies to be granted to the vessel.

deficiency_finding: Garbage storage on board is excessive and the same is pending.
description_overview: Garbage storage on board is excessive and the same is pending.
immediate_causes: Failure to check tools prior to use of equipment is a human factor.
root_cause_analysis: Despite the email sent to the vessel as PSC preparation, the Master did not request shore facilities in order to discharge accumulated garbage.
corrective_action: Master was reminded to request availability for garbage discharge to shore facility through port agents.
preventive_action: The outcome of the AMSA PSC inspection has been communicated to all managed vessels through the Safety Bulletin. Replies have been obtained for understanding and compliance.

deficiency_finding: The gangway is not seated on the shoreside and safety net.
description_overview: The initial fire drill did not demonstrate adequate familiarity.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with procedure is an example of inadequate onboard training and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: The placement of the gangway is questionable.
corrective_action: The height of the subject gangway was adjusted after being pointed out.
preventive_action: The master briefed on proper gangway operation, maintenance, and safety procedures after the inspection.

deficiency_finding: The emergency generator room has a defect.
description_overview: There is low insulation on the emergency generator.
immediate_causes: There is a shore power lead penetration cover.
root_cause_analysis: There is a shore power lead penetration cover.
corrective_action: The new cover was fabricated and put in place.
preventive_action: The deck needs to be inspected frequently.

deficiency_finding: The company identification number is notCOINCIDED.
description_overview: The ISSC was issued by the flag after a successful completion of inspection, however the company identification number was incorrect when the certificate was issued and same was missed to be checked by the master.
immediate_causes: The act is not under the control of the local authorities.
root_cause_analysis: Poor inspection of ship certificates after issuance.
corrective_action: Attached is a copy of the ISSC certificate that was sent to the vessel.
preventive_action: The master was told to check the trading certificates and documents issued to the vessel to make sure they are accurate.

deficiency_finding: The control on the bridge wings detached from the brackets and was held on with cable ties.
description_overview: Before fumigating a previous voyage, no evidence of the ship safety committee should be carried out.
immediate_causes: Material fatigue caused this gasket to break.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: The control box on the bridge wings has been fixed.
preventive_action: Maintenance should be done in strict accordance with the requirements.

deficiency_finding: Seaworthiness is affected by hull damage.
description_overview: The next port of call for the vessel will be Montreal, Canada.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause was imposed because of the recent grounding of the vessel during her transit through the St.Lawrence river.
corrective_action: The DNV presence was present during the UWS inspection.
preventive_action: There is still an ongoing soft-mud grounding incident at the Three Rivers port.

deficiency_finding: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
description_overview: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge failed to inspect the exhaust gas pipe.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't check the engine exhaust gas pipe in the lifeboat because of Marker's manual.
corrective_action: After repairing exhaust gas pipe, engines in lifeboat are tested and no leaks are found.
preventive_action: All equipment should be inspected by an experienced engineer.

deficiency_finding: The number of two-way radio is not marked on the bridge.
description_overview: All the vessels need to have a certain number of mandatory, hazard, safety, fire, direction and prohibitory signs.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency lies with the safety officer's failure to identify the missing symbol of the two-way VHF, as the investigation revealed that all IMO signs onboard are maintained in proper condition.
corrective_action: The abnormality was fixed on the PSCO.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer and 3rd Officer were instructed to make sure that the symbols are placed correctly.

deficiency_finding: There are missing bolts on the standard discharge connection.
description_overview: There is a standard disch.
immediate_causes: The crew was in the process of changing the FW tank while the vessel was receiving fresh water.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient practice.
corrective_action: All bolts were put in place after the reception of fresh water was stopped.
preventive_action: There is a seminar as above.

deficiency_finding: There are a lot of loose boxes in the CO2 room.
description_overview: Non-Conformity was rectified on April 12.
immediate_causes: Due to short passage and lack of awareness of situational importance of hygiene, the washrooms on the ship were not immediately cleaned and maintained.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer's failure to maintain vessel's proper housekeeping and hygiene condition is the root cause of the deficiency.
corrective_action: The boxes had to be removed immediately.
preventive_action: The monthly safety committee meeting with the participation of all officers and crew will discuss all the deficiencies.

deficiency_finding: The lifeboat engine could not be started.
description_overview: The lifeboat engine did not start.
immediate_causes: The lifeboat engine was not started.
root_cause_analysis: The batteries lost their density and had stopped taking charge. The batteries lost their density and had stopped taking charge.
corrective_action: At the port of Ulsan, the batteries were installed and the lifeboat engine was started.
preventive_action: During the safety meeting conducted on board after sailing out from port, Master emphasized the need to report matters of importance immediately to the Master.

deficiency_finding: There is one lamp in the messroom.
description_overview: The gangway watchman failed to record the security tag for one of the 2 boarding custom officers.
immediate_causes: The battery was replaced during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The lamp was in good condition at the time of the inspection.
corrective_action: The lamp is different.
preventive_action: The weekly check list will be followed by the master in order to avoid reoccurrence.

deficiency_finding: The FW temperature of no.2 D/G is out of order.
description_overview: The FW temperature of no.2 D/G is out of order.
immediate_causes: The FW thermometer didn't work after the thermometer locking nuts came loose.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance checks.
corrective_action: Engine room team briefed on effective checks during routine safety rounds and any inadequacies noted to be promptly reported and rectified.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels will receive feedback.

deficiency_finding: The Frequency of position fixing interval using two means is different from the passage plan.
immediate_causes: Lack of immigration is a problem.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was negligent.
corrective_action: The position fixing needs to be in accordance with the passage plan.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There are dirty air filters in the ER.
description_overview: There are dirty air filters in the ER.
immediate_causes: The air filters were cleaned.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance wasn't completed during the inspection.
corrective_action: The air filters were cleaned.
preventive_action: During weekly ER inspection and clean/repaired whenever necessary, the Ventilation grids and air filters must be checked.

deficiency_finding: There is an oil leak on the fuel pumps.
description_overview: A/E were running on load for cargo operation.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient seal materials can lead to oil leaks around the fuel pumps.
corrective_action: Check the ME fuel pump puncture valve and the other fuel pumps for leaks.
preventive_action: Provide training to maintenance personnel on proper maintenance procedures and the importance of detecting and addressing leaks promptly to prevent equipment damage and downtime.

deficiency_finding: The Rain plug of the L/B (P) was broken during the PSC inspection at ZHUHAI, China.
description_overview: The company's established procedures and practices clearly state that all scuppers must be plugged at all times when in port.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer and the Deck Officers are responsible for making sure the deck scuppers are plugged and secured.
root_cause_analysis: During inspection it was asked PSCO to open the rain plug of life boat, same was opened up, but the rain plug fell out of the housing hole on the life boat body.
corrective_action: The rain plug was replaced with a new one immediately after the inspection.
preventive_action: "Rapid Fleet Safety Alert" was issued for our fleet on 21st Nov to call attention to this issue.

deficiency_finding: The engine room can't explain why the agent neutralizing tank is in alarm when the system is switched on.
description_overview: The engine room can't explain why the agent neutralizing tank is in alarm when the system is switched on.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The log on the E/R was not recorded by the crew.
corrective_action: The crew took the chemical into the AUN and reduced the water content.
preventive_action: The crew made a card with the ratio of chemical to water and posted it near the alarm panel.

deficiency_finding: There is a Bunker station.
description_overview: Including pipe and valves.
immediate_causes: There has been a sudden failure of communication equipment/switch which burn on date of inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Conflicting policy.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The emergency reading light is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The emergency reading light isn't working.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The GMDSS emergency reading light was last checked in good order before the maneuver at Abbot Point, Australia.
corrective_action: The bulb was broken on the spot.
preventive_action: Every week and after drills, all lights should be checked.

deficiency_finding: The emergency generator cooler fan belt is not tight.
description_overview: There are excessive belts on between the motor and compressor.
immediate_causes: The crew replaced the air cooler drain cock.
root_cause_analysis: Exposure to cold climate and ambient temperature causes the rubber belt to stiffen.
corrective_action: The belt was tightened as per the instructions.
preventive_action: When the temperature is low and the climate is cold, the cooler belt should be monitored frequently.

deficiency_finding: Wrong direction for release.
description_overview: The condition of MOB was checked after the observation and it was found that an additional release pin was attached to the equipment and it was rusted.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: The MOB design of the vessel was approved by Class.
corrective_action: In order for the Light release position to meet the satisfaction of the PSC Officer, the old supports of MOB have to be uninstall and re-installed.
preventive_action: Discussed with the crew in order to increase their safety awareness.

deficiency_finding: There is no information on the gangway.
description_overview: There is no information on the gangway.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Damages to the safety net did not impair its function.
corrective_action: Fix the upper platform of the accommodation ladder and deliver a spare safety net.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is no safe way to access the property.
description_overview: There was no space on the deck for safe movement of the crew at the last load port in China.
immediate_causes: Load line regulation 25-1 requires a permanent walkway of at least 0.6 m in width, fitted at freeboard deck level and consisting of two rows of quard rails with stanchions spacing not more than 3 m.
root_cause_analysis: The risk of blocking safe access for the crew was not understood by the ship staff responsible for cargo planning.
corrective_action: The permanent walkway for safe access was cleared after the re-inspection.
preventive_action: The Master and the chief officer were briefed on the requirements of load line regulation 25-2 and the importance of ensuring that safe access is always provided for movement of ship staff.

deficiency_finding: Engine room double bottom tanks sounding pipes self-closing mechanism didn't work for two numbers sounding pipes which were always kept in open position
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: Crew members are familiar with emergency systems.
description_overview: There is a de-watering valve area in a store.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Bad housekeeping is one of the job/ system factors.
corrective_action: The internal audit was carried out parallel to the PSC inspection.
preventive_action: In the forthcoming edition of the Compliance Check list, deficiency and recommendation will be shared within the fleet.

deficiency_finding: There are no records in the approved training record book for the Engine Cadet.
description_overview: There are no records in the approved training record book.
immediate_causes: When heaving up the port side anchor, the windlass mooring winch gear sheared due to heavy weather.
root_cause_analysis: The Training Record Book was not signed by the officer in charge on time.
corrective_action: The training record book reflected the actual working hours of the cadet.
preventive_action: The POEA Standard Cadet Training Agreement and Program needs to be followed by all officers and engineers.

deficiency_finding: A FOAM MONITOR GUN was found during an inspection.
description_overview: There is a slight air leak in the copper pipe fittings of pilot air valve for OWS that can only be felt by touching the pipe.
immediate_causes: The valve was old.
root_cause_analysis: The gun on the break of AccomMODATION was found to be empty at the time of inspection.
corrective_action: There were no injuries after the FOAM MONITOR VALVE was cleaned and returned.
preventive_action: All officers were reassured about the importance of regularly testing FOAM MONITORS.

deficiency_finding: The conditions of Class Nos. CC1 and CC2 were issued by the RO.
description_overview: The electrical apparatus should be constructed and installed in a way that does not cause injury when handled or touched.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The due date remains valid even though the case is known and handled through class.
corrective_action: Due to long delivery parts were shipped to Canada to fix the issue.
preventive_action: The due date is closely monitored by the technical department.

deficiency_finding: The discharge of 48112.2 m3 of water from the vessel was not reported to the local MSA in advance.
description_overview: The abandon ship drill and fire drill were not recorded in the log book.
immediate_causes: The previous Master was told to report any deballasting in Chinese waters prior to his arrival.
root_cause_analysis: The master forgot to sign at other tasks.
corrective_action: The master was told to train his crew on the rules of the port so that they are aware of them in the future.
preventive_action: As different ports in China have different rules and regulations, the fleet will be reminded of proper handover notes.

deficiency_finding: Diagnostic gloves are not presented for the test.
description_overview: The certificate on board was not valid.
immediate_causes: The L2 manifolds didn't close within 30 seconds.
root_cause_analysis: There is personal protective equipment knowledge on the test procedure.
corrective_action: 3 PAIRS OF NEW DIELECTRIC GLOVES ARE SUPPLIED NOW.
preventive_action: The gloves may not be put into service if they are not issued for service.

deficiency_finding: The upper and lower platforms are not marked as per regulation.
description_overview: The upper and lower platforms are not marked as per regulation.
immediate_causes: The deck crew forgot to mark on the upper and lower platform of the gangway after applying paint as routine maintenance, which was overlooked by deck officers due to lack of gangway access safety and situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: There is lack of planning and compliance on proper marking of gangway.
corrective_action: The upper and lower platforms were marked and Master instructed CO to check after maintenance.
preventive_action: Crew members are to be motivated and trained on the requirement of maintaining proper marking on both upper and lower platform of accommodation gangway during pre-joining training.

deficiency_finding: The boat's cooling water line was blocked.
description_overview: Scupper from deck going off into the water.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: Senior officer neglected to conduct a post-operational test to verify the absence of any obstructions in the cooling water inlet mesh/ports after the last trial/testing on January 21st, 2024.
corrective_action: The rescue boat engines were tried out by the AMSA inspector after the rescue boat engine cooling water line was cleared.
preventive_action: The LSA Maintenance plan chapter 5.6 for weekly inspections and maintenance of rescue boat engines should be followed by the ship staff.

deficiency_finding: The item "Time In" was recorded in the above drill's entry permit section 4 incorrect.
description_overview: The drill was for Steering gear failure.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: During the auditing of the drill schedule and drill reports, the PSCI found that the entry into the enclosed space and rescue drill was not planned well.
corrective_action: The entry permit times were corrected by the Master.
preventive_action: To satisfaction of the ship's senior officer, the masters of managed vessels have been asked to check and confirm that emergency drills are conducted at regular intervals.

deficiency_finding: There is a certificate or documentary evidence of financial security.
description_overview: A valid certificate for financial security was not put in the officer and crew mess room as requested by the inspector.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of awareness.
corrective_action: There was a copy of the certificate in the mess rooms.
preventive_action: Instructions to paste the copy of insurance certificates is included in the guidance of the company.

corrective_action: The importance of proper usage of vessel's FFE/LSA equipment was discussed and analyzed.
preventive_action: The PSC Inspection report and lessons learned have been included in the agenda of the monthly scheduled Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: The Muster List doesn't specify which officers are assigned to ensure that life-saving and fire appliances are maintained in good condition and ready for immediate use, and doesn't specify replacements for key persons who may become disabled, taking into account that different emergencies may call for different actions.
description_overview: The muster list was not specified which officers are assigned to ensure that life-saving and fire appliances are maintained in good condition and are ready for immediate use or replacements for key persons who may become disabled, taking into account that different emergencies may call for different actions.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The responsibilities of the safety officer who maintains the LSA and FFE were not explained.
corrective_action: The muster list is checked by the Master to make sure it reflects the current crew and roles.
preventive_action: Crew members were trained to understand the importance of the muster list.

deficiency_finding: There is no information on the gangway.
description_overview: There is no information on the gangway.

deficiency_finding: There is a difference of 2 degrees between the steering angle on bridge and the real mechanical indicator at the rudder stock.
description_overview: Deficiency was noted and action taken.
immediate_causes: There was a small amount of water at the entrance of the pipe duct during the PSC inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance was indicated by the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: The difference between the mechanical indicator at rudder stock and the repeaters of rudder indicator was identified during the inspection.
preventive_action: A Non Conformity PSC2 304 was raised by the Safety Department.

deficiency_finding: The record must be filled with item 1.2 "not fit" and item 1.3 "fitted".
description_overview: The vegetable room door is not sealed properly.
immediate_causes: There are rules and regulations.
root_cause_analysis: The master's understanding of the certificate was inadequate and the defects raised by PSC were not clarified in a timely manner.
corrective_action: The master reported the issue to the Supremo.
preventive_action: The master should be familiar with the certificates and the class should be aware of any doubts.

deficiency_finding: Two liferafts are secured.

immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

corrective_action: There were two liferaft's installed in a single craddle.
preventive_action: Master will issue work instructions for securing two liferaft's installed in single craddle.

deficiency_finding: A rotten pumpkin was found in the vegetables cold room.

immediate_causes: Fruits and vegetables are not available on the ship.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient monitoring and inadequate action.
corrective_action: Provision was delivered on the 16th of May.
preventive_action: The training of the chief cook and the weekly round of the provision store should be reinforced.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has a space fire door.
description_overview: The insulation on the fire door of the purifier room was damaged.
immediate_causes: The fire door insulation is poor.
root_cause_analysis: Poor standards.
corrective_action: The master ordered the insulation material and connected it to the ship.
preventive_action: The condition of the insulation on the fire doors is verified and observed in good condition.

deficiency_finding: There is oil in the engine room.

corrective_action: The traces of accumulated oil were cleaned during the inspection.
preventive_action: The recurrence can be prevented.

deficiency_finding: Some water is not working.
description_overview: There is ready availability of fire-fighting equipment.
immediate_causes: There are incomplete details in the company's particulars.
