corrective_action: The malfunctioning flashing devices were fixed.
preventive_action: During the next safety meeting, the Master will tell the crew that the deficiencies should have been avoided and that they can be fixed immediately.

deficiency_finding: The crew couldn't demonstrate high pressure leak test, low pressure alarm test and mask seal test.
description_overview: Poor crew performance during fire drill is related to poor maintenance and lack of central centre of command.
immediate_causes: The unit was inspected and repaired.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient training.
corrective_action: The importance of proper usage of vessel's FFE/LSA equipment was discussed and analyzed.
preventive_action: The PSC Inspection report and lessons learned have been included in the agenda of the monthly scheduled Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: The form E indicates that there is no back up for nautical publications.
description_overview: During the cable break test, the fire detection system didn't show an alarm.
immediate_causes: The original cargo cleaning pump was not fully guard by the safety net.
root_cause_analysis: Form E did not reflect digital publications installed.
corrective_action: Class annuals have been scheduled at the same port and the master instructed the class to amend Form E accordingly.
preventive_action: The Monthly Alert Bulletin will be sent to all fleet vessels with instructions to verify compliance.

deficiency_finding: The mount for the aerial antenna was corroded.
description_overview: VIV for #2 and #3 A/E was not closed on the first attempt.
immediate_causes: Maintenance and inspection are improper.
root_cause_analysis: Failing to implement inspection routines is required.
corrective_action: During the class attendance on January 5th, it was confirmed that the upgradation of the emergency light foundation was completed.
preventive_action: The general maintenance standards on board fleet vessels need to be checked by the Vessel Manager and Marine Supremo during internal audits and vessel visits.

deficiency_finding: Chubby security drills are not recorded in the drill matrix.
description_overview: The last time the boat was in the water was on December 16th.
immediate_causes: The drill matrix column for launching and maneuvering of rescue boat was found by the PSC inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of inspection.
corrective_action: The company was informed and asked for more information.
preventive_action: The company has been informed of the situation.

deficiency_finding: The locking devices are inoperative.
description_overview: An Occasional Survey was carried out at the request of the owner after deficiencies were pointed out by the USCG Mobile.
immediate_causes: The system settings required verification according to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The lever that locks the mooring winces was not working after the PSC officer requested that it be checked.
corrective_action: The damage was repaired before the inspection ended.
preventive_action: The deficiency was communicated to all ships in the fleet and relevant orders given to carry out a thorough check where the said lever exist to be able to operate normally.

deficiency_finding: There is a self-closing valve between the oil level glass gauge and the M/E L.O.S.T.
description_overview: The deficiency was closed by the PSC Inspector.
immediate_causes: The crewmember failed to comply with procedures.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of situational awareness.
corrective_action: The crew will be reminded that the self-closing valve should not be kept open with the use of clamping devices.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: All paint types were not covered by the sds at paint locker.
description_overview: There was a shortage of PSC PPE in the S/G room.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Some old Hempel paints were missing from the paint locker, but they were accompanied with the relevant MSDS.
corrective_action: A copy of the old paint stock was filled out in the paint locker and downloaded by the master.
preventive_action: Masters to ensure proper checks are made and advise outcome after deficiency was communicated amongst managed fleet.

deficiency_finding: The alarm column has a main power fault.
description_overview: The control of the water in the cargo hold is in the control of the engine.
immediate_causes: China ports are not convenient for delivery of spare parts.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause the mechanical defect.
corrective_action: The alarm deficiency has been fixed.
preventive_action: The GR will be closed as the alarm deficiency is fixed.

deficiency_finding: There are additional spaces in the sleeping room.
description_overview: The basin tap in the Seaman cabin is loose.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew members were not adequately addressed by the Master and Chief Engineer who were in charge of the inspection.
corrective_action: The cabin basin tap was inspected, the hot water valve was opened, and the shower tap was replaced with a spare.
preventive_action: There were potential deficiencies and observations discussed in the management meeting and the safety meeting onboard.

deficiency_finding: Fresh provisions were insufficient for the intended voyage.
description_overview: The inspector's comment was acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew went to the local supermarket on the same date of the PSC inspection, however, they did not return to the vessel until after the inspection.
corrective_action: Provide before departure and arrange provisions list to meet it.
preventive_action: The stock provision should be arranged before the ship's schedule is suddenly changed.

deficiency_finding: The echo sounder malfunctioned.
description_overview: A technician reported that the echo sounder was malfunctioning and the bottom signal was lost.
immediate_causes: The Main switchboard AC 220 V panel had a low insulation alarm activated due to a faulty portable cargo light.
root_cause_analysis: A technician reported that the echo sounder was malfunctioning and the bottom signal was lost.
corrective_action: The trouble shooting was carried out by the service technician at the next drydock.
preventive_action: The new report will be released to the fleet as soon as possible.

deficiency_finding: The mooring rope deteriorated.
description_overview: The crew pointed out that the connection to the ship's antenna was in need of repair and the relevant spare parts had already been ordered and delivered.
immediate_causes: The mooring rope is used with the guide rollers.
root_cause_analysis: The officers failed to find a crack on the antenna.
corrective_action: The chief officer called BoSUN to change the mooring rope and greasing area.
preventive_action: The mooring rope should be inspected by the chief officer.

deficiency_finding: The First Aid chest drug name expired.
description_overview: The expired medicine was in the first aid kit at the bridge.
immediate_causes: The crew members were aware that the sea chest valves were not marked with a contrasting color during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: The expired medicine was removed.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be discussed in the next meeting.

deficiency_finding: There was a fire in the paint locker.
description_overview: The limit switches for each door from bridge to navigation locker and stairway, which are installed to avoid obstructing vision of bridge watch by lighting from other places, were not moving smoothly during inspection.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: The water spray system in the paint locker was dirty and had water SCAL.
corrective_action: There was a fire in the water spray system.
preventive_action: To be familiar with the company's self-responsibility and to improve the work standard.

deficiency_finding: The Cargo Hold No 4 hatch coaming plate stiffener is cracked.
description_overview: There are four small hatch covers on the main deck.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The hatch cover no4 port side had a crack on the hatch coaming stiffener.
corrective_action: The damage did not affect the structural integrity and watertightness of the vessel, since the crack is limited to the support stiffener on the railway, and therefore accepted by the managers.
preventive_action: The Master is instructed to ensure that a thorough examination is carried out when the vessel faces severe weather conditions.

deficiency_finding: The company is unable to ensure the crew are well trained and organized.
description_overview: The crew can't demonstrate the alarm's function because they don't know the system.
immediate_causes: There is no compliance with procedures, permits, or safe working practices.
root_cause_analysis: The deficiencies that were pointed out were not taken into account.
corrective_action: Ensure the proper familiarization and training of the master, officers and crew are carried out regularly.
preventive_action: To inform all managed vessels about the deficiency to avoid a similar point out item during a PSC inspection.

deficiency_finding: The first aid kit was not kept in the rescue boat.
description_overview: Some of the medicines inside the first aid box need to be replaced.
immediate_causes: The first aid kit of the rescue boat was not put back after the shipyard.
root_cause_analysis: There was inadequate job delegation and supervision.
corrective_action: The first aid kit was put into the rescue boat immediately.
preventive_action: feedback is shared with all fleet vessels

deficiency_finding: There is a certificate or documentary evidence of financial security.
description_overview: A certificate of financial security for crew repatriation and ship owners liability is posted in a mess room.
immediate_causes: While taking over, the master didn't check the certificate at the mess rooms.
root_cause_analysis: There was no certificate or documentary posted.
corrective_action: There are certificates of financial security posted on the spaces.
preventive_action: Crew trained MLC Part- II will be strengthened.

deficiency_finding: Limitation device for rescue boat
immediate_causes: The equipment is defective.
root_cause_analysis: The limit switch of the rescue boat was stuck during the inspection.
corrective_action: Proper operation was confirmed with the free-up limit switch.
preventive_action: In order to prevent the same defect from happening again, we have revised the PSC checkLIST and LSA checkLIST.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, the temperature gauge outside the fish, meat, and dairy cold rooms were showing readings that were vastly different from the readings on the thermometers installed inside the same rooms.
description_overview: The refrigerators that were put in place didn't have thermometers installed.
immediate_causes: There is a new order at the first port.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was aware that the temperature gauge outside of the cold rooms were malfunctioning, but the temperature gauge in the cold rooms were functioning.
corrective_action: A Safety Committee meeting should be called in order to discuss with all crew members the importance of proper operation of the temperature gauge.
preventive_action: The planned maintenance and the frequent inspections of cold room temperature on daily basis should be followed as per Company's specific instructions and appropriate records should be kept.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence of approval for the booklet on behalf of the Administration.
description_overview: Class approval stamp did not mention that the manual was approved on behalf of Singapore flag administration when the vessel entered into management.
immediate_causes: The Stability Manual was approved by the classification society.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of documentary awareness.
corrective_action: RO wants to have an approval with an "approved" stamp on the documents.
preventive_action: All documents related to the change of RO must be presented and approved by the RO inspector.

deficiency_finding: The main valve in the engine room was leaking.
description_overview: There is a quick-closing valve for the generator oil inlet.
immediate_causes: Poor rubber packing, lack of safety culture and situational awareness of the importance to weather-tight and water integrity were some of the reasons why the forward forecastle doors were not checked carefully.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of effective routine inspection.
corrective_action: The valve was fitted back after being completely overhauled.
preventive_action: The Chief engineer was briefed to watch the work being carried out by the concerned person.

deficiency_finding: The vessel certificate expires in August of 2022.
description_overview: The annual verification was found to have expired.
immediate_causes: Statutory Certificates will be expired at the next port of call due to vessel trade.
root_cause_analysis: The staff of the ship missed out on the verification of the issued certificate.
corrective_action: Subject to the successful completion of occasional surveys at the next port of call, the postponement of Class and Statutory renewal surveys will not be objected to.
preventive_action: If he is satisfied with the condition of the equipment for the recommended period of extension, the service can be extended by three months.

deficiency_finding: There is an inventory of portable equipment in the plan.
description_overview: One two-way vhf radiotelphone apparatus is missing.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are job responsibilities that include inadequate leadership and/or supervision.
corrective_action: The equipment was put in a box and the inventory page was updated.
preventive_action: A weekly check.

deficiency_finding: At the moment of inspection, the BWMS is not functioning.
description_overview: At the moment of inspection, the BWMS is not functioning.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: Poor shelf life for re-use of materials and equipment is a problem.
corrective_action: To the satisfaction of the PSCO, the manufacturer's service engineer attended the vessel along with the required spare parts and restored the BWTS normal operation.
preventive_action: Although no substandard action was taken by the vessel's or company's side, following measures were agreed: Master shall discuss the deficiency's nature / contributed factors during the next monthly safety meeting in order to ensure that any identified defective equipment or machinery shall be properly followed up.

deficiency_finding: Sounding pipe did not close properly.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: The door from the engine room to the deck is not closing correctly.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance on safety devices is improper.
corrective_action: The crew restored the operation after cleaning the self-closing mechanism.
preventive_action: Management advised the Master to discuss the contents of the observation with the ship staff to highlight the importance of housekeeping and self-closing safety devices.

deficiency_finding: Equipment and loading instrument are included in cargo operations.
description_overview: The stability booklet states that shearing forces that do not comply with condition are found in the last loading computer test.
immediate_causes: The results of the test hadn't been compared with the protocol.
root_cause_analysis: Other Factors: N/A.
corrective_action: The PSCO accepted the rectification and closed the deficiency after a new test of the loading computer was carried out.
preventive_action: A minimum of 3 months is recommended for loading computer tests, along with details of relevant requirements.

deficiency_finding: Life-saving signals not posted in the bridge and crew were unable to show the pages in the manual.
description_overview: The international code of signals is not updated.
immediate_causes: 3/O and C/O couldn't explain the operations of the release hook.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not fully understand the question when asked about the poster of Lifesaving Signals.
corrective_action: The pages for Lifesaving Signals can be seen immediately by PCSO.
preventive_action: The vessel submitted a request for a Lifesaving Signals poster to avoid a repeat of the deficiency in the future.

deficiency_finding: During PSC inspection by US Coast guard on 08 May 2023, in Bulk Terminal 1, Lake Charles, LA following deficiency raised under Code 14104 and action taken code 30ac: "Oil filters referred to in paragraph 1 of this regulation shall be of a design approved by the Administration and shall be such
description_overview: The Bilge pump could not be maintained during the course of the inspection.
immediate_causes: The water came from the emergency because the discharge valve on the common delivery line was stuck in the open position.
root_cause_analysis: The CAPTAIN GIL D. JARANILLA JR. Bilge tank received water from the E/R bilge wells.
corrective_action: The pump's operation was restored after the VALVE ASSEMBLY and PISTON ASSEMBLY had their spare parts renewed.
preventive_action: A flow device that cuts-off power to the Bilge pump in order to maintain integrity/ operability will be installed in the next 3 months.

deficiency_finding: Sewage water is collected through the pipe through the temporary holding tank which is not marked on the ISPP Cert.
description_overview: Managers have dealt with this matter since last year where relevant exchanges with Classification Society,CCS verified that no such denoting in vessel's ISPP Certificate is required.
immediate_causes: None was identified.
root_cause_analysis: There was no lack of planning or standards.
corrective_action: The next Safety Committee Meeting will discuss deficiency and corrective actions with all crew.
preventive_action: The next Safety Committee Meeting will discuss deficiency and corrective actions with all crew.

deficiency_finding: There is a leak of the portside mooring device.
description_overview: Water leaking from the service pump.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The cover for the motor is packed.
corrective_action: Remove the broken parts, inspect and replace the packing, and find no leak.
preventive_action: The company SMS HMC-VMM-012 Hull and Deck machinery and enforcement routine maintenance of winch are referred to by training the engineer.

deficiency_finding: Cargo that isn't loaded on board will have a shipping determination.
description_overview: The sludge was dumped from the W.O. service tank to the primary separated service tank.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: During the safety meeting, the chief officer requested the cargo MSDS, but he did not give it.
corrective_action: After the PSC inspection, the terminal staff provided the MSDS to the vessel.
preventive_action: If cargo is not provided to the vessel, the cargo operation should be stopped.

deficiency_finding: The hull Summary report and the Thickness measurement report are missing from the last survey.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: Bulk carrier was stated in the ship's classification certificate, along with other cargo ships.
root_cause_analysis: There is a different state of ship's type in class certificates and ship's drawing and manual.
corrective_action: The report and drill record were Enclosed.
preventive_action: If you want to apply to the requirements, you need to update the state of the ship's type in all class certificates and ship's drawing and manual.

deficiency_finding: Fire protection is lacking.
description_overview: The insulation material of the FO drain tank is broken.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: There is only one jet or water for the fire drill in the engine room. Safety belt of one fireman falled down, not carried lamp and axe by first fireman team, fireman outfit does not cover all skin of person, pressure of water low, and not checked the arrangements for abandoning.
description_overview: The drill performance was below expected standards due to miscommunication between PSCO and ships crew.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance.
corrective_action: All items pointed out by the PSCO were verified.
preventive_action: Discussion on the outcome of the drill, suggestions for improvement, requirements on the ship specific arrangements for abandoning ships, and verification will be carried out by the auditor during his subsequent visit and/or Internal Audit.

deficiency_finding: The floor was wet because the steam pipe was leaking.
description_overview: When the gasket of the steam line gave way, PSCO did the E/R inspection at the same time.
immediate_causes: The crew did not have a tight well connection.
root_cause_analysis: The gasket was not leaking when the inspector came onboard.
corrective_action: The leaking gasket was replaced and presented to PSCO.
preventive_action: There are regular checks of the steam pipes.

deficiency_finding: It's not a family with Seemp part III.
description_overview: There are no drills visible on the company form III.3.1.3 Drill & Training log.
immediate_causes: The PSC inspector required a copy of the SEEMP Part III Certificate of Compliance to be presented by the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: There may not be enough training to educate the crew on SEEMP Part III.
corrective_action: Training sessions for all crew members should be focused on SEEMP Part III.
preventive_action: If there is a missing document, the company should organize workshops and practical drills to ensure crew members understand and can apply the principles of SEEMP Part III.

deficiency_finding: Plans and diagrams are not in the file.
description_overview: The SOPEP Port contacts list is not up to date.
immediate_causes: The ship's plans for recovery of person from the water were not mentioned due to lack of review and supervision by the master and the person in charge.
root_cause_analysis: The contents of the ship's SOPEP plan are according to the content list, but additional plans and diagrams are required by the PSC inspector.
corrective_action: General arrangements, tank capacity plans and bilge were added.
preventive_action: All plans will be added after the fleet is informed of a new requirement from PSC.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire hydrant with salt crust on the upper dock.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: The crew didn't put the caps on the hydrants.
root_cause_analysis: The ship staff didn't follow the PMS and regular inspection rounds weren't done to identify the issue.
corrective_action: Training of crew for maintaining equipment will be carried out.
preventive_action: Train and discuss with crew to carry out a routine inspection of the fire main line and associated hydrants.

deficiency_finding: Sewage leake before the valve on the portside.
description_overview: When the vent flap is not engaged in the rod, the water will cause it to detach.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow the procedures of the company.
root_cause_analysis: It is necessary to tear and wear piping.
corrective_action: Confirmation with onboard materials was sent to AMSA.
preventive_action: The condition of the piping was determined from our investigation.

deficiency_finding: The ship identification number is not marked on the correct position.
description_overview: BWM appendix II does not include the records of ballast.
immediate_causes: As per the No. 6 to No. 21 deficiencies.
root_cause_analysis: Responsible personnel should be aware of the marking requirements.
corrective_action: Spot deficiency was corrected and proper marking done.
preventive_action: The monthly alert bulletin will be sent to all fleet vessels with instructions to verify compliance.

deficiency_finding: Engine room auxiliary generator No.2, No.3 bed plate and No.3 Purifier lubricating oil pump have oil in them.
description_overview: Due to crew being occupied with port activities and duties, old mattress was not taken out of hospital in time.
immediate_causes: The fire door insulation is poor.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not clean up the scene carefully.
corrective_action: The leaking gasket on the No.3 oil pump has been replaced with onboard spare parts.
preventive_action: Master/CE will conduct more practical shipboard inspection for actual condition verification after all engine crew have been educated for practical shipboard maintenance procedure.

deficiency_finding: There is a leak in the NO.2 steer gear.
description_overview: The Master has acknowledged that the plastic drainpipe for the no. 2 steering gear had aged.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The Master has acknowledged that the plastic drainpipe for the no. 2 steering gear had aged.
corrective_action: The plastic pipe was renewed with a new one and the system was verified and closed out.
preventive_action: The staff of the engine room had a discussion about the need to inspect all oil compartments and drain pipes to make sure that the system works as designed.

deficiency_finding: There is a broken railing in the engine room platform.
description_overview: The pilot ladder was parted and the ship side railing was damaged.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The base plate and railing are secured with bolts.
preventive_action: The importance of securing the work place after completion of the task was emphasized in the training given to all ship staff.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has a cargo hold.
description_overview: BWMS found two alarms still active despite being alarmed.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedures.
root_cause_analysis: Poor assessment of preventive maintenance needs.
corrective_action: The vessel sailed from Australia to her destination.
preventive_action: The Class instructed the crew to use cement boxes or doubler plates to fix the issue.

deficiency_finding: There is a wash basin in the cabin.
description_overview: The annual PSC inspection is held at Hull.
immediate_causes: Installation problems and vessel's inherent vibration are to blame for the hairline crack.
root_cause_analysis: The crew owner didn't tell the master about the problem.
corrective_action: Master ordered the fitter to go to the cabin and check the pipe.
preventive_action: Additional training and familiarization was provided by master to all crew members with the content of MLC 2006 as well as company's documented procedures of DMLC PART I & II focusing in crew welfare condition.

deficiency_finding: The reagent inside the reactor is missing.
description_overview: When the last voyage was done, there was scope of improvement on the refractory built up, which was identified by the ship staff, and an item was being connected to this port.
immediate_causes: The certificates considered of Bunker CLC not available onboard were construed as non-fulfilment of specified requirement.
root_cause_analysis: When the last voyage was done, there was scope of improvement on the refractory built up, which was identified by the ship staff, and an item was being connected to this port.
corrective_action: The required material was delivered to the vessel.
preventive_action: The fleet vessels will be made aware of this finding.

deficiency_finding: There are not enough fruits to complete the provision store.
description_overview: Title3 / Regulation A 3.2.
immediate_causes: The ship crew doesn't have a concept of garbage management.
root_cause_analysis: The store was under control because the order had already been placed.
corrective_action: Immediate actions were taken by assessing the current inventory levels, specifically identifying the types and quantities of fruits in short supply.
preventive_action: To ensure compliance with requirements and maintain fresh provisions, it is important to consider potential delays, waiting times at anchorage, etc.

deficiency_finding: The no.1 mic switcher failed.
description_overview: The water was discolored and hot.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply.
root_cause_analysis: Equipment aging and out of work.
corrective_action: The captain was satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: Maintenance of equipment of VDR needs to be improved.

deficiency_finding: There is insufficient heat insulation of the exhaust manifolds.
description_overview: There was a fire on top of the funnel.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not put the insulation back after they had finished their maintenance.
corrective_action: Adequate insulation was placed on the exhaust manifolds.
preventive_action: Chief Engineer and responsible officer should always monitor the progress of any machinery's maintenance and make sure that it is back to normal as soon as possible.

deficiency_finding: The Master cannot verify the information contained in the electronic certificate, including confirmation of periodic endorsements, when necessary because the vessel is carrying digitally issued certificates by Flag Administration and R.O.
description_overview: The service confirmation for the Voyage data recorder expired.
immediate_causes: The missing authorisation letter was immediately sent to the vessel by the office.
root_cause_analysis: There is no internet access on the vessel.
corrective_action: An electronic certificates file procedure was received.
preventive_action: Since all documentation is handled by the office, it is not necessary to fit Alrayan with internet.

deficiency_finding: The oil spill boxes must be in m3 during the inspection.
description_overview: The Upper Deck E/R fire door and the purifier room door were not properly sealed at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: The tube light for illuminating the main switch board wasn't working.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance is caused by failure to follow R&R.
corrective_action: The deficiency was corrected on the spot and the boxes were marked.
preventive_action: The next Safety Committee Meeting will discuss deficiency at the end of March.

deficiency_finding: To investigate the malfunction several crew members entered the CO2 room without making a proper risk assessment, measurement of the oxygen level or an enclosed space permit.
description_overview: The inspector noted that the CO2 room blower was not operational and that the crew entered without Gas check and Risk assessment.
immediate_causes: During control testing, the navigation lights were found to be in good order.
root_cause_analysis: At the time of the inspection, there were issues with the blower.
corrective_action: A risk assessment was prepared for entering the CO2 room.
preventive_action: The entire crew received computer based training for enclosed space entry.

deficiency_finding: The current convention requires that the condition of the ship and its equipment be maintained.
description_overview: There is a manual for P and A.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The P & A manual was not amended in 2021.
corrective_action: S/I sent amendments to the vessel from the P & A manual.
preventive_action: To put on the link of COF in shipnet 1.

deficiency_finding: The auxiliary boiler has a water level indicator that is not working.
description_overview: The engine room layout and auxiliary engines are class-approved.
immediate_causes: It's difficult to find the right spare because of long term unavailability.
root_cause_analysis: The boiler water level gauge is faulty due to the faulty water level transmitter.
corrective_action: The item has been checked and approved by the PSC officers.
preventive_action: The crew will be informed about the related advice at the first safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The risk assessment and permit to work were missing from the enclosed space drill record.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts are not in place on the two manifolds found on the Bunker stations.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The officers in charge and crew are not familiar with the procedure.
corrective_action: All details of the drill were recorded on the drill records.
preventive_action: The officer in charge and crew were trained for space rescues.

deficiency_finding: The port chart was not provided when entering the port.
description_overview: BWNAS was not operating after the alarm test by the ship's crew.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The last voyage from South Africa to China (Fang Cheng) was equipped with one set ECDIS and paper charts back up, however the new edition could not be sent on board the vessel.
corrective_action: The new edition chart was delivered on the same day.
preventive_action: To ensure compliance, master will randomly check all nautical charts to make sure they are correct.

deficiency_finding: GASKET LEAK AT SEAWATER INLET FLANGE WAS OBSERVED by PCSO.
description_overview: The level of the Da dedicated seawater tank is not high enough for a ship to use the BWTS.
immediate_causes: The temperature sensor had sea water tear drops on it.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was overlooked due to its location.
corrective_action: A new gasket was installed.
preventive_action: During weekly and monthly inspection of sea water pipings and machineries, more check must be done to make sure that there are no leaks.

deficiency_finding: The deck pipes have missing U clips.
description_overview: Several gauges of A/E no. 1 were not readable.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Several U bolts have already been installed.
corrective_action: There were missing bolts on the deck pipes.
preventive_action: Share information with the fleet.

deficiency_finding: The fixed gas detection cabinet needs to be repaired prior to the cargo discharge operation.
description_overview: The fire screen for the valve is broken.
immediate_causes: There was a malfunction with the sample pump.
root_cause_analysis: The human factor is inadequate inspection and follow up.
corrective_action: Each person carried a personal gas detector along with an EEBD while entering the pump room.
preventive_action: An unsafe condition was raised in the safety management system.

deficiency_finding: There is a restriction on the amount of water that can be used on board.
description_overview: The fresh water line was not maintained.
immediate_causes: Master contacted the local agent to get permission from the port authority to carry out the drill.
root_cause_analysis: Due to long port stays at African ports, the fresh water generation by ship own was impossible, also the fresh water supplies were not available at those port, the temporarily limiting consumption fresh water measure were adopted on board to ensure crew and ship safety.
corrective_action: The master raised the request for fresh water at the port of Gijon to the local agent.
preventive_action: Master will seek fresh water from all available resources to make sure there is enough for routine use.

deficiency_finding: The EEDI Technical file is not onboard.
description_overview: Transferring information to authorities is inadequate.
immediate_causes: Though the pressure was checked weekly and before each arrival, there was a lower pressure than required at the time of the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The instructions manual boxes are labeled in a way that leads to confusion.
corrective_action: Place the EEDI Technical file back in the correct box.
preventive_action: 3.Conduct regular audits or spot checks of document storage areas to ensure compliance

deficiency_finding: The deck rest hour log shows Master & Chief Officer duty and rest hours from February 1 to today.
description_overview: There are lights at the emergency station panel for the A/C room to not work.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow procedure due to oversight.
corrective_action: Work/rest hours records have been updated.
preventive_action: Every day the rest hours records will be updated.

deficiency_finding: Oil pollution discharge reported by the vessel and there are apparent oil substance remaining onboard and the hull of the vessel are suspected of being a discharge violation.
description_overview: Oil pollution discharge reported by the vessel and there are apparent oil substance remaining onboard and the hull of the vessel are suspected of being a discharge violation.
immediate_causes: There was an oil spill on the deck.
root_cause_analysis: Crew failed to follow instructions from senior officers.
corrective_action: Emergency clean up operation on deck followed by reporting to office and concerned authorities.
preventive_action: It is necessary to conduct cross checks during internal oil transfer.

deficiency_finding: BWTS is malfunctioning due to a malfunction of the rectifier.
description_overview: During her passage to the US Gulf on October 30th, 2022, the BWTS was not operational due to defects in the PCB.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Repairs of the BWTS system will be carried out by a service engineer.
preventive_action: During the BWTS operation, current fluctuations will be monitored diligently at the CCR panel.

deficiency_finding: Only one NOX technical file for auxiliary engines was found on the board.
description_overview: The NOX technical file of auxiliary engines was not found by the Master and Chief Engineer during the PSCO inspection.
immediate_causes: Poor order.
root_cause_analysis: The officers don't know where to find the Technical files.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer's cabin contains three technical files, one for each auxiliary engine, along with other documentation and booklets.
preventive_action: Monthly Alert bulletin will be used to circulate the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: The standard specifics for shipboard incinerators developed by the organization will be considered by the Administration.
description_overview: The rate of discharge from the holding tank approved by the Administration is not available.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The location of the bricks under the steel could affect the condition of the bricks inside the incinerator.
corrective_action: The captain's maintenance report shows that the job has been completed.
preventive_action: The crew must be briefed on the new circular by a safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence of the meeting of the ship safety committee.
description_overview: The voyage safety plan checklist was not signed by the master and chief officer.
immediate_causes: The rest hours were not filled by the crew.
root_cause_analysis: The safety committee meeting that was requested by the PSC office was delayed because of previous problems.
corrective_action: As per instructions from the PSC, the regular safety committee meeting and training will be held on February 19th.
preventive_action: The case is closed because of follow up/closing out of corrective and preventive actions.

deficiency_finding: All emergency stops were found on the deck and not ready for use.
description_overview: Managers noted deficiency.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Equipment was protected against bad weather, but it wasn't ready to use until after the election.
corrective_action: There was a meeting about the importance of emergency stop buttons for cargo and ships.
preventive_action: Emergency Stops should be included in the Boxer operation.

deficiency_finding: The safety net was broken.
description_overview: When the engine was stopped, the Rpm indicator was stuck on 35rpm and did not come back to zero.
immediate_causes: The gangway net was damaged when the crew tried to shift the gangway to allow the crane's movement and adjust the height of the gangway for the tidal change during the port stay.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not have situational awareness while handling the gangway net.
corrective_action: The crew was able to repair the net to the satisfaction of the PSCO.
preventive_action: The Master has conducted a detailed training session with the onboard crew considering the findings of the inspection with the focus on:

deficiency_finding: There are steel pipes in the Engine room 2nd deck.
description_overview: A voyage or passage plan.
immediate_causes: After a change of management failure to check the tanks in the certificate section 3.1 is what happened.
root_cause_analysis: Steel pipes are secured to avoid shifting during rolling, but this time they were not secured back by rope after pulling out some materials.
corrective_action: The pieps were secured by rope and confirmed by PSC officers before they disembarked.
preventive_action: The securing condition of objects is included in the Internal Audit Cehcklist.

deficiency_finding: There is a leak in the Main engine cylinder head area.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

preventive_action: Master should strengthen supervision and inspection on board in order to avoid similar defects.

deficiency_finding: Maintenance and inspection.

root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The rescue boat was lowered into the water after it swung on the accumulator power.
preventive_action: The davit-launched life rafts are swung for the rescue boat when required and stowed at the position over the life raft as per the procedures.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has various sounding pipes.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance and supervision.
corrective_action: The crew immediately tightened the pedal which operates the self-closing cock head.

deficiency_finding: There isn't a damage control booklet onboard.
description_overview: There is a damage control booklet that needs to be repaired in 14 days.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Damage Control Booklet on the vessel was not found to comply with the requirements of the IMO.
corrective_action: The Master reported the deficiency to the Technical manager through email.
preventive_action: The Master is to make sure that the ship's plans and documentations are in compliance with the requirements.

deficiency_finding: The transfer of oily water from the bilges to the tank was not recorded on ORB.
description_overview: The Oil Record book states that the spill from the #2 HSFO (S) tank was verified by the CCS.
immediate_causes: There was a small amount of water at the entrance of the pipe duct during the PSC inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The master and C/E did not fully explain the PSCO's query about the related recording in the ORB.
corrective_action: In order to avoid the same mistakes in the future, the chief engineer should learn "Regulation 17 of Chapter 3 of MARPOL ANNEX I" immediately.
preventive_action: Carry out self- inspection of oil record book before signature and weekly to strengthen the supervision of crew.

deficiency_finding: The headline is not connected to the rescue boat.
description_overview: Rescue boat davit slewing is slow.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: The line was kept aside in the boat because of the lack of familiarity with the requirements.
corrective_action: The officer was told to connect the headline back to the rescue boat.
preventive_action: Make sure the headline is connected to the rescue boat.

deficiency_finding: The fire flaps on the funnel are malfunctioning.
description_overview: The emergency light outside the funnel was unlit when PSCO checked the lighting system.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: The fire flaps had been tested and found to be malfunctioning.
corrective_action: The issue was identified and fixed in the presence of the inspector.
preventive_action: The planned maintenance system includes regular testing of the fire flaps to make sure they are ready for use.

deficiency_finding: Port/S F.W is not under SECURITY CONTROL.
description_overview: The fresh water feeling line was not kept under the lock and key arrangement.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The freshwater filling line was padlocked.
preventive_action: The management team discussed the requirements with the fleet alert.

deficiency_finding: The person who is responsible for the maintenance of LSA equipment is not on the muster list.
description_overview: The water system alarm is off permanently.
immediate_causes: Liaise with the company to get the fire-maintenance program for the fire doors.
root_cause_analysis: The responsible for the maintenance of the LSA and FFE should be placed in the rank of master.
corrective_action: Renark will be discussed in the next safety meeting.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Steering gear room intermediate inlet ducting was found to be corroded and wasted.
description_overview: There are numerous pipe support on the main deck that are cracked and Wasted.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Steering gear dust was repaired.
preventive_action: The Deck, Engine Room, and Steering gear room have been added to the safety officer's inspection list.

deficiency_finding: There are 6 rusty old drums with oil on the main deck.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: There were no identified dangers from dirt accumulate.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of awareness is the underlying cause.
corrective_action: There are oil drums inside the store.
preventive_action: Fleet Alert prepared and distributed among all fleet vessels highlighting the issue and instructed vessels to carry out the checks to make sure there isn't a deficiency onboard.

deficiency_finding: The cargo tanks should be protected by a fixed inert gas system in accordance with the requirements of the fire safety systems code.
description_overview: This fix gas detection system serves to detect atmosphere in ballast tanks, void spaces, steering gear, and IGG room.
immediate_causes: As per their advice, interim repairs were carried out pending renewal of the entire combustion chamber.
root_cause_analysis: Since the repairs were carried out by the equipment manufacturer's approved workshop, class notification for the repairs was not required.
corrective_action: The repairs were carried out according to the approved procedures from the equipment manufacturer.
preventive_action: The lesson learnt from the inspection has been shared with the fleet.

deficiency_finding: Three crew members are not available on-board.
description_overview: The chief engineer and 3rd engineer joined VESSEL at the same time, but they didn't get their email addresses in time.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with flag rules.
root_cause_analysis: The Attestation Letter from Flag was presented to the PSC Officer due to insufficient time.
corrective_action: Original documents must be sent to the vessel on the next port in Pusan by 11/10/2018.
preventive_action: There is an isolated case where Ship Management has no control.

deficiency_finding: The Garbage record book hasn't been signed by the master.
description_overview: BWM appendix II does not include the records of ballast.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer missed to sign the entries in the Garbage Record Book.
corrective_action: The Master and Chief Officer are about to sign the Garbage record book.
preventive_action: All entries in the Garbage Record book and log books have to be signed by the master.

deficiency_finding: The upper and lower platforms are not marked as per regulation.
description_overview: The upper and lower platforms are not marked as per regulation.
immediate_causes: The deck crew forgot to mark on the upper and lower platform of the gangway after applying paint as routine maintenance, which was overlooked by deck officers due to lack of gangway access safety and situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: There is lack of planning and compliance on proper marking of gangway.
corrective_action: The upper and lower platforms were marked and Master instructed CO to check after maintenance.
preventive_action: Crew members are to be motivated and trained on the requirement of maintaining proper marking on both upper and lower platform of accommodation gangway during pre-joining training.

deficiency_finding: The latest edition of the manual is missing.
description_overview: Master instructed to make sure original Malta endorsement is onboard at the earliest opportunity.
immediate_causes: The apron and PPE were not located in the paint locker.
root_cause_analysis: Logistical problems.
corrective_action: The corrective action was completed and the publication arrived in Poland on time.
preventive_action: The other vessels in the fleet have been made aware of this observation and it has been verified.

deficiency_finding: FORM 2 and 3 are missing from the CSR document.
description_overview: At the time of inspection, 5 out of 6 anodes in wing ballast tank #2 PS were not attached to their brackets, but left laying on top of the hull longitudinal girder.
immediate_causes: The Master signed and stamped the CSRs in front of the PSC Officer.
root_cause_analysis: The company filing system did not clearly state that amendment forms need to be attached to CSR.
corrective_action: Master should be familiar with the manual.
preventive_action: There is a validity list of certificates reviewed and amended.

deficiency_finding: Two red lights are not lighting up.
description_overview: Arcs of visibility are not for NUC lights.
immediate_causes: After the Bunkering operation, failed and forgot to record on time.
root_cause_analysis: While drifting off Japan coast, the crew checked the lights and they were in good working order.
corrective_action: Crew immediately replaced the busted light bulbs with new spare bulbs onboard.
preventive_action: If the lights are in good working condition, they will be checked.

deficiency_finding: The watchman left the gangway due to his escort.
description_overview: The watchman left the gangway due to his escort.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The watchman should not leave the gangway.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The port chart was not provided when entering the port.
description_overview: BWNAS was not operating after the alarm test by the ship's crew.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The last voyage from South Africa to China (Fang Cheng) was equipped with one set ECDIS and paper charts back up, however the new edition could not be sent on board the vessel.
corrective_action: The new edition chart was delivered on the same day.
preventive_action: To ensure compliance, master will randomly check all nautical charts to make sure they are correct.

deficiency_finding: The Voyage data recorder is a flawed item.
description_overview: VDR malfunctioning due internal battery expiry date and according service report fail to pass the black-out test, new battery for VDR are intended to be installed at next dry dock at Yalova, Turkey according class/flag condition.
immediate_causes: It is possible to be exposed to adverse weather condition.
root_cause_analysis: Manufacturing equipment parts are faulty.
corrective_action: The battery was connected to the vessel on July 6th, 2023, please refer to attached delivery receipt.
preventive_action: In one of the cases where battery was requested well in time, but it was not in production from the maker, the ship manager told senior management to raise the request in advance.

deficiency_finding: The GMDSS battery room and Oxygen room do not have closing arrangements contrary to the fire safety plan.
description_overview: Garbage bin covers are missing from the galley.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure and instructions is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: Basic/Root Cause- Personal Factors 5: Lack of knowledge Basic/Root Cause- Job Factors 15: Insufficient product / service design
corrective_action: A new closing arrangement has been installed.
preventive_action: As per the Fire Fighting Plan, all natural ventilation closing arrangements should be checked.

deficiency_finding: There are resources and personnel.
description_overview: There are preventive deficiencies code numbers.
immediate_causes: Substandard Act by External Party.
root_cause_analysis: Transferring information to authorities is inadequate.
corrective_action: PSCO agreed before departure.
preventive_action: An external ISM audit was performed to make sure the deficiencies were fixed.

deficiency_finding: The sewage treatment plant has an expired date.
description_overview: Failure to follow instructions.
immediate_causes: To ensure that the system is operational, a through inspection of the plant was conducted to identify the cause of the malfunction.
root_cause_analysis: The requirement of the product from the maker is not followed.
corrective_action: The new product should have a valid shelf life.
preventive_action: Record the condition of the product in the inspection book.

deficiency_finding: There is a document that shows the financial status of the company.
description_overview: There is a certificate of financial security for repatriation.
immediate_causes: While taking over, the master didn't check the certificate at the mess rooms.
root_cause_analysis: The notice fell off and wasn't replaced in time.
corrective_action: While the e-copy was given to each crew, the notice was posted back.
preventive_action: Each crew was given an e copy of the safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The provision rooms are dirty.
description_overview: The magnetic compass is out of order.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: The insufficient housekeeping is to blame.
corrective_action: The provision rooms were cleaned.
preventive_action: The instructions have been given to the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The second means of access to the emergency fire pump is secured on the inside.
description_overview: The second means of access to the emergency fire pump is secured on the inside.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the C/E failure to ensure that the A-Class doors between E/R and S/G room are closed is human error.
corrective_action: 17/10 code was issued by PSCO because the issue was resolved on the spot.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company took the following measures.

deficiency_finding: B.W.R.B is not in compliance with BWM.
description_overview: Seafarers' extension contracts are not signed by the owner's managers.
immediate_causes: Master asked for clarification from the office.
root_cause_analysis: The form in use was not the one approved by BWMP.
corrective_action: The form used by the Master was not the correct one presented to the PSC.
preventive_action: The form used by the Master was not the correct one presented to the PSC.

deficiency_finding: There is no support provided for the coaming height of the ventilator.
description_overview: There is no support provided for the coaming height of the ventilator.
immediate_causes: The location of the fan has not changed since the design stage was accepted by both the class and the flag.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient verification during the surveys.
corrective_action: The required 4 pieces of brackets fabrication were completed as per load-line convention requirements and the same was verified by the attending class surveyor and found satisfactory.
preventive_action: Master carried out a training session with all ship staff to ensure that area audit checks are strengthened to ensure that items are tracked carefully.

deficiency_finding: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: Rules, regulations or procedures are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: Crew member missed to fill work rest hours for all the calls during night time.
corrective_action: Training done, Master to brief all crew members on how to fill their rest hours.
preventive_action: This deficiency is to be shared across all fleet vessels to ensure that proper record keeping of work rest hours is maintained onboard.

deficiency_finding: The application receipt of the flag endorsement of 3rd mate expired on April 10th.
description_overview: The engineer didn't know about the test of M/E L.O stand-by pump change-over in case of low pressure.
immediate_causes: Incorrect equipment handling and operating.
root_cause_analysis: The flag endorsement has been issued and forwarded, but no further corrective action has been done.
corrective_action: As the full crew certification was onboard, the deficiency was initially not understood.
preventive_action: The availability and validity of the new joiners certificates are checked by the Master through S-29 report which is submitted to office.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has missing means of escae markings.
description_overview: A portable gas detector.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There wasn't enough marking in the engine room.
corrective_action: The escape route was painted but not enough.
preventive_action: Company staff will check when they visit a vessel.

deficiency_finding: There is a copy of a certificate for financial security posted.
description_overview: Post a new certificate of insurance or other financial security after removing an outdated one.
immediate_causes: While taking over, the master didn't check the certificate at the mess rooms.
root_cause_analysis: The Master was negligent for not updating the required postings of the latest MLC certificate.
corrective_action: The QHSE department advised the Master to make sure the latest vessel certificates are up to date.
preventive_action: Code 10 was signed by the PSC.

deficiency_finding: There are motor protective guards that are rotating.
description_overview: There are dangerous areas with several pumps without protective cover.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The pumps have a design.
corrective_action: punched metal around open rotating parts of several pumps in E/R
preventive_action: If necessary, the company will take further action.

deficiency_finding: There is a hole in the side main engine cooling water pipe.
description_overview: The main sea water pump discharge pipe is leaking.
immediate_causes: Failure to operate the boiler safety valve manual operation using the pull wire and identify the temporary repairs carried out on the wire by the previous management is a non compliance with procedures, permits, PMS or safe working practices.
root_cause_analysis: Class was notified of the defect along with remaining defect identified in the PSC inspection.
corrective_action: The entire length of the cooling water piping system was checked and found to be in good condition.
preventive_action: The staff on board prior to their next assignment will be required to highlight any concerns promptly in order to avoid a similar issue.

deficiency_finding: A gyro compass is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The compass developed an error of more than 4 degrees.
immediate_causes: There has been a sudden failure of communication equipment/switch which burn on date of inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There were four Line-throwing appliances that expired in November.
description_overview: The starboard side load line is not clear.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: All Life Saving Appliances, including bridge rocket parachute flares, which must be kept in a good condition and in line with SOLAS and Class requirements, must be inspected weekly and monthly.
corrective_action: The new line-throwing appliances were received before the vessel left.
preventive_action: During the next Safety Meeting, where the proper procedures to be followed will be highlighted, the observation will be discussed.

deficiency_finding: The vegetable room had provisions on the floor at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: Human physical constraints are caused by error.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not return the removed provisions back to rack.
corrective_action: A sack of provision was removed from the floor and placed on a rack.
preventive_action: Provisions to always be stored on the rack were included in training for the galley staff.

deficiency_finding: The master was able to show the printed version of the electronic certificates.
description_overview: There are valid certificates that are not readily available on board for examination.
immediate_causes: After the inspection, a telecom was conducted with the Master, but he did not present the available certificate from the ship management software.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to demonstrate is a technical glitch.
corrective_action: The certificates can be downloaded and presented whenever required.
preventive_action: In order to prevent this occurrence, this observation will be shared with all the fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The quick closing valve of the HFO service tank failed to close from the fire control station.
description_overview: The international shore connection is a universal hose connection that is to be provided on all ships.
immediate_causes: An arrangement was made to fix the emergency fire pump.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency is servicing and routine inspection issue.
corrective_action: Blow off the air supply many times until the rust comes out.
preventive_action: The Safety Officer and Chief Engineer were reminded to pay attention to all the FFE and LSA equipment on board.

deficiency_finding: The BWM-plan can be requested for D-1 operations, but not for D-2 operations.
description_overview: SOPEP is not compliant with MARPOL Annex I Regulation 37.
immediate_causes: Human factors include non-compliance with procedures, permits, or safe working practices.
root_cause_analysis: The BWMP was available on the vessel and was approved by the Class.
corrective_action: The D-1 standard BWMP was removed from the ship and the D-2 standard was approved by the Class.
preventive_action: The Master and Chief officer were briefed about the decision.

deficiency_finding: The SART battery expired.
description_overview: The battery of the SART was showing an end of life date at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Lack of situational awareness and inadequate monitoring and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: The new SART batteries were not ordered in time.
corrective_action: After trying out the new batteries, they were installed in the Next Port of call Singapore.
preventive_action: The monthly navigation and communication equipment status report will be exchanged with the company.

deficiency_finding: The antenna warning poster is missing.
description_overview: Due to the accumulated ice above food, the cold room/ meet room did not thaw out.
immediate_causes: There is oversight.
root_cause_analysis: Unfortunately, one of the signs that had been removed for renewal was the high voltage warning sign.
corrective_action: In response to the incident, the vessel's Master held a meeting with all officers to emphasize the importance of proper job planning.
preventive_action: It will be a point of discussion during company-run seminars and in-house pre-joining meetings to reinforce the importance of proper task completion and verification.

deficiency_finding: The lights are used without protection.
description_overview: The lights are used without protection.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Some Cargo Lights have protection covers that aren't properly maintained.
corrective_action: The crew repaired cargo lights.
preventive_action: The case information of PSC deficiencies for all company ships is rounded.

deficiency_finding: All life buoy lifelines were not non-kinking.
description_overview: SOPEP is not compliant with MARPOL Annex I Regulation 37.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were offered.
root_cause_analysis: This was a matter of inadequate follow-up, since these were not compliant as per LSA regulation III/7.1.2.
corrective_action: In order to raise awareness, a Safety Committee Meeting was performed.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness, a Safety Committee Meeting was performed.

deficiency_finding: The two independent means of position fixing are not used during pilotage.
description_overview: The rope was soaked in paint and found on the starboard side.
immediate_causes: Crew carelessness or improper record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: Although the deck officers have made a passage plan from anchorage to berth, during navigation the vessel had to alter slightly the planned course due to several fishing boats on the original course and did not proceed with relevant revision / update to the passage plan.
corrective_action: The Master along with the deck officers corrected the passage plan.
preventive_action: The Master and the Port Captain had a discussion about the captioned matter and preventive actions were taken.

deficiency_finding: Large amount of plastic garbage was found in drums and the store at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: Vegetables in the freezer room were rotten.
immediate_causes: Garbage management plan and mandatory regulations were not complied with by the crew.
root_cause_analysis: Garbage from received stores and provisions was mishandled.
corrective_action: The garbage was taken to the shore facility.
preventive_action: Garbage Management Plan for properly disposal of garbage was delivered to crew.

deficiency_finding: SEVERAL CARGOS ACCESS HATCHES ARE IN POOR CONDITION, THEY NEED TO BE REPLACED/ADJUSTED.
description_overview: The crew reported that the echo sounder sensor was broken.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: There was no safe access to the deck due to the weather conditions.
corrective_action: Maintenance of the manhole covers is done by fixing them and opening them.
preventive_action: To be followed, the company must be followed by the ship's management level office.

deficiency_finding: There are various Pressure gauges in the engine room that are not working.
description_overview: One pressure gauge in the engine room was out of range due to inadequate maintenance.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: The pressure gauge should be replaced immediately.
preventive_action: Training was given to crew for implementation of the new system.

deficiency_finding: Schedules for watchkeeping in the engine room are not posted.
description_overview: The port side wharf is between No. 4 and 5 Cargo Harbor.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: Immediate root cause possible.
corrective_action: The schedule for watchkeeping was posted in a public place.
preventive_action: The Company will communicate the raised deficiency to All Fleet vessels so as the responsible for the task shipboard management personnel to become aware of what had happened.

deficiency_finding: OS V.A.T is in charge of launching PS liferaft but doesn't have a certificate of competence on survival craft and rescue boat.
description_overview: There is no copy of the certificate of safety training in the documents.
immediate_causes: The Manning agent was sent an original copy of the training.
root_cause_analysis: OS V.A.T has a certificate of proficientness on survival craft and rescue boat.
corrective_action: The deficiency was demonstrated to the PSC officer during the inspection.
preventive_action: All the deficiencies imposed during external/ internal inspections root cause analysis and corrective actions taken are Circulated fleet-wise, in order to be discussed during the next monthly Safety Committee Meeting for better knowledge and in order to prevent recurrence.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, toilets and showers had no running water.
description_overview: There are two showers and an eyewash on the vessel.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer was aware of the issue after the previous night's maintenance in one of the showers.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer opened the valve and discovered that there was running water for the common toilets and showers.
preventive_action: In order to avoid the same in the future, the engine crew was instructed.

deficiency_finding: Evidence of ISM failure or lack of effectiveness implementation is related to emergency preparedness.
description_overview: There is a failure or lack of effectiveness in the implementation of the ISM code.
immediate_causes: The acts are substandard.
root_cause_analysis: The company dictated the failure of proper ISM implementation.
corrective_action: Compliance with ISM Requirements should not exceed 3 months from the date of the PSC inspection, as an additional Ism Audit will be carried out.
preventive_action: Master discussed deficiency with all members of the crew in Safety Committee Minutes on board.

deficiency_finding: LSA retro-reflective tape is not required.
description_overview: Provision and disposition of life saving appliances are included.
immediate_causes: The inspection was inadequate.
root_cause_analysis: The Safety Officer failed to identify the deficiency at an earlier stage due to the bad weather during the Pacific Ocean crossing.
corrective_action: The rescue boats condition was pointed out by the PSC officers.
preventive_action: He emphasized that retro reflective tapes need to be in very good condition and that they should not be considered acceptable in similar cases.

deficiency_finding: There are drills for space entry and rescue.
description_overview: At the time of inspection, familiarisation is not required.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The training session was held with all crew members present.
preventive_action: A fleet alert was sent to all ships.

deficiency_finding: The meat has been put back in the freezer.
description_overview: Charterers arranged to supply LSFO 120 MT in PM on the same day that Ocean Venus accepted the renewal audit.
immediate_causes: Instructions to the vessel were given to the company.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision by superiors resulted in the lack of awareness of CCK.
corrective_action: To not be frozen again once unfrozen, CCK was instructed.
preventive_action: The procedures from the safety manual were advised by CCK.

deficiency_finding: Only one working novel can be found in the Beck log book.
description_overview: There was a small leak from the shower at the front of the building.
immediate_causes: The English version operation procedure was not created due to the first work with Bangladesh crew.
root_cause_analysis: The crew used two languages, Chinese and English, but the 2nd officer didn't understand the rules.
corrective_action: The Chinese language should be deleted from the front page of the logbook and all records should be in English.
preventive_action: In the event of a wrong entry being made, the captain should inspect the front page of the logbook and fill in the correct language.

deficiency_finding: There was a station roller at the mooring station.
description_overview: Including pipe and valves.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: It was easy to turn and move the frozen rollers.
preventive_action: The crew was briefed on all the deficiencies with the help of the Fleet Supremo and Internal Auditor.

deficiency_finding: The heat insulation on E/G, T/C was not completely covered.
description_overview: There is a corridor short of a handrail at the 'A' deck of accommodation space.
immediate_causes: The Guard/Barrier is inadequate.
root_cause_analysis: The insulation installed by the manufacturers is short on the bottom.
corrective_action: The insulation was added to the bottom part.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer was told to check if similar machines still exist on other types of machinery.

deficiency_finding: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer had already identified the condition of the cargo hold's entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 and the maintenance job was postponed after departure from the port of Rotterdam.
corrective_action: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 have been adjusted and maintained.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was reminded of the importance of scheduling maintenance work at an earlier stage.

deficiency_finding: The gangway net is damaged.
description_overview: All the vessels need to have a certain number of mandatory, hazard, safety, fire, direction and prohibitory signs.
immediate_causes: The old gingham net was replaced with a new one.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of compliance, inadequate maintenance, and insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: NET REPLACED.
preventive_action: There is an issue to be included in the next committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: Other is listed in the Annex V.
description_overview: Food waster was found in the lobby room of the freezer.
immediate_causes: There was no consideration of safe passage on board.
root_cause_analysis: The freezer's lobby room/chamber is where the vessel is kept separate from the rest of the freezer due to the fact that disposal of food waste is not allowed.
corrective_action: Food waste is transferred to the garbage locker room and put in a drum.
preventive_action: Excess food waste must be stored in garbage central storage and properly sealed and secured inside food waste drums.

deficiency_finding: Maintenance of ship structure access is not done as per the ship structure access manual.
description_overview: The ship structure access manual is missing.
immediate_causes: The Master didn't understand the document request.
root_cause_analysis: The instructions were not clear.
corrective_action: The crew is trained for maintenance and records.
preventive_action: Education, Engineering, Enforcement, Examples, Environment.

deficiency_finding: The convention requires that the principal ballast water management method used on the ship be used.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The certificate was replaced in the folder with the correct one.
preventive_action: As soon as a certificate is received, the file will be updated.

deficiency_finding: Not available is the record of employment.
description_overview: Seafarers' extension contracts are not signed by the owner's managers.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with industry rules.
root_cause_analysis: Seafarers contract extensions were in place for all crew, but they couldn't be processed at POEA since the vessel's manning had been handed over to new management.
corrective_action: The contracts don't like manning the department.
preventive_action: All staff are told to carry Signed contracts at the beginning of their contracts.

deficiency_finding: There is an oil record book.
description_overview: Multiple tanks entered as single entries.
immediate_causes: Sampling was stopped after the last pump out.
root_cause_analysis: Engine staff misinterpretation of rules and requirements.
corrective_action: From now on, record book entries must be set as required.
preventive_action: There is a safety meeting and additional training for crew.

deficiency_finding: LSA locker A on deck B had restricted access due to equipment being stowed in the locker preventing the items from being easy to use.
description_overview: The eye wash kit was not returned after the paint room was cleaned last week.
immediate_causes: There is a lifeboat seat that fell due to rough weather.
root_cause_analysis: Some of the spare boxes were kept on the floor because of the rough weather in the North Atlantic Ocean.
corrective_action: All loose equipment was secured to prevent further movement.
preventive_action: After any heavy weather, the lockers should be checked and the additional gear moved to an alternate room with proper rack arrangement.

deficiency_finding: The delivery note was not recorded in the oil record book.
description_overview: Charterers arranged to supply LSFO 120 MT in PM on the same day that Ocean Venus accepted the renewal audit.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of familiarity with related ORB and procedures.
root_cause_analysis: C/E paid insufficient attention to checking/reviewing the correct entry into ORB Part I on weekly basis and did not adopt good practice on making entry of oil operation into the Oil Record Book Part I in timely manner.
corrective_action: The entry was made into the Oil Record Book Part I after the PSCO pointed out.
preventive_action: This case should be brought to the attention of the fleet so that Masters can scrutinize and train operation officers within a week.

deficiency_finding: The metal cover of No.1 WBT (S) was not fixed by 8 nuts.
description_overview: The metal cover of No.1 WBT (S) was not fixed by 8 nuts.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
