root_cause_analysis: As the Inspection was not complete, only 8 nuts were fitted back in place.
corrective_action: The missing nuts were shipped back in place prior to the Inspector disembarking.
preventive_action: Department heads were told to avoid short cuts which could compromise the safety of the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The poop deck of the Fair Lead Roller PS is stuck.
description_overview: Protection machines and parts.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The ship personnel failed to implement the relevant requirements during the self-inspection.
corrective_action: After greasing the fair lead and testing it, the corrective action was reported to the PSCO and reached to them satisfactory on the spot and code 10 issued.
preventive_action: The health protection, medical care, welfare and social security protection are included in company SMS.

deficiency_finding: There was nothing visible from the Engine Room side.
description_overview: The log book is not verified by the master.
immediate_causes: The ship's hull has a'scratch' measuring approximately 3mm deep and 700mm long, which was confirmed by an inspection from inside the engine room.
root_cause_analysis: There is no sign of welding or hot work on the inside of the ship, which is why the PSC Officer referred to the visible sign of corrosion as a "burn mark".
corrective_action: The inspector was adamant that the matter be reported to Class, despite a photograph showing that there was no evidence of a previous repair or welding mark.
preventive_action: The photographs show that only a cosmetic upgrade is required, which has already been completed.

deficiency_finding: The alarm panel was kept off.
description_overview: The two Ventilators had to be provided with additional supports.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The crew turned off the water alarm panel to prevent an electric short, but PIC forgot to turn on the water alarm system.
corrective_action: The crew turned on the water ingress alarm system.
preventive_action: The master conducted education to the crew about the check list.

deficiency_finding: Emergency shutdown valves in liquid piping should close after 30s of activation.
description_overview: There was a small leak from the union during the test and it took 30 seconds for the valve to shut down.
immediate_causes: Improper maintenance is one of the ImMEDIATE CAUSES.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient verification by the ship staff after repairs were completed.
corrective_action: The valves were tried out and no leak was observed.
preventive_action: The senior management of the vessel was briefed by the superintendent of the vessel to make sure that the emergency shutdown system and associated fitting/pipelines are checked at regular intervals.

deficiency_finding: The Chief Engineer is not familiar with the operation of the Sewage Treatment System.
description_overview: As part of pre-arrival checks, the Inert Gas System was tried out and all parameters were checked and the system was found to be working well.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer misinterpreted the inspector's question as to where to store sewage in case of failure.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer was briefed on the proper operation of the sewage system.
preventive_action: A thorough familiarization of the vessel's sewage system operation and arrangement was carried out in conjunction with Marpol regulations with crew.

deficiency_finding: There is no indication for open/close position in all air ventilation mushroom types.
description_overview: The officer on watch was limited to taking the compass bearing from the conning position.
immediate_causes: The broken bulbs of indicator lights on the ship's Electrician were replaced immediately by the PSCO who was present on the scene.
root_cause_analysis: It was determined that the flaps of most of the ventilations were not working after the ship's delivery.
corrective_action: The flap is being repaired.
preventive_action: Maintenance and checks on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: The signalling lamp battery was found discarded.
description_overview: The battery charge was off at the test.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given and the deficiency was fixed on-site during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The battery for the lamp was charged according to the schedule, but it wasn't getting power.
corrective_action: The power from the battery was restored to the outer port after the terminal was connected.
preventive_action: The Master held a Safety Meeting where all findings were discussed.

deficiency_finding: Secondary means of starting malfunctioning.
description_overview: The Emergency Generator failed to start during a 'black out simulation test', which resulted in the vessel being held.
immediate_causes: HFO Settling insulation tank lagging is broken.
root_cause_analysis: There was a partial power failure that prevented the generator from starting.
corrective_action: The following actions were immediately taken.
preventive_action: Long-term and preventive measures have been put in place to prevent similar incidents in the future.

deficiency_finding: There is a multi gas detector not on board.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: This port or next port will be supplied with a portable gas meter with built in pump.
root_cause_analysis: Equipment could not be supplied onboard due to the vessel's drifting.
corrective_action: The portable gas detector was received at the port.
preventive_action: The finding will be shared with all vessels to make them aware of it.

deficiency_finding: There were several doors that weren't properly closing.
description_overview: The starboard side freeboard marks, forward and middle draft marks, and Plimsoll mark are not fully painted.
immediate_causes: The equipment is defective.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: The dogs were adjusted and lubricated.
preventive_action: The crew was briefed on all the deficiencies with the help of the Fleet Supremo and Internal Auditor.

deficiency_finding: Fire safety is not the only thing.
description_overview: There was a mixture of water and oil in the first 10m of the tunnel.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The water was caused by a large difference in temperature between the hull and engine room.
corrective_action: The area was properly cleaned after the water was removed.
preventive_action: Carry out the inspection of the pipes tunnel on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: There isn't an emergency light for the free fall launch area.
description_overview: There are adequate guidelines incorporated in the safety manual and the abandoned ship drills.
immediate_causes: Bulk carrier was stated in the ship's classification certificate, along with other cargo ships.
root_cause_analysis: Installation wasn't done on the ship's design and drawing.
corrective_action: The emergency light was installed on the poop handrail.
preventive_action: Master and Chief Officer will supervise the duty persons.

deficiency_finding: The Master is instructed to notify class and arrange for their recording or agreement to repair for the damage not later than January 9, 2023.
description_overview: The QHSE team will be notified if the risk rating is high.
immediate_causes: The electrician was asked to fix the lights.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of this incident is the crew's inability to follow Company's procedures, proper reporting, coordination of task on hand and lack of proper inspection.
corrective_action: In the meantime, the condition will be monitored and will be in close contact with classification society.
preventive_action: Since it is a case that should have been communicated to the company, it was communicated to the crew.

deficiency_finding: The SO2/CO2 ratio is incorrect due to missing calibration gas.
description_overview: According to the flag state approved action plan, to be repaired.
immediate_causes: The muster list was updated.
root_cause_analysis: Calibration gas is difficult to dispatch by parcel because it is dangerous.
corrective_action: In order to secure integrity condition of EGCS, Ship's hand carried out of following process ; i) Gas sampling probe filter on funnel side has duly applied maintenance as replaced filter and cleaning/penetrating of pipe line
preventive_action: The C/E educated officer is in charge of the shipboard maintenance procedure.

deficiency_finding: One of the gas detectors is out of order.
description_overview: According to the flag state approved action plan, to be repaired.
immediate_causes: There are mechanical defects.
root_cause_analysis: One gas detector's probe was disabled.
corrective_action: The gas detector should be replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: The Manufacture's manual can be used to improve the maintenance of the gas detectors.

deficiency_finding: The main fire line isolation valve was not closing at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The stanchions for securing cargo on the main deck are in bad shape.
immediate_causes: The excessive paint of the valve needs to be identified.
root_cause_analysis: The maintenance plan for the vessel is going forward with the cooperation of the crew and the Technical Department.
corrective_action: The paint was removed, the valve's cover was opened, grease was applied and the deficiency was marked on the report.
preventive_action: The shaft of the valves must remain clean and un-painted if maintenance is to be done.

deficiency_finding: The Gangway is unsafe.
description_overview: The deficiency was recorded and closed at FORM B.
immediate_causes: The limit switch was stuck by frozen grease when the Rescue Boat was tested in the monthly drill.
root_cause_analysis: There is inadequate control and supervision.
corrective_action: The means of embarkation which are provided on board meet all applicable international standards and conform with regulation II-1/3-9 of the 1974 SOLAS Convention.
preventive_action: A copy of "Guidelines for Construction, Installation, Maintenance and Inspection/Survey of Means of Embarkation and Disembarkation" which highlights ship's gangway safety, testing, maintenance and inspection is provided by the company.

deficiency_finding: There is a galley cooktop exhaust that accumulates oil.
description_overview: The floor plate of the Purifier room No.2 was found to have oil on it.
immediate_causes: The fuel injection pump drain was found in place at the time of the last inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There are four things that are not to comply with fire safety requirement.
corrective_action: The crew was arranged to clean the exhaust trunking.
preventive_action: The master should strengthen recheck and supervision of safety equipment.

deficiency_finding: The ISM Code requires the company and the ship to comply with certain requirements.
description_overview: The crew couldn't say anything to the inspector because there weren't any valves on the diagram.
immediate_causes: Clarifications and instructions were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Crew members were unaware that the life jackets were to be worn in conjunction with the immersion suits.
corrective_action: The installation of the Hydrostatic release unit for the life raft was instructed and corrected immediately.
preventive_action: It is the same as above no.1.

deficiency_finding: There is time and space for closed space exploration and rescue.
description_overview: Insufficient maintenance.
immediate_causes: The space drill report was immediately corrected.
root_cause_analysis: There is inadequate monitoring of personal facts.
corrective_action: Training was given to personnel towards effective recordkeeping.
preventive_action: Sharing of deficiency is a way to prevent re-occurrence.

deficiency_finding: The crew is working during the night.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: Rules, regulations or procedures are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: There is no supervision of engine ratings in the port.
corrective_action: Keeping/working schedule in port is monitored by change engineers.
preventive_action: All crew information is easily accessible from the amended table of shipboard working arrangement.

deficiency_finding: The security level is not posted on the security station.
description_overview: The board where the security level was written was not visible.
immediate_causes: The vessel not update and poster on time was due to the port facility security level.
root_cause_analysis: Duty officer will check from time to time to make sure that the security level is displayed in the correct place.
corrective_action: The PSC inspector was satisfied with the prompt action taken and closed out the deficiency with code 10 at the time of issuing the report itself.
preventive_action: The gangway watchkeeper will make sure the board on which the security level is written is visible and verified by the officer of the watch.

deficiency_finding: In the emergency escape route, the emergency light is not marked.
description_overview: The Emcy light is hanging loose in the cables without mounting.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was no sign to inspect the emergency light in the emergency escape route.
corrective_action: The lamps of the emergency lights were signed and this deficiency was immediately corrected by PSCO.
preventive_action: Make sure that all the emergency lights are marked and check the emergency light at the emergency escape route.

deficiency_finding: The paint lockers will be protected by a water spraying or sprinklers.
description_overview: The paint store did not cover all paint types.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't know about fire prevention and the sprinklers didn't work.
corrective_action: The paint locker and paint cans have been rearranged.
preventive_action: To be added into pre-joining training for avoiding the same reoccurring.

deficiency_finding: The symbol for fire control plan is not correct.
description_overview: All the vessels need to have a certain number of mandatory, hazard, safety, fire, direction and prohibitory signs.
immediate_causes: The incorrect symbol was used on one side.
root_cause_analysis: Management.
corrective_action: The symbol was replaced with a different one.
preventive_action: The checks will be rigorously implemented on all ships through the campaign.

deficiency_finding: There are fire doors in fire-resisting divisions.
description_overview: The Upper Deck E/R fire door and the purifier room door were not properly sealed at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Poor rubber packing, lack of safety culture and situational awareness of the importance to weather-tight and water integrity were some of the reasons why the forward forecastle doors were not checked carefully.
root_cause_analysis: The doors must close all the time and the seal must be in good condition.
corrective_action: The worn out gasket around these doors was replaced with the same gasket material and an adjustment was made around the door to help it close properly.
preventive_action: There will be a monthly alert bulletin for the fleet awareness.

deficiency_finding: The rest shown on the safety meeting time in the remark column is not the same as the rest shown in the same line.
description_overview: Before fumigating a previous voyage, no evidence of the ship safety committee should be carried out.
immediate_causes: The rest hours were not filled by the crew.
root_cause_analysis: The rest hour records were approved without verification.
corrective_action: The officer was trained to fill the rest hour records correctly.
preventive_action: There is a proper procedure for filling up rest hours record and verification.

deficiency_finding: It is the responsibility of the adminisration to ensure that the weathertightness can be maintained.
description_overview: The crew noticed minor rust on the lines, but it did not affect the integrity of the line.
immediate_causes: Instructions were given for the emergency light to be replaced.
root_cause_analysis: Due to rush of the shipment and bad weather during sailing period in North Pacific area, the maintenance work cannot be arranged properly.
corrective_action: The cleats with poor condition have been repaired by the crew and shore base repair team.
preventive_action: The maintenance result will be monitored by the PIC of technical and marine dept.

deficiency_finding: There are over 5 twist locks that aren't in lock position.
description_overview: There are methods of position fixing that are not marked in the passage plan.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: 3 hours before complete loading operation, the stevedores securing job were in progress, and twist locks were not in lock position when inspected.
corrective_action: The deck crew requested the foreman to secure the twist lock.
preventive_action: C/O will discuss with foreman before cargo operation to demonstrate ship's requirements.

deficiency_finding: The expired publication was found during the inspection.
description_overview: There was an oil stain under the drain valve of the oil tank for the Hatch Cover system.
immediate_causes: The contents of the SOLAS Training Manual were not checked by the officer in charge.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the epidemic, the application was unable to supply ships.
corrective_action: The master and PSCO were satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: 2nd Officer will make sure the publications are updated at all times.

deficiency_finding: There are plans for survival craft.
description_overview: The outer plate of the freefall release hook is not visible anymore.
immediate_causes: The cam pin of the release system had an identification mark on it.
root_cause_analysis: There is excessive wear and tear.
corrective_action: A new green indicator line was applied to the cam pin after the release system was inspected and tested for correct operation.
preventive_action: There is a way to prevent the systematic recurrence.

deficiency_finding: The fixed CO2 system is not connected to the air control pipe.
description_overview: The planned maintenance records were checked and it was found that the monthly safety task for the fixed fire fighting system was carried out on the 31st of May.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The cause for the disconnected pipe was found to be due to the fact that the pipe was not fully tightened during the last monthly checks.
corrective_action: The pipe of the air control for opening the CO2 system was connected in presence of the PSCO.
preventive_action: The fire fighting system's PMS was verified and found to be adequate.

deficiency_finding: EEBD for training is not marked.
description_overview: The pressure on the bridge was less than recommended.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The third officer doesn't talk about the training purpose.
corrective_action: The training purpose was marked by the third officer.
preventive_action: The LSA/FFA must be inspected and maintained by the third officer.

deficiency_finding: The second officer is not familiar with the code.
description_overview: The second officer is not familiar with the code.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: As part of joining familiarization, the second officer was briefed on ship specific security duties, but he was not familiar with the use of SSAS button.
corrective_action: The use of SSAS button was demonstrated to the satisfaction of the PSC Inspector by the second officer.
preventive_action: Training was carried out for all crew to be familiar with the SSAS.

deficiency_finding: There are oil leaks around diesel generators.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: There was an operational requirement of handling cable carousels that necessitated generators for power sets with ancillaries, but they were not verified by the class of vessel.
root_cause_analysis: We have confirmed that the diesel generators and surrounding areas were free of oil.
corrective_action: The diesel generators #2 and #3 were stopped and the diesel generator #1 was on full ship's load.
preventive_action: After departure from the port, the observation was discussed with Ships staff responsible for general maintenance and upkeep.

deficiency_finding: The communication equipment for the fireman outfit is located in Bridge.
description_overview: The ship structure access manual is missing.
immediate_causes: The engine room and radio room are inside the fire locker, while the bridge deck and navigation locker are inside the fire locker.
root_cause_analysis: The Instrinsically UHF Transceiver was not returned by the officer in charge.
corrective_action: Returned the Intrinsically safe radio at the fire control station in the upper deck to educate the officer in charge.
preventive_action: Master told all crew members the permanent location of intrinsically safe radios, 2 of which were located at the fire Station at upper deck.

deficiency_finding: There is a light through the door that is visible.
description_overview: The emergency light outside the funnel was unlit when PSCO checked the lighting system.
immediate_causes: The door wasn't closing due to Deformation.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not follow the procedure for maintenance and inspection of fire doors.
corrective_action: A photo evidence was sent to the PSC.
preventive_action: The doors have been inspected for the same problem.

deficiency_finding: There is a dewatering valve indicator that is missing.
description_overview: The system isn't ready for use.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Crew lack of inspection and maintenance.
corrective_action: The indicator needs to be repaired immediately on the spot.
preventive_action: Strengthen crew training on the importance of dewater system, establish a sound inspection and maintenance system, regular inspect and maintenance as per company's working instruction, fix defects in time.

deficiency_finding: The glass of the meter is damaged.
description_overview: The Shaft/Hull meter glass was found to be broken during the PSC inspection.
immediate_causes: Master did not push the PIC to update in time.
root_cause_analysis: The engine crew failed to identify and correct the issue.
corrective_action: To the satisfaction of attending PSC officers, a new glass was installed on the Shaft/Hull meter.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be communicated via the Monthly Alert Bulletin.

deficiency_finding: UpPER DECK ONE SELF-CONTAINED BREATHING APPARATUS FOR THE CARRIAGE OF DANGEROUS WITH INSUFFICENT PRESSURE.
description_overview: A portable gas detector.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge failed to inspect the exhaust gas pipe.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not conduct the air pressure check and test of SCBA in time because they did not use the relevant drills.
corrective_action: The crew was told to use the air compressor to refill the Upper Deck SCBA.
preventive_action: In order to remind crew to check and test SCBA and EEBD for immediate or emergency use, ISM PIC requested 3/O to add hydro test into the PMS Deck calendar.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, no ratings were identified to be part of the safety committee.
description_overview: It is the responsibility of the support team to close water-tight doors according to the muster list.
immediate_causes: Poor safety awareness and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of documentation Unclear roles.
corrective_action: Crew should vote for their representatives for the Safety Committee at the extraordinary meeting.
preventive_action: All vessels will receive the matter.

deficiency_finding: Some mooring ropes have not been properly installed.
description_overview: There are some Mooring ropes that are below standard.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew missed to correct a few of them after adjusting the mooring ropes.
corrective_action: The rat guards were placed correctly after the inspector pointed them out to the satisfaction of the inspector.
preventive_action: The crew were educated on checking the proper positioning of ratguards after adjustment of each mooring rope.

deficiency_finding: The life raft was not secured with a pelican hook.
description_overview: In this way, the steering gear units can be started from a distance with possible fatal consequences for the crew working on the steering machine.
immediate_causes: The quick release of forward life raft was difficult to open due to the improper installation of accompanying shackle that was used for securing in place.
root_cause_analysis: Testing of plant, tools or equipment was not done.
corrective_action: The quick release device and flash rust were removed and lubricated after the shackle with improper installation was adjusted.
preventive_action: The safety officer was trained in the proper installation of the quick release device.

deficiency_finding: The insulation is low.
description_overview: There is a navigation.
immediate_causes: Lack of immigration is a problem.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't check the equipment in time.
corrective_action: A new insulation indicator was changed by the crew.
preventive_action: Ensure the crew is familiar with the requirements of the SMS and implement accordingly.

deficiency_finding: The instructions for the port and starboard of the rescue boat are not readable.
description_overview: The launching instructions for the port and starboard side and recovery of the rescue board were not clearly legible due to excessive wear and tear.
immediate_causes: Lack of proper/effective inspection by concerned PIC, faded instructions timely renewal of poor condition operational placards even though vessel is having ready spare procedure available onboard is an inadequate compliance issue.
root_cause_analysis: New available lauching procedure replaced faded operating instructions.
corrective_action: Crew training and familiarization conducted by Master briefed the importance of clearly visible operationg instructions and placards.
preventive_action: Yes.

deficiency_finding: There is insufficient air pressure in the fire control station.
description_overview: There was no fitness equipment in the gym.
immediate_causes: A spare bottle of the SCBA was partially filled.
root_cause_analysis: The Bulk Carrier Pre-Arrival preparation was incomplete.
corrective_action: The bottle was immediately charged to max pressure.
preventive_action: All SCBA bottles pressure were checked and refilled.

deficiency_finding: The fluorescent bulb light is unlight.
description_overview: One of the lights in the cable duct space was unlit, but the light was immediately renewed and shown to PSCO.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: Bulb failure due to noise.
corrective_action: The electrical officer was briefed by the master to check the lights outside and inside one day before the arrival port.
preventive_action: The completion date is 06.06.2.

deficiency_finding: Medical equipment, chest, and guide.
description_overview: Eye wash expired in the engine room.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: Immediate correction of correct date on eye-wash was rectified and accepted by PSCO.
preventive_action: Discussed in a meeting.

deficiency_finding: The tape for the rescue boat is in poor condition.
description_overview: Rescue boat davit slewing is slow.
immediate_causes: The rescue boat davit's remote control lever was not recovered because it was worn out.
root_cause_analysis: The Rescue Boat was not checked and maintained.
corrective_action: New tapes were attached.
preventive_action: The master will teach the PIC how to maintain the Rescue Boat.

deficiency_finding: There is insufficient cleanliness of the engine room.
description_overview: If there were leaks in the engine room, the adjacent spaces may become dirty.
immediate_causes: Cleaned before leaving.
root_cause_analysis: There may be maintenance work in the port.
corrective_action: Cleaned before leaving.
preventive_action: There may be maintenance work in the port.

deficiency_finding: The ship's declaration of security does not include details of the port facility.
description_overview: There is no cabin available for the crew member.
immediate_causes: Master failed to notify agents about change in plans.
root_cause_analysis: Transferring information with external parties is adequate.
corrective_action: The Master requested the agents to fill out the ship's declaration of security and submit it to the Port state control inspector.
preventive_action: The vessel's Supdt talked to the Master about the importance of filling up the DOS and how the observation would be shared with vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is a cold room for meat.
description_overview: There is not proper storage of food in the fish and meat room.
immediate_causes: Every time the cold room is opened for a long period, the power failure will cause a false alarm because the sensitivity of the sensor is dependent on the power supply.
root_cause_analysis: The chef didn't close the door in time to get the meat because it was too cold.
corrective_action: The master and PSCO were satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: The cold room should be taken care of by the C/C at any time.

deficiency_finding: There are fire doors in fire-resisting divisions.
description_overview: There is a hole in the Laundry A15 door handle.
immediate_causes: The missing parts have been requested.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear are job/ equipment factors.
corrective_action: The missing handle and self-closing device have been installed on the laundry door and all fire doors are in good working order.
preventive_action: In order to improve their approaching to safety, the General Manager and DPA have visited the vessel.

deficiency_finding: Safety Management Certificate-Intermediate verification as per ISM code part -8 paragraph 13.8 no entries and is recorded into inappropriate part-B paragraph 13.13
description_overview: The e-certificate notification was sent to the vessel, however the endorsed certificate was not printed and filed onboard.
immediate_causes: There is a human error.
root_cause_analysis: After it was pointed out by inspector, quick investigation showed that the auditor unintentionally verified the wrong place of certificate and the situation oversighted by the vessel management team.
corrective_action: A new certificate was published and sent to the vessel.
preventive_action: The vessel management team did not know about the error and so they did not conduct an online training on certificate requirements.

deficiency_finding: There was a reference to the Statement of Fact Bunker Oil spill in the ORB.
description_overview: The Oil Record book states that the spill from the #2 HSFO (S) tank was verified by the CCS.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow R&R, inadequate records are direct causes of unsafe acts.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of standards in the forms VP09 and ORB.
corrective_action: There will be a discussion of corrective and preventive actions at the end of December.
preventive_action: Engine personnel were refreshed for Bunkering Safe Working Practices, Company's Procedures and proper ORB recordkeeping using relevant SMS procedures and INTERTANKO Guidance available in e-SMS.

deficiency_finding: There is an application for approval by the flag state of three members not signed by the ruler.
description_overview: The cargo ship safety equipment certificate stated that the navigation equipment was in good working condition, as it was seen by the inspector.
immediate_causes: Negligence and oversight.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient monitoring.
corrective_action: The crew was briefed on how to sign certificates including flag state endorsement and how to fill sections with their signatures.
preventive_action: When a new certificate is received, it should be verified by the individual crew and master.

deficiency_finding: The garbage station is on the port side.
description_overview: In line with MARPOL Annex 5, the company's "Garbage Management Plan" details guidelines and procedures for collecting, processing, and disposing of garbage generated onboard ships.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: The garbage station on the port side main deck didn't have a good warning system.
corrective_action: The final report of the garbage management plan was endorsed by the PSCO and all relevant posters were displayed immediately.
preventive_action: The statutory requirement of displaying various placards and posters that needs to be exhibited at various locations as required by the Garbage Management Plan was reiterated after the lapse to exhibit the placards.

deficiency_finding: The rescue boat engine is not running.
description_overview: Not working.
immediate_causes: There is a chance that the paper will get wet.
root_cause_analysis: The choke was kept fully open while starting.
corrective_action: The choke was adjusted before the engine started.
preventive_action: Before starting the engine, there should be more effective Familiarization and training.

deficiency_finding: The main alarm of the water ingress alarm system was activated during the PSC inspection.
description_overview: After the last use of the gas meter, the officer left the extension hose in the forward store and not in the dedicated location.
immediate_causes: The main alarm panel malfunctioned because of the PCB buzzer alarm.
root_cause_analysis: There was a build up of cargo residual on the alarm sensors.
corrective_action: The crew cleared the cargo residual and the alarm went off.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness to crew and prevent reoccurrence of the similar nature, the person in charge was instructed to regularly check and test the sensors.

deficiency_finding: The navigation bridge has a table of life-saving signals missing.
description_overview: There are life-saving signals missing on the navigation bridge.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient safety checks by the Master and Safety Officer during their safety rounds.
corrective_action: The Table of Life saving signals on the Bridge were immediately posted.
preventive_action: To maintain oversight and ensure that all required posters are posted on the navigation bridge and other areas on the vessel, the master must be a safety officer.

deficiency_finding: The X-Band Radar wasn't working at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The record book of engine parameters did not record the replacement of fuel valve nozzles for G/E and M/E.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The X band radar was out of order on the way to Japan.
corrective_action: Report to Class and Flag, relevant safety measures put in place for safety navigation, pre-arrival and departure report to VTS and relevant port authority.
preventive_action: Keep necessary spare parts onboard which can be shared with other vessels.

deficiency_finding: M.E OIL MIST DETECTOR FUNCTION.
description_overview: Before departure, to be corrected.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: There was a failure to replace in time.
corrective_action: Oil strippers are replaced with system restorers.
preventive_action: The effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluents of the effluent

deficiency_finding: The hot water temperature isn't enough around the vessel.
description_overview: The sink and faucet are in poor condition.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: It took some time to reach the uppermost accommodation's faucet when it was requested by the PSC officers because there was no hot water at the accommodation's hot water supply piping.
corrective_action: For improving the supply pressure, the hot water's re-circulating pump was overhauled.
preventive_action: The case has been treated as a non-conformance in accordance with company procedures and will be closely monitored until its' proper conclusion.

deficiency_finding: The type approval certificate for the Incinerator is not available onboard.
description_overview: The crew is familiar with the garbage management plan.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The type approval certificates were available onboard.
corrective_action: The type of approval certificate was available.
preventive_action: Before incinerating the plastic, one should consult the instruction book and ask the company for help.

deficiency_finding: The vending device in Galliy was broken.
description_overview: Outside the Engine Control room there was a bad smell.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew neglected to perform maintenance on the duct in the galley.
corrective_action: The crew was told to fix the broken duct.
preventive_action: The case will be discussed during the next meeting of the safety committee.

deficiency_finding: There is no effective prevention of mosquitoes in the hospital.
description_overview: There is no effective prevention of mosquitoes in the hospital.
immediate_causes: There was inadequate size wire mesh installed at the hospital.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of self checks by crew.
corrective_action: There is a new frame and wire mesh at the hospital.
preventive_action: The crew has been asked to do more checks on the vents.

deficiency_finding: One of the portable gas detectors isn't working.
description_overview: A portable gas detector.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The equipment was in good working order and had been used daily to determine gas content in cargo holds filled with coal.
corrective_action: Two of the portable gas detectors are usable and back up for the faulty one.
preventive_action: The master is supposed to make sure that the maintenance routines provided by Martin Brussgaard for the Gas detectors are followed, kept fully charged and the self test is carried out before use.

deficiency_finding: Safety in general.
description_overview: A potential slip trip and fall can be caused by rubber insulation mats in front of electrical panels that are not secured properly.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The rubber insulation mats in front of the electric panels were not secured.
corrective_action: tiger tape is used to secure insulation mats in front of electrical panels.
preventive_action: The Company procedure has been revised to include guidance on securing the insulation mat.

deficiency_finding: The anchor chain bitter end release arrangements are not normal.
description_overview: The anchor chain bitter end release arrangements are not stable and the removal of the PS pin is not verified.
immediate_causes: During the self-inspection on the ship, the deficiency was not found in advance.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient close-up inspection of anchor chain bitter end release arrangements.
corrective_action: The anchor chain bitter end release arrangement was immediately checked by the Master, minor repairs were carried out and it was confirmed that the bitter end can be released quickly in case of an emergency.
preventive_action: The Master convened a special safety meeting with all the senior officers during which the importance of close-up inspection of all equipment of board was under-lined.

deficiency_finding: The company's address and place on the survey were incorrect.
description_overview: Only for information.
immediate_causes: On endorsement of annual verification, PSC decided not to write 'R.O.C.' as a country on the DOC company address.
root_cause_analysis: Not applicable.
corrective_action: The address and endorsement on DOC were requested by the company.
preventive_action: The company decided to change the address in order to prevent arguments of China PSC in the future.

deficiency_finding: Main Gen. set No.1 and No.2 leaking oil.
description_overview: An Occasional Survey was carried out at the request of the owner after deficiencies were pointed out by the USCG Mobile.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: The bolts on the door of the main Gen. sets were loosened, which resulted in oil leaking.
corrective_action: The crew cleaned the oil leaking from the main Gen. set No.1 and No.2.
preventive_action: The engine department crew will be supervised by the Chief Engineer in the future.

deficiency_finding: There are tight conditions.
description_overview: The starboard side freeboard marks, forward and middle draft marks, and Plimsoll mark are not fully painted.
immediate_causes: The vessel has been at the last port of Iquique, Chile for more than a month and failed to clean the hull due to restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of supervision and compliance with the maintenance plan.
corrective_action: The port authority gave permission for the marks to be painted.
preventive_action: Inspection hull condition should be carried out regularly during stay in ports.

deficiency_finding: The communication method was not completed before the ship arrived at the port.
description_overview: After mooring operations by the Aft mooring team, the Winch clutch lever was not put in place.
immediate_causes: The information on the Communication method was missing in the ship/shore checklist.
root_cause_analysis: There are personal facts about inadequate practice and inadequate coaching.
corrective_action: The training is done by the master to duty officer.
preventive_action: Sharing of deficiency is a way to prevent re-occurrence.

deficiency_finding: There is a radio log.
description_overview: The GMDSS log book is not complete.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Master briefed 3/O on updating Radio Log.
preventive_action: Master will check the Arrival Port Checklist D/03 to make sure required books and documents are up to date.

deficiency_finding: Some ER pumps are not protected.
description_overview: Protection machines are not required.
immediate_causes: The water in tanks 2 P and 2 S is not treated.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect identification of safety guards.
corrective_action: There are pump guards for main SW and ME-LO-Priming pumps.
preventive_action: The matter will be distributed among sister vessels to make sure that the exposed rotating parts of the pumps are protected.

deficiency_finding: There were two International loadline cert. with different freeboard provided.
description_overview: There were two International loadline cert. with different freeboard provided.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The Loadline certificate no 2141347/LL1 was inadvertently presented to PSCO, which resulted in the captioned vessel being assigned with multiple load lines.
corrective_action: The Loadline certificate that was not in use was immediately removed from the dedicated trading certificate file.
preventive_action: The report of the master was carried out by a marine admiral and the compliance with the notice was reiterated.

deficiency_finding: There was no indication when performing the test.
description_overview: To be fixed before departure.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Equipment failure or malfunctioning.
corrective_action: The Sat-EPIRB was replaced prior to the departure of the ship.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The washers for International Shore Connection were missing.
description_overview: During the PSC Inspection at Yokkaichi PSC Officer Maeda Takuma imposed a deficiency.
immediate_causes: The ship safety officer did not report the deficiency.
root_cause_analysis: The washers for International Shore Connection were missing.
corrective_action: Put the washers on the International Shore Connection.
preventive_action: The International shore Connection is inspected weekly by the third officer.

deficiency_finding: There is a damaged F.O. tank on top of the engine room.
description_overview: Transferring information to authorities is inadequate.
immediate_causes: Though the pressure was checked weekly and before each arrival, there was a lower pressure than required at the time of the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of timely maintenance on fuel lines.
corrective_action: There will be a planned renewal in the next dry dock.
preventive_action: Corroded pipes should be maintained as per the schedules.

deficiency_finding: The brake lining on the anchor windlass is worn out.
description_overview: Brake lining is worn out and in poor conditions.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The brake lining was not stated to be in bad condition despite being reported to be in need of maintenance.
corrective_action: New brake linings were requested and expected to be delivered on board by 15 August in order to replace the remaining mooring winch and windlass.
preventive_action: The company's procedures for reporting of defect and non conformities were requested by the responsible officer.

deficiency_finding: The M/E LO stand-by pump was unable to be started automatically due to overload, and the stand-by low temperature fresh water pump and main sea water cooling pump were also unable to be started automatically.
description_overview: The inspector looked at all the alarms of the rudder pumps.
immediate_causes: The changeover pump was not achieved.
root_cause_analysis: The test button is supposed to be pulled to overload, but instead it was pushed to depress the NC contact.
corrective_action: The pumps were tested for change over and the test button was the same as the stop push button.
preventive_action: The procedure for testing for engine officers can be found in the manual.

deficiency_finding: The EIAPP statements of compliance were issued by RINA instead of the EIAPP certificates.
description_overview: The PSC officer noted that EIAPP statements of compliance existed on board for ME and 3AE, instead of certificates as per MALTA flag requirements.
immediate_causes: Poor certificate management by Master resulted in EIAPP certificate not being returned to certificate file folder.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient knowledge by attending the RINA Surveyor to issue the proper EIAPP Certificates.
corrective_action: There were 4 new EIAPP certificates left on board after RINA Surveyor attendance.
preventive_action: Monthly Alert bulletin will be used to circulate the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: A wrong field of work is indicated by the Chief Engineer medical certificate.
description_overview: The number of people which the ship is certified to carry is not indicated in the International Sewage Pollution Prevention Cert.
immediate_causes: The officers ignored the indication on the battery panel.
root_cause_analysis: The authority's typing error, inadequate check of the Chief Engineer's certificate, and inadequate document control of the 2nd officer are some of the problems.
corrective_action: The Turkish Health Authority sent the wrong part of the certificate to the vessel in electronic format.
preventive_action: The crew has been given training to check their certificates.

deficiency_finding: The MSMD does not include the required number of cook unless a certified cook is onboard.
description_overview: Guidance on carriage of cook was not included in the Minimum safe manning document available at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: The crew delayed responding to the PSC officer request due to their busy schedule.
root_cause_analysis: Communication was delayed to transmit the renewed certificate.
corrective_action: The new Minimum safe manning document was issued on the 5th of April, which is an electronic version.
preventive_action: Since this was a fleet-wide action, team members were working on a task sheet and being closely monitored.

deficiency_finding: The earth lamp is out of order.
description_overview: The insulation on the panel is not good.
immediate_causes: High humidity air makes low insulation in one illumination on deck.
root_cause_analysis: There is maintenance management.
corrective_action: Thefective bulb was replaced.
preventive_action: To be cross verified by the chief engineer, weekly checks of critical lamps to be carried out diligently by designated officer.

deficiency_finding: The bridge team couldn't locate the emergency light for the GMDSS station.
description_overview: On 7th of August there will be a test without records.
immediate_causes: Light was not working.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient checks.
corrective_action: The light was repaired after the power cable was cut.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels will get feedback.

deficiency_finding: There were insects noted inside the light covers.
description_overview: There were insects noted inside the light covers.
immediate_causes: There were a lot of flies around the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: We didn't remove the dead flies before we arrived.
corrective_action: Light covers were removed and cleaned.
preventive_action: Light cover for any flies trap should be included in a routine inspection.

deficiency_finding: The ship identification number is not marked permanently.
description_overview: The ship identification number is not marked permanently.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: In front of the entrance of the ER space, a steel plate was attached to the frames to permanently mark the ship's IMO Number.
corrective_action: The vessel's class society requested to attend the vessel and verify that the position meet requirements.
preventive_action: As a lesson learnt and sharing of information the following actions were performed:

deficiency_finding: The International Energy Efficiency Certificate is not valid.
description_overview: The port main deck is not closed properly.
immediate_causes: After the inspection, a telecom was conducted with the Master, but he did not present the available certificate from the ship management software.
root_cause_analysis: The International Energy Efficiency Certificate was not issued by the Classification Society.
corrective_action: The issuance of the certificate is expected to be completed by the 23rd of January.
preventive_action: The company will communicate the raised deficiency to the fleet in order to avoid a repeat.

deficiency_finding: The insulation of the 220V panel is low.
description_overview: galley equipment is not operational after the emergency stop.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: 220V and 440V insulation was tested prior to arrival in the port, but a grounding on cargo hold lighting in entrance to cargo hold no.1 was found at the time of inspection.
corrective_action: On site prior to disembarkation of PSCO.
preventive_action: In case of low insulation, the 220 V electric feeder panel should be checked regularly by the master.

deficiency_finding: The original discharge criteria are not available on board.
description_overview: There are other DEFICIENCIES.
immediate_causes: The sewage discharge valve on the shore facility was frozen and rusted.
root_cause_analysis: A copy of the original sewage discharge rate table was kept on board.
corrective_action: Class can clarify matter.
preventive_action: This was accepted as sufficient by the actual class and will only be endorsed during the next attendance.

deficiency_finding: There is evidence that the members of the engine department don't know how to operate an oil separator.
description_overview: The engine crew was not able to demonstrate alarm quickly when using the oily water separator.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions is one of the reasons for inadequate knowledge update training.
root_cause_analysis: All crew must be familiar with ship's machinery/ equipment in order for the engine team to be known as OWS.
corrective_action: The engineer officers and crew have been told to be familiar with the procedures of the oil separator.
preventive_action: To demonstrate in rest fleet for awareness and further actions, the said remarks will be included on monthly distance checking.

deficiency_finding: There are not enough fruits to complete the provision store.
description_overview: Title3 / Regulation A 3.2.
immediate_causes: The ship crew doesn't have a concept of garbage management.
root_cause_analysis: The store was under control because the order had already been placed.
corrective_action: Immediate actions were taken by assessing the current inventory levels, specifically identifying the types and quantities of fruits in short supply.
preventive_action: To ensure compliance with requirements and maintain fresh provisions, it is important to consider potential delays, waiting times at anchorage, etc.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection there was no indication of Enclosed Space.
description_overview: At the time of inspection, familiarisation is not required.
immediate_causes: The gangway safety marks notice board is displayed on the upper side of the gangway but not on the lower platform.
root_cause_analysis: Enclosed space safety and marking procedures were neglected.
corrective_action: Space entrances were marked by the crew.
preventive_action: If needed, the crew should check the marks and renew in the future.

deficiency_finding: GALLEY STEOVE Vent is heavily greased.
description_overview: GALLEY STEOVE Vent is heavily greased.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect inspection as required.
corrective_action: The wire mesh was properly cleaned.
preventive_action: There is more detailed inspection on a weekly basis.

deficiency_finding: There is no return liquid in the backflow pipe of the sewage treatment plant during the inspection.
description_overview: Failure to follow instructions.
immediate_causes: To ensure that the system is operational, a through inspection of the plant was conducted to identify the cause of the malfunction.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of awareness of the importance of regular maintenance.
corrective_action: After PSC left the vessel, the Plant System and pipes were cleaned.
preventive_action: Following the inspection of the sewage treatment plant, the vessel manager instructed the PIC to make sure that all system components are functioning well.

deficiency_finding: Life rafts connection painter and weak link are not required.
description_overview: The position fixing method was not carried out as per the approved plan.
immediate_causes: The crew re-installed the life raft HRU painter line.
root_cause_analysis: Human error is one of the possible causes of the wrong connection of the life raft painter.
corrective_action: Regular inspections and maintenance of the life raft painter and connections could be done to prevent similar issues in the future.
preventive_action: The safety bulletin was re-issued and sent to the fleet for further familiarization.

deficiency_finding: The engineer didn't know about the test of M/E L.O stand-by pump change-over in case of low pressure.
description_overview: The engineer didn't know about the test of M/E L.O stand-by pump change-over in case of low pressure.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The officer was stressed out during the inspection and did not perform in line with his capacity.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer gave additional training to the engine crew for the M/E LO stand-by pump simulation test.
preventive_action: Before taking any engineering watch, the Chief Engineer must verify that all engineers joining the vessel have undergone on board familiarization of all machinery equipment including changeover procedures.

deficiency_finding: The boiler alarm is inadequate.
description_overview: The electronic water level sensor is not insulated.
immediate_causes: Human Factors Rushing to complete task (perceived pressure from other party) Boiler Water Level Alarm Casing not insulated after boiler survey Lack of two man verification check Senior officers to check and verify the daily jobs once completed.
root_cause_analysis: Human Factors Rushing to complete task (perceived pressure from other party) Boiler Water Level Alarm Casing not insulated after boiler survey Lack of two man verification check Senior officers to check and verify the daily jobs once completed.
corrective_action: Engine room staff renewed the alarm insulation.
preventive_action: The general safety inspection by Safety Officer (COFF / 2ENG) will be followed by improved and inspection to be increased.

deficiency_finding: The call points are not capable of immediate operation.
description_overview: Not required.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: The embarkation ladder shacks don't connect with the pad eye.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: During the sea passage, the embarkation ladder shackles were disconnected to protect the rope end from exposure to the sea, but they were not reconnected after passing through an area of heavy weather.
root_cause_analysis: Life-saving appliances and firefighting equipment were not adequately controlled.
corrective_action: The Port State Control Officer accepted the corrective action report before departure.
preventive_action: Notices will be posted in the bridge if FFE and LSA are temporarily secured.

deficiency_finding: There are tube lights in the steering gear room.
description_overview: Some tube lights in the steering gear room were found to be deficient.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The PSC Inspector deficiency was identified by the responsible officers before the inspection and replacement of tube lights in the steering gear room was scheduled, but was delayed due to other issues onboard.
corrective_action: The tube lights that were faulty were replaced with new.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company took the following measures.

deficiency_finding: The stability information booklet is not required.
description_overview: There was no approval from the flag.
immediate_causes: The Stability Manual was approved by the classification society.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of inspection ship certs.
corrective_action: The correct certificates were printed out and kept in file.
preventive_action: Master should be familiar with Chapter I General Provisions Part B and Certificates and the Appendix of SOLAS convention.

deficiency_finding: There is enough time for change for all fuel consumers on board.
description_overview: The ship uses low and high sulphur fuels to comply with the SECA requirements.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The company safety management system requires a vessel specific fuel oil change over procedure to be made onboard, but the relevant vessel's staff used the company generic procedure for fuel oil change over.
corrective_action: A vessel specific fuel oil change over procedure was created and reviewed.
preventive_action: To follow and implement company procedures that will contribute to environmental protection, and to verify that all parameters are updated in the change-over time calculator prior to fuel change.

deficiency_finding: The main deck plug isn't installed during cargo operations.
description_overview: The company's established procedures and practices clearly state that all scuppers must be plugged at all times when in port.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer and the Deck Officers are responsible for making sure the deck scuppers are plugged and secured.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause is that dutyAB forgot to close the scupper plug when the rain stopped.
corrective_action: The main deck plug was installed immediately after the satisfactory of the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: The monthly safety committee meeting will be carried out with the participation of all officers and crew and will discuss all the deficiencies.

deficiency_finding: The EEDI technical file was not available.
description_overview: The correct nozzle ID was marked on the record.
immediate_causes: Poor order.
root_cause_analysis: Master was not familiar with the location of the EEDI technical file.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed by the PSC office on site after the EEDI technical file was found in a drawing folder.
preventive_action: The relative ship's staff should study the requirement of SMS and make sure the certificates and documents are managed according to the requirement.

deficiency_finding: There are records about the maintenance and testing of security equipment.
description_overview: Master instructed to make sure records are kept for deployment of freefall lifeboat.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The security equipment is not fully included because the Form D of certificate is not detailed enough.
corrective_action: During the test and drill, the record was made up accordingly.
preventive_action: The ship's emergency response fire explosion and the ship's equipment maintenance are included in the security plan.

deficiency_finding: The gas detector system test failed.
description_overview: The tank cleaning operations room sample point failed while testing the fixed gas detection system.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given and the deficiency was fixed on-site during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: After the defect was observed, the ship staff began to investigate and found that the solenoid valve in the system serving the purpose for drawing tank cleaning operation room atmosphere samples and delivering them to the sensing unit was not fully operational due to presence of some stains and foreign particles.
corrective_action: After finding the fault, the vessel staff referred the problem to the manufacturer's manual and the valve was cleaned and mounted back.
preventive_action: The sample point distribution system of the fixed gas detection system must be serviced annually by competent service technicians.

deficiency_finding: The galley exhaust vent is not functioning properly.
description_overview: The crew cabins are outworn.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: The crew failed to inspect and fix the galley exhaust fan.
corrective_action: After the work was done, the galley exhaust fan closed properly.
preventive_action: The fans are part of the planned maintenance system.

deficiency_finding: The cook on board is not provided by MSMD.
description_overview: The cook on board is not provided by MSMD.
immediate_causes: The original documentation should be kept with the sentence of "specimen".
root_cause_analysis: The flag advised on the renewal of MSMC certificates to include Cook for the vessels with ten or more crew.
corrective_action: There is a new MSMC certificate for the subject vessel.
preventive_action: The entire fleet is getting a new MSMC certificate.

deficiency_finding: It impairs the ship's seaworthiness.
description_overview: The forecastle cracked about 12 metres above waterline frames due to the same collision.
immediate_causes: The deck line mark on the hull was not marked correctly.
root_cause_analysis: There are machines and equipment.
corrective_action: See F-022 No 11.2023 and F-020 dated 17.11.2093 for corrective actions.
preventive_action: See F-022 No 11.2023 and F-020 dated 17.11.2093 for corrective actions.

deficiency_finding: Engine crew did not record call-out alarms at night, but did record rest in the 'work and rest hours' records.
description_overview: deficiency was raised during the Port State Control Inspection.
immediate_causes: Rules, regulations or procedures are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance is caused by inadequate leadership.
corrective_action: The Company's Safety Manager will attend the vessel in order to attend the Audit.
preventive_action: The incident to be discussed during the next Safety, Occupational Health and Environmental Committee in order to avoid reoccurrence.

deficiency_finding: The temperature in the room was 36 degrees.
description_overview: The engine room of the vessel has been meticulously maintained and is currently in good working condition.
immediate_causes: The Bridge A/C unit was switched off when the galley fire alarm was being tested.
root_cause_analysis: There is an air conditioner compressor fault.
corrective_action: The temperature of the accommodation has been reduced and the air conditioning units have been repaired.
preventive_action: The training crew should follow the procedures stipulated in SMI-S-H21 The Stipulation for Maintenance of Refrigeration Plant.

deficiency_finding: The hatch of E/R Sky lacks nuts.
description_overview: The Hatch of E/R Sky lack of two nuts, the Access cover of S/G RM lack of three nuts, and the Access cover of Rope store lack of two nuts.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The crews did not pay attention to the lack of nuts.
corrective_action: The crews put back butterfly nuts in the presence of PSC officers.
preventive_action: The nuts should be put back after opening the covers.

deficiency_finding: Captain's medical certificate expired at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The Captain's medical certificate expired at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient monitoring.
corrective_action: Master was relieved in the next port.
preventive_action: There is a isolated case and a human element.

deficiency_finding: The officers couldn't demonstrate familiarity with using a ship to send a call.
description_overview: There was a bridge wing microphone at the monitor.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: It appeared that there was miscommunication during the examination of bridge equipment and that it was related to time on responding and not on demonstration.
corrective_action: The officer was asked to demonstrate how the call was processed and how user friendly the equipment was.
preventive_action: In order to inspect, report non-compliance or defect and comply with deficiency as addressed, the non-conformance path was used.

deficiency_finding: The X-Band radar is not operational.
description_overview: There is a quick-closing valve for the generator oil inlet.
immediate_causes: Lack of immigration is a problem.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was negligent in their maintenance of the radar.
corrective_action: The radar has been repaired in Singapore and all functions have been checked, all in good condition.
preventive_action: The radar inspection and maintenance training needs to be done by a technical engineer.

deficiency_finding: Bunker filling valve indicator is open.
description_overview: The open/close indicator of the filling valve was damaged during the inspection.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: Failure to fulfill maintenance requirements: Defective parts/components not replaced/repaired in due time proper maintenance to remove/clean/minimize rust on vent gratings could and should be done by crew on board.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient motivation for the crew to do their job.
corrective_action: The open/close indicator of the filling valve is painted red for easy observation.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be communicated to the rest of the fleet by the Monthly Alert Bulletin.

deficiency_finding: There are chemicals that are not available on board.
description_overview: There was a shortage of PSC PPE in the S/G room.
immediate_causes: The store at fore peak has some lamps that burn-out.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector did not receive the MSDS immediately.
corrective_action: The master improves the file organization.
preventive_action: At their regular ship visits, management make sure that documents are filed according to category and date.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency phone in the gear room.
description_overview: During the Emergency steering gear drill, the steering gear emergency phone and headphones were tested and found to be working well.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear.
corrective_action: The new headphones were tested and found to be satisfactory and the deficiency was closed.
preventive_action: The master was briefed on the importance of a thorough inspection of Emergency steering gear and all related equipment.

deficiency_finding: The crew was not properly instructed about their duties as the fireman's outfit was not checked and they were not properly dressed.
description_overview: There was no damage to the lines or the sensor.
immediate_causes: The garbage drums were not secured by the engine staff.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to demonstrate is one of the causes of inadequate leadership.
corrective_action: On 25-Nov-2023, proper donning of fireman's outfit with correct procedures for fire drill were demonstrated in presence of Fleet Manager.
preventive_action: In order to prevent this occurrence, this observation will be shared with all the fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: There are electrical installations in general.
description_overview: There were wires of lights and ventilators that were broken, connection boxes that were broken, and electrical cables that were not secured.
immediate_causes: The main alarm panel malfunctioned because of the PCB buzzer alarm.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient supervision on board.
corrective_action: The broken cover of the electrical connection from the ventilators was repaired.
preventive_action: As per the instructions of the company, thorough inspection and maintenance must be done.

deficiency_finding: The LSA training manual has many deleted and unbound pages.
description_overview: The LSA training manual was thoroughly inspected by ship staff and class surveyor during the last annual survey on 20th December 2022, and the manual was in good condition.
immediate_causes: The valve that goes to the sewage treatment unit is not rotating.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection was inadequate.
corrective_action: The LSA training manual on the bridge and officers mess room was bound in good condition.
preventive_action: The responsible officer has been briefed by the master and safety officer to keep the LSA training manual in good condition.

deficiency_finding: Life-saving appliances have an operational readiness.
description_overview: Lifebuoy is not ready at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Non compliance with procedures is a human factor.
root_cause_analysis: While securing the lifebuoy with a rope, the concerned staff did not consider the unavailability of the lifebuoy to be deployed immediately in an emergency situation.
corrective_action: The ropes were removed.
preventive_action: The attending vessel manager briefed the entire ship staff.

deficiency_finding: The record of equipment for cargo ship safety radio certificate is incomplete.
description_overview: The flag administration doesn't agree with deficiency and is waiting for a final decision.
immediate_causes: Human factors are not applicable.
root_cause_analysis: The INMARSAT-C station has an EGC receiver incorporated.
corrective_action: The flag state does not agree with def issued and corresponding with the PSC office for supporting documents to justify the def.
preventive_action: To check for the Form R certificate onboard each vessel, a fleet wide message was shared.

deficiency_finding: The safety pin of the appliance that launches the free-fall lifeboat is not arranged to prevent boarding without first releasing it.
description_overview: The inspector's comment is acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Bulk carrier was stated in the ship's classification certificate, along with other cargo ships.
root_cause_analysis: The procedure for removing the safety pin, as well as the stowage turnbuckles, is described in detail in the boat's instructions, as provided by the maker, and is considered an essential step in the launching process.
corrective_action: As per standard procedure, a Non-Conformity was issued.
preventive_action: In the form of a campaign, the deficiency will be forwarded to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: Both sides had fairleads on the deck.
immediate_causes: The chief officer took the waste paint off the safety pins.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of routine maintenance.
corrective_action: Greasing of the rollers was carried out until free to turn.
preventive_action: During port preparation to turn the rollers and ensure adequate lubrication/grease, adhere to routine maintenance regime including weekly greasing routine, planned maintenance and zone maintenance plan.

deficiency_finding: Water leaking from the fire line isolation valve.
description_overview: There were not ship specific and missing information in the fire safety operational booklet.
immediate_causes: Instructions to the vessel were given to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The root of the deficiency was material wear.
corrective_action: The safety committee will discuss the deficiency during the meeting.
preventive_action: The safety committee will discuss the deficiency during the meeting.

deficiency_finding: The old edition of the list of coast stations.
description_overview: The same is missing from the place where the publication was received.
immediate_causes: Lack of situational awareness and inadequate monitoring and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: The same was not supplied due to short time in ports.
corrective_action: It will be dispatched in the next convenient port after the procurement department has purchased it.
preventive_action: The check will be done as per VS-11.

deficiency_finding: There were many violations of the minimum rest hours in the month of January and February.
description_overview: According to the PSC report, there were many violations of the minimum rest hours in the month of January and February.
immediate_causes: Judgement that is extreme.
root_cause_analysis: Exposure to work load.
corrective_action: C/E and 3/E took rest hours compensation.
preventive_action: The Quarterly Safety Bulletin raises awareness among the crew.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency shut off valve for the auxiliary engine.
description_overview: The pumproom mushroom vent is an important part of the company's planned maintenance system.
immediate_causes: The established procedure was not followed.
root_cause_analysis: The emergency shut off valve was not active after the release of air because the stopping block of fuel oil was not reset properly.
corrective_action: Grease the moving parts and reset the stopping block.
preventive_action: Engineers are trained to reset the emergency shut off valve.

deficiency_finding: The Chief Engineer was instructed to impart this training within 30 days.
description_overview: One pressure gauge in the engine room was out of range due to inadequate maintenance.
immediate_causes: The officer forgot to put the blocker back in ECDIS as he was rushing to finish the plan.
root_cause_analysis: Master and Navigating Officer didn't know that a password should be kept in computers.
corrective_action: The location and operation of emergency generators should be learned within 2 weeks after boarding.
preventive_action: The company will distribute the deficiency to the fleet.

deficiency_finding: The Revolution Counter was found to be faulty.
description_overview: When the engine was stopped, the Rpm indicator was stuck on 35rpm and did not come back to zero.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given.
root_cause_analysis: The crew reported that the indicator was malfunctioning.
corrective_action: The deficiency was corrected immediately after the replacement of the RPM indicator by an electrician.
preventive_action: The next Safety Committee Meeting will discuss the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: Installation of the radio is not required.
description_overview: Disregard deficiency before departure.
immediate_causes: The lifeboat engine was not started.
root_cause_analysis: The date of the message display error was caused by the loss of the gps signal at the port area.
corrective_action: After checking the gps signal, I manually updated the time until the gps signal came back to normal.
preventive_action: The shore-based superintendent has urged the master to strengthen the daily training of officers, followed by regular spot checks on the officer's operation of various equipment.

deficiency_finding: Seafarers' employment agreements don't contain the name of the ship-owner.
description_overview: The annual PSC inspection is held at Hull.
immediate_causes: As amended, improper record keeping and documentation.
root_cause_analysis: Seafarers' employment agreements don't contain the name of the ship-owner.
corrective_action: Seafarers' Employment Agreements are required by the convention.
preventive_action: According to the Maritime Labour Certificate, the name of the ship-owner should be stated in the contract.

deficiency_finding: There is a Water Ingress Alarm Monitor in the Engine Control Room.
description_overview: During the PSC Inspection at the port of Ashdod, Israel, it was found that the vessel had less Sodium Chloride than required.
immediate_causes: Defective tools, equipment, materials, and preventive cleaning are some of the things that can be found.
root_cause_analysis: Transport Malta did not follow reporting procedures documented in the Technical Notice SLS. 27.
corrective_action: A refurbished component was installed.
preventive_action: All vessels were given additional guidance on reporting equipment defects and breakdowns.

deficiency_finding: The 100 V feeder panel has low insulation.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator room had low insulation found on the panel.
immediate_causes: The grinding machine in the ER workshop had a low insulation.
