root_cause_analysis: The insulation in the local area was not identified.
corrective_action: insulation on the local 100V feeder panel has been cleaned and the grinding machine power switch has been cleaned.
preventive_action: The electrician was told that the electrical equipment needed to be checked and maintained.

deficiency_finding: The air pressure gauge of G/E No2 needs to be boosted.
description_overview: The battery charging panel board is low insulation.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient auditing, inspection, and monitoring.
corrective_action: Change from spare part.
preventive_action: The officer is responsible for following P.M.S.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency shut off valve for the auxiliary engine.
description_overview: The pumproom mushroom vent is an important part of the company's planned maintenance system.
immediate_causes: The established procedure was not followed.
root_cause_analysis: The emergency shut off valve was not active after the release of air because the stopping block of fuel oil was not reset properly.
corrective_action: Grease the moving parts and reset the stopping block.
preventive_action: Engineers are trained to reset the emergency shut off valve.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence of enclosed space entry or rescue drills.
description_overview: The officer on watch was limited to taking the compass bearing from the conning position.
immediate_causes: The duty officer did not notice any signs of depression.
root_cause_analysis: The entrance of the enclosed space drill was not done before the arrival in Ravenna since the month of May is not over and there is enough time for the drills planned during the month.
corrective_action: Carried out the entrance of the drill.
preventive_action: If there will be an inspection of the PSC, the completion of all drills should be done in advance.

deficiency_finding: The emergency generator room has low insulation.
description_overview: The insulation on the panel is not good.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer and the Deck Officers are responsible for making sure the deck scuppers are plugged and secured.
root_cause_analysis: There was some water in the Emergency Generator room when the vessel was at Anchorage due to the heavy rain.
corrective_action: The Lifeboat light on the upper deck was opened and cleaned.
preventive_action: If any low insulation is found, it is to be sorted out on the priority list.

deficiency_finding: Generator No. 1 has an Exhaust Pipe Thermometer.
description_overview: Fire-fighting equipment.
immediate_causes: Generator No. 1 has a Defective Exhaust Pipe Thermometer.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear.
corrective_action: The battery of the thermometer had to be renewed after the defect was reported.
preventive_action: The engine room team should report any issues to the senior engineer as soon as possible.

deficiency_finding: There are rollers in the section that aren't rotating.
description_overview: There was a failure to follow the instructor.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient adjustment, maintenance, and repair.
corrective_action: The rope rollers will be carried out.
preventive_action: In case of any issue, the mooring station equipment should be reported to C/O in a timely manner.

deficiency_finding: Maintenance of equipment is not up to standard.
description_overview: The fresh water supply pipe had a small leak at the C-deck branch connection.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient knowledge on complaint procedure.
corrective_action: All items need to be fixed asap.
preventive_action: The Master received training on how to deal with complaints.

deficiency_finding: There was no security drill after 7 crew members were changed.
description_overview: While scrutinizing the drill records, the PSCO noted that there was a crew change of more than 25% and the vessel had conducted an abandon ship drill and fire drill within 24 hours of the crew change.
immediate_causes: There was an isolated lapse on complying with drill requirements.
root_cause_analysis: There was an isolated lapse on complying with drill requirements.
corrective_action: After obtaining terminal permission, the vessel conducted a security drill.
preventive_action: The drills and trainings were conducted as per the company procedure after the master was debriefed.

deficiency_finding: Some forward deck lights don't work.
description_overview: The engine control room has a 220V feeder panel.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: The crew failed to find the damage in time.
corrective_action: The forward deck light should be renewed immediately.
preventive_action: The ship patrol should be increased to find any deficiency in time.

deficiency_finding: The ER fuel oil slope tank valve was broken during the Port State Control Inspection.
description_overview: Some tube lights in the steering gear room were found to be deficient.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The ER fuel oil slope tank valve was scheduled to be replaced in December after the PSC Inspector deficiency was identified by the responsible officers.
corrective_action: The broken handle was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: In order to avoid similar occurrences in the future, the Company took the following measures: Deficiency will be discussed at the next Safety meeting onboard highlighting the importance of keeping all equipment in good order.

deficiency_finding: There was an oil spill during the operation of the MARPOL AnNEX I/Pumping, piping and discharge arrangements.
description_overview: There was an oil spill from the 2P tank vent.
immediate_causes: The air supply system valve was closed.
root_cause_analysis: Refer investigation report shows that the 2P Bunker tank filling valve was leaking and lead to the overflow of the 1 Starboard VLSFO Bunker tank.
corrective_action: There was a 300 liter oil spill which was contained on the deck.
preventive_action: Training session for all ship's staff was conducted for correct procedures to be followed as per company's Fuel management plan Chapter 5 'Bunkering Procedures'.

deficiency_finding: The record of rest hours doesn't match the ORB time.
description_overview: The weekly and monthly inspection of lifesavers were not recorded.
immediate_causes: The bridge daily checks were not complied with.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge causes inaccurate information to be entered into the system.
corrective_action: Double-check the data entries against any supporting documentation, such as logs or shift schedules.
preventive_action: In case of need, check the rest hours records in the next internal audit.

deficiency_finding: The space that was used for oil production was garbage-strewn.
description_overview: The O2/Acetylene room doors had a retrofit plate welded on them.
immediate_causes: There was a small amount of water at the entrance of the pipe duct during the PSC inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency is a housekeeping issue.
corrective_action: The deficiency was fixed to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer, Engine's officers and personnel were strongly advised to ensure proper detection, elimination of any leaking and cleaning works on a daily basis and to ensure that all deficiencies are discussed at the monthly safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is no protection cover for the emergency light in the generator room.
description_overview: There is a safety guard on the pump.
immediate_causes: The original cargo cleaning pump was not fully guard by the safety net.
root_cause_analysis: During regular inspections, I had to identify the missing protection cover for the Emergency Light.
corrective_action: EO was replaced with a complete light assembly.
preventive_action: A training session was held for all ship staff on the importance of thorough inspections and reporting of any defects to safety officer.

deficiency_finding: The fireman's outfit on the main deck of the No1 Fire Station was not working.
description_overview: The Safety Light for fireman's outfit was found to be in good working order.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Poor task management, inadequate skills, inadequate follow up inspection, and failure to follow safety instructions were all indicated in the root case analysis.
corrective_action: The Chief Officer was asked to confirm the condition.
preventive_action: The next monthly submission of LSA/FFE PMS checklist was to be submitted by the vessel by the end of October.

deficiency_finding: The Fire Control Plan container has a broken cover.
description_overview: The eye wash kit was not returned after the paint room was cleaned last week.
immediate_causes: The deck crew did maintenance on the rescue boat painter.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient assessment of readiness.
corrective_action: The fire control plan container has a cover.
preventive_action: The matter will be discussed at the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The IG Exhaust auto control valve isn't working.
description_overview: As part of pre-arrival checks, the Inert Gas System was tried out and all parameters were checked and the system was found to be working well.
immediate_causes: To get the crew to recover the auto closing valve.
root_cause_analysis: The ship staff was unable to demonstrate the operation of both auto control valve and exhaust control valve with reference to the makers manual.
corrective_action: After seeing the PSCO observations, we immediately contacted the makers for clarification on the IGS operation and valve control in auto mode.
preventive_action: The human element was briefed by the Supt explaining the actual operation of the IGS and requested all concerned officers to be well familiar with the system and operation, including references made in the makers manual to highlight the same to any 3rd party inspector when questioned.

deficiency_finding: Communication between officers is not in the language of the vessel.
description_overview: There is a 5 degree difference between the bridge compass and steering gear compass located inside the steering gear room.
immediate_causes: A malfunction in the antenna unit caused the system to stop working.
root_cause_analysis: The operational requirement has not been emphasized.
corrective_action: In order to determine their ability to communicate effectively in the designated working language, all officers were assessed.
preventive_action: When forming the crew for a vessel, aim for a crew with a common working language.

deficiency_finding: There is a hot water leak.
description_overview: The needle indicator on the pressure gauge was found to be half broken, but the gauge was functioning.
immediate_causes: Mission not provided by the port.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient parts substitution/replacement is a problem.
corrective_action: The guidance on the inspection and Maintenance of structure on deck, Hull, and accommodation was given by the master.
preventive_action: The Safety Meeting Master will discuss the deficiency with all crew during the next safety meeting and emphasize regular inspection.

deficiency_finding: The fan in the engine room can't be closed effectively.
description_overview: Fire damper for engine room ventilation fan no.2 was conducted additional test as well as PMS, but ship's crew had conducted cursory inspection without details, as he hadn't known the damper closed completely or not.
immediate_causes: The PSCO suspected that the safety valve was stuck after the Third Engineer had difficulty pulling it.
root_cause_analysis: Poor supervision and maintenance.
corrective_action: The No.2 Damper wasn't fully closing because it was stuck.
preventive_action: The company distributed and shared the deficiency to all the fleets to prevent similar case.

deficiency_finding: Generator 1, and 3 exhaust systems were found with exposed surfaces.
description_overview: The insulation lagging on steam/bunker pipes in the underdeck passage was damaged.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: There are exposed surfaces for the G/E exhaust system.
corrective_action: The hot surfaces should be covered with proper lagging.
preventive_action: The third engineer must check the temperature daily and pay more attention to lagging condition.

deficiency_finding: There are two mattresses on the floor of the hospital room.
description_overview: Due to crew being occupied with port activities and duties, old mattress was not taken out of hospital in time.
immediate_causes: The elevator needed extended service because it was not operational.
root_cause_analysis: The old mattress wasn't taken out of the hospital in time.
corrective_action: The old mattress was removed.
preventive_action: This finding together with control, root cause and corrective actions applied will be sent to all fleet ships in quarterly letters.

deficiency_finding: Not required.
description_overview: The fire pump room is not closing.
immediate_causes: The findings of the inspection of ISM.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of this failure was lack of proper housekeeping as well as lack of compliance with crew welfare standards as set out by our company.
corrective_action: RECTIFIED.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The hull was corroded.
description_overview: The master was told to put in place safety procedures for access to the ship from shore.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector was told by the Master that the condition of the hull had been identified and reported to the company.
corrective_action: The Master held an additional safety meeting where all deficiencies were reviewed.
preventive_action: The Master held an additional safety meeting where all deficiencies were reviewed.

deficiency_finding: There is a fluorescent bulb light flickering.
description_overview: All emergency lights are checked on a weekly basis as part of the port pre-arrival checks by the electrical officer.
immediate_causes: The actual status of the tapes is good but they are not in good shape.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector pointed out the flickering tube light and the team immediately renewed it.
corrective_action: In the wake of the inspection, the master and chief engineer were briefed on the importance of adequate lighting and satisfactory operation of all lights, as well as adequate stock of spare consumables such as Bulbs and accessories.
preventive_action: The onboard staff were instructed by Master to immediately notify the chief engineer incase any in-operational lighting is noticed onboard the vessel.

deficiency_finding: Outside light is partly dirty.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Didn't report the broken equipment to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The Company has established procedures to ensure that vessels are maintained in accordance with the provisions of the PMS.
corrective_action: The crew cleaned the globe after the PSC Officer pointed out the deficiency.
preventive_action: The necessary corrective and preventive action plan has been issued by the company.

deficiency_finding: The safety net is not rigged properly.
description_overview: The PSC deficiency caused the non-conformity to be raised.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the issue is a lack of clear guidelines or training that emphasizes the importance of adhering to safety protocols, even in the face of perceived pressure to expedite things for PSC.
corrective_action: The accommodation ladder net was rigged shortly after the PSCOs boarding even though it was not re-inspected or fixed during the initial report.
preventive_action: To address the root cause, we sent the attached email to all our fleet so that there are clear guidelines that prioritize safety protocols over accommodating external pressures.

deficiency_finding: It was found out of order.
description_overview: The battery charging panel board is low insulation.
immediate_causes: The Bridge A/C unit was switched off when the galley fire alarm was being tested.
root_cause_analysis: There is equipment malfunction.
corrective_action: The AC system was found to be in good working order after being tested by the shore service team.
preventive_action: From where significant and repeat observations are selected for inclusion in periodic QHSE/Vetting Bulletin for promulgation among all vessels across the fleet, this observation will be included into Company database.

deficiency_finding: Engine international Air Pollution Prevention Certificate is incorrect.
description_overview: 4 pieces rockets for line throwing apparatus expired in April 2020 and the last weekly ISM check was 2 days ago.
immediate_causes: The certificates for the diesel generators were not original.
root_cause_analysis: The class said that the change of flag in 2020 was carried out remotely and that the re-issue of the EIAPP Certificates might have been omitted.
corrective_action: The class has confirmed that they will return to the original certificates soonest.
preventive_action: Discussing this with the Master, he stated that since certificates were available, although not original, he believed that they satisfied the requirements, particularly as the matter had not been raised during previous vetting, Flag or PSC inspections.

deficiency_finding: The davit was found inoperative and there was a huge oil leak.
description_overview: Rescue boats.
immediate_causes: The equipment is defective.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of training and familiarization.
corrective_action: Rescue boat davit was used to try out the accumulator and the O-Ring of return line filter was replaced.
preventive_action: The master was told to make sure the ship staff follow the correct procedure of operating the rescue boat davits while using the manual and accumulator modes and to follow the maker's instructions on the davit at all times.

deficiency_finding: The response engineer wasn't familiar with the main cooling sea water standby pump change.
description_overview: The inspector looked at all the alarms of the rudder pumps.
immediate_causes: Delays of maintenance were caused by previous port restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of training and practice.
corrective_action: The sea water standby pump change was found to be in good working order after being tested again.
preventive_action: There are certain practices to be followed as per company regulations.

deficiency_finding: 3 PC M/E spare exhausts are not secured.
description_overview: Several manholes were not secured.
immediate_causes: Lack of awareness of the importance of securing spare parts.
root_cause_analysis: Hatchway for Ref room is not secured due to the carelessness of crew.
corrective_action: The integrity of the spare exhaust valves was reconfirmed.
preventive_action: Conduct training sessions to emphasize the importance of securing spare parts.

deficiency_finding: The steering gear alarm is on.
description_overview: The local steering gear room was used to perform the tests on the alarm panel.
immediate_causes: There was a small amount of water at the entrance of the pipe duct during the PSC inspection.
root_cause_analysis: When steering control and pump start change from bridge to local control in steering gear, there is an indication that the control is in local side.
corrective_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: There is a 6X6 connection with the pipe system found corroding.
description_overview: The inspector is talking about the fair corrosion at the port side Bunker Manifold and pipe system.
immediate_causes: Insufficient crew awareness on fire prevention.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: The PSC officers were satisfied with the work carried out at anchorage after the departure port side.
preventive_action: The effectiveness of the maintenance will be reviewed by the marine vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire plans mark on the port side main deck.
description_overview: The inspector demanded to check the sample from the discharge pump after he was informed about the status of the overboard valve.
immediate_causes: The incorrect symbol was used on one side.
root_cause_analysis: The importance of the symbol was neglected by the safety officer.
corrective_action: The spare IMO symbol was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: The safety officer should inspect all IMo symbols in accordance with the standard.

deficiency_finding: Unless explicitly stated otherwise in the opinion of the administration, other requirements are appropriate and all lifesavers should be marked with approval information.
description_overview: It is observed that the vessel intended to avoid any possible condensation on cargo tanks during the anchorage period.
immediate_causes: Master contacted the local agent to get permission from the port authority to carry out the drill.
root_cause_analysis: LSA code requirements require Incorrect supply and improper checks.
corrective_action: New life jackets are USCG and SOLAS approved.
preventive_action: When equipment is received, ensure appropriate certification is available and requirements are complied with.

deficiency_finding: There are stores on the floor of the boat that impede the use of the space by people.
description_overview: There is a rotten vegetable in provision stores.
immediate_causes: The equipment is defective.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient inspection.
corrective_action: Equipment inside the rescue boat is secured and cleaned.
preventive_action: The personnel were told to carry out routine checks.

deficiency_finding: Emergency systems need to be ready for use all the time.
description_overview: There is a sewage treatment plant.
immediate_causes: There is a malfunction of the control valve.
root_cause_analysis: The emergency valve not being maintained for a long time resulted in frozen parts.
corrective_action: After de-rusted and cleaned the valve stem and applied penetrating oil, the valve could be opened by hand.
preventive_action: If the system remains inactive for a long period of time, then its moving parts may.

deficiency_finding: There is one light in the CO2 room.
description_overview: The cargo ship safety equipment certificate stated that the navigation equipment was in good working condition, as it was seen by the inspector.
immediate_causes: The air filters were cleaned.
root_cause_analysis: During the routine inspection the light was not found fused, this resulted in the PSC deficiency.
corrective_action: The PSC officer was on board and immediately replaced the light in the CO2 room.
preventive_action: The master told the officer to take frequent rounds and to make sure the lights are working.

deficiency_finding: The Lifeboat is not able to start.
description_overview: The operation was not tested correctly by the PIC 2/E.
immediate_causes: After the maneuvering drill of the life boat on 26th Oct., the No.1 battery was not adequately charged, which led to critical equipment failure.
root_cause_analysis: Although the battery was replaced in the month of March, the engine did not start in the first couple of attempts.
corrective_action: The life boat battery was replaced.
preventive_action: Job description for the Lifeboat battery has been amended.

deficiency_finding: The PPE in the S/G room has not been checked in over a year.
description_overview: There was a shortage of PSC PPE in the S/G room.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were provided.
root_cause_analysis: The PPE was not checked by the PIC due to lack of knowledge and familiarity of the company's system documents.
corrective_action: During the PSC inspection, the PIC immediately checked the condition and quantity of PPE and made a list to correct it.
preventive_action: The crew members have been educated about the company's procedure 'ESH-26 MSDS'.

deficiency_finding: The radar reflectors on the rescue boat expired.
description_overview: The inflatable boat is mentioned in the access manual as a means to inspect the higher parts of the Fore Peak Tank.
immediate_causes: Lack of situational awareness and inadequate monitoring and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: There is a specific radar reflector that does not have an expiration date.
corrective_action: The Expired one was replaced with the New Radar Reflector in order to avoid any implications with the local PSC.
preventive_action: If there is an expiriment date Master to proceed with aRequisition, it is necessary to circulate deficiency to the whole fleet.

deficiency_finding: Medical equipment is missing.
description_overview: During the PSC Inspection at the port of Ashdod, Israel, it was found that the vessel had less Sodium Chloride than required.
immediate_causes: V/L only had a Scan copy of CSR and LRIT certificate.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient supervision and follow up by the Chief Officer.
corrective_action: To comply with the Malta flag requirement of 4 liters, 7 sets of 500ml of sodium chloride were ordered immediately.
preventive_action: During the upcoming Safety Committee meeting, the deficiency will be further discussed and analyzed.

deficiency_finding: The water pipe is used to clean the bridge windows.
description_overview: The bulwarks are on the main deck.
immediate_causes: The electrician was asked to fix the lights.
root_cause_analysis: The port stays in the winter season because of the humidity in the air.
corrective_action: After draining the bridge window wash-water line, the drain was left open so that the window wash could be used before departure.
preventive_action: Cold air should not enter the bridge and pipes with water should be drained.

deficiency_finding: There is a leak of the portside mooring device.
description_overview: Water leaking from the service pump.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The cover for the motor is packed.
corrective_action: Remove the broken parts, inspect and replace the packing, and find no leak.
preventive_action: The company SMS HMC-VMM-012 Hull and Deck machinery and enforcement routine maintenance of winch are referred to by training the engineer.

deficiency_finding: The restricted areas are not effectively controlled.
description_overview: The deficiency was fixed by the PSC inspector.
immediate_causes: DirectCauses - Unsafe Acts/ Unsafe conditions: failure to follow R&R/ SSP, failure to secure, inadequate guards & barriers, indirect causes
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of compliance with company requirements.
corrective_action: The training on proper implementation of the SSP requirements was carried out in November.
preventive_action: Managers' SMS procedures were followed during the next Safety Committee Meeting end of November.

deficiency_finding: Crew contracts and salary payments are not according to S.E.A.
description_overview: Crew contracts and salary payments are not the same as the current collective bargaining agreement.
immediate_causes: The inadequate record is due to the failure to follow SMS.
root_cause_analysis: Crew contracts and salary payments were not updated.
corrective_action: The Master paid the outstanding salary balance to the crew based on the new contract.
preventive_action: The Master will inform the crewing personnel and Management Office if there is a discrepancy in wages.

deficiency_finding: Other work.
description_overview: Before assuming his duties, the chief mate did not receive a full familiarization schedule.
immediate_causes: Substandard Act by External Party.
root_cause_analysis: Transferring information to authorities is inadequate.
corrective_action: The procedure was accepted by PSCO before departing.
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: The number of endorsements does not match the original Philippine CoC.
description_overview: The number of endorsements does not match the original Philippine CoC.
immediate_causes: The office was told.
root_cause_analysis: The number of endorsement of the GMDSS certificate of the second mate did not match the original Philippine CoC, which was reported to the office.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency in order to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: Steering gear no.1 and 2 shaft seal are leaking oil.
description_overview: There were some minor leaks on the steering gear no.1 and 2 shaft seal.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: The bolts loosened due to the vibration.
corrective_action: During Class attendance at Port Giles on 15th April, the steering gear was operationally tested and no leak was found at the shaft seal.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The Sea Water line pipe is leaking.
description_overview: PSCO observed penetrations into several junction boxes in the engine room, including the main engine junction box #3.
immediate_causes: The excessive wear and tear is not related to routine maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Poor work planning Leak was identified after her last departure from China and maintenance was deferred to next call at disport, where vessel is expected to have a longer port stay.
corrective_action: During her port stay, the pipe line will be fabricated and replaced.
preventive_action: The training center requested to include a training course about the safety and potential risks involved due to any SW leaks.

deficiency_finding: The embarkation ladder shacks don't connect with the pad eye.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: During the sea passage, the embarkation ladder shackles were disconnected to protect the rope end from exposure to the sea, but they were not reconnected after passing through an area of heavy weather.
root_cause_analysis: Life-saving appliances and firefighting equipment were not adequately controlled.
corrective_action: The Port State Control Officer accepted the corrective action report before departure.
preventive_action: Notices will be posted in the bridge if FFE and LSA are temporarily secured.

deficiency_finding: Several instances of crew not receiving the required rest as found in the fitness for duty - work and rest hours for July and June 2022.
description_overview: It states that unless otherwise directed by Flag Administration or local regulations, hours of work or rest.
immediate_causes: The vessel could not comply with the work rest hours regulation due to operational reasons.
root_cause_analysis: The crew were still getting familiar with the company procedures and systems when they were taken under the management.
corrective_action: Crew were briefed on how to use the existing tools more efficiently in planning the work rest hours and the vessel management team advised to make every effort to keep non-compliances to minimum.
preventive_action: If Master is unable to resolve the issue, the Marine Supdt/ Fleet Cell should work with the v/l to find a solution.

deficiency_finding: The mandatory surveys need to be completed in time before the window closes.
description_overview: The Enhanced Survey Program is mandatory surveys that are not carried out on time.
immediate_causes: During the last rescue boat drill on 19th May 2023, the wire rope for the pin of the rescue boat hook got detached from the hook while trying out.
root_cause_analysis: Class NK witnessed the double bottom survey on the 10th of August.
corrective_action: Class NK witnessed a close up survey done by MCE on August 11th.
preventive_action: The master was briefed on the requirement to always have valid ship certificates.

deficiency_finding: The SLUDGE TANK'S CAPACITY was incorrect when it was transferred to the oil record book.
description_overview: The oil spill boxes were marked with their capacity and the vents with the space that they serve, but the saveall capacity was presented in barrels.
immediate_causes: Mistakenly holding tank capacity value recorded the oil record book from capacity plan instead of sludge tank capacity, overlook of the in charge of the person.
root_cause_analysis: Mistakenly holding tank capacity value recorded the oil record book from capacity plan instead of sludge tank capacity, overlook of the in charge of the person.
corrective_action: Correct recordings have been entered into the oil record book and savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay savesay
preventive_action: The international oil pollution prevention certificate was added to the first page of the oil record book.

deficiency_finding: The inspection in October was not recorded in the NAV log book.
description_overview: The abandon ship drill and fire drill were not recorded in the log book.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge forgot to record the LSA inspection entry in the deck log book.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of awareness.
corrective_action: Log entry rectified on the spot of PSCO with reference of company LSA/FFA inspection check list.
preventive_action: On a weekly basis, the master and chief officer will conduct regular inspection.

deficiency_finding: The emergency generator room has a defect.
description_overview: There is low insulation on the emergency generator.
immediate_causes: There is a shore power lead penetration cover.
root_cause_analysis: There is a shore power lead penetration cover.
corrective_action: The new cover was fabricated and put in place.
preventive_action: The deck needs to be inspected frequently.

deficiency_finding: A FOAM MONITOR GUN was found during an inspection.
description_overview: There is a slight air leak in the copper pipe fittings of pilot air valve for OWS that can only be felt by touching the pipe.
immediate_causes: The valve was old.
root_cause_analysis: The gun on the break of AccomMODATION was found to be empty at the time of inspection.
corrective_action: There were no injuries after the FOAM MONITOR VALVE was cleaned and returned.
preventive_action: All officers were reassured about the importance of regularly testing FOAM MONITORS.

deficiency_finding: VESSEL AND PORT MAINTAINING SECURITY level 2 is not required.
description_overview: There are inconsistencies between the descriptions of the IBWM certificate and the BWMP.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Various security levels were explained and the same to be emphasized during the pre-cargo meeting at each port call.
preventive_action: During the pre- cargo meeting at each port call, security measures to be followed must be discussed with the watchkeepers.

deficiency_finding: The officer in charge of water ballast water management onboard was not familiar with the BWMP.
description_overview: There is a certificate for the management of water.
immediate_causes: The treatment system wasn't working.
root_cause_analysis: After returning from vacation, the individual in charge of the BWMS aboard the company vessel had not completed the verification of all details regarding the BWMS.
corrective_action: The Master explained the differences of D1 and D2 to the Inspector.
preventive_action: This includes external training when necessary to fulfill specific duties and comply with SOLAS regulations.

deficiency_finding: The safety cover for the generator #2 H.P fuel pump isn't in place.
description_overview: The M/E SCR System was found to be working well after leaving Mobile.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of safety awareness.
corrective_action: The safety cover needs to be fixed.
preventive_action: Ensure be positioned properly with the help of the PIC and the CE.

deficiency_finding: There is an inflatable life jacket.
description_overview: Seafarers used inflatable life jackets that were not serviced as required by the manufacturer.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: New lifejackets have been put in use after inflatable lifejackets were destroyed and stored in a secure place.
preventive_action: Training was done on the importance of lock out and tag out of expired PPE.

deficiency_finding: The OWS spare filter was missing.
description_overview: The gas analyzer is malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: Lack of awareness of the importance of securing spare parts.
root_cause_analysis: There was not enough time to arrange the delivery of the spare part at the subject port, so the office made arrangements to supply the vessel at its next convenient port after Taman.
corrective_action: The captain confirmed receipt of the spare filter on the day it was delivered.
preventive_action: An extra meeting will be held to remind the crew that there is a need to replenish an item, even though the requisition for a new filter was sent to the office as soon as the spare one was used.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire drill and emergency preparation.
description_overview: An additional fire drill was conducted onboard on 9th Oct, 2022, as follow-up actions, the checking and preparation of subsequent abandon ship were made accordingly.
immediate_causes: The CSR-1 wasn't handled properly during the last CSR amendment.
root_cause_analysis: Code 10 was given to the deficiency by PSCO after the corrective actions were re-inspected and verified.
corrective_action: The rules of emergency drills and trainings for ship and shore were held by the shipmaster for chief officer and 3rd officer on October 9, 2022, to improve the knowledge.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There are multiple winches on the mooring deck and on the tension drum.
description_overview: mooring ropes were not laid correctly after berths.
immediate_causes: Minor leaks came up due to exposure.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of skill, lack of knowledge, and inadequate supervision.
corrective_action: The mooring ropes were adjusted and explained to the staff.
preventive_action: Follow up with the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The ship doesn't have an up-to-date copy of the international Aeronautical and Maritime Search and rescue manual.
description_overview: In the crew mess room, it was observed that the certificates were not pasted.
immediate_causes: The contents of the SOLAS Training Manual were not checked by the officer in charge.
root_cause_analysis: The 2/0 neglected to apply the new version of the international Aeronautical and Maritime Search and rescue manual.
corrective_action: The 2/O applied the new version immediately.
preventive_action: The Captain told the 2/O to be careful to check the publications and to always keep the publications up to date.

deficiency_finding: The smell and decomposing of garbage can be seen.
description_overview: Garbage storage on board is excessive and the same is pending.
immediate_causes: Poor planning of garbage disposal resulted in below-standard order.
root_cause_analysis: Garbage was accumulated despite the vessel following good waste management procedures.
corrective_action: The balance of garbage was discharged after the inspection.
preventive_action: In order for arrangements to be made at a suitable port, garbage disposal needs to be coordinated with the Company Operations Department in advance of long voyages.

deficiency_finding: The valves should be reset after the test.
description_overview: Key shipboard operations should include procedures, plans and instructions for the safety of the personnel, ship and protection of the environment.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
corrective_action: An internal audit will be arranged before re-visiting a US port in order to ensure the proper closing of the deficiency.
preventive_action: In order to ensure the proper closing of the deficiency no.1 & 2, an additional internal audit will be arranged before re-visiting a US port.

deficiency_finding: The low platform rail is not fixed properly.
description_overview: Inspector's opinion says one stanchion is missing.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human performance difficulty - team performance
corrective_action: Crew members added one more stanchion to the deck.
preventive_action: On board meeting held by Chief Officer with Deck crew members in order to stress and direct crew members in proper way of gangway rigging as per Safe working practices.

deficiency_finding: The X-Band Radar wasn't working at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The record book of engine parameters did not record the replacement of fuel valve nozzles for G/E and M/E.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The X band radar was out of order on the way to Japan.
corrective_action: Report to Class and Flag, relevant safety measures put in place for safety navigation, pre-arrival and departure report to VTS and relevant port authority.
preventive_action: Keep necessary spare parts onboard which can be shared with other vessels.

deficiency_finding: There are dirty oil and rags in the engine room.
description_overview: The PSC team found oily rags in the engine room.
immediate_causes: The garbage drums were not secured by the engine staff.
root_cause_analysis: The crew failed to clean up the area after the work was done.
corrective_action: Clean the workshop and work site.
preventive_action: Clean up and organize tools in time after work is completed, as well as strengthen crew training.

deficiency_finding: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
description_overview: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge failed to inspect the exhaust gas pipe.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't check the engine exhaust gas pipe in the lifeboat because of Marker's manual.
corrective_action: After repairing exhaust gas pipe, engines in lifeboat are tested and no leaks are found.
preventive_action: All equipment should be inspected by an experienced engineer.

deficiency_finding: There was an eye wash station in the chemical store.
description_overview: The due date is June 20.
immediate_causes: Maintenance and inspection are improper.
root_cause_analysis: The responsible personnel are not fully implementing the requirement of company's SMS Procedure.
corrective_action: The position of EYE WASH CHEMICAL was correct after the ship's engineer renewed it.
preventive_action: The instructions for shipboard medical apparatus and medicines and the responsible personnel are fully implemented by the master request.

deficiency_finding: The structural fire protection of the bulkhead is compromised by the bridge air conditioning unit penetrating through it.
description_overview: The inspector believes that the marking does not comply with the requirements of SOLAS XI-1/3.
immediate_causes: The bridge communication unit was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: Procedure was not followed.
corrective_action: There is an issue of NCR O-20240416/002.
preventive_action: Deficiency was sent via e-mail to all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: Some supports and brackets for cargo associated piping were found to be corroded.
description_overview: Problematic areas were put into priority by the on board deck maintenance program.
immediate_causes: Other.
root_cause_analysis: There is objective evidence of the same and it was raised as a deficiency due to lack of time.
corrective_action: The weekly reporting program includes photos of the overall appearance, critical points and progress of rectification.
preventive_action: The weekly reporting program includes photos of the overall appearance, critical points and progress of rectification.

deficiency_finding: The cargo tanks should be protected by a fixed inert gas system in accordance with the requirements of the fire safety systems code.
description_overview: This fix gas detection system serves to detect atmosphere in ballast tanks, void spaces, steering gear, and IGG room.
immediate_causes: As per their advice, interim repairs were carried out pending renewal of the entire combustion chamber.
root_cause_analysis: Since the repairs were carried out by the equipment manufacturer's approved workshop, class notification for the repairs was not required.
corrective_action: The repairs were carried out according to the approved procedures from the equipment manufacturer.
preventive_action: The lesson learnt from the inspection has been shared with the fleet.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence to show that the enclosed space entry drill records complied with the SOLAS requirements.
description_overview: The drill was for Steering gear failure.
immediate_causes: The space drill report was immediately corrected.
root_cause_analysis: The record keeping was not adequate.
corrective_action: After the deficiency was raised, a training for the crew for the enclosed space rescue was carried out and the initial drill record was updated to reflect the actions taken.
preventive_action: The Master was instructed to discuss this matter at the next safety meeting to analyze the risks and consequences of this omission.

deficiency_finding: The company's address and place on the survey were incorrect.
description_overview: Only for information.
immediate_causes: On endorsement of annual verification, PSC decided not to write 'R.O.C.' as a country on the DOC company address.
root_cause_analysis: Not applicable.
corrective_action: The address and endorsement on DOC were requested by the company.
preventive_action: The company decided to change the address in order to prevent arguments of China PSC in the future.

deficiency_finding: The position fixing intervals are not as per the plan.
description_overview: The same devices observed for 3 MSW cooling pumps and function is not confirmed.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to record rest hours.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: The passage plan was reviewed and approved by the master.
preventive_action: This observation has been shared with other vessels.

deficiency_finding: The latest version of the manual is not available.
description_overview: The code is old edition.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear are consequences of material fatigue.
root_cause_analysis: The defect was issued in Japan on 6/15 and has not been closed in the computer system.
corrective_action: The Iamsar MANUAL VOL III is available on board and can be changed to code 10.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is a new edition of the list of coast stations and special service stations.
description_overview: It is not required for the publication to be carried on board.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The PSC officer noticed that ITU List IV was the previous edition and not the latest one.
corrective_action: Immediate corrective actions need to be taken.
preventive_action: There is a deficiency among the fleet for the Masters' reference.

deficiency_finding: Stbrd's quick closing valve was found to be nonfunctional at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The vessel has a quick closing valve system.
immediate_causes: The control unit 1 actuates LSFO storage port and LSFO storage starboard tanks' quick closing valves.
root_cause_analysis: The LSFO storage starboard tank's quick closing valve was working without any problems, despite the fact that this was explained to the PSC officer.
corrective_action: The quick closing valve system was found to be working properly by the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The quick closing valves and their control units are in good condition.

deficiency_finding: The application expired after 3 months and a new one was issued for the next 3 months.
description_overview: The original certificate was received by the manning agent.
immediate_causes: Original documents are not available onboard if the specified requirement is not fulfilled.
root_cause_analysis: The photocopy of the application for flag endorsement was available onboard.
corrective_action: The Management office sent the original hard copies to the vessel.
preventive_action: If any of the original certificates are not available, the manager told the master to report to office immediately.

deficiency_finding: While not maintaining proper lookout, there are reset buttons located in position where the system can be reset.
description_overview: There is a reset button in the chart room.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency lies in the Human Factor / Situations Awareness during installation.
corrective_action: The radio tables were disconnected from the system and verified by class after the buttons at the chart were reset.
preventive_action: An extra ordinary safety committee meeting was held and all deficiencies were discussed under the supervision of the master.

deficiency_finding: CO2 pipes, FW pipes, cable pipes, Bunker pipes and valves are all corroded in several places.
description_overview: The pilot ladder was parted and the ship side railing was damaged.
immediate_causes: NIL.
root_cause_analysis: The crew identified the need for maintenance before the plan was put in place.
corrective_action: The PSC inspector's findings were added to the plan.
preventive_action: The crew must inform the Company if they can't cover certain areas.

deficiency_finding: The irrigation system of the BoSUN store is dependent on the remote control.
description_overview: The system isn't ready for use.
immediate_causes: The indicator light broke and wasn't promptly monitored.
root_cause_analysis: There are inadequate tools and equipment.
corrective_action: The indicator light was replaced.
preventive_action: The weekly lamp test was not adequate.

deficiency_finding: There was a fire in the paint locker.
description_overview: The limit switches for each door from bridge to navigation locker and stairway, which are installed to avoid obstructing vision of bridge watch by lighting from other places, were not moving smoothly during inspection.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: The water spray system in the paint locker was dirty and had water SCAL.
corrective_action: There was a fire in the water spray system.
preventive_action: To be familiar with the company's self-responsibility and to improve the work standard.

deficiency_finding: There is a quick-closing valve for the generator oil inlet.
description_overview: There is a quick-closing valve for the generator oil inlet.
immediate_causes: The NO.3 G/E quik was not active when tested.
root_cause_analysis: Self check and maintenance was not done by the crew.
corrective_action: The contact joint was renewed.
preventive_action: Crew will make self-check and maintenance a priority.

deficiency_finding: A crew member couldn't understand Spanish and most other crew members couldn't understand English.
description_overview: The Deck Log Book was printed in English for Bridge-to-Bridge / Bridge-to-Shore communications, but the PSCO wanted it to be handwritten.
immediate_causes: Poor housekeeping/order is a result of failure to follow procedures.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient supervision, inadequate communication, and lack of competence.
corrective_action: The work language was changed to English and Spanish so that all crew members could read and understand the ISM and the manual.
preventive_action: The noted items were discussed and analyzed by the Master's supervision with the participation of Deck, Engine officers and ratings during the extraordinary Safety Committee Meeting which was carried out after the inspection.

deficiency_finding: The person who is responsible for the maintenance of LSA equipment is not on the muster list.
description_overview: The water system alarm is off permanently.
immediate_causes: Liaise with the company to get the fire-maintenance program for the fire doors.
root_cause_analysis: The responsible for the maintenance of the LSA and FFE should be placed in the rank of master.
corrective_action: Renark will be discussed in the next safety meeting.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The galley room is dirty.
description_overview: Vegetables in the freezer room were rotten.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: There wasn't enough checking by the chief cook.
corrective_action: The galley room is being cleaned by the crew.
preventive_action: The Chief officer must check the galley room on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: There are fire doors in fire-resiling divisions that aren't CLOSING PROPERLY.
description_overview: The galley fire door was fixed to make it easier to get to it.
immediate_causes: There are immediate causes of substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: There are basic causes and system factors.
corrective_action: Carefully adjust the self-closing device on the fire door.
preventive_action: All fire doors should be in good working order at all times.

deficiency_finding: The escape ladder of the elevator has emergency lights on it.
description_overview: The escape ladder of the elevator has emergency lights on it.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the deficiency is the substandard condition of tools, equipment or materials, but inadequate parts substitution and inadequate inspection method have been identified as the factors that led to the deficiency's.
root_cause_analysis: Emergency lighting system is being inspected on a weekly basis and prior arrival at each port in order to verify adequate illumination within the various spaces.
corrective_action: The PSCO requested that emergency lights be replaced on the spot by new spare parts available onboard.
preventive_action: The Electrician has been advised to conduct an additional / quick check upon engine manoeuvring completion during mooring operations in order to identify any defects due to the occurred vibration.

deficiency_finding: Calibration gas equipment is not available on board.
description_overview: According to the flag state approved action plan, to be repaired.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the schedule.
root_cause_analysis: The crew can't perform gas detector calibration due to equipment not available on board.
corrective_action: Gas detector and equipment were requested.
preventive_action: If the vessel doesn't have equipment for calibrating the gas detector, it must send it to shore.

deficiency_finding: The display of the vessel JESSICA B was found to be malfunctioning and requires repairs.
description_overview: The second deck canopy seat was damaged and not in place.
immediate_causes: Incorrect navigation or ship handling would not be understood with a faulty display of SAT-c.
root_cause_analysis: Bridge team would not be able to read SAT-c messages due to improper motivation.
corrective_action: During class attendance, a test was performed for the replacement of equipment.
preventive_action: Training for the bridge team is done.

deficiency_finding: The sludge return hose and the dosage filling tube for the sewage treatment plant did not show any flow during the inspection.
description_overview: There is a sewage treatment plant.
immediate_causes: The sewage treatment plant was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance and supervision.
corrective_action: The sewage treatment plant is being maintained as per the vessel's planned maintenance system and in-line with the Company's Technical operations manual.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer was briefed by the engine room staff.

deficiency_finding: The SOLAS requirements for maximum walking distance from any point to the nearest portable fire extinguishers are not complied with by the fire extinguisher arrangement for engine room.
description_overview: One two-way vhf radiotelphone apparatus is missing.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: As per SOLAS requirements, additional fire extinguishers must be placed in the ER.
preventive_action: The Crew was told to check the location of LSA/FFA items in ER in order to fulfill regulatory requirements.

deficiency_finding: There was an estimated volume discharged of water in the anchorage on 26 and 27 October.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: DirectCauses - Unsafe Acts/ Unsafe conditions: failure to follow R&R/ SSP, failure to secure, inadequate guards & barriers, indirect causes
root_cause_analysis: The volume of water discharged wasn't properly recorded.
corrective_action: The Ballast Water Management Record has a corrective recording on it.
preventive_action: Training was done to make crew familiar with the requirement and record it on the record.

deficiency_finding: The safety net was broken.
description_overview: When the engine was stopped, the Rpm indicator was stuck on 35rpm and did not come back to zero.
immediate_causes: The gangway net was damaged when the crew tried to shift the gangway to allow the crane's movement and adjust the height of the gangway for the tidal change during the port stay.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not have situational awareness while handling the gangway net.
corrective_action: The crew was able to repair the net to the satisfaction of the PSCO.
preventive_action: The Master has conducted a detailed training session with the onboard crew considering the findings of the inspection with the focus on:

deficiency_finding: Between E/R and Str. R. is the location of cable penetration on Bulkhead and Deck.
description_overview: There is an electric cable that connects the Minoans to the MGPS that was damaged.
immediate_causes: Compliance with performance standard was inadequate.
root_cause_analysis: There are some small gaps on cable penetrations.
corrective_action: The PSC officers verified the deficiency as closed by applying special cement to the small gaps on the cable.
preventive_action: The thorough inspection of all cable penetrations was included in the safety campaign performed on all company's vessels.

deficiency_finding: There were cracks in the steps of the ACCOMMODATION LADDER.
description_overview: Garbage bins for food waste were found in the fish room.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer had already identified the defects and planned maintenance work was postponed for a more convenient time because of weather issues.
corrective_action: After leaving from Qingdao, there was an abnormality above.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was reminded of the importance of scheduling maintenance work at an earlier stage.

deficiency_finding: Boiler fuel pipes and water level drums are not insulated.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: The responsible crew is required to check the overall condition of the pipework during the monthly inspections of the boilers.
corrective_action: The insulation around the fuel pipes was installed by the engine crew.
preventive_action: During the next monthly safety meeting, the Master was instructed to emphasize the need of carrying out effective inspections and enhancing crew's supervision during the periodic inspections/checks as well as reporting any identified defects.

deficiency_finding: The emergency generator room has low insulation.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator room had low insulation found on the panel.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are job factors, system factors, and inadequate maintenance factors.
corrective_action: Look for the source of low insulation.
preventive_action: Findings will be shared with the entire fleet in order to prevent future occurrences.

deficiency_finding: There are spots of rust on the main deck.
description_overview: The SOLAS Ch XI-1, Rg 7 Atmosphere testing instrument for enclosed spaces does not have a gas detector onboard.
immediate_causes: Substandard conditions are acts.
root_cause_analysis: The maintenance on deck is continuous and reported to the office on a daily basis.
corrective_action: Taking into account the vessel's trading area and the weather conditions, maintenance is expected to be completed by the end of July.
preventive_action: The company's relevant departments keep a close watch on the maintenance on the subject vessel.

deficiency_finding: Four of eight washers were missing.
description_overview: During the PSC Inspection at Yokkaichi PSC Officer Maeda Takuma imposed a deficiency.
immediate_causes: The ship safety officer did not report the deficiency.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge of international shore connection inspection did not notice that 4 of 8 washers were missing.
corrective_action: The officer in charge was asked to make missing washers available.
preventive_action: An additional meeting and training held by Master with all crew during which it was discussed the importance of proper and effective checks to be carried out to firefighting equipment.

deficiency_finding: The following stages are not functioning.
description_overview: The echo sounder was working well and was shown to PSCO.
immediate_causes: The system was moved to the local stand.
root_cause_analysis: The routine working of 2/0 was not supervised by the C/O.
corrective_action: The test was found in good condition after the function repair.
preventive_action: C/O and CAPTAIN will keep an eye on the routine.

deficiency_finding: There is evidence that hatch covers aren't weather tight.
description_overview: The over compression of Hatch cover rubber packing has been identified by crew, however on 13 May 20th, all hatch covers have undergone hose test by deck crew with satisfactory results, thus replacement of rubber packing is not an immediate need.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The chalk and hose test was carried out with satisfactory results.
corrective_action: Hatch cover rubber packing that is more than allowable limited by the Hatch Cover Maker are to be renewed as per the instructions of the Hatch Cover Manual 'TTS' and tested to satisfaction of the attending surveyor.
preventive_action: If compression is more than the maximum allowed by the manufacturer, rubber packing, in a length of no less than 1.5 meters, should be used.

deficiency_finding: When the flap for the CO2 fire extinguishing system was opened, the alarm didn't sound.
description_overview: The alarm system for CO2 Fire Extinguishing system for the main engine of the air space is not fitted to the vessel.
immediate_causes: The Scrubber was out of order and the vessel was on MGO.
root_cause_analysis: The alarm system for CO2 Fire Extinguishing system for the main engine of the air space is not fitted to the vessel.
corrective_action: The vessel does not have a CO2 release alarm for the fire extinguishing system.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer should be aware of the requirements with regards to the CO2 release alarm for the fire extinguishing system for the main engine.

deficiency_finding: The format of the record book is not in compliance.
description_overview: Code 17 deals with deficiency prior to departure.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel is currently using BW Record Book which is intended to use for both Methods (D1 & D2), however attending PSC officer opined to use BW form as per Class approved Ballast Water Management Plan.
corrective_action: The records for the last two months were updated by the ship staff.
preventive_action: Changes to the format of the BW record Book will be necessary in order to have well defined records for the D-1 and D-2 method when carried out by the Vessel.

deficiency_finding: The Forecastle store has a fan.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: The old gingham net was replaced with a new one.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance was identified as one of the reasons for the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: The deficiency was verified by the inspectors.
preventive_action: Managers' SMS procedures were followed whenciency was discussed during the next Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is a sink in the crew laundry that has a missing tap.
description_overview: The sink and faucet are in poor condition.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given to the company.
root_cause_analysis: After the inspection, the crew laundry heater drying room and the missing tap / switch were renewed, as applicable.
corrective_action: During the Monthly Safety Committee Meeting, the deficiency was brought to the attention of the entire fleet.
preventive_action: During the Monthly Safety Committee Meeting, the deficiency was brought to the attention of the entire fleet.

deficiency_finding: The engine control room panel has a fault alarm on it.
description_overview: The load line marks were not visible to the public.
immediate_causes: The crew were not familiar with the stripping procedure of the tanks.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge of working principle of machinery is an inadequate assessment of preventive maintenance needs.
corrective_action: The fault was fixed by the technician.
preventive_action: The data will be added to the data base of the vessels in our fleet.

deficiency_finding: There are occupational safety and health policies on the ship.
description_overview: Material safety data sheets are missing.
immediate_causes: The glycol was kept in the store.
root_cause_analysis: The chemicals are not stored in the Deck houses.
corrective_action: The steering gear room is where the chemicals are stored and the relevant MSDS was shown to the PSCO before he disembarked from the vessel.
preventive_action: Under section 2 - 'Work Environment' item 7 was amended to include the inspection of chemicals along with other flammable liquids that are not stored in deck houses and machinery spaces.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has a space fire door.
description_overview: The insulation on the fire door of the purifier room was damaged.
immediate_causes: The fire door insulation is poor.
root_cause_analysis: Poor standards.
corrective_action: The master ordered the insulation material and connected it to the ship.
preventive_action: The condition of the insulation on the fire doors is verified and observed in good condition.

deficiency_finding: It was not possible for Vessel to implement cyber risk management.
description_overview: Instructions and procedures to ensure safe operation of ships should be included in every company's safety management system.
immediate_causes: The officer forgot to put the blocker back in ECDIS as he was rushing to finish the plan.
root_cause_analysis: Master and Navigating Officer didn't know that a password should be kept in computers.
corrective_action: The deleted file 'Computer Credentials' is kept in Master's custody.
preventive_action: Master's weekly verification and before arrival port that cyber security management is being maintained.

deficiency_finding: The bridge deck has cable penetrations in it.
description_overview: Code 10.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The safety officer missed to identify the shortcoming.
corrective_action: The penetrations closed to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The Monthly Alert Bulletin will be sent to all fleet vessels with instructions to verify compliance.

deficiency_finding: TheABILITY INFORMATION BOOKLET MANUAL IS NOT APPROVED BY ADMINISTRATION
description_overview: The cold room temperature is cold.
immediate_causes: The Stability Manual was approved by the classification society.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge for the approval procedure of the Stability Manual is one of the basic causes of a job.
corrective_action: Under the authority of the Government of the Republic of Singapore, seek approval from the Classification Society.
preventive_action: The captain should strengthen the management of statutory certificates and the company will request all fleet vessels to inspect Stability manual/Loading Manual to avoid this defect.

deficiency_finding: There were instances of violation of requirements for minimum hours of rest during the months of January and February.
description_overview: Identified and recorded broken rules were related to Master's and Chief Engineer's extra occupation during vessel's pilotage.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency was caused by a type error at the time of completion.
corrective_action: The training for the officers who are responsible for the completion of the work and rest hours was carried out by the Marine Supremo.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer and the 2nd Engineer were warned about the proper implementation of the working arrangement.

deficiency_finding: The company should establish procedure to ensure that the ship is maintained in accordance with the provisions of the relevant rules and regulations and with any additional requirements which may be established.
description_overview: Instructions and procedures to ensure safe operation of ships should be included in every company's safety management system.
immediate_causes: It failed to implement cyber risk management.
root_cause_analysis: Not applying the standard that is appropriate for cyber risk management.
corrective_action: There is a ship's office PC.
preventive_action: To establish procedures to ensure that the ship is maintained in accordance with the provisions of the relevant rules and regulations when coming to the USA.

deficiency_finding: Decontamination showers and an eyewash are not working and have insufficient pressure.
description_overview: There are two showers and an eyewash on the vessel.
immediate_causes: Decontamination shower and eye wash pressure have been reduced because of dirt particles on the filter.
root_cause_analysis: There are two showers on the deck and fixed piping leading to them.
corrective_action: The staff of the ship observed good pressure on the shower and eye wash.
preventive_action: A detailed case study will be included in the safety bulletin.

deficiency_finding: When the mic is used to make an announcement, GA does not cut-out.
description_overview: The engine room has many floor plates that are not secured with screws.
immediate_causes: An internal audit is planned for the earliest port.
root_cause_analysis: The type of equipment allows only manual handling of GA, thus need to be manually interrupted when using the PA system.
corrective_action: It needs to be dealt with during dry dock.
preventive_action: The deficiency was reported to all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The work and rest schedule of engine room personnel are not reflected in the table of shipboard working arrangement poster.
description_overview: The table of shipboard working arrangement poster does not reflect the actual work and rest schedule of engine room personnel.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: 2E only arrange the normal working arrangement when he prepares the working arrangement plan.
corrective_action: The table of shipboard working arrangements was updated by the captain and accepted by the PSC officer.
preventive_action: If there is any findings, he must report to office and conduct training immediately to ensure all crews are competent.

deficiency_finding: Not required: record of drills and steering tests.
description_overview: The emergency steering drill procedure was not followed.
immediate_causes: Lack of training is one of the human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient training repetition is one of the factors.
corrective_action: An emergency steering drill was performed with the crew using both methods.
preventive_action: Instructions for the operation in emergency are posted on the bridge and steering gear room, and communication between the bridge and steering gear room is established.

deficiency_finding: There were marks on the starboard side of the boat.
description_overview: The forward forecastle doors are weathertight.
immediate_causes: Using faulty equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Already faded.
corrective_action: The picture was taken and repainted before being shown to PSCO.
preventive_action: If there is a faded repaint, it's time to check the markings.

deficiency_finding: There is a certificate of financial security relating to shipowners' liability.
description_overview: Firefighting outfits on board are fire proximity suits type and may not provide the wearer sufficient thermal protection from radiated heat if entering an enclosed space including machinery and accommodation spaces where a fire is established.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human Cause - Failure to follow procedure.
corrective_action: The crew replaced the latest copy of the certificate immediately.
preventive_action: Fleet messages are sent to all vessels to make sure they are in compliance.

deficiency_finding: The control valve panel is not lit.
description_overview: The system isn't ready for use.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The control valve panel was unlit during the inspection due to loosened terminal connections.
corrective_action: The closing pressure switch PS1 has connections that need to be tightened.
preventive_action: Regular checks by Responsible officer.

deficiency_finding: The SOLAS training manual is not ship specific.
description_overview: The officer accompanying him showed the hyper mist system operation procedure as per the procedure.
immediate_causes: The contents of the SOLAS Training Manual were not checked by the officer in charge.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient compliance to SOLAS.
corrective_action: The SOLAS Training manual was reviewed and changed to be ship specific.
preventive_action: Regular review of the SOLAS Training manual to make sure that the existing SOLAS LSA/FFA is ship specific.

deficiency_finding: VESSEL AND PORT MAINTAINING SECURITY level 2 is not required.
description_overview: There are inconsistencies between the descriptions of the IBWM certificate and the BWMP.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Various security levels were explained and the same to be emphasized during the pre-cargo meeting at each port call.
preventive_action: During the pre- cargo meeting at each port call, security measures to be followed must be discussed with the watchkeepers.

deficiency_finding: The engine room sea chest valve is not in a contrasting colour.
description_overview: The lower platform of Gangway was marked with the maximum load and maximum angle of Inclination.
immediate_causes: The crew members were aware that the sea chest valves were not marked with a contrasting color during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect marking.
corrective_action: The valves with open/closing markings are inspected and marked with contrasting colors for easy identification.
preventive_action: The observation has been included into company database from where repeat and significant observations are selected for inclusion in periodic circulation of repeat observation.

deficiency_finding: There is a radio log.
description_overview: The GMDSS log book is not complete.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Master briefed 3/O on updating Radio Log.
preventive_action: Master will check the Arrival Port Checklist D/03 to make sure required books and documents are up to date.

deficiency_finding: The ship identification number is not marked permanently.
description_overview: The ship identification number is not marked permanently.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: In front of the entrance of the ER space, a steel plate was attached to the frames to permanently mark the ship's IMO Number.
corrective_action: The vessel's class society requested to attend the vessel and verify that the position meet requirements.
preventive_action: As a lesson learnt and sharing of information the following actions were performed:

deficiency_finding: The calculation in the voyage plan does not account for the safety depth of the ECDIS.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with industry rules.
root_cause_analysis: The safety depth of the ECDIS is not set correctly as per the calculation in the voyage plan.
corrective_action: The navigation officer was asked to update safety settings.
preventive_action: Master spoke to the crew about the importance of updating ECDIS settings based on voyage planning and UKC calculation.

deficiency_finding: Bitts wrongly used as guide-roller are dangerous mooring arrangemnet.
description_overview: Mooring-ropes are not used for bollards.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: According to the company's procedures, the mooring line should not be wrapped around the drum, and the P.I.Cs were not familiar with how to use the f'cle and poop winches to ensure crew safety and prevent equipment accidents.
corrective_action: The mooring line on the warping drum and the mooring line on the bitts were moved immediately.
preventive_action: The mooring line is secured to the bollard.
