deficiency_finding: There is a mistake on item 3.2.3 of the IOPP Certificate Supplement.
description_overview: The gross tonnage record in the comply test report for LRIT is incorrect.
immediate_causes: On endorsement of annual verification, PSC decided not to write 'R.O.C.' as a country on the DOC company address.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient inspection of the ship certificate is incorrect on the Form A of IOPP certificate.
corrective_action: The statement on Form A of IOPP certificate was corrected by the ship class.
preventive_action: This deficiency will be shared to all fleet vessels and request the PICs to cross check and avoid similar case onboard.

deficiency_finding: Not required: ISM.
description_overview: The ISM system needs to be corrected within 3 months.
immediate_causes: Deficiency marked ISM is an objective evidence of a failure or lack of effectiveness of the implementation of the ISM Code.
root_cause_analysis: Shore management failure is a management factor.
corrective_action: The necessary assistance and actions will be provided by the deputy DPA, flag and RO.
preventive_action: Within 3 months, an additional internal audit will be carried out.

deficiency_finding: The draft marks were altered.
description_overview: The starboard Bow draft mark was faded and not clearly visible.
immediate_causes: Mission not provided by the port.
root_cause_analysis: Improper attempt to avoid pain.
corrective_action: The master was told to take permission to paint the draft when it is slightly faded and to check the marks at every port.
preventive_action: The status of theciency was closed on the completion date.

deficiency_finding: The battery charge was off at the test.
description_overview: The battery charge was off at the test.
immediate_causes: The issue was fixed in the presence of the PSC Officer and endorsed before leaving the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: The ship crew didn't realize that the GMDSS battery couldn't drop less than 24v during the test period.
corrective_action: The TAYLOR MARINE DEEP SEA SERVICE approved by class should be arranged to board repairing.
preventive_action: Crew was trained to follow ISM SI 100101 and SPR 1002-01 strictly.

deficiency_finding: Maintenance is needed for theCover,Hatchways portside.
description_overview: Steering gear has oil leaks.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: The responsible personnel onboard don't fully implement the periodically inspection and maintenance regulations.
corrective_action: Master will conduct familiarization to include: "SOM 1001-06 The Stipulation for Ship Route Maintenance" and "SPM-1001 Procedure for Maintenance of Ship and Equipment".
preventive_action: It is the responsibility of the ship Master and the Ch/Off to ensure daily maintenance of deficiency equipment.

deficiency_finding: BWMS barrels with hazardous substances on the funnel deck are not properly stored and lashed.
description_overview: Oil pollution discharge reported by the vessel and there are apparent oil substance remaining onboard and the hull of the vessel are suspected of being a discharge violation.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Master and his crew lack of safety awareness on handling hazardous substances that can cause pollution when not properly secured and stored.
corrective_action: Transfer the drums to a store that has proper storage and lashed them.
preventive_action: Carry out education on all crew to make sure the drums with hazardous substance are locked up.

deficiency_finding: A cold room with rotten fruit.
description_overview: A vegetable cold room with rotten fruit was found.
immediate_causes: There is a risk of crew health if rotten fruit is found in the vegetable room.
root_cause_analysis: The person in charge failed to properly inspect the stock of food inside the vegetable rooms and overlooked the presence of rotten fruit.
corrective_action: To ensure health crew protection, a safety meeting was held to educate all crew members to prioritize the thorough inspection of all stock items and maintain high standards of hygiene and food safety.
preventive_action: The company encourages a culture of accountability and responsibility for maintaining orderliness throughout the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The steering gear room is not under security.
description_overview: The action code is 17/10/2018.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The door to switch on the power of the pump was accidentally left open by the crew member.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire damper in the engine room.
description_overview: There is a fire damper in the engine room.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The damper's closing was verified prior to arrival as part of the PSC preparation checks.
corrective_action: The new spare hose was found in order.
preventive_action: The weekly inspection has to be carried out by the senior management and during the inspection where all parts, linkages etc must also be closely inspected for wear and tear.

deficiency_finding: A BUTTERFLY NUT IS ON THE HATCHWAY COVER.
description_overview: The Hatch of E/R Sky lack of two nuts, the Access cover of S/G RM lack of three nuts, and the Access cover of Rope store lack of two nuts.
immediate_causes: Ladders for liferaft are due for a shore strength test.
root_cause_analysis: The steering gear room hatchway is located on the poop deck and butterfly nuts were closed to prevent water from entering the steering flat as the vessel was on a long sea voyage.
corrective_action: The butterfly nut was slackened and properly operated in the presence of the inspector.
preventive_action: To ensure that the securing arrangements are maintained in good order, the ship staff was trained to ensure that they are regularly operated.

deficiency_finding: The crew was unfamiliar with the operation of oily water separator and its oil content monitoring system.
description_overview: The crew couldn't say anything to the inspector because there weren't any valves on the diagram.
immediate_causes: The crew did not know about the 2 valves pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: nil
corrective_action: Training was done for all engine crew on the operation of oily water separator.
preventive_action: Crew to participate in weekly testing and operation of oily water separator.

deficiency_finding: There is a self-closing valve between the oil level glass gauge and the M/E L.O.S.T.
description_overview: The deficiency was closed by the PSC Inspector.
immediate_causes: The crewmember failed to comply with procedures.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of situational awareness.
corrective_action: The crew will be reminded that the self-closing valve should not be kept open with the use of clamping devices.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: No.1 cargo holds the alarm detector out of order.
description_overview: Before departure, to be corrected.
immediate_causes: The copper concentrate can cause the false alarm.
root_cause_analysis: The empty cargo hold condition was identified and reported.
corrective_action: The old sensor was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: Share information with the fleet to make sure it doesn't happen again.

deficiency_finding: Fire protection is lacking.
description_overview: The insulation material of the FO drain tank is broken.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: The Master and Chief Engineer were unable to provide evidence of using the UMS system in the Engine Room.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: The hours were restored July and August.
root_cause_analysis: The records did not show that UMS had been implemented.
corrective_action: The bridge duty officer was informed of the start of the UMS Period.
preventive_action: To show the in charge personnel from the beginning of the period to the end.

deficiency_finding: There is one light on the open deck.
description_overview: There is a navigation.
immediate_causes: An internal audit is planned for the earliest port.
root_cause_analysis: The person in charge didn't check the working condition of the light on the deck.
corrective_action: Check the lamp's working condition by changing it.
preventive_action: If there is an abnormal working condition, try to find the reason and change the bulb or repair it in time.

deficiency_finding: The rescue boat area has an emergency projector light on it.
description_overview: One of the lights in the cable duct space was unlit, but the light was immediately renewed and shown to PSCO.
immediate_causes: Lack of distribution of standard.
root_cause_analysis: The light was malfunctioning during the last weekly inspection per company procedures, but the bulb burst.
corrective_action: There was an emergency light on the rescue boat area.
preventive_action: The company shared the monthly overview with the fleet.

deficiency_finding: There are additional spaces in the sleeping room.
description_overview: Due to the joining crew, the cabin was devoid of bed sheets.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient assessment of needs and risks is one of the substandard acts.
corrective_action: Fresh bed lining will be provided for each crew.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: packaging of dangerous goods
description_overview: The engine room has a chemical/oil store.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient performance.
corrective_action: Engineers were told to organize this immediately.
preventive_action: There is a new procedure for chemical storage.

deficiency_finding: PSCO observed damaged lagging on the F.O.
description_overview: The electronic water level sensor is not insulated.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: The insulation cloth of M/E F.O. sytem has not been inspected.
corrective_action: Both M/E return lines have lagging insulation.
preventive_action: Chief Engineer instructed all engineer officers and engine ratings on engine room watch to ensure that all surfaces with high temperature should be inspected regularly at each watch and that they are properly insulated to prevent fire in case they are hit by fuel oil leaks.

deficiency_finding: Evaluation of crew performance in fire drills.
description_overview: The initial fire drill did not demonstrate adequate familiarity.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Crew did not follow company procedures.
corrective_action: At the 2nd attempt in front of PSC inspectors, all crew briefed the same time and carried out the fire drill.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be shared with all fleet vessels to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: There is a light on the boat deck.
description_overview: There is a light on the boat deck.
immediate_causes: There was a broken light bulb on the boat deck.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance was indicated by the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: Deficiency was noted and action taken.
preventive_action: On 18 August, extraordinary refresh training on general maintenance requirements / condition of deck lights was carried out.

deficiency_finding: The second efficient painter is not available in the lifeboat, the heat exchanger is partly covered by paint.
description_overview: The painter release device has been fixed.
immediate_causes: Didn't carry out inspection and grease.
root_cause_analysis: There were insufficient inspection and maintenance and insufficient monitoring and supervision.
corrective_action: Training on the inspection and maintenance requirement for all related crew is required.
preventive_action: The preventive action was discussed with the ship master and should be shared with all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: Many visitors overlook to check their ID cards when boarding the gangway watch.
description_overview: The problem was not reported to the office because people weren't using the Officer TV Room.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Substandard procedures or instructions can be kept in a record.
corrective_action: SEC-01 will be filed according to the security filing system.
preventive_action: The SEC -15 was received by message.

deficiency_finding: The ship's structutal integrity may have been compromised as a result of the collision.
description_overview: The company policy is to maintain the vessel in its highest standards.
immediate_causes: The lever in the meat room was damaged when one of my crew accidentally hit it.
root_cause_analysis: There was a collision with Hong Hai 189.
corrective_action: Repairs to the satisfaction of the class have been carried out.
preventive_action: The damaged areas will be repaired within the deadline provided by the class.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency generator room.
description_overview: The operation was not tested correctly by the PIC 2/E.
immediate_causes: There has been a sudden failure of communication equipment/switch which burn on date of inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Conflicting policy.
corrective_action: The new switch has been put in place.
preventive_action: The 2nd engineer will carry out additional testing and more frequently inspection of communication equipment.

deficiency_finding: The sewer holding tank in the engine room is not stated in the report.
description_overview: The holding tank's capacity is different with the certificate.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: In reference to the previous PSC inspection, the ISPP was amended, however a clarification as to why Holding tk is not included in the certificate is required by the PSC inspector.
corrective_action: As part of the investigation required by PSC, a class was contacted.
preventive_action: A copy of the statement issued by Class ABS is filed with the ISPP certificate.

deficiency_finding: Steering gear was found to be creeping continuously to the starboard side, even when the order was midship position.
description_overview: Steering gear alarms are activated in the same time at the steering gear control panel.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: The steering gear was overhauled by approved makers service engineers during a drydocking period in June of 2023, and after completion the steering gear was operating in normal condition.
corrective_action: There was a slip of the rudder in the local mode according to their advice.
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: The water meeter has a low temperature.
description_overview: The echo sounder was working well and was shown to PSCO.
immediate_causes: The system was moved to the local stand.
root_cause_analysis: The management is negligent in periodic inspection.
corrective_action: Immediately replace the pressure gauge and the deficiency was closed the same day.
preventive_action: The procedure for maintenance of important machinery and equipment was improved.

deficiency_finding: The port side navigation wing's RPM indicator is not adjusted properly.
description_overview: When the engine was stopped, the Rpm indicator was stuck on 35rpm and did not come back to zero.
immediate_causes: The gangway net was damaged when the crew tried to shift the gangway to allow the crane's movement and adjust the height of the gangway for the tidal change during the port stay.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance was not done.
corrective_action: The electrical officer was asked to check the port side indicator.
preventive_action: The master will explain the proper checks of bridge equipment to the bridge team.

deficiency_finding: It was not possible to operate the fire dampers because of the rusted pins securing them.
description_overview: Aft Rope Winch Safety Pin can be unlocked.
immediate_causes: The safety pin could not be easily removed from the safety pin hole because the crew did not maintain the safety pin properly.
root_cause_analysis: The safety pin could not be easily removed from the safety pin hole because the crew did not maintain the safety pin properly.
corrective_action: The safety pin can be easily put on and removed from the safety pin hole, and the lever of the fire damper can be operated.
preventive_action: Master and C/O are also advised to verify the safety pin and the lever condition of the fire damper during monthly fire drill.

deficiency_finding: The cold/refrigerator room temperature check stopped for the last three days.
description_overview: Heavy parts stored on deck are not protected from movement.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: All four cold/refrigerator rooms have temperature records that can be found on the locally maintained list.
corrective_action: All cold/refrigerator rooms' records from the ER book are immediately transferred to local lists.
preventive_action: The crew was told that the lists of temperatures should be updated daily.

deficiency_finding: The VDR acoustic beacon battery expired.
description_overview: specify in clear text
immediate_causes: Information is insufficiently communicated.
root_cause_analysis: The crew's carelessness caused 2/O to not properly inspect and maintain navigation items.
corrective_action: The old VDR beacon battery should be replaced with the new one.
preventive_action: The deficiencies were educated to all officers by the company.

deficiency_finding: The volume of low sulphur fuel oils in each tank as well as the date, time and position of the ship when the fuel oil changeover operation is completed prior to the entry into an emission control area missing was instructed to be in compliance by the master.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with industry rules.
root_cause_analysis: There are insufficient training and supervision.
corrective_action: This finding was immediately rectified by ship staff and training for all Engineers on correct procedures for recording all entries as appropriate especially those pertaining to position and time of FO changeover.
preventive_action: Master has been told to make sure that all entries are filled in correctly for SOX records at the next meeting.

deficiency_finding: Plans and diagrams are not in the file.
description_overview: The SOPEP Port contacts list is not up to date.
immediate_causes: The ship's plans for recovery of person from the water were not mentioned due to lack of review and supervision by the master and the person in charge.
root_cause_analysis: The contents of the ship's SOPEP plan are according to the content list, but additional plans and diagrams are required by the PSC inspector.
corrective_action: General arrangements, tank capacity plans and bilge were added.
preventive_action: All plans will be added after the fleet is informed of a new requirement from PSC.

deficiency_finding: There was no report from the last inspection.
description_overview: The report of the inspection was missing.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: All certificates and final reports are only available in electronic form at the My Freedom web portal.
corrective_action: The same was confirmed and verified by R.O.ABS during the PSC follow up survey.
preventive_action: Control and corrective actions will be applied in quarterly letters to all fleet.

deficiency_finding: Fuel change isn't ship specific.
description_overview: In the 'before' pictures, the change over procedure was ship specific, but it was revised as requested and the deficiency was fixed before departure.
immediate_causes: The inspector demanded that a special wording for 'boiler fuel changeover during sailing' be included in the procedures, despite the fact that we were having ship specific change over procedure for all fleet.
root_cause_analysis: We didn't record the procedure of not leaving the boiler at any type of F/O during shut-off and assuring that its feed pumps and lines don't contain any non-complient fuel for ECA requirements.
corrective_action: The procedure changeover was revised to cover the issue.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels had their changeover procedures revised.

deficiency_finding: The ladder was hung over the water between the quay and the ship.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts are not in place on the two manifolds found on the Bunker stations.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The crew doesn't follow the rules for ship safety day activity and safety regulations for the ship berths.
corrective_action: On the quay at all times, place the accommodation ladder on a safe place.
preventive_action: The master should be supervised when the gangway is lower down.

deficiency_finding: The seal for the oil content meter is missing.
description_overview: The vessel couldn't demonstrate the operation of the alarm system.
immediate_causes: Makers verified that the design of OCM was the same as the one on the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: Examination of units is one of the JOB FACTORS.
corrective_action: Makers email confirmation will be posted near the OCM to avoid confusion.
preventive_action: To avoid similar deficiencies, sharing finding with the fleet vessel.

deficiency_finding: The International Energy Efficiency Certificate is not valid.
description_overview: The port main deck is not closed properly.
immediate_causes: After the inspection, a telecom was conducted with the Master, but he did not present the available certificate from the ship management software.
root_cause_analysis: The International Energy Efficiency Certificate was not issued by the Classification Society.
corrective_action: The issuance of the certificate is expected to be completed by the 23rd of January.
preventive_action: The company will communicate the raised deficiency to the fleet in order to avoid a repeat.

deficiency_finding: The supplies of ozon depleting substances will be recorded in the record book.
description_overview: The PSC deficiency was caused by the PSC Inspector keeping the records in hard copy.
immediate_causes: ISM Code regulation 11 'Documentation' is misinterpreted.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient training and inadequate supervision.
corrective_action: The Ozone-Depleting Substances Record Book has been updated for the shipment on September 22, 2022, as per the requirement.
preventive_action: The training on the recording methods and requirements of the Ozone-Depleting Substances Record Book was conducted by the C/E.

deficiency_finding: The last one was in Port of New Orleans.
description_overview: The initial fire drill did not demonstrate adequate familiarity.
immediate_causes: The MARSEC level is on the upper landing platform of the gangway.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer did not have effective supervision and inspection.
corrective_action: The agent reported the non-conformity deficiency to the PSCO before sailing and got his confirmation.
preventive_action: The master will supervise and guide the work of the Chief Officer.

deficiency_finding: The re-CIRCULATING FACILITY PIPELINE for OWS isn't compatible with the resolution.
description_overview: The recirculating facilities were found not to be in line with section 6.11.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: N/A
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge is one of the human factors.
corrective_action: The Hopper arrangement was made on the re-circulation line.
preventive_action: The Hopper arrangement was made on the re-circulation line.

deficiency_finding: The bridge doors are open.
description_overview: Oil gas can not be kept tight by the bridge doors.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: System factors include excessive wear and tear and inadequate maintenance.
corrective_action: The bridge wing doors were adjusted during the PSC.
preventive_action: In a HEADS UP publication, the tanker fleet will be instructed on the requirements for wheelhouse doors.

deficiency_finding: A certificate of financial security for crew repatriation and ship owners liability is posted in the mess room.
description_overview: A certificate of financial security for crew repatriation and ship owners liability is posted in a mess room.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Copies of financial security certificates were not posted in public places onboard for easy access.
corrective_action: The financial security certificates were posted in the mess room.
preventive_action: To ensure compliance, the financial security posters should be included in the weekly accommodation inspection.

deficiency_finding: There were multiple instances of oil soaked on lagging and oil leaks in and around the area.
description_overview: There were multiple instances of oil soaked on lagging and oil leaks in and around the area.
immediate_causes: There are some lagging and slight oil leaks in and around the area.
root_cause_analysis: Crew lack safety awareness and hazard identification, inadequate maintenance to machinery and lack of supervision by senior officer.
corrective_action: The multiple oil leaks on fuel valves, viscometer pump and cleaning and repainting purifier space were fixed immediately.
preventive_action: Senior officers must thoroughly inspect and monitor the machineries and equipment on a daily basis to identify any risk of fire hazard in the engine room.

deficiency_finding: The rest hours record was not consistent with the drill record.
description_overview: On the 16th of September, the entry drill time for Second Officer was 10:00-11:00 instead of 10:30-11:45 because of a typing error.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The factors that affect a job are system factors, inadequate communication, and information.
corrective_action: To correct wrong entry.
preventive_action: The drill time for the second officer was changed from 10:00-11:00 to 10:30-11:45.

deficiency_finding: There is a container on the port side that is poorly stowed with a rope and without the iron supporting cage causing it to bend.
description_overview: Oil pollution discharge reported by the vessel and there are apparent oil substance remaining onboard and the hull of the vessel are suspected of being a discharge violation.
immediate_causes: The lack of supervision by officers is one of the reasons for the inadequate awareness of crew.
root_cause_analysis: The 1.0 Cub.M drum was a spare container and not part of the kit.
corrective_action: Annex-II vegetable oil wash water can be used to dispose of 900 liters of contaminated water.
preventive_action: A fleet alert was sent to all vessels in the fleet and requested to verify that the deficiencies raised in the PSC inspection are not present on board.

deficiency_finding: There is a statement of compliance for fuel oil reporting.
description_overview: The Statement of Compliance for Fuel Oil Consumption Reporting expired on May 21st, 2022.
immediate_causes: The Statement of Compliance of Fuel Oil Consumption Reporting expired.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of proper documentation by the ship's staff.
corrective_action: The master requested the head office to send the document back to the vessel.
preventive_action: The company's internal auditor is to check the certificates of the vessel on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: There is a window, side scuttles and deadlights.
description_overview: As a result of the review, the quality of the window glasses is not required in accordance with the convention.
immediate_causes: There arefective tools/ equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: Scuttles were immediately de-rusted and cleaned.
preventive_action: In the next safety meeting, the vessel will discuss this deficiency.

deficiency_finding: There are critical spare parts for emergency fire pump and auxiliary engine that are not onboard.
description_overview: The PSC action code is 17
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency is the Chief Engineer's failure to issue a relevant requisition in advance for the missing spare parts.
corrective_action: AMSA Inspector identified a deficiency and closed it.
preventive_action: The deficiencies to be discussed during the next monthly safety committee meeting under master's supervision to avoid re-occurrence with the participation of all shipboard personnel.

deficiency_finding: The band doesn't work.
description_overview: According to the Navigating Procedures Manual section 'Navigational Equipment & Aids to navigation', the procedures which should be followed for all navigation equipment along with shipboard safety checks should be conducted in accordance with SOLAS.
immediate_causes: The fire door doesn't have an adjustment to lock.
root_cause_analysis: There are bad tools, equipment or materials.
corrective_action: The S-Band radar was repaired by a shore service technician after the company's prompt arrangements.
preventive_action: In order to ensure that any identified defects are promptly reported, Master will discuss the deficiency's nature and origin during his next monthly safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The number of endorsements does not match the original Philippine CoC.
description_overview: The number of endorsements does not match the original Philippine CoC.
immediate_causes: The office was told.
root_cause_analysis: The number of endorsement of the GMDSS certificate of the second mate did not match the original Philippine CoC, which was reported to the office.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency in order to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: The alarm panel is inaudible.
description_overview: The E/G had a fuel leak alarm.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The general and fire alarm was tested weekly by the engineer and found normal, however due to wear and tear the cable was not found loose in connection, no audio was found when tested by PSCO.
corrective_action: The Elec engineer checked the cable and found it was loose, connected again and tested the alarm, audio and visual alarm comes.
preventive_action: Elec engineer should ensure the alarm panel is in good condition and senior management should check the compliance in the monthly inspection.

deficiency_finding: The crew did not comply with the protection measures.
description_overview: Firefighting outfits on board are fire proximity suits type and may not provide the wearer sufficient thermal protection from radiated heat if entering an enclosed space including machinery and accommodation spaces where a fire is established.
immediate_causes: Equipment not renewed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient instruction.
corrective_action: A meeting was held to highlight the procedure for gangway watch.
preventive_action: During the next safety committee meeting, the company circular will be shared with all crew.

deficiency_finding: There are cracks in the Starboard forward free fall window of the Lifeboat.
description_overview: Launching instructions on the deck are not good.
immediate_causes: The previous voyage was laden and the cargo holds couldn't be accessed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The crew couldn't notify the defect during the safety round on deck due to the cold weather.
corrective_action: The lifeboat window renewal was done before the vessel left.
preventive_action: All equipment should be checked regularly while the vessel is in the cold.

deficiency_finding: Air is escaping from the top of the mask when the two crew members are wearing the BA set.
description_overview: The SCBA sets are placed in the location as per the approved fire plan for the vessel.
immediate_causes: The correct donning procedure was explained to the crew members after they were briefed on the inspector's concern.
root_cause_analysis: In the presence of PSCO, the crew was briefed on the proper donning procedures of SCBA sets.
corrective_action: The BA sets were donned by all the Fire Fighters as part of the corrective measures.
preventive_action: The next theme as part of monthly safety day training across the fleet will be focused on the correct donning procedure of Fireman's suits and SCBA sets.

deficiency_finding: There is a damaged rubber step of the pilot ladder.
description_overview: There was no fitness equipment in the gym.
immediate_causes: There are a lot of rubber hoses and ropes on the floor.
root_cause_analysis: There are problems such as lack of maintenance, lack of inspection before arrival, and inadequate supervision.
corrective_action: The master was satisfied with the verification.
preventive_action: All pilot ladder should be in good order at all times.

deficiency_finding: Satellite is 406MHz/ 1.6 GHz.
description_overview: At the time of Inspection there was a no maintenance record for the EPIRB.
immediate_causes: The failure to follow procedure was identified.
root_cause_analysis: During the Inspection performance, the requested 5 Year Maintenance Report was not presented to the PSC Inspectors, as the Master did not manage to identify the requested Report in his Certificates folder.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: The next Monthly Alert Bulletin will be sent to the fleet for awareness and for avoiding repetition.

deficiency_finding: The fire alarm is inadequate.
description_overview: There was a weak fire alarm in the engine room.
immediate_causes: The ER Alarm speakers deteriorated due to the failure to warn.
root_cause_analysis: Over a period of time, the sound of the speakers in the engine room deteriorated.
corrective_action: Training was carried out by the entire crew, with reference to the company Training Material 120 (PSC Detainable Deficiencies) guiding them of the importance of inspections, early detection, and regular maintenance.
preventive_action: To carry out the checks of the Fire Alarm System as per FFA Maintenance Plan section 9.1.1.

deficiency_finding: The crew working in the E/R and Emergency Generator Room are not wearing proper PPE.
description_overview: There are ship's occupational safety and health policies.
immediate_causes: The company was told.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency was improper supervision and an attempt to save time.
corrective_action: The safety committee will discuss the deficiency during the meeting.
preventive_action: The safety committee will discuss the deficiency during the meeting.

deficiency_finding: Fuel oil PIPE is covered with fuel oil.
description_overview: The No.3 Generator has a fuel oil pipe.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: The insulation material for the oil pipe of the generator was renewed.
preventive_action: The meeting is based on the shore.

deficiency_finding: The EGCS is a gas analyzer.
description_overview: The cooling fan supply pump number two for the exhaust gas cleaning system in the engine room was found to be malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: The inspector was given clarifications.
root_cause_analysis: In order to fix the EGCS malfunction that had been reported by the Master to the Port State, a technician was already on board the vessel along with the relevant spare parts.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency in order to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: The davit hooks are not safe.
description_overview: There is safety management.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of maintenance and not following company instructions is a problem.
corrective_action: It is working in good order.
preventive_action: There will be training for the Chalet and the deck.

deficiency_finding: Some emergency lights weren't working.
description_overview: The vessel couldn't demonstrate the operation of the alarm system.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge failed to inspect the exhaust gas pipe.
root_cause_analysis: The crew neglected to check after bad weather.
corrective_action: The emergency light bulbs were changed because of a defect.
preventive_action: Training was done to upgrade safety awareness and performance.

deficiency_finding: There is oil and oil mixture under the engine.
description_overview: The PSC team found oily rags in the engine room.
immediate_causes: The crew failed to clean the area after the maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer of the Engine Department should ensure that the Engine Room is clean and free of oil.
corrective_action: Before the officers left the vessel, the deficiency was corrected.
preventive_action: On the same day as the refresh training, a Safety Bulletin was sent to all vessels reminding them of the importance of keeping the Engine Room clean and free of oil.

deficiency_finding: There is insufficient cleanliness of the engine room.
description_overview: The Engine Room is dirty.
immediate_causes: The fire door insulation is poor.
root_cause_analysis: Good housekeeping is not maintained in the engine room.
corrective_action: The purifier room was thoroughly cleaned.
preventive_action: A training session was held for all ships staff to teach them how to keep their house clean.

deficiency_finding: The accommodation air condition was found to be insufficient.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The crew of the ship knew that the No.1 AC compressor didn't have enough gas.
corrective_action: The compressor system was filled with gas.
preventive_action: The crew is watching the leak of freon gas in the compressor system.

deficiency_finding: There is an oil filter.

immediate_causes: Maintenance and routine inspection instructions were not followed.
root_cause_analysis: There is a risk for ship's navigation safety due to the leaking of oil filter.
corrective_action: Bolts, nuts, oil pipes joint, safety lock, O-ring, and all connection parts need to be tightened.
preventive_action: The pipe lines, valve and joint should be checked regularly.

deficiency_finding: Live bugs are found in daily used rice bags.
description_overview: Food should be clean, wholesome, free from adulteration and otherwise safe for human consumption.
immediate_causes: The Master will be responsible for the clean handling of food preparation.

corrective_action: The vegetable room was cleaned up to the satisfaction of the PSC officer and the standards were followed.
preventive_action: The Safety Committee Meeting that took place after the inspection emphasized the importance of proper familiarization with the onboard duties and requirements.

deficiency_finding: The heaving lines have heavy monkey fists.

deficiency_finding: A reset button is located in the radio station.

deficiency_finding: The company must take corrective actions on the ISM system within 3 months.

deficiency_finding: Provision of lifeboats.
