immediate_causes: The FFB was secured with 2 turnbuckles when it arrived in the port.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient practice.
corrective_action: The Internal audit performed 21-JUN-23 was immediately corrected.
preventive_action: As per the External ISM audit, the discussion was done onboard.

deficiency_finding: When equipment for which performance standards are developed by the organization is carried on ships in addition to those items of equipment required by regulation 19 and 20, such equipment shall be subject to approval and compliance with performance standards not inferior to those adopted by the organization.
description_overview: The vessel is fitted with a Furuno VR-700 VDR unit and ancillary equipment, and the vessel's class-approved PMS is provided with weekly, monthly, and maintenance and testing work orders which are in line with makers' recommendations and instructions.
immediate_causes: After a change of management failure to check the tanks in the certificate section 3.1 is what happened.
root_cause_analysis: An approved service technician boarded the vessel and carried out a repair on the MIC.
corrective_action: The Annual Performance Test of VDR is carried out as per guidelines given in SOLAS regulation V 20 and as per Circular 1222.
preventive_action: It was emphasized that proper and regular maintenance for the bridge equipment be completed as per the schedule and in case any defect or discrepancy is noted same is to be reported and attended to immediately.

deficiency_finding: There is a warning for the maximum load and angle of inclination on the upper plate.
description_overview: The lower platform of Gangway was marked with the maximum load and maximum angle of Inclination.
immediate_causes: The maximum working load was only marked on the lower platform of the gangway.
root_cause_analysis: The ship staff assumed that the marking was only required at one end of the Gangway.
corrective_action: Marking of Max working load and maximum angle of Inclination was done at the upper platform of the Gangway.
preventive_action: The deficiency and marking requirements will be sent to all vessels in the fleet.

deficiency_finding: The operation of the SSB does not have a key.
description_overview: The PSC action code is 17
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: When sailing between Australia and China, familiarity wasn't enough and the PSC pointed it out.
corrective_action: How to operate by Master was Carried out.
preventive_action: Lesson learned was sent to all vessels via company e-pos system.

deficiency_finding: The shower curtain is missing and the light is flickering.
description_overview: The Fitter's cabin had a shower curtain missing and light flickering.
immediate_causes: There are interrelated causes of Standard Acts.
root_cause_analysis: ROOT CAUSES are personal facts.
corrective_action: The shower curtain and light were fixed by PSCO.
preventive_action: It is not applicable because the vessel didn't deviate from the rules.

deficiency_finding: Not required.
description_overview: The PSC/AMSA Inspector found out that the existing and newly supplied pilot ladder was not compliant with the Australian Local Ports while she was in Australia.
immediate_causes: The wirings went over the junction box because of inadequate routine inspection that led to overtime and undetected.
root_cause_analysis: The last pilot ladder certificate was issued in April 2023 and complies with ISO 799- 1: 2019.
corrective_action: The master and deck officers need to be aware of the different local port regulations and their standards, as well as the SOLAS regulations.
preventive_action: The master and deck officers need to be aware of the different local port regulations and their standards, as well as the SOLAS regulations.

deficiency_finding: Some endorsement by flag state of crew member is not signed by the holder.
description_overview: The cargo ship safety equipment certificate stated that the navigation equipment was in good working condition, as it was seen by the inspector.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The crew members' signature was taken.
preventive_action: Before signing the AOA, all crew members need to have their certificates verified.

deficiency_finding: The crew doesn't know how to use the release hook for the rescue boat and life raft.
description_overview: There were problems with the rescue boat engine cooling water pump.
immediate_causes: 3/O and C/O couldn't explain the operations of the release hook.
root_cause_analysis: They didn't know how to use a release hook for a rescue boat and life raft.
corrective_action: Crew concerned for the operation of release hook for rescue boat and life raft launching under captain's supervision will be trained on board.
preventive_action: The company vessels will be given company circulars to share the case.

deficiency_finding: There is a piracy clause in Part II.
description_overview: The primary means of ballast water management will be amended to the short term certificate.
immediate_causes: The record entry of the drill was incomplete.
root_cause_analysis: There were no procedures, policies or statements that were in contradiction to the amendments.
corrective_action: BMA has confirmed there is no need to update the vessel's existing DMLC-Part II provided, there are no pre-existing references that are in violation of the amendments.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The steel wire ropes are used for safe passage of crew on the main deck.
description_overview: The cargo holds line 3 has a smoke sampling fire detection system.
immediate_causes: Not complying with load line regulation.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision.
corrective_action: There are safety lines on the main deck.
preventive_action: The master discussed the defect with the deckhands to make sure the safety line is rigged in place.

deficiency_finding: The sprinkler system for the engine room was not tested during the fire drill.
description_overview: All of the vessels managed by the company are equipped with a dedicated software that is used to electronically maintain the hours of work and rest records by the onboard crew.
immediate_causes: The company was notified.
root_cause_analysis: The pressure low alarm of the SCBA was caused by the use of oxygen during the fire drill, and thevalve was fully opened as it should have been during normal emergency situations.
corrective_action: The fire pump's working condition was confirmed by the crew onboard.
preventive_action: The crew is requested to discuss the following at the next Safety Committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: The medical fitness certificate for the Chief Cook was issued for a different reason.
description_overview: The medical fitness certificate for the Chief Cook was issued for a different reason.
immediate_causes: Carelessness is recorded in the Work and Rest hours module.
root_cause_analysis: In the section of the form where the rank of the department of seafarer is printed, the flag medical document for Chief Cook was left off, but in all other medical test forms, the rank was printed as Cook.
corrective_action: After being advised of the error, the concerned crew coordination went to the medical center and got the form re-written.
preventive_action: During the weekly meeting of the crewing office, there was an error and oversight in the verification of the crew medical certificate and the crew managers were advised to review the crew documents before handing them over to the crew.

deficiency_finding: The crew of the ship is not provided with proper training for taking cargo sample.
description_overview: The action was taken on 30 October.
immediate_causes: The crew did not know about the 2 valves pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The company has a procedure for sampling cargo.
corrective_action: The subject crew member was assigned to assist the AB in cargo sampling and not to carry out the cargo sampling himself during the incident.
preventive_action: The company decided not to employ crews on dual rank.

deficiency_finding: The operator needs to have a longer device to observe the lifeboat at all times.
description_overview: The action code is 17 October.
immediate_causes: There was a small leak from the isolation valve during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The wire rope was not long enough to reach the ship side for the operator to observe safe launching.
corrective_action: The PSCO gave code 10 for the rectification of the deficiency after the Inspector pointed out that the wire rope needed to have a minimum length of 4 meters.
preventive_action: The safety implication of the subject observation as received was discussed with ship's staff for their continued awareness after departure from port of inspection.

deficiency_finding: There is a sludge pump in the Engine Room that has oil water rest.
description_overview: Aft peak tank sounding and piping arrangement will be reviewed and approved by class for storing treated sewage.
immediate_causes: Minor leaks came up due to exposure.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance and inspection base on MARPOL Annex I.
corrective_action: A new pipe is going to be replaced.
preventive_action: periodical inspection will be carried out by C/E, 2/E&3/E.

deficiency_finding: The auxiliary engine no3's fuel isolation valve is not closing from a remote location.
description_overview: During the PSCO test, the A/E No.3 fuel inlet quick closing valve was found to be fully operational.
immediate_causes: There was a small leak from the isolation valve during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The isolation valve did not respond to close from remote due to the valve rod being a little stick.
corrective_action: The engine made few test to verify the functioning of the valve after adjusting the gear.
preventive_action: The fuel isolation valve of the auxiliary engine had to be tested and inspected every month and prior to the arrival of the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The irrigation system of the BoSUN store is dependent on the remote control.
description_overview: The system isn't ready for use.
immediate_causes: The indicator light broke and wasn't promptly monitored.
root_cause_analysis: There are inadequate tools and equipment.
corrective_action: The indicator light was replaced.
preventive_action: The weekly lamp test was not adequate.

deficiency_finding: Several steps at the lower part of the Pilot Ladder are loosened.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: The Sub Panel lost communication with the Main Fire Alarm control panel.
root_cause_analysis: The pilot ladders were declared to be in good condition based on the Chief Officer's inspection.
corrective_action: The pilot ladder with loosened steps was removed from service and marked as "Do Not Use, Out of Service."
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was told that the ladder should be straightened and that each step should be inspected thoroughly.

deficiency_finding: The local fire fighting monitor is malfunctioning.
description_overview: There was a weak fire alarm in the engine room.
immediate_causes: Unforeseen defect.
root_cause_analysis: Even though all buzzers were checked before arriving at the port of inspection and tested at regular intervals, the local firefighting monitor in E/R sound alarm is malfunctioning due to an unexpected electronic malfunction.
corrective_action: The alarm panel's buzzer wasfective.
preventive_action: A message was released to the entire fleet for experience feedback purposes and compliance as required by our company's SMS for frequent test / inspections of sound and visual indicators.

deficiency_finding: The Marpol Consolidated Book did not have a new edition.
description_overview: The Marpol Consolidated Book did not have a new edition.
immediate_causes: I found a new edition of Marpol Consolidated in Witherby Connect.
root_cause_analysis: PIC was first time using Witherby and didn't know much about it.
corrective_action: The deck officers refreshed their understanding of the proper operation of Witherby.
preventive_action: Deck officers must be familiar with access to digital publications.

deficiency_finding: The revolution counter in Bridge is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The counter in the bridge had a deviation of more than 10rpm.
immediate_causes: The quick release of forward life raft was difficult to open due to the improper installation of accompanying shackle that was used for securing in place.
root_cause_analysis: The indicator of the port side revolution counter was stuck.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed at the time of the inspection after the indicator was overhauled by the crew.
preventive_action: The same will be discussed in the next SCM when the deficiency is brought to the attention of the managed fleet.

deficiency_finding: The engine room can't explain why the agent neutralizing tank is in alarm when the system is switched on.
description_overview: The engine room can't explain why the agent neutralizing tank is in alarm when the system is switched on.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The log on the E/R was not recorded by the crew.
corrective_action: The crew took the chemical into the AUN and reduced the water content.
preventive_action: The crew made a card with the ratio of chemical to water and posted it near the alarm panel.

deficiency_finding: Watertight doors and closing devices.
description_overview: The door can't be closed due to the fact that it's out of hinge/angle.
immediate_causes: The maintenance of the water/weather tight doors was not carried out according to company's guidance.
root_cause_analysis: The importance of water/weather tight doors was overlooked.
corrective_action: The hinges were renewed.
preventive_action: Water tight door inspection is included in the monthly routine so that deteriorated doors can be renewed in dry docking.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence of an objective investigation into the launch of Lifereaft.
description_overview: It took the crew more than 20 minutes to lower the boat.
immediate_causes: The record entry of the drill was incomplete.
root_cause_analysis: There is no knowledge of the Abandon Drill crew.
corrective_action: Abandon drill will be renewed and recorded.
preventive_action: In the next Safety Meeting, the topic will be discussed and shared with the crew.

deficiency_finding: There is a dose not indicated on the bridge panel.
description_overview: The bridge door was found to have a small hole.
immediate_causes: There was a small hole in the bridge door during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There is no maintenance on the sensor of the indicator.
corrective_action: The dust of the sensor was cleaned and the indicator was in good working order.
preventive_action: All sensors for W/T doors need to be regularly checked to make sure they are in good order.

deficiency_finding: Medical equipment, medical chest, and medical guide are not required.
description_overview: The Oxygen Resuscitator was not ready for use.
immediate_causes: The water came from the emergency because the discharge valve on the common delivery line was stuck in the open position.
root_cause_analysis: PSCO pointed out that the empty bottle was connected to the portable Oxygen Resuscitator mask during the inspection.
corrective_action: The mask was connected to the oxygen spare bottle and ready for use.
preventive_action: In order to prevent the same deficiency, the company distributed this NC through all fleets.

deficiency_finding: Rescue boat radar isn't ready for use.
description_overview: There is a fire extinguisher that is missing.
immediate_causes: The acts are substandard.
root_cause_analysis: The pole was not ready for use.
corrective_action: A new pole has been mounted.
preventive_action: To be looked at as VI-20.

deficiency_finding: Food temperature is not required.
description_overview: A portable deep fridge is missing.
immediate_causes: There is no way to display the current temperature of the galley fridge located inside the officer's pantry.
root_cause_analysis: The design of the fridge did not include a display of the current temperature.
corrective_action: After the PSC inspector pointed out the issue, the crew made a proactive approach.
preventive_action: The temperature in the fridges in the galley and mess rooms will be checked daily by the Master or Chief Officer.

deficiency_finding: The Magnetron for both radars isn't replaced as per manufacturer's instructions.
description_overview: The forward forecastle doors are weathertight.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: There is a broken window.
description_overview: From the main steering position, the horizontal field of vision will extend from right to left on each side of the ship.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The window was broken.
corrective_action: The new glass was delivered on the 21st of July.
preventive_action: This observation was shared with other vessels in the fleet to raise awareness.

deficiency_finding: There is a bung cover for the steering room that is hard to use.
description_overview: The Fire damper in the Engine room was found to be working well after an inspection by the ship staff.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The closing mechanism was disassembled and needed to be fixed immediately by the ship's staff.
preventive_action: The Seniour Management was briefed by the Vessel Manager to make sure the safety routines are complied with.

deficiency_finding: The covers for garbage bins in the galley are missing.
description_overview: Garbage bin covers are missing from the galley.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: The lack of spare bins which had been ordered by the vessel but delivered at the same day in the afternoon is the first cause.
corrective_action: The galley has a new garbage bin placed in it.
preventive_action: The galley has a new garbage bin placed in it.

deficiency_finding: Garbage on board.
description_overview: During the inspection at the Port of Novorossiysk, the PSC officer noted a box not being checked in the question of 'at-sea maintenance capability' as per the requirements.
immediate_causes: Direct is Tear and Wear.
root_cause_analysis: Garbage discharge was already planned through the agent and at the time of inspection, the collecting truck had not arrived.
corrective_action: The garbage was discharged after the ship docked.
preventive_action: Masters should not have this kind of deficiencies recorded on paper.

deficiency_finding: Emergency first aid equipment, eye wash equipment and workshop first aid kit are not in the engine room.
description_overview: Some of the medicines inside the first aid box need to be replaced.
immediate_causes: There is an eye wash station in the steering room next to the engine workshop.
root_cause_analysis: In case of emergency, the eye wash equipment and first aid kit were insufficient.
corrective_action: After confirmation from the office, the Master immediately requested direct purchasing with a first aid kit and eye wash equipment from the local supplier.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer will conduct regular checks to make sure the engine room has adequate first aid and eye wash equipment.

deficiency_finding: The emergency generator is malfunctioning.
description_overview: According to the relevant Class/IACS rules and regulations, as in built condition.
immediate_causes: The issue was fixed in the presence of the PSC Officer and endorsed before leaving the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: After the generator test was done, the PSCO decided to hold the vessel until the issue was fixed.
corrective_action: The PSCO came back to verify the crew's corrective action was taken.
preventive_action: The company instructed the master to conduct a safety meeting to discuss the incurred deficiencies and ways to prevent them from happening again.

description_overview: The Enhanced Survey Program is mandatory surveys that are not carried out on time.
immediate_causes: The procedures to correct typo error mistakes were not followed.
root_cause_analysis: The certificate post issuance from the servicing company was not checked for clerical errors.
corrective_action: The PSCO was satisfied with the new certificate issued by the servicing company.
preventive_action: All certificates received onboard should be checked for details and any Typo errors should be addressed immediately.

deficiency_finding: The SOLAS training manual is not ship specific.
description_overview: The angle indicator on the bridge is partially unreadable.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The SOLAS training manual has been updated by crossing out equipment and operating instructions that do not apply to this vessel.
corrective_action: The SOLAS training manual can't be removed due to double-sided printing, however, it has been covered with blank paper and labeled with the word "deleted" as per the inspector's request.
preventive_action: The master told the officers and crew members that the SOLAS training manual should be easy to read and consistent with the vessel.

deficiency_finding: C/E cannot connect fire hose to fire valve because of a defect.
description_overview: The isolator/connection box has a radio antenna wire broken off.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: During the last week, all fire systems were thoroughly and properly tested, and no leaks were found.
corrective_action: New fire valve and cover were installed.
preventive_action: The individuals responsible for safety on deck and in the engine room were told to maintain safety equipment according to the schedule.

deficiency_finding: The propeller guard and rudder of the free fall life boat are very old.
description_overview: There is water in the weathertight condition.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: The crew had identified the rusty surface of the rudder and propeller guard for the FFLB and had included the de-rusting/painting job in the vessel's deck maintenance schedule, to be carried out at first opportunity.
corrective_action: Crew proceeded with necessary de-rusting and painting of the guard of the rudder and propeller of the FFLB - during good weather conditions, and took all necessary precautions/control measures in accordance with company's procedures.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The main engine Cylinder No.2 and No.4 ran late.
description_overview: Provision and disposition are included in lifebuoys.
immediate_causes: Defective valve of sewage system is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer's failure to schedule the maintenance work at an earlier stage is the root cause.
corrective_action: The main engine Cylinder No.2 and No.4 needed to be overhauled.
preventive_action: During the monthly safety committee meeting, the deficiencies will be discussed with the participation of all shipboard personnel.

deficiency_finding: There is a small oil leak from M.E.
description_overview: High water pressure can be caused by POLYURETHAN HOSE FROM PUMP TO GAUGE.
immediate_causes: Every time the cold room is opened for a long period, the power failure will cause a false alarm because the sensitivity of the sensor is dependent on the power supply.
root_cause_analysis: There was a small leak from the main engine.
corrective_action: The pipe was replaced on the spot.
preventive_action: Thorough inspections will be carried out by engine officers and crew in order to avoid similar leaks.

deficiency_finding: The fire pump couldn't pressurise the fire main.
description_overview: The last weekly test of the Emergency Fire Pump was on the day before the inspection.
immediate_causes: The water came from the emergency because the discharge valve on the common delivery line was stuck in the open position.
root_cause_analysis: The discharge valve on the common delivery line was stuck in the open position.
corrective_action: The discharge valve was closed manually and the EFP pressure was maintained.
preventive_action: A new valve will be supplied to the vessel to keep as a spare during her upcoming call to Singapore around 3rd May 2024.

deficiency_finding: The sewage treatment plant's circulation pipe was blocked.
description_overview: There are excessive belts on between the motor and compressor.
immediate_causes: Instructions for removing the obstruction were provided.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency in order to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: There is a booklet about fire safety.
description_overview: There were not ship specific and missing information in the fire safety operational booklet.
immediate_causes: The other external party is not under the control of the company.
root_cause_analysis: The latest communication equipment was not updated in the fire safety operational booklet.
corrective_action: There was a deficiency in the Fire Safety Operational booklet that was closed prior to departure.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Shore Based Maintenance Contract expired.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: Instructions were given for the post to be on the bridge.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector insisted on writing the deficiency because the document was not posted on the bridge in the GMDSS area.
corrective_action: All deficiencies were reviewed during an additional safety meeting conducted by the master.
preventive_action: The entire fleet will be made aware of the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: Water leaking from the fire line isolation valve.
description_overview: There were not ship specific and missing information in the fire safety operational booklet.
immediate_causes: Instructions to the vessel were given to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The root of the deficiency was material wear.
corrective_action: The safety committee will discuss the deficiency during the meeting.
preventive_action: The safety committee will discuss the deficiency during the meeting.

deficiency_finding: The number was not written recently in the engine room.
description_overview: The inspector believes that the marking does not comply with the requirements of SOLAS XI-1/3.
immediate_causes: The ship's identification number can be permanently marked either on one of the machinery spaces or on one of the hatchways.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector didn't accept the explanation that the number on the engine room is approved by class and complies with the SOLAS requirements.
corrective_action: The office consulted vessel's flag and class, who confirmed that the number marked on the engine room is in line with the requirements of SOLAS XI-1/3.
preventive_action: The deficiency has been shared with other vessels as a part of information exchange.

deficiency_finding: The MSMD does not include the required number of cook unless a certified cook is onboard.
description_overview: Guidance on carriage of cook was not included in the Minimum safe manning document available at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: The crew delayed responding to the PSC officer request due to their busy schedule.
root_cause_analysis: Communication was delayed to transmit the renewed certificate.
corrective_action: The new Minimum safe manning document was issued on the 5th of April, which is an electronic version.
preventive_action: Since this was a fleet-wide action, team members were working on a task sheet and being closely monitored.

deficiency_finding: There is a lack of fruits and vegetables.
description_overview: Fruits and vegetables are not available on the ship.
immediate_causes: Fruits and vegetables are not available on the ship.
root_cause_analysis: There was a shortage of fresh vegetables and fruits as a result of the change of voyage.
corrective_action: Provisions were given to the vessel at Puerto Bolivar port, to suffice for until the next port of call.
preventive_action: Fleet Alert was sent by company to all vessels, sharing the deficiency to avoid such instances.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence that the operations waste is met with the requirements of MARPOL AnNEX V.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: The Master and C/O didn't know how to enter the Garbage Log.
root_cause_analysis: The Master and C/O didn't know how to enter the Garbage Log.
corrective_action: The Garbage Management Plan was re-educated.
preventive_action: The Master and C/O were told to enter the Garbage Log.

deficiency_finding: The original certificate is not available on the board.
description_overview: The original sheet of C.S.R no.1 is not on the board.
immediate_causes: Not identified.
root_cause_analysis: Master neglectful to check the condition of ship's certificates and the original certificate must be on board for inspection.
corrective_action: The certificate will be delivered at the next port.
preventive_action: Master will carefully check the certificates condition to ship's certificate in valid and original certificates are available on board.

deficiency_finding: The no.4 and no.5 cargo hold were found to be wet.
description_overview: The lifeboat engine did not start.
immediate_causes: The water alarm sensor was malfunctioning.
root_cause_analysis: At the time of PSC inspection, the sensor cable no.4 and no.5 cargo hold its joint connection in junction box was loosen due to failure to follow repair/ maintenance instructions.
corrective_action: The signal cable was loosened and it was reconnected by E/O.
preventive_action: Maintenance of the water ingress detection system should be done right after the vessel berths.

deficiency_finding: Sundries block the anchor chain remover port side.
description_overview: The main engine fuel leak alarm was found to be inoperative during the test in front of PSCO.
immediate_causes: There is a lifeboat seat that fell due to rough weather.
root_cause_analysis: The de-muck is secured closed to the bitter end for rough weather precautions.
corrective_action: The bitter end is clear of obstructions.
preventive_action: Keep the areas clear of obstructions for ease of use in an emergency.

deficiency_finding: There are additional spaces in the sleeping room.
description_overview: Due to the joining crew, the cabin was devoid of bed sheets.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient assessment of needs and risks is one of the substandard acts.
corrective_action: Fresh bed lining will be provided for each crew.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is an oil leak on the fuel pumps.
description_overview: A/E were running on load for cargo operation.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient seal materials can lead to oil leaks around the fuel pumps.
corrective_action: Check the ME fuel pump puncture valve and the other fuel pumps for leaks.
preventive_action: Provide training to maintenance personnel on proper maintenance procedures and the importance of detecting and addressing leaks promptly to prevent equipment damage and downtime.

deficiency_finding: The emergency valve in the engine room was hard to operate.
description_overview: The lever to slew the R/B davit does not return to neutral position on its own.
immediate_causes: Maintenance is improper.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of monitoring and inspection.
corrective_action: The emergency valve was kept in good working order.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness to crew and prevent reoccurrence of the similar nature, deficiencies will be sent to all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is a safety guard on the pump.
description_overview: There is a safety guard on the pump.
immediate_causes: The original cargo cleaning pump was not fully guard by the safety net.
root_cause_analysis: The design and installation of cargo cleaning pump for safety guard was not up to standard.
corrective_action: The engineers made a safety guard for the rails to prevent people from falling down.
preventive_action: Engine staff were trained for cause analysis, correction action and preventive action on the shipboard.

deficiency_finding: The Administration will approve each incinerator subject to this paragraph based on the standards developed by the Organization.
description_overview: Only one of two valves was closing for the individual stop of FO to ME.
immediate_causes: There is a human error.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: The Incinerator chamber was cleaned and repaired with new fireclay powder and the condition of the brick was found to be satisfactory.
preventive_action: The maintenance schedule for Incinerator was not effective.

deficiency_finding: Several self-closing valves were forced open by cable tie.
description_overview: At the time of inspection, the exemption had expired but the conditions were still required to be completed onboard.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The poor check and poor work of the chief engineer is the root cause of the deficiency.
corrective_action: The engineers immediately cleaned and oiled the fuel tanks level gauge's self-closing valves.
preventive_action: The chief engineer was warned about the situation when it was discovered.

deficiency_finding: There is fire safety in the engine room at the lubricating oil tank.
description_overview: There are small leaks from the Diesel Generator.
immediate_causes: Cyl.oil has a measuring tank level gauge.
root_cause_analysis: The guide was not followed before the parts were replaced.
corrective_action: The plastic was returned to its original state after being removed.
preventive_action: The crew didn't install plastic clamps on the level gauge.

deficiency_finding: The latest version of the manual is not available.
description_overview: The code is old edition.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear are consequences of material fatigue.
root_cause_analysis: The defect was issued in Japan on 6/15 and has not been closed in the computer system.
corrective_action: The Iamsar MANUAL VOL III is available on board and can be changed to code 10.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: PAPER CHARTS FOR PREVIOUS VOYAGE ANYER TO TOWNSVILLE AND NEXT VOYAGE TOWNSVILLE TO PANJANG ARE SUPPLIED.
description_overview: There is a lack of communication.
immediate_causes: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
root_cause_analysis: It is not possible to plan and execute on board on time.
corrective_action: The required CHARTS are SUPPLIED.
preventive_action: There are proper planning and proper execution of EXECUTIONS.

deficiency_finding: There are leaks in the emergency fire pump.
description_overview: Water leaking from the service pump.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment includes jack plugs.
root_cause_analysis: The emergency fire pump had metal threaded plugs that were leaking at the seal/gland.
corrective_action: The emergency fire pump was tested without leaks after the metal threaded plug at seal/gland was renewed.
preventive_action: If short-comings are observed, the crew is advised to carry out maintenance as per the guidelines of the ship's owner.

deficiency_finding: The forepeak tank's automatic closing devices are missing.
description_overview: The vent heat PS FW tank is not waterproof, and the vent in the way of the accommodation ladder is heavily corroded.
immediate_causes: The Log-book record's regulation was not strictly complied with by the PIC.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not strictly follow the requirements.
corrective_action: The floating ball has been put inside the vent heads.
preventive_action: Carry out routine inspections as per requirements; strictly follow up routine maintenance work as per ISM and PMS requirements; the management company follow-up inspection and supervision; and carry out training to crew with ISM and PSM requirements.

deficiency_finding: The vending machine of the room was missing.
description_overview: The steering gear room broken because of a gasket.
immediate_causes: Material fatigue caused this gasket to break.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: The complete plan maintenance system job scheduling is based on the recommendation of the maker.
preventive_action: The other ventilators were checked for free operation.

deficiency_finding: Bunker delivery notes for the last three years are not available.
description_overview: Bunker delivery notes are not available onboard.
immediate_causes: The vessel did not have to have certs onboard.
root_cause_analysis: The Bunker delivery notes were taken off the vessel by the previous management.
corrective_action: The BDN file was mistakenly removed by the previous vessel's technical management before the vessel took over.
preventive_action: In order to make sure that all copies of mandatory records are always left on board, an additional meeting was held by Master with all crew.

deficiency_finding: At the time of the inspection there was no fresh vegetables on board for the next intended voyage.
description_overview: The fresh water line was not maintained.
immediate_causes: There was no fresh provisions at the time of inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The fresh vegetables and fruits could not be delivered due to logistical issues.
corrective_action: The full provisions were supplied at the second loading port Caldera.
preventive_action: If the stock of fresh vegetables falls below minimum required for the next voyage, a local purchase will be arranged and the vessel's trading specifically on long voyages will always be stocked with fresh vegetables.

deficiency_finding: Safety data sheets for all the chemicals in steering gear are not available.
description_overview: Section 3 includes cargo handling procedures and documents.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were provided.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of routine checks.
corrective_action: During the inspection, you can remove the MSDS for non-stored chemicals and verify all stored chemicals.
preventive_action: Safety committee consisting of safety officer and engine room team were given the task of carrying out routine and periodic safety inspections as per SF11B.

deficiency_finding: The WBT vent heads were faulty.
description_overview: The vent heads of WBT were found to be faulty.
immediate_causes: There is excessive wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: The rubber gasket for vent heads was detached.
corrective_action: The rubber gasket was defective.
preventive_action: Persons involved with the job were briefed to follow the correct procedure for the inspection.

deficiency_finding: The officer was not familiar with the operation.
description_overview: The equipment is being operated.
immediate_causes: The established procedure was not followed.
root_cause_analysis: The officer didn't reply to the call.
corrective_action: The 2OFF was told to improve the skill after the deficiency was closed.
preventive_action: The issue was discussed with the crew manager.

deficiency_finding: The gas analyzer in EGCS is malfunctioning.
description_overview: Pilot ladders and hoist pilot transfer arrangements.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human Cause - overlook by ship's crew.
corrective_action: The new gas analyzer cooler and temperature transmitter were replaced.
preventive_action: Risk control, quality control of safety checklist and procedural process are included in the general conditions inspection.

deficiency_finding: The sewage treatment plant was not working and the UV lamp was not working.
description_overview: Not correctly treated sewage was found at the sewage treatment plant.
immediate_causes: The sewage treatment plant was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: As a result of the mixing of grey water and black water, the sterilizer jacket accumulated dirt and shortened the life of the UV lamp.
corrective_action: The UV sterilizer lamp was pulled out and replaced with a new spare, the chlorination chamber was cleaned, and chlorine tablets were added.
preventive_action: In wastewater treatment systems, ultraviolet light is used to destroy disease-causing organisms.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence that ACM had been removed from the vessel.
description_overview: There was no evidence that ACM had been removed from the vessel.
immediate_causes: There was no procedure for what we have to do after the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was unaware of the SMI-S-G10 TheInstruction for ship Asbestos-free Control.
preventive_action: The shore-based manager will strengthen supervision of onboard Asbestos-free Control training to on-board officers.

deficiency_finding: There are Hazards of MLC and Pers.
description_overview: There is a lack of Norms of Work and Non-Compliance.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There are no general procedures for the prevention of accidents.
corrective_action: The plates had to be fixed with a 500 brass screw.
preventive_action: In order to fulfill the requirements of the PSCO, periodic inspections, including the safety inspections a/p SOLAS, and vigilance are required to ensure that floor plates are properly fixed.

deficiency_finding: The air bladder of the effluent treatment plant was located at the off station.
description_overview: There were no instructions from the company on how to dispose of expired EPIRBs.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The air bladder of the effluent treatment plant was in the off position.
corrective_action: After finishing the maintenance work, I immediately switched back to 'AUTO' mode.
preventive_action: Finding will be reported to the honeybees for awareness.

deficiency_finding: The ship's declaration of security does not include details of the port facility.
description_overview: There is no cabin available for the crew member.
immediate_causes: Master failed to notify agents about change in plans.
root_cause_analysis: Transferring information with external parties is adequate.
corrective_action: The Master requested the agents to fill out the ship's declaration of security and submit it to the Port state control inspector.
preventive_action: The vessel's Supdt talked to the Master about the importance of filling up the DOS and how the observation would be shared with vessels.

deficiency_finding: The disk from the automatic closing devices was damaged and not in place.
description_overview: The hatch cleats of No.3 hold were found to be in poor condition and the vessel was in the process of freeing and fixing them.
immediate_causes: There is a lifeboat seat that fell due to rough weather.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow maintenance instructions is the root cause of the missing air heads.
corrective_action: To install the rod and change the disk of the vent-heads.
preventive_action: The deck crew members were trained about the maintenance guidelines and the deck maintenance manual.

deficiency_finding: Irrational weekly inSPECTION/TEST/RECORDS (VESSEL WAS LAY-BY) is a radio log.
description_overview: The GMDSS log book is not complete.
immediate_causes: Distress alarm cancellation procedure was not posted near the radio station.
root_cause_analysis: The rules for keeping the radio are not well understood.
corrective_action: The log was amended by a responsible person.
preventive_action: 2/off being told to keep the radio log up to date.

deficiency_finding: It is difficult to read the labels on the boxes.
description_overview: There is a missing LSA element.
immediate_causes: The crew was not familiar with the operation of the fixed CO2 firefighting system.
root_cause_analysis: There is no system of storing medicine in a manner.
corrective_action: It was necessary to match the number and location of the storage cabinet.
preventive_action: There is training for office workers about prescription medicine and labelling.

deficiency_finding: The new name of the ship does not correspond to the LRIT Conformance test.
description_overview: The LRIT conformance test report is not vessel specific.
immediate_causes: There are mechanical defects.
root_cause_analysis: A new LRIT conformance test was not carried out due to the change of the ship's name and management.
corrective_action: LRIT Conformance test was carried out after a new terminal was installed.
preventive_action: Before taking the vessel into the management more information about the condition of GMDSS equipment should be requested from the vessel's manager.

deficiency_finding: There is a working light in the s/g room.
description_overview: The letter of extension was issued by the company at the end of the inspection.
immediate_causes: There was a failure to follow SOLAS regulations.
root_cause_analysis: The deck lights were found burnt during the PSC inspection.
corrective_action: The steering gear room had a lump on it.
preventive_action: The electrician was told to inspect deck lights in line with the requirements.

deficiency_finding: Every candidate for certification will be required to provide evidence of having achieved the required standard of competence in accordance with the methods for demonstrating competence and the criteria for evaluating competence in columns 3 and 4 of table A-VI/S.
description_overview: PSC deficiencies may be caused by simple busted lights.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer presented the plan to the officer.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer was worried about the positive outcome of the inspection as the crew was preparing the vessel and applying maximum efforts.
corrective_action: The SSP was returned to the secure storage location by the Chief Officer.
preventive_action: The master will review the security records regularly and increase his control over the performance.

deficiency_finding: The portside vent head is not working.
description_overview: When the vent flap is not engaged in the rod, the water will cause it to detach.
immediate_causes: There is an oil mark on the cylinder liner.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of proper inspection.
corrective_action: The vent flap will not detach from the spindle rod at any position because of the longer rod.
preventive_action: If there is a possibility of the same, inspect other vent heads.

deficiency_finding: The Magnetron for both radars isn't replaced as per manufacturer's instructions.
description_overview: The forward forecastle doors are weathertight.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: The garbage category in the record book is incorrect.
description_overview: The inspector's comment is acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The garbage record book was not properly recorded after the garbage was incinerated.
corrective_action: The master reviewed and amended the garbage record book.
preventive_action: He emphasized that the category and quantity of garbage incinerated, must be recorded accurately in the Garbage record book, prior being off landed for proper disposal.

deficiency_finding: There is one light on the open deck.
description_overview: There is a navigation.
immediate_causes: An internal audit is planned for the earliest port.
root_cause_analysis: The person in charge didn't check the working condition of the light on the deck.
corrective_action: Check the lamp's working condition by changing it.
preventive_action: If there is an abnormal working condition, try to find the reason and change the bulb or repair it in time.

deficiency_finding: The ISO sockets at bay 14(SA), 18(SA), 26(SF) and 38(SF) were wasted.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Not enough to meet the requirement.
corrective_action: The crew replaced the old ISO sockets with new ones.
preventive_action: To follow the requirements.

deficiency_finding: The report was not found at the time of inspection.
description_overview: There is a certificate or documentary evidence of financial security.
immediate_causes: Carelessness is recorded in the Work and Rest hours module.
root_cause_analysis: The audit report was not printed because the instructions were not understood.
corrective_action: The audit report was presented to PSCO after being received from the office.
preventive_action: The master of the safety meeting will give a presentation to the crew at the next safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: Old edition of the code.
description_overview: The code is old edition.
immediate_causes: Oversight.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient inventory control of publications.
corrective_action: A deficiency was discussed with the bridge team.
preventive_action: (This is as per companies quarterly standard publication list - latest edition dates are given in the list).

deficiency_finding: There is one light in the CO2 room.
description_overview: The cargo ship safety equipment certificate stated that the navigation equipment was in good working condition, as it was seen by the inspector.
immediate_causes: The air filters were cleaned.
root_cause_analysis: During the routine inspection the light was not found fused, this resulted in the PSC deficiency.
corrective_action: The PSC officer was on board and immediately replaced the light in the CO2 room.
preventive_action: The master told the officer to take frequent rounds and to make sure the lights are working.

deficiency_finding: On the main deck and entrances, there is information that the ship has closed circuit television cameras, however, according to the SSP, it does not have that security equipment.
description_overview: The equipment was not listed in the SSP.
immediate_causes: There is a person named Nil.
root_cause_analysis: There is a person named Nil.
corrective_action: There is no requirement to include the equipment in SSP.
preventive_action: There is a person named Nil.

deficiency_finding: The scale draft was not readable.
description_overview: The FWD port side draft marks are covered with rust and are not clearly visible.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the long voyage, there was no option to maintain the draft marks on the last port of call.
corrective_action: Master instructed deckhands to paint at the first available port.
preventive_action: The crew was advised to keep the draft marks up to date.

deficiency_finding: There is an alarm horn in the workshop.
description_overview: The CO2 alarms on the signals column inside the engine room were not working at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: During testing of the signal light column's self-test in the workshop, it was found that the speaker was non-functional, with only the light indicators functioning as intended.
corrective_action: The staff replaced the transformer with a new spare.
preventive_action: Training: The Chief Engineer briefed concerned personnel on recognizing the early signs of transformer problems, such as unusual sounds, overheating, or unusual odors.

deficiency_finding: The lifeboat engine can't be started.
description_overview: The PSC report states that there are no records of the GMDSS reserve source of energy.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The battery is new but not fully charged.
corrective_action: PSCO was able to start the engine after the battery was fully charged and re-tested.
preventive_action: Proper supervision and more detailed inspection shall be carried out and verified by the Master to prevent oversights.

deficiency_finding: Multiple Alarms on the Main Operational Panel.
description_overview: The crew of the ship could not give a satisfactory explanation as to why the emergency power source was insufficient.
immediate_causes: Cleaned before leaving.
root_cause_analysis: The subjects of the M/E multiple alarms were found to have previously been set in "inhibit" mode.
corrective_action: As per standard procedure, a non-conformity was issued.
preventive_action: The relevant NC will be discussed on the next Safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: There are two lifejackets in the locker that are stained and in poor condition.
description_overview: There are signs and indications.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The life jackets in ECR were found to be stained and in poor condition, and an order was in place for supply in the inspection port at anchorage.
corrective_action: The life jackets which were replaced with new life jackets have been moved to accessible areas near their original location.
preventive_action: The proper planning of equipment's supply will be emphasized under the management in the form of Fleet Notice.

deficiency_finding: Garbage is stored on deck.
description_overview: There is an excessive amount of garbage between cargo holds.
immediate_causes: Clarifications and instructions were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the long voyage and stay at anchorage, the existing storage capacity for garbage was exhausted and excess garbage was temporarily transferred.
corrective_action: Garbage was to be landed at the port before the inspection vessel docked, but this service was delayed.
preventive_action: A training was done for the staff of the ships over the phone in order to add more garbage cans.

deficiency_finding: The safety test protocol was not performed on monthly bases.
description_overview: The muster station on the starboard side upper deck is not marked in the posted safety plans.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Non-compliance with plan is the primary cause.
corrective_action: According to the GMDSS test procedure, monthly call for ship to shore test was conducted.
preventive_action: Comply with the instructions of the record book.

deficiency_finding: The CO2 room fan is not working.
description_overview: After a black out test, the power was restored.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Once power is restored.
corrective_action: No action is required.
preventive_action: A common message will be sent to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: No.1, No.2 and No.3 A/E failed because of the high-pressure fuel leak alarm.
description_overview: Bunker operations records did not have records on type of fuel or total quantity received.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The fault with the alarm monitoring system was identified by ship staff and recorded in the defect list.
corrective_action: A short term safety construction certificate was issued after a technician from Makers Kongsberg attended the vessel.
preventive_action: It is necessary to carry out regular inspection and maintenance as per the system.

deficiency_finding: The NOX record should only include the ID number of the engine parts.
description_overview: In case of a low pressure, the M/E F.O. feeders and booster pumps cannot be started automatically.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of initial training.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer should have recorded the full ID - D34 DII-137TE2810 when he carried out the maintenance.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer filled the entire installed ID as per the NOx listed in front of PSCO.
preventive_action: The lesson learnt by the Chief Engineer to avoid the same mistake will be shared with all engineers.

deficiency_finding: BW should be treated at all times as the vessel is D2 certified.
description_overview: Low.
immediate_causes: The crew were not familiar with the stripping procedure of the tanks.
root_cause_analysis: The permission was taken from the flag state to take the water that was not of good quality.
corrective_action: The vessel followed proper procedures.
preventive_action: A fleetwide circular will be sent to all fleet vessels for awareness and compliance.

deficiency_finding: The current convention requires that the condition of the ship and its equipment be maintained.
description_overview: There is a manual for P and A.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The P & A manual was not amended in 2021.
corrective_action: S/I sent amendments to the vessel from the P & A manual.
preventive_action: To put on the link of COF in shipnet 1.

deficiency_finding: There was no approval from the flag.
description_overview: There was no approval from the flag.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The stability booklet had a class stamp, but the certificate showing the booklet number was missing, which the Master missed.
corrective_action: The approval certificate was obtained from the class.
preventive_action: The stability booklet approval can be found in the certificate status form AD-04.

deficiency_finding: There was a single punch of caulk between the pipes and the corrine on the deck.
description_overview: There are other DEFICIENCIES.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient supervision during shipbuilding.
corrective_action: During the inspection, the area was isolated.
preventive_action: The design review should be performed by someone other than the designers.

deficiency_finding: The sewage treatment plant's sterilants are seriously blocked.
description_overview: The watchkeepers missed a chance to check the contents of the compartment for chlorine tablets.
immediate_causes: Poor supervision and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The engineer failed to check the chlorine tablet circulation after putting it in the sterilizer.
corrective_action: The engine crew confirmed that the inside pipe has holes for the chlorine tablets circulation and a plastic tube for the chlorine tablets at the Sewage treatment plant.
preventive_action: The senior management of the Sewage Treatment Plant will inspect the plastic tube after putting the chlorine tablets in it.

deficiency_finding: All vls valves are to be tested and fully operational prior to loading.
description_overview: The SCBA sets are placed in the location as per the approved fire plan for the vessel.
immediate_causes: There was a small leak from the isolation valve during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The Teflon seat ring on the port side isolation valve was damaged when it was removed for inspection.
corrective_action: The valves will be pressure tested to the satisfaction of the vessel class society and the USCG.
preventive_action: The company's planned maintenance system will be reviewed to make sure that maintenance requirements for the VCS system and VCS system valves are complete.

deficiency_finding: The P&S rubber seals partially perished.
description_overview: The P&S rubber seals partially perished.
immediate_causes: Minor damages to Tank Dome seals were noted during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Senior officers did not adequately instruct the staff that seals must be replaced even for minor defects.
corrective_action: Replacement of tank dome seals was ordered by the chief officer.
preventive_action: Even if there are minor defects, tank dome seals must be replaced even if there is a deficiency.

deficiency_finding: Guards are around dangerous machinery.
description_overview: There are two loadline certificates that were shown during inspection.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: There is not a place for welding/hot works in the ER workshop.
corrective_action: The engine workshop has a hot working area.
preventive_action: Fleet Circular related protection guard for the hot working area should be issued asap.

deficiency_finding: During inspection, the emergency generator room can not be closed.
description_overview: Fire damper for engine room ventilation fan no.2 was conducted additional test as well as PMS, but ship's crew had conducted cursory inspection without details, as he hadn't known the damper closed completely or not.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of inspection and maintenance is the cause of inadequate supervision.
corrective_action: After chipping and de-rusting the ventilation can be operated properly, the C.E immediately give order to Engineers to check and maintenance flap shaft and greasing.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be shared with other vessels in the fleet as a part of information exchange and raising awareness to prevent recurrence.

deficiency_finding: Equipment and loading instrument are included in cargo operations.
description_overview: The stability booklet states that shearing forces that do not comply with condition are found in the last loading computer test.
immediate_causes: The results of the test hadn't been compared with the protocol.
root_cause_analysis: Other Factors: N/A.
corrective_action: The PSCO accepted the rectification and closed the deficiency after a new test of the loading computer was carried out.
preventive_action: A minimum of 3 months is recommended for loading computer tests, along with details of relevant requirements.

deficiency_finding: The gyro compass is not synchronized with the master gyro compass.
description_overview: The difference between gyro was noticed while carrying out the steering gear drill.
immediate_causes: Bridge officers and engineers were briefed on arrival checks on steering gear.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient inspection of the steering fear room.
corrective_action: The gyro's were synchronized immediately.
preventive_action: Proper checks of steering gear prior arrival/departure checks will be added to the data base.

deficiency_finding: There is an oil leak on the lower platform and the floor needs to be cleaned.
description_overview: Many ER floor plates are not secured by screws.
immediate_causes: There was a lack of inspection in the lower platform and a failure to identify the hazard in the turning wheel.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient design.
corrective_action: Fresh water mixed with soap powder was used to clean the flooring.
preventive_action: There will be a weekly inspection to be made.

deficiency_finding: The cooling sea water inlet pipe was leaking.
description_overview: The forecastle cracked about 12 metres above waterline frames due to the same collision.
immediate_causes: There is a leak in the way of pipe connections on the cooler end plates.
root_cause_analysis: The Nav Log Book did not record the sea temperature.
corrective_action: Delivery is scheduled for the vessels next discharge port at China by the end of October.
preventive_action: Once exchange is required, the end covers for the LT Cooler #1 will be available.

deficiency_finding: The buoy release pins are difficult to remove.
description_overview: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
immediate_causes: The deficiency was corrected during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The company's procedures state that the safety officer is responsible for checking the overall condition of all safety equipment.
corrective_action: The Monthly PSCI performance will be used as loss prevention for all crew awareness.
preventive_action: The Monthly PSCI performance will be used as loss prevention for all crew awareness.

deficiency_finding: The clumps of the hair don't work very well.
description_overview: Mooring equipment.

root_cause_analysis: The exposure is high.
corrective_action: Repairs were made by shipboard staff before departure.
preventive_action: Monthly shipboard safety management meeting 30/APR to be discussed with all crew.

deficiency_finding: The surfaces of the exhaust were not properly insulated.
description_overview: The gas detection equipment will be designed to sample and analyse from each line of the protected space at intervals not exceeding 30 minutes.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: Crew requested a replacement for thermal insulation for the no.2 auxiliary generator because it was not enough to cover the exposed surface.
corrective_action: During PSC Inspection, the lagging insulation for the No.2 generator engine has been replaced after it was damaged.
preventive_action: The Company share this issue with all vessels and instructs them about following points.

deficiency_finding: The davit hooks are not safe.
description_overview: There is safety management.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of maintenance and not following company instructions is a problem.
corrective_action: It is working in good order.

deficiency_finding: EEBD for training is not marked.
description_overview: The pressure on the bridge was less than recommended.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The third officer doesn't talk about the training purpose.
corrective_action: The training purpose was marked by the third officer.
preventive_action: The LSA/FFA must be inspected and maintained by the third officer.

deficiency_finding: Load line mark is not painted as the requirements.

immediate_causes: Lack of knowledge is one of the reasons for inadequate training and leadership.
root_cause_analysis: There is a requirement to follow rules and regulations.
corrective_action: There was a safety meeting about this non-conformity.
preventive_action: In order to avoid re-enforcement, non-conformity must be washed in order to be checked by experts.

deficiency_finding: The symbol Mark for E/G is missing.
description_overview: All the vessels need to have a certain number of mandatory, hazard, safety, fire, direction and prohibitory signs.
immediate_causes: Lack of knowledge is one of the reasons for inadequate training and leadership.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge is one of the reasons for inadequate training and leadership.
corrective_action: The symbols should be posted immediately by the safety officer.
preventive_action: The crew was given training about the importance of the safety signs.

deficiency_finding: The emergency battery for the ocean signal expired.
description_overview: The Captain's medical certificate expired at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The company tried to purchase the battery during the port stay in Argentina, but the battery was not in stock, so the company had to use the next port of calls Mina Zayed and Jebel Ali.
corrective_action: The battery was received on board during a port stay.
preventive_action: If known, better planning will be ensured by the company.

deficiency_finding: There is a free fall life boat.
description_overview: There is no safe way to get to the free fall emergency light.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: The safety officer didn't follow company guidelines.
corrective_action: Cleaned free fall wind chime.
preventive_action: The safety officer was told to keep the free fall window clean.

deficiency_finding: Heavy parts stored on deck are not protected from movement.
description_overview: Heavy parts stored on deck are not protected from movement.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The old used spare was not accepted by the reception facility at the port.
corrective_action: The old used spare was secured with wire lashings.
preventive_action: The team discussed the importance of removing all loose items from the main Weather deck and storing them inside the stores before sailing to sea.

deficiency_finding: The inventory for fire detonation system is not correct.
description_overview: There is a lack of familiarity with the system.
immediate_causes: There were different locations for fire nozzles.
root_cause_analysis: The locations of the fire detectors are not verified against the fire alarm panel during a routine test.

preventive_action: All ships in the fleet have been told to check the zone number of the fire sensor to make sure it matches the zone number on the fire detection panel.

deficiency_finding: Some crew members couldn't understand the established working language on board.

immediate_causes: The emergency generator was isolated and the supply to the emergency switchboard was cut off.
root_cause_analysis: Engine crew lack of working language training according to company SMS files.
corrective_action: The state vessel's working language is English.
preventive_action: The A05 training plan states that we need serious training and learning.

deficiency_finding: The emergency diesel generator fuel tank is not marked.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: When logging out, INM-C was not closely monitored and checked by the duty deck officer due to lack of safety and situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: Although the Emergency Diesel Generator has marks with tank full capacity, the PSC officer required to indicate marks also the 18.0 hrs working hours of the Emergency Diesel Generator as well.
corrective_action: The post marked for 18.0 hours of work at maximum capacity.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer spoke to the crew about the importance of marking the Emergency Diesel Generator tank for easy identification.

deficiency_finding: Incinerator operations and operating manual.

root_cause_analysis: It was decided that there was no imminent safety concern because of the wear on the furnace door.
corrective_action: Our crew proceeded with the necessary repair because the required material was onboard.
preventive_action: All managed vessels were made aware of the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: There were CO2 pipes on the deck.

immediate_causes: The ship crew doesn't have a concept of garbage management.
root_cause_analysis: Improper extension of service life Windlass P/S gypsies are in poor condition and need to be renewed.
corrective_action: After checking on the condition of the CO2 pipes on the deck, it was confirmed that there was no leaking or broken pipes, and then the jobs of de-rusting/painting maintenance were arranged for the pipes with serious rust condition.

deficiency_finding: It was not possible for Vessel to implement cyber risk management.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency light outside of the funnel.

corrective_action: Grease the moving parts and reset the stopping block.
preventive_action: Engineers are trained to reset the emergency shut off valve.

deficiency_finding: There is no eye wash in the paint locker.

preventive_action: a) Before departure a circular letter has been sent to fleet and Company depts in order to clarify this issue and the renewal requirements of statutory certificates

deficiency_finding: Not required.

deficiency_finding: Not resting on the quay side, the ladder is hanging in the wires.

preventive_action: Setting up training records and checking the tightness of the wire rope of the accommodation ladder are two ways to strengthen the on-site inspection of ship leaders.
