immediate_causes: Lack of distribution of standard.
root_cause_analysis: PSC officers requested the vessel to have posted the collective bargaining agreement as well.
corrective_action: To the satisfaction of the PSC officers, the CBA was posted immediately.
preventive_action: In due time deficiency will be shared with all managed vessels.

deficiency_finding: LSA locker A on deck B had restricted access due to equipment being stowed in the locker preventing the items from being easy to use.
description_overview: The eye wash kit was not returned after the paint room was cleaned last week.
immediate_causes: There is a lifeboat seat that fell due to rough weather.
root_cause_analysis: Some of the spare boxes were kept on the floor because of the rough weather in the North Atlantic Ocean.
corrective_action: All loose equipment was secured to prevent further movement.
preventive_action: After any heavy weather, the lockers should be checked and the additional gear moved to an alternate room with proper rack arrangement.

deficiency_finding: The power went out at high density and narrow water.
description_overview: At the stage of inspection, there isn't any further action on root cause analysis.
immediate_causes: There was an inadequate check after the blackout test.
root_cause_analysis: The crews failed to drain the water from the tanks.
corrective_action: The G/E worked normally after the water was drained from the service tanks.
preventive_action: The duty engineer will check the service tanks and drain water at least daily during the E/R watch.

deficiency_finding: The NOX record should only include the ID number of the engine parts.
description_overview: In case of a low pressure, the M/E F.O. feeders and booster pumps cannot be started automatically.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of initial training.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Engineer should have recorded the full ID - D34 DII-137TE2810 when he carried out the maintenance.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer filled the entire installed ID as per the NOx listed in front of PSCO.
preventive_action: The lesson learnt by the Chief Engineer to avoid the same mistake will be shared with all engineers.

deficiency_finding: The expired date was for the HRU marking.
description_overview: The company must take corrective action on the ISM system within 3 months.
immediate_causes: Not under their control.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient practice.
corrective_action: The importance of checking the equipment's expiry date was discussed during the safety meeting.
preventive_action: The importance of checking the HRU actual expiry was discussed during the safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: At the time of inspection, the self-closing arrangement on Fire Doors was missing.
description_overview: There is a lack of familiarity with SSP Confidentiality on who is not authorized to look into the manual.
immediate_causes: Individual and group violations by lack of supervision.
root_cause_analysis: Individual and group violations by lack of supervision.
corrective_action: There are Sel-Closing devices in the CO2 room.
preventive_action: It has been verified that the fire door arrangements are in line with the fire safety plan.

deficiency_finding: The ships gangways and pilot ladders were missing load test certified plates.
description_overview: All of the vessels managed by the company are equipped with a dedicated software that is used to electronically maintain the hours of work and rest records by the onboard crew.
immediate_causes: The agent didn't report to the PSC office because he didn't receive the letter from the flag.
root_cause_analysis: During the gangway examination the PSC inspector saw the stencil on the ladder platform but not make any inquiry about certified plates from ship's builders to the Chief Officer who escorted him on the deck.
corrective_action: Since the delivery of the vessel, Placards have been installed in the vicinity of the ladders.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: PSCO observed damaged lagging on the F.O.
description_overview: The electronic water level sensor is not insulated.
immediate_causes: PSCO found damage to the insulation lagging of the M/E return lines.
root_cause_analysis: The insulation cloth of M/E F.O. sytem has not been inspected.
corrective_action: Both M/E return lines have lagging insulation.
preventive_action: Chief Engineer instructed all engineer officers and engine ratings on engine room watch to ensure that all surfaces with high temperature should be inspected regularly at each watch and that they are properly insulated to prevent fire in case they are hit by fuel oil leaks.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire hydrant leaking.
description_overview: There was no fire hydrant on the forward side.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The last inspection of hydrants was done before the PSC inspection.
corrective_action: The closed out of the deficiency was credited by the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The Marpol Consolidated Book did not have a new edition.
description_overview: The Marpol Consolidated Book did not have a new edition.
immediate_causes: I found a new edition of Marpol Consolidated in Witherby Connect.
root_cause_analysis: PIC was first time using Witherby and didn't know much about it.
corrective_action: The deck officers refreshed their understanding of the proper operation of Witherby.
preventive_action: Deck officers must be familiar with access to digital publications.

deficiency_finding: My head is leaking.
description_overview: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
immediate_causes: There is an oil mark on the cylinder liner.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of paying attention to detail.
corrective_action: Keep the work area clean after work by inspecting additional leaks in the main engine.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is an oil leak on the lower platform and the floor needs to be cleaned.
description_overview: Many ER floor plates are not secured by screws.
immediate_causes: There was a lack of inspection in the lower platform and a failure to identify the hazard in the turning wheel.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient design.
corrective_action: Fresh water mixed with soap powder was used to clean the flooring.
preventive_action: There will be a weekly inspection to be made.

deficiency_finding: The supplies of ozon depleting substances will be recorded in the record book.
description_overview: The PSC deficiency was caused by the PSC Inspector keeping the records in hard copy.
immediate_causes: ISM Code regulation 11 'Documentation' is misinterpreted.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient training and inadequate supervision.
corrective_action: The Ozone-Depleting Substances Record Book has been updated for the shipment on September 22, 2022, as per the requirement.
preventive_action: The training on the recording methods and requirements of the Ozone-Depleting Substances Record Book was conducted by the C/E.

deficiency_finding: The lights of the NUC.
description_overview: Arcs of visibility are not for NUC lights.
immediate_causes: The bottle brush used for testing the alarm signal of the OWS 15PPM monitor is missing.
root_cause_analysis: The 2nd officer was responsible for checking the navigation equipment and did not detect the inadequate light.
corrective_action: Ensure that the blinding sector of the affected light is corrected.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness in the entire fleet, the deficiency will be shared within the Bi-Weekly Compliance Check.

deficiency_finding: The Fire plan does not clearly mark EEBD for training.
description_overview: The pressure on the bridge was less than recommended.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Training EEBD was marked "For training purpose only" on the equipment, but it was also marked as "spare EEBD" on the Fire plan.
corrective_action: The spare EEBD for Training was indicated on all copies of the Fire plan.
preventive_action: The Fire Plan will be thoroughly checked to make sure it matches the location and description indicated on it.

deficiency_finding: There was a leaking deck shower in front of the accommodation.
description_overview: There was a small leak from the shower at the front of the building.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of anticipation is a personal factor.
corrective_action: After the PSC left the ship, the eyes were cleaned and the gasKET was replaced.
preventive_action: All of the other showers were checked by the ship staff to make sure they were working correctly.

deficiency_finding: There was ice in the Fish room.
description_overview: There is ice in the Fish room due to high temperature and humidity.
immediate_causes: The fuel injection pump drain was found in place at the time of the last inspection.
root_cause_analysis: When entering and exiting the fish room, the galley crew left the door open for a long time.
corrective_action: Before the port inspector leaves the vessel, deficiency is solved.
preventive_action: The electrician was told to pay more attention to this kind of deficiency and to immediately report it to the chief cook.

deficiency_finding: The radar band is inoperative.
description_overview: The ship name port of registry was found faded due to long period on the sea without specific maintenance.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: During the daily use and inspection, the radar was found fails, it could not be repaired by crew under shore-based guidance due to the lack of spare parts, although the application for exemption has been made to the registry authority and got it, the deficiency still accured.
corrective_action: Maintenance personnel were arranged by the shore-based party.
preventive_action: The regularly maintenance should be strengthened.

deficiency_finding: The vessel certificate expires in August of 2022.
description_overview: The annual verification was found to have expired.
immediate_causes: Statutory Certificates will be expired at the next port of call due to vessel trade.
root_cause_analysis: The staff of the ship missed out on the verification of the issued certificate.
corrective_action: Subject to the successful completion of occasional surveys at the next port of call, the postponement of Class and Statutory renewal surveys will not be objected to.
preventive_action: If he is satisfied with the condition of the equipment for the recommended period of extension, the service can be extended by three months.

deficiency_finding: There is a pipe between the engine room and the gear room.
description_overview: The inspector believes that the marking does not comply with the requirements of SOLAS XI-1/3.
immediate_causes: Ladders for liferaft are due for a shore strength test.
root_cause_analysis: The maintenance procedure was not followed.
corrective_action: The anti-fire material was used to block the pipe.
preventive_action: Train all crew the FJDS-SP-EL 10-04C ship's Precautionary Inspection, Maintenance Period and Distribution.

deficiency_finding: The list of ship stations and maritime mobile service identity assignments is outdated.
description_overview: In the crew mess room, it was observed that the certificates were not pasted.
immediate_causes: The P&I certificate copy that was on display in the Mess room was outdated and not replaced with a new one.
root_cause_analysis: List of ship stations and maritime mobile service identity assignments (list v) was outdated and a new delivery was pending from the subscription supplier.
corrective_action: The delivery of the List of ship stations and maritime mobile service identity assignments (list v) could not be delivered at the vessel's current port.
preventive_action: If nautical publications in subscription cannot be delivered timely and as per subscription, vessels within the fleet are advised to monitor the ship's library and order locally the required nautical publications for the intended voyage well in time with active pre-planning.

deficiency_finding: Sewage treatment plant equipment is out of order.
description_overview: There is a sewage treatment plant.
immediate_causes: The sewage treatment plant was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: He overlooked two failed components because he didn't have enough experience in servicing the plant.
corrective_action: The vessel was allowed to sail out after the condition of class(CC) was imposed.
preventive_action: Sewage treatment plant maintenance and operations is part of standard engineering competency, however this case will be published in quarterly QHSSE bulletin in order to improve awareness.

deficiency_finding: The steering gear overload alarm is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The inspector looked at all the alarms of the rudder pumps.
immediate_causes: The lack of marking on the relay caused the alarm.
root_cause_analysis: The lack of marking on the relay caused the alarm.
corrective_action: It was rectified before departure.
preventive_action: There was a case of subjective opinion of PSCO.

deficiency_finding: The local temperature of the vegetable cold room was malfunctioning and the galley refrigerator's local temperature was inoperative.
description_overview: The refrigerator lines were found with a lot of ice.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: Master made a request for new thermometers to replace the defect on and to have spare ones in case of any other.
preventive_action: During the Ad-Hoc Safety Committee Meeting Master highlighted the importance of the follow-up procedures as per Company's Form S001 HSH Inspection checklist.

deficiency_finding: There was a single punch of caulk between the pipes and the corrine on the deck.
description_overview: There are other DEFICIENCIES.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient supervision during shipbuilding.
corrective_action: During the inspection, the area was isolated.
preventive_action: The design review should be performed by someone other than the designers.

deficiency_finding: There is not a toothbrush room.
description_overview: There are no rubber mats in the engine room.
immediate_causes: The store at fore peak has some lamps that burn-out.
root_cause_analysis: PSC officer considered that all operation concern electric insulation should be protected by materials which are easily overlooked by crew because it is not easy to get an electric shock through the 24V battery.
corrective_action: The mats were provided in the battery room.
preventive_action: During the inspection process, hidden or easily overlooked areas are often more prone to problems, and more attention should be given to them.

deficiency_finding: The Sewage Treatment Plant did not operate as per instructions.
description_overview: There was no visible flow of liquid in the transparent observation pipe on top of the sewage treatment plant during the test.
immediate_causes: Chemicals used to clean the toilet bowl may affect the performance of the sewage treatment plant.
root_cause_analysis: Cleaning agent causes bubbles in the toilet bowls.
corrective_action: Transferred sewage to clean drain tank then cleaned the following tanks.
preventive_action: The company instructed the Master to shorten the cleaning time at the Sewage Treatment Plant.

deficiency_finding: A/C room insulation is damaged.
description_overview: The Engine room has 4 chairs that are damaged.
immediate_causes: Lack of immigration is a problem.
root_cause_analysis: Not fully checked rounding manual.
preventive_action: SI reg instructed the eng crew to ensure proper installation of the insulation materials.

deficiency_finding: There are two inflatable liferafts in portside, but there are only two inflatable liferafts in the certificate.
description_overview: There are two inflatable liferafts in portside, but there are only two inflatable liferafts in the certificate.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: For her last annual service of the liferafts, for vessel calling remote, the vessel is on long-term agreement with the Viking for delivery of fully serviced liferafts of 2x 16 persons on exchange annually, in compliance with the LSA capacity of the vessel.
corrective_action: The amended capacity and revised Form-E were notified by the class.
preventive_action: The Monthly Findings list and deficiency will be shared with the Fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: There are spots on the steam pipes, pressure pipes, wires, and Port Side CO2 system pipes.
description_overview: The crew was unable to conduct proper maintenance on the CO2 system pipes due to bad weather and water spray on deck.
immediate_causes: The crew did not properly inspect and maintain the equipment.
corrective_action: Wherever necessary, CO2 pipes were checked and maintained.
preventive_action: The weather permitting.

deficiency_finding: There isn't enough time for a fuel change before entering SECA.
description_overview: The inspector was presented with a request for a fuel change for VLSFO with a max sulfur content of 0.10%.
immediate_causes: Insufficient review instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow correct documentation procedure is a problem.
corrective_action: The Fuel changeover procedure has been amended to show min 45 min timing and the use of a calculator.
preventive_action: The courses are for Master and 2nd officer.

deficiency_finding: Four of eight washers were missing.
description_overview: During the PSC Inspection at Yokkaichi PSC Officer Maeda Takuma imposed a deficiency.
immediate_causes: The ship safety officer did not report the deficiency.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge of international shore connection inspection did not notice that 4 of 8 washers were missing.
corrective_action: The officer in charge was asked to make missing washers available.
preventive_action: An additional meeting and training held by Master with all crew during which it was discussed the importance of proper and effective checks to be carried out to firefighting equipment.

deficiency_finding: Exhaust manifolds have insufficient heat insulation.
description_overview: The new insulation was found to be insufficient after completion of routine maintenance.
immediate_causes: Generator No. 1 has a Defective Exhaust Pipe Thermometer.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear are part of a routine.
corrective_action: New insulation was used.
preventive_action: The chief engineer held a meeting with all crew to emphasize the importance of compliance with the PMS routines and replacement of worn out parts.

deficiency_finding: The engine room air conditioner isn't working.
description_overview: The anti-heeling system is not good.
immediate_causes: The Bridge A/C unit was switched off when the galley fire alarm was being tested.
root_cause_analysis: All living conditions and spaces should be maintained and equipment should be in good order at all times according to the company's established procedures.
corrective_action: The PSCI report states that the air conditioner unit was replaced by a new one.
preventive_action: A post-inspection analysis to identify weaknesses and lessons learned carried out for continuous improvement was provided to all involved shipboard staff.

deficiency_finding: There is a galley cooktop exhaust that accumulates oil.
description_overview: The floor plate of the Purifier room No.2 was found to have oil on it.
immediate_causes: The fuel injection pump drain was found in place at the time of the last inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There are four things that are not to comply with fire safety requirement.
corrective_action: The crew was arranged to clean the exhaust trunking.
preventive_action: The master should strengthen recheck and supervision of safety equipment.

deficiency_finding: There were instances of violation of requirements for minimum hours of rest during the months of January and February.
description_overview: Identified and recorded broken rules were related to Master's and Chief Engineer's extra occupation during vessel's pilotage.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The root cause of the deficiency was caused by a type error at the time of completion.
corrective_action: The training for the officers who are responsible for the completion of the work and rest hours was carried out by the Marine Supremo.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer and the 2nd Engineer were warned about the proper implementation of the working arrangement.

deficiency_finding: To be fixed by June 14th 2024.
description_overview: As soon as the vessel reported a malfunction, the Company requested a dispensation letter from the flag until necessary spare parts are delivered.
immediate_causes: The bridge navigational watch alarm system is operated by the master and navigation officers.
root_cause_analysis: The extended service life of the battery causes it to wear and tear.
corrective_action: The battery was found to be malfunctioning and a defect report was issued.
preventive_action: The Safety Committee Meeting took place after the inspection in order to emphasize the importance of thorough inspections.

deficiency_finding: The meat has been put back in the freezer.
description_overview: Charterers arranged to supply LSFO 120 MT in PM on the same day that Ocean Venus accepted the renewal audit.
immediate_causes: Instructions to the vessel were given to the company.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision by superiors resulted in the lack of awareness of CCK.
corrective_action: To not be frozen again once unfrozen, CCK was instructed.
preventive_action: The procedures from the safety manual were advised by CCK.

deficiency_finding: The speed log is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The speed log is not working.
immediate_causes: The duty officer couldn't demonstrate properly to the PSC inspector.
root_cause_analysis: There is a malfunction of the speed log sensor.
corrective_action: Service ordered.
preventive_action: The service was carried out by Radio Holland.

deficiency_finding: The crane hook safety latch was seized.
description_overview: The crane is out of commission.
immediate_causes: Human physical constraints are caused by error.
root_cause_analysis: The crew failed to identify the seized safety latch of the portside crane during the monthly inspection.
corrective_action: After leaving the port of Geelong, the crew dismantled the hook, transferred it to the workshop and fixed the safety latch.
preventive_action: During the extra Safety Committee Meeting, the importance of proper inspection and maintenance onboard will be emphasized.

deficiency_finding: Aft side twindeck support fender are found to be in bad shape.
description_overview: The standard compass error was not determined by a watch.
immediate_causes: The storage position of the accommodation side was scratched by pontoons.
root_cause_analysis: Poor planning and heavy weather.
corrective_action: The vessel needs good weather and time to be painted.
preventive_action: The twd storage was painted.

deficiency_finding: The ship's length was wrong in the test report.
description_overview: The ship's navigation system malfunctioned.
immediate_causes: The date in the test report was wrong.
root_cause_analysis: Master missed out on the ship's length mentioned in the last test report because of a Typo error.
corrective_action: A corrected copy of the test report was received and PSCO verified it.
preventive_action: All certificates received onboard should be checked for details and any Typo errors should be addressed immediately.

deficiency_finding: SART/AIS-SART is not working.
description_overview: The battery of the SART was showing an end of life date at the time of inspection.
immediate_causes: There was a positive test result after the last test.
root_cause_analysis: During the last transit of a high-risk area in the southern Red Sea to the Gulf of Aden the ship's SART system was completely switched off as per security protocol.
corrective_action: After some time, the power supply was restored, but not from the second SART.
preventive_action: As the system had been switched off during a high-risk area, the Master and responsible persons were advised to check the system once a year.

deficiency_finding: RATE NOT COVERED UPTO MAX SUMMER DRAFT.
description_overview: The Bilge and Sludge discharge shore connection is the original since the vessel was delivered from the shipyard.
immediate_causes: None was identified.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel has only a treated sewage holding tank so it does not need to apply for cert.
corrective_action: Master told PSCO that it does not need to apply to the subject vessel.
preventive_action: The name of the sewage holding tank should be changed from sewage holding tank to sewage treated water holding tank in the drawing of the piping diagram.

deficiency_finding: There is a record of the inspection for the galley and provisions that are missing.
description_overview: Title 3 is The Regulations and the Code.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
corrective_action: Records to missing parts should be put in the official logbook.
preventive_action: To properly record as per required intervals, education was given to all deck officers.

deficiency_finding: The crane's protection guard is poor.
description_overview: The observations were made due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: Proper rectification was not scheduled because of the absence of the protection cover.
corrective_action: The protection guard was restored after corrective actions were initiated.
preventive_action: Protection guards are provided to all moving gears.

deficiency_finding: The E/G room has an emergency switch board and PCS emergency lights on top of it.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There is lack of regular inspection by the Responsible crews.
corrective_action: The 2 PCS emergency lights became normal after being renewed.
preventive_action: The master held a safety meeting to address the issue to engine room crews to check the emergency lights.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence of receiving acknowledgment for the weekly DSC test call to the nearest coast station.
description_overview: The inspector asked the 3rd officer to demonstrate the procedure for sending the test message, but he couldn't explain the procedure for changing-over from AC to DC power.
immediate_causes: A malfunction in the antenna unit caused the system to stop working.
root_cause_analysis: The investigation shows that the last DSC test was not recorded in the GMDSS logbook.
corrective_action: The test record was properly recorded into the GMDSS logbook.
preventive_action: Testing GMDSS equipment requirements to be discussed, extra attention to be paid during testing of GMDSS equipment and proper records.

deficiency_finding: There is a dirty air duct gratings filter in the steering gear room.
description_overview: The engine room fire damper could not close because of a locking pin stuck in the fan housing.
immediate_causes: The engine room duct was not inspected and the Blind cover was not noticed by the ship staff.
root_cause_analysis: The duct gratings filter was not maintained by the Engine Crew.
corrective_action: The engine crew was given instructions by the technical manager to maintain the air duct gratings filter after the PSC inspection.

deficiency_finding: The computer test was not presented.
description_overview: PSC Officer asked for checked loading conditions during Annual surveys by Class against approved loading conditions that were not onboard.
immediate_causes: The elevator needed extended service because it was not operational.
root_cause_analysis: In all Fleet, we print loading conditions and are being stamped by RO in order to verify accuracy by checking conditions against the approved ones.
corrective_action: The statement was presented to the authorities.
preventive_action: A training session was carried out by the Master to all Crew regarding this issue and highlighted the need of keeping checked loading conditions during Annual surveys in case requested by 3rd parties' inspections.

deficiency_finding: The last survey date for the main deck cargo crane was not marked.
description_overview: When the vent flap is not engaged in the rod, the water will cause it to detach.
immediate_causes: The vessel was unable to apply the stencil in time due to the sudden berthing schedule.
root_cause_analysis: Poor work planning and supervision.
corrective_action: The crane has a survey date stenciled on it.
preventive_action: If the berthing schedule is uncertain, it's not a good idea to do cosmetics prior to arrival port.

deficiency_finding: The Government of the Republic of Singapore has the authority to issue the Engine International Air Pollution Prevention Certificate.
description_overview: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
immediate_causes: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
root_cause_analysis: Although there were EIAPPs cert issued by previous class DNV on behalf of the Bahamas flag, the same were not presented to PSC officers during inspection.
corrective_action: A new detailed index of vessel certificates files was established and followed by the Master.
preventive_action: The ship's certificates maintenance, correct location to be filed as per Company's establish index of certificates was discussed with Master and all senior officers.

deficiency_finding: The light on the bridge malfunctioned.
description_overview: The last watch for the voyage from Dardanelles to Constanta did not include an entry for related error calculation.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The use of one light during the sea passage is excessive.
corrective_action: Master told the electrical officer to check the bulb after he found it working well.
preventive_action: The master briefed the bridge team on the causes of navigation light failure.

deficiency_finding: The doors of the battery room, deck escape trunk, emergency steering gear room, and deck crane no. 4 are all corroded.
description_overview: The doors of the battery room, deck escape trunk, emergency steering gear room, and deck crane no. 4 are all corroded.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: During the last class ISM audit, it was pointed out to the ship staff that there were some problems with the external doors.
corrective_action: Watertight doors have parts that are de-rusted.
preventive_action: It is necessary to carry out proper maintenance as per HPMS.

deficiency_finding: There is a certificate of financial security relating to shipowners' liability.
description_overview: Firefighting outfits on board are fire proximity suits type and may not provide the wearer sufficient thermal protection from radiated heat if entering an enclosed space including machinery and accommodation spaces where a fire is established.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human Cause - Failure to follow procedure.
corrective_action: The crew replaced the latest copy of the certificate immediately.
preventive_action: Fleet messages are sent to all vessels to make sure they are in compliance.

deficiency_finding: The insulation alarm is defective.
description_overview: The insulation alarm is defective.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There are electric current dangers and inadequate inspection.
corrective_action: Immediately after completion of the inspection, 220 V and 440V were restored within acceptable limits.
preventive_action: Master conducted an additional safety meeting, discussing / analyzing the inspection's general process and the recorded deficiencies nature, in an effort to identify further measures to prevent similar remarks in the future.

deficiency_finding: The handlingroom is damaged.
description_overview: Several tiles were broken or loose.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.

deficiency_finding: There is a torch light in a boat.
description_overview: The torch was not water proof.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The Rescue boat torch was replaced with a new spare torch.
preventive_action: The officers were told that LSA/FFA equipment should be kept onboard in a state of readiness at all times.

deficiency_finding: The table of shipboard working arrangement is not correct.
description_overview: The table of shipboard working arrangement poster does not reflect the actual work and rest schedule of engine room personnel.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The times in the shipboard working arrangement are not in line with the actual working hours form.
corrective_action: It needs to be prepared in accordance with the hours of the company.
preventive_action: The master has been instructed to assign able seafarer watch and work schedule.

deficiency_finding: There is no form of non-formity.
description_overview: There is a fault on the panels of the fire alarm.
immediate_causes: Installation problems and vessel's inherent vibration are to blame for the hairline crack.
root_cause_analysis: The problem is with the configuration of the already existing set up.
corrective_action: The crew on board are aware of the case due to the fact that the spare parts have a long delivery date.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness, deficiency was discussed with all crew.

deficiency_finding: The first aid kit was not kept in the rescue boat.
description_overview: Some of the medicines inside the first aid box need to be replaced.
immediate_causes: The first aid kit of the rescue boat was not put back after the shipyard.
root_cause_analysis: There was inadequate job delegation and supervision.
corrective_action: The first aid kit was put into the rescue boat immediately.
preventive_action: feedback is shared with all fleet vessels

deficiency_finding: The safety net of the gangway wasn't assembled correctly.
description_overview: The main engine fuel oil leakage alarm was bypassed.
immediate_causes: Errors were allowed to go undetected because of inadequate Monitoring and supervision during the assembly and rigging process.
root_cause_analysis: Errors were allowed to go undetected because of inadequate Monitoring and supervision during the assembly and rigging process.
corrective_action: The Gangway safety net was rigged correctly.
preventive_action: The crew was briefed on proper monitoring and care to be taken while rigging the safety net.

deficiency_finding: The operation on the deck is not able to observe the lifeboat at all times during the launching.
description_overview: There is exhaust gas leaking into the cabin.
immediate_causes: Operators were not able to observe the life boat at all times because the remote-control wire was not long enough.
root_cause_analysis: The remote-control wire must be long enough to allow the lifeboat to be safely launched and controlled from a distance.
corrective_action: The remote-control wire of P and S Life boats will be changed to a longer one which will allow operators to observe the life boat at all times.
preventive_action: If an appropriate length remote-control wire is used, the case will be shared among all fleets.

deficiency_finding: There was some pasta with worms.
description_overview: During the last monthly inspection, all provision items were found to be in good condition.
immediate_causes: Testing was carried out after the repair and it was found to be in good working order.
root_cause_analysis: The inspection was inadequate.
corrective_action: The spoiled pasta was thrown away.
preventive_action: The Galley staff has been briefed by the master to ensure proper inspection of all provision items and any sign of spoilt items to be safely dispose of.

deficiency_finding: The Collective Bargaining Agreement for Phillipino crew members is not available.
description_overview: The wage tables were not included in the CBA that was presented to the inspector.
immediate_causes: Not identified.
root_cause_analysis: There is missing documentation.
corrective_action: The wage scale has been uploaded in the documentation system.
preventive_action: The missing pages of the annex were identified due to a transferring error.

deficiency_finding: The main unit of the voyage data recorder has a connection failure.
description_overview: Not working.
immediate_causes: After the vessel reported the failure, the company did not arrange necessary repair service.
root_cause_analysis: The VDR was left unrepaired because the company PIC did not understand the importance of the case.
corrective_action: The short-term SE certificate was issued by Class NK for the occasional survey on the vessel in San Lorenzo.
preventive_action: Technical group members will be reminded of the importance of the navigation systems and equipment listed in the SE Cert Form E.

deficiency_finding: Load Line marks are no longer on the Stbd side paint.
description_overview: Load line marks are unreadable.
immediate_causes: The current trading pattern of the vessel causes inadequate preventive checks on the vacuum side of the valve.
root_cause_analysis: It has not been possible to re-paint the load line marks due to unfavorable weather conditions during the last voyages.
corrective_action: The master was given permission to paint the starboard side plimsol mark during the port stay.
preventive_action: The draft marks on the Port and Stbd side of the vessel are checked by the master to make sure they are readable.

deficiency_finding: Plates with food for crew stored on galley cabinet and not kept refrigerated in refrigerator
description_overview: Dirty floors under cabinets and Plates with food for crew stored on galley cabinet and not kept refrigerated in refrigerator are some of the issues that have been noted prior to the inspection.
immediate_causes: Poor hygiene and food safety can be found in the galley equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient good working practice.
corrective_action: Hotel staff were told to clean up the galley after dinner.
preventive_action: The deck and engine crew have discussed the deficiency to make sure it is fixed after the job is done.

deficiency_finding: Oil record books and working hours reports don't match.
description_overview: The record books of engine parameters are not always filled in.
immediate_causes: The records and photographic evidence of the last drill were verified by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of awareness and inadequate supervision.
corrective_action: The oil record book was immediately corrected and implemented according to the crew's schedule.
preventive_action: The officers were told to make entries of crew working hours in the day according to the actual operations of the vessel.

deficiency_finding: The contract was terminated without a flag state permission.
description_overview: The chief engineer and 3rd engineer joined VESSEL at the same time, but they didn't get their email addresses in time.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of two man verification check.
root_cause_analysis: The company did not follow up on the mission.
corrective_action: The company should apply for a renewal of the contract.
preventive_action: To make the management of the company apply for the mission in order to avoid the dangers associated with the main contract.

deficiency_finding: Endorsement by state.
description_overview: Master instructed to make sure original Malta endorsement is onboard at the earliest opportunity.
immediate_causes: V/L only had a Scan copy of CSR and LRIT certificate.
root_cause_analysis: There was a soft copy of the Malta endorsement available onboard at the time of the inspection.
corrective_action: The fleet personnel department is waiting for details of the next port of call where the Original Malta endorsement will be delivered.
preventive_action: All crew must have valid original documents before joining a vessel.

deficiency_finding: There is seggregation of dangerous goods.
description_overview: The condition of the ship and its equipment will be monitored to ensure that it is fit for purpose without endangering the people on board.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew's failure to assess the condition of the forecastle door caused the bad condition.
corrective_action: The Buson Store Corroded knife edge area was welded with a new plate.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer and the Chief Engineer were invited to a live training session by the Technical Supremo in order to assess the condition of all doors.

deficiency_finding: Seafarer's Employment Agreement
description_overview: Pictures before and after.
immediate_causes: The original documentation should be kept with the sentence of "specimen".
root_cause_analysis: The maximum duration of employment for the 2nd Officer Mr. Pejante is 10 months.
corrective_action: The 2nd officer's first SAE will be terminated on the 20th of Feb, 2024.
preventive_action: The HR department will be informed in advance of the terminated dates.

deficiency_finding: Page 3 of the IOPP certificate has been updated.
description_overview: The observations were made due to the emergency changing of the ship management team and inadequate handovers.
immediate_causes: The Master could not locate the ship structure access manual during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of controlling and upkeep of ship's certificate and document is one of the reasons.
corrective_action: The company informed the class and received an e-certificate.
preventive_action: If a ship's certificate is missing or expired, it must be reported immediately to the company.

deficiency_finding: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: Rules, regulations or procedures are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: Crew member missed to fill work rest hours for all the calls during night time.
corrective_action: Training done, Master to brief all crew members on how to fill their rest hours.
preventive_action: This deficiency is to be shared across all fleet vessels to ensure that proper record keeping of work rest hours is maintained onboard.

deficiency_finding: The master failed to report the malfunction of the ship compass gyro.
description_overview: The master failed to report the malfunction of the ship compass gyro.
immediate_causes: The agent didn't report to the PSC office because he didn't receive the letter from the flag.
root_cause_analysis: Master didn't check with the agent to make sure he had reported to port authorities as requested.
corrective_action: Master will follow up with the agent to make sure he is in compliance with the requirement.
preventive_action: The ship's master and manager should report the important information about the system to the port authority.

deficiency_finding: There is insufficient heat insulation of the exhaust manifolds.
description_overview: There was a fire on top of the funnel.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not put the insulation back after they had finished their maintenance.
corrective_action: Adequate insulation was placed on the exhaust manifolds.
preventive_action: Chief Engineer and responsible officer should always monitor the progress of any machinery's maintenance and make sure that it is back to normal as soon as possible.

deficiency_finding: There is an operation procedure posted in the CO2 room.
description_overview: The engine room has a CO2 alarm.
immediate_causes: The crew was not familiar with the operation of the fixed CO2 firefighting system.
root_cause_analysis: The officers overlooked the requirements for the CO2 alarm system.
corrective_action: Master created a sign for the pilot valve box cabinet.
preventive_action: All safety equipment must be placed close to the equipment in order for the meeting to be included in the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The grinder machine has a missing cap.
description_overview: No one.
immediate_causes: During the self-inspection on the ship, the deficiency was not found in advance.
root_cause_analysis: During the self-inspection on the ship, the deficiency was not found in advance.
corrective_action: Make a new one.
preventive_action: The daily maintenance and inspection of deck equipment will be strengthened in the future to avoid the occurrence of similar defects.

deficiency_finding: The galley room is dirty.
description_overview: Vegetables in the freezer room were rotten.
immediate_causes: The flap cannot move due to rusty and no greasing, the cause being lack of inspection and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: There wasn't enough checking by the chief cook.
corrective_action: The galley room is being cleaned by the crew.
preventive_action: The Chief officer must check the galley room on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: To be fixed by June 14th 2024.
description_overview: As soon as the vessel reported a malfunction, the Company requested a dispensation letter from the flag until necessary spare parts are delivered.
immediate_causes: The bridge navigational watch alarm system is operated by the master and navigation officers.
root_cause_analysis: The extended service life of the battery causes it to wear and tear.
corrective_action: The battery was found to be malfunctioning and a defect report was issued.
preventive_action: The Safety Committee Meeting took place after the inspection in order to emphasize the importance of thorough inspections.

deficiency_finding: The SOPEP Materials inventory for the month of January was not updated.
description_overview: Master instructed to make sure original Malta endorsement is onboard at the earliest opportunity.
immediate_causes: The maintenance and inventory of SOPEP materials was not updated due to recent Crew changes.
root_cause_analysis: The maintenance and inventory of SOPEP materials was not updated due to recent Crew changes.
corrective_action: An updated list of SOPEP Material inventory can be found in the SOPEP Manual.
preventive_action: In the future, the officer in charge will make sure that their duties are highlighted in their hand over notes.

deficiency_finding: There are symbols missing in the Engine Room.
description_overview: The general arrangement plans will be permanently displayed for the guidance of the ships officers, showing clearly fire sections enclosed by 'A' & 'B' class divisions.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The missing label was not observed by the Safety Officer and Engineers.
corrective_action: The order was created for the missing label.
preventive_action: The crew has to be trained on how to label safety equipment as per regulations.

deficiency_finding: There is a missing bolt and nut in the No.4 WBT portside manhole.
description_overview: There are small leaks from the Diesel Generator.
immediate_causes: The RPM dropped because of the vibrating E/G self and 2 sets of batteries.
root_cause_analysis: The bolt and nut were missing because of broken.
corrective_action: During the inspection, new bolts and nuts were installed by ship staff.
preventive_action: The manhole cover condition can be checked monthly according to M.GUIDE.

deficiency_finding: There is a wrong LRIT number in ship particulars.
description_overview: The old LRIT number was recorded instead of the new one in the ship particulars.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of two man verification check.
root_cause_analysis: When a ship's flag is changed, the LRIT number is not updated.
corrective_action: The LRIT number has been updated.
preventive_action: The master briefed the PIC on the correct data.

deficiency_finding: The fluorescent bulb light was broken.
description_overview: A voyage or passage plan.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The internal and external lights of the vessel were inspected by the officer with satisfactory results.
corrective_action: The light's function was verified by the Port State Control Officer.
preventive_action: Finding will be communicated to all vessels, under the management in the form of Fleet Notice, aiming to avoid re-occurrence, pointing out the importance of maintaining deck lights, on proper operational state at all times.

deficiency_finding: Not submitted.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: Lack of distribution of standard.
root_cause_analysis: The updated MLC was not properly filed in order to show the same to PSCO.
corrective_action: The certificate was lost by the crew before it was presented to the PSCO.
preventive_action: The bridge crew members will be learing about the filling system in the next safety meetings.

deficiency_finding: The lifejackets for the bow liferaft were not immediately used.
description_overview: The bodega can't be opened because the rain system is shutting down.
immediate_causes: The electrician was asked to fix the lights.
root_cause_analysis: The life jackets that correspond to the remote location of the forecastle deck and the life jackets that correspond to the nearby location of the liferaft are kept in a box in the store.
corrective_action: The space was secured with a security seal after the deficiency was noted by the attending PSC Officer.
preventive_action: As the vessel was in port and the safety of the shipboard personnel was at stake, the following actions had to be taken.

deficiency_finding: Some sanitary facilities were not cleaned.
description_overview: As part of weekly inspections, sanitary facilities are regularly checked.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of diligence when conducting inspections.
corrective_action: It is important to keep the sanitary facilities clean in order to stay in line with the requirements.
preventive_action: This finding together with control, root cause and corrective actions applied will be brought to crew attention during regular safety meeting on board with goal to prevent similar occurrences.

deficiency_finding: Maintenance of equipment is not up to standard.
description_overview: The fresh water supply pipe had a small leak at the C-deck branch connection.
immediate_causes: There is a missing log in the official logbook.
root_cause_analysis: There is insufficient knowledge on complaint procedure.
corrective_action: All items need to be fixed asap.
preventive_action: The Master received training on how to deal with complaints.

deficiency_finding: The Lifebuoy is damaged.
description_overview: There was a weak fire alarm in the engine room.
immediate_causes: The crew on duty did not follow the rules.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision on board and neglect to comply with the company's Precautionary Inspection, maintenance Period and Distribution.
corrective_action: The life buoy on board was checked and found to be in good condition.
preventive_action: The supervision of the inspection of life-saving and fire-fighting equipment on board should be strengthened.

deficiency_finding: Balls of gas are not in safe places.
description_overview: The pilot ladder was parted and the ship side railing was damaged.
immediate_causes: The speaker got damaged because of rain water and the cable connection didn't work properly.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of knowledge.
corrective_action: OXYGEN has been placed in a safe store.
preventive_action: Training about the storage and purification of OXYGEN-ACETYLENE has been done for everyone.

deficiency_finding: The bridge echo sounder is out of service.
description_overview: The echo sounder was working well and was shown to PSCO.
immediate_causes: Ropes conditions weren't good enough.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance was not carried out.
corrective_action: Senior officers will carry out regular checks and inspect bridge equipment.
preventive_action: The completion date is 30.08.

deficiency_finding: Communication between ships party is not established in working language.
description_overview: The master was told to provide communication in working language all the time.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Rules or regulations are not followed.
corrective_action: The common working language onboard the ships is English, as per the company's policy.
preventive_action: In the next safety committee meeting, subject observation will be discussed to make sure it doesn't happen again.

deficiency_finding: The flag of Brazil is out of standard standards.
description_overview: The chief engineer and 3rd engineer joined VESSEL at the same time, but they didn't get their email addresses in time.
immediate_causes: Delays of maintenance were caused by previous port restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: The present Brazilian flag was damaged due to bad weather.
corrective_action: The Brazilian flag was immediately delivered.
preventive_action: All navigation offices were attacked by the master.

deficiency_finding: Some locking arrangements found on escape routes are not a way that they provide the escape in case of emergency.
description_overview: Some locking arrangements found on escape routes are not a way that they provide the escape in case of emergency.
immediate_causes: Incorrect equipment handling and operating.
root_cause_analysis: The upper main deck was locked with padlocks instead of plastic seal straps because of the barriers at the stbd side.
corrective_action: The barrier was closed again with plastic straps and the crew was told that safety should never be compromised.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Bunker filling valve indicator is open.
description_overview: The open/close indicator of the filling valve was damaged during the inspection.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: Failure to fulfill maintenance requirements: Defective parts/components not replaced/repaired in due time proper maintenance to remove/clean/minimize rust on vent gratings could and should be done by crew on board.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient motivation for the crew to do their job.
corrective_action: The open/close indicator of the filling valve is painted red for easy observation.
preventive_action: The deficiency will be communicated to the rest of the fleet by the Monthly Alert Bulletin.

deficiency_finding: There is a light on the boat deck.
description_overview: There is a light on the boat deck.
immediate_causes: There was a broken light bulb on the boat deck.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance was indicated by the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: Deficiency was noted and action taken.
preventive_action: On 18 August, extraordinary refresh training on general maintenance requirements / condition of deck lights was carried out.

deficiency_finding: Work and rest hours for fitness for duty.
description_overview: Several crew members didn't keep their minimum resting time, for example Master resting within 24Hrs on 1.07 only 0,5 + 2.5hrs, on 4th of July.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply.
root_cause_analysis: Transferring information to authorities is inadequate.
corrective_action: The master didn't provide the information of the voyage, but he did have enough rest after recalculating.
preventive_action: Crewing discussed with Master and crew on roper reporting and providing correct information to the PSCO and other relevant parties.

deficiency_finding: Seafarers' employment agreement expired.
description_overview: A total of one deficiency was identified during the PSC inspection at port of Butterworth.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The agreements to our manning agent were sent three days before the inspection but the response was delayed because of the weekend.
corrective_action: A copy of the correspondence was sent to the PSC inspector.
preventive_action: Finding will be communicated to all vessels, under the management in the form of Fleet Notice aiming to emphasize the finding, pointing out the importance of the proper record keeping and to plan well in advance the renewal of crew contracts taking in consideration the weekends.

deficiency_finding: A BUTTERFLY NUT IS ON THE HATCHWAY COVER.
description_overview: The Hatch of E/R Sky lack of two nuts, the Access cover of S/G RM lack of three nuts, and the Access cover of Rope store lack of two nuts.
immediate_causes: Ladders for liferaft are due for a shore strength test.
root_cause_analysis: The steering gear room hatchway is located on the poop deck and butterfly nuts were closed to prevent water from entering the steering flat as the vessel was on a long sea voyage.
corrective_action: The butterfly nut was slackened and properly operated in the presence of the inspector.
preventive_action: To ensure that the securing arrangements are maintained in good order, the ship staff was trained to ensure that they are regularly operated.

deficiency_finding: The International Anti-Fouling system certificate is missing.
description_overview: It is not clean.
immediate_causes: Due to the short port stay at Onsan, S. Korea, the UWC was canceled and Underwater Cleaning was carried out at Yeosu.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of familiarity with ship's certificates.
corrective_action: The new Original Antifouling Certificate was issued by the Contacted Class RINA.
preventive_action: The importance to have only official Class electronic e-certificates was discussed with Master and all senior officers during a Safety Meeting on the ship.

deficiency_finding: There is no planned interval or method of position fixing mentioned in the voyage plan.
description_overview: Pilot ladders and hoist pilot transfer arrangements.
immediate_causes: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
root_cause_analysis: The updated passage plan was not kept in a hard copy.
corrective_action: The master briefed the bridge team on the requirements of the passage plan.
preventive_action: Bridge team meeting Master will discuss the deficiency with bridge team along with corrective action.

deficiency_finding: There was a large hole in the insulation door.
description_overview: The bridge door was found to have a small hole.
immediate_causes: The handle lever of the fish room has been tested.
root_cause_analysis: The door was cracked and burned out due to constant burning of garbage and E/R operational waste.
corrective_action: New material was used to build up the damaged and cracked refractory.
preventive_action: The condition of the material is to be checked during the routine maintenance of the incinerator.

deficiency_finding: It is recommended that the test be limited to not more than once a month due to battery life issues.
description_overview: There are lights at the emergency station panel for the A/C room to not work.
immediate_causes: During the last rescue boat drill on 19th May 2023, the wire rope for the pin of the rescue boat hook got detached from the hook while trying out.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge doesn't know about the testing of yarn.
corrective_action: It will take a month for the test to be followed by the manufacturer's instructions.
preventive_action: The training was done by a master.

deficiency_finding: The condition evaluation report and thickness measurement were not present.
description_overview: There are certificates and documentation.
immediate_causes: Poor supervision and maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The documents have been placed at the Synchronization folder but they have not been printed and filed.
corrective_action: The files were printed and filed accordingly.
preventive_action: During the meeting, it will be discussed.

deficiency_finding: The Fire Control Plan container has a broken cover.
description_overview: The eye wash kit was not returned after the paint room was cleaned last week.
immediate_causes: The deck crew did maintenance on the rescue boat painter.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient assessment of readiness.
corrective_action: The fire control plan container has a cover.
preventive_action: The matter will be discussed at the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The hot water calorifier has a leak.
description_overview: The hot water calorifier was leaking.
immediate_causes: There were 6 pieces of pipe support that were corrosive and 3 that werecracked due to insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: The crew welded the crack to fix the leaking.
preventive_action: Subject deficiency will be communicated to the fleet vessels via the Company's Monthly Alert Bulletin after a training Session was carried out by the Master for the awareness of responsible deck personnel.

deficiency_finding: The Load Line mark is not painted clearly.
description_overview: It is a fact that cannot be avoided over time, thus the need to refresh/paint as necessary and while in operation, as well as the fact that ports should not have restrictions or regulations preventing/prohibiting the vessel to comply with regulations that are adopted worldwide as is the case.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: Before the next operation/port of call, draft marks will be refreshed/painted the soonest.
preventive_action: There are draft marks for maintenance and inspections.

deficiency_finding: Lifting eyes in steering gear compartment is not marked with SWL.
description_overview: The rigging of escape trunk in engine room was found by the PSC inspector and fixed by the vessel crew.
immediate_causes: The person failed to comply with the requirements.
root_cause_analysis: Each crane failed to mark for Lifting eyes.
corrective_action: The confirmation letter of Lifting eyes was issued by the shipyard.
preventive_action: The master held a safety meeting with the crew and reminded them to SWL mark each lifting eye before use.

deficiency_finding: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: The crew couldn't test the fire alarm system from the bridge panel to the satisfaction of the PSCO.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of compliance with the company's text messages.
corrective_action: In order to conduct an additional ISM internal audit, additional training and a fire drill was conducted on the vessel.
preventive_action: The ISM related deficiency was discussed during an extra safety meeting for all crew members.

deficiency_finding: The main engine has a malfunctioning air temperature.
description_overview: While the vessel was drifting and waiting for pilot embarkation, the alarm on the Main Alarm Panel was off-scanned.
immediate_causes: As per the maker design, deviation of M.E. exhaust valve is necessary.
root_cause_analysis: There is incompetence in placing.
corrective_action: The alarm was found in order and the deficiency was closed with code 10.
preventive_action: The crew was told that no alarm can be off-scanned without proper risk assessment and notification to the office.

deficiency_finding: Some strands are broken and in poor condition.
description_overview: Not working.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of supervision is the reason for inadequate inspection.
corrective_action: Deficiency was fixed on the spot after Mooring rope was replaced.
preventive_action: If a rope is found to be faulty, it will be immediately reported to the crew and corrective actions will be taken.

deficiency_finding: There are Hazards of MLC and Pers.
description_overview: There is a lack of Norms of Work and Non-Compliance.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There are no general procedures for the prevention of accidents.
corrective_action: The plates had to be fixed with a 500 brass screw.
preventive_action: In order to fulfill the requirements of the PSCO, periodic inspections, including the safety inspections a/p SOLAS, and vigilance are required to ensure that floor plates are properly fixed.

deficiency_finding: Financial security is not posted.
description_overview: There is a certificate or documentary evidence of financial security.
immediate_causes: While taking over, the master didn't check the certificate at the mess rooms.
root_cause_analysis: The notice board was not displayed for all shipboard personnel due to lack of awareness and knowledge.
corrective_action: The Master had the financial security information posted on the notice boards.
preventive_action: The Master is to make sure that information that is required by regulatory regulations for shipboard personnel is posted at a designated location.

deficiency_finding: The alarm panel in the water ingress detector is faulty.
description_overview: The Chief Officer conducted both tests without any defects and on a monthly basis.
immediate_causes: Defective tools, equipment, materials, and preventive cleaning are some of the things that can be found.
root_cause_analysis: Defective tools, equipment, materials, and preventive cleaning are some of the things that can be found.
corrective_action: The new sensor was successfully fitted during the vessel's dry-docking / special surveys to the satisfaction of the attending Class surveyor.
preventive_action: Master will discuss the deficiency during the next monthly safety meeting in order to discuss the inspection's overall process; the recorded deficiency's contributed factors among to all crew members in order to ensure that sufficient shipboard inspections shall be conducted at all times.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence that the Crew Basic training certificates issued to Indian crew members are acceptable to the flag state.
description_overview: There is no evidence that the Crew Basic training certificate issued to an Indian crew member is acceptable to the flag state.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with Customer / Stakeholder requirements Unclear Instructions is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: There are personal factors such as lack of competence, Misunderstood instructions, and inadequate supervision.
corrective_action: To consult the flag state and get clarification.
preventive_action: Before joining the vessel, the office should assess the current certification requirement.

deficiency_finding: Not required.
description_overview: In this way, the steering gear units can be started from a distance with possible fatal consequences for the crew working on the steering machine.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.

description_overview: Critical Fire Fighting and Life Saving Appliances / Systems onboard are unreliable due to deficiencies 6 - 8.
immediate_causes: The crew couldn't test the fire alarm system from the bridge panel to the satisfaction of the PSCO.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of compliance with the company's text messages.
corrective_action: In order to conduct an additional ISM internal audit, additional training and a fire drill was conducted on the vessel.
preventive_action: The ISM related deficiency was discussed during an extra safety meeting for all crew members.

deficiency_finding: The ballast record book was incomplete and not a format approved by the Administration.
description_overview: If there were leaks in the engine room, the adjacent spaces may become dirty.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Person in Charge may be insufficient oversight or supervision of record-keeping practices.
corrective_action: Ensure that the book includes all necessary sections, columns, and details as per regulatory requirements, and complete the missing entries in the Ballast Water Record Book to ensure that all required information is accurately documented.
preventive_action: To ensure that entries are accurate and up-to-date, the company has mandated the use of the Ballast Water Record Booklet.

deficiency_finding: When an enclosed space entry drill is carried out, it is not allowed by the crew.
description_overview: When an enclosed space entry drill is carried out, it is not allowed by the crew.
immediate_causes: PSCO recorded a deficiency because Master's information that the familiarization process of the signed on 2nd Officer was just initiated at the same day was not accepted.
root_cause_analysis: Conflicting demands, directions, and inadequate transfer of information are some of the problems.
corrective_action: To the satisfaction of the PSCO's request, an additional safety enclosed space rescue drill was conducted, while requested SMS work permit report was also completed.
preventive_action: During the Master's next monthly safety meeting for all crew members awareness / attention was given to the fact that there are deficiencies that need to be communicated to all managed vessels.

deficiency_finding: Basic training and medical fitness certificates are not available.
description_overview: The access or structural features of the ship.
immediate_causes: The vessel did not have to have certs onboard.
root_cause_analysis: The shipper supplied the CO2 gas analyser and O2 tubes to the vessel after they arrived at the port.
corrective_action: The deficiency was fixed on the spot in presence of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The coastal area setting is incorrect.
description_overview: The current area of operation is not receiving maritime safety information from Inmarsat-C.
immediate_causes: The navigation officer set only code B in the broadcast of Navarea X Australia.
root_cause_analysis: The bridge management failed to change the status of the EGC coastal area to the correct setting due to a lack of awareness.
corrective_action: The duty officer was ordered by the master to cover the correct area.
preventive_action: The Master and the navigation officer must make sure that the correct Navarea region is included in the new passage plan.

deficiency_finding: The plan relating to section 9.4 subsections.2,.4,.5,.7,.15,.17 and.18 of this part of the code can't be inspected unless the contracting governments agree.
description_overview: The SEA contracts and monthly wage accounts provided at PSC for the two European 3rd engineers show that the vessel can't provide a breakdown of the salary figure.
immediate_causes: The SSP approval letter was submitted by the SSO.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer was worried about the positive outcome of the inspection as the crew was preparing the vessel and applying maximum efforts.
corrective_action: The SSP was returned to the secure storage location by the Chief Officer.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was asked to be more careful when communicating with Third Parties.

deficiency_finding: Gas Concentration safety checks are not recorded in the ship's logbook.
description_overview: The gas detection equipment will be designed to sample and analyse from each line of the protected space at intervals not exceeding 30 minutes.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Our Company's established procedures clearly define that all cargo spaces should be monitored for gas concentration during the voyage, however, shipboard staff omitted to enter these measurements in the ship's logbook.
corrective_action: The entries were put at the ship's log book by the PSC officer.
preventive_action: Lessons learned and instructions to the Head of Departments to verify compliance are communicated monthly to our fleet.

deficiency_finding: Bunker delivery note incomplete.
description_overview: The BDN for the operation was incomplete.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: BDN was not filled properly because C/E did not pay attention after Bunkering.
corrective_action: The company was informed.
preventive_action: The Engineer needs to check and react to all the documents.

deficiency_finding: International shore connections are not comparable to REQUIREMENTS.
description_overview: Some bolts and nuts are not in place on the two manifolds found on the Bunker stations.
immediate_causes: Poor order.
root_cause_analysis: DIMENSIONS NOT BEING CHECKED, UPON CHECKED, THOUGH ALL DIMENSIONS MATCHED, BUT THEY FIND LONGER than FSS.
corrective_action: Scales need to be adjusted by ship's crew to correspond with FSS RGS.
preventive_action: Monitoring and supervision is done by senior management during routine test and maintenance of FFA.

deficiency_finding: Found near emergency control of M/E.
description_overview: The Hatch of E/R Sky lack of two nuts, the Access cover of S/G RM lack of three nuts, and the Access cover of Rope store lack of two nuts.
immediate_causes: HFO Settling insulation tank lagging is broken.
root_cause_analysis: They cleaned up the area after the work but didn't replace the lagging insulation.
corrective_action: It's time to replace the lagging insulation.
preventive_action: All managed vessels were notified by the company.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence that the ship safety commission implemented their guidelines for cargo operations in the port.
description_overview: Low.
immediate_causes: Poor safety awareness and supervision.
root_cause_analysis: The safety alert for cargo operation is recorded in the monthly safety committee meeting record, but there is no description of each member's duty.
corrective_action: All relevant crews have a safety meeting on the day, learn about the main point of safety committee meeting, master stressed that everyone should be familiar with their duties, especially the duty of safety during cargo discharging in port.
preventive_action: Every ship in the fleet is reminded to pay close attention to relevant deficiency and keep in mind the important of safety in all aspects.

deficiency_finding: Noted tonnage increased by the addition of scrubber from 44192 GT to 44513 GT.
description_overview: Managers seek official advice from the flag administration.
immediate_causes: Before departure, the flag state representative must join the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: There was no lack of standards or planning in the analysis.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is a steam pipe on the main deck.
description_overview: The water leak was caused by the worn-out gasket.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient inspection.
corrective_action: The leak was fixed by replacing the gasket with a new one on 29 September 2023.
preventive_action: The meeting was held with the onboard team to discuss the importance of pre-arrival checks on deck and rounds.

deficiency_finding: The Hull was noted with some kind of problem.
description_overview: There was a long period of sailing from the previous dry dock.
immediate_causes: Delays of maintenance were caused by previous port restrictions.
root_cause_analysis: Poor supervision and maintenance.
corrective_action: Will be done in the shipyard.
preventive_action: Special attention needs to be paid to the dry dock when the hull needs to be painted and when the crew needs to protect it.

deficiency_finding: The monthly liferaft inspection was not recorded correctly last month.
description_overview: The monthly liferaft inspection was not recorded correctly last month.
immediate_causes: There is a difference between an automatic painter (HRU) and a manual painter (Non-HRU).
root_cause_analysis: Lack of initial training.
corrective_action: Liferaft No.1 and No.2 were recorded as automatic painter and manual painter, respectively, in the LSA record book.
preventive_action: The C/Off is responsible for ensuring correct data are recorded in the LSA Record book.

deficiency_finding: Several manholes for fuel oil tanks were found to be in poor condition with bolts missing.
description_overview: Poor maintenance and supervision.
immediate_causes: Though the pressure was checked weekly and before each arrival, there was a lower pressure than required at the time of the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The bolts on four of the manholes were not fitted back after the inspection as the stud's threads were worn out.
corrective_action: The condition was upgraded, packing was renewed and the missing bolts were replaced.
preventive_action: Even though only 2 to 3 bolts out of 27 were found missing from a cover, the potential consequences of water or leaks are extremely serious.

deficiency_finding: The hull was corroded.
description_overview: The master was told to put in place safety procedures for access to the ship from shore.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector was told by the Master that the condition of the hull had been identified and reported to the company.
corrective_action: The Master held an additional safety meeting where all deficiencies were reviewed.
preventive_action: The Master held an additional safety meeting where all deficiencies were reviewed.

deficiency_finding: The scale draft was not readable.
description_overview: The FWD port side draft marks are covered with rust and are not clearly visible.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the long voyage, there was no option to maintain the draft marks on the last port of call.
corrective_action: Master instructed deckhands to paint at the first available port.
preventive_action: The crew was advised to keep the draft marks up to date.

deficiency_finding: The Vent Head of the Bilge Tank Crack is very old.
description_overview: Poor maintenance and supervision.
immediate_causes: Lack of documentation.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance was carried out on the FO tanks vent heads.
corrective_action: The significance of inspection and maintenance of structures on deck, hull and accommodation was briefed by the master.
preventive_action: During the next safety committee meeting, the safety meeting master will have a discussion with the crew about the inspection method and part substitution.

deficiency_finding: Several connections boxes and junction boxes on deck in poor conditions are not required.
description_overview: PSCO observed 5 overhead lights with wiring terminated outside or a junction box located in the vicinity.
immediate_causes: Equipment failure, malfunctioning, and lack of verification.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
