corrective_action: New boxes were ordered and will be delivered at the next port of call, Turkey.
preventive_action: At the next Safety Meeting, deficiencies will be discussed.

deficiency_finding: The UMS system couldn't be used for several days in September because the crew couldn't provide evidence.
description_overview: The UMS working arrangements engineers undertake are not outlined in the table of shipboard working arrangements.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: In normal working days at sea and port, engine room is kept in UMS mode and the time for the required safety rounds was inputted on to the comment section of the table of working arrangements.
corrective_action: There is a table of shipboard working arrangement for UMS and manned condition.
preventive_action: The incident is shared across the fleet to avoid reoccurrence.

deficiency_finding: The crew doesn't know how to operate a life raft float free.
description_overview: Managers noted deficiency.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient implementation of safety instructions, incorrect use of safety equipment, inadequate seamanship practice, routine/ slackness, inadequate skills/ knowledge, Lack of Compliance were all identified in the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: The Non Conformity PSC2 304 was raised by the Safety Department.
preventive_action: The training on proper fitting and installation of HRU was carried out on August 26, 2023.

deficiency_finding: The insulation indicator is lower.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The distribution box outside lights had low insulation.
corrective_action: The distribution box was disconnected.
preventive_action: The Responsible Engineer was instructed by the inspector to check the insulation weekly.

deficiency_finding: The form E indicates that there is no back up for nautical publications.
description_overview: During the cable break test, the fire detection system didn't show an alarm.
immediate_causes: The original cargo cleaning pump was not fully guard by the safety net.
root_cause_analysis: Form E did not reflect digital publications installed.
corrective_action: Class annuals have been scheduled at the same port and the master instructed the class to amend Form E accordingly.
preventive_action: The Monthly Alert Bulletin will be sent to all fleet vessels with instructions to verify compliance.

deficiency_finding: There is an operation procedure posted in the CO2 room.
description_overview: The engine room has a CO2 alarm.
immediate_causes: The crew was not familiar with the operation of the fixed CO2 firefighting system.
root_cause_analysis: The officers overlooked the requirements for the CO2 alarm system.
corrective_action: Master created a sign for the pilot valve box cabinet.
preventive_action: All safety equipment must be placed close to the equipment in order for the meeting to be included in the next safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The bolts of the discharge connection port side were found to be corroded.
description_overview: The inspector's comment is acknowledged.
immediate_causes: The person failed to comply with the requirements.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance and a safety culture.
corrective_action: The bolts were replaced with spare ones.
preventive_action: In order to avoid such recurrence in the future, the Chief Engineer told the engine crew to always thoroughly check and renew the heavily rusted bolts of discharge connections.

deficiency_finding: The port main deck has a fire fighting box.
description_overview: Not seen because these tools can't be stored in one place and they were kept on different places and designated places.
immediate_causes: There were different locations for fire nozzles.
root_cause_analysis: The nozzles will be removed from the fire hose boxes.
corrective_action: Training was carried out for all the crew.
preventive_action: The crew should not remove fire nozzles from the fire boxes.

deficiency_finding: PSCO identification is not checked on arrival.
description_overview: The locking pins for the damper's handle were not aligned when the damper was completely shut.
immediate_causes: The agent didn't report to the PSC office because he didn't receive the letter from the flag.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not ask for his identification as his position was clear already.
corrective_action: The PSCO showed his deficiency by himself.
preventive_action: The SSO was reminded that he should always ask for an ID check.

deficiency_finding: Sewage treatment plant equipment is out of order.
description_overview: There is a sewage treatment plant.
immediate_causes: The sewage treatment plant was out of order.
root_cause_analysis: He overlooked two failed components because he didn't have enough experience in servicing the plant.
corrective_action: The vessel was allowed to sail out after the condition of class(CC) was imposed.
preventive_action: Sewage treatment plant maintenance and operations is part of standard engineering competency, however this case will be published in quarterly QHSSE bulletin in order to improve awareness.

deficiency_finding: The oily water separator transfer pump has a leak.
description_overview: Including pipe and valves.
immediate_causes: The modification to the shipboard piping drawing was already class approved prior installation.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance and inspection base on MARPOL Annex I.
corrective_action: Before sailing, the new packing will be replaced.
preventive_action: The pollution prevention measures should be based on the MARPOL Annex I requirements.

deficiency_finding: Cargo ship safety is included in the exemption.
description_overview: At the time of inspection, the exemption had expired but the conditions were still required to be completed onboard.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The Dutch flag made a proper decision on the steps to be taken after the exemption expired.
corrective_action: To get an official decision, the company needs to contact the various parties in this matter.
preventive_action: The certificate will be renewed with a new date without any major changes.

deficiency_finding: The water system has a fault alarm.
description_overview: There is a cover letter for the Tonnage Certificate, but it is not available on board.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow repair/ maintenance instructions.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of supervision.
corrective_action: There was a re-tightened wire connection.
preventive_action: During the extra safety meeting, a discussion of the present deficiency was done.

deficiency_finding: The lock on the rescue boat is a manual one.
description_overview: In the crew mess room, it was observed that the certificates were not pasted.
immediate_causes: The crew didn't input drill time into the record.
root_cause_analysis: There is a harsh maritime environment, inadequate maintenance schedule, and oversight.
corrective_action: The seized interlock mechanism needs immediate repair or replacement.
preventive_action: To share lessons learnt with office staff as well as the fleet to review/discuss and correct where required to avoid similar finding.

deficiency_finding: Steering position to exit door is not provided.
description_overview: The walkway was painted with anti-skid paint.
immediate_causes: Due to the short port stay at Onsan, S. Korea, the UWC was canceled and Underwater Cleaning was carried out at Yeosu.
root_cause_analysis: It was assumed that the new coat of paint would diminish the antiskid property of the walkway.
preventive_action: This finding is being shared with the fleet.

deficiency_finding: There are no chlorine tablets in the sewage treatment plant.
description_overview: The watchkeepers missed a chance to check the contents of the compartment for chlorine tablets.
immediate_causes: The valve that goes to the sewage treatment unit is not rotating.
root_cause_analysis: The checks to make sure the quantity of chlorine tablets was enough were not effective.
corrective_action: There was a note posted near the chlorinator to check for chlorine tablets.
preventive_action: Training is carried out for all crew members to confirm compliance with the work order.

deficiency_finding: There is a steering gear compartment.
description_overview: The steering gear compartment has electric cables near the securing tray.
immediate_causes: The vessel did not have to have certs onboard.
root_cause_analysis: Good maintenance is not kept onboard.
corrective_action: All wasted cable ties have been replaced with new ones.
preventive_action: Senior officer keep an eye on crew maintenance work, ensure all work is done correctly, and check crew work during a ship visit.

deficiency_finding: The P&S rubber seals partially perished.
description_overview: The P&S rubber seals partially perished.
immediate_causes: Minor damages to Tank Dome seals were noted during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Senior officers did not adequately instruct the staff that seals must be replaced even for minor defects.
corrective_action: Replacement of tank dome seals was ordered by the chief officer.
preventive_action: Even if there are minor defects, tank dome seals must be replaced even if there is a deficiency.

deficiency_finding: There are no entries in the records for the main engine and auxiliary engines since the year 2021.
description_overview: The PSC deficiency was caused by the PSC Inspector keeping the records in hard copy.
immediate_causes: ISM Code regulation 11 'Documentation' is misinterpreted.
root_cause_analysis: The Master began keeping the documentation in hard copy in order to satisfy the PSC Inspector.
corrective_action: The Classification Society was invited to conduct an Occasional Survey.
preventive_action: There will be an Internal Audit within 3 months and an External Audit within the next H&S meeting.

deficiency_finding: The water mist repeater on the bridge is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The water mist repeater on the bridge is malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: The system was moved to the local stand.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of daily safety inspection on board.
corrective_action: The system was switched back to auto mode.
preventive_action: The report will be shared with fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: The programme to test fire detection systems on a weekly basis has not been carried out for the month of September.
description_overview: In September, the monthly inspection record of lifeRAFT was updated.
immediate_causes: In the month of September, the weekly check of smoke detectors was not transferred to the quarterly report.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: Data of weekly routine checks must be input.
preventive_action: During attendances, compliance will be verified.

deficiency_finding: There was medicine in the first aid box.
description_overview: Some of the medicines inside the first aid box need to be replaced.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: If any expired medicines were found in the first-aid boxes, they were replaced with new ones.
preventive_action: During the meeting for enhancing shipboard management and crew's responsibility, a relative training course was provided to all shipboard crews.

deficiency_finding: There were insects noted inside the light covers.
description_overview: There were insects noted inside the light covers.
immediate_causes: There were a lot of flies around the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: We didn't remove the dead flies before we arrived.
corrective_action: Light covers were removed and cleaned.
preventive_action: Light cover for any flies trap should be included in a routine inspection.

deficiency_finding: The pressure gauge of No.1 and No.2 is unreadable.
description_overview: The failure to identify faded and inoperable gauges was the result of inadequate monitoring.
immediate_causes: There was a malfunction with the sample pump.
root_cause_analysis: The failure to identify faded and inoperable gauges was the result of inadequate monitoring.
corrective_action: She was at the port when the deficiency was closed.
preventive_action: All engine room staff will be advised to report malfunctioned monitoring equipment if the finding is discussed in the next ships safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is ready availability of fire fighting equipment.
description_overview: There is a fire extinguisher that is missing.
immediate_causes: The acts are substandard.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient leadership.
corrective_action: I don't know.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: There is an isolation valve in the middle of the ship.
description_overview: Each vessel and its equipment must be maintained in a state of complete operational order and in accordance with all requirements of regulatory bodies and regulations.
immediate_causes: The immediate cause of the defect was due to the exposure to the marine environment.
root_cause_analysis: Exposure to the prevailing marine environment causes wear and tear.
corrective_action: Regular pressure tests are carried out to verify the integrity of the system.
preventive_action: Continuous check and test of the deck equipment and piping system as required by the company.

deficiency_finding: The freeZER was not listed in the management plan.
description_overview: The position and number of fireman outfits are not listed in the fire plan.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There is a defect cause.
corrective_action: The management company immediately amended the garbage plan to include the Freezer as a means of disposal.
preventive_action: If there is a change in equipment, procedures, or lay-out, it is important to review the GMP.

deficiency_finding: The sewage discharge valve was not locked.
description_overview: The vessel is fitted with OWS, type- 3Sep OWS-5m3/h, Oil Filtering equipment with alarm and automatic stopping device.
immediate_causes: Defective valve of sewage system is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: There are 12 factors that can cause a job to fail.
corrective_action: The discharge valve to Aft peak tank was replaced because it was stuck in shut position.
preventive_action: The topic will be discussed during monthly safety and management meetings.

deficiency_finding: The cable under the passage on deck is in poor condition.
description_overview: About 60 percent of the supports are in poor, corroded or damaged condition.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear.
corrective_action: These are known and followed conditions and could not be fixed during the winter.
preventive_action: This observation will be shared and discussed during company-run seminars and in house pre-joining meetings, as regular checks and maintenances will continue to ensure vessels condition and further actions will be taken if required.

deficiency_finding: The valve remote control system is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The cargo is listed in the shipper's declaration as a group B cargo, but there is no information on the chemical hazard of the cargo.
immediate_causes: Didn't report the broken equipment to the company.
root_cause_analysis: The forward valve of Forepeak was not functional due to wear and tear and was reported to the flag administration on the same day.
corrective_action: The forepeak store valve and valve remote control system was replaced by a vessel.
preventive_action: In order to confirm compliance, the Master shared his experience across the fleet.

deficiency_finding: There is an obstruction for the deck fire main line.
description_overview: Line-throwing appliance containers are no longer valid.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew did not clear the astern drain valve.
corrective_action: Remove the astern drain valve for the deck main line.
preventive_action: Training crew checks main line valves on a regular basis.

deficiency_finding: The springs on the No.1 and No.2 cargo hold fwd are not tensioned and are wasted.
description_overview: The rope was inspected prior to the vessel's arrival and was found to be in good order during the last drill.
immediate_causes: The covers can be opened and closed.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear, lack of attention, exposure to extreme conditions are some of the things that can happen.
corrective_action: Proper operation was ensured when the springs were maintained.
preventive_action: The information was given to the whole fleet.

deficiency_finding: The auxiliary engine has an air condition unit in the control room.
description_overview: There is a gas detection unit for the air conditioning room on the vessel.
immediate_causes: The actual status of the tapes is good but they are not in good shape.
root_cause_analysis: The drain pipe of the air condition unit inside the engine control room was not working.
corrective_action: The drain pipe of the air condition unit can be dredged.
preventive_action: The engineers should be trained to inspect and maintain the air condition unit.

deficiency_finding: The main deck muster station is not clear.
description_overview: The main deck muster station is not clear.
immediate_causes: The Master didn't understand the document request.
root_cause_analysis: The gangway was temporarily left close to the Muster station in order to be stored later in the day.
corrective_action: The parts were immediately removed and stored as appropriate.
preventive_action: There are daily safety rounds by OOW.

deficiency_finding: The crew doesn't know how to use the release hook for the rescue boat and life raft.
description_overview: There were problems with the rescue boat engine cooling water pump.
immediate_causes: 3/O and C/O couldn't explain the operations of the release hook.
root_cause_analysis: They didn't know how to use a release hook for a rescue boat and life raft.
corrective_action: Crew concerned for the operation of release hook for rescue boat and life raft launching under captain's supervision will be trained on board.
preventive_action: The company vessels will be given company circulars to share the case.

deficiency_finding: Light for liferaft unlit.
description_overview: There is a hand crank for the lifeboat.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect tools, equipment, materials, and inadequate inspection are some of the things that can go wrong.
corrective_action: The sudden malfunction of the launching light for liferaft was fixed from the vessel's stock prior to the completion of the inspection.
preventive_action: The ship's engineers and safety officer were reminded of the importance of the proper shipboard inspections on the critical equipment in order to make sure it is ready for use at all times.

deficiency_finding: The cover for the emergency stop cargo pump is missing.
description_overview: There are other DEFICIENCIES.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There is inadequate technical design and design criteria.
corrective_action: The additional protection cover was installed in keeping with the continuous improvement policy of the company.
preventive_action: The crew members were briefed on the importance of good planning during the monthly safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: Oxygen and Acetylene bottles are not caped and there is a connection valve still in place.
description_overview: Due to long voyage from China to Canada and restrictions in the ports along the way, empty bottles could not be landed.
immediate_causes: The vessel not update and poster on time was due to the port facility security level.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of acknowledge for the management of dangerous goods.
corrective_action: Acetylene and Oxygen bottle stowed separately with disconnected pressure regulation valve and outlet tube, carry out safety training.
preventive_action: Acetylene and Oxygen bottle stowed separately with disconnected pressure regulation valve and outlet tube, carry out safety training.

deficiency_finding: Emergency systems.
description_overview: The Emcy light is hanging loose in the cables without mounting.
immediate_causes: There are bulbs on the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: The emergency light on the Stbd bridge wing needs to be renewed.
preventive_action: Narendra Bisht is responsible for regular inspections of emergency lights.

deficiency_finding: The repair of the valve will be done under the supervision of RO.
description_overview: The captioned vessel is issued with an International Ballast Water Management Certificate by Class NKK under the UK flag and endorsed on the certificate with validity until 25th November 2024.
immediate_causes: No defect was identified.
root_cause_analysis: There was a lack of interest, poor maintenance, and no regular inspections.
corrective_action: A damaged magnet valve will be replaced.
preventive_action: A person in charge of equipment maintenance should report any failure immediately.

deficiency_finding: The EIAPP statements of compliance were issued by RINA instead of the EIAPP certificates.
description_overview: The PSC officer noted that EIAPP statements of compliance existed on board for ME and 3AE, instead of certificates as per MALTA flag requirements.
immediate_causes: Poor certificate management by Master resulted in EIAPP certificate not being returned to certificate file folder.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient knowledge by attending the RINA Surveyor to issue the proper EIAPP Certificates.
corrective_action: There were 4 new EIAPP certificates left on board after RINA Surveyor attendance.
preventive_action: Monthly Alert bulletin will be used to circulate the deficiency.

deficiency_finding: Emergency equipment for communications.
description_overview: There is a dedicated battery that is not sealed and marked for emergency use.
immediate_causes: The request was made via agent in port Hull.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of attention.
corrective_action: There is a new order.
preventive_action: See issued measures for preventive measures.

deficiency_finding: A crew member wearing a fireman outfit is not familiar with the proper use of self-contained breathing apparatus.
description_overview: A crew member wearing a fireman outfit is not familiar with the proper use of self-contained breathing apparatus.
immediate_causes: The correct donning procedure was explained to the crew members after they were briefed on the inspector's concern.
root_cause_analysis: The person selected by PCSO was not able to demonstrate the pressure check.
corrective_action: During the additional fire drill, all crew members were given additional training on the use of the BA set.
preventive_action: Every fire drill should include checking of the equipment given to the fire-fighting team, assigned in the muster list, and the knowledge of the correct use of this equipment.

deficiency_finding: Incinerator is not working.
description_overview: There was excessive Hull Growth on the stern and port side of the vessels.
immediate_causes: The company in the port of San Lorenzo was able to repair the problem before it was closed out by Flag.
root_cause_analysis: Delivery time by supplier is 30 days.
corrective_action: Delivery time is 30 days as per supplier.
preventive_action: The crew will be told about the subject finding at the first safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: There is paint in a store.
description_overview: Poor judgement when storing paint in a store.
immediate_causes: The ship crew doesn't have a concept of garbage management.
root_cause_analysis: Poor judgement when storing paint in a store.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed when she was at the port.
preventive_action: The finding will be discussed in the next safety meeting with the crew about good seamanship and fire prevention procedures.

deficiency_finding: The EEXI technical file was not provided by the PSC.
description_overview: All the vessels need to have a certain number of mandatory, hazard, safety, fire, direction and prohibitory signs.
immediate_causes: Poor order.
root_cause_analysis: There are insufficient information documents in supervision.
corrective_action: The EEXI Technical File was sent to the ship managing company by e-mail.
preventive_action: There is a file folder onboard.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence that the flexibility of the room has been changed.
description_overview: An Occasional Survey was carried out at the request of the owner after deficiencies were pointed out by the USCG Mobile.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Master's and CE failed to identify that the certificate was not available onboard.
corrective_action: The last renewal of the CO2 system flexible hoses took place in Paradip, India.
preventive_action: Keeping proper filling of vessel's certificates and survey records is important in order to avoid similar observations in the future.

deficiency_finding: There was a reference to the Statement of Fact Bunker Oil spill in the ORB.
description_overview: The Oil Record book states that the spill from the #2 HSFO (S) tank was verified by the CCS.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow R&R, inadequate records are direct causes of unsafe acts.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of standards in the forms VP09 and ORB.
corrective_action: There will be a discussion of corrective and preventive actions at the end of December.
preventive_action: Engine personnel were refreshed for Bunkering Safe Working Practices, Company's Procedures and proper ORB recordkeeping using relevant SMS procedures and INTERTANKO Guidance available in e-SMS.

deficiency_finding: The radio communication system can't be powered by the battery DC supply.
description_overview: During the inspection, the inspector told 2/O to cut off the AC and AC switch, but they didn't know how to do it, so he switched off the DC breaker with the AC and AC switch.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The training of the DC power operation for the HF/MF onboard was not done well.
corrective_action: The electrical engineer was scheduled to attend the vessel to fix the issue and provide the training on DC operation for the master and related crew.
preventive_action: To avoid a similar recurrence in fleet in future, the DC function of HF/MF should be checked and tested regularly.

deficiency_finding: There are no liens at the Baltimore Management Panel.
description_overview: There was no evidence of familiarity in the emergency duties of the last crew members.
immediate_causes: An arrangement was made to fix the emergency fire pump.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of safety awareness onboard.
corrective_action: The staff placed the mat during the inspection.
preventive_action: During the weekly round, the officer in charge is reminded to conduct a thorough inspection.

deficiency_finding: There isn't an emergency light for the free fall launch area.
description_overview: There are adequate guidelines incorporated in the safety manual and the abandoned ship drills.
immediate_causes: Bulk carrier was stated in the ship's classification certificate, along with other cargo ships.
root_cause_analysis: Installation wasn't done on the ship's design and drawing.
corrective_action: The emergency light was installed on the poop handrail.
preventive_action: Master and Chief Officer will supervise the duty persons.

deficiency_finding: The machinery, boilers, and other pressure vessels associated piping systems and fittings should be of a design and construction adequate for the service for which they are intended.
description_overview: The boat cooling water port was blocked by a fire.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: The officer noticed a leak from the cooling water line.
corrective_action: To address the problem, our crew was instructed to conduct a comprehensive inspection of all cooling water lines, to identify any loose, or inadequately tightened connections.
preventive_action: During the Safety Committee Meeting, the deficiency along with corrective and preventive actions were discussed.

deficiency_finding: The weapon is being tested at the factory.
description_overview: All emergency lights are checked on a weekly basis as part of the port pre-arrival checks by the electrical officer.
immediate_causes: Substandard Act by External Party (Not Under Own Control)
root_cause_analysis: During the first test, the three-way valve activated, triggering both audio and visual alarms.
corrective_action: The engine crew repeated the test multiple times after the inspector left the vessel.
preventive_action: Proper resetting procedures (15 PPM test) that need to be applied at all times were offered for refresh training.

deficiency_finding: There are no posted schedules for keeping an eye on the engine room.
description_overview: The deficiency was fixed by the PSC inspector.
immediate_causes: DirectCauses - Unsafe Acts/ Unsafe conditions: failure to follow R&R/ SSP, failure to secure, inadequate guards & barriers, indirect causes
root_cause_analysis: The 3rd Officer forgot to replace the table because of Lack of Due Diligence.
corrective_action: Posted a table in the control room and checked all the post offices to make sure there were no missing documents.
preventive_action: There needs to be a complete training on how to use the arsenal table.

deficiency_finding: The air conditioning unit is malfunctioning.
description_overview: There are excessive belts on between the motor and compressor.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The Galley AC was found to be out of order after the AMSA inspection.
corrective_action: The faulty AC compressor was replaced and the unit was found to be functioning.
preventive_action: The deficiency was brought to the attention of the fleet at a safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: The books of engine parameters should be kept.
description_overview: The record books of engine parameters are not always filled in.
immediate_causes: The third mate was not aware of the special requirements of the Nav logbook regrading drill record.
root_cause_analysis: The engineer's duties can cause records not to be done consistently.
corrective_action: NOx related records were supplemented immediately.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer instructed on records related to NOx.

deficiency_finding: The safety lamp is not ready for use.
description_overview: The inspector demanded to check the sample from the discharge pump after he was informed about the status of the overboard valve.
immediate_causes: During the sea passage, the embarkation ladder shackles were disconnected to protect the rope end from exposure to the sea, but they were not reconnected after passing through an area of heavy weather.
root_cause_analysis: The importance of FFE appliances was neglected by 3/O.
corrective_action: 3/O immediately tightens the loops lump bulb and safety lamp.
preventive_action: ISM PIC implemented an enhanced monitoring program for 3/O's routine inspection duties of FFE.

deficiency_finding: On the main deck and entrances, there is information that the ship has closed circuit television cameras, however, according to the SSP, it does not have that security equipment.
description_overview: The equipment was not listed in the SSP.
immediate_causes: There is a person named Nil.
root_cause_analysis: There is a person named Nil.
corrective_action: There is no requirement to include the equipment in SSP.
preventive_action: There is a person named Nil.

deficiency_finding: The meat room has food waste in it.
description_overview: It was not possible to confirm if the disposal method of the operational garbage was in line with the MARPOL rules because the Garbage Log did not record it.
immediate_causes: The Master and C/O didn't know how to enter the Garbage Log.
root_cause_analysis: The vessel was drifting at the coast of Poland due to the delayed berthing schedule.
corrective_action: Conducted training to all ship personnel to follow the garbage management plan.
preventive_action: To ensure the onboard housekeeping is maintained in a good manner, the master should conduct a joint inspection with the head of department.

deficiency_finding: An Indian crew is holding scanned Medical Certificates.
description_overview: The emergency steering drill procedure was not followed.
immediate_causes: Failure to comply with Customer / Stakeholder requirements is an immediate cause-substandard act.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of competence is one of the personal factors.
corrective_action: Office assistance will be needed to get new certificates from the medical center.
preventive_action: To verify the certificates prior to the crew member joining the vessel.

deficiency_finding: Medical fitness for a second engineer who isn't on board.
description_overview: A drill has been conducted in order to complete the mission.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: After the 2nd engineer boarded the vessel, a black and white copy of the medical certificate was provided.
corrective_action: The original medical certificate was given before the departure from Port of Boryeong.
preventive_action: Section 3 Management of Crew Qualifications and Certificates and Section 4 Medical certificates should be provided to the all fleets, in the Crew Management, as requested by the revision of the phrase.

deficiency_finding: Incinerator - pressure gauge
description_overview: There is a light on the boat deck.
immediate_causes: There was a broken light bulb on the boat deck.
root_cause_analysis: When the main burner is started, the pressure on the burner goes up and the pressure on the burner goes down.
corrective_action: Chief Engineer told the crew to take a photo of the ignition burner pressure gauge.
preventive_action: The method of giving proper explanation to inspectors was taught by the Chief Engineer.

deficiency_finding: The crew won't be allowed to work at height when they prepare the cargo in this voyage.
description_overview: The crew won't be allowed to work at height when they prepare the cargo in this voyage.
immediate_causes: The crews were not aware of the requirement of shipboard maintenance by painting and store management procedure.
root_cause_analysis: The associated permit to work - Work Aloft Permit could not be located at the time of inspection due to inadequate filing of the permits.
corrective_action: The work permits were filed in the Chief Officer's system and code 10 was given by PSCO.
preventive_action: The importance of accurate record keeping of the permits to work for the maintenance tasks was emphasized during the meeting.

deficiency_finding: Local fish area safety navigation information is not included in the passage plan.
description_overview: Gas concentration safety checks have not been recorded in the ship's logbook.
immediate_causes: Senior's staff did not monitor and update the Garbage Management Plan.
root_cause_analysis: The master didn't check the feasibility of the voyage plan.
corrective_action: Timely review and correct the voyage plan prepared by the second officer.
preventive_action: The voyage plan should be prepared in strict accordance with the company system.

deficiency_finding: On board training and instructions.
description_overview: The SOLAS training manual is incomplete and not vessel specific.
immediate_causes: The ship's plans for recovery of person from the water were not mentioned due to lack of review and supervision by the master and the person in charge.
root_cause_analysis: The SOLAS training manual contains the recovery of rescue boat general instruction.
corrective_action: The specific instruction was attached to the SOLAS training manual.
preventive_action: The crews should check the SOLAS training manual for the specific equipment.

deficiency_finding: There is no eye wash in the paint locker.
description_overview: The limit switches for each door from bridge to navigation locker and stairway, which are installed to avoid obstructing vision of bridge watch by lighting from other places, were not moving smoothly during inspection.
immediate_causes: There is an eye wash station in the steering room next to the engine workshop.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of proper supervision by the safety officer.
corrective_action: To place the new eye wash kit in the paint locker.
preventive_action: The instructions for eye wash kits will be posted in the paint and chemical store.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence if adequate rest is granted.
description_overview: deficiency was raised during the Port State Control Inspection.
immediate_causes: Rules, regulations or procedures are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: There were no records for the month of April that the duty engineer's hours of work and rest were recorded.
corrective_action: When their normal rest was disturbed by an alarm, duty engineers recorded the time on their record of hours of rest.
preventive_action: If an alarm is activated at duty engineer's watch, it should be recorded as their normal period of rest is disturbed, even if it's a false alarm.

deficiency_finding: The vessel does not carry ETO because of the expired shore based maintenance agreement.
description_overview: Technical teams worked with the vessel on trouble shooting and attendance of the maker's technician during dry dock in March 2024 after the scrubber dumper inoperable condition was reported to the technical department.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The latest shore based maintenance agreement was not provided by the technical department.
corrective_action: A new shore based maintenance agreement has been provided by the company technical department.
preventive_action: The CTO gave a warning to the company's technical department.

deficiency_finding: Vegetables in storage are rotten.
description_overview: The inspector's comment was acknowledged.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't notice the rotten or spoiled provisions in the fruits area.
corrective_action: The rotten fruits were removed from the vegetable room and placed in the garbage area.
preventive_action: Finding will be communicated to all vessels, under the management in the form of Fleet Notice, aiming to avoid re-occurrence, requesting a refresh training of the catering staff with the company's Catering Handbook.

deficiency_finding: The expired date was for the HRU marking.
description_overview: The company must take corrective action on the ISM system within 3 months.
immediate_causes: Not under their control.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient practice.
corrective_action: The importance of checking the equipment's expiry date was discussed during the safety meeting.
preventive_action: The importance of checking the HRU actual expiry was discussed during the safety meeting.

deficiency_finding: Mixed garbage was found in the engine room, as well as oily rags and a broken waste bin.
description_overview: The PSC team found oily rags in the engine room.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given and the deficiency was fixed on-site during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: Our procedures mandate strict compliance with the requirements of MARPOL Annex V and a specific garbage management plan, including the segregation and storage of each garbage category is available on board each vessel.
corrective_action: The damaged bin was removed, the pre arrival form was amended, and the corrective actions were verified by the PSC officers.
preventive_action: The above observation will be spread across the rest of the fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: HULL CRACKING IS A CONSEQUENCE OF COLLISION WITH A BARGE DURING BUNKER OPERATION.
description_overview: There are numerous pipe support on the main deck that are cracked and Wasted.
immediate_causes: There were 6 pieces of pipe support that were corrosive and 3 that werecracked due to insufficient maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: Green Pearl was damaged due to the inability of the Bunker barge to maneuver.
corrective_action: The ship's damages were repaired at the shipyard.
preventive_action: After repairs were done at Las Palmas Shipyard, deficiency was issued by the PSC officer.

deficiency_finding: The Safety Management System has failed to ensure safe operation safety of crew and safety management.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: The door wasn't closing due to Deformation.
root_cause_analysis: Complacency on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on the part of the company on
corrective_action: The training and education onboard should be conducted as per the SMS Procedure.
preventive_action: Use of onboard video training as provided in the e-video training modules of KARCO to supplement the training and drills conducted onboard.

deficiency_finding: Automatic telephone is out of service.
description_overview: Code 17.
immediate_causes: The documentation was reviewed by the master with proper clarifications provided.
root_cause_analysis: The PSCO asked the ship's staff to test the communication system in the steering gear room, but they didn't want to wait for it.
corrective_action: The communication system has once again been invited to be checked by the PSCO, and the same has been accepted before leaving the vessel.
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: The officer in charge of the GMDSS station could not send a message from one satellite to the other.
description_overview: The officer in charge of the GMDSS station could not send a message from one satellite to the other.
immediate_causes: A malfunction in the antenna unit caused the system to stop working.
root_cause_analysis: The officer couldn't send a message from one Inmarsat to the other because of his stress.
corrective_action: Additional training was conducted to all deck officers to correct the deficiency.
preventive_action: Bridge officers are well trained in proper use and test of equipment.

deficiency_finding: The temperature in the freezer was recorded at -12 and -14 for the entire month of March.
description_overview: The refrigerators that were put in place didn't have thermometers installed.
immediate_causes: The temperature gauge was not checked.
root_cause_analysis: The company procedures were not followed and the portable temperature meter was giving an incorrect temperature.
corrective_action: A new temperature meter will be purchased in the next port of call after the freezer was found to be -22 degrees Celsius.
preventive_action: The temperature log will be sent to the SHEQ department on a monthly basis by the master.

deficiency_finding: The second officer is not familiar with the operation of the equipment.
description_overview: The second officer is not familiar with the operation of the equipment.
immediate_causes: The Chief Officer presented the plan to the officer.
root_cause_analysis: The 2nd officer was aware of the use of GMDSS equipment in the past but was not able to demonstrate it.
corrective_action: Master carried out Familiarization training for the Bridge team for the operation of equipment.
preventive_action: Master reviewed this deficecny with the brdge team and it was agreed that as a weekly routine each deck officer to deostrate usage of GMDSS equipment to other team members and if any doubt on the operation to be clarified during the training session.

deficiency_finding: Liferafts are not connected in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
description_overview: Steering gear room has an oil store.
immediate_causes: The chief officer took the waste paint off the safety pins.
root_cause_analysis: Senior officer is unaware that the liferafts prevent its release.
corrective_action: Make sure liferafts are secured separately.
preventive_action: The case should be sent to the fleet as a lesson.

deficiency_finding: There was nothing visible from the Engine Room side.
description_overview: The log book is not verified by the master.
immediate_causes: The ship's hull has a'scratch' measuring approximately 3mm deep and 700mm long, which was confirmed by an inspection from inside the engine room.
root_cause_analysis: There is no sign of welding or hot work on the inside of the ship, which is why the PSC Officer referred to the visible sign of corrosion as a "burn mark".
corrective_action: The inspector was adamant that the matter be reported to Class, despite a photograph showing that there was no evidence of a previous repair or welding mark.
preventive_action: The photographs show that only a cosmetic upgrade is required, which has already been completed.

deficiency_finding: The engine room is not clean.
description_overview: The oil was found under the equipment in the engine room.
immediate_causes: Poor order.
root_cause_analysis: The cleaning/resurfacing is inadequate.
corrective_action: Immediate oil was removed and cleaned.
preventive_action: Discussed the oil spill drill with the crew.

deficiency_finding: The cover for the emergency stop cargo pump is missing.
description_overview: There are other DEFICIENCIES.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There is inadequate technical design and design criteria.
corrective_action: The additional protection cover was installed in keeping with the continuous improvement policy of the company.
preventive_action: The crew members were briefed on the importance of good planning during the monthly safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: Main engine, D.G no.1 and D.G no.2 are overhauled.
description_overview: According to the PSC report, there was a failure to report a malfunctioning auxiliary generator while the vessel was in Australian waters.
immediate_causes: Important rules are missing.
root_cause_analysis: The company offered to provide reports from the office but this was refused.
corrective_action: Correct extracts were sent to the PSC officer after new hardware was sent onboard.
preventive_action: In case of malfunction, the company should be immediately notified for additional actions.

deficiency_finding: The working hours of crew who attended the drills did not correspond to the actual hours in the Record of Hours OF Rest of Seafarers.
description_overview: The working hours of crew who attended the drills did not correspond to the actual hours in the Record of Hours OF Rest of Seafarers.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were offered.
root_cause_analysis: The Chief Officer admitted that the wrong entries had been recorded.
corrective_action: The incorrect entries were corrected.
preventive_action: The Master conducted a training session on the proper rest hours recording after the deficiency was discovered.

deficiency_finding: The exhaust gas temperature gauge is not readable.
description_overview: The Electrician and the 2nd Engineer were found to have expired.
immediate_causes: The crewmember failed to comply with procedures.
root_cause_analysis: There is oversight.
corrective_action: The auxiliary engines are covered under the ship specific computerized plan maintenance system.
preventive_action: We shared the observation with all the vessels.

deficiency_finding: During the first call and shift of the ship to West Hinder anchorage, only partial discharge is allowed due to insufficient amount of water on board.
description_overview: The discharge of water in a port is not required.
immediate_causes: The Techcross ECS 600 BWTS systems are fitted to the vessel.
root_cause_analysis: The system was retrofitted in Jan 2016 to comply with the regulations.
corrective_action: The flag state advised that if the management of the water in the port is needed to be deviated from, the office should inform the vessel's flag state.
preventive_action: Modification of the system was recommended by BWTS makers and accepted by the office.

deficiency_finding: There was no evidence that frequent inspection is carried on board.
description_overview: An Occasional Survey was carried out at the request of the owner after deficiencies were pointed out by the USCG Mobile.
immediate_causes: The master was not occupied at other tasks.
root_cause_analysis: The master didn't show the inspector the proper check list, he didn't refer to it in the log book.
corrective_action: After checking food weekly, the master started entering the deck log book.
preventive_action: Master to inspect the Food and Catering and record it by using MC06 and keep it in use for any inspection master to ensure recording all check lists and inspection in the log book master to check with his officers the check lists and inspections carried out.

deficiency_finding: Exhaust gas scrubber continuous emission monitoring system unit ratio sensor is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The crew cabins are outworn.
immediate_causes: The SO2/CO2 ratio was incorrect on the monitor, but the sensor was in good order.
root_cause_analysis: Program error was not addressed in a timely manner.
corrective_action: The Scrubber monitor system was found to be in good working order after the engineer carried out trouble shooting.
preventive_action: Senior management was briefed on the importance of effective safety and inspection rounds.

deficiency_finding: The officer is not familiar with the test call procedure.
description_overview: Disregard deficiency before departure.
immediate_causes: The officer was able to perform the DSC Call testing but failed to explain to the inspector that the unit he was asking to test with is not the main unit in the system.
root_cause_analysis: There is confusion regarding the instructions posted near the unit and the procedure from the manual.
corrective_action: The navigation officers should be trained prior to departure from the port.
preventive_action: Monthly training on the operations of all Nav Equipment should be conducted by all navigation officers.

deficiency_finding: The remote control of the mooring winch is not working.
description_overview: The fire plan is not up to date.
immediate_causes: The warning system is not adequate.
root_cause_analysis: People are related.
corrective_action: The class have attended issuing a class condition and raised a spare PartRequisition.
preventive_action: The company standard procedure for establishing contact with company technical department for reporting has been completed.

deficiency_finding: There is a fluorescent bulb light flickering.
description_overview: All emergency lights are checked on a weekly basis as part of the port pre-arrival checks by the electrical officer.
immediate_causes: The actual status of the tapes is good but they are not in good shape.
root_cause_analysis: The inspector pointed out the flickering tube light and the team immediately renewed it.
corrective_action: In the wake of the inspection, the master and chief engineer were briefed on the importance of adequate lighting and satisfactory operation of all lights, as well as adequate stock of spare consumables such as Bulbs and accessories.
preventive_action: The onboard staff were instructed by Master to immediately notify the chief engineer incase any in-operational lighting is noticed onboard the vessel.

deficiency_finding: LSA retro-reflective tape is not required.
description_overview: Provision and disposition of life saving appliances are included.
immediate_causes: The inspection was inadequate.
root_cause_analysis: The Safety Officer failed to identify the deficiency at an earlier stage due to the bad weather during the Pacific Ocean crossing.
corrective_action: The rescue boats condition was pointed out by the PSC officers.
preventive_action: He emphasized that retro reflective tapes need to be in very good condition and that they should not be considered acceptable in similar cases.

deficiency_finding: Expired 19 Feb 2024, Service certificate for SSAS, Expired 19 Feb 2024, Service certificate for Radio Facilities, issued 19 Feb 2023.
description_overview: The second officer is not familiar with the code.
immediate_causes: Equipment not renewed for maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The service engineer is in the port.
corrective_action: The cargo ship safety radio certificate will be carried out before the end of the term.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The person launching on the deck cannot see the rescue boat.
description_overview: During the abandon ship drill, the crew couldn't demonstrate the launching of the lifeboat.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The wire and sheaves are not fixed to the requirement.
corrective_action: The Rescue boat can be seen by the person who launches on the deck.
preventive_action: The LSA should be checked by the third mate and CO.

deficiency_finding: The company should establish procedures to ensure that the ship is maintained in accordance with the provisions of the relevant rules and regulations and with any additional requirements which may be established by the company.
description_overview: The company should establish procedures to ensure that the ship is maintained in accordance with the provisions of the relevant rules and regulations and with any additional requirements which may be established by the company.
immediate_causes: The documentation was reviewed by the master with proper clarifications provided.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of procedure knowledge.
corrective_action: An additional ISM audit was conducted by Class KR on March 14, 2023.
preventive_action: The Engine Room Quarterly Inspection Log was maintained by the Chief Engineer.

deficiency_finding: The oil trays will be marked in Mtrs.
description_overview: The capacity bead was welded on the trays.
immediate_causes: The manual was endorsed by the classification society and there was no instructions available to make sure it was approved by the class.
root_cause_analysis: The save-alls were marked and approved by the classification society with the capacities, while the inspector requested it to be marked in metric system.
corrective_action: The save-alls were stenciled in the metric system.
preventive_action: If they get faded or painted over, the vessel's stencil capacities are added to it's list.

deficiency_finding: The person is a MLC.
description_overview: The certificates are not posted in some places.
immediate_causes: The two furniture doors in the galley were disassembled by the ship's crew and put aside due to their broken hinges and lack of food safety and situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: Not familiar with Labour Convention 2006
corrective_action: The first and second part of the MLC certs have been added.
preventive_action: The case should be shared with the fleet to remind them of the requirements.

deficiency_finding: There is a copy of the certificate not posted.
description_overview: It was MLC 2006
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew failed to post the MLC certificate.
corrective_action: The copy was posted on the spot.
preventive_action: All fleet vessels are given the deficiency along with our comments.

deficiency_finding: The protective covering of the antenna is broken.
description_overview: The crew pointed out that the connection to the ship's antenna was in need of repair and the relevant spare parts had already been ordered and delivered.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were given to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The officers failed to find a crack on the antenna.
corrective_action: The equipment was tested and found to be working.
preventive_action: Deficiency will be communicated to all Fleet via monthly alert bulletin, specially instructed to all, the importance proper examination of all LSA equipment and reporting of all defects found, even if are considered a minor nature/importance.

deficiency_finding: There was no eye wash in the locker.
description_overview: The eye wash kit was not returned after the paint room was cleaned last week.
immediate_causes: The lack of supervision by officers is one of the reasons for the inadequate awareness of crew.
root_cause_analysis: There was no eye wash in the locker.
corrective_action: There is a new eye wash bottle in the battery locker.
preventive_action: Every battery room inspection should include eye wash and chemical gloves.

deficiency_finding: There aren't enough handrails for working access to steering gear machinery and controls.
description_overview: Ladders on the port side are faulty.
immediate_causes: Fruits and vegetables are not available on the ship.
root_cause_analysis: Poor assessment of access safety management needs is one of the reasons for the failure to follow up.
corrective_action: The working performance was checked by the PIC and reported to the master.
preventive_action: Proper on-board training is carried out to promote crew's knowledge towards industry standard.

deficiency_finding: ARPA TX time's magnetron was found late.
description_overview: The suits for duty officer in bridge are not appropriate.
immediate_causes: Clarifications were offered to the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: The performance test was carried out by the end of every watch and both radars were in good working condition.
corrective_action: Instructions were given to the Chief Officer and the Electrician to prepare for the renewal of the magnetron.
preventive_action: A training session was conducted by the Master to Deck Officers and Electrician to discuss company's compliance with monitoring and maintenance of navigation equipment.

deficiency_finding: The side embarkation ladder rope was wasted.
description_overview: The rope ladder found in satisfactory condition by the officer was claimed to be not proper by the PSCO.
immediate_causes: State of embarkation ladders are assessed monthly.
root_cause_analysis: State of embarkation ladders are assessed monthly.
corrective_action: The urgent requisition was accepted by the Technical Division.
preventive_action: The information on this deficiency was sent to the entire fleet as a preventive measure on the 6th of March '23, using the form PG02-F09 'Information on ship's deficiencies'.

deficiency_finding: There is hot water in the dishwasher.
description_overview: A hazard to personnel was caused by shattered gauge glass on the hot well.
immediate_causes: Poor certificate management by Master resulted in EIAPP certificate not being returned to certificate file folder.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient knowledge by attending the RINA Surveyor to issue the proper EIAPP Certificates.
corrective_action: The hot water well was cleaned.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: The record must be filled as required.
description_overview: The vegetable room door is not sealed properly.
immediate_causes: The same serial numbers were shown for the auxiliary engines.
root_cause_analysis: The master's understanding of the certificate was inadequate and the defects raised by PSC were not clarified in a timely manner.
corrective_action: The Master reported the issue to the Supremo.
preventive_action: The certificate must be consistent with ship equipment and the master should be familiar with it.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has a fire damper.
description_overview: The number 4 Fire Damper is broken.
immediate_causes: The speaker got damaged because of rain water and the cable connection didn't work properly.
root_cause_analysis: The engine room fire damper was tested before the arrival at the port as part of pre-PSC checks.
corrective_action: The broken flap was repaired with a new spare flap and all locking linkages were inspected and tightened.
preventive_action: The onboard inspections should be strengthened to identify substandard conditions and take appropriate action to correct them.

deficiency_finding: Engine crew did not record call-out alarms at night, but did record rest in the 'work and rest hours' records.
description_overview: deficiency was raised during the Port State Control Inspection.
immediate_causes: Rules, regulations or procedures are not followed.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of compliance is caused by inadequate leadership.
corrective_action: The Company's Safety Manager will attend the vessel in order to attend the Audit.
preventive_action: The incident to be discussed during the next Safety, Occupational Health and Environmental Committee in order to avoid reoccurrence.

deficiency_finding: There is insufficient cooling water flow.
description_overview: The magnetic compass is out of order.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Incorrect inspection is caused by lack of thorough knowledge of the equipment.
corrective_action: He suspected the cooling water thermostat was faulty and removed the cover.
preventive_action: To be able to convince authorities regarding the same, all personnel should have full knowledge of the working of various sytems.

deficiency_finding: Light and life line are not provided in the vicinity of Port side Gangway.
description_overview: When the engine was stopped, the Rpm indicator was stuck on 35rpm and did not come back to zero.
immediate_causes: The rope with life buoy and light was used on the side that was farthest from the PSCO.
root_cause_analysis: The rope with life buoy and light was used on the side that was farthest from the PSCO.
corrective_action: The position of the buoy was changed.
preventive_action: It is being kept on the Gangway so that it can be used for access to ship.com instructions.

deficiency_finding: Limit switch on bridge malfunction.
description_overview: The limit switches for each door from bridge to navigation locker and stairway, which are installed to avoid obstructing vision of bridge watch by lighting from other places, were not moving smoothly during inspection.
immediate_causes: The setting position wasn't adjusted properly and the limit switches weren't touching the plate.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance.
corrective_action: In the presence of the PSCO, the ship staff immediately carried out maintenance of limit switches and function of limit switches.
preventive_action: The master has been instructed to closely monitor maintenance details through work done reports and ensure that maintenance jobs are completed accordingly and vessel staff were briefed on effective maintenance.

deficiency_finding: There are not properly marked oil spill boxes.
description_overview: The oil spill boxes were marked with their capacity and the vents with the space that they serve, but the saveall capacity was presented in barrels.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The oil spill boxes were marked with their capacity and the vents with the space that they serve, but the saveall capacity was presented in barrels.
corrective_action: The deck crew marked the savealls to show their capacity after the inspection.
preventive_action: The fleet will be made aware of the deficiency to ensure compliance.

deficiency_finding: The EIAPP certificate for Aux. 1 and 2 could not be found onboard.
description_overview: Code 17 deals with deficiency prior to departure.
immediate_causes: The same serial numbers were shown for the auxiliary engines.
root_cause_analysis: Class made a clerical error when issuing the certificates.
corrective_action: The deficiency was corrected and shown to the inspector.
preventive_action: He was told to be more careful when checking certificates after the issue was discussed with the Master.

deficiency_finding: There is an inventory of portable equipment in the plan.
description_overview: One two-way vhf radiotelphone apparatus is missing.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are job responsibilities that include inadequate leadership and/or supervision.
corrective_action: The equipment was put in a box and the inventory page was updated.
preventive_action: A weekly check.

deficiency_finding: During 1300H - 1400H, drills will be carried out, as well as C/E and 2/E at rest.
description_overview: Crew members were sent away before mustering finished and one crew member was reported missing during the drill, but nobody was actually missing.
immediate_causes: The valves were closed during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: They didn't record the hours of training and drills.
corrective_action: In order to correct the record of training and drills on their D.T.R., MASTER CARRIED out a safety meeting and instructed C/E and 2/E.
preventive_action: The training/drills must be recorded immediately in order to avoid danger.

deficiency_finding: When the oil water separator had no real water test, it still worked.
immediate_causes: The crew did not know about the 2 valves pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: Maintenance of waste oil treatment.
corrective_action: The water separator is oily.
preventive_action: I don't know.

deficiency_finding: Ventilators, air pipes.
description_overview: All the vent heads are missing.
immediate_causes: Not applicable.
root_cause_analysis: Not applicable.
corrective_action: Not applicable.
preventive_action: Senior officers were briefed by the vessel manager to include in Handing Over notes that the wire gauze is only required to be installed for oil fuel.

deficiency_finding: There is a hand crank for the lifeboat.
description_overview: There is a hand crank for the lifeboat.
immediate_causes: The emergency light was adjusted to direct its beam towards the free-fall lifeboat and the switch was relocated to a safe position.
root_cause_analysis: There are Incorrect tools, equipment or materials.
corrective_action: The vessel's immediate corrective actions were verified by the PSCO prior to the vessel's departure from the port.
preventive_action: Master, Safety Officer and his assistant Officer responsible for the LSA maintenance have been reminded on the importance of effective shipboard inspections in order to ensure that such equipment shall be readily available for immediate use at all times.

deficiency_finding: There is a control panel in the bridge for the cargo holds.
description_overview: There is no shipping document on the ship with the name of the product listed in the code.
immediate_causes: The copper concentrate can cause the false alarm.
root_cause_analysis: The cargo is moist.
corrective_action: The alarm system was found in good order after the cargo discharged.
preventive_action: Regular inspection and testing of cargo hold alarm system was done.

deficiency_finding: One window is not working properly.
description_overview: One of the windows is malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: Repairs performed and confirmed by Class - Evidence 2 and 3 Class report.
preventive_action: The additional toolbox was held with the crew prior to their departure.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency fire pump located in a forward space.
description_overview: The inspection and maintenance of the emergency fire pump are carried out as per the guidelines.
immediate_causes: The emergency generator was isolated and the supply to the emergency switchboard was cut off.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was distracted by the emergency generator and failed to communicate power isolation to the ESB.
corrective_action: The emergency generator was stopped, the isolation was removed, and the emergency fire pump was tried out to the satisfaction of the attending PSCO.
preventive_action: The Master and Chief Engineer were briefed on the importance of an adequate flow of communication during the PSC inspection.

deficiency_finding: Garbage record book has no master's signature.
description_overview: There were only self-inspection records on May 7, 2024 and a document with the inspection photos, but the self-inspection record on November 7, 2023 was missing.
immediate_causes: The master was not occupied at other tasks.
root_cause_analysis: After completing one page in the Garbage Record Book, the C/O and Master's did not sign the name.
corrective_action: Code 10 was issued after the master signed the Garbage Record Book.
preventive_action: Check the ship Garbage Record Book and other statutory Logbooks from the master.

deficiency_finding: The fluorescent bulb light is unlight.
description_overview: One of the lights in the cable duct space was unlit, but the light was immediately renewed and shown to PSCO.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: Bulb failure due to noise.
corrective_action: The electrical officer was briefed by the master to check the lights outside and inside one day before the arrival port.
preventive_action: The completion date is 06.06.2.

deficiency_finding: Oil filters are not properly maintained.
description_overview: Plastic strips were used to fix the solenoid valves that were not attached to the valve bodies.
immediate_causes: Solenoid valves are fixed with plastic strips instead of attaching them to the valve bodies because of non-compliance with procedures, permits, and safe working practices.
root_cause_analysis: Engineers must check the condition of valves Incorrect type of maintenance Engineers must check the condition of valves Incorrect type of maintenance Engineers must check the condition of valves Incorrect type of maintenance Engineers must check the condition of valves Incorrect type of maintenance Engineers must check the condition of valves Incorrect type of maintenance Engineers must check
corrective_action: Engine staff immediately removed all cable ties and all concerned OWS Solenoid valves were secured with nuts.
preventive_action: Senior officers are instructed to check and verify routine jobs after they have been completed.

deficiency_finding: There is a certificate of financial security in relation to the owners of ships.
description_overview: The financial security certificate for seafarer repatriation costs and liabilities was updated on February 20th, but was missed out in the mess rooms.
immediate_causes: The P&I certificate copy that was on display in the Mess room was outdated and not replaced with a new one.
root_cause_analysis: The outdated certificate was overlooked during weekly rounds and safety inspections which led to the deficiency.
corrective_action: The old certificate was replaced with a new one.
preventive_action: The master's monthly verification checklist has been updated to include checking posted certificates for expired certificates.

deficiency_finding: There is an emergency fire pump located in a forward space.
description_overview: The inspection and maintenance of the emergency fire pump are carried out as per the guidelines.
immediate_causes: The emergency generator was isolated and the supply to the emergency switchboard was cut off.
root_cause_analysis: The crew was distracted by the emergency generator and failed to communicate power isolation to the ESB.
corrective_action: The emergency generator was stopped, the isolation was removed, and the emergency fire pump was tried out to the satisfaction of the attending PSCO.
preventive_action: The Master and Chief Engineer were briefed on the importance of an adequate flow of communication during the PSC inspection.

deficiency_finding: There are ventilators in the store.
description_overview: There are ventilators in the store.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The protection cover wasn't identified during the inspection.
corrective_action: Put the guard in place.
preventive_action: As per the schedules, all vents will be inspected.

deficiency_finding: A handrail on the starboard side main deck is broken.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: At the time of the inspection, the Chief Officer had already identified the abnormality and the required rectification works were added to the vessel's schedule in order to be conducted in due course.
corrective_action: The crew of the vessel rectified the handrail section.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was told to inspect the railings one more time and report the findings back to the office.

deficiency_finding: There are steam pipe and pressure pipes.
description_overview: The cargo is listed in the shipper's declaration as a group B cargo, but there is no information on the chemical hazard of the cargo.
immediate_causes: Lack of supervision and inadequate job planning.
root_cause_analysis: During the last monthly inspection in December of last year, a few flanges were observed with slight rust.
corrective_action: The steam pipe's cosmetic upgrade plan is being reviewed and prioritized.
preventive_action: The observation was discussed in the monthly safety meeting and it was emphasized that routine checks on the pipelines must be conducted as per company's requirements and if opportunity is available, the pipelines/flanges / corroded sections must be derusted and painted.

deficiency_finding: The last edition of the volume is not up to date.
description_overview: There are no drills visible on the company form III.3.1.3 Drill & Training log.
immediate_causes: The vessel did not have to have certs onboard.
root_cause_analysis: The latest edition was not sent on time.
corrective_action: The next port of call for the edition will be Brazil.
preventive_action: To be provided at the first port of call, latest editions of publications must be sent onboard on time.

deficiency_finding: Seafarers will be provided with a copy of the on-board complaint procedures applicable on the ship.
description_overview: The onboard complaint procedures don't specify contact information for the competent authority in the seafarers country of residence, and the name of a person or persons onboard the ship who can, on a confidential basis, provide seafarers with impartial advise on their complaint and otherwise assist them in following the compliant procedures available
immediate_causes: There were different locations for fire nozzles.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient supervision.
corrective_action: There were compliant procedures, forms, and updated national contact numbers list posted in all the mess rooms for easy and every time reachable positions for all crew.
preventive_action: Instructions were given to the Safety Officer to attach the onboard complaint procedure form with national and flag administration contact details.

deficiency_finding: The Cybersecurity drill is not in the matrix.
description_overview: The drill was for Steering gear failure.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow instructions.
corrective_action: It's a good idea to use the updated SMS file.
preventive_action: Share information with the fleet to make sure it doesn't happen again.

deficiency_finding: The engine room has missing means of escae markings.
description_overview: A portable gas detector.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: There wasn't enough marking in the engine room.
corrective_action: The escape route was painted but not enough.
preventive_action: Company staff will check when they visit a vessel.

deficiency_finding: Personal protection.
description_overview: The emergency showers were not ready to use because the water was drained.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Human performance difficulties are not followed.
corrective_action: Prior to calling the port, the vessel had prepared for the cold weather by checking the emergency eyewash and showers.
preventive_action: The crew members were briefed on cold weather preparations and procedures and the Chief Engineer explained the functioning of the equipment.

deficiency_finding: Garbage disposal placards are not displayed in the garbage room.
description_overview: The MARPOL garbage disposal placards are missing from the garbage room on the main deck.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of situational awareness.
corrective_action: Placards were placed immediately.
preventive_action: The awareness is raised by publishing PSC inventory and Lessons Learned in the Quarterly Safety Bulletins.

deficiency_finding: The CO2 room fan is malfunctioning.
description_overview: The engine room can't explain why the agent neutralizing tank is in alarm when the system is switched on.
immediate_causes: There was a small leak from the isolation valve during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: During the emergency stop test, the circuit breaker in the emergency operator room was switched off and neglected to be switched back on.
corrective_action: The circuit breaker in the emergency generator room was switched back on after the PSCO closed the deficiency.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness and prevent re-occurrence, this deficiency will be sent to the whole fleet.

deficiency_finding: Many officers are not as large as they should be.
description_overview: The vessel was aware of the problem and was going to fix it.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The suits provided by the new building shipyard were only universal in size, so they didn't fit the average height of the crew.
corrective_action: Medium size suits will be supplied at the port.
preventive_action: In addition to the legal number of universal size immersion suits, the company decided to supply 2 sets of medium size immersion suits to all managed vessels.

deficiency_finding: There were several doors that weren't properly closing.
description_overview: The starboard side freeboard marks, forward and middle draft marks, and Plimsoll mark are not fully painted.
immediate_causes: The equipment is defective.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient maintenance.
corrective_action: The dogs were adjusted and lubricated.
preventive_action: The crew was briefed on all the deficiencies with the help of the Fleet Supremo and Internal Auditor.

deficiency_finding: D-1 operations were issued for a time period beyond the first IOPP renewal survey.
description_overview: There were not ship specific and missing information in the fire safety operational booklet.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
