root_cause_analysis: The root cause is the Technical Manager's and the Master's omission to ensure that the data on the IOPP certificate is corresponding to the actual condition onboard.
corrective_action: A revised IBWM certificate was issued for D-2 only after the class attended the vessel.
preventive_action: The master was told to always check the certificates as per the vessel's particulars and equipment during the extra ordinary safety committee meeting.

deficiency_finding: Scupper from deck going off into the water.
description_overview: Scupper from deck going off into the water.
immediate_causes: C/E immediately went to Isolate to fix or replace the damaged pipe.
root_cause_analysis: During PSC inspection, it was discovered that the hull plate deck scupper hole is blocked by foreign material, and it was not identified by the crew in advance.
corrective_action: There were foreign substances blocking the deck hole on the hull side, and after removing them, the problem was solved.
preventive_action: The comprehensive inspection for all vessels was completed by February 16, 2024 after we promoted the issue of foreign substances blocking the deck hole on the hull side.

deficiency_finding: The instructions in the ballast water record book were not followed by some entries.
description_overview: The instructions in the ballast water record book were not followed by some entries.
immediate_causes: Incorrect interpretation of entries will be made in BWRB.
root_cause_analysis: Insufficient review of BWRB entries.
corrective_action: The guidance for recording entries in the Ballast water record book has been corrected.
preventive_action: feedback is shared with all fleet vessels

deficiency_finding: There is a portable fire extinguisher on the bridge, steering room and galley.
description_overview: One two-way vhf radiotelphone apparatus is missing.
immediate_causes: As per Solas, one of the portable fire extinguishers intended for use should be near the entrance of the space.
root_cause_analysis: As per class approved fire safety plan, the fire extinguishers were kept in the location after delivery.
corrective_action: One of the portable fire extinguishers is to be kept near the entrance door of the Galley, Bridge and Steering gear room.
preventive_action: Senior officers to verify that one of the portable fire extinguishers is kept near the entrance for easy access during fire and same amended in fire plan with the consent of Class.

deficiency_finding: The ship's declaration of security does not include details of the port facility.
description_overview: There is no cabin available for the crew member.
immediate_causes: Master failed to notify agents about change in plans.
root_cause_analysis: Transferring information with external parties is adequate.
corrective_action: The Master requested the agents to fill out the ship's declaration of security and submit it to the Port state control inspector.
preventive_action: The vessel's Supdt talked to the Master about the importance of filling up the DOS and how the observation would be shared with vessels.

deficiency_finding: Several prominent locations in the engine room are missing Escape route signs.
description_overview: The security gratings on A deck were secured with a padlock, preventing immediate access or escape in case of emergency.
immediate_causes: As per their advice, interim repairs were carried out pending renewal of the entire combustion chamber.
root_cause_analysis: The escape routes since the ship's delivery and builder's are adequate to guide someone to emergency exit and escape means.
corrective_action: There is an additional escape route sign in the engine room.
preventive_action: The escape routes for the rest of the ships will be reviewed and additional signals added where required as a result of this item being sent within the company's fleet.

deficiency_finding: The plan for the recovery of people from the toilet is not applicable to the ship.
description_overview: The board where the security level was written was not visible.
immediate_causes: The Plan For The Recovery of Person From The Water manual does not include specific missing characterestic and limitation of equipment intended to be used for the recovery operations.
root_cause_analysis: Recovery of persons from the water was a part of the Safety Management System in Contingency Plan.
corrective_action: After inspection, chapter 4 was obtained and a separate plan was created for the vessel.
preventive_action: Recovery from persons form water will be removed from the contingency plan.

deficiency_finding: The room is dirty.
description_overview: The magnetic compass is out of order.
immediate_causes: There are bad equipment.
root_cause_analysis: A thorough cleaning of the area could not be done at the time of the inspection because of the routine maintenance that had just been completed.
corrective_action: The area was thoroughly cleaned.
preventive_action: The senior staff were briefed on the importance of keeping the engine room clean.

deficiency_finding: The oil was found during the inspection.
description_overview: Provision and disposition are included in lifebuoys.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew had identified the small amount of oil on the earlier stage.
corrective_action: Stbd side bilge was cleaned after detection of PSCO.
preventive_action: As part of awareness, deficiency was brought to all fleet vessels to remind them of the importance of similar defects.

deficiency_finding: Work hours and rest hours do not reflect actuals.
description_overview: C/E is not familiar with essential shipboard procedures.
immediate_causes: The crew takes input the work and rest hour.
root_cause_analysis: The permit for entry into enclosed space carried out by the Chief Officer was mentioned during the PSC inspection.
corrective_action: The permit was replaced by a corrected one.
preventive_action: The Master must make sure that the operations are always reflecting the actual work hours of the crew.

deficiency_finding: The auxiliary engine found oil leaking from the F.O filter.
description_overview: There was no fitness equipment in the gym.
immediate_causes: A spare bottle of the SCBA was partially filled.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient time for maintenance and arrival preparation.
corrective_action: The oil stain from the F.O filter was checked by the chief engineer and immediately corrected by the PSC officer on board.
preventive_action: During the monthly safety meeting, the issue was brought to the attention of the officers and ratings.

deficiency_finding: The Boiler is out of order.
description_overview: The Boiler is out of order.
immediate_causes: The engine personnel determined that the bulb was broken due to the excessive noise in the engine room.
root_cause_analysis: There was insufficient monitoring by the person in charge.
corrective_action: The light bulb was replaced by the ship crew.
preventive_action: Engine personnel should be aware that light bulbs are prone for damage at sea and at berths.

deficiency_finding: There is one international shore connection that does not have 4 washers.
description_overview: The equipment was found to be satisfactory, but the PSCI noticed that there was a valve attached.
immediate_causes: Poor housekeeping.
root_cause_analysis: The missing washers remained unidentified and the defect remained unrectified.
corrective_action: The defect was fixed with the four washers.
preventive_action: Training was done for the deck department for proper inspection and maintenance of FFE and LSA items.

deficiency_finding: The fixed gas detection cabinet needs to be repaired prior to the cargo discharge operation.
description_overview: The fire screen for the valve is broken.
immediate_causes: There was a malfunction with the sample pump.
root_cause_analysis: The human factor is inadequate inspection and follow up.
corrective_action: Each person carried a personal gas detector along with an EEBD while entering the pump room.
preventive_action: An unsafe condition was raised in the safety management system.

deficiency_finding: There is a plastic container in the ER.
description_overview: The crew overhauled the mushroom and forgot to re- connect the cables.
immediate_causes: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
root_cause_analysis: Failure to follow R&R, fire hazard, and inadequate supervision were identified in the root cause analysis.
corrective_action: The metal drums were secured in the ER and were transferred from the plastic container.
preventive_action: An audiovisual training material was used to teach the engine crew about proper lubrication in their engines, as well as fire prevention in the ER.

deficiency_finding: The crew was unfamiliar with the operation of oily water separator and its oil content monitoring system.
description_overview: The crew couldn't say anything to the inspector because there weren't any valves on the diagram.
immediate_causes: The crew did not know about the 2 valves pointed out by the inspector.
root_cause_analysis: nil
corrective_action: Training was done for all engine crew on the operation of oily water separator.
preventive_action: Crew to participate in weekly testing and operation of oily water separator.

deficiency_finding: The Maritime Labour Certificate can only be valid when the DMLC is attached.
description_overview: There is a manual for P and A.
immediate_causes: Poor record keeping.
root_cause_analysis: The cover letter to the DMLC II document states that the Error in Interpretation of the vessel is reviewed and issued by Indian flag administration.
corrective_action: The class IRS has issued the vessel with a certificate on behalf of the flag state.
preventive_action: On behalf of flag state, Vesel has a valid MLC certificate issued by class IRS, valid until July 2028.

deficiency_finding: The alarm for the sewage holding tank failed.
description_overview: There was oil leaking from hatch cover No.1 forward lift-up jack flexible hose end connection during the inspection.
immediate_causes: Repairs were made by shipboard staff before departure.
root_cause_analysis: Poor maintenance and supervision.
corrective_action: The high level alarm is tested on a weekly basis.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer was briefed by the engine room staff.

deficiency_finding: The engine room air conditioner isn't working.
description_overview: The anti-heeling system is not good.
immediate_causes: The Bridge A/C unit was switched off when the galley fire alarm was being tested.
root_cause_analysis: All living conditions and spaces should be maintained and equipment should be in good order at all times according to the company's established procedures.
corrective_action: The PSCI report states that the air conditioner unit was replaced by a new one.
preventive_action: A post-inspection analysis to identify weaknesses and lessons learned carried out for continuous improvement was provided to all involved shipboard staff.

deficiency_finding: The strg gear room does not have a master gyro compass.
description_overview: A gyro compass.
immediate_causes: There was a two-degree difference between the main gyro and the repeater in the steering gear room.
root_cause_analysis: The crew had become too focused on the task and failed to complete it adequately.
corrective_action: The crew immediately synchronised the repeater with the master gyro. All gyro repeaters were checked against the master gyro reading, and all were in order.
preventive_action: The Chief Engineer and the Master have been briefed by the Technical Supremo on the importance of performing the routines diligently.

deficiency_finding: There are no records in the approved training record book for the Engine Cadet.
description_overview: There are no records in the approved training record book.
immediate_causes: When heaving up the port side anchor, the windlass mooring winch gear sheared due to heavy weather.
root_cause_analysis: The Training Record Book was not signed by the officer in charge on time.
corrective_action: The training record book reflected the actual working hours of the cadet.
preventive_action: The POEA Standard Cadet Training Agreement and Program needs to be followed by all officers and engineers.

deficiency_finding: The air conditioning isn't working.
description_overview: The air conditioning is malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: The Bridge A/C unit was switched off when the galley fire alarm was being tested.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the hot weather in Malaysia, the air conditioner was notCharging the air conditioner was not properly carried out
corrective_action: After leaving Lumut, Malaysia, the ship's crew repaired the No.2 Air conditioner compressor.
preventive_action: The P.I.C of air conditioner needs to be educated.

deficiency_finding: There is an annual service report for the rescue boat.
description_overview: The second officer is not familiar with the operation of the equipment.
immediate_causes: Liaise with the company to get the fire-maintenance program for the fire doors.
root_cause_analysis: The company's established procedures clearly state that all annual/periodical LSA/FFE inspections by 3rd party technicians must be carried out in accordance to SOLAS and national regulations.
corrective_action: Master was reprimanded for not keeping the certificates folder in order.
preventive_action: The safety committee will discuss the matter during the next meeting.

deficiency_finding: The Power off of AIS was not recorded in the logbook.
description_overview: The panel was found operational after it was restored.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The Human Performance Factor - established procedure was not followed.
preventive_action: The deck officers were advised to record the power on/off times and the reason in the Logbook.

deficiency_finding: The action was taken 17 October.
description_overview: The visitor's log book is not required to be recorded.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow instructions.
root_cause_analysis: The last port complete visitor log page was not signed by SSO.
corrective_action: The complete pages of the visitor log book were immediately signed by the author.
preventive_action: After departure from every port, all the complete visitor log pages must be checked and signed by SSO.

deficiency_finding: There is one lamp in the messroom.
description_overview: The gangway watchman failed to record the security tag for one of the 2 boarding custom officers.
immediate_causes: The battery was replaced during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The lamp was in good condition at the time of the inspection.
corrective_action: The lamp is different.
preventive_action: The weekly check list will be followed by the master in order to avoid reoccurrence.

deficiency_finding: There are additional spaces in the sleeping room.
description_overview: The basin tap in the Seaman cabin is loose.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The crew members were not adequately addressed by the Master and Chief Engineer who were in charge of the inspection.
corrective_action: The cabin basin tap was inspected, the hot water valve was opened, and the shower tap was replaced with a spare.
preventive_action: There were potential deficiencies and observations discussed in the management meeting and the safety meeting onboard.

deficiency_finding: There was a larger amount of oil under the capstans.
description_overview: There was an oil stain under the drain valve of the oil tank for the Hatch Cover system.
immediate_causes: The engine crew did not spot the oil leaks.
root_cause_analysis: The leaking cover plates of the storage tank were tightened.
corrective_action: The leaking cover plates of the storage tank were tightened.
preventive_action: Crew were told during the safety meeting to be on the lookout for any leaks in the engine room.

deficiency_finding: The water depth was not recorded in the record of the operations.
description_overview: The water depth was not recorded in the record of the operations.
immediate_causes: Instructions for investigation into the root cause were offered.
root_cause_analysis: All items have been grouped into sections and although the book was filled in a chronological order with accuracy, the depth indication was not included.
corrective_action: The depth was inserted into the Ballast book and provided with evidence to the PSC.
preventive_action: The training on proper record keeping was done.

deficiency_finding: packaging of dangerous goods is not required.
description_overview: There needs to be a permanent storage compartment for dangerous goods.
immediate_causes: Accidental release of pressure and excessive environmental factors.
root_cause_analysis: Storage of chemicals is inappropriate.
corrective_action: There is a permanent arrangement to keep dangerous chemical drums in the forepeak store recess area.
preventive_action: There is a dedicated location for dangerous chemicals.

deficiency_finding: The medical certificate was not signed by the holder.
description_overview: The Medical Certificate does not have C/E's signature on it.
immediate_causes: The agent didn't report to the PSC office because he didn't receive the letter from the flag.
root_cause_analysis: C/E forgot to sign the medical certificate.
corrective_action: The medical certificate was signed by C/E.
preventive_action: Company SI will verify the certificate at the time of visit.

deficiency_finding: The engine room is dirty.
description_overview: Air valves are in a closed position.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Deficiency was experienced after the recent departure from Drydock.
corrective_action: The crew was told to clean the Engine Room and make sure it was free of obstructions.
preventive_action: In order to confirm compliance, deficiency will be distributed to all fleet vessels in terms of sharing experience.

deficiency_finding: The Safety Management System failed to ensure compliance with element 10 of the ISM code as evidenced by deficiencies 1, 2, 3 and 4.
description_overview: The company must take corrective action on the ISM system within 3 months.
immediate_causes: The actions will be implemented according to the company's requirements and ISM Code provisions.
root_cause_analysis: In order to determine whether the ISM activities and results comply with planned arrangements and are suitable to achieve objectives, an additional ISM Audit should be conducted after the completion of the AMSA inspection.
corrective_action: For verification of corrective action purposes, additional internal audit has been carried out.
preventive_action: Class Society (BV) will conduct an external audit on the vessel within three months to determine if the ISM activities and related results comply with planned arrangements and if they are suitable to achieve objectives.

deficiency_finding: There is a fire door on the main deck.
description_overview: The emergency generator is malfunctioning.
immediate_causes: The crew didn't think the cover was a defect and didn't report it.
root_cause_analysis: The latest week's inspection was done on the 5th of November and the fire doors are included in the form.
corrective_action: The new mechanics was adjusted to meet the standards of the PSC.
preventive_action: All fire doors are checked in order.

deficiency_finding: The generator's exhaust pipe has a Thermometer on it.
description_overview: The vessel couldn't demonstrate the operation of the alarm system.
immediate_causes: The officer in charge failed to inspect the exhaust gas pipe.
root_cause_analysis: The 3/E didn't know the requirement of the SMI-S-H11.
corrective_action: The training was done for the person in charge.
preventive_action: C/E should monitor 3/E's routine work according to the requirement of the SMS.

deficiency_finding: The number of people which the ship is certified to carry is not indicated in the International Sewage Pollution Prevention Cert.
description_overview: The number of people which the ship is certified to carry is not indicated in the International Sewage Pollution Prevention Cert.
immediate_causes: Incorrect documentation is one of the causes of information mismanagement.
root_cause_analysis: The number of persons which the ship is certified to carry had not been printed on the upper right corner.
corrective_action: The certificates were re-issued within 2 hours after the class was contacted.
preventive_action: The case will be given to all vessels to remind them of the importance of double-checking certificates.

deficiency_finding: There are rollers on the mooring station.
description_overview: There are not many rollers on the mooring station.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was no compliance with the guidelines.
corrective_action: The rollers were oiled and checked for movement using ropes and hands.
preventive_action: In case of any issues similar to be recorded as TDL and follow up with office for rectification plan, Master explained the importance of follow up of PMS routines and ensuring the rollers/ mooring equipment in good working condition at all times.

deficiency_finding: The portside of the #5 wing ballast tank was found to be in poor condition at the time of the inspection.
description_overview: In addition, the inspected top part of the ballast tank is not always submerged in water which caused additional wear to occur.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: Although there was no damage to the paddle, we ordered new paddles to satisfy the PSC officers.
corrective_action: The anodes were ordered to be replaced.
preventive_action: This finding together with control, root cause and corrective actions applied will be brought to crew attention during regular safety meeting on board with goal to prevent similar occurrences.

deficiency_finding: The training was not done according to the plan.
description_overview: The training was not done according to the plan.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The training record sheet attached to the BWMP was not recorded in time.
corrective_action: The training record for the ballast water management plan has been recorded.
preventive_action: Master should make sure that training records are conducted correctly and that learning is strengthened in the future work process.

deficiency_finding: The port side windlass break line is out of order.
description_overview: The Break line system of the port side windlass is out of order according to the inspector.
immediate_causes: The crew did not follow the procedure and instructions and acted in haste.
root_cause_analysis: The deficiency was caused by the failure to follow procedure, inadequate communication and act in haste.
corrective_action: The port windlass was tested in the satisfaction of the PSC inspector and the observation was corrected.
preventive_action: A conference call was held between office management and vessel senior officers to review the outcome of the PSC inspection along with the preventive actions as determined.

deficiency_finding: The tiles were found missing and cracked.
description_overview: The fresh water supply pipe had a small leak at the C-deck branch connection.
immediate_causes: There were 6 pieces of pipe support that were corrosive and 3 that werecracked due to insufficient maintenance.
root_cause_analysis: The cracked tiles were not fixed in time and the tap in the laundry room was not replaced quickly.
corrective_action: Fix the damaged tiles and install a new water tap.
preventive_action: Conduct monthly inspections of living facilities and strengthen patrols on a daily basis.

deficiency_finding: The vessel did not arrange a proper annual survey.
description_overview: During the cable break test, the fire detection system didn't show an alarm.
immediate_causes: On endorsement of annual verification, PSC decided not to write 'R.O.C.' as a country on the DOC company address.
root_cause_analysis: IAPP annual survey due date was different from the class status report.
corrective_action: The class immediately took action to update the survey status.
preventive_action: The survey status is important to make sure the annual surveys are set up correctly.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence of approval for the booklet on behalf of the Administration.
description_overview: Class approval stamp did not mention that the manual was approved on behalf of Singapore flag administration when the vessel entered into management.
immediate_causes: The Stability Manual was approved by the classification society.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of documentary awareness.
corrective_action: RO wants to have an approval with an "approved" stamp on the documents.
preventive_action: All documents related to the change of RO must be presented and approved by the RO inspector.

deficiency_finding: The Bulk Cargo Shipping Name is not specified in one of the five cargo declarations.
description_overview: The Bulk Cargo Shipping Name is not specified in one of the five cargo declarations.
immediate_causes: The chemical hazard of the cargo was not specified in the declaration.
root_cause_analysis: There was an incorrect document in one of the cargo declarations.
corrective_action: Please immediately ask for the correct and complete details of the cargo declaration.
preventive_action: All cargo documents are checked before they are accepted.

deficiency_finding: Not entered 'Drill' in the record of hours of rest.
description_overview: The work rest hours of C/E last month could not be accessed due to a software issue.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were provided.
root_cause_analysis: The data was transferred to the software after the IT department fixed the software issue.
corrective_action: The record was immediately updated when noticed and presented to the PSC inspectors, who verified the correct reports previously made in hard copy.
preventive_action: The office will randomly verify the rest hour records against the drill reports during the month-end reviews.

deficiency_finding: There are fire doors and openings in fire.
description_overview: The self-closing door at the poop deck is malfunctioning over time.
immediate_causes: Insufficient crew awareness on fire prevention.
root_cause_analysis: The proper closing of the fire doors is checked monthly by the crew, as required by the company.
corrective_action: The door closing mechanism is adjusted.
preventive_action: The doors on the board were inspected and found to be in good working order.

deficiency_finding: Some abandon ship drill records.
description_overview: The drill was for Steering gear failure.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The officer was careless while preparing the drill record.
corrective_action: The drill record has been updated with photos from the last drill.
preventive_action: Proper record keeping of drill records is required by the responsible officer.

deficiency_finding: The bolts of the discharge connection port side were found to be corroded.
description_overview: The inspector's comment is acknowledged.
immediate_causes: The person failed to comply with the requirements.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of maintenance and a safety culture.
corrective_action: The bolts were replaced with spare ones.
preventive_action: In order to avoid such recurrence in the future, the Chief Engineer told the engine crew to always thoroughly check and renew the heavily rusted bolts of discharge connections.

deficiency_finding: Part of the eye wash was used.
description_overview: Eye wash bottles are leaking in the store.
immediate_causes: The lack of supervision by officers is one of the reasons for the inadequate awareness of crew.
root_cause_analysis: Poor inspection and supervision.
corrective_action: Eye wash bottles were removed from the place and replaced on the spot with new bottles full of liquid and sealed to the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: The PSC report and lessons learned were included in the agenda of the monthly scheduled Safety Committee Meeting.

deficiency_finding: The record of instruction in the use of radio life saving equipment was not found.
description_overview: The port side quick release life buoy line was not able to be quickly deployed.
immediate_causes: The third mate was not aware of the special requirements of the Nav logbook regrading drill record.
root_cause_analysis: The record from the beginning is not comparable.
corrective_action: There was a revision of the January 2024 record immediately.
preventive_action: All records must be comply as per chapter 3 of the book.

deficiency_finding: There is a training booklet in the mess rooms.
description_overview: There is a training booklet in the mess rooms.
immediate_causes: As amended, improper record keeping and documentation.
root_cause_analysis: As per the LSA/FFA plan, failure of sticker training booklets.
corrective_action: The training booklet that was in the mess room has been stickered.
preventive_action: Training should be given to the officers who are directly dealing with such tasks on a monthly basis.

deficiency_finding: The SOLAS Ch. I / Reg.11 ship has not been maintained after surveys.
description_overview: The condition of the ship and its equipment will be maintained in accordance with the provisions of the present regulations.
immediate_causes: There is a lack of situational awareness.
root_cause_analysis: After SOLAS surveys the condition of the ship and its equipment, it is required that any repair and maintenance work be carried out by the crew and monitored by the ship's management.
corrective_action: The crew immediately fixed the deficiencies and ordered the replacement of the spare part.
preventive_action: To conform with the provisions of the present regulations, the company's management should be instructed on proper maintenance by the crew.

deficiency_finding: It's Hull Corrosion.
description_overview: The vessel's hull is badly damaged.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic situation, the next periodical survey has been extended for 3 months.
corrective_action: All necessary actions for the repair of vessel's hull condition will be undertaken during vessel's next periodical Survey (Special Survey) at S/Y, which is scheduled to be conducted the latest by 24/1/2023.
preventive_action: The case was distributed to the fleet.

deficiency_finding: Two valid Load Line Certificates are in the file of the ship.
description_overview: The Master accidentally kept both certificates in the same file.
immediate_causes: The owners asked for help.
root_cause_analysis: Lack of documentation.
corrective_action: A lock and key has been placed on the certificate.
preventive_action: A common message will be sent to all vessels.

deficiency_finding: There is a limit on how much sledgehammer can be used on a rescue boat.
description_overview: The Emergency Diesel Generator tank was not marked for 18.0 hours of working at maximum capacity during the PSC Inspection at port Taman.
immediate_causes: The equipment is defective.
root_cause_analysis: During the last rescue boat drill, this was not the cause of the problem.
corrective_action: The new limit SWITCH has already been replaced.
preventive_action: In order to avoid re-currENCE, finding will be prioritized to all breeches.

deficiency_finding: In the emergency escape route, the emergency light is not marked.
description_overview: The Emcy light is hanging loose in the cables without mounting.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There was no sign to inspect the emergency light in the emergency escape route.
corrective_action: The lamps of the emergency lights were signed and this deficiency was immediately corrected by PSCO.
preventive_action: Make sure that all the emergency lights are marked and check the emergency light at the emergency escape route.

deficiency_finding: The ship identification number is not marked permanently.
description_overview: The ship identification number is not marked permanently.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: In front of the entrance of the ER space, a steel plate was attached to the frames to permanently mark the ship's IMO Number.
corrective_action: The vessel's class society requested to attend the vessel and verify that the position meet requirements.
preventive_action: As a lesson learnt and sharing of information the following actions were performed:

deficiency_finding: There is a fixed gas detection system in place for oil vessels of 20,000 tonnes.
description_overview: There is a fixed gas detection system in place for oil vessels of 20,000 tonnes.
immediate_causes: As per their advice, interim repairs were carried out pending renewal of the entire combustion chamber.
root_cause_analysis: The cooling fan of the fixed gas detection system broke and caused the active alarm.
corrective_action: The fixed gas detection system had a risk assessment in place.
preventive_action: The fixed Gas detection system has a monthly/ 6 monthly / Annual planned maintenance job which is inlined with the Maker's recommendations.

deficiency_finding: There is not enough recreation equipment in the gym.
description_overview: The Engine room has 4 chairs that are damaged.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: There was only one spinning bike in the gymnasium, which the PSC officer suggested not enough for crew to exercise and relax.
corrective_action: The broken chair was replaced with spare chairs on board.
preventive_action: Crew learned how important recreation facilities are for exercising and relaxing.

deficiency_finding: The garbage station is on the port side.
description_overview: In line with MARPOL Annex 5, the company's "Garbage Management Plan" details guidelines and procedures for collecting, processing, and disposing of garbage generated onboard ships.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow procedure
root_cause_analysis: The garbage station on the port side main deck didn't have a good warning system.
corrective_action: The final report of the garbage management plan was endorsed by the PSCO and all relevant posters were displayed immediately.
preventive_action: The statutory requirement of displaying various placards and posters that needs to be exhibited at various locations as required by the Garbage Management Plan was reiterated after the lapse to exhibit the placards.

deficiency_finding: The rescue boat has a towing line.
description_overview: The emergency towing manual is missing from the forecastle.
immediate_causes: I found a new edition of Marpol Consolidated in Witherby Connect.
root_cause_analysis: The officer in charge of the LSA was unaware of the towing requirement.
corrective_action: The PSCO acknowledged that the officer in charge of the LSA placed one towing line with more than 50 meters in a rescue boat immediately.
preventive_action: The crew studied the Rescue boat towing arrangement and noted one line not less than 50 meters in length of sufficient strength to tow a life raft.

deficiency_finding: There is a risk of personal injury or damage to machinery if the oil drums in the steering compartment are not properly secured.
description_overview: There are drums of garbage on the starboard side of the main deck.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: During the removal of the drums for shore disposal and the replacement of them with new drums, the crew was unable to lash the drums properly during the PSC inspection.
corrective_action: The engine crew replaced the drums in order to avoid personal injury or damage.
preventive_action: Finding will be communicated to all vessels, under the management in the form of Fleet Notice aiming to emphasize the proper lashing of equipment/drums, securing them to respective strong points in all areas on the vessel to minimize the risk of personal injury and/or damage.

deficiency_finding: The ship discharged waste into the sea, but it was wrongly recorded as discharging into the sea.
description_overview: There will be a 611.
immediate_causes: Human Factors: N/A
root_cause_analysis: The C/O was recorded in the wrong position.
corrective_action: The discharged waste position was recorded as C/O corrected.
preventive_action: The system document management regulations need to be strictly implemented.

deficiency_finding: The buzzer alarm from the main alarm panel does not work in the engine control room.
description_overview: The buzzer alarm from the main alarm panel does not work in the engine control room.
immediate_causes: The main alarm panel malfunctioned because of the PCB buzzer alarm.
root_cause_analysis: The buzzer alarm for the main alarm panel malfunctioned and the officer missed it.
corrective_action: The buzzer alarm for the main alarm panel needs to be solved by the chief engineer.
preventive_action: To ensure that proper checks and maintenance is carried out on the buzzer alarm system of the main control panel, this deficiency is to be shared across all fleet vessels.

deficiency_finding: There are lights at the emergency station panel for the A/C room to not work.
description_overview: There are lights at the emergency station panel for the A/C room to not work.
immediate_causes: The broken bulbs of indicator lights on the ship's Electrician were replaced immediately by the PSCO who was present on the scene.
root_cause_analysis: The light indicators were found to be in good working condition after being checked by the ship's electrician during the weekly critical equipment inspection.
corrective_action: The Chief Engineer issued a shorter timeframe for the replacement of bulbs affecting the light indicators of the flaps so as to ensure their proper working condition at all times. The Chief Engineer issued a shorter timeframe for the replacement of bulbs affecting the light indicators of the flaps so as to ensure their proper working condition
preventive_action: The crew was made aware of the deficiency so as to prevent it from happening again.

deficiency_finding: Crew training and familiarization records not seen during inspection are evidence for pollution prevention.
description_overview: No call-out for alarms at night were recorded in the 'work and rest hours' records.
immediate_causes: Training/familiarization records were not presented during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: The officer couldn't find the training and familiarisation records during the inspection.
corrective_action: Additional training and familiarization on the operation, procedures and maintenance of the Ballast Water Treatment System has been carried out by the Chief Officer.
preventive_action: The Master has been instructed to make sure that all on board training and familiarisation records are readily available for presentation to the PSC officers on request.

deficiency_finding: There is a battery room inside.
description_overview: There were only self-inspection records on May 7, 2024 and a document with the inspection photos, but the self-inspection record on November 7, 2023 was missing.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: The PSC officer noticed that the batteries that had been replaced were still inside the battery room.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed after thebatteries were transferred to the garbage area.
preventive_action: The safety committee will discuss deficiency during the next meeting.

deficiency_finding: Not required.
description_overview: In this way, the steering gear units can be started from a distance with possible fatal consequences for the crew working on the steering machine.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it
preventive_action: It's not like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it's like it

deficiency_finding: Fruits and vegetables are missing completely on board.
description_overview: Title3 / Regulation A 3.2.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: Physical causes are listed.
corrective_action: On 14th July, the vessel received a provision.
preventive_action: Physical.

deficiency_finding: The contact information of the authority in the seafarer's country of residence was not available.
description_overview: The action was taken 17 October.
immediate_causes: Even if validation of certificate was met according to company requirement, some crew's medical certificate was not meet U.K rule.
root_cause_analysis: After joining multi-country crew members, the documents were not updated in time.
corrective_action: To update the contact information of the complaint procedure, contact the company immediately.
preventive_action: To be familiar with the requirement of the convention, training and guidance should be enhanced.

deficiency_finding: The completion date of the survey on which the certificate is based was before the issuance of the S.C certificate.
description_overview: The vessels get the same date to fix the boiler controllers malfunction.
immediate_causes: The same serial numbers were shown for the auxiliary engines.
root_cause_analysis: The class issued certificate was not checked for clerical errors.
corrective_action: The PSCO was satisfied with the new certificate issued by the Class.
preventive_action: All certificates received onboard should be checked for details and any Typo errors should be addressed immediately.

deficiency_finding: The certificate is not required.
description_overview: The IOPP renewal date means that the vessel can no longer have a D1 status.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: There are human factors.
corrective_action: The D-1 option was struck out in order to avoid confusion with the PSCO.
preventive_action: The clarification was shared with all sister vessels.

deficiency_finding: There was no record of servicing embarkation ladders on the vessel.
description_overview: Even though the vessel has records of regular inspection of the embarkation ladders, the inspector was not satisfied due to the age of the ladders.
immediate_causes: Wear and tear.
root_cause_analysis: The embarkation ladders were built in the 19th century.
corrective_action: A new certified embarkation ladder was supplied by the TM.
preventive_action: The embarkation ladders will be checked every 5 years by the vessel and management will consider renewal based on the condition of the ladder.

deficiency_finding: The latest ship's Condition Evaluation Report is not available.
description_overview: Crew members were sent away before mustering finished and one crew member was reported missing during the drill, but nobody was actually missing.
immediate_causes: The crew did not realize that fire rounds come under work hours and missed out on recording the same.
root_cause_analysis: The last Condition Evaluation Report was lost and Master was not able to find it.
corrective_action: The Master forwarded the report to the PSC Officer.
preventive_action: The Master was discussed the captioned matter with the Technical Manager and the importance of proper filing was emphasized.

deficiency_finding: Four speakers are not working in the public address system.
description_overview: Not seen because these tools can't be stored in one place and they were kept on different places and designated places.
immediate_causes: There were different locations for fire nozzles.
root_cause_analysis: The PA system speakers on the C deck need to be inspected.
corrective_action: The ship staff was unable to repair the defect.
preventive_action: The importance of reporting any defects was emphasized to all crew members.

deficiency_finding: Boiler blow down line insulation.
description_overview: Boiler blow down line insulation.
immediate_causes: There were five charts in ECDIS that expired.
root_cause_analysis: The schedule of work plan does not include maintenance and repair.
corrective_action: The crews were educated according to the manual.
preventive_action: The case information is spread through the Shore SHEQ meeting result and company data processing system.

deficiency_finding: The crew member is entitled to 57 $/month leave pay, but only 50 are re-numerated.
description_overview: The BDN for the operation was incomplete.
immediate_causes: Lack of training.
root_cause_analysis: There is an oversight on part of the crewing team.
corrective_action: An investigation was initiated after the observation was issued to the vessel.
preventive_action: The crewing team was briefed on how to use the vessel specific wage scale.

deficiency_finding: Garbage Record Book is not maintained according to MARPOL Annex V.
description_overview: Garbage Record Book is not maintained according to MARPOL Annex V.
immediate_causes: The procedures to correct typo error mistakes were not followed.
root_cause_analysis: There is a lack of awareness in fixing typo errors.
corrective_action: The flag's instructions were followed in the Garbage Record Book.
preventive_action: Fleetwide sharing of findings and lessons learned.

deficiency_finding: InmarSAT No.2 is out of order.
description_overview: At the navigation bridge, the Inmarsat C No 2 is not working.
immediate_causes: The ship staff missed out on connecting the painter line after they disconnected the rescue boat.
root_cause_analysis: Theceiver is not connected.
corrective_action: The new INMARSAT will be installed.
preventive_action: In order to avoid huge reparing in Egypt due to customs restriction, an internal meeting was held.

deficiency_finding: The Gangway SWL mark is not as per the certificate.
description_overview: There is no mark on the port side and stbd side ladder boarding platform.
immediate_causes: There were no SWL markings on the platforms during the inspection.
root_cause_analysis: There was an internal audit of the SWL of number of persons the ladder can carry.
corrective_action: The deficiency was closed after the PSC officer disembarked.
preventive_action: The gangway certificate should be checked to determine the correct markings that should be stenciled on the lower and upper platforms.

deficiency_finding: Most cleats can't be closed, 2 are missing.
description_overview: Cargo hold entrance hatch No. 2 and No.5 are not able to close properly.
immediate_causes: Substandard acts.
root_cause_analysis: After the departure of the vessel from the port, the Chief Officer and Chief Engineer had already identified the condition and maintenance work that needed to be done.
corrective_action: The 2 missing cleats were replaced with the help of the deck crew.
preventive_action: The Chief Officer was strongly advised to follow all the Company's maintenance procedures onboard in order to ensure the vessel's good maintenance condition as required.

deficiency_finding: There were signs of decay in the rope around the area at the time of inspection.
description_overview: The rope was inspected prior to the vessel's arrival and was found to be in good order during the last drill.
immediate_causes: No defect was identified.
root_cause_analysis: Wear and tear, lack of attention, exposure to extreme conditions are some of the things that can happen.
corrective_action: The Embarkation ladder was replaced with a spare one.
preventive_action: In order to raise awareness, a safety meeting was held with all crew members in attendance.

deficiency_finding: The vessel entered the port with the ME running on VLSFO.
description_overview: SOPEP is not compliant with MARPOL Annex I Regulation 37.
immediate_causes: The crew took some fuel oil from the storage tank and put it into the emergency generator's fuel oil tank.
root_cause_analysis: The quality of communication suffered because there were too many parties in the communication process.
corrective_action: The new plan to comply with the fuel regulation was approved by the PSC.
preventive_action: Six spare fuel pumps were supplied on board to be prepared for future cases.

deficiency_finding: There is a wrong direction for the release.
description_overview: The condition of MOB was checked after the observation and it was found that an additional release pin was attached to the equipment and it was rusted.
immediate_causes: Defective equipment.
root_cause_analysis: The MOB design of the vessel was approved by Class.
corrective_action: The old supports of MOB were re-installed in order for the light release position to meet the satisfaction of the PSC officer.
preventive_action: Discussed with all responsible crew on board in order to increase their safety awareness.

deficiency_finding: The master was told to be in compliance from today.
description_overview: The company's Safety Management System provides detailed guidelines on the fuel change over procedures and appropriate entry is made in the company logbook TEC 31 - Fuel Oil & Ozone Depleting Substances Record Book, prior entry to ECA, CARB or EU Area.
immediate_causes: After the last tryout/ testing on 21st January, the ship staff failed to carry out the post operational test to ensure no obstruction on the cooling water inlet mesh.
root_cause_analysis: There was a mistake in recording the individual tank entries for the remaining quantities as required by the guidelines by the ship staff.
corrective_action: The guidelines for appropriate entries in the Sulphur record book were discussed.
preventive_action: The importance of accurate record-keeping related to sulfur record book, including the specific requirement to record individual tank quantities post- changeover has been the focus of training sessions conducted by the Further Chief Engineer.

deficiency_finding: The safety of the ship and the crew can be assured by the installation of electricity.
description_overview: During the last year, heavy weather and electric fitting boxes on the port side churchyard got damaged.
immediate_causes: During the last rescue boat drill on 19th May 2023, the wire rope for the pin of the rescue boat hook got detached from the hook while trying out.
root_cause_analysis: Electric boxes were damaged due to shipping.
corrective_action: Returned with new boxes.
preventive_action: Due to the heavy weather, there is a need for an inspection.

deficiency_finding: There is no evidence that the density of the cargo has been declared.
description_overview: The Master was instructed by the PSC Officer to request the missing separate density declaration from the shipper.
immediate_causes: Failure to follow regulations and rules is a standard act.
root_cause_analysis: The loading programs allow detailed strength and stability calculations using either the density or the cargo.
corrective_action: Shippers were quickly contacted to provide amended cargo documents.
preventive_action: All vessels and the Operations dept were given additional guidance to ensure compliance with SOLAS regulation.

deficiency_finding: The mooring lines are not properly arranged.
description_overview: The training of the code for controlling access to the ship at different security levels was given to the chief officer.
immediate_causes: There are human factors.
root_cause_analysis: The crew didn't tidy the ropes after the ship docked.
corrective_action: The crew should arrange all the ropes at the area.
preventive_action: Always keep safety and property in mind when you request an officer in charge.

deficiency_finding: The electrical apparatus should be constructed and installed in a way that does not cause injury when handled or touched.
description_overview: The electrical apparatus should be constructed and installed in a way that does not cause injury when handled or touched.
immediate_causes: Instructions for correction were given to the company.
root_cause_analysis: There are electrical hazard and inadequate identification of failure mode.
corrective_action: The ship's corrective actions were verified by the class report and forwarded to the local office.
preventive_action: Engine personnel were reminded of the importance of the adequate shipboard inspections in order to ensure that any identified oil leaks shall be promptly rectified.

deficiency_finding: The radio communication system can't be powered by the battery DC supply.
description_overview: During the inspection, the inspector told 2/O to cut off the AC and AC switch, but they didn't know how to do it, so they switched off the DC breaker with the AC and AC switch.
immediate_causes: The procedure for changing from AC to DC power was not explained by the 3rd officer.
root_cause_analysis: The training of the DC power operation for the HF/MF onboard was not done well.
corrective_action: The electrical engineer was scheduled to attend the vessel to fix the issue and provide the training on DC operation for the master and related crew.
preventive_action: To avoid a similar recurrence in fleet in future, the DC function of HF/MF should be checked and tested regularly.
